[\[36a.4\]]can ta twa prAtsh+ra zhes pa'i sgra la/_tsha sha Sha sogs kyis tsh+raSh+ra/_Sha'i Da 'os Sh+ra D+ra/_gnas med pa sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_!_ta twa prAT+ra/_si_ta twa prAD+ra/_si_ta twa prA tshau/_au/_ta twa prA tshaH_dzasra_he ta twa prAT+ra/_si_he ta twa prAD+ra/_si_ta twa prA tshaM/_amra_ta twa prA tshau/_au_ta twa prA tshaH_shasra_ta twa
[\[36a.5\]]prA tshA/_TA_ta twa prAD+b+h+yAM/_ta twa prAD+b+hiH_sogs dang bdun pa'i mang tshig la/_ta twa prAT+su/_!_tha yig mtha' can ag+ni mathra zhes pa'i sgra la/_de kho na nyid la dri ba/_gnas med pa la yang na'o dang /_dz+ha b+ha la dza ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_!_si_ag+ni matra/_me srubs pa/_ag+ni madra/_si_ag+ni ma thau/_au_
[\[36a.6\]]ag+ni ma thaH_he ag+ni matra/_he ag+ni madra/_si_ag+ni ma thaM/_sogs dang /_ag+ni mad+b+h+yAM/_ag+ni mad+b+hiH_ag+ni mat+su/_sogs so/_!_/tsa yig mtha' can prat+yats+ra zhes pa'i sgra la/_de yang atsa?'i sgra la rnam dbye thog ma lnga po pha rol la numra A ga ma ster bar bshad pas/_numra
[\[36a.7\]]byin/_dzasa?_prat+yanra/_si_ts+ra si zhes gnas pa la/_amra_sa tu'i sha tsu rnams la sha tsu 'os/_nrany+ra/_yang dag par sbyor ba'i mtha' dbyi 'os/_ts+ra phyis/_tsoHkuH_tsu'i ku'o/_/mtha'i tsa sde ni byings yin na dz+ha sa'i yi ge dang ming lar sa'i yi ge pha rol na yod pa dang tshig mtha' las
[\[36b\]]
[\[36b.1\]]kyang grangs mtshungs pa'i ka sde rnams su 'gyur te/_ny+ra ng+ra/_!_pra t+yang+ra/_de bzhin du bsgrubs pas/_gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/_pra t+yany+tsau/_au_pra t+yany+tsaH_dzasra_bod pa gsum la/_he pra t+yadra/_si_he pra t+yany+tsau/_au_he pra t+yany+tsaH_dzasa?_gnyis pa'i gcig tshig dang gnyis tshig la/_
[\[36b.2\]]pra t+yany+tsaM/_amra_pra t+yany+tsau/_au_mang tshig la/_a tse ra lo po dIr+g+hash+tsaH_si_atsa?'i dbyi zhing ring po'ang ngo /_/a ts+ra zhes pa'i sgra a yig ni shasa? sogs rnams dbyed dbyangs thog ma rnams dang /_de phan dang /_mo rkyen Ipra dang I yig rnams pha rol la dbyi zhing dbyangs snga ma de yang ring
[\[36b.3\]]por 'gyur te a phyis/_rgyu mtshan med na rgyu mtshan can yang med pas y+ra yang i la log_/de ring por bsgyur bas/_pra tI tsaH_shasa?_de bzhin du/_pra tI tsA/_TA_pra t+yag+b+h+yAM/_pra t+yag+b+hiH_sogs dang /_bdun pa'i mang tshig la/_pra t+ya k+Shu/_!_tir+Yats+ra/_zhes pa la'ang rnam dbye thog
[\[36b.4\]]ma lnga pra t+yats+ra dang 'dra zhing shasa? sogs dbyangs thog ma can rnams la cho ga mi 'dra ba yod de/_!_tir+Yang+ra/_si_tir+Yany+tsau/_au_tir+Yany+tsaH_dzasra_he tir+Yang+ra/_si_tir+Yany+tsaM_amra_tir+Yany+tsau/_au_zhes dang /_shasa?l/_ti rash+tsA da yaH_ti rash+tsa la sogs pa'o/_/ti r+Yats+ra la sogs pa
[\[36b.5\]]rnams ni shas sogs rnam dbye dbyangs thog ma can rnams dang /_de phan dang /_mo rkyen Ipra dang dud 'gro rgyags po_I yig rnams pha rol la tir+rash+tsa la sogs pa rnams su 'gyur la de yang tshig phrad kyis sgrub pa ste/_tir+Yats+ra ti rash+ts+ra tu bsgyur bas/_ti rash+tsaH_lhag ma rnams la/_ti
[\[36b.6\]]rash+tsA/_TA_tir+Yag+b+h+yAM/_tir+Yag+b+hiH_ti rash+tse/_nge_tir+Yak+Shu/_supra_sogs so/_!_/de bzhin du u dats+ra zhes pa'i sgra la'ang thog ma lnga de rnams dang 'dra la shasra sogs la ti rash+ts+ra la sogs pa 'os u dats+ra/_u dIts+ra ru bsgyur nas sgrub pa sogs byas pas/_!_shasa?_u dang+ra/_si_u
[\[36b.7\]]dany+tsau/_au_u dany+tsaH_dzasra_he u dang+ra/_si_u dany+tsaM/_amra_u dany+tsau/_au_u dI tsaH_shasa?_u dI tsA/_TA_u dag+b+h+yAM/_a dag+b+hiH_adI tse/_nge_u dak+Shu_supra_sogs so/_!_/de bzhin du samyats+ra la yang shas sogs dbyangs thog ma can la sa mIts+ra ru sgyur ba sogs byas pas/_!yang dag pa/_samyang /_si_
[\[37a\]]
[\[37a.1\]]samyany+tsau/_au_samyany+tsaH_dzasra_he sa myang+ra /_si_samyany+tsaM/_amra_samyany+tsau/_au_samI tsaH_shasra_samI tsA/_TA_samyag+b+h+yAM/_samI tse/_nge_samyak+Shu/_supra_sogs so/_!_/ta yig mtha' can ma rutra ces pa'i sgra la/_gnas med pa la yang na'o dang /_dbyangs kyis dman pa/_
[\[37a.2\]]dz+ha b+ha la dza ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_!_ma rutra/_si_ma rudra/_si_ma ru tau/_au_ma ru taH_dzasra_ma ru taM/_amra_ma ru tau/_au_ma ru taH_shasra_ma ru tA/_TA_ma rud+b+h+yAM/_ma rud+b+hiH_ma rut+su sogs so/_!_/de bzhin du ag+ni tsitra sogs mang po dag des 'gre'o/_!_/ta mtha' u yig rjes
[\[37a.3\]]'brel can las ma ha tu zhes pa la u phyis/_ma hatra/_ces gnas pa la rnam dbye rnams byin pas/_dang po'i gcig tshig la/_br-i to numra/_u r-itra dag las numra'o/_/rtags u yig dang r+r-itra rjes 'brel me gsog pa/_can rnams las/_skyes pa'i rtags kyi skabs su rnam dbye thog ma
[\[37a.4\]]lnga po dang d+hi rnams dang /_shi pha rol la yang numra A ga ma 'gyur te/_numra byin/_n+sam+ma ha to d+hau dIr+g+ha shau tsa/_nra sra apra ma hatra kyi d+hi ma yin pa la ring po ste shi la'ang ngo /_/nra yig dang sra yig gi mtha' dang apra dang ma hatra kyi sgra rnams phyis u pa d+hA'i dbyangs rnams ni d+hi bor
[\[37a.5\]]ba'i rnam dbye thog ma lnga dang shi pha rol la'ang ring por 'gyur te/_u pa d+hA ring po/_yang dag par sbyor ba'i mtha' phyis/_!_si_ma ha nra/_chen po/_gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/_ma hAn+tau/_au_ma hAn+taH_dzasra_bod tshig la/_he ma ha nra/_si_gnyis pa gsum la/_ma hAn+taM/_amra_ma hAn+tau/_au_
[\[37a.6\]]ma ha taH_shasra_gsum pa'i gcig tshig la/_ma ha tA/_TA_gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/_dz+ha b+ha la dza ba 'os/_tra dra/_ma ha D+b+h+yAM/_ma ha D+b+hiH_de bzhin du/_ma ha te/_nge_ma ha d+b+h+yAM/_ma ha d+b+h+yaH_ma ha taH_ngasi_ma hat+su sogs so/_!_/ta mtha' u rjes 'brel na b+ha batra ces pa'i sgra las/_
[\[37a.7\]]dang po'i gcig tshig la/_a twa so sau/_a tu dang sa'i si la'o/_/rkyen a tu'i mtha' dang sa yig mtha' can gyi u pa d+hA ni d+hi ma yin pa'i si pha rol la ring por 'gyur te/_!_dngos po/_b+ha bAnra/_si_gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/_b+ha ban+tau/_au_b+ha ban+taHdzasra_de bzhin du bsgrubs pas/_
[\[37b\]]
[\[37b.1\]]b+ha ban+taM/_amra_b+ha ban+tau/_au_b+ha ba taH_TA_b+ha bad+b+h+yAM/_b+ha bad+b+hiH_b+ha bat+su sogs so/_!_/ta yig mtha' r-ita rjes 'brel can b+ha ba tr-i zhes pa'i sgra la'ang r-i phyis/_si la ring por mi 'gyur gzhan thams cad sngon ma dang 'dra ste/_!_b+ha banra/_si_b+ha ban+tau/_au_b+ha ban+taH_dzasa?_

[\[37b.3\]]he pa tsanra/_si_pa tsan+taM/_amra_patsan+tau/_au_pa tsa taH_shasra_pa tsa tA/_TA_pa tsad+b+h+yAM/_pa tsad+b+hiH_pa tsat+su sogs so/_!_sha yig mtha' can bishra zhes pa'i sgra la/_tsha sha Sha sogs kyis sha Sha/_/Sha'i Da'os/_Sh+ra D+ra ru bsgyur ba sogs kyis 'tshed pa/_bsgrubs pas/_!_biT+ra/_si_biD+ra/_si_
[\[37b.4\]]bi shau/_au_bi shaH_dzasra_he biT+ra/_si_he biD+ra/_si_bi shaM/_amra_bi shau/_au_bi shaH_shasra_bi shA/_TA_biD+b+h+yAM/_biD+b+hiH_biT+su sogs so/_!_/Sha yig mtha' can ShaSh+ra zhes pa'i sgra las grangs kyi don la mang tshig kho na las mi 'jug cing /_de yang rang bzhin gyi rtags g.yog/_gsum pa
[\[37b.5\]]zhes zer te/_dang po'i mang tshig la dzasra shasra dag 'jig gos dzasa? phyis/_Sha'i Da'os/_Sh+ra D+ra ru bsgyur bas/_!_ShaD+ra/_ShaT+ra/_de bzhin du bsgrubs pas/_he ShaT+ra/_dzasra_he ShaD+ra/_dzasra_ShaT+ra/_shasra_ShaD+ra/_shasra_ShaD+b+hiH_ShaD+b+h+yaH_ShaD+b+h+yaH_zhes dang drug pa'i mang tshig la/_Sha Na zhes

[\[37b.7\]]mtha' ma yin pa la'ang tshigs mtha'i cho ga rnams bya bar bshad do/_!_/Sha yig mtha' can do Sha zhes pa'i sgra la/_dang po'i gcig tshig la/_doShAM raH_doSh+ra rnams kyi r+ra'o/_/doSh+ra/_sa dzuSh+ra/_g.yog nang zan lta bu/_A shiSh+ra/_snying nye ba/_ha biSh+ra/_sreg rdzas/_la sogs pa rnams kyi
[\[38a\]]
[\[38a.1\]]mtha'i Sha yig ni ra sa'i yi ge pha rol tu byung ba dang tshig mtha' las kyang r+ra yig tu 'gyur te/_!_doH_si_gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/_do Shau/_au_do ShaH_bod tshig la/_he doH_si_gnyis pa'i gcig tshig dang gnyis tshig la/_do ShaM/_amra_do Shau/_au_mang tshig
[\[38a.2\]]la/_shasa? sogs rnam dbye dbyangs thog ma can rnams pha rol la nra yig mtha' can du sgyur ba dang mi sgyur ba Sh+ra mtha' lag pa/_nyid kyi cho ga 'dam kha can du bshad pas/_do Sh+NaH_shasra_dzasra_do ShaH_shasra_de bzhin du gsum pa sogs la/_do Sh+NA/_TA_doShA/_TA_dor+b+h+yAM/_dor+b+hiH_ngo Sh+Ne/_nge_ngo She/_nge_
[\[38a.3\]]dor+Shu sogs so/_/de bzhin du sa dzuSh+ra zhes pa'i sgra la yang gzhan cho ga thams cad de dang 'dra ba la/_sa dzuSh+ra dang A shiSh+ra'i u pa d+hA'i dbyangs ni ra sa'i yi ge pha rol dang tshig mtha' las kyang ring por 'gyur bar bshad pas/_!_sa dzuH_si_sa dzuShau/_au_su dzu ShaH_dzasa?_he sa dzUH_si_sa dzu
[\[38a.4\]]ShaM/_amra_sa dzu Shau/_au_sa dzu ShaH_shasa?_sa dzu ShA/_TA_sa dzUr+b+h+yAM/_sa dzUr+b+hiH_sa dzu She/_nge_sa dzAr+Shu sogs so/_!_/sa yig mtha' can puM sa'i sgra las dang po'i gcig tshig la/_puM so a sung /_puMsra'i a sung ngo /_/g.yog nang zan lta bu rgyun du nye bar gnas pa'i don/_puMsra'i mtha' ni
[\[38a.5\]]rnam dbye thog ma lnga po pha rol la a sung du 'gyur te/_sra a sung+ra du sgyur/_ng+ra yig mtha' kho na 'gyur ba'i don/_u yig u r-itra dag la numra 'os don/_swa re maH_dbyangs la ma'o/_/rjes su nga ro ni dbyangs pha rol la mra yig tu 'gyur te/_pu masra si zhes gnas pa la/_u r-itra tsha_
[\[38a.6\]]ces pa'i numra byin/_nra sra apra ma hatra sogs kyis ring po dang /_yang dag par sbyor ba'i mtha' phyis pas/_!_pu mAnra/_si_de bzhin du bsgrubs pas/_gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/_pu mAM sau/_pu mAM saH_dzasra_bod tshig la/_he pu manra/_si_he pu mAM sau/_au_he pu mAM saH_

[\[38b\]]
[\[38b.1\]]be puM saHkak+sau/_mi 'byung ba la puM sa?'i su la kakra'o/_/mi 'byung ba zhes pa skyes bu ni rang nyid gcig po yin pas bdun pa'i mang tshig supra mi thob la de la rigs dang brtson pa skyed pa'i don du supra pha rol la kakra A ga ma ster bar rig byed kyi lugs tshig phrad du bsgrub pa ste/_yang
[\[38b.2\]]na kakra byin pas/_puMsa? kra su zhes gnas pa la/_skorA d+yosh+tsa/_sa? kra dag gi sngon ma'o/_/yang dag par sbyor ba sra yig dang kra yig gnyis 'dzom pa la ni gang sngon na yod pa de dbyi bar bya ste/_sngon ma'i sra phyis/_ku i la sogs kyis sra Sh+ra/_kra Sh+ra yang dag par sbyor bak+Sha_/_

[\[39a\]]
[\[39a.1\]]daM shasra/_a ne hasra rnams las pha rol gyi d+hi ma yin pa'i si ni DA zhes par 'gyur te/_si DA/_Dita la Ti phyis pas/_!_u sha nA/_si_gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/_u sha na sau/_au_u sha na saH_dzasra/_bod tshig la u sha nasra kyi na mtha' dang
[\[39a.2\]]a mtha' dang sa mtha' gsum du bshad pa ltar/_he u sha nanra/_si/_he u sha ni/_si_he u sha naH_si_he u sha na sau/_au_he u sha na saH_pa sangs/_gnyis pa sogs la/_u sha na saM/_amra_u sha na sau/_au_u sha na saH_shasra_u sha na sA/_TA_u sha no b+h+yAM/_u sha no b+hiH_

[\[39b\]]
[\[39b.1\]]a mI b+h+yaH_lnga pa gsum la/_a muSh+mAtra/_nga si_a mU b+h+yAM/_a mI b+h+yaH_drug pa'i gcig tshig la/_a mu Sh+ya/_ngasa?_gnyis tshig la/_sngon la osra la'os/_a e/_e ay+ra/_de nas/_ma la u 'os bsgrubs pas/_a mu yoH_osa?_mang tshig la/_a mI ShAM/_Amra_bdun pa

[\[39b.4\]]kaiH_b+hisa?_a mu ka smai/_nge_a mu kA b+h+yAM/_a mu de b+h+yaH_a mu ka smAtra/_nga si_a mu kA b+h+yAM/_a mu ke b+h+yaH_a mu ka s+ya/_ngasa?_a mu ka yoH_osra_che ga mo/_a mu ke ShAM/_a mu ka sminra/_a mu ka yoH_a mu ke Shu/_i ti swar swa sti byA ka ra Na s+ya sU trAd+d+ha san+tAHpul+liM gAHsa mAp+tAH_zhes

[\[40a\]]
[\[40a.1\]]u pa na d+b+h+yAMH_drug pa gsum la/_u pa na haH_ngasra_u pa na hoH_osra_u pa na hAM_Amra_bdun pa gsum la/_u pa na hi/_ngi_u pa na hauH_osra_u pa na t+su/_!_ba yig mtha' can dibra ces pa'i sgra las/_dang po'i gcig tshig la/_dibra au sau/_dibra kyi si la au/_
[\[40a.2\]]dibra kyi bra yig ni si pha rol la au yig tu 'gyur te/_!_d+yauH_si_gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/_di bau/_au_di baH_dzasra_bod tshig gsum la/_he d+yauH_si_he di bau/_au_he di baH_dzasra_gnyis pa'i gcig tshig la/_/bA mi/_amra la A yang na'o/_/dibra kyi bra yig ni rnam dbyed

[\[40a.4\]]'gyur te/_d+yub+h+yAM/_d+yu b+hiH_de bzhin du bsgrubs pas/_di be/_nge_d+yu b+h+yAM/_d+yu b+h+yaH_d+yu Shu sogs so/_!_/ra yig mtha' can tsa tur+ra gyi sgra la/_/de yang grangs kyi skabs mang tshig bdun po kho na las mi 'jug pas/_dang po'i mang tshig la/_tri tsa tu roHs+t+ri yAM ti sr-i tsa ta sr-I batra/_tri tsa

[\[40a.6\]]gnyis pa gsum bzhi pa lnga pa rnams kyi mang tshig la/_tsa ta sraH_shasra_tsa ta sr-i b+hiH_tsa ta sr-i b+h+yaH_tsa ta sr-i b+h+yaH_drug pa'i mang tshig la/_sdeb sbyor las nAM la ring por sgyur ba dang mi sgyur ba 'dam kha can du bshad pas/_tsa ta sr-i NAM/_bzhi/_tsa ta srI NAM/_bdun pa'i mang tshig la/_tsa ta
[\[40a.7\]]sr-i Shu/_!_r+ra yig mtha' can gir+ra zhes pa'i sgra la dang po'i gcig tshig la/_y+borbi ha se/_ra ba dag la i u dag gi ha sa la'o/_/r+ra yig dang bra yig dag gi u pa d+hA'i dbyings kyi i yig dang u yig dag ni ha sa'i yi ge pha rol la ring por 'gyur te/_/i ring por bsgyur bas/_!_
[\[40b\]]
[\[40b.1\]]gIH_si_gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/_gi rau/_au_gi raH_dzasa?_bod tshig la/_he gIH_si_gnyis pa gsum la/_gi raM/_amra_gi rau/_au_gi raH_shasa?_gsum pa'i gcig tshig la/_gi rA/_TA_gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/_r+ra bdag la i u dag gi ha sa la'os/_
[\[40b.2\]]smra ba/_gIr+b+h+yAM/_gIr+b+hiH_sogs dang bdun pa'i mang tshig la/_gIr+Shu/_!_de bzhin du pur+ra d+hur+ra sogs kyang de kho na dang 'dra'o/_!_/d+ha yig mtha' can sa mid+h+ra zhes pa'i sgra la/_gnas med pa dang /_dbyangs kyis dman pa sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_!_sa mitra/_si_
[\[40b.3\]]sa midra/_si_sa mi d+hau/_au_sa mi d+haH_dzasra_he sa mitra/_si_sa mi d+haM/_amra_gang ba/_gnya' brag gam sa gzhi/_sa mi d+hau/_au_sa mi d+haH_shasra_sa mi d+hA/_TA_sa mi d+b+h+yAM/_si mid+b+hiH_sa mit+su/_sogs so/_!_/b+h+ra yig mtha' can ka kub+h+ra zhes pa'i sgra la'ang gnas yam shing /_

[\[41a\]]
[\[41a.1\]]mo/_/i damra zhes pa'i sgra ni bud med du brjod pa la si dang lhan cig par i yaM zhes par 'gyur te/_!_i yaM/_si/_gnyis tshig sogs la t+yadra sogs kyis Tia dang /_da'i ma/_bud med la a la Apra byin pas/_i mA zhes grub pa la mo rtags
[\[41a.2\]]t+yadra sogs kyi cho gas bsgrubs pas/_i me/_au_i mAH_dzasra_i mAM/_amra_i me/_au_i mAH_shasra_a na yA/_TA_A b+h+yAM/_A b+hiH_a s+yai/_nge_A b+h+yAM/_A b+h+yaH_a s+yAH_nga si_A b+h+yAM/_A b+h+yaH_a s+yAH_ngasra_a na yoH_osra_A sAM/_Amra_a s+yAM/_ngi_a na yoH_osra_A su/_supra_
[\[41a.3\]]!_tsa yig mtha' can twats+ra zhes pa'i sgra la/_tsu'i ku dang /_gnas med pa sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_!_si_twakra/_pags pa/_twagra/_si_twa tsau/_au_twa tsaH_dzasra_he twagra/_si_twa tsa/_amra_twa tsau/_au_twa tsa/_shasra_twa tsA/_TA_twa g+b+h+yAM/_twa g+b+hiH_sogs dang bdun pa'i mang tshig la/_

[\[41a.5\]]gnyis pa'i mang tshig_/rig byed gyi tshig rkang /_drag/_la/_a paH_shasa?_gsum pa'i mang tshig la/_b+hi da pAM/_apra rnams kyi b+ha la dra'o/_/apra la sogs pa rnams kyi pra yig ni b+ha yig pha rol la dra yig tu 'gyur te/_ad+b+hiH_de chu_dzasra_bzhin du bzhi pa lnga pa drug pa bdun pa
[\[41a.6\]]rnams kyi mang tshig la/_ad+b+h+yaH_ad+b+h+yaH_a pAM/_Amra_ap+su/_!_sha yig mtha' can dishra zhes pa'i sgra las/_dang po'i gcig tshig la/_di shAM kaH_dishra rnams kyi ka'o/_/dishra/_dr-ishra/_spr-ishra_mr-ishra/_sa dr-i shra rnams kyi mtha' ni ra sa'i yi ge pha rol na yod pa dang tshig mtha'
[\[41a.7\]]las kyang ka yig tu 'gyur te/_shra kra/_gnas med pa dang /_dz+h+ra b+h+ra la dza ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_!_phyogs_dikra/_si_digra_si_di shau/_au_di shaH_dzasra_he dikra_si_he digra/_si_phyogs/_lta ba/_reg pa/_na rdzu/_mnyam par lta ba/_di shaM/_amra_di shau/_au_di shaH_shasra_dishA/_TA_dig+b+h+yAM/_dig+b+hiH_
[\[41b\]]
[\[41b.1\]]sogs dang bdun pa'i mang tshig la/_dik+Shu/_supra_!_Sha yig mtha' can twiSh+ra zhes pa'i sgra la/_Sha'i Da'o dang gnas med pa sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_!_twiD+ra/_si_twiT+ra/_si_twiShau/_au_twi ShaH_dzasra_he twiD+ra/_si_he twi T+ra/_si_twi ShaM/_amra_twa Shau/_au_twi ShaH_shasra_twi ShA/_TA_
[\[41b.2\]]twiD+b+h+yAM/_twiD+b+hiH_sogs dang bdun pa'i mang tshig la/_twi k+Shu/_sumra_!_Sha yig mtha' can A shiSh+ra zhes pa'i sgra las/_si la ra nyid dang lhag ma ra sa'i yi ge rnams la/_doSh+ra rnams kyi ra 'os r+ra dang /_Sha'i Da'os D+rar sgyur ba 'dam kha can du byas/_ra'i
[\[41b.3\]]phyogs la/_sa dzuSh+ra sogs kyis ring por bsgyur bas/_!_A shIH_si_A shiShau/_au_A shi ShaH_dzasra_he A shIH_si_A shi ShaM_amra_A shi Shau/_au_A shi ShaH_shasra_A shi ShA/_TA_A shIr+b+h+yAM/_A shrID+b+h+yAM/_A shIr+b+h+yAM/_A shIr+b+hiH_sogs dang bdun pa'i mang tshig la/_A
[\[41b.4\]]shIr+Shu/_A shiT+su/_!_sa yig mtha' can a dasra zhes pa'i sgra las/_mdza' ba'am snying nye ba/_si la da sa da/_si au/_lhag ma rnams la t+yadra sogs kyis Ti a/_bud med la a la Apra/_da'i ma/_ma la u sogs dang /_mo rtags sarba sogs kyi cho gas bsgrubs pas/_
[\[41b.5\]]dang po gsum la/_!_/a sau/_'di_a mU/_au_amUH_dzasra_gnyis pa gsum la/_a mUM/_amra_amU/_au_a mUH_shasra_gsum pa gsum la/_a mu yA/_TA_a mU b+h+yAM/_a mU b+hiH_bzhi pa gsum la/_a mu Sh+yai/_nge_a mU b+h+yaH_lnga pa gsum la/_a
[\[41b.6\]]mu Sh+yAH_nga si_a mU b+h+yAM/_si_a mU b+h+yaH_drug pa gsum la/_a mu Sh+yAH_ngasra_a mu yoH_osra_a mU ShAM/_Amra_bdun pa gsum la/_a mu Sh+yAM/_ngi_a mu yoH_osra_a mU Shu/_supra_i ti swa ra swa sti byA ka ra Na s+ya sU trAd+d+ha sAn+ta s+t+rA+e ling+gAt+sa mAp+tAH_zhes pa brda sprod pa dbyangs can gyi mdo
[\[41b.7\]]las ha sa'i mtha' las bud med kyi rtags rnams rdzogs so//_//de nas ha sa'i mtha' can ma ning gi rtags rnams rab tu bstan par bya ste/_de la ra yig mtha' can bAr+ra zhes pa'i sgra las/_ma ning la si amra 'jig pa dang /_au I/_dzasra shasra shi sogs dang /_
[\[42a\]]
[\[42a.1\]]ya mra min pa zhes numra mi ster/_dbyangs kyi dman pa sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_!_bAH_bA rI/_bA ri/_he bAH_bAH_bA rI/_bA ri/_bA rA/_bAr+b+h+yAM/_bAr+b+hiH_bAr+Shu/_sogs so/_!_/ra yig mtha' can tsa tur+ra gyi sgra las/_de yang grangs kyi
[\[42a.2\]]don la mang tshig kho na las mi 'jug cing /_tsa tur+ra gyi shi la Amra A ga ma ster ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_!_si_au_dzasa?_si_amra_au_shasa?_TA_tsa twA ri/_dzasa?_he tsa twA ri/_dzasa?_tsa twA ri/_shasa?_tsa tur+b+hiH_tsa tur+b+h+yaH_tsa tur+b+h+yaH_tsa tu r+NAM/_amra_tsa tu r+Shu/_supra_!_
[\[42a.3\]]na yig mtha' can a hanra zhes pa'i sgra la/_dang po'i gcig tshig la/_ah+naHsaHa han gyi sa'o/_/a han gyi na yig ni ra sa'i yi ge pha rol tu byung ba dang /_bzhi/_tshig mtha' las kyang sra yig tu 'gyur te/_si amra 'jig nra sra/_!_a haH_si_gnyis tshig la/_
[\[42a.4\]]au I/_I ngi dag la yang na'os/_u pa d+hA'i a dbyi ba dang mi dbyi ba yang na bar byas pas/_a h+ni/_a_a ha nI/_au_mang tshig la/_dzasa? shi/_nra'i u pa d+hA'os/_ring por bsgyur bas/_a hA ni/_de bzhin du gnyis pa nyi ma_gsum la yang /_a
[\[42a.5\]]haH_amra_a h+nI/_au_a ha nI/_au_a hA ni/_shasa?_gsum pa'i gcig tshig la/_u pa d+hA'i a phyis pas/_a h+nA/_gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/_a han gyi sa'os/_nra sa?/_sra r+ra dag gi rnam bcad/_a las ha ba la u/_u la o/_a ho b+h+yAM/_a ho b+hiH_
[\[42a.6\]]de bzhin du bzhi pa gsum la/_ah+ne/_nge_a ho b+h+yAM/_a ho b+h+yaH_lnga pa gsum la/_a h+naH_nga si_a ho b+h+yAM/_TA_a ho b+h+yaH_drug pa gsum la/_a h+naH_ngasra_a h+naH_osra_ah+nAM/_Amra_bdun pa gsum la/_a h+ni/_ngi_a ha ni/_ngi_a h+noH_osra_a has+su/_supra_!_nra
[\[42a.7\]]yig mtha' can brah+manra zhes pa'i sgra las/_dang po'i gcig tshig la/_na lo paH_na dbyi'o/_/brah+manra la sogs pa'i nra yig ni ra sa'i yi ge pha rol dang tshig mtha' las kyang dbyi bar bya ste/_na phyis/_ma ning la si amra 'jig_!_tshangs pa/_brah+ma/_si_gnyis tshig dang mang
[\[42b\]]
[\[42b.1\]]tshig la/_brah+ma NI/_au_brah+mA Ni/_dzasra_slar yang /_brah+ma/_amra_brahra NI/_au_brah+mA Ni/_shasa?_bod tshig la na mi dbyi bas/_he brah+manra/_si_gsum pa gsum la/_brah+ma NA/_TA_brah+mab+h+yAM/_brah+mab+hiH_bzhi pa gsum la/_brah+ma Ne/_nge_brah+ma b+h+yAM/_brah+mab+h+yaH_lnga
[\[42b.2\]]pa gsum la/_brah+maNaH_nga si_brah+mab+h+yAM/_brah+ma b+h+yaH_drug pa gsum la/_brah+maNaH_ngasra_brah+maNoH_osra_brah+maNAM/_Amra_bdun pa gsum la/_brah+maNi/_ngi_brah+maNoH_osra_brah+masu/_supra_!_de bzhin du/_tsa rmanra/_karmanra/_barmanra/_sharmanra la sogs pa yang cho ga thams
[\[42b.3\]]cad 'di dang 'dra'o/_!_/nAn+ta da dan+tA tshan+da si ngi sh+yorbA lo pa/_na mtha' atra ngi shi dag gi yang na dbyi ba sdeb sbyor la'o/_/ma ning gi rtags na dang a yig gi mtha' la ngi shi pha rol la/_sdeb sbyor dang rig byed bags pa/_las/_go cha'am gso ba/_ngo mtshar ram skyid pa/_las A ga ma'i na
[\[42b.4\]]ngi shi dang bcas pa dbyi ba dang glo bur ba ma yin pas na mi dbyi bar ngi shi dag dbyi ba dang /_spyir btang gi cho ga 'dam kha can du bya ste/_brah+manra la ngi byin pas brah+ma Ni zhes grub pa la rtags mtha'i na mi dbyi bar ngi dbyi ba dang mi dbyi ba yang na bar byas pas/_brah+ma Ni/_brah+manra zhes pa
[\[42b.5\]]lta bu dang /_de bzhin du shi la/_sarba dang b+hU ta la dzasa? dang /_shasa?/_nge shi/_numra byin pas/_sarbA Ni/_b+hU tA ni zhes pa la/_A ga ma'i nra shi dang bcas pa dbyi ba dang mi dbyi bar yang na bar byas rtags mtha' thung ngur mi 'gyur bas/_sarbA/_dzasa?_sarbA Ni/_dzasa?_tshangs pa la/_b+hU
[\[42b.6\]]tA/_shasa?_b+hU tA ni/_shasa?_lta bu'o/_!_/da yig mtha' can t+yad ces pa'i sgra la/_si am 'jig pas Ti ar+ra mi 'gyur la/_rnam dbye gzhan rnams la Ti a ru bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_!_t+yadra/_t+yatra/_t+ye/_t+yA ni/_t+yadra/_t+yatra/_t+ye/_au_thams cad rnams/_t+yA ni/_shasa?_t+ye nA/_TA_
[\[42b.7\]]'byung po rnams la/_t+yA b+h+yAM/_t+yaiH_b+hisra_t+yasmai/_de_t+yA b+h+yAM/_t+ye b+h+yaH_t+yA b+h+yAM/_t+ye b+h+yaH_t+yas+ya/_ngasra_t+ya yoH_osra_t+ye ShAM/_Amra_t+ya sminra/_ngi_t+ya yoH_omra_t+ye Shu/_supra_!_de bzhin du bsgrub pas/_tadra/_si_tatra/_si_nge_si_si_au_dzasa?_amra_amra_te/_au_tA ni/_dzasa?_sogs dang /_!_
[\[43a\]]
[\[43a.1\]]e tadra/_si_e tatra/_si_e te/_au_e tA ni/_dzasa?_sogs dang /_!_yadra/_gang_si_yatra_si_ye/_au_yA ni/_dzasa?_sogs so/_!_/de ltar du ma yig mtha' can kimra gyi sgra la yang /_!_tsi/_kimra/_si_ke/_au_kA ne/_shasra_sogs dang /_!_ma yig mtha'
[\[43a.2\]]can i damra la'ang /_!_i daM/_si_i me/_au_i mA ni/_dzasa?_i daM/_amra_i me/_au_i mA ni/_shasra_a ne na/_TA_A b+h+yAM/_e b+hiH_asmai/_nge_A b+h+yAM/_e b+h+yaH_sogs skyes pa'i skabs bzhin no/_!_/tsa yig mtha' can pra t+yats+ra zhes pa'i sgra la/_si/_amra 'jig_/_

[\[43a.5\]]dza ga te/_nge_dza gat+su/_supra_sogs so/_!_/de bzhin du ta yig mtha' can ma hatra kyi sgra la'ang /_!_ma hadra/_si_ma hatra/_si_ma hatI/_au_'gro ba/_ma han+ti/_dzasra_gnyis pa gsum yang de dang 'dra/_gsum pa sogs la/_ma hatA/_TA_ma had+b+h+yAM/_ma had+b+hiH_TA_ma ha te

[\[43b\]]
[\[43b.1\]]ha biShI/_o_he bIM Shi/_dzasra_gnyis pa gsum la yang /_ha biH_ha bi ShI/_ha biM Shi/_gsum pa sogs la/_ha bi ShA/_ha bi r+b+h+yAM/_ha bi r+b+hiH_ha bi She/_nge_ha bar+Shu sogs so/_!_/sa yig mtha' can a dasra kyi sgra la/_si amra 'jig pas/_Ti amra mi 'gyur/_lhag ma rnams

[\[43b.6\]]bA bau dwi ba tsa ne/_gnyis tshig la yu ba A ba dag go/_/yuSh+madra dang a smadra dag ni gnyis tshig pha rol la rim pa bzhin yu ba A ba zhes par 'gyur te/_yu ba/_a/_A ba/_au zhes gnas pa la/_A mo/_au A mra'o/_khyod/_nga'am bdag/_yuSh+madra dang a smadra dag

[\[44a\]]
[\[44a.1\]]te/_yU yaM/_ba yaM/_!_gnyis pa'i gcig tshig la/_twan+ma de ka twe/_gcig nyis la twadra madra dag go_/yuSh+madra a smadra dag ni rnam dbye gcig tshig rnams pha rol la rim pa bzhin twag mad ces par 'gyur te/_twad/_samra/_mad/_amra/_zhes

[\[44a.3\]]la t+yad sogs kyi si sogs la Ti a/_shasa? la 'os ring po/_sha so naH_shasra kyi na'o/_/yuSh+mad asmad las pha rol gyi shas ni nA ru 'gyur te/_yuSh+mAnra/_shasa?_khyad rnams la/_a smanra/_shasra_nged rnams la/_!_gsum khyod la/_bdag la/_pa'i gcig tshig la/_gcig khyed dag la/_nged dag la/_nyid la

[\[44a.7\]]tshig la/_yu bA b+h+yAM/_khyed dag gi ched du/_nged dag gi ched du/_mang tshig la/_b+h+yasra sh+b+h+yaM/_b+h+yasra sh+b+h+yaM mo/_/yuSh+madra asmadra dag las pha rol gyi rnam dbye bzhi pa'i b+h+yasra ni sh+b+h+yaM zhes par 'gyur zhing sha yig ni b+h+yasra yongs rdzogs sgyur ba dang b+ha yig thog ma'i khyod kyi ched du/_bdag gi ched du/_
[\[44b\]]
[\[44b.1\]]bya ba rnams 'gog pa'i don te/_t+yadra sogs kyi si sogs la Ti a/_b+h+yasra/_sh+b+h+yaM/_sha phyis pas/_yuSh+ma b+h+yaM/_asma b+h+yaM/_!_lnga pa'i gcig tshig la/_gcig nyid la zhes pas/_twadra/_madra/_ces bsgyur ba la/_t+yadra sogs kyi si sogs la Ti ar bsgyur bas
[\[44b.2\]]twa/_nga si/_ma/_nga si zhes gnas pa la/_nga si b+h+ya sosh+tuH_nga si b+h+yasra dag gi sh+tu'o/_yum Sh+ma da dang khyed rnams kyi ched da/_ded rnams kyi ched du/_a smad dag la pha rol gyi rnam dbyed lnga pa'i sid dang b+h+ya dag na g+tu zhes par 'gyur zhing u brjod don dang sha yig ni thams cad 'gyur
[\[44b.3\]]pa'i don te/_twa tA/_gnyis tshig la/_yu bA b+h+yAM/_A bA b+h+yAMH_mang tshig la/_b+hasra sh+tur bsgyur ba/_yuSh+matra/_!_drug pa'i gcig tshig la/_gcig nyid la zhes pas/_twadra/_ngasa?/_madra/_ngasa?/_zhes gnas pa la/_ta ba ma ma nga sA/_ngasra kyis ta
[\[44b.4\]]pa ma ma'o/_khyed las/_nged las/_yuSh+madra dang asmadra dag ni rnam dbye ngas pha rol khyed rnams las/_nged rnams las/_la rim pa bzhin rtags dang rnam dbye bcas pa ta ba dang ma ma zhes par 'gyur te/_ta ba/_ngasa?/_ma ma/_ngasra_gnyis tshig la/_yu
[\[44b.5\]]ba yoH_osa?_A ba yoH_osa?_mang tshig la/_Ti a dang /_sarba sogs kyi suT+ra byin pas/_yuSh+ma/_sAM/_asma/_sAM/_zhes gnas pa la/_sA mA kaM/_sAM A kaM ngo /_/yuSh+masradra asmasradra dag las pha rol gyi suT+ra dang bcas khyod kyi/_bdag gi/_pa'i Amra ni A kaM zhes
[\[44b.6\]]khyod dag gi/_nged dag gi/_par 'gyur te/_yuSh+mA kaM/_asmA kaM/_!_bdun pa'i gcig tshig la/_gcig nyid la zhes dang /_TA ngi zhes pas/_twa yi/_ngi_ma yi/_ji_gnyis tshig la/_yu ba yoH_osra_A ba yoH_osra_mang tshig la/_Ti a/_amra sa b+hi la 'os/_
[\[44b.7\]]de ring por bsgyur bas/_yuSh+mA su/_khyed rnams la/_nged rnams la/_zhes pa de rnams ni yuSh+madra dag gi sgrub _khyod la/_bdag la/_tshul dngos yin pa/_da khyed dag la/_nged dag la/_ni de las slar yang gzhan du 'gyur ba'i cho ga dang
[\[45a\]]
[\[45a.1\]]gzugs rnams ni/_yuSh+mad sma doHShaSh+ThI tsa tuR+thI dwi tI ya b+hi ste me ban+nau bsna sau/_yuSh+madra asmadra dag la drug pa bzhi pa gnyis pa rnams kyi/_te/_me/_bamra/_nau/_bas/_nasra dag go_/yuSh+madra asmadra dag la rnam dbye drug pa bzhi pa gnyis pa rnams kyis
[\[45a.2\]]bsgrubs pa'i/_twAM mAM sogs ni rim pa ltar gcig tshig rnams te me zhes pa dang gnyis tshig rnams/_bamra/_nau/_zhes pa dang /_mang tshig rnams/_bsra/_nas/_zhes pa rnams su 'gyur la/_de yang drug pa sogs dngos su bstan pa yin zhing sdeb sbyor sogs
[\[45a.3\]]kyi dgos pa dang 'dod na ni dang po'i twaM a haM nas bdun pa'i yuSh+mA su asma su'i bar thams cad la sgyur du rung ba ni nges pa ste/_dper brjod tshig bcad du brjod na/_swA mI te saH_ngasra_sa mA ya taHswA mI me sAM bra taM ga taH/_/na ma ste b+ha ga ban+b+hU yo de hi mo_nge_mok+Sha ma bya yaM/_khyod
[\[45a.4\]]kyi rje de legs par byon gyur tam/_/bdag gi rje bo yang ni da lta byon/_/bcom ldan khyed la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/_/mi zad thar pa bdag la stsal du gsol/_/swA mI baM sa dza hA sauts+cer+d+r-i Sh+T+wA nau dA na yA tsa nAM/_/rA dzA baM dA s+ya te dA naM dz+nyA naM nau ma d+hu sU da naH/_/gang rgyangs mtho
[\[45a.5\]]de rje bo khyed dag gi/_/sbyin pa'i khrom 'khrugs 'chos pa bdag gis mthong /_/rgyal pos khyed dag la ni sbyin pa byin/_/nged dag la yang ye shes sbrang rtsi dgras/_osa?/_de bo ba ma ba tA dwiSh+Nurna ra kAt+nau dza nArda naH/_/b+h+yAM_swa mI bo ba ya_b+h+h+yAM_bAM rA dzA swA mI nau sau dza narda naH/_/_
[\[45a.6\]]khyab 'jug lha yi 'jug pas khyed dag la/_/skye 'gro'i mchod pas nged dag dmyal las sgrol/_/stobs ldan rgyal po khyed cag rnams kyi rje/_/'gro ba'i mchod de nged cag rnams kyi rje/_/au/_na mo bo b+h+ya sra_brah+ma bi dz+nye b+h+yo dz+nyA naM nau b+h+yasra_di ya tAM d+ha naM/_Amra/_sA naM dA t+paHpra pa sh+yA maHAmra_pash+yA
[\[45a.7\]]mo naH_shasa?_su duH_khe na/_/'dud do rnam mkhyen tshangs pa khyod rnams la/_/ye shes nor sbyin bdag cag rnams la stsol/_/dus kun dga' bar khyed rnams rab tu mthong /_/bde dang sdug bsngal bdag cag rnams la mthong /_b+h+yasra_/tA mA mA/_shasra_amra gyi twA mA dag go/_/_
[\[45b\]]
[\[45b.1\]]yuSh+madra dang asmadra rnam dbye gnyis pa dang lhan gcig pa'i gzags twaM dang mAM ni 'dod cing dgos pa yod na rim pa bzhin twA dang mA dag tu 'gyur te/_pa sh+yA mi twA ma dA lI D+haM pa sh+yA mA ma da b+he da kaM_/khyed la bltas na myos byed kun nas len/_/nged cag la ni myos byed 'jigs
[\[45b.2\]]par mthong /_nAdau/_dang po la ma yin no/_/tshig gi dang po na yod pa'i yuSh+madra dang asmadra rnam dbye dang bcas pa rnams ni te me la sogs par 'gyur ba amra_ma yin te/_amra_dper na/_ta ba ye sha tra bo rA dzan+ma ngasa?_ma te s+ya te sha tra paH/_ta ba mi trA Ni yA ni s+surma ma
[\[45b.3\]]mi trA Ni tA n+ya pi/_/ji ltar rgyal po khyod kyi dgra bo rnams/_/de rnams bdag cag gi yang nges par dgra/_/nges par khyed kyi gnyen bshes gang yin pa/_/de rnams bdag cag gi yang gnyen bshes so/_ngasa?_/ru dro bi shwe shwa ro de bo yuSh+mAkaM kU la de ba tA/_ngasa?_/sa e ba ngasa?_
[\[45b.4\]]b+ha ga ban+nA tho asmA kaM pA pa nA sha naH/_/drag po sna tshogs dbang phyug lha/_/khyed cag rnams kyi rigs kyi lha/_/de 'dir mgon po bcom ldan 'das/_/bdag cag rnams kyi sdig pa 'joms/_/zhes so/_/de bAsmA n+pAhi nr-i ha re Amra_biSh+No\u0f85smA trak+Sha sarba dA/_saM b+ho da
[\[45b.5\]]na pa dA da gre na saM b+ha ba ti ba sAd yaH/_/tshig gi thog ma kun tu bod pa la/_/bas la sogs par 'gyur ba ma yin te/_/kye lha mi yi seng+gas bdag skyongs shig_/dus kun bdag rnams srungs shig khyab 'jug kye/_/tshig gi dang po bod tshig ma yin na
[\[45b.6\]]bod tshig dang 'brel pa yin kyang bas sogs su 'gyur te/_pA tuM bo nr-i sid+ha su na kha lAM ga la ko Ta yaH/_hi ra N+ya ka shi porbak+ShaHk+She tA sr-ik+ka rmA ru NaH/_/skyongs shig khyed rnams mi yi seng+ge yis/_/sen mo'i gshol gyi rtse mos 'drob skyong bu/_/gser can gyi ni lto ba'i
[\[45b.7\]]ngos bral ba'i/_/khrag gi 'dam rdzab 'char ka'i dmar po 'dzin/_/tsA di b+hi sh+tsa/_tsa la sogs pa rnams kyis kyang ngo /_/ca la sogs pa ste/_tsa/_bA/_a ha/_e ba/_e baM rnams dang sbyor ba la yang te la sogs par 'gyur ba ma yin te/_ta ba tsa ma ma tsa mai trI
[\[46a\]]
[\[46a.1\]]tsan+d+ra le khe ba bar+b+ha te/_/khrod dang bdag gi byams 'dris ni/_/zla ba yar gyi ngo ltar 'phel/_/i ti swa ra swasti byA ka ra Na s+ya sU trAd+YuSh+ma da sma dwi d+ha yas+sa mAp+tAH_zhes pa brda sprod pa dbyangs can gyi mdo las yuSh+madra a smadra kyi cho ga rnams rdzogs
[\[46a.2\]]so//_//de nas mi zad pa'i sde rnams brjod par bya ste/_tsA dirni pA taH_tsa la sogs pa ni pA ta'o/_/ming gcig gis don du ma ston pa tsa la sogs pa rnams la mi zad pa'am ni pA ta ste nges tshig ces zer la tsa la sogs pa ni/_tsa/_bA/_yang na'am 'dra ba/_a ha/_
[\[46a.3\]]e ba/_e baM/_nU naM/_nges pa/_pr-i thakra/_bi nA/_nA nA/_swa sti/_a sti/_do ShA/_nak+ta/_mr-iShA/_mith+yA/_mi thasa?/_a tha/_a tho/_h+yasa?/_shwasa?/_uts+tsaisra/_nI tsaisa?/_swar+ra/_an+tar+ra/_pra ta ra/_pu nar+ra/_dang ngam yang kyang /_tshig gi kha skong smra ba/_
[\[46a.4\]]'di 'am ces nges pa/_bzhin rnams mtshungs pa/_so so'am tha dad/_spangs pa/_sna tshogs/_bde legs/_yod pa/_mtshan mo'am mun nag/_brdzun/_gsang ba'am 'dres pa/_de nas bkra shis/_bar mtshams med dam phyis nas/_song nyin/_mtho ba/_dma' ba/_mtho ris/_bar mtshams/_zhogs pa/_slar ram bskyar ba/_b+hU yasra/_a ho/_
[\[46a.5\]]switra/_utra/_sa ha/_r-i te/_an+ta re Na/_an+tar+ra/_na masra/_a laM/_kr-i taM/_a/_mA/_no/_nA bzhi dgag tshig dang /_i Shatra/_ki la/_kha lu/_bai/_hi/_A rAtra/_b+h+r-i shaM/_r-i taM/_sA kaM/_sA r+d+haM/_sadra/_tadra ces pa la sogs pa'i mang po/_ngo mtshar/_
[\[46a.6\]]rnam rtog/_mtho ba'am de ring /_bcas/_spangs pa/_bar stongs/_'dud pa'am phyag/_rgyan/_byed pa/_tshogs rnams ni pA ta zhes brjod par chung ngu /_gtam/_tshig rgyan/_spangs pa/_rgyu/_thag ring thung gnyis ka la 'jug/_phul byung /_bden pa/_thams cad dam mthun pa/_bya'o/_!_/gzhan yang rnam dbye'i don can gyi
[\[46a.7\]]rkyen sbyar ba dang rtags rnam dbye dang bcas pa gzugs 'gyur ba'i ni pA ta yang yod de/_tasminra zhes pa ta tra/_de la/_ya sminra zhes pa/_ya tra/_gang la_kasminra zhes pa/_ku tra dang /_ci la/_ku ha dang /_ci la/_kwa/_ci la/_yang ta sminra zhes sogs dus dang 'brel pa la/_ta dA/_de la/_
[\[46b\]]
[\[46b.1\]]ya dA/_e ka dA/_a n+ya dA/_ka dA/_sogs dang /_rnam dbye gsum pa rab tu byed pa ston byed/_ta na zhes pa/_ta thA/_de bzhin du/_ya thA/_ka thaM/_it+thaM/_sogs so/_!_/rnams dbye lnga pa'i don la tasmAtra zhes pa/_ta taH_de bzhin du/_ya taH_ku taH_
[\[46b.2\]]gang la/_gcig la/_gzhan la/_ci la/_a taH_i taH_sogs dang /_!_rnam dbye thams cad kyi don la tasa? 'jug_/des/_cing de yang gtso_gang gis/_ci yis/_'dis/_bo kho na dang gcig pu'i don la 'jug pa shas che la rkyen de de las/_sbyar ba'ang ni gang las/_ci las/_
[\[46b.3\]]pA ta ste/_sarba sminra zhes pa sarba taH_zhes_'di las/_pa lta bu dang /_!_gzhan yang /_purba sminra zhes pa/_purba sminra zhes pa/_pu rastAtra/_a d+ha ra sminra zhes pa/_a d+hastAtra/_pa ra sminra zhes pa/_pa re Na/_sogs dang /_!_dak+Shi Na dang i ta ra la/_a hi zhes pa'i rkyen sbyar na
[\[46b.4\]]yang ni pA ta ste/_dak+Shi thams cad las/_NA hi ba sa n+ti tsaN+Da laH/_!_kimraH_sA mA n+ye tsi dA diH_kimra las spyi la sngon nam shar/_tsitra la sogs pa'o/_'og la/_/kimra gyi sgra las spyi'i pha rol la/_don brjod pa la rnam dbye thams cad kyi don la tsitra la sogs pa'i rkyen 'jug
[\[46b.5\]]cing rkyen de dag gi mtha' gdol pa rnams lho phyogs thag ring ba na gnas/_can yang ni pA ta ste/_ka dA tsitra/_kash+tsitra/_kash+tsanra/_kwa tsitra/_kwa tsa na/_ku tra tsitra/_ku ha tsitra/_ku ha tsitra/_sogs so/_/de'i g.yog 'khor dang tshogs 'dus pa'i don la sAtra 'gyur zhing de'i mtha' yang
[\[46b.6\]]ni pA ta ste/_rA dza sAtra/_b+hasma sAtra/_na ra sAtra/_smra ba'i tshig la 'di zhes tshad bzung ba dang /_mang po'i nang nas gcig bzung ba'i don la/_U rI/_u ra ri/_u ra rI zhes pa rnams 'jug cing de yang ni pA ta'o/_!_/dus kyi don/_sa d+ya/_sa pa ti/_a d+ya/_de dag/_
[\[46b.7\]]rgyal po'i g.yog 'khor/_thal ba'i phung po/_mi thams cad/_de ni/_a d+hu nA/_da lta/_i d+ha nA/_da lta/_sAM pra taM/_purbe d+yuH_sang_pa re d+yuH_gzhes dgus sogs/_ya di/_dus gang la/_yar+hi/_ta di/_de'i dus su/_tar+hi/_de ma thag/_A shu/_mgyogs po/_shI
[\[47a\]]
[\[47a.1\]]g+h+raM/_dz+ha Ti ti/_drur+Na sogs kyang ni pA ta'o/_!_/pra di ru pa sargaH_pra la sogs pa nyer bsgyur ro/_/pra/_pa rA/_a pa/_samra/_a nu/_a ba/_rjes su/_a ba/_ni ra/_dur/_bi/_kun/_Ad/_ni/_a d+hi/_a bi/_yang /_shin tu/_a ti/_phul byung /_su/_
[\[47a.2\]]utra/_a b+hi/_pra ti/_mgyogs po/_pa ri/_/u pa sogs 'di rnams la nyer bsgyur zhes bya ste de rnams rab/_mchog/_bral ba'am gnod pa/_rdzogs pa kun tu yang dag/_kun tu nges pa/_nges pa 'gag pa/_ngan pa dka' ba/_rnam/_brapa/_log/_par/_nges pa/_bral ba/_lhag par/_kyang /_ngang /_bzang /_mdzes/_bde/_rab/_legs/_shin tu/_
[\[47a.3\]]shin tu/_mngon par/_so so/_tha dang /_yongs su/_nye bar phan pa/_dang phyogs mtshungs A bi yang ngo /_/prag+d+hA toH_byings la thog ma'o/_/nyer bsgyur rnams byings la thog mar sbyor ba shas che'o/_/ta da bya yaM/_de rnams mi zad pa'o/_/gong du bsten pa'i tsa la sogs pa
[\[47a.4\]]nas pra la sogs pa'i bar de rnams la ni pA ta 'am mi zad pa zhes zer ro/_!_/k+tAd+yan+taM tsa/_k+t+wA la sog pa'i mtha' rnams kyang ngo /_/'og nas 'byung ba'i rkyen k+t+wA dang tu munra la sogs pa mang po zhig gi mtha' can yang mi zad pa ste/_kr-i twA/_kartuM/_sogs so/_/a bya yA
[\[47a.5\]]dwi b+hak+terlukra/_mi zad pa las rnam dbye rnams 'jig go/_/rig byed dang tshig phrad kyi sgrub pa 'ga' zhig yod srid kyi gzhan du mi zad pa'i rtags las pha rol gyi rnam dbye thams cad 'jig go/_/smras pa/_sa dr-i shaM tri Shu ling+ge Shu sarbA byas nas/_byed pa'i don du'am byed pa la/_su
[\[47a.6\]]tsa bi b+hak+ti Shu/_/ba tsa ne Shu tsa sarbe Shu yan+na bye ti ta da byaM yaM/_/rtags gsum la ni mnyam par mtshungs/_/rnam dbye thams cad la yang ngo /_/tshig rnams thams cad la yang ste/_/dbyer med gang de mi zad pa'o/_/de ltar rtags gsum la dbye ba med pas mnyam par
[\[47a.7\]]'jug pa dang /_don zad pa med pa'am/_gang las kyang 'gyur ba med pas/_mi zad pa'am nges tshig ces bya'o/_/i ti swa ra swa sti byA ka ra Na s+ya sU trA da bya ya se na sa mAp+tAH_zhes pa brda sprod pa dbyangs can gyi mdo las mi tsad pa'i sde rnams rdzogs so//_//de nas
[\[47b\]]
[\[47b.1\]]bud med du sgrub pa'i rkyen rnams bshad par bya ste/_gong du bud med la a la Apra'o zhes bshad pa ltar/_Apra byin pas/_!_ma yA/_med+hA/_shrad+d+hA/_d+ha rA/_mA lA/_sogs so/_!_a dzA de sh+tsApra/_a dza sogs las kyang Apra'o/_a dza sogs ni/_
[\[47b.2\]]a dza/_e Da ka/_ko ki la/_shu dra/_ga Ni ka rnams te/_'di rnams la'ang Apra 'gyur nor can ma'am sgyu ma can ma/_dad can ma/_'dzin ma/_phreng rgyud mkhan ma/_zhing 'di rnams Apra mtha' can ni dus rtag tu mo rtags kho na la 'jug pa'i dgos pa ste/_
[\[47b.3\]]ri/_lug/_khu byug/_byis pa/_dmangs/_a dzA/_e Da kA/_ko ki lA/_bA lA/_shudrA/_ga Ni kA/_!_gA pya taH_kApra la atra kyi i'o/_/ka n+ya kA sogs ma yin pa'i de phan gyi rkyen ka dngos su gnas pa dang bcas pa'i mo rkyen Apra pha rol la u pa d+hA'i
[\[47b.4\]]atra ni i yig tu 'gyur te/_kA ra ka/_la/_ram/_ma mo/_khu byug mo/_bu mo'am bu mo lo bcu drug ma la 'jug/_dmangs mo/_smad 'tshong ma/_Apra/_kA ri kA/_de bzhin du/_pA Thi kA/_pA_tsi kA/_sogs mtha' las so/_/ka n+ya kA sogs ni ir mi 'gyur bar de kha la gnas
[\[47b.5\]]so/_/nye bsgyur a ba dang a pi gnyis kyi a dgos pa yod na dbyi ba dang ha sa'i mtha' la mo rkyen Apra 'jug par drang byed mkhan ma'am tshig le'ur byas pa/_klog pa mo/_'tshed pa mo/_srong b+ha gu ris bshad pas/_a ba gA h+yaM/_bu mo/_a pi d+hA naM zhes pa la/_ba gA h+yaM/_bi d+hA
[\[47b.6\]]naM zhes pa lta bu dang /_ha sa'i mtha' la/_pAts+ra/_bA tsA/_ni shra/_ni shA/_dishra/_di shA/_!_hra swo bA/_thung ngu yang na'o/_/kau kA sogs ma yin pa'i sngon ma'i dbyangs ring po rnams ni ka dang bcas pa'i mo kun tu 'gro/_nor yang /_rkyen Apra dang kun tu 'gro/_nor yang /_
[\[47b.7\]]ta rA sogs pha rol la yang na thung ngur 'gyur te/_ngag ma'am smra bam/_g.yog mo/_phyogs ma/_be Ni kA/_lan char can ma/_be NI kA/_rgyun can ma ste chu bo/_na dI kA/_shre ya si ta rA/_dge legs can ma/_shre ya sI ta rA/_!_nu Ni A+opra/_na r-i asro la A+opra'o/_/rtags
[\[48a\]]
[\[48a.1\]]na yig dang r-i yig mtha' can dang rkyen aN gyi mtha' can rnams la mo rkyen Ipra 'gyur te/_daN+Dinu/_zhes pa la/_daN+Di nI/_de bzhin du/_dan+ti nI/_daN+Di nI/_ka rinra/_ka ri NI/_mA linra/_mA li nI/_rA dzanra la Ipra/_rA dzanra gyi u pa d+hA'i
[\[48a.2\]]a dbyi bar bshad pas/_rA dz+nyI/_shwanra/_yu banra/_ma g+ha banra rnams la Ipra shwa la sogs pa'i yang ngo zhes pas ba ur bsgyur bas/_dbyug pa can ma/_shu nI/_yU nI/_se ldan ma/_glang chen ma/_ma g+ha nI/_sogs _phreng ldan mo/_dang r-i mtha' la/_kar+t+r-i zhes pa la
[\[48a.3\]]Ipra/_kar+t+rI/_de bzhin _rgyal mo/_du/_ha r+t+rI/_sogs dang /_yang r-i yig mtha' can yin kyang ma tr-i/_swa sr-i sogs la ni mo rkyen mi 'jug ste gdod_khyi mo/_lang tsho ma/_ma nas mo rtags su/_brgya byin ma/_grub pas so/_/a Na gyi mtha' la au pa ga ba zhes pa
[\[48a.4\]]la/_Ipra/_byed pa mo/_!_ya s+ya lo paH_i a dag rkun chung mo/_gi dbyi'o/_/rtags mtha'i i dang a dag_/ma/_smyug po/_ni rkyen dbyangs dang ya yig pha rol la dbyi bar bya ste a phyis pas/_au pa ga bI/_sogs so/_/Sh+T+b+r-itaH_Sh+ra T+ra u r-itra las so/_/Sha yig dang T+ra yig dang
[\[48a.5\]]u yig dang ritra rjes 'brel can rnams las mo rkyen Ipra 'gyur te/_dper brjod rim pa ltar/_ba rA kI/_Sha_ku ru za rI/_Ta_go ma tI/_u_b+ha ba n+tI/_r-i_pa tsa n+tI/_r-i_pa Tha n+tI/_r-i_!_na dA deH_nad la _nye ba'i ba lang gi be'u mo/_na da la sogs pa rnams las kyang
[\[48a.6\]]mo rkyen Ipra 'gyur te/_na dI/_gau rI/_gau ta mI/_tsa tuR+thI/_pany+tsa mI/_pi ban+tI/_mdzes ma/_sgra ngan du spyod ma/_chu'i nang chan/_skal ldan ma/_g.yes ma/_klog ma/_zhes so/_!_/in+d+rA de rA NIpra tsa/_in+d+ra sogs las A nIpra yang ngo /_/in+d+ra la sogs pa rnams las
[\[48a.7\]]mo rkyen A nIpra 'gyur rgyun can ma sta chu bo/_dkar mo/_bzhi pa ma/_lnga pa ma/_'thung ma/_te/_in+d+rA NI/_dbang mo/_b+ha pA nI/_skal ldan ma/_ru drA NI/_drag mo/_sogs so/_!_/mnyam par bsre ba'i don dang 'brel ba'i Ipra pha rol la rtags mtha' yon tan du 'gyur bar bshad
[\[48b\]]
[\[48b.1\]]pas dper na/_be dA nAM tra ya NAM/_zhes pa la gsal byed rnam dbye dang bcas pa phyis Ipra byin yon tan byas pas/_tra yI/_go pA li ka sogs ma yin pa'i pho dang ldan pa la yang mo rkyen Ipra 'jug par bshad de/_ga Na kI/_sogs so/_/go
[\[48b.2\]]pA la ka sogs la rig byed rnams gsum rnams/_ni Apra sbyar bas/_go pA li kA/_zhes sogs mang po yod do/_!_/dzA te ra rig byed gsum_ye pa d+hAtra/_u pa d+hA ya ma yin pa las rigs la'o/_/u pa d+hA ya yig ma yin dmangs rigs kyi chung ma/_rtsis mkhan gyi chung ma/_
[\[48b.3\]]pa las rigs dang 'brel ba'i bud med brjod pa la mo rkyen ba lang skyong ba'i chung ma'am phyugs rdzi ma/_Ipra 'gyur te/_me ShI/_ma hi ShI/_shU ka rI/_haM sI/_kU k+ku TI/_brAh+ma NI/_sogs mtha' yas so/_!_/u pa d+hA ya yig yin na Apra sbyar bas/_k+Sha tri yA/_
[\[48b.4\]]bai sh+yA sogs so/_!_/na tshod dang po brjod pa dang 'brel ba'i atra mtha' can las mo rkyen Ipra 'gyur bar _'brugamo/_ma he mo/_phag mo/_ngang mo/_khyim bya mo/_bram ze mo/_bshad de/_ku mA rI/_kal b+hI sogs so/_/na tshod dang po brjod pa rgyal rigs mo/_
[\[48b.5\]]rje rigs mo/_dang 'brel ba'i Ipra mtha' can las mo rkyen Ipra mi 'gyur bas/_Ipra byis pas/_br-id+d+hA/_s+tha bi rA sogs dang /_atra mtha' can ma yin na Ipra mi 'gyur bas/_shi shuH_sogs so/_/swaM gAM bA/_gzhon nu ma/_lo brgyad ma/_mdzes ma'am bu mo chung ngu /_rang lus la yang na'o/_/_
[\[48b.6\]]rang gi lus dang 'brel bar brjod pa la su mU kha sogs la_rgan mo/_gnas brtan ma 'am ches rgan mo/_Ipra 'gyur zhing pad+ma ba da na sogs la Idra/_gzhon nu ma/_mi 'gyur yang Apra 'gyur te/_su mU khI/_bzhin mdzes ma/_mr-i gA k+ShI/_ta n+wang+gI/_sogs mtha' yas so/_/yang
[\[48b.7\]]pad+ma ba da na sogs la/_pad+ma ba da nA/_pad+ma'i rkang pa ma/_ka ma lan ya nA/_pad+ma'i mig can ma/_ga l+yA Na ko DA/_gi sha la ya ka rA/_bu mo lo bcu gcig ma'am chu shing sngon po 'dra ba'i lag ldan ma/_mr-i NA la b+hu dzA/_ku ba 'dra ba'i sa'i 'khril shing ring po zhig ste de dang 'dra ba'i la gang ring po ma/_ri dgas mig can ma/_lus phra ma/_su
[\[49a\]]
[\[49a.1\]]ha stA sogs mang po yod do/_!_/kr-ita sogs kyi rkyen k+ti ma yin pa'i i yig rnams kyi mtha' la mo rkyen Ipra yang na 'gyur bar bshad de/_ang+gu lI/_ang+gu liH_d+hulI/_d+hu liH_a dzI/_a dziH_
[\[49a.2\]]sogs so/_/k+ti'i lag mdzes ma/_rkyen can la Ipra mi 'gyur bas/_kr-i tiH_b+hu tiH_sogs so/_!_/ai tsa ma n+wA deH_ma nu sogs kyi ai yang ngo /_/ma nu la mdzub mo/_/sogs pa la mi rkyen Ipra 'gyur zhing Ipra pha
[\[49a.3\]]rol la ma nu sogs kyi mtha'i dbyangs rnams ai yig tu 'gyur ba dang yang na byed pa mo/_'byor pa mo/_au ru 'gyur te/_ma nu la/_Ipra/_ma nA yI/_ma nA bI/_de bzhin du/_pr-i ShA ka pa zhes pa la/_pri ShA ka pA yI/_pr-i ShA ka pA bI/_
[\[49a.4\]]sogs so/_!_/pa t+n+ya da yaH_pat+n+ya la sogs pa las so/_/pat+n+ya la sogs pa las mo rkyen Ipra 'gyur zhing de yang ni pA taste/_pat+n+ya sogs tshangs pa'i bu ma nu'i chung ma/_la Ipra sbyar bas/_pat+nI/_an+ta rbat+nI/_dbang phyug gi glang ste khyu mchog spre'u/_sa
[\[49a.5\]]khI/_a sa khI/_ar+d+ha dza ra tI/_yu ba tI/_a shi shwI/_rnams so/_pra tI tsA da yaH_shab+dA ni pA t+yan+te/_pra tI tsI la sogs pa'i sgra ni ni pA ta'i mtha'o/_/pra tI tsI la sogs pa rnams bud med/_mtha' yas pa'i nang nas nye ba mo/_ni bud med du
[\[49a.6\]]grogs mo/_grogs min mo/_cung zad rgas ba/_lang tsho ba/_phrug gu med de mo gsham/_brjod pa la khrapra kyi mtha' can ni pA ta ste/_pra tI tsI/_u dI tsI/_prA tsI/_a bA tsI/_sogs so/_!_/dA ra zhes pa'i sgra ni yul bud med la 'jug pa yin kyang
[\[49a.7\]]rtags pho rtags kho na yin pas mo rkyen mi 'jug cing rnam dbye rnams kyi yang mang tshig kho na las mi 'jug la cho ga yang pho rtags nub/_byang /_shar/_shar lho/_kyi skabs ltar bsgrub pa ste/_bud med rnams/_dA_rAH_dzasra/_bud med rnam sa la/_dA
[\[49b\]]
[\[49b.1\]]rAnra/_shasa?/_dA raiH_b+hisa?_dA re b+h+yaH_bud med rnams las/_dA rA NAM/_Amra_dA re Shu/_supra/_!_/baurgu NAtra/_u las yon tan la yang na'o/_/u yig mtha' can las yon tan brjod pa'i don dang 'brel pa la mo rkyen Ipra yang
[\[49b.2\]]bud med rnams kyis/_bud med rnams kyi ched du/_bud med rnams kyi/_bud med rnams la/_na 'gyur te/_pa T+wI/_pa TuH_mr-i dwI/_mr-i duH_ta n+wI/_ta nuH_r-i dzI/_r-i dzuH_'jam mnyen ma/_sogs so/_!_/u ta UH_utra las U'o/_/utra
[\[49b.3\]]mtha' las mo rkyen Upra yang na 'gyur te/_pang+gaH_pang+gUH_bA mo ruH_bA mo rUH/_!_yU nastiH_yu _mkhas ma/_'jam mnyen ma/_lus phra ma/_'jam klas ma/_ban las ti'o/_/yu ban las ti'o/_/yu ban gyi sgra las mo rkyen ti 'gyur te/_yu ba tiH_
[\[49b.4\]]de ltar mo rtags su grub pa 'di rnams la tshig gong mo/_brla mdzes ma/_tu bsgrub pa'i phyir si sogs rnams ster ba'i cho ga rnams gong bud med kyi rtags tshig tu sgrub pa'i skabs su bshad pa ltar ro/_/i ti swa ra swaste byA ka ra Na lang tsho ma/_
[\[49b.5\]]s+ya sU trAt+s+ti yaHpra t+ya yAs+sa mAp+tAH_zhes pa brda sprod pa dbyangs can gyi mdo las bud med kyi rkyen rnams rdzogs so//_!_//de nas rnam dbye rnams kyi don dang 'jug pa'i yul rgyas par ston pa byed pa can kyi le'u'i don rnams bshad
[\[49b.6\]]par bya ste/_li gAraR+thepra tha mA/_rtags kyi don la dang po'o/_/byings las ming du bsgrub pa'i rkyen byin pas byings las yongs su 'gyur ba/_don dang ldan pa'i sgra'i gzugs de la ming ngam/_rtags sam/_sgra zhes bya ste/_rtags de'i
[\[49b.7\]]ngo bo'am don tsam brjod pa'i tshig tu bsgrub pa'i don la rnam dbye dang po gsum 'jug cing /_rtags la sogs pa ste bod tshig la yang rnam dbye'i ngo bo ni dang po nyid de/_dper na/_tshangs pa de yod pa'o/_/tat+sang+b+rah+ma/_si/_legs par byed pa legs pa ji tsam/_san+ti
[\[50a\]]
[\[50a.1\]]san+taH_ki yan+taH_si/_zhes dang /_tshigs bcad du brjod na/_ra bi ra bi rA dza te rA dza ro ShAt+ku mA rI ro rU ya te/_/bo b+hU dz+ya te b+hu baM b+hU pA laH_prA gAstAM rA ma lak+Sh+ma Nau/_si/_nyi ma bzhin du gsal byed rgyal po ste/_/khros nas ngu
[\[50a.2\]]bar byed do gzhon nu ma/_/sa la longs spyod byed de sa skyong ba/_/sngon dus byung ngo dga' byed mtshan si/_ldan dag_/si/_ku mA rAH_she ra te swai raM ro rU yan+te tsa nA ra kAH_dzasa?/_o/_/ye gI yan+te tsa gI ta dz+nyAH_me mr-i yan+ti ru dzA dzi tAH_dzasa?/_rang dgar
[\[50a.3\]]nyal bar byed do gzhon nu rnams/_/ngu bar byed do dmyal ba pa rnams kyang /_/glu shes rnams ni glu yang len par byed/_/gang yang dzasra/_rgyal ba min rnams 'chi byed nad/_!_/A man+t+re tsa/_bod dzasa?/_dzasa?/_pa la'ang ngo /_/mngon du phyogs pa'i don gyi
[\[50a.4\]]bod pa'i tshig la'ang rnam dbye dang po gsum 'gyur te/_dper na/_twAM sa mud+d+ha ra go bin+da pra sI da pa ra me shwa ra/_si/_/ku mA rau swai ra mA sA thA k+Sha ma d+h+waM b+ho ta pa swi naH_dzasa?/_khyed la rjes su gzungs shig khyab 'jug kye/_/rab bsil stsol cig mchog gi dbang phyug kye/_/_
[\[50a.5\]]rang 'dod gdan la 'dug cig gzhon nu kye/_/bzod par mdzod cig dka' thub can rnams si/_kye/_!_b+ho saH_b+ha gosra/_a g+hosra/_zhes pa'i sgra 'di rnams ni bod pa'i don can tshig phrad can te/_k+Sha ma swa
[\[50a.6\]]b+ho du rA rA d+h+ya b+ha go stu b+h+yaM na mastu te/_/A d+h+wA Sh+wa b+ho ma hA prA dz+nya b+hA ta yA g+ho swa g+ha sma raM/_/bzod par mdzod cig dka' bas skyob pa kye/_/skal ldan khyed la phyag 'tshal bstod par bgyi/_/bshad par mdzod cig shes rab chen po kye/_/_
[\[50a.7\]]bdag b+hosra/_b+ha gosra_gi sdig pa choms shig sprug med b+hosra/_kye/_!_/she ShAH_a b+hosra/_kaR+Ye kar+t+raM sA d+ha na yordA na pA tre bi sh+le ShA ba d+hau saM ban+d+hA d+hA ra b+ha ba yoH_lhag ma rnams/_bya ba'i las/_byed pa pos bsgrubs pa'i thabs/_sbyin pa'i snod/_bye zhing lhung ba/_'brel ba
[\[50b\]]
[\[50b.1\]]rten du gyur pa'i dngos ngo dag la'o/_/rnam dbye lhag ma gnyis pa la sogs pa rnams ni rim pa ltar bya ba'i las la sogs pa de rnams kyi don la 'jug go/_/smras pa/_karta karma tsa ka ra NaM saM pra dA ta thai ba tsa/_/a pA dA nA d+hi ka ra Na mi t+yA hu kA ra kA ni ShaT+ra/_/byed

[\[51a\]]
[\[51a.1\]]par byas te zhi ba 'thung /_!_/a b+hi taHdang /_sarba taHgnyis dang sbyor ba dang /_d+hikra tse dang sbyor ba dang /_u paR+Yu pa sogs lan gnyis dang gsum du zlos pa dang sbyor ba dang /_de las gzhan du yang rnam dbye gnyis pa 'jug pa mthong ste/_a b+he

[\[52b.1\]]d+ha ni b+hir+b+h+r-i taHsA d+huH_sa maM tsan+d+re No_TA_di ta gu ruH/_!_phyag 'tshal ba sogs ni/_na maH_swa sti/_swA hA/_swa d+hAH_a laM/_ba ShaTu rnams dang sbyor ba la bzhi pa 'jug ste/_na mo bud+d+hA ya/_nge_na mo gu ra be/_nga_swa stI rA dz+nye/_nge_so mA ya swA hAH_pi tri b+h+yaH_swa d+hAH_a

[\[54a.1\]]ru toH_pra bra dza ti pu traH/_!_a n+yok+ta pra tha maH_gzhan las bshad pa'i dang po'o/_/don tsam dang byed po ngo bo tsam ma yin kyang kun bshad dang kr-ita sogs kyi sbyor ba gzhan la yang dang po 'jug pa yod de/_g+ho TaH_si_kri ya te/_paTaH_si/_kAR+YaH_!_tshan+da

[\[54a.3\]]dang gnyis tshig sbyor ba dang /_gnyis tshig la gcig tshig dang mang tshig sbyor ba sogs gcig tu ma nges pa sna tshogs yod de/_da d+hi dzu ho ti/_da d+h+nA dzu ho ti/_pu man+tu brAh+ma Naspa tiH_pa tiH_zhes mang tshig gi don la
[\[54a.4\]]gcig tshig byung ba lta bu'o/_/i ti swa ra swasti byA ka ra Na l+ya sUtAt+kA ra ka pra kri yA sa mAp+tAH/_zhes pa brda sprod pa dbyangs can kyi mdo las byed pa can gyi rab tu byed pa rnams rdzogs so//_si/_zho sbyin sreg byed/_TA/_bram ze'i bdag po rnams gtsang sbra byed do//_si/_//de nas tshig sdud kyi
[\[54a.5\]]cho ga rnams bshad par bya ste/_de yang rnam dbye sogs rab tu bkram pa'i tshig gi sbyor ba rnams nyung ngur bsdus te brjod pa ni tshig sdud ces bya'o/_!_/sa mA sash+tsA n+waye nA maM/_ming rnams kyi phan tshun bsdu ba yang ngo /_/don 'gal ba ma yin pa'i ming tshig tu grub pa gnyis sam
[\[54a.6\]]gsum la sogs pa bsgrigs pa'i phrad dang rnam dbye sogs bsdus pas tshig phan tshun ma 'brel ba rnams gcig tu 'brel zhing tshig spyor kyi don thams cad ma tshang ba med par rdzogs shing tshig nyung la don rgyas pa brjod bde ba de ni tshig sdud kyi dgos pa yin no/_/yang
[\[54a.7\]]chu'i me zhes sam de ni dka' thub can gyi chung ma zhes pa lta bu don 'gal ba rnams la ni tshig sdud kyi bya ba mi 'jug go_!_/sa tsa Sha D+wi d+haH_de yang drug tu dbye'o/_/tshig sdud de la yang dbye ba drug tu yod de/_mi zad par gyur pa dang /_de'i skyes bu dang /_zlas dbye
[\[54b\]]
[\[54b.1\]]dang /_'bru mang po dang /_las 'dzin dang /_phyogs gnyis pa'i bsdu ba rnams yin la/_de rnams las kyang /_tshig snga phyi gnyis las snga ma gtso bor gyur pa mi zad pa'i bsdu ba/_tshig phyi ma'i don gtso bor gyur pa phyogs gnyis pa dang de'i skyes bu'i bsdu ba/_tshig
[\[54b.2\]]snga phyi'i brjod bya la gtso phal med pa zlas dbye dang /_las 'dzin kyi bsdu ba/_dngos su brjod pa'i tshig de gtso bor mi 'gyur bar de dang 'brel ba'i don gzhan zhig gtso bor gyur pa 'bru mang po'i bsdu ba yin zhing /_tshig sdud de rnams kyi nang nas gtso bor gyur pa stobs
[\[54b.3\]]dang ldan pa ni zlas dbye dang las 'dzin gnyis yin no/_/de ltar tshig sdud drug las dang po mi zad par gyur pa'i bsdu ba ni/_s+t+rI'i sgra la rnam dbye gnyis pa'i amra sbyar/_de'i rjes su a d+hi kr-i t+ya b+ha ba ti zhes pa bris pas/_s+t+ri ya ma d+hi kr-i t+ya b+ha ba ti/_zhes pa 'di
[\[54b.4\]]la tshig spyor ram ngag ste/_bA kya'am/_bi gra haHzer la tshig sdud byed pa'i gzhi yin no/_!_/pUrba\u0f85bya ye\u0f85bya yI b+ha ba/_mi zad pa snga ma ni mi zad par gyur pa'o/_/mi zad pa'i rtags gcig sngon na yod pa de la mi zad pa'i bsdu ba zhes bya zhing tshig sbyor gyi bud med bya ba lhag por yod pa'o/_/_
[\[54b.5\]]skabs mi zad pa'i rtags de dbus mthar yod kyang bsdu ba byed tshe sngon du 'jog pa ni tshig phrad nges tshig gi sgrub pa zhes bya ste/_a d+hi sngon du bzhag_/a d+hi s+t+rI yamra kr-i t+ya b+ha ba ti zhes pa byung ste a d+hi sngon du bzhag pas mi zad pa'i bsdu ba yin la/_!_sa mA sa pra t+ya ya yoH_
[\[54b.6\]]bsdu ba dang rkyen dag la'o/_/tshig sdud kyi bya ba la 'jug pa dang de phan kyi rkyen sogs la rnam dbye'i rkyen rnams dang tshig gi phrad rjes 'brel la sogs pa rnams dbyi bar bya ste/_rnam dbye rjes 'brel dang bcas pa phyis pas/_a d+hi s+t+rI zhes gnas pa la de ltar rnam dbye

[\[55a\]]
[\[55a.1\]]rnam pa kun tu ma ning gi rtags su 'gyur te/_ma ning la thung ngu 'os/_thung ngur bsgyur bas/_a d+hi s+t+ri/_si/_!_a bya yi b+hA bAtra_/mi zad par gyur pa las so/_/mi zad pa'i bsdu ba byas pa'i mi zad par gyur pa de las pha rol gyi rnam dbye thams cad 'jig cing rnam 'gyur

[\[55b.1\]]yang na'o/_/mi zad par gyur pa'i atra mtha' las pha rol gyi rnam dbye TA ngi dag ni amra du yang na 'gyur te/_gsum pa la/_u pa kum+b+haM kr-i taM/_u pa kum+b+haM de hi/_bzhi pa la/_u pa kum+b+hi de hi/_lnga pa la A ta ma yin pa zhes pas amra du mi 'gyur/_u pa kum+b+hA

[\[56a.1\]]yaM/_pr-i ka b+ha yaM/_rA dz+haHpu ru Sha/_rA dza pu ru ShaH_a k+SheShu shauN+DaH_ak+Sha shauN+DaH/_!_skabs la lar amra la sogs pa'i mtha' can gyi tshig de bsdu ba byas nas slar phyi mar spo ba yang yod de/_ag+nau ngi_A hi taH_zhes pa la rnam dbye phyis snga phyi brjes

[\[56b.1\]]bsdu ba ste/_de la yang spyir bsdu ba dang /_bral ba dang gi don dang /_sbyor ba dang bral ba dang gi don dang /_gcig gcig sbyor ba dang gi don dang /_kun tu sdud pa dang gi don dang bzhir dbye ba las/_byed po gcig gi bla ma'i bstod pa dang dbang phyug gi bstod pa dus gcig tu

[\[57a.1\]]tiH_!_yang asni la sogs pa'i pha rol gyi so ma la sogs pa'i sa yig dang sha yig ni Sha yig tu 'gyur bar bshad de/_ag+hish+tsa si_so mash+tsa/_si_zhes pa'i don la rnam dbye sogs phyis sngon ma ring po sa Shar bsgyur bas/_ag+nI Sho mau/_de rnams ni gcig

[\[57a.3\]]dang ldan pa yin pas gcig tshig kho na sbyor ba dang dngos po mang po yod pas mang tshig sbyor ba yang na bar bya ste/_sha shA dzasa?_sh+tsa ku dzasra_shAsh+tsa pA la shAsh+tsa_dzasa?/_zhes pa'i tshig sbyor la rnam dbye sogs phyis/_mthar gcig tshig dang mang tshig yang na bar byas pas/_sha sha

[\[57b\]]
[\[57b.1\]]bsdu ba'i mtha' ata yin na de mo rtags su byed na Ipra 'gyur te/_da shA nAM grA_Amra_mA NAM_Amra sa mA hAraH_zhes pa'i tshig sbyor la rnam dbye rjes 'brel bcas pa phyis/_mthar I sbyar bas/_da sha grA mI/_de bzhin du/_pany+tsAg+na yaH_sa ma hri ta/_I/_pany+tsA nAM ga pAM sa mA hA raH_pany+tsa guH_tra

[\[57b.6\]]de'i yon tan can/_rna ba ring po dag/_zhes pa'i don la/_lo hi tAk+ShiH_de bzhin du/_gr-i he_ngi_ku sha laM si ya s+ya/_gr-i he ku sha laH_!_nen+d+wA di b+h+yash+tsa/_in+du la sogs pa dag khyad par du dmar ba'i mig gang gi/_au_numra/_las kyang ma yin no/_/in+du la sogs pa rnams dang /_tsakra pA Ni la sogs pa dag

[\[58a\]]
[\[58a.1\]]sogs so/_!_/pra dzA me d+ha yo ra suka?/_pra dzA me d+ha dag la a suka'o/_/'bru mang po'i bsdu ba las pra dzA dang me d+ha dag la a suka? A ga ma ster te/_su pra dzAHya s+ya/_dzas _zhes pa'i tshig sbyor la rnam dbye rjes 'brang bcas pa phyis/_mthar a suka? byin/_kra
[\[58a.2\]]gnas don u brjod don/_i a zhes pas rtags mtha'i a phyis/_si byin/_de yang phyis/_a tu sogs kyis u pa d+hA ring pos rnam bcad/_su pra dzAH_de bzhin du/_bzang po'i skyes bu gang gi_/durme d+hAHya s+ya/_durme d+hAH/_!_d+harmA danra/_darma las anra'o/_/'bru mang po'i bsdu ba
[\[58a.3\]]las d+harma'i sgra la anra rkyen du 'gyur te/_su d+harmo ya si_s+ya zhes pa la/_su d+harmA/_!_an+yAr+the/_gzhan gyi don la'o/_/'bru mang po'i bsdu ba las _skye rgu bzang po rnams/_gzhan gyi don te sngar mo _blo gros ngan pa gang gi/_dzas/_a sukrasi/_blo gros ngan pa/_rtags su grub pa'i A I rnams spyir btang la thung
[\[58a.4\]]ngur 'gyur te/_rU pa ba tI b+hA_si_R+YA si_ya s+ya/_zhes legs pa'i chos gang gi/_pa'i _legs pa'i chos/_an si na'i u pa d+hA ring po/_tshig sbyor la/_rnam dbye sogs phyis/_A pa mtha' thung ngur bsgyur/_!_puM ba dwA/_skyes pa bzhin yang na'o/_/'bru mang po'i bsdu ba las spyir btang mo rtags

[\[61b.1\]]de'i bu brgyud kyi don la iny+ra 'gyur te/_de ba dat+ta s+ya _ngas _a pa t+yaM/_si_zhes pa'i don la/_nam dbye sogs phyis/_iny+ra/_ny+ra 'phel pa'i don/_i a dag gi dbyi 'os rtags mtha'i a phyis pas/_dai ba dat+tiH_iny+ra/_lhas byin gyi bu/_de bzhin du/_shrai d+ha riH_!_N+yA ya na Ne yaN+NA yA garga na

[\[61b.7\]]'ga' zhig tu bu brgyud la sogs pa'i rkyen rnams 'jig ste/_gArgya/_dzasa?/_gna'i bu rnams/_gargAH_sa'i bu ste mig dmar/_A tre yaH_dzasa?/_a tra yaH_rgyun shes kyi bu rnams/_bai de ha/_dza sa/_rgyal po lus 'phags kyi bu rnams/_bi de hAH_!_de ba te da mar+the/_lha dang 'di'i don la'o/_/_
[\[62a\]]
[\[62a.1\]]mchod pa lta bu lha'i don dang 'di zhes pa'i don la aN 'gyur te/_in+d+ro de ba tAM ya _Am _s+ya ha _ngas _bi/_zhes pa'i don la rnam dbye sogs phyis aN+ra byin pas/_ain+d+raM ha bi/_de bzhin du/_so myo de ba tAM ya s+ya/_sau myaM sogs lha'i don dang /_!_'di'i don la dper na/_
[\[62a.2\]]de ba dat+tAr+tha mi si_daM/_zhes pa'i don la/_dai ba dat+taM/_zhes pa ste lhas byin gyi don du bzhag si_lha dbang po'i sreg rdzas gang gi_/pa'i zas dang gos la sogs pa'i don no/_!_/kwa tsid+d+wa dbang po'i ched kyi sreg rdzas/_yoH_lha zla ba'i ched du gang gi/_si_aN si_la lar gnyis ka la'o/_/rkyen 'phel
[\[62a.3\]]'di lhas byin gyi don du/_ba'i rgyu mtshan can pha rol la lhas byin gyi don du/_skabs la lar ming sngon ma dang phyi ma gnyis ka'i thog ma'i dbyangs 'phel bar byed pa yang yod de/_Ag+hi mA ru ta karmA/_!_yang dngos po'i don la'ang aN sogs 'jug par bshad pas/_su hr-id dang su b+ha ga la dngos po'i
[\[62a.4\]]don du aN+ra dang N+ya byin/_so so'i tshig gnyis ka'i dbyangs thog ma 'phel ba byas pas/_sauhA rdaM/_sau b+hA gyaM/_!_Ni to bA/_N+ra 'gro ba las yang na'o/_/mi la rlung gis las byed/_gong du brjod pa dang 'chad 'gyur gyi rkyen N+ra yig rjes 'brel 'gro ba 'phel ba'i rgyu mtshan can rnams las kyang
[\[62a.5\]]skabs 'gar 'phel ba sogs Na 'gro ba'i cho ga rnams byed pa dang mi byed pa 'dam kha can du byed mdza' bshes/_skal bzang pa sogs yang na bar byed pa'ang yod de/_a dzo si_gaiR+Ya s+ya/_zhes pa'i don la rnam dbye sogs phyis/_aN+ra 'phel ba yang na bar byas pas/_A dza ga
[\[62a.6\]]baM/_a dza ga baM/_de bzhin du/_ku mu da s+ya ngas _gan+d+ha _i _mi ba gan+d+ho ya _si _s+ya/_zhes pa'i don la/_N+ya kau mu da gan+d+h+yA/_'phel ba 'dam kha'i dpe/_ku mu da gan+d+h+yA/_shwA su ra s+yA yaM/_shwA su_N+ya_r+Ya grA maH_nor dang sa gzhi ldan pa gang gi zhes pa ste dbang phyug chen po'i ming /_biSh+No ri ngas daM 'phel ba'i dpe/_ngas si/_'phel ba'i dpe/_baiSh+Na baM/_dbang phyug chen po'am dbang phyug gi gzhu la yang 'jug go/_
[\[62a.7\]]ku mu da'i dri dang 'dra ba'i dri gang gi/_ngas _si _go ri daM/_ba lang 'di/_ga byaM/_'phel ba mi byed pa'i dpe/Ta/_ku la s+ya_ngas _ku mu da'i dri dang ldan pa'i dri yod pa me'i bu/_ngas i damra si gyos po'i 'di/_'phel ba'i dpe/_'di gyos po'i khyim/_i daM/_si _'di'i rigs/_ku l+yaM/_N+ya/_'phel ba mi byed pa'i dpe/_khyab 'jug gi 'di/_amra_yuSh+madra/_NI ya/_khyod kyi'o/_/twa
[\[62b\]]
[\[62b.1\]]dI yaM/_a smadra/_NI ya/_ma dI yaM/_!_tsa tu rash+tsa lo paH_tsa tur+ra gyi tsa dbyi'o/_/tsa tudra gyi sgra'i tsa yig ni de phan gyi rkyen ya dang dbyangs rkyen pha rol la dbyi bar bya ste/_tsa tur+ra/_N+ya/_tuR+YaM/_tsa tur+ra/_NI ya/_tu rI yaH_!_a n+ya su dkra/_a n+ya kyi dkra'o/_/a n+ya kyi sgra la de phan
[\[62b.2\]]si _'phel ba mi byed pa'i dpe/_nga'am bdag go_/gyi rkyen dbyangs pha rol las dkra A ga ma 'gyur te/_a n+ya la/_NI ya/_dkra A ga ma byin pas/_a n+ya dI yaM/_dkra A ga pa a n+ya kho na la ster bzhi bo rnams/_gyi gzhan la ni bzhi bo rnams/_ma yin te/_ar+b+ha dza ra ta/_NI ya/_ar+d+ha dza ra tI yaM/_!_

[\[62b.5\]]I na i ya i ka rnams so/_/rkyen ka dang I na dang i ya dang i ka ste bzhi po 'di rnams 'byung ba la gur gum gyis btsos pa'i gos/_sogs pa'i don la a N+ra _gur gum gyis btsos pa/_yAT+ra _nga si _bcom brlag nas 'ongs so/_grong na yod/_'jug N+ya _cing /_'phang lo 'dren pa po ste shing rta 'dren pa'i glang /_N+ya_rkyen de rnams la'ang N+ra
[\[62b.6\]]'gro ba'i ming btags te 'phel bar byed pa dang mi byed pa yang na bar byed de/_kar+Na Ti b+ha baH_zhes pa'i don la rkyen ka 'phel ba yang na bar byas pas/_kAr+Na Ta kaH_kar+Na Ta kaH_sogs dang /_!_grA mA nga si _dA ga ta_si _sta tra dzA si to bA/_zhes pa'i don la rkyen I na grA mI NaH_yang na N+ya sbyar bas grA myaH_

[\[63a\]]
[\[63a.1\]]sogs dang /_!_ya lo pash+tsa/_ya dbyi ba'ang ngo /_kan+ya sogs rtags mang po'i u pa d+hA'i ya yig ni de phan sogs rkyen mang po pha rol la dbyi ba'ang yod de/_ga n+ya yAHdza taH_zhes pa'i don la/_I na byin/_ya phyis pas/_ka nI naH_de bzhin du/_puSh+ye
[\[63a.2\]]Na yuk+taH_pau ShaH_aN _pau ShI/_aN A pa/_yang na I na phyin pas/_pau ShI NaH_pu r+No mA saH_zhes pa'i don la/_pau r+Na mA sI sogs dang /_!_rkyen I ya'i dpe ni/_k+Sha tra la I ya/_k+Sha trI _nga si _yaT+ra _si _bu mo las skyes pa sten la bu/_ya yang na aN byin pas k+Sha traH_de _bu mo las skyes pa sten la bu/_bzhin du/_shu
[\[63a.3\]]skar ma rgyal dang 'dus pa ste rgyal zla/_rgyal gyis nya ba/_krI yaM/_shau kraH_aN_in+d+rI yaM/_I ya/_ain+d+raH_rgyal gyis nya ba/_zla ba nya gang ba ste tshes bco lnga/_!_rkyen i ka'i dpe ni/_tshes bco lnga/_A k+Shi kaH_shAb+di kaH_bai di kaH_sogs so/_!_'dugs ldan nam dpa' bos bskor ba ste rgyal rigs/_'dugs ldan nam dpa' bos bskor ba ste rgyal rigs/_t+ya ta no/_/t+ya dang tan dag
[\[63a.4\]]go/_/'byung ba la sogs I ya khu ba 'dus pa/_dbang po'i tshogs/_pa'i don la ki ma la sogs pa rnams la t+ya dang a d+ya la sogs _rab tu gsal ba'i mig_/sgra'i nang nas/_rig byed kyi khongs nas/_rtog ge'i nang na yod pa/_pa rnams la tan rkyen du 'gyur te/_ku tra t+yaH_ku ta s+t+yaH_ta tra t+yaH_sogs dang /_a d+ya sogs la/_a d+ya ta naH_

[\[63a.7\]]yuSh+ma ka gang rung dang /_asmadra ni rigs bzhi bo 'di/_!_chos rkun nyid/_ma ma ka dang asma ka gang rung du 'gyur te/_tAbakaHIN+ra khyod nyid/_yauSh+ma kaH_aN+ra _mA ma kaH_aN+ra _bdag nyid/_Asma kaH_aN+ra _tA ba kI naH_I na _khyod nyid/_yauSh+ma kI naH_I na _mA ma kI naH_I na _bdag nyid/_Asma kI naH/_In/_!_
[\[63b\]]
[\[63b.1\]]bat+tu l+ye/_mnyam pa la bta'o/_/phan tshun mnyam pa'am 'dra ba'i don la rkyen batra 'gyur te/_tsan+d+ra Na _TA _sa dr-i shaM mu khaM/_zhes pa'i don la/_tsan+d+ra ban+mu _batra _khaM/_de bzhin du/_g+ha Ta ba du _batra _da raM/_!_b+hA be ta twa yaN+ra/_dngos po la ta twa yaN+ra'o/_/dngos po dang mtshan nyid brjod pa'i don la
[\[63b.2\]]rkyen ta dang twa dang yaN+ra rnams 'gyur la rkyen de gsum la yang ta rkyen gyi mtha' can rnams rtag tu mo rtags zla ba dang mtshungs pa'i gdong /_dang twa dang yaN+ra zla ba dang 'dra ba'i gdong /_gyi mtha' rnams bum pa dang 'dra ba'i lto ba/_ma ning gi rtags te/_brAh+ma Na s+ya _ngasra _b+ha ba zhes pa'i don la/_brAh+ma Na tA/_brAh+ma Na twaM/_brAh+ma N+yaM/_!_

[\[64a\]]
[\[64a.1\]]sogs pha rol ba hu'ang b+hU zhes par 'gyur te/_ba hor+b+ha baH_si/_zhes pa'i don la/_ba hu/_i manra zhes gnas pa la/_i phyis/_ba hu yang b+hU ru bsgyur bas/_b+hU mA/_si_!_as+t+ya r+the ma tupa?/_yod pa'i don la ma tupa?'o/_/ming las yod pa'i don la ma tupa?
[\[64a.2\]]'gyur te/_go a s+ya asti i ti/_zhes pa'i don la/_ma tupra mang po'i mtshan nyid dam mang po nyid/_pa rjes 'brel/_u yig_/u r-ita dag las numra mos numra gyi don/_a tu dang sa'i si mang ba'i mtshan nyid dam mang po nyid/_la 'os ring por bsgyur bas/_go mAn/_yang na de'i mthar I ka sbyar
[\[64a.3\]]bas/_go ma tI/_de bzhin du/_shrI mAnra/_shrI ma tI/_sogs so/_!_/a i kau ma tAr+the/_ma tu'i don la a dang i ka dag go/_/ming las ma tu'i don te yod pa'i don brjod pa la rkyen a dang i ka dag kyang 'gyur te/_bai dza yan+ti bi _ba lang yod ba'am ba lang can/_d+ya ti ya s+ya/_

[\[64a.5\]]las kyang yod pa'i don la rkyen ba tu dang inra dag 'gyur te/_do shal can/_go bid+ya te ya s+ya/_sanga? _sgyu ma can nam nor can/_zhes pa'i don la/_ba tu/_u numra gyi don/_b+ha ga bAnra/_btu _de bzhin du/_d+ha nI/_k+ShA trI/_inra si/_daN+DI/_inra si _kA mI/_inra si_da mI/_sha mI/_anra si _sogs a mtha'

[\[64b\]]
[\[64b.1\]]ru twAn/_!_e tat+kiM yat+tad+b+h+yaH_e tad/_kim/_yad/_tad rnams las so/_/e tatra la sogs pa 'di rnams las tshad ston pa'i don la rkyen ba tu 'gyur te/_yadra dang tadra la rkyen ba tu byin/_!_ya t+ta do rA/_yadra tadra dag gi A'o/_/rkyen ba tu pha rol la yadra dang tadra dag gi Ti ni
[\[64b.2\]]ba tu _numra _si _A ru 'gyur te/_Ti A/_si/_numra byin pas/_yA bAnra/_tA bAnra/_!_ki maHkir+Yash+tsa/_kimra ni ki ste ya yang ngo /_/rkyen ba tu pha rol la kim gyi sgra ni ki ru 'gyur zhing ba tu'i ba de yang ya yig tu 'gyur te/_ki yAnra/_!_A i sh+tsaita do bA/_e tatra kyi A dang i yang na'o/_/_
[\[64b.3\]]rkyen ba tu pha rol la e tatra kyi Ti U ru 'gyur zhing yang na e tata yongs _gang tsam _de tsam/_rdzogs i ru 'gyur la rkyen gyi ba yang yar 'gyur te/_e tA bAnra/_i yAn/_!_tun+dA de ri laH_tun+da sogs la i la'o/_/tun+da la _ji tsam/_sogs pa rnams la yod pa'i don la 'don la rkyen i la 'gyur te
[\[64b.4\]]tun+di laH_u da ri laHsogs so/_!_/aun+na t+ye dan+tA du raH_dan+ta las ring ba la u ra'o/_/dan+ta las ring ba'am sbom pa'i don can dang ldan pa _si numra _de tsam/_si numra la rkyen ur 'gyur te/_un+nAHdan+tAHas+ya/_zhes pa'i don la/_dan+tu ur raHsi/_!_shrad+d+hA derUH_shrad+d+ha la sogs pa la
[\[64b.5\]]ste ba can/_lu'o/_/lto ba can/_shrad+d+hA la sogs pa rnams la yod pa'i don la lu rkyen du 'gyur te/_shrad+d+hA luH_si_ni drA luH_kr-i pA luH_sogs so/_!_/asa? kyi mtha' can dang mA yA dang me d+hA dang srakra rnams dzas_dzasa?_si ring po yod pa'am so sbom po yod pa'am so mthon po yod pa can/_las yod pa'i don la rkyen binra 'gyur
[\[64b.6\]]bi t+ya te yas+ya bcas tshig sbyor/_bar bshad de/_ta paswI/_mA yA bI/_si_numra/_me d+hA bI/_si numra _sra g+pI/_si numra/_dad can/_gnyid can/_brtse ba can nam brtse ldan/_!_bA tsog+mi niH_bA tsa las g+mi ni'o/_/bAts+ra las yod pa'i don la g+mi ni rkyen du 'gyur te/_bAts+ra la/_g+mi ni/_rkyen gyi na'i i dang gra rjes 'brel/_tsu'i
[\[64b.7\]]ku dang /_tsa pa'i a ba dza ba as ta pasra binra si numra dka' thub can nam sdom ldan/_sgyu ma can/_blo gros can/_'phreng ldan nam 'phreng ba can/_sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_sma ba can/_bAg+mI/_/A lA Tau kut+si ta b+hA ShI NI/_smad pa brjod pa la A la AT+ra dag go_/pAtsa las smad pa'i tshig brjod pa'i don la rkyen A la dang AT+ra
[\[65a\]]
[\[65a.1\]]dag 'gyur te/_bA tsA laH_bA tsA TaH_!_I Sha da pa ri sa mAp+tau kalpa de sh+ya de shI yaH_cung zad yongs su ma rdzogs pa la/_kalpa/_de sh+ya/_de shI ya rnams so/_/don gang la'ang phal cher yongs su rdzogs kyang cung zad ma tshang bas lhag ma can gyi don la rkyen/_kalpa dang /_de
[\[65a.2\]]sh+ya dang /_de shI ya rnams 'gyur te/_I ShaT+ra smra ba ngan pa te rdzun chen po/_a pa ri sa mAp+taHsarba dz+nyaH_zhes pa'i don la/_sarba dz+nya kalpaH_de bzhin du/_pa Tu de sh+yaH_ka bi de shI yaH_sogs so/_!_/prA shaM sa yAM rU paH_kha bsgyur ba la rU pa'o/_/mi mkhas pa mkhas par rdzu ba dang /_mi shes kyang shes
[\[65a.3\]]zer ba lta bu kha bsgyur ba'i don la rkyen rU pa 'gyur te/_prA shastau bai yA ka ra NaH_zhes pa'i don la/_be cung zad yongs su ma rdzogs pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa/_cung zad ma rdzogs pa'i snyan ngag mkhan/_cung zad ma rdzogs pa'i snyan ngag mkhan/_!_yA ka ra Na rU paH_kut+pa yaM pA shaH_smra ba ngan pa la pA sha'o/_/smra ba ngan pa brjod pa'i don la rkyen pA sha
[\[65a.4\]]'gyur te/_kuSh+pe to bai yA ka ra NaH_zhes pa'i don la/_bai yA ka ra Na rdzus ma'i brda sprod mkhan pa/_pA shaH_de bzhin du/_kut+si to be yA ka ra No pa huH_ba hu pA shaH/_!_b+hU ta purbe tsa raT+ra/_sngon dus shes pa la tsa raT+ra'o/_/gang yang sngon gyi dus su shes pa'i don
[\[65a.5\]]la rkyen tsa raT+ra 'gyur te/_pUrbaM brda sprod mkhan po rdzun du smra ba'am ngan par smra ba/_dr-iSh+Ti bi d+ya te ya s+ya/_dr-iSh+Ti tsa raH/_!_prA tsuR+Ya pi kA ra pra d+hA n+yA di Shu ma yaT+ra/_spyi bungs brda sprod mkhan po tshig ngan smra ba mang po/_dang rnam 'gyur dang gtso bo rnams la ma yaTa'o/_/ston mo byed rgyu'i zas spungs pa lta bu'i
[\[65a.6\]]spyi bungs dang /_bzo bo'i las kyi rnam 'gyur dang /_gzhan la ma bltos par _sngon dus shes shing mthong ba gang gi/_rang dbang du byed pa gtso bo'i don rnams la rkyen ma yaT+ra 'gyur te/_an+na prA tsu ra ba sminra ya dz+nye zhes pa'i don la/_an+na ma yo ya dz+nya/_de bzhin du/_mr-i to bi ka ra g+ha TaH_mr-in+ma
[\[65a.7\]]ma yaT+ra_si_yo g+ha TaH_s+t+rI pra d+hA n+ya ma s+yastI ti/_khyi gyi gtso bo bud med 'di yod pa'o/_/s+t+rI ma yo dzAl+maH_ma yaT+ra si_pUr+Ne na a mr-i ta tsan+d+raH_nya gang ba'i zla bas bdud rtsi sbre/_a mr-i ta ma yash+tsan+d+raH/_!_brda sprod mchod sbyin gyi zas spyi spung sa 'di/_shes nas ma yaTa? si rig byed kyang klog ngas pa sa'i rnam 'gyur bum pa byed/_
[\[65b\]]
[\[65b.1\]]lta bu'i don la rkyen aN+ra 'gyur bar bshad de/_byA ka ra NaM a d+hI te be+e ta be+e ti bA/_zhes pa'i don la aN byin pas/_byA ka ra Na/_aN+ra zhes gnas pa la/_!_na san+d+hi y+boR+YaT+ra tsa/_mtshams sbyor kyi y+ra bra dag la ma yin te iT+ra uT+ra dag go/_/rkyen 'phel ba'i rgyu
[\[65b.2\]]mtshan can pha rol las 'phel ba byed rgyu'i yi ge dang po de mtshams sbyar brda sprod bklags shing rig byed kyang rig pa/_ba'i y+ra yig dang bra yig yin na thog mar 'phel ba mi byed par/_yi ge thog ma de dang y+ra bra so sor phye nas y+ra yin na iT+ra A ga ma dang bra yin na uT treA ga ma byin te/_de nas
[\[65b.3\]]'phel ba so so'i thob ltar bya ste/_byu kyi bra dang ya phye ba'i bar du iT+ra byin/_de nas 'phel ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_bai yA ka ra NaH_de bzhin du/_swa shwaHtaM be+e de ti/_zhes pa'i don la/_sau ba shwaH/_!_i to dzA tA r+the/_skyes pa'i don la i ta'o/_/ngo tsha skyes pa lta bu
[\[65b.4\]]skyes pa'i don la rkyen i ta 'gyur te/_ladz+dzitaH_tri pi taH_k+Shu dataH_sogs so/_!_/ta ra ta me ya swiSh+ThAHpra kaR+She/_khyad par brda sprod bklags shing rig byed kyang rig pa/_rta mchog der rig go_/du 'phags pa la ta ra ta ma I ya rta mchog der rig go_/su/_iSh+Tha rnams so/_/gang las khyad par du 'phags
[\[65b.5\]]pa'i phul du byung ba'i don la rkyen ta ra dang ta ma dang I ngo tsha skyes/_tshim pa skyes/_bkres rngab skyes/_ya su dang iSh+Tha rnams 'gyur zhing I ya su dang iSh+Tha gnyis la Ditra bzhin du Ti dbyi bar bya ste/_a ti sha ye na kr-iSh+TaH_zhes pa'i don la/_kr-iSh+Na taraH_de bzhin du/_

[\[66a\]]
[\[66a.1\]]'gyur te/_a ti sha ye na gu ruH_zhes pa'i don la/_ga rI yAnra/_si numra/_ga riSh+ThaH_gu rur+b+hA baH_ga ri mA/_gu ru sogs ni/_pri ya/_I ya su/_pre yAnra/_sinumra _pri ya/_iSh+Tha/_priSh+ThaH_pri ma/_i man/_pre mA/_si numra/_de bzhin du/_s+thU la s+tha
[\[66a.2\]]ba zhes par bsgyur bas/_s+tha bI yAnA/_s+tha biSh+ThaH_s+tha bim/_phul du byung ba'i dga' ba'am snying nye shos/_skal ba dang ldan pa'i bla ma'am legs pa dang ldan pa'i bla ma/_!_i lo po dz+yA sha b+d+rA dI ya saH_dz+yA kyi sgra las phul du byung ba'i dga' ba'am snying nye shos/_I yasra kyi I dbyi'o/_/br-id+d+ha _dga' ba dang ldan pa/_zhes pa'i sgra dz+yA zhes par

[\[66b\]]
[\[66b.1\]]pa'o/_/gang la'ang che chung mtho dma' sogs kyi tshad brjod pa'i don la/_da g+h+na dang mA tra dang /_dwa yasra rnams 'gyur te/_dzA si_nu pa ri mA NaM dza laM/_si_zhes pa'i don la/_dzA nu dag+h+naM/_si_de bzhin du/_pu ru Sha mA traM br-ik+ShaH_shi ro dwa ya saM si_daN+DaH_kim dang yatra dang tatra rnams la

[\[67a.1\]]logs su bkar ba'am rdzogs pa'i don la rkyen Da 'gyur te/_Dita la Ti phyis pas/_e ka da shaH/_!_dwi t+r+yaSh+TA nAM dwA tra yo\u0f85Sh+TAH_dwi tri aSh+Tanra rnams kyi dwA tra yo aSh+TA rnams so/_/dwi dang tri dang aSh+Tanra rnams kyi ni da sha dang sbyor ba la rim pa bzhin dwA tra yo

[\[67b.1\]]bAraM b+huMk+te/_zhes pa'i don la/_pany+tsa kr-i twaH_de bzhin du/_ShaT+k+r-i twaH_sogs so/_!_/dwi tri b+h+yAM suH_dwi tri dag la su'o/_/dwi dang tri dag la bya ba'i ched du kun nas 'jug pa'i don la rkyen su 'gyur te/_u brjod don sra rnam bcad byas pas/_dwiH_triHzhes grub pa uk+taHdang

[\[68a\]]
[\[68a.1\]]las tshig tu bsgrub pa kun bshad kyi rab tu bya ba rnams brjod par bya ste/_!_d+hA toH_byings las so/_/rnam dbye sde tshan gnyis las phyi ma 'chad 'gyur ti la sogs pa 'di rnams byings kyi mthar sbyor bar shes par bya'o/_!_/b+h+wAdiH_b+hU la sogs

[\[68b.1\]]tha/_mipra/_bsra/_masra/_!_te/_A te/_an+te/_se/_A the/_d+h+we/_e/_ba he/_ma he'o/_/rnams dbye sde tshan bcu las 'jug bzhin pa dang bya ba shes par nus pa'i da ltar ba'i don la tipra la sogs pa bco brgyad po 'di rnams 'gyur te/_pA Ni pa'i lugs la laT+ra zhes zer ro/_!_/_

[\[69a\]]
[\[69a.1\]]yin no/_/des na 'dir apra bi kA ra Na pra 'gro ba yin pas/_byings la yon tan/_pra de'i don/_o abra sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_b+ha ba ti/_gnyis tshig la/_b+ha ba taH_mang tshig la'ang b+hA b+ha bar bsgrub tshul sogs gong ltar byas pas/_
[\[69a.2\]]b+ha ba/_an+ti zhes gnas pa la/_!_/a de/_ata kyi a dang e'o/_/byings kyi mtha'i atra ni rkyen a yig dang e yig pha rol la dbyi bar bya ste/_byings mtha'i a phyis yod/_pas/_b+ha ban+ti/_dag yod/_de bzhin du skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_b+ha ba si/_b+ha ba thaH_
[\[69a.3\]]b+ha ba tha/_skyes bu phyi ma'i gcig tshig la/_b+ha ba/_mipra ces gnas pa la/_!_/ba mo rA/_ba ma dag la A'o/_/rnam dbye ti sogs ba yig dang ma yig thog ma can pha rol la byings mtha'i a rnams yod/_thung ni A yig ring por 'gyur te/_b+ha bA mi/_de bzhin yod/du gnyis _dag yod_
[\[69a.4\]]rnams yod/_tshig dang mang tshig la/_b+ha bA baH_b+ha bA maH_gong du bshad pa ltar de rnams nye ba'i tshig dang sbyor tshul ni/_ming dang skyes bu dang po gsum rim bzhin sbyar bas/_si _sa rA dza d+hA rmi ko b+ha ba ti/_au_tau rA dza _au _nau d+hArmi kau_au_b+ha ba taH_te rA dzA no d+hArmi yod_kA b+ha ban+ti/_an+ti/_yuSh+madra dang
[\[69a.5\]]skyes bu dbus ma rnams sbyar ba'i dpe ni/_ngag yod/_rnams yod/_twaM sA si d+hur+b+ha ba si/_sipra_yu bAM sA d+hu b+ha ba thaH_thasra_yU yAM sA d+hu b+ha ba tha/_tha _skyes bu phyi ma a smad dang sbyor ba'i dpe ni/_de rgyal po chos dang ldan par yod/_si _si _tipra/_de dag rgyal po dag chos ldan dag yod/_tasa?_dzasa?_dzasa?_a ha simAt+ma _dzasa? de rnams rgyal po rnams chos ldan rnams yod/_
[\[69a.6\]]bid+d+hA bA mi/_mipa /_A bA au _mAt+ma bi dau b+ha bA baH_bsra _ba ya mAt+ma bi daHsi _si _khyod legs par yod/_o _khyod dag legs par yod pa dag/_khyed rnams legs pa rnams yod/_b+ha bA maH_masa? _sogs so/_!_/a bya ba d+hA nAts+tsa pu ru Sha bi she ShaH_bar ma chad pa las kyang skyes bu'i bye brag go_/nga ni bdag nyid rig par yod/_ming dang yuSh+madra dang asmad

[\[69b\]]
[\[69b.1\]]gyi skyes bu gsum po la'ang gtso phal bye brag yod la/_de yang gsum ga sgrigs pa la asmadra gtso bas skyes bu phyi ma dang /_gnyis sgrigs pa la'ang asmad yod na de gtso bas phyi ma dang /_asmadra med pa'i gnyis sgrigs la yuSh+madra gtso che bas skyes bu dbus ma 'jug ste/_

[\[70a.1\]]b+ha be+e da sau be+e da pA ra go brAh+ma Na twA di ti saM b+hA ba naM/_zhes pa 'byung ba'i gnas kyi dpe'o/_!_/a shIH_bre ra Na yoHtup+tA man+tu hi taM tA ni bA ba bA map+tA mA tA man+tAMswA thAM d+h+wA mai bA ba hai bA ma haipra/_shis byed dang byed du 'jug pa dag la tupra/_tAM_an+tu/_hi taM ta/_A nipra/_A bapra/_A mapra/_!_tAM

[\[72a\]]
[\[72a.1\]]don can la pa rasmai pa da dang gnyis ka'i tshig can la gnyis ka sbyor tshul rnams rigs 'gre ste shes par bya'o/_!_/de nas adra la sogs pa apra bi kA ra Na 'jig pa rnams kyi cho ga rnams bshad par bya ste/_!_a dA derlukra/_adra la sogs pa

[\[72b\]]
[\[72b.1\]]pa da rnams pha rol la byings shIng+ra gi I yig ni rtag tu yon tan du 'gyur te/_brta ma na'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig dang gnyis tshig la/_she te/_sha yA te/_mang tshig la/_she/_an+te zhes gnas pa la/_!_shI ngo\u0f85n+to ruT+ra/_shI las an+ta la ruT+ra'o/_/byings shIng

[\[72b.3\]]a ta zhes par 'gyur te/_an+te/_a te ru bsgyur bas/_she ra te/_de bzhin tu bsgrubs pas/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_sha She/_sha yA the/_she d+h+we/_phyi ma gsum la/_sha ye/_she ba he/_she ma he/_cho ga de bzhin du byas pas cho ga dang 'byung gnas ling+ra gi skyes

[\[73a\]]
[\[73a.1\]]an+ti/_zhes gnas pa la/_!_nA na pyorbaH_apra med pa la U'i w+ra ma yin no/_/apra bi kA ra Na phyis pa'i yul las byings mtha'i U yig ni dbyangs dang po can pha rol la wa yig tu 'gyur ba ma yin te/_byings kyi I U sogs kyi uw+ra ru bsgyur pas/_
[\[73a.2\]]bru ban+ti/_de rnams dang 'dra bar bsgrubs pas/_skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/_pra bI Shi/_brU thaH_brU tha/_phyi ma gsum la/_bra bI mi/_brU baH_brU maH_!_de bzhin du At+ma ne pa da rnams la/_brU te/_bru bA te/_bru ba te/_brU She/_bru bA the/_brU d+d+h+we/_bru be+e/_brU bA he/_
[\[73a.3\]]brU ma he/_!_brUnya'i lus 'gyur gzhan ni/_bru ba A hash+tsa pany+tsa naM/_brU'i Aha ste lnga po rnams kyang ngo /_/ti sogs rnam dbye dang po lnga pha rol la byings brU ni Ahra zhes par 'gyur zhing tipra sogs lnga po yang rim ata ma yin pa la Ata kyi an+ta ata 'os an+te a ter bsgyur/_bzhin/_
[\[73a.4\]]Napra/_a tusra/_usra/_thabra/_a thus rnams su 'gyur te/_skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/_tipra/_Napra/_pra rjes 'brel/_Na yig byings la 'phel ba byed pa'i don/_brU/_A hra ru bsgyur bas/_A ha/_gnyis tshig la/_tasra/_a tus su bsgyur bas/_A ha tuH_mang
[\[73a.5\]]tshig la an+ti usra su bsgyur bas/_A huH_skyes bu dbus ma'i gcig tshig la/_sipra thapra tu bsgyur bas/_Ahra/_tha pra ces gnas pa la/_!_ta the/_tha la ta'o/_/rnam dbye tha yig dang po can pha rol la brU 'gyur ba'i Ahra'i hra yig ni ta yig tu 'gyur te/_hra trar bsgyur
[\[73a.6\]]bas/_At+tha/_gnyis tshig la/_thasra/_a thus su bsgyur bas/_A ha thuH_rnams so/_!_/gong ma rnams dang 'dra bar bsgrubs pas chog 'byung ling+ra gi pa rasmai pa da rnams la/_brU yAtra/_brU yA tAM/_brU yuH_brU yAH_brU yA tAM/_brU yA ta/_brU yAM/_brU yA ba/_brU yA ma/_
[\[73a.7\]]At+ma ne pa da rnams la/_bru bI ta/_bru bI yA tAM/_bru bI ranra/_bru bI thaH_bru bI yA thAM/_bru bI d+h+waM/_bru bI ya/_bru bI ba hi/_bru bI ma hi/_shis byed loT+ra'i pa rasmai pa da rnams la/_bra bI tu/_brU tAtra/_brU tAM/_bru ban+tu/_brU hi/_brU tAtra/_brU taM/_brU ta/_bra bA
[\[73b\]]
[\[73b.1\]]ni/_bra bA ba/_bra bA ma/_!_At+ma ne+e pa da rnams la/_brU tAM_bru bA tAM/_bru ba tAM/_brU Sh+wa/_bru bA thAM/_brU d+h+waM/_bra bai/_bra bA ba hai/_bra bA ma hai/_!_/de ring ma yin pa lang gi pa rasmai pa da rnams la/_a bra bItra/_a byu tAM/_a bru banra/_a bra bIH_a brU tAM/_a brU ta/_a bra baM/_
[\[73b.2\]]a brU ba/_a brU ma/_!_At+ma ne+e pa da rnams la/_a brU ta/_a bru bA tAM/_a bru ba ta/_a brU thAH_a bru bA thAM/_a brU d+h+waM/_a bru bi/_a brU ba hi/_a brU ma hi/_de rnams ni apra bi kA ra Na 'jig pa rnams kyi cho ga dper mtshon tsam brjod pa yin la/_byings hu sogs
[\[73b.3\]]la ni apra bi kA ra Na 'jig par ma zad khyad par gzhan yang yod de/_hwa der+d+wish+tsa/_hu la sogs pa'i gnyis kyang ngo /_/rnam dbye tipra la sogs pa pha rol la yod cing apra bi kA ra Na 'jig pa las byings hu la sogs pa rnams ni gnyis su 'gyur ro/_!_/sa swa
[\[73b.4\]]rA dir+d+wi ra dIH_dbyangs bcas dang po gnyis te gnyis pa ma yin no/_/byings gnyis su 'gyur ba de yang byings kyi dang po'i yi ge dbyangs bcas gnyis su 'gyur la yi ge gnyis pa sogs gzhan rnams ni gnyis su 'gyur ba ma yin no/_/ku hosh+tsuH_
[\[73b.5\]]ku dang ha'i tsu'o/_/byings gnyis brjod pa'i dang po'i yi ge de ka sde yin na/_rim pa ltar tsa sder 'gyur zhing ha yin na dz+ha yig tu 'gyur ro/_!_/dz+ha pA mAM dza ba tsa pAH_dz+ha pa rnams kyi dza ba dang tsa pa'o/_/byings gnyis brjod pa'i dang po'i yi ge de dz+ha pa so sor bsdu ba yin na dza ba so sor
[\[73b.6\]]bsdu ba rnams dang tsa pa so sor bsdu ba rnams su 'gyur la de yang dz+ha pa'i nang nas dz+ha D+ha d+ha g+ha b+ha rnams rim pa bzhin dza Da da ga ba rnams dang /_kha pha tsha Tha tha rnams rang sde'i tsa Ta ta ka pa rnams su 'gyur ro/_/de ltar na hu sbyin pa dang mchod pa dag la'o
[\[73b.7\]]zhes pa'i byings la/_brta ma na'i pa rasmai pa da'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig tipra/_apra 'jig_/byings gnyis brjod/_ha dz+ha/_de yang dzar bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_dzu ho ti/_de bzhin du 'og ma rnams kyang bsgrubs pas gnyis tshig la/_dzu hu taH/_
[\[74a\]]
[\[74a.1\]]mang tshig la/_/dzu hu an+ti zhes gnas pa la/_!_dwe/_gnyis las so/_/byings gnyis brjod pa las pha rol gyi an+ta ni a ta zhes par 'gyur te/_dzu hwa ti/_dbus ma gsum la/_dzu ho Shi/_dzu hu thaH_dzu hu tha/_phyi ma'i gcig tshig la/_dzu ho
[\[74a.2\]]mi/_gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/_!_orba morbA lo paH_ba ma dag la u yang na dbyi'o/_/byings mtha'i gdod ma'i u dang rkyen kyi u ni rnam dbyi ba dang ma dag pha rol la yang na dbyi bar bya ste/_u dbyi ba dang mi dbye ba 'dam ka can du byas pas/_dzu hu baH_dzu hwaH_

[\[74a.7\]]bya ba'i don dang nga At+ma ne'i don gnyis brjod/_ha dz+har bsgyur ba sogs kyis/_dzA hA te zhes gnas pa la/_!_hra swaH_thung ngu'o/_/byings gnyis brjod pa'i dang po de'i dbyangs ring po yin na thung ngur 'gyur te/_dzA'i a thung ngur bsgyur/_/b+h+r-i nyAM lu ki/_'jig pa la b+h+r-iny+ra

[\[74b.1\]]rnams kyi'o/_/apra bi kA ra Na sogs rkyen 'jig pa la byings Du b+h+r-inya 'dzin pa dang rgyas pa o hAng+ra 'gro ba/_mAdra mchod pa rnams kyi dang po'i a ni i ru 'gyur te/_a ir bsgyur/_!_dwe stau lo po nya nu brta te I kA rash+tsa/_gnyis nyid las mi gnas pa rjes su 'jug pa la I yig

[\[75b.1\]]a dat+ta/_a da dAM/_a da dwa/_a dad+ma/_de bzhin du/_At+ma ne pa da rnams sbyor ba las brta ma na laT+ra la/_dat+te/_da dA te/_da da te/_dat+se/_da dA the/_dad+d+h+we/_da de/_da dwa he/_dad+ma he/_!_chog 'byung ling la/_da dI ta/_da dI yA tAM/_da dI ranra/_sogs so/_/shis

[\[76a\]]
[\[76a.1\]]da d+hA tAM/_a da d+ha ta/_a d+had+thAH_a da d+hA thAM/_a d+had+d+h+waM/_a da d+hi/_a da d+h+wa hi/_a dad+h+ma hi/_sogs te/_de rnams kyi rigs 'gre ded de shes par bya'o/_!_/da ni byings dibra la sogs pa apra kyi yul la ya bi kA ra Na 'jug pa rnams kyi bya ba rnams
[\[76a.2\]]brjod par bya ste/_de yang de bu ste ba dang /_mngon par 'dod pa dang /_tha snyad dang /_sdug gu'am 'du 'god dang /_gsal ba dang /_bstod pa dang /_rmi lam dang /_mdzes pa dang /_dga' ba dang /_myos pa dang /_'gro ba rnams la'o/_/zhes pa'i byings la brta ma na sogs kyi
