[\[76a.5\]]'byung ling+ra la/_dI byetra/_dI bye tAM/_dI bye yuH_dI byeH_dI bye tAM/_dI bye ta/_dI bye yaM/_dI bye ba/_dI bye ma/_!_shis byed loT+ra la/_dI bya tu/_dI bya tAtra/_dI bya tAM/_dI byan+tu/_di bya/_di bya tAtra/_dI bya tAM/_dI bya ta/_dI byA ni/_dI byA ba/_dI byA ma/_!_de ring ma yin pa lang la/_
[\[76a.6\]]a dI byatra/_a dI bya tAM/_a dI byanra/_a dI byaH_a dI bya taM/_a dI bya ta/_a dI byAM/_a dI byA ba/_a dI byA ma sogs so/_!_de nas Shuny+ra la sogs pa nu bi kA ra Na 'jug pa rnams kyi bya ba'i dpe tsam brjod par bya ste/_Shuny+ra gcod cing brdung ba la'o zhes pa'i byings la brta ma na
[\[76a.7\]]sogs kyi bdag don dang gzhan don gnyis ka sbyor te/_dang po pa rasmai pa da rnams las brta ma na laT+ra'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig tipra sbyar byings mtha'i ny+ra gnyis ka'i tshig can gyi don/_Shu/_tibra ces gnas pa la/_!_Ad+yaHSh+NaHsnaH_dang po'i Sha Na ni sa na'o/_/byings kyi
[\[76b\]]
[\[76b.1\]]dang bo'i Sha yig dang Na yig ni rim pa ltar sa yig dang na yig tu 'gyur te/_Sha sar bsgyur/_!_swA dernuH_su la sogs pa la nu'o/_/Shu sur bsgyur bas byings su la sogs pa rnams la rnam dbye laT+ra sogs sde tshan dang po bzhi pha rol la byed pa po'i don gyi apra kyi yul la nu bi kA ra Na 'jug ste nu
[\[76b.2\]]bi kA ra Na byin/_!_nU pa/_nu dang u'i pa la'o/_/rkyen nu bi kA ra Na dang u bi kA ra Na gnyis kyi mtha'i dbyangs ni rnam dbye ba 'gro ba'i ming can rnams pha rol la yon tan du 'gyur te/_yon tan byas pas/_su no te/_!_prA d+yash+tsa ta thA tau su na mAM/_pra la sogs pa rnams las su dang namra
[\[76b.3\]]rnams kyi de bzhin yang ngo /_/pra la sogs pa nyer bsgyur sa Sha dang na Nar 'gyur ba'i rgyu mtshan can sngon ma las byings su la sogs pa dang namra la sogs pa sngar Sha dang Na yig sa dang nar bsgyur ba rnams slar yang de bzhin nyid de Sha dang Na dag tu 'gyur te/_nyer bsgyur a b+hi sngon du gzhag_/sa de slar
[\[76b.4\]]yang Shar bsgyur bas/_a b+hi Shu No ti/_gong ma rnams dang 'dra bar bsgrubs pas gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/_su nu taH_su n+wan+ti/_dbus ma rnams la/_su no She/_su nu thaH_su nu tha/_skyes bu phyi ma'i gcig tshig la/_su no mi/_gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/_
[\[76b.5\]]ba ma dag la zhes pas u dbye ba mngon par gcod cing rdung bar byed/_dang mi dbyi ba yang na bar byas pas/_su n+waH_su nu baH_sun+maH_su nu maH/_!_chog 'byung ling la/_su nu yAT+ra/_su nu yA tAM/_su nu yuH_sogs dang /_!_shis byed loT+ra'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/_su no tu/_su nu
[\[76b.6\]]tAtra/_su nu tAM/_su n+wan+tu/_skyes bu dbus ma'i gcig tshig la/_!_orbA heH_u la sa ti'i yang na'o/_/yi ge brtsegs pa ma yin pa'i rkyen u yig las pha rol gyi hi ni yang na 'jig ste/_hi 'jig pa dang shis byed la tA tang+ra du bsgyur ba yang na bar byas pas/_su nu/_
[\[76b.7\]]su nu tAtra/_yi ge brtsegs pa yin na hi mi 'jig pas/_dper na byings ta k+Shu dang twa k+Shu lta bu la/_nu bi kA ra Na sbyar bas/_ta k+Sh+Nu hi/_twa k+Sh+Nu hi zhes pa lta bu'o/_/gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/_su nu tAM/su nu ta/_phyi ma gsum la/_su na bA ni/_su na bA ba/_su na bA ma/_!_
[\[77a\]]
[\[77a.1\]]de ring ma yin pa lang la/_a su notra/_a su nu tAM/_a su n+wanra/_a su noH_a su nu taM/_a su nu ta/_a su na baM/_a su nu ba/_a su nu ma/_!_de nas At+ma ne pa da rnams las brta ma na laT+ra la/_su nu te/_su n+wA te/_su n+wa te/_su nu She/_su
[\[77a.2\]]n+wA the/_su nu d+h+we/_su n+we/_su n+wa he/_su nu ba he/_su n+ma he/_su nu ma he/_!_chog 'byung ling+ra la/_su n+wI ta/_su n+wI yA tAM/_su n+wI ranra sogs dang /_shis byed loT+ra la/_su nu tAM/_su n+wA tAM/_su n+wa tAM/_su nu Sh+wa/_su n+wA thAM/_su nu d+h+waM/_su na bai/_su na bA ba hai/_su
[\[77a.3\]]na bA ma hai/_de ring ma yin pa lang+ra la/_a su nu ta/_a su n+wA tAM/_a su n+wa ta/_a su nu thAH_a su n+wA thAM/_a su nu d+h+waM/_a su n+wi/_a su n+wa hi/_a su nu ba hi/_a sun+ma hi/_a su nu ma hi sogs so/_!_/da ni ru d+ha la sogs pa na mra bi kAsra Na 'jug pa rnams kyi cho ga
[\[77a.4\]]mdo tsam brjod par bya ste/_de yang ru d+hir+ra sgrib pa'o zhes pa'i byings la/_brta ma na sogs bdag don dang gzhan don gnyis ka sbyo ra te/_de la dang po rasmai pa da rnams las brta ma na'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig_/tipra sbyar byings kyi ir+ra dgos pa dang bcas pa'i rjes 'brel yin pas
[\[77a.5\]]phyis/_rud+h+ra/_tipra/_ces gnas pa la/_!_ru d+hA de rnamra/_ru d+h+ra la sogs pa rnams la namra mo/_/byings ru d+h+ra la sogs pa'i sde tshan rnams la rnam dbye brta ma na sogs sde tshan dang po bzhi pha rol la byed po po'i don gyi apra kyi yul la namra bi kA ra Na 'jug ste/_namra
[\[77a.6\]]sbyar rkyen gyi ma gnas kyi don te/_ru dang d+ha'i bar du sbyar/_de'i don gyi ma phyis/_!_ta thor+d+haH_ta dang tha'i d+ha'o/_/byings mtha' dz+ha b+ha so sor bsdu ba'i pha rol kyi rkyen dang rnam dbye'i ta yig dang tha yig dag ni d+ha yig tu 'gyur te/_ta d+ha/_dz+ha b+ha la dza ba 'os byings kyi d+ha da/_Sha ra r-i
[\[77a.7\]]sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_ru Nad+d+hi/_gnyis tshig la'ang /_namra sbyor ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_ru nadra/_d+hasra/_zhes gnas pa la/_!_na ma so\u0f85s+ya/_namra asra kyi a'o/_/ng+ra 'gro ba'i ming can pha rol la namra bi kA ra Na'i na'i dbyangs a dang byings a
[\[77b\]]
[\[77b.1\]]su zhes pa'i a yig ni dbyi bar bya ste/_na'i a phyis/_na'i yang dz+ha sa la 'os nga ror bsgyur bas/_ruMd+d+haH_mang tshig la/_ruM d+han+ti/_de rnams dang 'dra bar bsgrubs pas/_skyes bu dbus ma dang phyi ma la/_ru Nat+si/_ruMd+d+hAH_ruMd+d+ha/_ruM Nad+h+maM/_ruM d+h+waH_ruM d+h+maH/_!_
[\[77b.2\]]chog 'byung ling+ra la/_ruM d+h+yA tAM/_ruM d+h+yA tAM/_ruM d+h+yuHsogs dang /_shis byed loT+ra'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/_ru Nad+d+hu/_ruM d+d+hAtra/_ruM d+d+hAM/_ruM d+han+tu/_skyes bu dbus ma'i gcig tshig la/_!_dz+ha sAd+d+hir+hiH_dz+ha sa las hi'i d+hi'o/_/byings dz+ha sa so sor bsdu ba'i mtha'
[\[77b.3\]]can gyi pha rol gyi hi ni d+hi ru 'gyur te/_ruM d+d+hi/_ruM d+d+hAtra/_gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/_ruMd+d+haM/_ruMd+d+ha/_skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/_ru Na d+hA ni/_ru Na d+hA pa/_ru Na d+hA ma/_de ring ma yin pa lang gi skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/_!_di s+yo r+ha sAtra/_ha sa las di

[\[78a\]]
[\[78a.1\]]b+hai/_ru Na d+hA ba hai/_ru Na d+hA ma hai/_de ring ma yin pa lang+ra la/_a ruMd+d+ha/_a ruM d+hA tAM/_a ruM d+ha ta/_a ruMd+d+hAH_a ruM d+hAM thAM/_a ruM d+d+h+waM/_a ruM d+hi/_a ruM d+h+wa hi/_a ruMd+h+ma hi/_sogs so/_!_de nas upra bi kA ra Na 'jug pa rnams kyi cho ga rnams

[\[80a\]]
[\[80a.1\]]kA ra Na 'gyur te/_A na sbyar/_atra ces pas hi yang phyis pas/_gr-i hA Na sogs so/_!_de bzhin du paSh+ra rgyas pa la'o zhes pa'i byings la'ang cho ga thams cad de dang 'dra bar bsgrubs pas/_puSh+NA ti/_puSh+NI yAtra/_puSh+NA tu/_puShA Na/_a puSh+NA tra

[\[80b.1\]]las med par bshad do/_/zhes pa ste ngo tsha sogs don bcu gnyis po de rnams kyi don can kyi byings rnams la ni las med pa zhes bya zhing /_de rnams las gzhan pa rnams las dang bcas pa'o_/dngos po'i mtshan nyid ni/_ji skad du/_san+mA traM b+hA ba ling+gaM s+yA da spr-iSh+Ta ya ts+tsha
[\[80b.2\]]kA ra kaiH/_d+ha twAR+thaHke ba laM shud+d+he b+ha ba i t+ya b+hi d+hI ya te/_yod tsam dngos po'i rtags su 'gyur/_/gang yang byed can rnams ma reg_/byings don rkyang pa dag pa ni/_/de la dngos por mngon par brjod/_/ces te byed can drug pa gang dang yang ma sbyar ba/_dngos po yod pa

[\[80b.4\]]bsgrubs pas/_b+hU ya te b+ha ba tA/_e d+h+ya te d+hArmi kaH_shIng+ra gi yakra pha rol la I a yang+ra du bsgyur bar bshad pas/_I a yang+ra/_ng+ra dang ya'i a rjes 'brel yin pas phyis pas/_shay+Ya te shru dre Na/_yang skabs la lar byings las

[\[81a\]]
[\[81a.1\]]twaM du khI kri ya se/_rA gau ba rA gaiH_su khya haM kri ye/_!_a ya ki/_a yakra la'o/_/byings mtha'i r-itra ni rkyen a dang yakra pha rol la ring+ra da du 'gyur te/_ng+ra yig bar mtshams gcod pa'i don te 'og nas 'byung ba'i ya la'o zhes pa sogs 'gog pa'i don yin

[\[81a.5\]]dA de riH_dA sogs kyi i'o/_/byings Du dAny+ra la sogs pa'i A yig ni rkyen kra dang ng+ra 'gro ba'i ming can pha rol la i ru 'gyur te/_Du dAny+ra sbyin pa la'o zhes pa'i byings la yakra/_so phag rnams gsog par byed/_A i/_ya la 'os ring por bsgyur bas/_dI ya te/_me la zas sbyin sreg byed/_
[\[81a.6\]]be da bi de A do dI ya tAM d+ha naM/_de bzhin du/_Du d+hAny+ra 'dzin pa dang gso ba la'o zhes pa'i byings la/_ni d+hI ya te d+hA n+yaM b+hU mau/_mAng+ra tshad 'jal ba la'o zhes pa'i byings la/_mI ya te/_!_san+d+h+ya k+Sha rA NA mA/_mtshams sbyor gyi yi ge rnams kyi A'o/_/sbyin par byed/_byings mtha'i
[\[81a.7\]]rig byed rig pa la nor byin cig_/mtshams sbyor gyi yi ge rnams ni dngos po dang las kyi don gyi At+ma ne pa da rnams pha rol la A yig_/gter du spos shig 'bru rnams/_tu 'gyur te/_kai_gai_raisgra la'o_tshad 'jal bar byed/_zhes pa'i byings gsum la_yakra/_ai A ru bsgyur de nas dA sogs kyis A de slar
[\[81b\]]
[\[81b.1\]]yang i/_ya la'os ring por bsgyur bas/_kI ya te/_gI ya te/_de bzhin du/_sho phra mor byed pa la'o zhes pa'i byings la/_shI ya te/_o hAkra gtong ba la'o zhes pa'i byings la/_hI ya te/_pA btung ba la'o zhes pa'i byings la/_pI ya te/_Sh+ThA 'gro ba

[\[82a.1\]]kaSh+ThaM swa ya me ba/_lU ya te ke dA raHswa ya me pa/_zhes pa lta bu ste byings pats+ra 'tshed pa/_b+hi dir+ra gnyis su byed pa/_lUny+ra gcod pa rnams la yakra sbyar nas bsgrubs pa'o/_/yang don gcig la las kyi tshig gnyis sbyor dgos pa yang yod la/_de

[\[84b.1\]]mtha'i a yang I ru 'gyur la Amra sogs kyang sbyar bar bya ste/_pu tra la/_ya ming mtha'i a I de la Amra sogs sbyar bas/_pu trI yAM tsa kA ra/_pu trI yA mA sa/_pu trI yAM ba b+hU ba sogs so/_!_/Du ba tsaSh+ra 'tshed pa la/_bdag gi 'dod pa lo sa 'os/_rkyen sa/_gnyis

[\[85a\]]
[\[85a.1\]]dzu hu buH/_dzu ho tha/_dzu ha bi tha/_dzu hu ba thuH_dzu hu ba/_dzu hA ba/_dzu ha ba/_dzu hu bi ba/_dzu hu bi ma/_Dub+h+r-inya 'dzin pa dang gsog pa la'o zhes pa la/_Amra sogs sbyar ba'i phyogs la/_bi b+ha rAM tsa kA ra/_bi b+ha rA mA sa/_bi b+ha rAM ba

[\[85a.3\]]ba sogs dang /_Amra sogs ma sbyar ba'i phyogs la/_dzi hA ya/_dzi hri ya tuH_dzi hri yuH/_dzi hra yi tha/_dzi hri tha/_dzi hri ya thuH_dzi hri ya/_dzi hA ya/_dzi hra ya/_dzi hri yi ba/_dzi hri yi ma/_de rnams ni byings b+hI la sngon ma'i ha sa dang po lhag po 'o sar phyis/_sogs pa bzhi

[\[85a.6\]]dzi gya thuH_dzi gya/_dzi gA ya/_dzi ga ya/_dzi gyi ba/_dzi gyi ma/_sems dran pa nyams pa dang mi bden pa'i rdzun tshig dang dus yun thung ngu rnams kyi don la'ang Napra la sogs pa rnams 'jug par bshad de/_bi sngon ma'i la pa nga ro 'don pa la'o zhes pa la Napra sogs

[\[85b\]]
[\[85b.1\]]ki la bi la lA pa/_de bzhin du gam+li 'gro ba la'o zhes pa la/_Napra/_gnyis brjod pa sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_dza gA ma/_!_ga mAM swa re /_gamra rnams kyi dbyangs la'o/_/byings gamra/_hanra/_dzanra/_khanra/_g+hasra rnams kyi u pa d+hA ni kra ng+ra 'gro ba'i
[\[85b.2\]]bdag nyid nyal bas ca co sgra 'byin no/_ming can dbyangs dang po can pha rol la dbyi bar bya ste/_gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/_dzag+ma tuH_dzag+muH_de bzhin du bsgrubs pas/_dza ga mi tha/_dzag+mi tha/_dza gaM tha/_dzag+ma thuH_dzag+ma/_dza gA ma/_dza ga ma/_dzag+mi ba/_dzag+mi ma/_
[\[85b.3\]]nye ba'i tshig dang sbyar bas/_dza gA mA ga s+t+yo dak+ShI Na de shaM/_!_hanra 'tshe ba dang 'gro ba la'o zhes pa la/_Napra/_hanra gyi na la g+ha 'os/_ha g+ha gnyis brjod/_sngon ma'i ha sa sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_dza g+hA na/_de bzhin du lhag ma rnams la/_dza g+h+na tuH_dza g+h+nuH/_
[\[85b.4\]]dza g+ha ni tha/_dza g+h+ni tha/_dza g+haM tha/_yul lho phyogs la ri byi 'gro bar byed do/_dza g+h+na thuH_dza g+hA/_dza g+hA na/_dza g+ha na/_dza g+h+ni ba/_dza g+h+ni ma/_nye ba'i tshig dang sbyar ba'i dpe ni/_mu rA dzA ga nA kadz+dza la lo pa lo lo lag+mI mu khAM b+ho dza bi lA pa b+h+r-ing+gaH/_dza ga tra pa trA Na ta nu tra b+hu to dza g+hA na kaM saM ka li
[\[85b.5\]]bA sa de baH/_gcod byed lha min yan lag ma yi mig sman byi/_/dpal mo'i gdong gi pad tshal rnam rol bung ba ni/_/'gro ba'i skyabs dang skyob pa phra bar 'jug pa can/_/kang+sa nges par bcom pa nor lha'i bu 'di'o/_/dza nI skye ba la'o zhes pa bdag don gyi
[\[85b.6\]]tshig can yin pas At+ma na pa da rnams 'jug pa la/_byings mtha'i I dgos pa dang bcas pa'i rjes 'brel/_gnyis brjod/_sngon ma'i ha sa dang po lhag po 'os nra gong ma phyis/_u pa d+hA yang phyis/_sa tu'i sha tsu'os/_nra ny+ra dzra ny+ra 'dus pa dz+ny+ra sogs
[\[85b.7\]]kyis bsgrubs pas/_dza dz+nye/_dza dz+nyA te/_dza dz+nyi re/_dza dz+nyi She/_dza dz+nyA the/_dza dz+nyi d+h+we/_dza dz+nye/_dza dz+nyi ba he/_dza dz+nyi ma he/_dza dz+nye dza gadz+dza/_nArdAnAtra/_'gro bas mchod pa las 'gro ba rnams skyes so/_/kha na bto ba la'o zhes pa la pa rasmai pa da rnams sbyor ba las/_byings mtha'i
[\[86a\]]
[\[86a.1\]]a brjod don/_gnyis brjod/_sngon ma'i ha sa dang po lhag po/_ku ha zhes pas/_kha tsha/_kha pa sogs kyis tsha tsar bsgyur ba sogs kyis/_tsa khA na/_tsa kh+na tuH_tsa kh+nuH_tsa kha ni tha/_tsa kh+ni tha/_tsa khaM tha/_tsa kh+na thuH_tsa kh+na/_tsa khA na/_tsa kha na/_
[\[86a.2\]]tsa kh+ni ba/_tsa kh+ni ma/_kU baM tsa khA na pUrta kr-i/_!_g+hasl-i za ba la'o zhes pa la pa rasmai pa da rnams sbyor ba las/_gnyis brjod pa sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/_dza g+hA sa/_gnyis tshig la de dang 'dra ba la u pa d+hA phyis/_kha sa zhes pas g+h+ra
[\[86a.3\]]g+ha krar bsgyur bas/_khron pa 'dru'o khron pa mkhan gyis/_dza krasra/_a tusra zhes gnas pa la/_!_g+ha sA de saHShaHg+ha sa sogs kyi sa'i Sha'o/_/byings g+hasra la sogs pa rnams kyi mtha'i sra yig ni Sh+ra du yig tu 'gyur te/_sra Sh+ra/_kra Sh+ra 'dus pa k+Sha sogs kyis/_dzak+Sha tuHdzak+ShuH_
[\[86a.4\]]de bzhin du lhag ma rnams la/_dzak+Shi tha/_dza g+ha si tha/_dza g+has+tha/_dzak+Sha thuH_dzak+Sha/_dza g+hA sa/_dza g+ha sa/_dzak+Shi ba/_dzak+Shi ma/_!_Du dAny+ra sbyin pa la'o zhes pa la/_Napra gnyis brjod thung ngu'o sa thung ngur bsgyur bas/_da dA/_Napra ces gnas pa la/_!_A to
[\[86a.5\]]Nap+Dau/_Atra las Napra Dau'o/_/byings A ring mtha' las pha rol gyi Napra na D+ro ru 'gyur te/_Napra Dau Dita la Ti phyis/_Da de'i don/_da dau/_gnyis tshig la/_da dA/_a tu sa zhes gnas pa la/_!_A to\u0f85na pi/_Atra kyi apra med pa la'o/_/byings A ring mtha'
[\[86a.6\]]can apra bi kA ra Na'i rkyen med pa ni kra ng+ra 'gro ba'i ming can dbyangs dang po can pha rol la dbyi bar bya ste/_A phyis pas da da tuH_de bzhin du bsgrubs pas lhag ma rnams la/_da duH/_da daM tha/_da de tha/_da dA tha/_da da thuH/_da da/_da dau/_da di ba/_da di ma/_de
[\[86a.7\]]bzhin du pA btung ba la'o zhes pa la/_pa pau/_pa pa tuH_pa puH_pa pi tha/_pa pe tha/_pa pA tha/_pa pa thuH_pa pa/_pa pau/_pa pi ba/_pa pi ma/_!_Sh+ThA 'gro ba las ldog pa la'o zhes pa la/_Napra/_gnyis brjod/_thung ngu 'os/_thung ngur bsgyur bas/_
[\[86b\]]
[\[86b.1\]]s+tha s+thA/_Napra ces gnas pa la/_!_na sha sAt+kha paH_sha sa'i ma yin te kha pa'o/_/byings gnyis su brjod pa'i ha sa dang po de lhag por gnas par bshad pa las gnyis brjod pa'i dang po'i yi ge de sha sa so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge yin na kha pa so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge pha rol la
[\[86b.2\]]sha sa'i yi ge de lhag mar gnas pa ma yin pas/_kha pa'i yi ge de lhag mar gnas te/_sa phyis/_kha sa sogs kyis/_tha ta/_Napra/_Dau/_Ti phyis pas/_tas+thau/_de bzhin du lhag ma rnams la/_tas+tha tuH_tas+thuH/_tas+thi tha/_tas+the tha/_tas+thA tha/_tas+tha thuH_
[\[86b.3\]]ta s+tha/_tas+thau/_tas+thi ba/_tas+thi ma/_de bzhin du yA thob par byed pa la'o zhes pa la/_Napra sogs sbyar bas/_ya yau/_ya ya tuH_ya yuH/_ya yi tha/_ya ye tha/_ya yA tha/_ya ya thuH_ya ya/_ya yau/_ya yi ba/_ya yi ma/_byings bzhi po de rnams
[\[86b.4\]]nye ba'i tshig dang sbyar ba'i dpe ni/_da dau dA naM dA dA tA pa pau pe yaM mu dA pu naH/_tas+thau prI tasta dAs+thA ne d+ha naM hi twA pa naM ya yau/_sbyin pa po de sbyin pa ster bar byed/_/slar yang dga' bas btung ba 'thung bar byed/_/gnas der mchod pa'i phyir du des bsdad la/_/nor rnams spangs
[\[86b.5\]]nas nags su thob par gyur/_!_Sh+NA dag par byed pa la'o zhes pa la Napra sogs sbyar/_dang po'i Sha Na'i sa na'os/_Sh+ra sa? Na yang nar log/_gnyis brjod thung ngu 'os/_thung ngu /_'di kha sa min pas sha sa'i yi ge mi dbyi sngon ma'i ha sa dang po lhag po'o sogs kyis
[\[86b.6\]]bsgrubs pas/_sa snau/_sa sna tuH_sa snuH/_sa sni tha/_sa sne tha/_sa snA tha/_sa sna thuH/_sa sna/_sa snau/_sa sni ba/_sa sni ma/_!_Sh+Tu nya bstod pa la Napra sogs sbyar/_gnyis brjod/_sha sa'i sogs kyis sra dbyi ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_tuSh+TA ba/_

[\[87a\]]
[\[87a.1\]]pa la/_dang po pa rasmai pa da'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig Napra sbyar gnyis kyang ngos gnyis brjod/_sngon ma'i ha sa dang po lhag po'os/_dzra gong ma phyis pas/_ya yadzra/_Napra ces gnas pa la/_!_Na bA dau pUrba s+ya/_Napra sogs la dang po'i 'o/_/Napra

[\[87a.3\]]gnas pa la/_ya dzAM ya ba ra NaM y+b+r-itaHsaM pra mA ra NaM ki ti/_ka 'gro ba la ya dza rnams kyi ya ba ra rnams i u r-itra rnams su slar yang dag par bsgyur ba'o/_/Napra la sogs pa kra 'gro ba'i ming can pha rol la byings/_yadzra/_bats+ra/_swapra/_beny+ra/_byeny+ra/_hwa ny+ra/_bapra/_
[\[87a.4\]]badra/_bsra rnams kyi ya ba ra rnams ni gnyis brjod pa'i dang por ma zad gnyis pa'ang rim pa ltar i u r-i rnams su 'gyur la/_de la saM pra sA ra Na ste slar yang dag par bsgyur ba zhes bya zhing /_spyir slar yang dag par bsgyur ba de yang ra sogs gsal byed kho na
[\[87a.5\]]mi 'gyur bar dbyangs bcas bsgyur ba yin la/_dbyangs de yang thung ngu yin na i sogs thung ngu dang ring po yin na ring por bsgyur bar bya ba yin te/_ya phyi ma yang i/_'dra ba'i yi ge 'dus pa sogs kyis/_I dza tuH_de gnyis dang 'dra bar bsgrubs pas/_I
[\[87a.6\]]dzuH/_I dzi tha/_i ya dzi tha/_i yaSh+Tha/_I dza thuH_I dza/_i yA dza/_i ya dza/_I dzi ba/_I dzi ma/_de bzhin du bsgrubs pas At+ma ne pa da rnams la/_I dze/_I dzA te/_I dzi re/_I dzi She/_I dzA the/_I dzi d+h+we/_I dze/_I dzi ba he/_I dzi

[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]]tsi ma/_!_brUnya gsal bar brjod pa la'o zhes pa la bdag don dang gzhan don gnyis ka sbyor ba las/_!_brUnyo ba tsi/_brUny+ra'i btsa'o/_/byings brUnya ni lkog gyur gyi rnam dbye dang gzhan yang apra bi kA ra Na med pa'i rkyen mang po la ba tsa zhes par 'gyur te/_brU btsa?r bsgyur bas pa

[\[88a\]]
[\[88a.1\]]pa la/_nuka? ster ba sogs cho ga thams cad snga ma dang 'dra bar bsgrubs pas/_pa rasmai pa da rnams la/_A naM dza/_A naM dza tuH_A naM dzuH_A naM dzi tha/_A naM dza thuH_A naM dza/_A naM dza/_A naM dzi ba/_A naM dzi ma/_At+ma ne pa da rnams la/_A naM dze/_

[\[88a.5\]]bshad de/_ki dang tsi 'dam kha can du byas ki ru bsgyur ba'i phyogs la nyer bsgyur nir+ra sngon du bzhag_/de nas 'phel ba yon tan iy+ra sogs so so'i thob ltar bsgrubs pas/_nish+tsi kA ya/_nish+tsi kya tuH_nish+tsi kyuH_nish+tsi ka yi tha/_nish+tsi ke tha/_nish+tsi kya thuH_nish+tsi

[\[88b.1\]]byeny+ra gnon pa la'o zhes pa la bdag don dang gzhan don gnyis ka 'jug pa las/_nyer bsgyur sam sngon du bzhag_/N+ra dang pra 'gro ba rnams la/_Napra sogs la dang po'i 'os/_gnyis brjod pa'i dang po saM pra sA ra Na dang /_ka 'gro ba'i ming can rnams la/_ka 'gro ba sogs

[\[89a\]]
[\[89a.1\]]kitra ma yin no/_/yang dag par sbyor ba ste byings mtha' yi ge brtsegs pa las pha rol gyi lkog gyur gyi rkyen rnams ni ka 'gro ba'i ming can ma yin zhing /_slar yang dag par bsgyur ba dang /_'phel ba dang /_yon tan sogs kyi khyad par yang med de gnyis brjod
[\[89a.2\]]sngon ma'i ha sa dang po lhag po sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_pa prats+tsha/_pa prats+tsha tuH_pa prats+tshaH_pa prats+tshi tha/_pa praSh+Tha/_pa prats+tsha thuH_pa prats+tsha/_pa prats+tsha/_pa prits+tshi ba/_pa prats+tshi ma/_skan+d+hir+ra/_lUny+ra/_muSh+ra/_hr-iny+ra rnams la mtho 'tsham pa dang /_yang yang gi don la
[\[89a.3\]]lkog gyur gyi rnam dbye Napra ni shis byed loT+ra'i skyes bu dbus ma'i gcig tshig hir bsgyur nas gcig tshig mtha' can du byed par tshig phrad kyi bsgrub par bshad de/_byings skaM d+hir+ra 'gro ba dang mya ngan/_lAny+ra gcod pa/_muSh+ra brku ba/_hr-iny+ra 'phrog pa rnams la/_Napra de hi ru bsgyur
[\[89a.4\]]skaM d+hi ra dang /_hrinya gnyis la apra bi kA ra Na/_lUny+ra la nA bi kA ra Na/_muSh+ra la A na bi kA ra Na rnams sbyor ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_skan+d+ha/_lU nI hi/_mu ShA Na/_ha ra zhes pa rnams 'grub ste/_nye ba'i tshig dang sbyar ba'i dpe ni ji skad du/_pU rI ma ba skan+d+ha lU nI hi nan+da
[\[89a.5\]]naM mu ShA Na rat+nA ni ha rA ma rAM ga nAH/_bi gr-i h+ya tsa kre Na mu tsi dwi ShA bA shI ya it+tha mash+tsA s+th+ya ma harni shaM di baH/_grong khyer mya ngan med bcom dga' ba'i tshal rnams bcad/_/rin chen rnams brkus 'chi med yan lag ma rnams phrogs/_/rnam 'khrugs 'khor los 'thor ba'i 'tshe bas khyab
[\[89a.6\]]par ni/_/ngal ba med par gnod byed 'di 'dra gnas pa min/_/de ltar Napra la sogs pa 'di rnams gtso bor lkog tu gyur pa'i dus 'das nas yun ring song ba la 'jug pa shas che zhing gzhan yang don sna tshogs pa la 'jug go/_/i ti swa ra swasti byA ka ra Na s+ya sU trAt+pa ro\u0f85k+Sha pa kri ya sa
[\[89a.7\]]mAp+tAH_zhes pa brda sprod pa dbyangs can gyi mdo las lkog gyur gyi rab tu byed pa rnams rdzogs so//_//de nas smon pa'i don gyi rnam dbye rnams kyi cho ga rnams bshad par bya ste/_A shi Shi yA d+yAstAM yA sus+yA s+yA staM yAsta yA saM yA swa yAsma sISh+Ta sI yAstAM sI raM sISh+Thas+sI
[\[89b\]]
[\[89b.1\]]yA s+thAMsI d+h+waM sI ya sI ba hi sI ma hi/_smon par byed pa la/_yAtra/_yA stAM/_yA susra/_yAsra/_yAstaM/_yAsta/_yA saM/_yA swa/_yAsma/_!_sISh+Ta/_sI ya stAM/_sI ranra/_sISh+ThAsra/_sI yAs+thAM/_sI d+h+waM/_sI ya/_sI ba hi/_sI ma hi rnams so/_/byings las smon par byed pa'i
[\[89b.2\]]don gyi bya ba brjod pa la yAta la sogs pa 'di rnams 'jug cing rnam dbye 'di rnams kyi'ang dang po dgu pa rasmai pa da ste ka 'gro ba'i ming can dang /_phyi ma dgu At+ma ne pa da ste pa 'gro ba'i ming can zhes tha snyad byed la/_pANi pa'i lugs la smon pa'i ling zhes zer ro/_/de ltar na byings b+hU yod pa

[\[89b.4\]]byAtra/_dzI byAstAM/_dzI byA suH/_sogs te nye ba'i tshig dang sbyar ba'i dpe ni/_sha taM sha ra de dzI byAd+b+ha banra/_!_byings bats+ra smra ba la pa rasmai pa da rnams sbyar/_krang+ra 'gro ba sogs de dpal dang ldan par gyur cig/_kyis saM pra sA ra Nar bsgyur bas/_uts+yAtra/_uts+yA suH_
[\[89b.5\]]sogs so/_!_byings Du dAny+ra sbyin pa la'ang pa rasmai pa da rnams sbyor ba las/_dA yAtra ces khyod ston brgya 'tsho bar shog_/gnas pa la/!_dA de re/_dA la sogs pa'i e'o/_/byings dA la sogs pa rnams kyi A ni smon pa'i don gyi rnam dbye yAtra sogs pa rasmai pa da rnams pha rol las

[\[90a\]]
[\[90a.1\]]yA suHsogs so/_!_/mA mchod pa la'o zhes pa dang mAng+ra mchod pa la'o zhes pa gnyis byings don gcig cing sngon ma la pa rasmai pa da dang phyi ma la At+ma ne pa da rnams 'jug pa'i gnyis ka'i tshig can du byas pas/_me yAtra/_me yAstAM/_me yA suH_

[\[90b\]]
[\[90b.1\]]ba las/_stU yAtra/_stU yAstAM/_stU yA suHsogs dang /_sto ShISh+Ta/_stoShI yAstAM/_stoShI ranra sogs so/_/i ti swa ra swasti byA ka ra Na s+ya sU drA dA shi She pra t+yA ya sa mAp+tAH/_zhes pa brda sprod pa dbyangs can gyi mdo las smon par byed pa'i rkyen rnams rdzogs so//_!_//de nas de ring ma
[\[90b.2\]]yin pa'i 'byung 'gyur gyi rnam dbye rnams kyi cho ga rnams bshad par bya ste/_shwasta ne tA tA rau tA rastA si tAs+tha tAs+tha tAsmi tAswastAsmastA tA rau tA rastA se tA sA the tA he tAsba he tAsma he/_de ring ma yin pa las/_tA rA+au/_tA rasra/_tA si/_tAs+thasra/_tAs+tha/_tAsmi/_tAsbasra/_tAsmasra/_!_tA/_

[\[91a\]]
[\[91a.1\]]la yon tan byas pas/_tse tA/_tse tA rau/_tse tA raHsogs dang /_de bzhin du NIny+ra thob pa la/_ne+e tA/_ne+e tA rau/_ne+e tA raHsogs dang /_hu sbyin pa la/_ho tA/_ho tA Rau/_ho tA raHsogs dang /_Du kr-iny+ra byed pa la/_kartA/_kartA rau/_kartA raH_
[\[91a.2\]]sogs dang /_hr-iny+ra 'phrog pa la/_hartA/_hartA rau/_hartA raHsogs so/_/yA thob pa la/_yA tA/_yA tA rau/_/yA tA raHsogs dang /_gam+l-i 'gro ba la/_gaM tA/_gaM tA rau/_shaM tA raHsogs so/_/i ti swa ra swasti byA ka ra Na s+ya sU trAts+tsh+wasta ne pra t+yA ya pra kri ya sa mAp+tAH/_zhes
[\[91a.3\]]pa brda sprod pa dbyangs can gyi mdo las de ring ma yin pa'i 'byung 'gyur gyi don gyi rkyen gyi rab tu byed pa rnams rdzogs so//_!_//de nas 'byung 'gyur dus ring ba'i don gyi rnam dbye rnams kyi bya ba rnams brjod par bya ste/_!_t+yA dau b+ha biSh+ya tis+yapra/_ti sogs la 'byung

[\[91a.5\]]l+r-iT+ra zer ro/_/des na byings b+hU yod pa la ti sogs s+yapra dang bcas pa sbyar/_si sa tA sI s+yapra rnams la iT+ra 'os/_iT+ra A ga ma byin/_byings yon tan ku i la sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_b+ha bi Sh+ya ti/_b+ha bi Sh+yataH_b+ha bi Sh+yan+ti/_b+ha bi Sh+ya si/_b+ha bi Sh+ya thaH_b+ha bi Sh+ya tha/_

[\[91b\]]
[\[91b.1\]]la'o/_/byings hanra dang gamra dang r-itra mtha' can rnams las pha rol gyi s+yapra la iT+ra A ga ma ster bar bya ste/_iT+ra byin pas/_ha ni Sh+ya ti/_de bzhin du bsgrubs pas/_ha niSh+ya taH_ha ni Sh+yan+ti sogs so/_!_de bzhin du Du kr-iny+ra byed pa la'ang iT+ra byin/_yon tan byas pas/_ka
[\[91b.2\]]ri Sh+ya ti/_ka ri Sh+ya taH_ka ri Sh+yan+ti sogs dang /_!_ga m+l-i 'gro ba la/_gami Sh+ya ti/_ga mi Sh+ya taH_ga miSh+ya n+ti sogs so/_!_bsra 'dug gnas la'o zhes pa la/_bsra s+ya ti zhes gnas pa la/_!_sa sto\u0f85na pi/_apra med pa la sa'i sra latra'o/_/apra bi kA ra Na med pa'i rkyen sa
[\[91b.3\]]yig pha rol la byings mtha'i sra yig ni ta yig tu 'gyur te/_sra trar bsgyur bas/_ba t+s+ya ti/_de bzhin du bsgrubs pas/_bat+s+ya taH_bat+s+yan+ti sogs so/_!_/dahra thal bar byed pa la/_s+ya ti sbyar/_da sngon ma'i g+h+ra 'os/_hrag+h+ra/_dz+ha b+ha'i mtha' sogs kyis dra d+h+ra/_kha sa sogs
[\[91b.4\]]kyis g+h+rakra/_ku i la zhes pas sa Shar+ra bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_d+hak+Sh+ya ti/_de dang 'dra bar bsgrubs pas/_d+hak+Sh+ya taH_d+hak+Sh+yan+ti sogs dang /_!_duhra rab tu 'gengs pa la'o zhes pa la'ang de bzhin du bsgrubs pas/_d+hukra s+ya ti zhes gnas pa la/_!_u pa d+hA la g+hoH_

[\[91b.6\]]'jug pa las/_yon tan sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_b+het+s+ya ti/_b+het+s+ya taH_b+het+s+yan+ti sogs dang /_b+het+s+ya te/_b+het+s+ya te/_b+het+s+yan+te sogs so/_!_ts+tshi dar+ri gnyis su byed pa la/_ts+tshet+s+ya ti/_ts+tshet+s+ya taH_ts+tshe t+s+yan+ti sogs dang /_ts+tshet+s+ya te/_ts+tshet+s+ye te/_ts+tshet+s+ya n+te sogs so/_!_tuSh+ra
[\[91b.7\]]dga' ba la'o zhes pa la/_tok+Sh+ya ti/_sa la ShaD+ha dag gi ka 'os Sh+ra ka ra/_to k+Sh+ya taH_tok+Sh+yan+ti sogs so/_!_tudra gdung ba la/_tot+s+ya ti/_tot+s+ya taH_a ta kyi A dang e'o/_/tot+s+yan+ti sogs so/_!_ed+h+ra 'phel ba la/_At+ma ne pa da rnams sbyar/_iT+ra byin pas/_e d+hi Sh+ya te/_e d+hi Sh+ye te/_e d+hi
[\[92a\]]
[\[92a.1\]]Sh+yan+te sogs so/_!_/shIng+ra nyal ba iT+ra yon tan sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_sha yi Sh+ya te/_sha yi Sh+ye te/_sha yi Sh+yan+te sogs so/_/o hAkra gtong ba la/_hA s+ya ti/_hA s+ya taH_hA s+yan+ti sogs so/_!_/Du dAny+ra sbyin pa la/_dA s+ya ti/_dA s+ya taH_dA s+yan+ti sogs dang /_rwa
[\[92a.2\]]s+ya te/_dA s+ye te/_dA s+yan+te sogs so/_!_/Sh+Tuny+ra bstod pa la'ang /_sto Sh+ya ti/_sto Sh+ya taH_sto Sh+yan+ti sogs dang /_sto Sh+ya te/_sto Sh+ye te/_sto Sh+yan+te sogs so/_!_b+hudzra skyong ba la'o zhes pa la'ang bdag don dang gzhan don gnyis ka 'jug ste/_byings mtha'i a swa ri ta ste de'i don/_tsu'i ku'os/_
[\[92a.3\]]dzra grar bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_b+hok+Sh+ya ti/_b+ho k+Sh+ya taH_b+ho k+Sh+yan+ti sogs dang /_b+hok+Sh+ya te/_b+hok+Sh+ye te/_b+hok+Sh+yan+te sogs so/_/i ti swa ra swasti byA ka ra Na s+ya sU trAd+b+ha bi Sh+yan+tipra t+yA ya s+ya pra kri ya sa mAp+tAH_zhes pa brda sprod pa dbyangs can gyi mdo las 'byung 'gyur gyi rkyen gyi rab tu byed pa rnams
[\[92a.4\]]rdzogs so//_!_//de nas bya ba shor ba'am ma 'dzom pa'i don gyi rnam dbye rnams kyi cho ga rnams bshad par bya ste/_!_s+yapa kri yA ti kra me/_bya ba shor ba la s+yapra'o/_/bya ba shor ba ste dus la ma khel ba'am rgyu tshogs ma 'dzom pa dang /_bya ba ma rdzogs par 'phro lus pa dang /_bya ba
[\[92a.5\]]zin ma thag pa'i grub zin gsar ba rnams kyi bya ba'i don la rnam dbye dipra la sogs pa bco brgyad po 'jug cing bar rkyen s+yapra kyang sbyin par bya ste/_pA Ni pa'i lugs la l+r-ing+ra zhes zer ro/_/de lta na b+hU yod pa la/_dipra/_bar rkyen s+yaT+ra/_si sa tA sI s+yapra rnams la iT+ra bu 'os/_iT+ra
[\[92a.6\]]A ga ma yon tan sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_a b+ha biSh+yatra/_de bzhin du lhag ma rnams la/_a b+ha biSh+ya tAM/_a b+ha bi Sh+yanra/_a b+ha bi Sh+yaH_a b+ha bi Sh+ya taM/_a b+ha bi Sh+ya ta/_a b+ha bi Sh+yaM/_a b+ha bi Sh+yA ba/_a b+ha bi Sh+yA ma/_nye ba'i tshig dang sbyar ba'i dpe ni/_yA dA su br-iSh+TiHsu rA dz+yaM tsA b+ha bi Sh+yatra/_ta dA su
[\[92a.7\]]de dag tu slong mo bzang po thab par 'gyur/_b+hi k+Sha ma/_bya ba ma rdzogs pa'i dpe/_b+ha bi Sh+yatra/_!_de bzhin du b+hudzra skyong ba dang za ba la/_a b+ho k+Sh+yatra/_a b+hok+Sh+ya tAM/_a b+hok+Sh+yanra sogs so/_!_gam+l-i 'gro ba la a ga mi Sh+yatra/_a ga mi Sh+ya tAM/_a ga mi Sh+yanra sogs gang du char babs shing rgyal po bde bar gyur/_grub zin gsar ba'i dpe/_te
[\[92b\]]
[\[92b.1\]]byings de gnyis nye ba'i tshig dang sbyar ba'i dpe ni/_a b+hok+Sh+ya d+b+ha bAr+Ya d+ya ga mi Sh+yatra/_!_Du pa tsaSh+ra 'tshed pa la/_a bak+Sh+yatra/_a ba k+Sh+ya tAM/_a bak+Sh+yanra sogs dang /_!_dz+wa la 'bar ba la nyer bsgyur pra sngon du bzhag pas/_prAdz+wa li Sh+yatra/_prA dz+wa li Sh+ya tAM/_pA dz+wa li Sh+yanra sogs te byings de gnyis
[\[92b.2\]]nye ba'i tshig dang sbyar ba'i dpe ni/_'ongs so grub zin gsar ba dang zas bya bas rdzogs pa/_gang khyed ni zas la 'ongs so/_/a pak+Sh+yad+b+ha bAr+Ya d+ya g+niHprA dz+wa liSh+yatra/_!_hanra 'tshe ba la/_hanra r-i ta las s+yapa la'os/_iT+ra byin pas/_a ha ni Sh+yatra/_a ha ni Sh+ya tAM/_a ha ni Sh+yanra sogs dang /_!_sha kl-i nus pa la/_a shak+Sh+yatra/_
[\[92b.3\]]a sha k+Sh+ya tAM/_a sha k+Sh+yanra sogs te byings de gnyis nye ba'i tshig dang sbyar ba'i dpe ni/_a ha ni Sh+yad+b+ha bAr+Ya d+ya khyod kyis tshos shig gang du me rab tu 'bar ro/_shak+Sh+yatra/_sogs te rnam dbye'i ngo bo dipra sogs dang rkyen s+yapra a yig mtha' can yin pas apra bi kA ra Na sogs kyi rigs 'gre bas cho ga rnams
[\[92b.4\]]rtogs sla'o/_/i ti swa ra swasti byA ka ra Na s+ya sU trAt+k+ri yA ti kra ma s+ya pra t+yA ya pra kri ya sa mAp+tAH/_khyed rang nus pa ji tsam pa choms shig/_zhes pa brda sprod pa dbyangs can gyi mdo las bya ba shor ba'i rkyen gyi rab tu byed pa rnams rdzogs so//_!_//de nas 'das pa'am sngon byung ba'i rkyen kyi rnam
[\[92b.5\]]dbye rnams bshad par bya ste/_!_b+hU te si/_byung zin pa la si'o/_/byings las 'das pa'am byung zin tsam gyi don brjod pa la dipra sogs rnam dbye bco brgyad bo 'gyur zhing bar rkyen si yang sbyin par bya la byung zin de yang 'das nas dus yun ring song ba la 'jug pa shas che ste/_!_b+hU
[\[92b.6\]]yod pa la rnam dbye dipra bar rkyen si/_i brjod don/_dipra sogs la aT byin pas/_a b+hUsra dra ces gnas pa la/_!_dA de pe/_pa la dA la sogs pa las so/_/pa ste rnam dbye pa rasmai pa da rnams pha rol la byings dA/_d+hA/_s+thA/_iN+ra/_b+hU/_pA rnams las pha rol gyi si ni
[\[92b.7\]]dbyi bar bya ste/_si phyis pas a b+hAtra/_de bzhin du gnyis tshig la/_a b+hU tAM/_mang tshig la/_a b+hUsra/_an zhes gnas pa la/_pa la dA la sogs pa las sos/_si phyis/_rnam dbye dbyangs thog ma can pha rol si phyis pa las b+hu la buka? A ga ma ster bar bshad
[\[93a\]]
[\[93a.1\]]pas/_buka? byin ka gnas don/_u brjod don/_a b+hU banra/_de rnams dang 'dra bar bsgrubs pas/_a b+hUH_a b+hU tAM/_a b+hU ta/_a b+hU baM/_a b+hU ba/_a b+hU ma/_nye ba'i tshig dang sbyar ba'i dpe ni/_a b+hUng+b+r-iSh+TaMH_Du dAny+ra sbyin pa
[\[93a.2\]]la'ang de bzhin du bsgrubs pas skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig dang gnyis tshig la/_a dAtra/_a dA tAM/_mang tshig la/_a dAsra/_anra zhes gnas pa la/_si phyis/_!_s+yA bi daH_si la A dang bid las so/_/rkyen si phyis pa la byings A ring mtha' can dang byings bid
[\[93a.3\]]las pha rol gyi rnam dbye an ni usra zhes par 'gyur te/_anra usra su bsgyur/_!_u s+yA lo paH_us la A dbyi'o/_/anra bsgyur ba'i us pha rol la byings mtha'i A ring ni dbyi bar bya ste/_A phyis pas/_a duH_lhag ma rnams la/_a dAH_a dA taM/_
[\[93a.4\]]a dA ta/_a dAM/_a dA ba/_a dA ma/_de bzhin du Du d+hAny+ra 'dzin pa la/_a d+hAtra/_a d+hA tAM/_a d+huH_a d+hAH_a d+hA taM/_a d+hA taH_a d+hAM/_a d+hA ba/_a d+hA ma/_!_de bzhin du Sh+ThA 'gro ba las ldog pa la/_as+thAtra/_a s+thA tUM/_
[\[93a.5\]]a s+thAH_sogs so//_!_iN+ra 'gro ba la/_dipra si sbyar/_si dbyi ba las iN+ra ni gA zhes par 'gyur bar bshad pas/_iN+ra gAr+ra bsgyur bas/_a gAtra/_a gA tAM/_a guH_nye ba'i tshig dang sbyar ba'i dpe ni/_a re mA gAHsA d+h+wa saM mA gAM garbi ta man+di raM/_
[\[93a.6\]]!_pA btung ba la/_a pAtra/_a pA tAM/_a puHsogs so/_!_g+haT rtsed mo la'o zhes pa'i byings la At+na ne pa da rnams sbyar/_iT+ra byin pas/_a g+ha Tisra tanra zhes gnas pa la/_dgag pa'i don gyi mA sngon du bzhag/_kye 'jig sar ma 'gro khang bzang dben par ma 'gro zhig_/_
[\[93a.7\]]!_me TaH_mA las aT+ra'i 'o/_/dgag pa'i don gyi mA sngon ma las dipra sogs kyi aT+ra ni dbyi bar bya ste/_aT+ra phyis/_ku i la sogs kyis sra Sh+ra/_Sh+Tu la Sh+Tu 'os/_tra T+rar bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_mA g+ha TiSh+Ta/_de bzhin du gnyis tshig
[\[93b\]]
[\[93b.1\]]dang mang tshig la/_mA g+ha TiShA tAM/_mA g+ha TiSha ta/_skyes bu dbus ma'i gcig tshig dang gnyis tshig la/_mA g+ha tiSh+ThAH_mA g+ha Ti ShA thAM/_mang tshig la/_mA g+ha Tisra d+h+waM zhes gnas pa la/_!_d+he tsa lo po/_d+ha la'ang si dbyi'o/_/rnam dbye At+ma ne pa da
[\[93b.2\]]rnams pha rol la spyir btang si dbyi ba ma yin kyang de'i dmigs bsal rnam dbye d+ha yig pha rol la At+ma ne pa da yin na'ang si dbyi bar bya ste/_si phyis pas/_mA g+ha Ti d+h+waM/_phyi ma gsum la/_mA g+ha Ti Shi/_mA g+ha TiSh+wa hi/_mA g+ha TiSh+ma hi/_sma sngon du sbyar ba la yang
[\[93b.3\]]aT+ra dbyi bar 'dod la/_sma sbyar ba na si dang bcas pa'i dipra sogs 'das par ma zad da ltar ba dang 'byung 'gyur gyi don la'ang 'jug par bshad de/_b+hU yod pa la/_dipra/_si/_aT+ra/_sma sngon du bzhag de nas aT phyis pas/_sma b+hU ta/_!_byings
[\[93b.4\]]Du kr-iny+ral/_dipra si sbyar bas/_a kr-i sra dra ces gnas pa la/_!_Ni t+ya pe/_pa la Na 'gro ba'o/_/byings r-i yig mtha' can sogs byings mang po zhig las pa ste pa rasmai pa da rnams pha rol la si ni Na 'gro ba'i ming can zhes tha snyad byed de dgos byung zin nam 'byung bar 'gyur/_pa ni
[\[93b.5\]]byings la 'phel ba byed pa'i don te/_'phel ba byas/_!_saHsi la'o/_/rkyen si las pha rol gyi rnams dbye dipra dang sipra la IT+ra A ga ma 'gyur te/_IT+ra byin pas/_a kAr+ShItra/_de bzhin du sipra la IT+ra dang /_anra/_usra su bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs
[\[93b.6\]]pas/_lhag ma rnams la/_a kAr+Sh+TAM/_a kAr+ShuH/_a kAr+ShIH_a kAr+Sh+TaM/_a kAr+Sh+Ta/_a kAr+ShaM/_a kAr+Sh+wa/_a kAr+Sh+ma/_nye ba'i tshig dang sbyar ba'i dpe ni/_nyer bsgyur nir+ra sngon du bzhag pas/_swa dz+nyA naM yo gI ni rakA r+ShItra/_!_de bzhin
[\[93b.7\]]du nyer bsgyur ba ri sngon ma'i hr-iny+ra 'tsho ba la/_paR+Ya hAr+ShItra/_paR+Ya hAr+Sh+TAM/_paR+Ya hAr+ShuH_paR+Ya hAr+ShIH_paR+Ya hAr+Sh+TaM/_paR+Ya hAr+Sh+Ta/_paR+Ya hAr+ShaM/_paR+Ya hAr+Sh+wa/_paR+Ya hAr+Sh+ma/_!_pa da gsal bar brjod pa la/_dipra/_rang gi ye shes rnal 'byor rnam par grol ba sgom mo/_si/_
[\[94a\]]
[\[94a.1\]]si/_sa tA sogs kyis iT+ra byin pas/_a badra/_isra Idra ces gnas pa la/_!_i TaH_I Ti/_iT+ra las IT+ra la'o/_/iT+ra las pha rol gyi si ni IT dbyi bar bya ste/_sra phyis pa la N+ra 'gro ba 'os 'phel ba byas

[\[94a.3\]]pra dzra rku ba la'ang de dang 'dra bar bsgrubs pas/_prA brA dzI tra/_prA brA dziSh+TAM/_prA brA dzi ShuH_prA brA dzIHsogs so/_!_grahra nye bar len pa la/_cho ga gzhan rnams snga ma dang 'dra ba la byings ha yig dang ma yig dang ya yig rnams kyi mtha' dang /_k+ShiN+ra/_shwasra/_dzA gr-i/_

[\[94a.5\]]sa hi Sha ta sogs so/_!_sha ma dang dwa ma nye bar zhi ba la/_a sha mItra/_a sha miSh+TAM/_a sha mi ShuHsogs dang /_a da mItra/_a da miSh+TAM/_a da mi ShuHsogs so/_!_kra mu rkang pa bskyod pa la/_a kra mItra/_a kra miSh+TAM/_a kra mi ShuHsogs so/_!_da ya 'gro ba la/_a

[\[94a.7\]]riSh+TAM/_a dzA ga ri ShuHsogs so/_!_ha sa dgod pa la/_a ha sItra/_a ha siSh+TAM/_a ha si ShuHsogs so/_!_byings a gi/_la gi/_ma thaM/_ba gi/_ma gi/_swa gi/_ri gi/_la g+hi rnams 'gro ba la/_A gItra/_A gISh+TAM/_A gi ShuHsogs
[\[94b\]]
[\[94b.1\]]so/_a la gItra/_a la giSh+TAM/_a la gi ShuHsogs so/_!_/Du kr-iny+ra byed pa la At+ma ne pa da'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig ta si aT+ra rnams sbyar bas/_a kr-isra ta zhes gnas pa la/_!_lo pohra swAtra dz+ha sa/_thung ngu las dz+ha sa la dbyi'o/_/byings iT mi 'jug pa
[\[94b.2\]]byings mtha' dbyangs thung ngu yin pa las pha rol gyi si ni rnam dbye dz+ha sa so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge dang po can pha rol la dbyi bar ste/_si phyis pas/_a kr-i ta/_de bzhin du dz+ha sa dang po rnams la/_si dbyi ba dang /_dbyangs dang po rnams la saShar+ra bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_a
[\[94b.3\]]kr-i ShA tAM/_a kr-i Shata/_a kr-i thAH_a kr-iShA thAM/_a kr-i D+h+waM/_a kr-iShi/_a kri Sh+wa hi/_a kr-iSh+ma hi/_!_Du dAny+ra sbyin pa la/_dA sogs kyi i 'os/_A ir+ra bsgyur de nas snga ma ltar bsgrubs pas/_a dita/_a diShA tAM/_a di Sha ta/_a di thAHsogs so/_!_
[\[94b.4\]]de bzhin du Du d+hAny+ra 'dzin pa la/_a d+hi ta/_a d+hi ShA tAM/_a d+hi Sha ta sogs so/_!_nyer bsgyur a d+hi sngon ma'i ing kha ton byed pa la'ang At+ma ne pa da rnams sbyor ba las/_!_i ngo bA gI sau/_ing gi si la gI yang na'o/_/byings ing ni si pha rol la gI zhes par yang na
[\[94b.5\]]'gyur te/_ing gI ru bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/_a d+h+ya gISh+Ta/_a d+h+ya gI ShA tAM/_ad+h+ya gI Sha ta sogs dang gI ru ma bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/_dipra sogs kyi aT+ra'i sngon du dbyangs dang po'i aT+ra sbyor ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_a d+h+yaiSh+Ta/_a d+h+yai ShA tAM/_a d+h+yai Sha

[\[95a\]]
[\[95a.1\]]la dbyi bar bya ste/_si phyis/_'phel ba/_tsu'i ku sogs kyis/_a pAk+tAM/_mang tshig la anra usra su bsgrubs pas/_a pAk+ShuH_de rnams dang 'dra bar bsgrubs pas/_a pAk+ShIH_a pAk+taM/_a pAk+ta/_a pAk+ShaM/_a pAk+Sh+wa/_a pAk+Sh+ma/_de bzhin du At+ma ne pa da
[\[95a.2\]]rnams la/_a pak+ta/_a pak+ShA tAM/_a pak+Sha ta/_a pak+thAH_a pak+ShA thAM/_a pag+d+h+waM/_a pak+Shi/_a pak+Sh+wa hi/_a pak+Sh+mahi/_!_pra tsha shes pa la/_dz+ha sa dang po rnams la si dbyi ba dang tsh+rashra Sh+ra sogs kyis tsh+ra Sh+ra de kra ku i la sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_a prAk+ShItra/_a prASh+TAM/_a prA k+ShuH/_

[\[95a.4\]]!_de bzhin du shIng nyal ba la/_a sha yiSh+Ta/_a sha yi ShA tAM/_a sha yi Sha ta/_a sha yiSh+ThAH_a sha yi ShA thAM/_a sha yi d+h+waM sogs so/_!_ru d+hir+ra sgrib pa la pa rasmai pa da rnams sbyor ba las/_!_i ri to bA/_i ru la yang na'o/_/byings ir rjes 'brel 'gro ba la byung zin
[\[95a.5\]]gyi don bar rkyen si'i yul la nga sbyor ba dang yang na si nyid sbyor ba 'dam kha can du bya ste/_nga sbyar ba'i phyogs la/_rkyen gyi nga bar mtshams bzung ba'i don/_d+h+ra a la 'dren pa sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_a ru d+hatra/_a ru d+ha tAM/_a ru d+hanra/_a ru d+haH_a ru d+ha taM/_a ru d+ha ta/_
[\[95a.6\]]a ru d+haM/_a ru d+hA ba/_a ru d+hA ma/_si nyid sbyin pa'i phyogs la/_!_a ni To nA mi ba taH_iT+ra med pa'i nA mi las 'phel ba'o/_/byings iT+ra mi 'jug pa'i dang po'o dbyangs de nA mi'i yi ge yin na si pha rol la 'phel bar 'gyur te/_byings la 'phel ba/_si dbyi ba dang ta tha
[\[95a.7\]]d+har+ra bsgyur ba sogs so so'i cho ga thob ltar bsgrubs pas/_a raut+sItra/_a ro d+d+hAM/_a raut+suH/_a raut+sIH/_a rau d+d+haM/_a raud+d+ha/_a raut+saM/_a raut+s+wa/_a raut+s+ma/_!_de bzhin du ts+tshi dir+ra gnyis su byed pa la'ang /_nga dang si yang na bar byas pas/_ats+tshai datra/_ats+tshai da tAM/_ats+tshai danra
[\[95b\]]
[\[95b.1\]]sogs dang /_ats+tshait+sItra/_ats+tshait+tAM/_ats+tshet+suHsogs so/_!_di bu rtsed mo la'o zhes pa la/_iT+ra 'jug pas iT+ra byin/_byings la yon tan sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_a de bItra/_a de bISh+TAM/_a de bi ShuH/_a de bIHsogs dang de bzhin du/_!_si bu bsnyen par byed pa la/_a sa
[\[95b.2\]]bItra/_a se biSh+TAM/_a se bi ShuHsogs so/_!_dr-i shir+ra lta ba la/_ir+ra la yang na'os par rkyen nga dang si yang na bar byed pas/_nga'i phyogs la/_a dar+shatra/_a dar+sha tAM/_a dar+shanra sogs dang /_si nyid kyi phyogs la/_!_rA ro dz+ha saM dr-i shAM/_dz+ha sa la dr-i sha rnams kyi ar ni ra'o/_/byung
[\[95b.3\]]zin gyi rnam dbye'i skabs 'dir rkyen dang rnam dbye dz+ha sa'i yi ge dang po pha rol la byings dr-i sha la sogs pa rnams la yon tan byas pa'i ar ni ra zhes par 'gyur te/_byings kyi r-i ar+ra de ra ru bsgyur/_de ring por bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_a drAk+ShItra/_a drASh+TAM/_a drAk+ShuH_a drAk+ShiH_a drASh+TaM/_

[\[95b.5\]]so/_!_b+hi dir+ra 'joms pa la iT mi 'jug pa rasmai pa da rnams la/_iT+ra med pa'i nA mi la 'phel ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_a b+hait+sAtra/_a b+hai t+tAM/_a b+hait+suHsogs dang /_At+ma ne pa da rnams la/_!_si s+yoH_si sI dag la'o/_/iT+ra med pa'i rkyen si dang sISh+Ta sogs
[\[95b.6\]]pha rol la byings kyi u pa d+hA la yon tan 'byung ba ma yin te/_byings la yon tan mi byed rnam dbye dz+ha sa dang po can rnams la si dbyi ba sogs kyis/_ab+hit+ta/_a b+hit+sA tAM/_a b+hit+sa ta/_a b+hit+thAH_a b+hit+sA thAM/_a b+hi d+h+wAM/_a b+hi t+si/_a b+hit+s+wa hi/_a b+hit+s+ma hi sogs so/_!_br-i tu 'jug
[\[95b.7\]]pa la At+ma ne pa da rnams sbyor ba las/_iT+ra ster ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_a brtiSh+TaM/_a brti ShA tAM/_a brti Sha ta/_a birtiSh+ThAH_a brtiShA thAM/_a brti d+h+wAM/_a brti Shi/_a brti Sh+wa hi/_a brtiSh+ma hi/_!_ga m+l-i dang sr-i p+l-i 'gro ba la'ang pa rasmai pa da rnams sbyor ba
[\[96a\]]
[\[96a.1\]]las/_!_lit+bu ShA deHnga /_l-i 'gro ba dang pu Sha sogs la nga'o/_/byings l-i yig rjes 'brel 'gro ba rnams dang pu Sha la sogs pa rnams la byung zin gyi rkyen si'i don la nga 'gyur te/_rkyen nga sbyar/_nga yig yon tan 'gog pa'i don yin pas/_dbyi ba sogs kyis
[\[96a.2\]]bsgrubs pas/_a ga matra/_a ga ma tAM/_a ga manra/_a ga maH_a ga ma taM/_a ga ma ta/_a ga maM/_a ga mA ba/_a ga mA ma/_!_de bzhin du/_sr-i p+l-i la/_a sri patra/_a sr-i pa tAM/_a sr-i panra sogs so/_!_mu ts+l-i/_grol ba la/_a mu tsatra/_a mu tsatAM/_a mu tsanra sogs
[\[96a.3\]]so/_!_buSh+ra rgyas pa la/_a pu Shatra/_a pu Sha tAM/_a pu Shanra sogs so/_!_d+yutra snang byed la/_a d+yu tatra/_a d+yutra tAM/_a d+yu tanra sogs so/_!_bats+ra yongs su brjod pa la/_rkyen nga pha rol las/_bats+ra'i dbyangs las kra A ga ma ster bar bshad pas/_tsa dang bra'i bar du sakra/_rjes
[\[96a.4\]]'brel phyis/_sra rnam bcad de ur+ra bsgyur ba sogs kyis/_a po tsatra/_a po tsa tAM/_a po tsanra sogs so/_!_du ha rab tu 'geng ba la nga dang dipra sbyar bas/_a duhra/_adra ces gnas pa la/_!_ha sha ShAM tAt+sakra/_ha sha Sha rnams kyi mtha' las sa kra'o/_/nga dang bcas pa'i dipra
[\[96a.5\]]sogs pha rol la byings ha yig dang /_sha yig dang Sha yig rnams kyi mtha' can la sakra A ga ma sbyin par bya ste/_sakra byin/_ka gnas don a brjod don/_hraD+h+ra/_drad+h+ra/_D+h+rakra/_sa Shar bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_a d+hu k+Shatra/_de bzhin du/_a d+huk+Sha tAM/_a d+huk+Shanra sogs
[\[96a.6\]]so/_!_li hA ro myang ba la'ang sngon ma ltar bsgrubs pas/_a li k+Shatra/a li k+Sha tAM/_a lik+Shanra sogs so/_!_bishra 'jug pa la/_a bik+Shatra/_a bik+Sha tAM/_a bik+Shanra sogs dang /_!_kr-iSh+ra 'gugs pa'am gshor gtod pa la/_a kr-ik+Shatra/_a kr-ik+Sha tAM/_a kr-ik+Shanra sogs so/_/_
[\[96a.7\]]i ti swa ra swa ste byA ka ra Na s+ya sU trA d+b+hU ta pra t+yA ya pra kri ya sa mAp+tAH/_zhes pa brda sprod pa dbyangs can gyi mdo las byung zin gyi rkyen gyi rab tu byed pa rnams rdzogs so//_!_//de nas dngos po dang las kyi don sogs kyi rnam dbye 'jug tshul rnams rab tu brjod par bya ste/_sngar bshad zin gyi dngos po
[\[96b\]]
[\[96b.1\]]dang las kyi don gyi 'jug tshul dang cho ga rnams ni byings thams cad pa rnams kyi cho ga yin la/_'dir byings phyed pa rnams kyi dngos po dang las kyi 'jug tshul te/_de yang gong byings thams cad pa'i skabs su bshad pa ltar 'dir yang At+ma ne pa da rnams 'jug pa las/_nyer bsgyur a nu
[\[96b.2\]]sngon ma'i b+hU yod pa la/_lkog gyur liTa'i At+ma ne pa da rnams sbyar/_gnyis kyang ngos gnyis brjod/_Napra sogs la b+hU a dag gi A 'os/_U A/_thung ngu'os/_de thung ngu /_dz+ha ba sogs dang /_b+hU la bukra'os/_pukra A ga ma/_kr-i sogs las Napra sogs la'os/_ba sa dang po
[\[96b.3\]]can la iT sbyor ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_a nu ba b+hU be/_a nu ba b+hU bA te/_a nu ba b+hU bi ri/_a nu ba b+hU bi She/_a nu ba b+hU bA the/_a nu ba b+hU bi D+h+we/_a nu ba b+hU be+e/_a nu ba b+hU bi ba he/_a nu ba b+hU ba ma he/_nye ba'i tshig dang sbyar ba'i dpe ni/_su kha ma nu ba b+hU ba de ba dat+te na/_!_Du
[\[96b.4\]]pa tsaSh+ra 'tshed pa la'ang gnyis brjod/_sngon ma'i ha sa dang po lhag po dang /_pats+ra rnams kyi ka 'gro ba la dbyi ste a'i yang e'o sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_pe tse/_pe tsA te/_pe tsi re/_pe tsi She/_pe tsA the/_pe tsi d+h+we/_pe tsa/_pe tsi ba he/_pe tsi ma he/_!_de bzhin du ta nu yang ba la/_lhas byin gyis bde ba rjes su myong bar gyur cig/_te ne/_
[\[96b.5\]]te nA te/_te ni re sogs dang /_!_manra la/_me ne+e/_me nA te/_me ni re sogs so/_!_Du bAnya sbyin pa la pats+ra sogs min pas a er bsgyur ba sogs mi byed pas/_da de/_da dA te/_da dI re sogs so/_!_Sh+NA gtsang bar byed pa la/_sasne/_sasnAte/_sasni re
[\[96b.6\]]sogs te/_tshig grogs dang sbyar ba'i dpe ni/_baM pA sa ra si rA me Na yat+k+r-i taM shIta yA sa ha/_ya di dzA nA si ta twa da sasne haM sa bi lA sa yA/_pad+ma'i mtsho la dga' byed dang /_/gang du shI ta lhan cig rtse/_/gtsang byed gang dang gang yin pa/_/de der ngang pa rnam par rol/_!_glai
[\[96b.7\]]dang m+lai dga' ba zad pa la'ang mtshams sbyor gyi yi ge rnams kyi/_A'os ai A/_gnyis brjod thung ngu'o sa thung ngu dang /_sngon ma'i ha sa dang po lhag po kuha dag gis tsu'o sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_dzagle/_dza glute/_dzagli re sogs dang /_de bzhin du/_!_mam+le/_mam+lA te/_
[\[97a\]]
[\[97a.1\]]mam+li re sogs so/_/byings dbyangs kyi mtha' can rnams dang han dang grahra dang dr-i sha la sogs pa rnams la dngos po dang las kyi don la/_si sa tA sI/_s+yapra rnams iT dang bcas pa rnams Na 'gro ba'i ming can du byed pa dang mi byed pa 'dam ka can du bshad de/_a nu sngon
[\[97a.2\]]ma'i b+hU la smon par byed pa'i rnam dbye sISh+Ta sogs sbyar iT+ra byin Na 'gro ba'i phyogs la 'phel ba dang /_Na 'gro ba ma yin pa'i phyogs la yon tan 'dam ka can du byas pas/_a nu b+hA bi ShISh+Ta/_a nu b+hA bi ShI yA stAM/_a nu b+hA biShI ranra sogs dang /_a nu b+ha bi ShISh+Ta/_a nu b+ha bi ShI yA stAM/_a nu b+ha
[\[97a.3\]]bi ShI ranra sogs te/_nye ba'i tshig dang sbyar ba'i dpe ni/_su kha ma nu b+hA bi ShISh+Ta b+ha ba tA/_!_de bzhin du shIng nyal ba la/_shA yi ShISh+Ta sogs dang sha yi ShISh+Ta sogs so/_!_Du kr-inya byed pa la/_kAri ShISh+Ta sogs dang /_N+ra 'gro ba ma yin pa'i phyogs la iT+ra mi 'jug pas/_kr-i ShISh+Ta sogs so/_!_
[\[97a.4\]]de bzhin du/_a nu sngon ma'i b+hU la de ring ma yin pa'i rnam dbye khyod kyi bde ba rjes su myong bar gyur cig_/tA sogs la'ang iT+ra byin Na 'gro ba dang mi 'gro ba 'dam ka can du byas pas/_a nu b+hA bi tA/_a nu b+hA bi tA rau/_a nu b+hA bi tA ra/_a nu b+hA bi tA se sogs sam/_a nu b+ha bi tA/_a nu b+ha bi tA
[\[97a.5\]]rau/_a nu b+ha bi tA raH_a nu b+ha bi tA se sogs so/_!_/'byung 'gyur gyi rnam dbye rnams la'ang yang na bar byas pas/_a nu b+hA bi Sh+ya te sogs sam/_a nu b+ha biSh+ya te sogs so/_/de bzhin du bya ba shor ba'i don gyi rnam dbye s+yapra dang bcas pa'i dipra sogs la'ang 'phel ba dang yon tan yang
[\[97a.6\]]na bar byas pas/_a n+wa b+hA bi Sh+ya ta/_a na b+hA bi Sh+ye tAM/_a n+wa b+hA biSh+ya ta sogs sam/_a n+wa b+ha bi Sh+ya ta/_a n+wa b+ha bi Sh+ya tAM/_a n+wa b+ha bi Sh+ya ta sogs te/_nye ba'i tshig dang sbyar ba'i dpe ni/_a n+wa b+hA bi Sh+ya ta twa ya ta twaM ya d+ya shro Sh+yatra/_!_byung zin gyi don gyi At+ma ne pa da'i skyes bu
[\[97a.7\]]dang po'i gcig tshig la/_!_iN+ra tan+ya karta ri/_byed pa po ma yin pa las tanra la iN+ra'o/_/byings las byed pa po'i don ma yin pa'i dngos po dang las kyi don las rnam dbye tanra la byung zin gyi rnam dbye'i rjes su zhugs shig gang du a de kho na nyid nyan pa la/_bar rkyen si'i yul la iN+ra 'gyur te/_si'i
[\[97b\]]
[\[97b.1\]]yul la iN+ra sbyar/_Na 'phel ba'i don/_a n+wa b+hA bra/_i tan zhes gnas pa la/_!_lo paH_dbyi'o/_/rkyen iN+ra las pha rol gyi rnam dbye tan ni dbyi bar bya ste/_tanra phyis pas/_a n+wa b+hA bi/_gnyis tshig sogs la/_iT+ra sbyar/_'phel ba dang yon tan 'dam kha can du
[\[97b.2\]]byas pas/_a n+wa b+hA bi ShA tAM/_a n+wa b+hA bi Shata/_a n+wa b+hA bi Sh+ThAH_a n+wa b+hA bi ShA thAM/_a n+wa b+hA bi d+h+waM/_a n+wa b+hA bi Shi/_a n+wa b+hA bi Sh+wa hi/_a n+wa b+hA biSh+ma hi/_yang na yon tan byas pas/_a n+wa b+ha bi ShA tAM/_a n+wa b+ha biSha ta sogs te/_nye ba'i tshig dang sbyar ba'i dpe ni/_a n+wa b+hA bib+ha bo b+ha
[\[97b.3\]]ba tA/_de bzhin du Du kr-iny+ra byed pa la'ang Na 'gro ba'i phyogs la iT+ra dang 'phel ba Na 'gro ba ma yin pa'i phyogs la iT mi ster ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_a kA ri/_a kA ri ShA tAM/_a kA ri Sha ta sogs dang /_a kr-i ShA tAM/_a kr-i Sha ta/_a kr-iSh+ThAHsogs so/_!_/nor 'go bar 'byung ngo khyed la/_
[\[97b.4\]]nyer bsgyur nir+ra dang Ang+ra sngon du bzhag na/_ni rA kA ri sogs so/_!_/de bzhin du hr-i ny+ra 'tshe ba la/_a hA ri/_a hA ri ShA tAM/_a hA ri Sha ta sogs dang /_a hr-iShA tAM/_a hr-iSha ta/_a hr-iSh+ThAHsogs so/_!_/Du ba tsaSh+ra 'tshed pa la/_iT+ra mi 'jug dz+ha sa dang po can rnams
[\[97b.5\]]la si dbyi ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_a pA tsi/_a pa k+ShA tAM/_a pak+Sha ta/_a pak+thaHsogs so/_!_b+hudzra skyong ba la/_At+ma ne pa da'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/_a b+hudzra/_i tanra zhes gnas pa la/_!_u ba d+hA ya la g+hoH_u pa d+hA thung ngu las so/_/rkyen
[\[97b.6\]]inra pha rol la byings kyi u pa d+hA nA mi'i yi ge thung ngu yin na 'phel ba mi byed par yon tan bya ste/_yon tan byas pas/_a b+ho di/_lhags ma rnams la'ang iT+ra mi 'jug pas/_dz+ha sa la si dbyi ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_ab+huk+ShA tAM/_a b+huk+Sha ta/_a b+huk+thAHsogs so/_!_
[\[97b.7\]]nyer bsgyur nir+ra dang Ang sngon ma'i d+h+r-i nya 'dzin pa la iT+ra sbyor ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_ni rA d+hA ri/_ni rA d+hA ri ShA tAM/_ni rA d+hA ri Sha ta/_nyer bsgyur pra ti sngon ma'i pa da 'gro ba la iT+ra mi 'jug pas/_dz+has dang po rnams la si dbyi ba sogs kyis/_pra t+ya pA di/_pra t+ya pat+sA tAM/_
[\[98a\]]
[\[98a.1\]]pra t+ya pat+sa ta/_pra t+ya pat+thAHsogs so/_!_/b+haN+ra sgra la/_a b+hA Ni/_a b+ha Ni ShA tAM/_a b+ha Ni Sha ta sogs so/_!_/bats+ra brjod pa la/_a bA tsi/_a bak+ShA tAM/_a bak+Sha ta/_a bak+thAHsogs so/_!_/graha nye bar len pa la/_Na 'gro ba'i ming can du yang na bar byed pas/_a grA hi/_a grA hi
[\[98a.2\]]ShA tAM/_a grA hi Sha ta/_a grA hiSh+ThAHsogs sam/_a gra hi ShA tAM sogs so/_!_nyer bsgyur nir+ra sngon ma'i NIny+ra 'dren pa la/_nir NA yi/_ni ra NA yiShA t+pi/_nir NA yi Sha ta/_ni ra NA yiSh+ThAHsogs so/_!_pA btung ba la byung zin gyi rnam dbye rnams sbyor ba las/_!_A to yuka_/Atra las yukra'o/_/byung zin gyi
[\[98a.3\]]rnam dbye nya yi dang Na yi dang pa yig 'gro ba'i ming can pha rol las byings A yig mtha' can la yukra A ga ma ster bar bya ste/_yukra byin pas/_a pA yi/_a pA yi ShA tAM/_a pA yi Sha ta/_a pA yeSh+ThAHsogs dang /_!_de bzhin du Sh+NA gtsang byed la/_a snA yi/_a snA yi ShA tAM/_a snA yi Sha ta/_a snA yi Sh+ThAHsogs
[\[98a.4\]]dang /_!_nyer bsgyur ni sngon ma'i Du d+hAnya 'dzin pa la/_n+ya d+hA yi/_n+ya d+hA yi ShA tAM/_n+ya d+hA yi Sha ta/_n+ya d+hA yiSh+ThAHsogs so/_!_/pa da 'gro ba sogs la dngos po dang las kyi don du ma zad byed pa po'i don du yang si'i yul la tanra pha rol la iN+ra 'gyur bar bshad de/_nyer bsgyur utra sngon du bzhag pas/_u
[\[98a.5\]]da pA di/_u da pat+sA tAM/_u da pat+sa ta/_u da pa t+thAHsogs so/_!_/bu d+ha khongs su chud pa la/_a bo d+hi/_a b+hut+sA tAM/_a b+hu t+sata/_a b+hu t+thAHsogs so/_!_/byings dza ni dang bu d+hi dag la iT+ra dang bcas pa'i si dang iN la 'phel ba mi byed par bshad de/_a dza ni/_a dza niShA tAM/_a dza ni Sha ta/_a
[\[98a.6\]]dza niSh+ThAHsogs so/_/i ti swa ra swa sti byA ka ra Na s+ya sU trAd+b+ha ba karma s+ya pra kri yA sa mAp+tAH_zhes pa brda sprod pa dbyangs can gyi mdo las dngos po dang las kyi rab tu byed pa rnams rdzogs so//_!_//de nas byings byings su sgrub pa dang ming byings su sgrub par byed pa'i rkyen rnams kyi 'jug yul dang
[\[98a.7\]]cho ga rnams bshad par bya ste/_!_a ti sha ye na ha sA deR+Yang+ra dwish+tsa/_ha sa dang po las phul du byung ba la yang+ra te gnyis kyang ngo /_/byings ha sa so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge dang po can la phul du byung ba dang yang yang gi don la byings byings su sgrub pa'i rkyen yang 'gyur zhing /_rkyen yang pha rol la byings
[\[98b\]]
[\[98b.1\]]de'ang gnyis su 'gyur te/_b+hU la yang+ra nga At+ma na pa da sbyor ba'i don/_gnyis brjod/_dz+ha ba rnams kyi dza ba dang tsa ba 'os/_b+h+rabra/_bU b+hU ya zhes gnas pa la/_!_ya ngi/_yang+ra la'o/_/byings kyi dang po nA mi'i dbyangs ni rkyen yang pha rol la yon tan du 'gyur te/_yon tan byas pas/_bo b+hU ya/_!_sad+hA tuHde byings so/_/_
[\[98b.2\]]yang la sogs pa'i rkyen sbyar ba de la'ang byings zhes zer ro/_/des na byings de tshig tu bsgrub pa'i phyir rnam dbye rnams sbyor ba las/_apra bi ka ra Na sbyor ba sogs gong ltar bsgrubs pas/_brta ma na laT la/_bo b+hU ya te/_bo b+hU ye te/_bo b+hU yan+te sogs dang /_chog 'byung ling la/_bo b+hU ye ta/_bo b+hU ye yA tAM/_bo
[\[98b.3\]]b+hU ye ran sogs dang /_shis byed loT+ra la/_bo b+hU ya tAM/_bo b+hU ye tAM/_bo b+hU yan+tAM sogs dang /_de ring ma yin pa lang la/_a bo b+hU ya ta/_a bo b+hU ye tAM/_a bo b+hU yan+ta sogs so/_/de bzhin du b+hudzra skyong ba la/_bo b+hu dz+ya te/_laT_bo b+hu dz+ya ta/_ling bo b+hu dz+ya tAM/_a bo b+hu dz+ya ta lang sogs so/_!_b+hUSh+ra rgyan la/_bo b+hU Sh+ya te/_laT_bo b+hu Sh+ye ta/_
[\[98b.4\]]loT_bo b+hU Sh+ya tAM/_lang _a bo b+hu Sh+ya ta lang sogs so/_!_muha sems nyams pa la/_mo mu h+ya te/_laT_mo mu h+ye ta/_ling _mo mu h+ya tAM/_loT_a mo mu h+ya ta sogs so/_lang _!_li ha ro myang ba la/_le li h+ya te/_laT_le li h+ye ta/_lang _le li h+ya tAM/_loT_a le li h+ya ta sogs so/_lang _!_hu sbyin pa la/_dzo hu ya te/_laT_dzo hu yeta/_ling _dzo hu ya tAM/_loT/_a dzo hu ya ta lang_sogs
[\[98b.5\]]so/_!_bid shes pa la/_be bi d+ya te/_laT_be bi d+ye ta/_ling _be bi d+ya tAM/_loT_a be bi d+ya ta yang_sogs so/_!_Du pa tsaSh+pe 'tshed pa la yang gnyis brjod/_sngon ma'i ha sa dang po lhag po/_!_A taH_Atra'o/_/byings gnyis brjod pa'i dang po'i dbyangs a thung ni rkyen yang pha rol la ring por 'gyur te/_pa gong ma
[\[98b.6\]]ring por bsgyur bas/_pA pa ts+ya te/_laT_pA pa ts+ye ta/_ling _pA pa ts+ya tAM/_loT_a pA ba ts+ya ta lang sogs so/_!_/de bzhin du paTha gsal bar brjod pa la/_pA pa Th+ya te/_laT_pA ba Th+ye ta/_ling _pA baTh+ya tAM/_loT_a bA Th+ya ta_lang sogs so/_!_byings dbyangs dang po can la'ang /_aT+ra/_a sha_/Ur+Nuny+ra/_r-i sogs la yang+ra 'jug par bshad de/_!_
[\[98b.7\]]aT+ra 'gro ba la brjod pas/_aT+ra aT+ra ya zhes gnas pa la/_!_swa rA deHpa raHdbyangs dang po'i pha rol lo/_/rkyen yang sogs pha rol la byings kyi dang po dbyangs rkyang pa yin na gnyis brjod pa'i gsal byed de yang mi dbyi zhing dbyangs dang po de las pha rol gyi dbyangs phyi ma de slar yang gnyis su 'gyur te/_a
[\[99a\]]
[\[99a.1\]]phyi ma slar yang gnyis brjod/_'dra ba'i yi ge 'dus pa la ring po sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_a TA T+ya te/_laT/_a TAT+yeta/_ling /_yid TA T+ya tAM/_loT/_A TAT+ya ta_lang sogs te/_nye ba'i tshig dang sbyar ba'i dpe ni/_a TA T+ya te d+h+r-i Sh+TaH_!_de bzhin du a sha tsa ba la/_a shA sh+ya te/_laT_a shA sh+ye ta/_ling a shA sh+ya tAM/_loT_a shA sh+ya ta_lang sogs dang /_!_
[\[99a.2\]]ri 'gro ba la/_a rA R+Yate/_laT_a rAR+Ye ta/_ling a rAR+Ya tAM/_loT_a rAR+Ya ta_ling sogs so/_!_/nyer bsgyur pra sngon ma'i Ur+Nuny+ra 'gebs pa la/_pror+NonU ya te/_laT_pror+NonU ye ta/_ling pror+NonU ya tAM/_loT_praur+NonU ya ta_lang sogs so/_!_gam+l-i 'gro ba la yang phul du byung ba'i ci brtol/_gnyis brjod/_sngon ma'i ha sa dang po lhag po sogs kyis/_dza ga mra/_ya zhes gnas pa la/_!_
[\[99a.3\]]nya ma dz+ha pAM nuka?/_nya ma dang dz+ha pa rnams la nuka?'o/_/byings nya ma so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge'i mtha' can dang nya ma'i mtha' can ma yin kyang dz+ha pa so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge gnyis brjod pa'i dang po la rkyen yang pha rol las nuka? [\[99a.4\]]nye ba'i tshig dang sbyar ba'i dpe ni/_dzaM ga mya te tu raM gaH_de bzhin du b+h+ra mu g.yo ba la/_baM b+h+ra mya te/_laT_baM b+h+ra mye ta/_ling baM b+h+ra mya tAM/_loT_a baM b+h+ra mya ta_lang sogs so/_/han 'tshe ba dang 'gro ba la/_dzaM g+ha n+ya te/_laT_dzaM g+ha n+ye ta/_ling dzaM g+ha n+ya tAM/_loT_a dzaM g+ha n+ya ta_lang sogs so/_/yang na han 'tshe ba'i don brjod pa la yang pha rol la g+h+nI zhes par sgyur
[\[99a.5\]]bar bshad pas/_g+h+nI ru bsgyur ba'i rta 'gros phul du byung ba/_phyogs la/_dze g+h+nI ya te/_laT_dze g+h+nI ye ta/_ling dzeg+h+nI ya tAM/_loT_a dzeg+h+nI ya ta_lang sogs so/_!_/dzapra dang dzalpa lhag par smra ba la/_dzaM dza pya te/_laT_dzaM dza pye te/_ling dzaM dza pya tAM/_loT_a dzaM dza pya ta_lang sogs so/_!_/dzaM dza l+p+ya te/_laT_dzaM dza l+p+ye ta/_ling dzaM dzal+p+ya tAM/_loT_a dzaM dzal+p+ya ta_lang sogs so/_!_/da ha thal bar byed
[\[99a.6\]]pa la/_daM da h+ya te/_laT_daM da h+ye ta/_ling daM da h+ya tAM/_loT_a daM da h+ya ta_lang sogs so/_!_/ya b+ha 'khrig pa la/_yaM ya b+h+ya te/_laT_yaM ya b+h+ye ta/_ling yaM ya b+h+ya tAM/_loT_a yaM ya b+h+ya ta_lang sogs so/_!_/daM sha snun pa la yang /_!_no lo paHna ni dbyi'o/_/byings kyi u pa d+hA'i na yig ni rkyen ha sa dang po kra yig dang nga yig 'gro ba'i ming can pha rol
[\[99a.7\]]la dbyi bar bya ste/_u pa d+hA'i na phyis/_nya ma dang dz+ha pa rnams la nuka?'os/_nuka? A ga ma ster ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_daM da sh+ya te/_laT_daM da sh+ye ta/_ling daM da sh+ya tAM/_loT_a daM da sh+ya ta lang sogs te/_nye ba'i tshig dang sbyar ba'i dpe ni/_daM da sh+ya te ma sha kaH_sha sbrang gis rmugs pa/_!_de bzhin du b+haM dzu 'joms pa la/_baM b+ha dz+ya te/_laT_baM b+ha dz+ye
[\[99b\]]
[\[99b.1\]]ta/_ling baM b+ha dz+ya tAM/_loT_a baM b+ha dz+ya ta lang sogs te/_baM b+ha dz+ya te brto dan+tI ta raM/_!_nr-i tI lus bskyod pa la yang sbyar/_gnyis brjod/_sngon ma'i ha sa dang po lhag po/_nr-i nr-i tra ya zhes gnas pa la/_!_rI gr-i du paHd+hA s+ya/_r-ita u pa d+hA'i rIkra'o/_/byings r-itra u pa d+hA can gnyis brjod
[\[99b.2\]]pa'i thog ma de la yang pha rol las rIkra A ga so ldan myos pas shing 'joms par byed/_ma ster bar bya ste/_rIkra A ga ma byin/_r-i a'os r-i ar+ra bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_na rI nr-i t+ya te/_laT_na rI nr-i t+ye te/_ling na rI nr-i t+ya tAM/_loT_a na rI nr-i t+ya ta lang sogs te/_na rI nr-it+ya te na TaH_!_de bzhin du
[\[99b.3\]]br-i tu 'jug pa la/_laT_ba rI br-i t+ya te/_ling ba rI br-i t+ya ta/_loT_ba rI br-i t+ya tAM/_a ba rI br-i t+ya ta sogs te/_lang ba rI br-i t+ya te bArtA su tsin+ta/_!_byings pa da/_sraM sra/_d+h+waM sa/_baMts+ra/_b+h+raMshra/_kashra/_pa ta/_skaMdra rnams la yang pha rol las gnyis brjod pa'i thog ma de la nIkra A ga ma ster bar gar mkhan lhag par gar sgyur ro/_bshad de/_
[\[99b.4\]]dgag pa'i na dang nyer bsgyur u pa sngon ma'i pa da 'gro ba la/_no pa pa nI pa d+ye ta/_ling no pa pa nI sems dga' ba'i gtam la 'jug/_'gro ba la'o/_'og tu ltung ba la'o/_pa d+ye ta/_no brdeg pa la'o/_/'gro ba la'o/_/pa pa nI pa d+ya tAM/_loT_no pA pa nI pa d+ya ta/_lang !_de bzhin du sraMs dang d+h+waMs 'og tu ltung ba la/_laT/_sa nI sra s+ya te/_si nI
[\[99b.5\]]sra s+ye ta/_ling sa nI sra s+ya tAM/_loT_a sa nI sra s+ya ta lang sogs dang /_!_da nI d+h+waM s+ya te/_laT_nye bar yang ma 'gro zhig_/da nAM d+h+waM s+ye ta/_ling da nI d+h+waM s+ya tAM/_loT_a da nI d+h+waM s+ya ta_lang sogs so/_!_baM tsu 'gro ba la/_ba nI baM ts+ya te/_laT_ba nI baM ts+ye ta/_ling ba nI baM ts+ya tAM/_loT_a ba nI baM ts+ya ta_lang sogs so/_!_b+h+raM sha 'og tu ltung ba la/_ba
[\[99b.6\]]nI b+h+raM sh+ya te/_laT_ba nI b+h+raM sh+ye ta/_ling ba nI b+h+raM sh+ya tAM/_loT_a ba nI b+h+raM sh+ya ta_lang sogs so/_!_/ka sha brdeg pa la/_tsa nI ka sh+ya te/_laT_tsa nI ka sh+ye ta/_ling tsa nI ka sh+ya tAM/_loT_a tsa nI ka sh+ya ta/_lang !_skaM dir 'gro ba la/_tsa nI ska d+ya te/_laT_tsa nI ska d+ye ta/_ling tsa nI ska d+ya tAM/_loT/_a tsa nI ska d+ya ta sogs so/_lang /_!_/tsar g.yo ba la yang
[\[99b.7\]]sbyar/_gnyis brjod/_sngon ma'i ha sa dang bo lhag po sogs kyis/_tsa tsar+ra/_ya zhes gnas pa la/_tsa ra pa lo ruts+tsA s+ya/_tsa ra pa la dag gi a'i yang uta'o/_/byings tsa ra dang pha la dag gi yang pha rol las byings gnyis brjod pa'i dang po la nuka? A ga ma 'gyur zhing mtha' ma'i a yig kyang u yig tu 'gyur te/_nuka?
[\[100a\]]
[\[100a.1\]]byin/_a ur bsgyur bas/_tsaM tsuR+Ya te/_laT/_tsaM tsurla ta/_ling /_rtsa tsur+Ya t+t+waM/_loT/_a tsaM tsur+Ya ta lang sogs dang /_!_de bzhin du pha la rdzogs pa la/_paM phu l+ya te/_laT/_paM phu l+ye ta/_ling /_paM phu l+ye tAM/_laT/_a paM phu l+ya ta sogs so/_!_/DU kr-i byed pa la yang sbyar bas/_kr-i_ya zhes
[\[100a.2\]]gnas pas/_!_r-i to riH_r-i ta kyi ri'o/_/byings r-i yig mtha' can ni yang pha rol la ri ru 'gyur te/_r-i ri gnyis brjod sngon ma'i ha sa dang po lhag po/_ku ha dag gi tsu/_yang la 'os yon tan/_ya la'os phyi ma ring por bsgyur bas/_tse krI ya te/_laT/_tse krI ye ta/_ling /_tse krI ya tAM/_loT/_
[\[100a.3\]]a tse krI ya ta lang sogs te/_a ti sha ye na ka ro tI ti zhes pa'i don la/_tse krI ya te/_!_de bzhin du hr-i ny+ra 'phrog pa la/_dze hrI ya te/_laT/_dze hrI ye ta/_ling /_dze hrI ya tAM/_loT/_a dze hrI ya ta sogs dang /_pr-inywa mchog gyur la/_be brI ya te/_laT/_be+e brI ya ta/_ling /_be+e brI ya tAM/_loT/_a be brI ya lang ta sogs te/_a ti
[\[100a.4\]]sha ye na br-i no tI ti zhes pa'i don la/_be+e dzrI ya te/_!_'di phul du byung bar byed do/_mr-ing srog gtong ba la/_me mrI ya te/_laT/_me mrI ye ta/_ling /_me mrI ya tAM/_loT/_a mi mri ya ta lang sogs te/_a ti sha ye na mri ya te zhes pa'i don la/_me mrI ya te/_Du hra ny+ra sbyin pa la yang /_dA sogs kyi i 'os A i
[\[100a.5\]]gnyis brjod/_'di yang phul du byung ba'am shin tu gang ba'o/_/yang la 'os yon tan/_ya la 'os phyi ma ring por bsgyur bas/_de dI ya te/_laT/_de dI ye ta/_ling /_de dI ya tAM/_loT/_a de dI ya ta/_lang /_!_de bzhin du shin tu shi ba'o/_/pA btung ba la/_pe pI ya te/_laT/_pe pI ye ta/_ling /_pe pI ya tAM/_loT/_a pe pI ya ta lang
[\[100a.6\]]sogs so/_/i ti swa ra swa sti byA ka ra Na s+ya sU trA r+ya d+ma t+yA ya bra kri ya sa mAp+tAH/_zhes pa brda sprod pa dbyangs can gyi mdo las yadra rkyen gyi rab tu byed pa rnams rdzogs so //_!_//de nas yang rkyen 'jig pa rnams kyi bya ba rnams bshad par bya ste/_!_bA n+ya tra lu ga nu brta te/_gzhan
[\[100a.7\]]la 'jig pra yang na rjes su 'jug go_/kr-itra sogs kyi rkyen ukra dang sbyor ba ma yin pa'i gzhan la yang na yadra 'jig pra'i cho ga rjes su 'jug go_!_/a na bi tsa ha sA tra/_a pra med pa'i ha sa las kyang ngo /_/yang 'jig pa'i cho ga de byings gang la'ang a pra bi kA ra Na med pa byings mtha' ha
[\[100b\]]
[\[100b.1\]]sa'i mtha' can yin pa de las 'jug ste/_b+hudzra skyong ba la yang gnyis brjod/_dz+ha pa sogs kyi b+ha ba/_sngon ma'i ha sa dang po lhag po/_yang la 'os yon tan/_yang 'jig_/yang 'jig pa la byings thams cad pa'i rnam dbye par smi pa da rnams 'jug pa las/_brta ma na'i
[\[100b.2\]]skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig tipra sbyar bas/_bob+hu dzra/_ti pra ces gnas pa la/_!_dweHswa re pi to pa d+hA yA gu naH_gnyis las byings pa 'gro ba la u d+hA'i yon tan no/_yang rkyen 'jig pa'i byings gnyis brjod pa las rnam dbye dang rkyen gsal byed dang po can rnams dang dbyangs dang
[\[100b.3\]]po can pa 'gro ba'i ming can rnams pha rol la u pa d+hA yon tan du 'gyur la/_yang 'jig pa las rnam dbye ta yig dang sa yig pa 'gro ba'i ming can rnams pha rol la bar rkyen I yang na ster bshad de/_I rkyen yang na bar byas/_I sbyar ba'i phyogs la yon tan mi byed/_

[\[103b.1\]]hanra gyi g+ha/_ku ha dag gi tsur bsgyur bas/_dzi g+hanra/_sa zhes gnas pa la/_!_ha n+heHse Ni tra/_hanra las sa Na 'gro ba'o/_/hanra las pha rol gyi 'dod pa'i rkyen sa laN 'gro ba'i ming can zhes bya ba la dgos pa ni 'phel ba byed pa'i don te/_'phel ba byas pas/_dzi g+hAMs ti/_laT/_

[\[104a\]]
[\[104a.1\]]byas/_'jig pa'i phyogs la/_si sa tA sogs kyi iT+ra byin pas/_pA pa ts+ya tA/_pA pa ts+ya tA rau/_pA pa ts+ya tA raHsogs sam/_pA pa tsi tA/_pA pa tsi tA rau/_pA pa tsi tA raH sogs so//_!_Du dAnya sbyin pa la/_bdag nyid 'dod pa las 'os/_rkyen sa sbyor gnyis
[\[104a.2\]]brjod pas/_dA dA _sa zhes gnas pa la/_!_i s+se/_sa la isra'o/_/byings dA la sogs pa'i mtha'i dbyangs ni sa pha rol isra zhes par 'gyur zhing byings gnyis brjod pa'i dang po de yang dbyi bar bya ste/_A isra su bsgyur/_gnyis brjod pa'i sngon ma phyis/_
[\[104a.3\]]apra med pa la sa'i sa la ta'os/_sa ta ru bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/_dit+sa ti/_laT/_di t+setra/_ling /_di t+satu/_loT/_di t+sa tAtra/_lang /_a dit+satra sogs so//de bzhin du Du d+hAny+ra 'dzin pa la/_d+hit+sa ti/_laT/_d+hi t+satra/_ling /_d+hit+sa tu/_loT/_d+hit+sa tAtra/_lang /_a d+hit+satra
[\[104a.4\]]sogs dang /_!_nyer bsgyur pra sngon ma'i mAng+ra gus pa la/_pra mit+sa te/_laT/_pra mit+se ta/_ling /_pra mit+sa tAM/_loT/_prA mit+sa ta lang sogs so/_!_Du la b+haSh+ra thob pa la/_sa rkyen sbyar/_gnyis brjod/_kha pa sogs kyis b+ha pa/_sa la is 'os/_la'i a is ru bsgyur/_

[\[108a.3\]]bsgyur ba'i rab tu bya ba rnams rdzogs so//_!_//de nas byings dang nyer bsgyur sbyor tshul sogs bshad par bya ste/_ni bi shA deHni las bi sha sogs la'o/_/nyer bsgyur ni las pha rol kyi byings bi sha sogs la rnam dbye A ne pa da rnams 'jug ste/_bi sngon ma'i bi sha 'jug pa la/_ni bi she te
[\[108a.4\]]nges par 'jug par byed sogs so//_!_//bi pa rA b+haM dze/_bi pa rA dag las dzi la'o/_/nyer bsgyur bi dang pa rA dag las pha rol gyi byings dzi rgyal ba las rnam dbye At+ma ne pa da rnams 'jug ste/_bi dza ya te/_pa rA dza ya te/_nyer bsgyur pra ti/_a pa dang saM las pha rol gyi byings Sh+ShA 'gro ba las ldog pa dang /_saM las pha _nges par 'dug byed
[\[108a.5\]]rol gyi dr-i shir lta ba/_gam+l-i 'gro ba shU thos pa/_pid shes pa/_pr-its+tsha shes par 'dod pa rnams la'ang rnam dbye At+ma ne pa da rnams 'jug ste/_prat+ya ba ti Sh+tha te/_saM_rnam par rgyal bar byed/_mchog tu rgyal bar byed/_tiSh+Tha te/_saM pa sh+ya te/_saM gats+tsha te/_saM shr-iNu te/_saM bi t+te/_saM pr-its+tsha te/_nyer bsgyur Ang+ra D+has pha rol gyi pr-i ts+tsha
[\[108a.6\]]dang ta nu yang ba la'ang At+ma ne pa da rnams 'jug ste/_A pr-its+tsha te/_kun tu 'dri bar byed/_A ta nu te/_kun nas yang bar byed/_sogs so/_!_/A ngo donya so so kun nas gnas/_yang dag par gnas/_nA s+ya bi har Ne/_yang dag par lta bar byed/_kun tu 'gro bar byed/_yang dag par nyan par byed/_kun tu shes bar byed/_kun nas 'dri bar byed/_Ang+ra las dA la kha gdangs pa ma

[\[108b.1\]]krIDa la'o/_nyer bsgyur a nu saM pa ri rnams dang ang+ra las kyang pha rol gyi krID+ra la At+ma ne pa da rnams 'jug ste/_a nu krIDa te/_saM krIDa te/_pa ri krIDa te/_A krIDa te/_!_sa ma ba pro pa bi b+h+yaHs+thAH_sama? a ba pra u pa bi rnams las s+thA la'o/_/nyer bsgyur saM dang a ba dang pra dang u pa dang bi rnams las
[\[108b.2\]]pha rol gyi Sh+ShA 'gro ba las ldog pa la'ang At+ma ne pa da rnams 'jug ste/_sa tiSh+Tha te/_a ba tiSh+Tha te/_pra tiSh+Tha te/_mthun par rtse bar byed/_legs par rtse bar byed/_yongs su rtse bar byed/_kun tu rtse bar byed/_u pa tiSh+Tha te/_bi tiSh+Tha te sogs so/_!_u dwi b+h+yI ta pa/_u tra bi dag las ta pa la'o/_/nyer bsgyur utra dang bi dag las pha rol

[\[108b.4\]]rnams 'jug ste/_yamra la/_A lats+tsha te/_shin tu gdung bar byed/_sogs dang /_A sngon ma'i hanra 'tshe ba la/_!_lo pa sta nu datA nAM/_rnam par gdung bar byed/_a nu dAt+ta rnams dbyi ba nyid do/_/byings mtha'i a nu dAt+ta ste skad gsang dma' bar 'don pa nya ma so sor bsdu ba rnams ni dz+ha sa'i yi ge kang 'gro ba rnams pha rol la dbyi bar bya ste/_

[\[109a\]]
[\[109a.1\]]rnams sa mtha' can la Atra'o/_/byings dz+hA khongs su chud pa/_shrU thos pa/_smr-i dran pa/_dra shir lta pa rnams 'dod pa'i don gyi rkyen sa'i mtha' can la'ang At+ma ne pa da rnams 'jug ste/_dzi dz+hAs te gu NaM/_shu shrUSha te swa raM/_su smU r+Sha te mi traM/_di dr-i k+Sha te dza na b+hU mI sogs so/_!_karma bya ti hA re
[\[109a.2\]]an+yata hi d+sA de rAtra/_'tshe ba sogs las gzhan pa'i las gcig la 'jug pa la Atra'o/_/'tshe ba dang 'gro ba'i don dang byings pa Th+ra dang ha sa rnams kyi don ma yin pa'i byed pa/_yon tan shes par 'dod/_grogs dran par 'dod/_skye yul lta bar 'dod/_po dang bya ba du ma las gcig la

[\[111a\]]
[\[111a.1\]]bid+ma/_chog 'byung ling la/_bi d+yAtra/_bid+yAtAM/_bi d+yuHsogs dang /_shis byed loT+ra la/_bet+tu/_bit+tu ta/_bat+tatra/_bit+tAM_bi dan+tu sogs dang /_de ring ma yin pa lang la/_a be tra/_a bit+tAM/_a bi duH sogs so/_!_/yang bid laA t+ma ne pa da rnams kyang 'jug

[\[111b.1\]]ha'i D+ha 'os/_hra D+h+ra/_ta tha dag gi d+ha'os ta d+ha/_Sh+Tu sogs kyis d+h+ra D+h+ra/_pa 'gro ba'i yon tan byas pas/_leD+h+ra/_D+h+ri zhes gnas pa la/_!_D+hi D+ho lo po dI r+g+hash+tsa/_D+ha'i D+ha la dbyi zhing ring po yang ngo /_/tshu rol gyi mtha'i D+ha yig ni D+ha yig pha rol la dbyi zhing /_

[\[116a\]]
[\[116a.1\]]gnas pa la/_!_kwipra/_kwipra'o/_/rkyen kwi pra ni yongs rdzogs dbyi bar bya ste/_kwipra phyis pas/_karma kr-itra/_de bzhin du/_ag+niM tsitra/_si_de baM stu s+t+ri sogs so/_/thung ngu ma yin na tu kra A ga ma mi 'jug pas/_so ma pAHsi_sarba dr-ika sogs so/_!_
[\[116a.2\]]yang prats+tsha la sogs pa ni kwipra pha rol la ring por bsgyur bar bshad de/_ta twa prAT+ra/_si_si_su shrIH_si_bAkra sogs so/_!_/yang _las byed/_ma gsog go/_/lha la bstod do/_rkyen kwipra pha rol can gyi nahra 'ching ba las sngon ma'i nyer bsgyur gyi mtha' _zhib 'thung /_thams cad mthong /_

[\[118b.1\]]zhes par 'gyur te/_shuSh+kaH_!_k+ShAde rmaHk+ShA sogs la ma'o/_/byings k+ShA la sogs pa las pha rol gyi rkyen k+ta ne ma zhes par 'gyur te/_k+Shai zad pa la/_k+ShA maH_!_s+phA yaHs+phIH_s+phA ya'i s+phI'o/_/rkyen k+ta pha rol la byings s+phA yi rgas pa la'o zhes pa ni s+phI

[\[119a.1\]]pha rol gyi rkyen A na'i A yig ni I ru 'gyur te/_A sInaH_!_bA dI yoHsha tuH_atra lasha tu ste Ipra la yang na'o/_/byings atra mtha' can la rkyen sha tu 'gyur zhing ming de mo rtags su byed na I pra pha rol las numra A ga ma star ba dang mi ster ba 'dam ka

[\[119b\]]
[\[119b.1\]]martA/_si_b+hartA/_si_!_i Sh+Nu snu k+nu/_i Sh+Nu snu k+nu rnams so/_/byings las ngang tshul dang 'brel ba'i don la rkyen iSh+Nu dang snu dang k+nu rnams kyang 'gyur te/_a laM ka rotI t+ye ba shI laH_zhes pa'i don la/_a laM ka riSh+NuH_de bzhin du/_b+ha dziSh+NuH_yiSh+Nu_gra siSh+NuH_i Sh+Nu_sa hiSh+NuH_i Sh+Nusogs dang /_
[\[119b.2\]]'chi ba'i ngang tshul/_khrims 'jug/_b+hUSh+NuHsnu_dziSh+NuHsnu_sogs dang /_gr-i ng+nuHsnu_sogs so/_!_/ShA ko ka NaH_ShA kau uka N+ra'o/_/byings las ngang tshul sogs kyi don la rkyen ShA 'di ltar tshul khrims kyis brgyan pa/_ka dang u dang u kaN gsal ba'i khrims/_bza' ba'i khrims/_bzod pa'i ngang tshul/_rnams kyang 'a_
[\[119b.3\]]gyur te/_ShA ka si_ba rA kaH_khrims yod/_rgyal ba'i ngang tshul/_Ipra ba rA kI 'dod pa'i ngang tshul/_sogs dang /_bik+ShuH_u sogs dang /_u ka Na 'dir 'phel ba mi byed/_bi k+Shu kaH_kA mu kaH_u ka Na 'phel ba/_b+hA bu gaHsogs so/_!_/sA n+tA shaM sa yosh+tsa/_sa mtha' shaMs dag la u yang ngo /_/'dod pa'i don gyi rkyen sa'i
[\[119b.4\]]mtha' can dang Ada? smad pa'i khrims/_sngon ma'i shaMsra dag_/smad pa'i khrims/_la ngang tshul sogs kyi don _slong ba'i tshul khrims can te dge slong /_ma yin pa la'ang rkyen 'dod pa'i tshul/_u 'gyur te/_yod pa'i tshul/_btsal/_bi bak+ShuH_kr-il/_tsa kI r+ShuHsogs dang /_A sngon ma'i shaM su bstod pa la/_yAshaM suH_

[\[122b.1\]]yig tu'ang 'gyur te/_dA la ya A I yon tan byas pas/_de yaM/_de bzhin du/_dz+nye yaM/_pe yaM sogs so/_!_/r-i ha sA n+tA ng+g+h+ya Na/_r-i ha sa'i mtha' las g+h+yaN+ra'o/_/byings r-i yig dang ha sa'i mtha' can las dngos po sogs dang 'byung 'gyur gyi don la rkyen g+h+ya Na 'jug ste/_kA r+YaM/_bAr+YaM/_
