[\[123a\]]
[\[123a.1\]]mtshon na/_a ba sh+ya b+hA byaH_b+ho k+tu kA maH_shro tu ma nAH_si hI taH_sa hi taH_saM ta taM/_sa ta traM/_mAM sa ba ca naM/_mAM spa ca naM/_mAM sa pA kaH_mAM spA ka sogs so/_!_/r-i du ba ng+hA t+k+ya ba/_r-i u ba ng+hA las kya ba'o/_/byings r-i yig u pa ng+hA tsa na las dngos po dang las
[\[123a.2\]]kyi don la rkyen kya pra 'gyur te/_kr-i tI nges par bden nam yod/_longs spyod 'dod/_thos pa yid la byed/_grogs bzang po'am lhan cig pa/_de legs pa/_sha 'tshed par byed/_gcod pa la kya pra_sha chos/_sbyar bas/_kr-i t+yaM/_yang Sh+Tu ny+ra sogs la'ang rkyen kya pra 'jug par bshad de/_/Sh+Tu ny+ra dang kr-i la kya pra
[\[123a.3\]]thung ngu sogs kyi pra 'gro ba tu kra byin pas/_stu t+yaM/_kr-i t+yaM sogs so/_!_/s+t+wa yAM ya dza ng+hA be/_ya dza rnams kyi dngos po la bud med la'o/_/byings ya dzu la sogs pa rnams las dngos po'i don la rkyen _gcad pa/_kya pra 'gyur zhing rtags de yang bud med kyi rtags su 'gyur ba nyid de/_pra sngon ma'i ya dza la
[\[123a.4\]]kya pra/_ya dzra sogs kyi bstod pa bya'o/_/slar yang dag par bsgyur/_bud med la Apra sbyar bas/_pre dz+yA/_de bzhin du samra sngon ma'i adzra 'gro ba la/_Apra _sa ma dz+yA/_brah+ma sngon ma'i ha nra la kya pra ta g+ha ka 'gro ba la a nu dA t+ta phyis/_thung ngu sogs kyis tu kra byin pas/_brah+ma g+ha ta sogs so/_!_/_
[\[123a.5\]]k+tiH_k+ti'o/_/byings las dngos po sogs kyi don la'ang k+ti 'gyur ba'i de yang rang bzhin gyi mo rtags te/_rab tu mchod/_/b+hU tiH_shung+ng+hiHbahra _U ng+hiHki _paMk+tiHpitsa _yang dag par 'gro ma/_bit+tiHsogs so/_!_/karta rik+te sh+tsa/_byed pa po la'ang k+ti'o/_/byings las byed pa po'i don la'ang tshangs 'joms/_rkyen
[\[123a.6\]]k+ti 'gyur te/_pra kr-i tiH_pi ng+h-i ti sogs so/_!_/i ka? sh+ti pau ng+hA tu ni dza shaH_i kra sh+ti pra dag las byings la rnam 'gyur _'byor ba/_dgab/_thob pa/_'phreng ba/_med do/_/byings las rig pa/_dngos po sogs kyi don la rkyen ika? dang sh+tipra dag 'gyur la rkyen de gnyis pha rol las byings la rnam 'gyur
[\[123a.7\]]yang med de/_rang bzhin/_khyab par 'dzin pa/_pa tsa la/_ika? dang sh+tipa?/_sha? yig a pra bi kA ra Na'i don te/_ba tsiH_'tshed do/_/pa catiH_'ched bar byed/_sogs so/_!_/Shing+b+hi dA ma dra/_Sha 'gro ba dang b+hi dra rnams kye ang+ra ngo /_/byings Sh+ra yig rjes 'brel 'gro ba rnams dang b+hi dra la sogs pa rnams las kyang rkyen ang+ra
[\[123b\]]
[\[123b.1\]]'gyur te/_A bra patsA/_A bra gr-i dzA/_b+hi dA/_A pra_ts+tshi dA Abra sogs so/_/yang jar sogs la rkyen a ng+ra gi ng+ra yig med par a nyid sbyor bar bshad de/_dza rA sogs so/_!_/gu re rta sA tra/_lci ba'i ha sa las so/_/byings u pang+hA yi ge lci ba dang ldan pa'i ha sa'i mtha' can la'ang rkyen ang
[\[123b.2\]]'gyur te/_I hA/_'chad ma/_dag ma/_'jigs ma/_dum bur byed ma/_U hA/_I k+Sh+ra sogs so/_!_/pra t+ya yA n+tA tra/_rkyen mtha' las so/_/byings rkyen mtha' can _rgas pa/_las kyang rkyen a 'gyur zhing rtags de'ang mo rtags su bya ste/_tsi kI r+ShA/_pu trI yA sogs so/_!_/pu rba kA lek+t+wA/_sngon gyis dus la k+tA'o/_
[\[123b.3\]]sngon byung rtsed mo byad/_ba'i 'das pa yun ring song ba dang 'das nas rtog par byed/_'dod par byed/_yun ring ma song ba'i don la'ang rkyen k+t+wA 'gyur te/_snA twA b+huM k+te/_b+hu k+t+wA pra dza ti sogs so/_!_/a laM kha lwoHpra ti She ng+he k+t+ra/_a la kha lu dag_/byed par 'dod/_bu 'dod dam/_las dgag pa la k+t+wA'o/_/mi zad pa'i nang tshan
[\[123b.4\]]a laM dang kha lu dgag pa'i don can sngon ma'i byings las kyang rkyen k+t+wA 'gyur te/_A lam+b+hU k+t+wA/_kha lU k+t+wA sogs so/_!_/k+t+wA seT+ra ki dwA/_khrus byas nas zas bza'/_bzos nas 'gro/_iT+ra dang bcas nga'i k+t+wA ka 'gro ba yang na'o/_/spyir rkyen g+t+wA ka 'gro ba yin kyang iT dang bcas pa'i k+t+wA ni ku 'gro ba'i ming can du
[\[123b.5\]]yang na par bya ste/_bi di twA/_be di twA sogs so/_!_/u di taHk+t+wA be tra/_u tra 'gro ba _mi zog_/smra 'phro chod/_las k+t+wA ste iT yang na'o/_/byings utra rjes 'brel 'gro ba las kyang rkyen k+t+wA 'gyur zhing iT+ra A ga ma ster ba 'dam ka can du bya ste/_i Shu 'dod pa la/_i Shi twA/_iSh+Ta/_bsu nges par gnas
[\[123b.6\]]pa la/_u _rig go'am shes so/_/Shi twA/_u Sh+T+rA _nges par gnas/_sogs so/_!_/sa mA se kya pra/_bsdu ba la kya pra'o/_/byings las tshig sdud dang 'brel ba'i byed pa'i don la'ang rkyen kya pra 'gyur te/_saM b+h+r-i t+ya ka ro ti/_kun nas 'phel bar byed/_pra Na mya gats+tsha ti sogs so/_!_/yang kha cig tu na ny+ra sbyor ba la'ang _'dod pa nyid/_rkyen k+ta sbyor bar
[\[123b.7\]]bshad de/_a dzi twa/_a kr-i twA/_a dat+t+wA sogs te/_ji skad du/_a dzi twA shA tra bA r+sa rbA na kr-i twA bi ma laM ya shaH/_a dat+t+wA mi t+ta ma r+thi b+h+yaHka thaM dzI ban+te b+hU b+h+r-i taH/_dgra rnams kun las rgyal bar ma 'gyur bas/_/phyag btsal nas 'gro bar byed/_dri ma med pa'i grags ldan mi byed cing /_don kun rig phyir sbyin
[\[124a\]]
[\[124a.1\]]pa mi gtong na/_/sa 'dzin 'tsho ba'i gtam yang med par 'gyur/_/zhes so/_/yang rkyen kyA pra pha rol las byings sngon ma de thung ngu yin pa'i bar rkyen nyi la yon tan byed par bshad de/_pa ri Na ma y+Yo b+hu k+te sogs so/_/yang dus dang 'brel pa la yang rkyen kya pra 'jug pa
[\[124a.2\]]mthong ste/_ne tre saM mI l+ya ha sa ti/_mi bra mu kha phyA ng+rAya swa pi ti sogs so/_!_/pau naHpu n+ye Na mapa daM dwi sh+tsa/_yang yang la Na ma ste tshig gnyis kyang ngo /_/byings las bzang ngan sogs dbye ba ma _yongs su btud nas zas za/_yin pa'i mnyam pa'i don dang yang yang bskyar ba'i don_
[\[124a.3\]]mig rab tu btsums nas dgod/_la rkyen Na mra 'gyur _kha gdangs nas nyal/_zhing byings rkyen dang bcas pa de'ang gnyis su brjod par bya ste/_pA yaM pA yaM gats+tsha ti/_b+ho dzaM b+ho dzaM bra dza ti sogs so/_!_/ka tha mA di Shu swa r+the Na mra kri nyaH_ka thaM la sogs pa rnams la kr-i na la sa rang don la Na mra'o/_/_
[\[124a.4\]]ka thi la sogs pa nye ba'i tshig tu yod pa la byings kr-inya las rang gi don la rkyenaNamra 'jug ste/_ka thaM kA raM/_i r+thaM kA raM sogs so//_!_btungs shing btungs nas 'gro/_zos shing zos nas 'gro/_b+hu bo b+ha be kya pra/_b+hU las dngos po la kya pra'o/_/byings b+hU las dngos po'i don kho na brjod pa
[\[124a.5\]]la'ang rkyen kya pra 'gyur te/_brat+ma b+hU yaM ga taH_!_lak+She rI muT+ra tsa/_lak+Sh+ra la I ste muT+ra gang ltar byed/_'di ltar byed/_yang ngo /_/byings lak+Sha mtshan nyid la rkyen I 'gyur zhing rkyen de la muT+ra A ga ma ster bar bya ste/_lak+Sh+mIH_!_s+t+yA ya teHs+t+rI twe D+ra T+ra/_s+t+ye las bud med
[\[124a.6\]]nyid la D+ra T+ra'o/_/byings s+t+yai nya sgra _srog can du gyur pa'i 'gro ba/_dad mnyam par 'dres pa las bud med nyid brjod pa'i don la rkyen DaT 'gyur te/_Sh+T+yai laD+raT+ra/_Sha sa Ta ta/_D+ra 'gro ba la Ti phyis/_Ta 'gro ba sogs kyi mo rkyen I pra sbyar bas/_dpal lam phun sum tshogs pa'am bkra shis/_s+t+rI/_!_bar+NA t+kA raH_yi ge las
[\[124a.7\]]kA ra 'o/_/yi ge so so'i mtha' las de dang de'i yi ge zhes rang bzhin brjod pa'i don la rkyen kA ra 'gyur te/_a kA raH_a yig/_ka raH_ka yig_/tsa kA raH_tsa yig_/Ta kA raH_Ta yig_/ta kA raH_ta yig_/pa kA raH_ba yig_/sogs so/_!_/sgra ldan nam bde bar 'tsho ba ste bud med/_/_
[\[124b\]]
[\[124b.1\]]rA di po bA/_ra las i pha yang na'o/_/ra yig las de'i rang bzhin brjod pa'i don la i pha yang na 'gyur te/_re phaH_ra kA raH_!_lo kA ts+tshe Sha s+ya sing+ng+haH_lhag ma 'jig rten las grub pa'o/_/sngon du bshad pa ltar brda sprod pa'i tshul gyi cho ga sogs nye bar mkho ba rnams bshad zin gyi/_
[\[124b.2\]]'dir ma bshad pa'i lhag ma 'jig rten dang bstan bcos la grags shing grub pa rnams kyang de dag tu shes par bya'o/_/ra yig/_!i ti swa ra swa sti byA ka ra Na s+ya sU tr-I t+k+ra dA da yaHpra kri ya sa mA p+tAH/_zhes pa brda sprod pa dbyangs can gyi mdo las kr-i tra la sogs pa'i rab tu byab rnams
[\[124b.3\]]rdzogs so//_!_//swa rU pA n+to nya nu b+hA t+yA diHshab+honya b+hA d+ya tra sAr+tha kaH_/sa ma ska rI shu b+hAM tsa kre pra kri yAM tsa tu ro tsi tAM/_/thog mtha' rjes 'byor rang bzhin bzang po yis/_/'dir ni don bcas sgra la zhugs byas te/_/mtshungs par spyod ldan dge bar byed pa yis/_/rab
[\[124b.4\]]tu byab gsal ldan bshad zin to/_/a ba tA dwo ha ya grA+e baHka ma lA ka ra I shwa raH/_su rA su ran rA kA ram ng+hu pA pI ta paM ka dzaH/_/khyod la srung bar mdzod cig rta mgrin gyi/_/dbang gi mnga' sgyur phyag na pad+ma yis/_/lha dang lha min mi la phan par ni/_/sbrang rtsi 'thung
[\[124b.5\]]bas chu skyes bzhin du skyongs/_/de ltar ngag gi dbang phyug 'phags ma dbyangs can mas gnas lnga rig pa'i slob dpon chen po a nu b+hU te swa ru pA tsar+Ya ste rjes su 'byor ba rang bzhin bzang po la dngos su stsal pa'i brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos chen po dbyangs can byA ka ra Na zhes grags pa'i
[\[124b.6\]]gzhung /_slob dpon chen po de nyid kyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa rab tu byab gsal ldan zhes pa dang bcas pa 'di yang /_/lha dang bcas pa'i 'gro ba yongs kyi ma 'dris nga'i mdza' bshes chen po 'phags pa phyag na pad+ma nyid gdul bya'i snang dor gsum ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa'i skur bzhengs pa
[\[124b.7\]]don gyi slad du mtshan nas smos ta/_rgyal ba'i dbang po thams cad mkhyen pa chen po ngag dbang blo bzang rgya mtsho 'jigs med go cha thub bstan lang tsho'i sdes gzhung 'di la lha mthong lo tsA ba'i phyed 'gyur tsam gyi legs po zhig yod tshod du 'dug pa deng sang dpe rgyun dkon zhing phyis su bsgyur
[\[125a\]]
[\[125a.1\]]ba dang /_yig sna kha shas 'dug kyang gzhung don go dka' ba dang slob dpon a nus mdzad pa'i 'grel pa'i dgongs don dang ma 'brel ba sogs 'ga' re 'dug pas/_khyod kyis paN+Di ta mched kyi gsung rgyun ltar 'di bzhin sgyur cig ces bka'i gnang
[\[125a.2\]]ba thob par brten/_rnam 'dren dam pa 'di nyid kyi gzhal du med pa'i bka' drin las 'phags yul nub phyogs ku ru k+Shetu bram ze'i rigs su 'khrungs pa gnas lnga rig pa'i ma hA paN+Di ta ba la b+ha dra dang /_paN+Di ta go kU la nA tha mi shra mched kyi drung du gzhung 'grel 'di sogs brda
[\[125a.3\]]sprod pa'i rang lugs la sbyangs pas cung zad tsam shes pa bka' 'bangs kyi tha chung gtsang stod 'dar gyi nor 'dzin yangs par se'i rigs las skyes pa ngag dbang phun tshogs lhun grub bam/_tshe dbang rab brtan rdo rjer 'bod pa'i rmongs brtul snyom las pas/_
[\[125a.4\]]me mkha' rgya mtsho la 'das lo drug cu skor bcu dang nyag sum cu rtsa brgyad bsre ba sna tshogs dbyig ces shing sbrul hor zla gsum pa'i dmar phyogs kyi dga' ba dang po'i gza' tshes dge bar mgo btsugs lo de'i hor zla dgu pa'i tshes bco lnga dkar po nam gru'i 'grub sbyor gyi dus
[\[125a.5\]]dge bar/_sde bzhi'i sgo 'phar cig car du phye ba'i phun tshogs lugs brgya'i 'dun sa chen po pho brang po ta lar bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o/_/tshul 'dir sgo gsum 'bad sogs rnam dkar 'bras/_/ji snyed mchis kun yongs su smin pa'i mthus/_/rigs kun khyab bdag don gyi thams
[\[125a.6\]]cad mkhyen/_/srid mtha'i bar du zhabs pad brtan pa dang /_/sna mang brda sprod ring lugs chu gter che/_/bsrubs pa'i snying po legs bshad nyin byed 'dis/_/lnga rig bstan pa'i pad tshal cher rgyas shing /_/rab rmongs blo yi mun pa sel bar shog_/bdag sogs deng nas skye dang tshe rabs
[\[125a.7\]]su/_/mchog gsum ngo bo rdo rje slob dpon gyis/_/rjes bzung gsang chen zab mo'i lam zhugs te/_/zung 'jug bde ba chen po'i sa thob shog_/_

[\[126b.1\]]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_a ma ra ko Sha nA ma/_/na mo bud+d+hA ya/_ya s+ya dz+nyA na da pA sin+d+hor gA gting d+ha s+yA na g+ha gu naH/_a g+ta sdig pa'am skyon/_se ba bstan pa'am bsnyan pa se bya_

[\[127a\]]
[\[127a.1\]]nu shA sa naM/_2_!_/prA ya po rU pa b+he de na sA ha tsa rlA ts+tsa ku tra tsita/_/s+t+rI pun+na pu n+sa kaM dz+nye yan+ta dwe sha Sha bi d+heH kra tsi ta/_3!_/b+he dA khyA nA ya na dwaM dwo ne ka se Sho na sang+ka ra/_/'dres pa dang 'chol ba dang phyag dar/_/_

[\[127a.3\]]kr-i to\u0f85tra b+hin+na ling+gA nA ma nuk+tA nAng+k+ra ma dr-i te/_4_!_/tri ling+g+yA n+t+ri Sh+wi ti pa daM mi thu ne tu dwa yo ri ti/_/ni Shid+d+ha ling+gaM peShAr+thaM twan+tA thA di na pUr+b+ba b+hA ka/_5_!_/swa ra bya ya

[\[127b\]]
[\[127b.1\]]swar+g+ga nA ka tri di ba tri da pA la yAH/_/su ra lo ko d+yo di po dwe s+t+ri yau klI be tri piSh+Ta ya/_6_!_/a ma rA ni rdza rA de bA s+t+ri da sA bi bud+d+hAHsurAH/_/su parbA Nap+su ma na sas+t+ri di be pA di bau ka saH/_7_!_/A di te yA di bi Sha do le khA
[\[127b.2\]]bzang dang /_/bde ldan sum rtse skabs gsum gnas/_/lha yi 'jig rten rol sa mkha'/_/gnyis mo ma ning gzhi gsum pa/_/'chi med rgas med skabs gsum lha/_/rnam par sad dang bcud ldan dang /_/tshigs bzang yid bzang sum rtsen dbang /_/mtho ris snang byed mi sbyin bu/_/mkha' spyod legs
[\[127b.3\]]a di ti nan+da nAH/_skye med/_/A di t+yA r-i b+ha bonyaswa snA a mad+h+yA a mr-i tAn+d+ha saH/_8_!_/bih+ni mu khAHkra tu b+hu dzo lha'i spyi ming /_gIrbA NA dA na bA ra yaH/_/br-in+dA ra kA de ba tA ni pu si bA de ba tA s+t+ri yAM/_9_!_/A di t+yA bi shwa ba sa bstu Shi tA b+hA swa rA Ni lAH/_/_

[\[127b.5\]]ma hA rA dzi ka sA d+h+yAsh+tsa tu drA sh+tsa ga na de ba tAH/_10_!_/bi d+yA d+ha ro nyap+sa ro yak+Sho rAk+Sha sa gan+d+ha r+b+ha kin+na rAH/_/pi shA tso gu h+ya kaH sid+d+ho b+hU te \u0f85mI de ba yo na yaH/_11_!_/a su rA dai t+ya dai te _lha'i rigs kyi ya d+ha nu dzen+d+ra ri dA na pAH/_/shu kra shi Sh+yA di

[\[128a\]]
[\[128a.1\]]ti shu tAH pUr+b+ba de bAHsu ra dwi ShaH/_/12@_/sarba dz+nyaHsu ga to shud+d+ho d+harma rA dzasta thA ga taH/_/sa man+ta b+ha dro b+ha ga bAn+mA ra dzil+lo ka dzi dz+dzi naH/_/Sha Da b+hi dz+nyo da sha ba lonyadwa ya pA dI bi nA ya

[\[128a.3\]]kaH/_su sta su tra shi shu bA la rnams bu'i byis pa/_/bye brag tu thub pa'i mu nIn+d+raHshrI g+ha na pA tA mu niHshAkya mu ni tu yaH/_/sa shAkya siM haHsar+b+bAr+tha sid+d+ha so d+hau da nish+tsa saH/_/gau ta mash+tsAr+k+ka ban+d+hu sh+tsa mA yA de bI su tash+tsa saH//_!_//bra h+mAt+ma b+hUHsu ra dz+yeSh+ThaHpa ra meSh+ThI pi tA ma haH/_/_
[\[128a.4\]]rnam par 'dren/_/thub pa'i dbang po dpal stug dang /_/ston pa thub pa nyid rnams so/_/shAkya thub dang don kun grub/_/shAkya seng+ge zas gtsang sras/_/gau ta ma dang nyi ma'i gnyen/_/lha mo sgyu 'phrul sras rnams so//_!//tshangs pa bdag skyes lha las rgan/_/mchog la gnas dang mes po dang /_/_
[\[128a.5\]]hi ra N+ya gar+b+ho lo ke shaHswa yaM b+hUsh+tsa tu rA Na naH/_/d+hA tAb+dza yo ni r+d+ru hi No bi riny+tsiH ka ma lA sa naH/_/sraSh+TA pra dzA sa tir+b+be d+hA bi d+hA tA bi swa sr-ig+bi d+hiH//_!_//biSh+NurnA rA ya NaH kr-iSh+NA bai kuN+Tho biSh+TA ra shra bAH/_a shwad+tha thos_
[\[128a.6\]]gser gyi mngal dang 'jig rten dbang /_/rang byung gdong bzhi 'dzin byed dang /_/pad+ma'i skye gnas nyes can dang /_/sna tshogs sgrub byed pad+ma'i gdan/_/sbyin byed skye dgu'i bdag po dang /_/rig byed rnam byed sna tshogs byed//_!_//khyab 'jug nag po sred med bu/_/rtul mo'i bu dang rna ba legs/_/_
[\[128b\]]
[\[128b.1\]]dA mo da ro hraM ShI ke shaHke sha bo mA d+ha baHswa b+hUH/_/dai t+yA ri puN+Da rI kA k+Sho go bin+do ga ru Da d+h+wa dzaH/_/pI tAm+ba ro \u0f85ts+yu ta sAM gI bi shwa k+se no dza nAr+d+ha naH/_/u pen+d+ra in+d+ra ba ra dzash+tsakra pA Nish+tsa tur+b+hu dzaH/_/_
[\[128b.2\]]dbang po'i dbang phyug me tog lto/_/skra can gsod dang sbrang rtsi'i bu/_/rang skyes sbyin dgra pad dkar mig_/mkha' lding rgyal mtshan glang rdzir grags/_/mi 'dzag gos ser rwa gzhu can/_/sna tshogs sde dang 'gro ba 'joms/_/steng gi dbang po dbang gzhan skyes/_/lag pa bzhi pa 'khor lo'i lag_/_

[\[133a\]]
[\[133a.1\]]tu puSh+pa ki/_/s+yAt+kin+na raH kim+bu ru Sha stu raM ga ba da no ma yuH/_/ni d+hirnA se ba d+hi r+b+he dAHpad+ma shaM khA da yo ni d+hiH//_!_//d+yo di bau dwai s+t+ri yA ba b+h+raM byo ma puSh+ka ra maM ba raM/_/na b+ho\u0f85dan+ta_
[\[133a.2\]]@#/_/tog can yin no/_/mi'am ci dang skyes bu'am ci/_/rta yi gdong can 'gro mgyogs so/_/gter dang mdzod kyi dbye ba la/_/pad can dung can la sogs gter//_!_//lha rtsen rol gnas gnyis po mo/_/'gro med kun khyab rgyas byed dang /_/sgra sgrogs mkha'
[\[133a.3\]]rI k+ShaM ga ga na ma nan+taM su ra bar+t+ma ra khaM/_/bi yad+biSh+Nu ba daM bA tu puM s+yA kA sha bi hA ya mIH/_/di shastu ka ku b+haH kASh+ThA A shAsh+tsa ha ri tash+tsa tAH/_nam mkha'i ming /_brA ts+ya bA tsI pra tA+e ts+yastAHpUr+b+ba dak+Shi Na pash+tsi mAH/_/_

[\[133b.1\]]naH/_/puSh+pa dan+taHsAr+b+ba b+hau maHsu pra tI kash+tsa dig+ga dzaH//_!_//ka ri No \u0f85 b+h+ra muHka pi lA piM ga lA\u0f85nu pa mA kra mAta/_/tA mra gar+N+NI su b+ha dan+tI tsaM ga nA tsAny+dza nA ba tI/_/klI bA bya yaM twa pa di shan+di shor+m+ma d+h+ye bi di kas+t+ri yAM/_

[\[137a.1\]]hi taH/_/e ka yok+t+ya puSh+pa ban+tau di bA ka ra ni shA ka rau/_/aSh+TA da sha ni me ShAstu kASh+ThA s+t+riM shat+ta tAHka lAH/_/tAstu tri shat+k+Sha Naste tu mu hUr+t+tau dwA dA shA sti yAM/_/te tu triM sha da ho rA traHpak+Sha ste
[\[137a.2\]]@#/_/rang bzhin bsgyur/_/gcig tu sbyor bas me tog ldan/_/nyin byed mtshan mo byed pa'o/_/mig 'dzums bco brgyad de yi gnas/_/de ni sum cu cha shas so/_/de yi sum cu skad cig go_/de ni bcu gnyis yud tsam yin/_/de ni sum cu nyin zhag go_/de rnams bco

[\[137a.5\]]ta ta/_/puSh+pa yuk+tA paur+N+Na mA sI pau ShI mA so tsa ya tra sAH/_/nAm+nA sa pau Shau mA g+hA d+yA sh+tsai ba me kA da shA pa re/_/mArga shIR+She sa hA mArge A gra hA ya Ni kash+tsa saH/_/pau She tai Sha sa ha s+yau dwau ta pA mA g+he\u0f85tha phAlgu ne/_/s+yAt+ta pa s+yaH_

[\[137b\]]
[\[137b.1\]]phAl+su ni kaHs+yA ts+tsai tre tsai tra ko ma d+huH/_/bai shA khe mA d+ha bo rA d+ho dz+yeSh+Tha shu kraHshu tsis+t+wa yaM/_/A khAD+he shrA pa Na stu s+yAn+na b+hAHshrA ba Ni ka sh+tsa saH/_/s+Yu r+n+na b+ha s+ya prauSh+Tha pa da b+hA dra b+hA dra pa dA s+sa mAH/_/s+yA dA shwi na i Sho pyA shwo yu dzo bi
[\[137b.2\]]thub dpo zla'o/_/nag pa 'dod dus sbrang zla'o/_/sa ga sbrang dus me tog can/_/gtso bo snron zla gtsang ma dang /_/chu stod zla ba gro zhun dang /_/nam mkha' dang ni thos zla'o/_/sprin bzangs khyu mchog rkang pa dang /_/ba lang rkang dang khrums zla mtshungs/_/tha skar ltad mo'i zla ba dang /_/glu dbyangs
[\[137b.3\]]s+yAt+tu kAr+t+ti kaH/_/bA hu lordzai kAr+t+ti ko he man+taHshi shi ro\u0f85s+t+ri yA ma/_/pa san+ta puSh+pa sa ma ya su ra b+hI grISh+ma USh+ma kaH/_/ni dA g+ha uSh+No pa ga ma uSh+mA ga ma sta pa/_/s+t+ri yAM prA br-i Sha s+t+ri yAm+b+hUm+ni baR+ShA a tha sa

[\[142b\]]
[\[142b.1\]]No ni kwa NaHkwa NaHkwa Na na mi t+ya pi/_/bI Na yAHkwa Ni te prA deHpra kwA NA da yaH/_/ko lA ha laHka la ka la sti ra sh+tsAm+bA shi taM ru taM/_/s+t+rI pra ti shrut+p+ra ti d+h+wA ne gI taM gA na mi me sa me/_/ni ShA daR+Sha b+ha gAn+d+ga ra Sha dzA ma d+h+ya ma d+hi ba tAH/_
[\[142b.2\]]ni ni kwa Na/_/mi gsal kwa Na kwa Na sgrogs/_/pi wang sgrogs pa la sogs pa/_/mi gsal pra kwa Na la sogs/_/ca co dang ni ku co dang /_/dud 'gro'i sgra ni bA shi taM/_/mo ni sgra brnyan brag ca'o/_/glu dang glu dbyangs 'di dag mtshungs/_/'khor nyan drang srong sa 'dzin dang /_/drug skyes bar ma brogs la dang /_
[\[142b.3\]]pany+tsa mash+tse t+ya mI sap+ta tan+t+rI kaN+Thot+thi tAHswa rAH/_/kA ka l-I tu ka le sUk+Sh+me d+h+wa nau tu ma d+hu ra sh+phu Te/_/ka lo man+t+rastu gam+b+hI re tA ro t+yuts+tse tra yas+t+ri Shu/_/sa ma n+wi ta la yas+t+we ka tA lo bI NA tu bal+la kI/_/bi pany+tsI s+yA tu tan+t+rI b+hiHsap+ta b+hiH_
[\[142b.4\]]lnga pa zhes bya bdun po 'di/_/rgyud dang mgrin las skyes pa'i sgra/_/kA ka lI ni sgra cha gnyis/_/mi gsal snyan pa d+h+wa ni'o/_/sngags ni zab mo'i dbyangs yin no/_/tA ra mthon po gsum pa gsum/_/sa ma n+wi ni cha lang gcig_/pheg dang pi wang bal+la kI/_/rnam par spro dang zhan pa ni/_/rgyud bdun yongs
[\[142b.5\]]pa ri bA di nI/_/ta tam+bI NA di kam+bA d+ya mA na dwa mu ra dzA di kaM/_/baM shA di kan+tu shu Shi raM kAM s+ya tA lA di ka g+ha naM/_/tsa turbi d+ha mi dam+bA d+yaM bA di trA to d+ya nA ma kaM_/mr-i daM gA mu ra dzA b+he dA daM kyA ling+gor+d+h+wa kAs+t+ra yaH/_/s+yAd+Ya shaHpa To ho
[\[142b.6\]]su bsgrags pa'i sgra/_/pi wang la sogs rgyud kyi sgra/_/rnga la sogs pa sbubs kyi sgra/_/gling bu la sogs bu ga'i sgra/_/sil snyan sgra ni cha lang sogs/_/rnam pa 'di bzhi rol mo'i sgra/_/bA di trA to zhes bya'o/_/rdza rnga rnga zlum dbye ba las/_/rnga rings ur+d+h+wa ka gsum dang /_/pa Ta ka dang Tag rngar
[\[143a\]]
[\[143a.1\]]Tak+kA b+her+Ya mA na ka dun+du b+hI/_/A na kaHpa Ta honyas+t+rI s+yA t+ko No bI NA dibA da naM/_/bI NA daN+DaHpra bA la s+yAt+ka kub+haM tu pra se ba ka_/ko lam+ba kastu kA yonyas+yA u pa nA ho ni ban+d+ha na/_/bA d+ya pra b+he dA Da ma ru ma Du DiN+Di ma dz+har+dz+ha rAH/_/_

[\[143a.3\]]mardalaHpa Na ba n+ye tsa nar+t+ta kI lA si ka sa me/_tshig rdeg/_/bi lam+be tan+du tam+ma d+h+yan+tat+t+wa mo g+ho g+ha naM kra mAta/_/tA laHkA la kri ya mA naM la yaHsA mya ma thA tam+bu ra zer/_s+t+ra yAM/_/tAN+Da ban+na Ta ban+nA T+yaM lA s+yaM nr-i tany+tsa nar+t+ta ne/_/cang rte'u/_tauR+ya tri kaM nr-it+ta
[\[143a.4\]]rnga dang khar rnga gzhan yang ngo /_/gar ma dang ni rol rtsed mtshungs/_/ngal dang myur dang bar ma la/_/ta twaM mo g+ho g+ha na rim/_/cha lang bya ba'i dus kyi tshad/_/la ya dang ni sA mya'o/_/de nas mo min gar dang ni/_/zlos gar rol rtsed bro dang ni/_/rtsed 'jo dang ni 'chi ba'o/_/rnga gsum gar dang glu
[\[143a.5\]]gI ta bA d+yan+nA T+yam+mi daM tra yaM/_/b+h+ra kuM shash+tsa b+h+ru kuM sash+tsa b+h+ru kuM sash+tseti nar+t+ta kaH/_mang rdeg_/s+t+rI be sha d+hA rI pu ru Sho nA T+yo k+tau ga Ni kArdzu kA/_/b+ha gi nI pa ti rA but+to b+hA bo bi dwA na thA bu kaH/_/dza na ko yu ba rA dzastu ku mA ro b+har+t+r-i dA
[\[143a.6\]]dang ni/_/rol mo gar bya 'di ni gsum/_/b+h+ra kuM sha dang b+h+ru kuM sa/_/b+hu kuM sa zhes bya ba'i gar/_/skyes bus bud med gzugs bzung ni/_/gar gyi tshogs can ardzu ka/_/srin mo'i bdag po A but+to/_/b+hA ba zhes pa rig ldan no/_/de nas A bu ka ni pha/_/rgyal tshab gzhon nu nyid la ni/_/b+har+t+r-i dA ra

[\[143b.1\]]ra kaH/_/rA dzA b+haT+Ta ra ko de bstat+su tA b+ha tr-i dA ri ka_/de bI kr-i tA b+hi She kA yA mi ta ra su tsa b+haT+Ti nI/_/a brah+ma N+ya me ba d+h+yok+tau rA dza sh+ya lastu rAsti yaH/_/am+ba mA tA tha bA la sh+yad+bA sU rAR+Ya stu mA ri ShaH/_/an+ti kA b+ha gi nI dz+yeSh+ThA

[\[143b.3\]]niSh+ThA ni nirba ha NaM sa me/_/haN+De hany+dze ha lA hwA naM nI tsaM tse TI sA khIm+p+ra ti/_/aM ga hA ronyang+ga bi k+She po byany+dzakA b+hi na yau sa mo/_/ni br-it+te twang+gA sa twA b+h+yAM dwe tr-i Sh+waM gi ka sa twi ke/_/shr-i gA ra bI ra ka ru NAd+b+hu ta
[\[143b.4\]]zin pa yin te mtshungs/_/haN+De hany+dze ha la 'bod/_/dman dang g.yog mo grogs mo slar/_/aM ga hA ro yan lag bskyod/_/byany+dza ka dang tshul dag mtshungs/_/zin pa'i yan lag dag ni gnyis/_/gsum ni aM gi ka dang ni/_/sa twi ke zhes mi dran pa'o/_/sgeg dang dpa' dang snying rje dang /_/rngam dang

[\[145a.1\]]b+h+ra mA la li tan+ta thA/_/he lA lI le t+ya mI hA bAHkri yAHshr-iM gA ra b+hA ba dzAH/_/dra baHke li pa rI hA sAHkrI DA lI lA tsa nar+m+ma tsa/_/byA dzo\u0f85pa de sho lak+Shany+tsa krI Da khe lA tsa kUr+d+da naM/_/_

[\[145b.1\]]swa b+hA bash+tsa ni sargash+tsA tha pe pa thu/_/kam+bo\u0f85tha k+Sha Na ud+d+hAR+Sho ma hA ung+ba ha ut+sa baH/_/swarga brgaH//_!_//a d+ho b+hu ba na pA tA la ba li sad+ma ra sA ta laM/_/nA ga lo ko\u0f85tha ku ha raM bi ba raM shu Shi raM bi laM/_/ts+tshi draM nir+b+ya

[\[146a.1\]]sar+p+paHpr-i dA ku b+hu dza go b+hu dzaM gonyahir+b+hu dzaM ga maH/_/A shI bi Sho bi Sha d+ha rash+tsa krI byA DaHsa rI sr-i paH/_/kuN+Da lI gU D+ha pAts+tsak+ShuHshra pAHkA ko da raHpha NI/_/dar+b+bI ka ro dIr+g+ha br-iSh+Thau dan+da shU ko bi le sha yaH/_/_
[\[146a.2\]]@#/_/sa la 'khyog dang sa la 'phye/_/lag 'gro myur 'gro gya gyur 'gro//_'phye 'gro mche dug dug 'dzin dang /_/'khor lo 'khyog 'gro rnam 'dzin dang /_/'khyil pa rkang sbas mig gis thos/_/lto 'phye gdengs can gzar bu'i mgo/_/rgyab rings zas na khung bu nyal/_/_

[\[146b\]]
[\[146b.1\]]saM g+hA taHkA la sU trany+tse t+yA d+yAHsa twAstu nA ra kAH/_/pre tA bai ta ra NI sin+duHs+yA da la k+ShI stu ni r+r-i tiH/_/biSh+Ti rA dzr-iH ka ra NA tu yA ta nI tI bra be da nA/_/pA DA bA d+hA bya thA duSh+kha mA mA na s+yaM pra sU ti

[\[146b.3\]]dzaM/_/s+yAt+ka Sh+TaM kr-i ts+tsha mA b+hI laM tri Sh+we ShAM b+he d+ya gA mi yata//_!_//sa mu dro\u0f85b+d+hi ra kU sA raHpA rA bA raHsa rit+pa tiH/_/u da n+wA nu da d+his+sin+d+huHsa ra swAn+sA ga ro\u0f85r+N+Na baH/_/rat+nA ka ro dza la ni d+hir+YA daHpa ti ra
[\[146b.4\]]las skye/_/bro 'tshal gcod sbyor 'jigs pa len/_/de rnams gsum du dbye bas 'gro/_!_//rgya mtsho chu 'dzin zla bas 'phel/_/pha rol 'grib dang chu klung bdag_/chu srel dang ni 'bab ldan dang /_/chu can mtsho can dug can mtsho/_/rin chen 'byung gnas chu gter dang /_/chu srin bdag po
[\[146b.5\]]pAM pa tiH/_/ta s+ya pra b+he dA k+ShI rA do la ba No dasta thA pa re/_/A pAHstI b+hU m+nibAr+b+bA ri sha li laM ka ma laM dza laM/_/pa yaHkI lA la ma mr-i taM dzI ba ni b+ha ba naM ba na/_/ka ban+d+ha mu da kam+p+rA thaHpuska raM sar+b+ba

[\[147a.1\]]to mu khaM/_/am+b+ho\u0f85r+N+Na sto ya pA nI ya nI rak+ShI rAm+bu sam+ba raM/_/me g+ha puSh+paM g+ha na ra sas+t+ri Shu dwe A s+ya mam+ma yaM/_/b+hang+gasta raM ga Urmi bA s+t+ri yAM bI tsi ra thor+m+mi Shu/_/ma hat+s+dUl+lo la kal+lo

[\[151a\]]
[\[151a.1\]]tu pang+ki laH/_/dza la prA ya ma nr-i paM s+yAt+puM si kats+tshasta thA bi d+haH/_/s+t+ri shar+k+ka rA sar+k+ka ri laHsAr+k+ka raHshar+k+ka rA ba ti/_/de sha e bA di mAbe ba mun+ne yAHshi ka tA ba ti/_bye ma ldan pa/_/dA+e shA nA d+yaM bu br-iSh+T+yam+bu saM san+na br-i hI
[\[151a.2\]]@#/_/ki la/_/chu mang chu dang ldan pa pho/_/mu khyud ldan pa de bzhin sgrub/_/mo ni gyo can rdza dum can/_/seg ma dang ni rde'u can/_/de la sogs pa'i yul rnams te/_/de bzhin gzhan yang shes par bya/_/bye ma can dang gtsang stod yul/_/char 'bab 'bru
[\[151a.3\]]pA li taH/_/s+yAn+na dI ma tri go de ba mA tr-i kash+tsa ya thA kra maM/_/su rA dz+nyi de she rA dza n+wAn+s+yAt+ta to n+ya tra rA dza bAn/_/go Sh+ThaM go s+thA na kan+ta tu go Sh+ThI naM b+hU ta pUr+b+ba ka/_/bar+Yab+ta b+hUHpa ri sa raHse
[\[151a.4\]]rnams phun tshogs skyong /_/gtsang po'i ma dang lta yi ma/_/rim pa ji lta ba bzhin no/_/rgyal po bzang po yod pa'i yul/_/rgyal po bzang po dang ldan dang /_/rgyal po can zhes gzhan las so/_/ba lang gnas dang phyugs lhas dang /_/phyugs kyi gnas ne sngon byung lhag_/rnam grangs de rnams
[\[151a.5\]]tu rA laus+t+ri yAm+pu mAn/_/bA ma lU ra swa nA kush+tsa bal+mI kalpun+na pun+sa kaM/_/a ya nam+bar+t+ma mAr+g+gA d+h+wa pan+thA naHpa da bI sU tiH/_/sha ra Ni pa dwa tiHpa d+yA bar+t+ma n+ye ka pa dI ti tsa/_/a ti pan+thAHsu pan+thAsh+tsa sat+pa thAsh+tsar+ts+tsi
[\[151a.6\]]sa'i zhor la/_/rdzing dang yur ba mo dang pho/_/grog mkhar grog tshang grog mo'i khyim/_/skyes bu dang ni ma ning ngo /_/li dang 'gro bya bgrod bya dang /_/shul dang 'jug bya goms dang li/_/'khor bya dang ni rkang gcig pa/_/shin tu 'jug bya lam bzangs dang /_/bden lam mchod par bya ba'i
[\[151b\]]
[\[151b.1\]]te\u0f85d+h+wa ni/_/bya d+h+wo du ra d+h+wo bi pa thad+ka da d+h+wA kA pa thas+sa maH/_/a pan+thAs+t+wa pa than+tu l+ye sring+gA Ta ka tsa tuSh+pa the/_/prAn+ta ran+dU ra sU n+yo d+h+wA kAn+ta ro bar+t+ma dur+g+ga maM/_/ga byu tiHs+t+rI kro sa yu gan+na lwaHkiSh+ku tsa tuHsa taM/_/g+haN+TA ba thaHsaM sa ra NaM tat+pu ra so pa niSh+ka
[\[151b.2\]]lam/_/lam ngan sdug 'gro pi ba tha/_/lam med a ba tha yin no/_/lam mdo sa dang bzhi mdo dang /_/mtha' dang ring po lam stong dang /_/dgon pa bgrod dka'i lam dang ni/_/ga byu ti mo rgyang grags zung /_/na lwa khru ni bzhi brgya'o/_/dril bu'i lam ni khral ba'o/_/de yi grong khyer
[\[151b.3\]]raM/_/b+hU mi bar+g+gaH//_!_//pUHs+t+rI pu rI na gaR+Yau bA sat+ta naM pu Ta b+he da naM/_/s+tha nI yan+ni ga monyan+yat+tu yat+mU la na ga rAt+pu raM/_/tats+tsha khA na ga raM be sho be s+yA dza na sa mA shra yaH/_/A sa nastu pi Sha nye
[\[151b.4\]]grong ngo /_/sa'i sde tshan no//_!_//grong khyer mo ste skyong byed dang /_/rgyal lam 'bab gnas tshong rdal dang /_/'jigs med dang ni mi bskyod gnas/_/gzhan gang rtsa ba'i grong khyer las/_/grong khyer de ni lo ma'i grong /_/smad 'tshong gnas dang 'jug gnas dang /_/skye gnas kun 'jug tshong
[\[151b.5\]]d+yA yAM bi pa NiHpa N+ya bI thi kAH/_/ra th+yA pra to lI bi shi khA s+yAts+tsa yo ba pra mas+t+ri yAM/_/prA kA ro ba ra Na sA laHprA tsI raM pran+ta to br-i tiH/_/b+hit+tiHs+t+rI ku d+ya mi DU kaM ta dan+tar+n+ya sta kI ka saM/_/gr-i ha ge ho da ba shi taM besma pad+ma ni
[\[151b.6\]]'dus dang /_/tshong lam dang ni srang lam dang /_/srang dang tshong khang rgya 'grems sa/_/ra ba'i rmang dang 'gram mo min/_/ra ba bskor ba lcags ri dang /_/rim pa 'obs tshal mtha'i mu khyud/_/rtsig pa mo dang brtsegs pa dang /_/rtsig pa'i bar rus kI ka saM/_/khang pa khyim dang gnas dang ni/_/'jug bya chags
[\[152a\]]
[\[152a.1\]]ke ta naM/_/ni shAn+ta bas+t+ya pa da naM b+ha ba nA gA ra man+di raM/_/gr-i hA pun+si tsa b+hUm+n+ye ba ni kA y+ya ni la yA la yAH/_/bA shaHku To dwa yoHsA lA sa b+hA sany+dza ba naM twi daM/_/_

[\[152b\]]
[\[152b.1\]]to b+ha dro naM d+yA bar+t+tA da yo pi tsa/_/bi ts+tshan+da ka pra b+he dA hi b+ha ban+tI shwa ra shad+ma nAM/_/s+t+r+ya gA raM b+hU b+hu dzA man+taHbu raM s+yA da ba ro d+ha naM/_/shud+d+hAn+tash+tsA ba ro d+hash+tsa s+yA daT+TaHk+Shau ma mas+t+ri yAM/_/pra g+hA

[\[153b.1\]]par+b+ba taH/_/hi ma bAn ni Sha d+ho bi d+h+yo mA l+ya bAn+sA ri pA twa kaH/_/gan+d+ha mA da na ma n+ye tsa he ma kU TA da yo mu gAH/_/pA ShA Na prasta ra grA bo pa lAsh+mA naHshi lA dri Shata/_/kU Tonyas+t+rI shi kha raM shr-iM gam+p+ra pA tas+t+wa ta To

[\[154a\]]
[\[154a.1\]]Ta bya ra N+yam+bi pi ni ga ha naM kA na naM ba naM/_/mA hA ra N+ya ma raN+yA nI gr-i hA rA mAstu niSh+ku TAH/_/A rA maHs+yA du pa ba naM kr-i tri maM ba na me ba yata/_blon po/_a mA t+ya ga Ni gakA ge ho pa pa ne br-ik+Sha

[\[154b.1\]]hiH/_/ban+d+h+yonyapha lonya ba ke shI tsa pha la bA na pha li naHpha lI/_/pra phul+lo t+phul+la saM phul+la byA ko Sha bi ka tsa s+phu TAH/_/phul+lash+tsai te bi ke si te s+yu ra ban+d+h+yA da yas+t+ri Shu/_/s+thA Nu bA nAd+h+ru baHshad+kur+h+ra swa shA khA shi phaHk+Shu paH/_

[\[154b.3\]]a pra kAN+De stam+ba gul+mau bal+lI tu pra ta tir+l+la tA/_/la tA pra tA ni nI pI ru ng+gu l+mi n+yu la pa mi t+ya pi/_/na ga d+yA ro ha uts+tshA yaHut+se d+ha sh+tso ts+tsh+ra yash+tsa saH/_/as+t+rI pra kAN+DaHskan+d+haHs+yAt+mU lAts+tshA khA ba d+hi sta roH/_/sa me shA

[\[154b.5\]]khA la te skan+d+ha shA khA sA le shi phA dza Te/_/shA khA si phA ba ro ha s+yAt+mU lA ts+tsA grad+ga tA la tA/_/shi ro\u0f85graM shi kha ram+bA nA mU la m+bud+h+no g+h+ri nA ma kaH/_/sA ro madz+dzA sa mau twa ka s+t+rI balkaM balka la ma s+t+ri yAM/_/_
[\[154b.6\]]ga lcug ma ste/_/sdong po yal g.yal 'dab dang /_/rtsa phran dang ni ral pa'o/_/yal ga'i rtsa ba 'phyang ba dang /_/rtsa las 'khri shing rtse mor son/_/mgo dang rtse mo co do ni/_/yang na pho'o rtsa ba dang /_/rmang dang rkang pa'o snying po dang /_/rkang mar mtshungs so lpags mo dang /_/skogs shun zhes pa mo min no/_/_
[\[155a\]]
[\[155a.1\]]kASh+Tha dAr+b+bin+d+ha naM twe d+ha Id+h+ma me d+hAHsa mid+s+t+ri yAM/_/niSh+ku haHko Ta ram+bA nA bal+la rim+maM dza riHs+t+ri yau/_/pat+t+raM pa lA shaM ts+tsha da nan+da laM par+N+NaM ts+tsha daHpu mAn/_/pal+la bonyas+t+rI ki sha la yaM bistA ro bi Ta ponyas+t+ri yAM/_/pr-i k+ShA dI nAM
[\[155a.2\]]@#/_/me shing shing bu 'tshed shing pho/_/yam shing hom shing sreg shing mo/_/khong stong nang can yang ni pho/_/gang bu dang ni snye ma mo/_/ltung byed lo ma grib byed dang /_/'dab ma shing lo lo 'dab pho/_/yal 'dab mo min yal tshogs dang /_/rgya chen go ling mo min no/_/shing sogs rnams
[\[155a.3\]]pha laM sha s+yaM pr-in+taM pra sha pa ban+d+ha naM/_/A me pha le sha lA TuHs+yA ts+tshuSh+ke bA na mu b+he tri Shu/_/sh+ShA ra ko dzA la kaM klI be klI kA ko raklaHpu mA na/_kha 'bus sring ma bye ba'i me tog ra kaHpu mA na/_/s+yAd+gut+sa kastu sta ba kaHkut+Na lo muk+ta lo s+t+ri yAM/_/s+t+ri yaHsu ma na saHpuSh+paM pra sU naM ku su maM sa maM/_/_

[\[155a.5\]]ma ka ran+daHpuSh+pa ra saHsa raM gaHsu ma ne ra dzaH/_/dwi hI naM pra sa be sar+b+bi ha rI ta kyA da gnyis ka rtags gsum yin no/_yaHs+t+ri yI/_/A shwat+tha bai Na ba p+lAk+Sha nai ya gro d+haid+gu dzaM pha le/_/bAr+ha tany+tsa pha la dzaMb+bA dzam+bAHs+t+ri dzam+bu dzAM ba baM/_/puSh+po dzA
[\[155a.6\]]me tog bcud dang me tog ro/_/me tog rdul dang yid 'ong rdul/_/gnyis dman 'bras 'byung thams cad do/_/a ru ra sogs mo min no/_/A shwat+tha dang bai Na ba/_/p+lak+Sha dang ni ya gro d+ha/_/ai gu da dang 'bras bu 'bru/_/'dzam bu'i 'bras bu dzaM bAn+d+ri/_/dzam+bu dzam+ba mo lam zer/_yin no/_/me tog rigs la
[\[155b\]]
[\[155b.1\]]tI pra b+h+r-i ta ya swa ling+gA brI ha yaH pa le/_/bi dAr+YA d+yA stu mU le pi puSh+pe klI be pi pA Ta lA/_/bo d+hi dru mash+tsa la da laHpi pya laHkuny+dza rA sha naH/_/a shwat+the\u0f85 tha ka pit+the s+yurda d+hit+tha grA hi man+ma thAH/_/ta smin+da d+hi ba laHpuSh+pa pha laHdan+ta
[\[155b.2\]]sogs pa rnams/_/rang rtags 'bru dang 'bras bu'o/_/bi dA ri sogs rtsa ba dang /_/me tog ma ning bA Ta la/_/byang chub shing dang lo ma bskyod/_/pi pya la dang glang po'i zas/_/a shwat+tha'o de nas ni/_/skyur rtsi urda r+hit+tha'o/_/so rtse la gnod skyur mo'o/_/de la zho 'bras me tog 'bru/_/so rtse nyams
[\[155b.3\]]sha ThA ba pi/_/u dum+ba re dzan+tu pha lo ya dz+nyAM go he mu dug+d+ha kaH/_/ko bi dA re tsa ma ri kaHkud+dA lo yu ga pat+t+ra kaH/_/sap+ta par+N+Ne bi shA la twa ka shA ra dI bi Sha mats+tsha daH/_/A rag+d+ha d+he rA dzA brik+Sha sa myA ka tsa tu rang+gu lAH/_/A
[\[155b.4\]]byed ces pa'o/_/u dum+bA ra dzan+tu'i 'bras/_/mchod sbyin yan lag gser zho ma/_/yongs 'dus brtol rnga yab can/_/ku mud lo ma 'dab zung can/_/lo ma bdun pa shun pa mthug_/ston ka 'byung dang mi mnyam mda'/_/dong ka dang ni rgyal po'i shing /_/zhi byed sor mo bzhi pa dang /_/'khor
[\[155b.5\]]re ba ta byA d+hi g+hA ta kr-i ta mA la su bar+N+Na kAH/_/s+yu dzaM bI re dan+ta sa Tha dzam+b+ha dzam+b+hI ra dzam+b+ha lA/_/ba ru Ne ba ru NaHse tustik+ta sA kaHku mA ra kaH/_/pun+nA ge pu ru Sha stung+gaHke sa ro de ba bal+la b+haH/_/pA ri b+ha dre ni m+ba ta tur+m+man+dA raHpA
[\[155b.6\]]lo dang 'dra nad 'joms dang /_/me tog phreng dang lo ma bzang /_/skyur rtsi chan po so rtse dang /_/skyur mo dzam+b+hir dzam+b+ha la/_/klu shing chu shing dkar po dang /_/lo ma kha dang gzhon nu ma/_/skyes bu klu shing skyes snga dang /_/mtho dang ge sar lha yi 'dab/_/yongs bzang dang ni ni ma pa'i shing /_/man dA
[\[156a\]]
[\[156a.1\]]ri dzA ta kaH/_/ti ni se s+yan+da no ne mI ra tha dru ra ti muk+ta kaH/_/baM dzu lash+tsi tra kr-its+tsA tha dwau pI ta na ka pi ta nau/_/A mra ta ke ma d+hU ke tu gu Da puSh+pa ma d+hu dru mau/_/_
[\[156a.2\]]@#/_/ra dang yongs 'du'i shing /_/ti ni sa dang s+yan da'o/_/mu khyud shing dang shing rta'i shing /_/a ti muk+ta ka zhes pa/_/shin tu grol dang snod shing dang /_/sna tshogs byed dang de nas gnyis/_/pi ta na ka pi ta no/_/a mra ta'i shing sbrang shing dang /_/bu ram me tog mngar ba'i shing /_/_

[\[156b\]]
[\[156b.1\]]ba pi/_ka pid/_/p+la k+Sho dzA TI pak+ka TI s+yAn+n+ya gro d+ho ba hu bA dwa TaH/_/gAl baHshA pa ro lo d+h+ra sti rI Ta sti lwa mAr+dz+dza nau/_/A mrash+tsU te ra sA lo so sa ha kA ro ti sau ra b+haH/_/kum+b+holU kha la ke klI be kau shi ko gug+gu luHpu raH/_/she luHsh+leSh+mAn+ta kaHsI

[\[157a.1\]]kau/_/ti la kaHk+Shu ra kaHshrI mAn sa mau pi tsu la dz+hA bu kau/_/shrI par+N+Ni kA ku mu di kA kum+b+hI kai Dar+y+Y+Ya kaM pha lau/_/kra mu kaHpaT+TikA khyaHs+yAt+paT+Ti lAk+ShA pra sA da na/_/nU da stu pu ShaHkra mu ko brah+ma N+yo brah+ma dA ru tsa/_/tU lany+tsa nI

[\[157b.1\]]yuHshAl+ma lIr+d+wa yoH/_/bits+tshA tu shAl+ma lI beSh+To ro tsa naHkU Ta shal+ma liH/_/tsi ra bi lwo nak+ta mA laHka ra dzash+tsa ka rany+dza ke/_/pra kIr+YaHpU ti ka ra dzaHpU ti kaHka li kA ra kaH/_/ka rany+dza b+he dAHShad+g+ran+tho marka T+yaM gA ra bal+la rI/_/ro hI ro hi ta ka p+lI ha sa trurdA Di ma

[\[158b.1\]]kar+N+Ni kA raHpa ri byA d+ho la ku tso li ku tso u huH/_/pa na saHkaN+Da ki pha lo ni tsu lA hidz+dza lo\u0f85m+bu dzaH/_/kA ko dum+ba ri kA phalgur+m+ma la pUr+dz+dza g+ha ne pha lA/_/a rista sar+b+ba to b+ha dra hiM gu niR+YA sa mA la kAH/_/pi tsu mar+d+da sh+tsa nim+be\u0f85tha pits+tshi lA

[\[159a\]]
[\[159a.1\]]e ta s+ye ba ka ling+go dra ya bam+b+ha dra ya baM pha le/_/kr-iSh+Na pA ka pha lA big+na su She NAHka ra mar+d+da ke/_/kA la skaM d+hasta mA laHs+yAt+tA piM tso bya tha sin+du kaH/_/sin+du bA ren+d+ra su ri sau ni rgu N+DIn+d+rA Ni ke t+ya pi/_/be NI kha ra ga rI

[\[159b\]]
[\[159b.1\]]ma hA sa hA/_/ta tra so Ne ku ru ba kasta tra pI te ku ruN+Da kaH/_/nI la dz+hiN+DI dwa yor+b+bA NA dA shI tsArtu ga la sh+tsa sA/_/sai rI ya kastu dz+hiN+DI s+yAt+ta smin+ku ra ba ko ru Ne/_/bI tA ku ra ba ko dz+hiN+DI ta smin+sa ha tsa rI dwa yoH/_gnyis/_/o dra puSh+paM dza bA badzra puSh+paM puSh+paM ti la s+yata/_
[\[159b.2\]]am+la na dang nus ldan che/_/de dmar ku ru ba ka'o/_/de ser ku ruN+Da ka'o/_/sngon po dz+hiN+Di gnyis dang mda'/_/bran mo tsArtu ga la sA/_/sai rI ya ka dz+hiN+Di yin/_/de dmar ku ra ba ka dang /_/ser po ku ra ba ka ni/_/dz+hiN+Di de dang lhan cig spyod/_/rnga mo me tog dza ba dang /_/rdo rje'i me tog me tog thig_/_
[\[159b.3\]]pra tI hA sa sha ta prA sa tsaN+DA ta ha ya mA ra kAH/_/ka ra bI re ka rI re tu kra ka ra gran+thi lA bu b+hau/_/un+mat+taHki ta bo d+hUr+t+to d+hu stU ra ka na kaHhwa yaH/_/mA tu lo ma da na sh+tsA s+ya pha le mA tu la pu tra kaH/_/pha la pU ro bI dza pU re
[\[159b.4\]]pra tI hA sa brgyar gyes dang /_/gtum po rta gsod lag pa dpa'/_/ka rI ri dang kra ka ra/_/tshigs pa dang ni gnyi ga'o/_/smyo byed dang ni ki ta mo/_/gdul dka' dang ni d+hu stU ra/_/gser gyi me tog ces pa'o/_/mA tu la dang myos byed do/_/de 'bras mA tu la pu tra ka_/bI dza pU ra 'bras bus gang /_
[\[159b.5\]]tu tsa ko mA tu lung+ga ke/_/sa mI ra No ma ru ba kaHpras+tha puSh+paHpa Ni dz+ha ka_/dzam+bI re pya tha par+NA se ka Thiny+dza ra ku Thi ra kau_/si te\u0f85r+dz+dza ko\u0f85tra bA ThI tu tsa tra ko bah+ni saM dz+nyA kaH/_/arkA hwa ba su kA s+pho ta ga Na rU pa bi kI ra NAH/_/man+dA rash+tsarka par+N+Ne\u0f85tra
[\[159b.6\]]mdog mdzes mA tu lung+ga ka_/sa mI ra Na ma ru bka_/pra s+tha me tog pha Ni dz+ha ka_/dzam+bI ra dang de nas ni/_/par+Na se dang ka Thiny+dza/_/ku Thi ra ka dkar po dang /_/ardza ka 'dir pA Thi ni/_/tsi tra ka dang me'i ming can/_/arga zhes pa ba su kA/_/s+pho tsha tshogs gzugs rnam par 'thor/_/man+da ra dang arka'i 'dab/_
[\[160a\]]
[\[160a.1\]]shukle\u0f85la rka ta pa sau/_/shi ba mal+lI pA shu pA ti e kASh+Thi lo ba ko ba suH/_/ban+dA br-ik+ShA da nI br-ik+Sha ru hA dzI ban+ti ke t+ya bi/_/bat+sA da nIts+tshin+na ru hA gu dU tsI tan+t+ri kA mr-i tA/_/dzI baM ti kA so ma bal+lI bi sa l+yA
[\[160a.2\]]@#/_/'di dkar a larka tas ba/_/zhi ba'i me tog phyugs bdag dga'/_/shing gcig spra ba ba su'/_/ban+dA shing la za ba dang /_/shing skyes 'tsho byed nyid kyang ngo /_/bu zas bcad skye sle tres dang /_/rgyud ldan bdud rtsi 'tsho byed dang /_/zla ba'i mgul pa yangs pa can/_/sbrang

[\[163a.1\]]bar+hiSh+Tho dI byaM ke sAm+bu nA mu tsa/_/kA lA nu sAr+Ya br-id+d+hA sma puSh+pa sI ta shi bA ni tu/_/sai le yaM tA la par+N+NI tu de t+yA gan+d+ha ku TI mu rA/_/gan+d+hi nI\u0f85ga dza b+hak+Sh+yA tu su ba hA su ra b+hI ra sA/_/ma he ra NA kun+du ru kI sa h+lA kI h+lA di nI ti tsa/_/_
[\[163a.2\]]@#/_/bar+hiSh+Tho dI byaM/_/ke sAm+bu yi ming can no/_/dus rjes 'brang dang rgan po dang /_/rdo yi me tog dkar zhi ba/_/brag skyes tA la'i 'dab ma dang /_/dai t+yA dri brtsegs mu rA'o/_/dri ldan glang zas legs 'bab dang /_/dri bzangs ro ldan ma he ra NA/_/si h+la tshim byed kun+du ru/_/_

[\[163b\]]
[\[163b.1\]]tsakra ka ra kaM/_/shu Shi rA bi dru ma la tA ka po tAM g+h+rir+n+na TI na lI/_/d+ha ma n+yaM dza na ke shI tsa ha nur+haT+Ta bi lA si nI/_/suk+tiHshaM khaHkhu raHko la da laM na kha ma thA D+hA kI/_/kak+ShI mr-it+s+nA tu ba ri kA mr-it+tA la ga su rASh+T+ra dze/_/ku TAn+na TaM ha sha pu
[\[163b.2\]]dang 'khor lo byed/_/sbubs can byi ru 'khri shing dang /_/phug ron rkang dang na lI dang /_/dza na ke shi d+ha ma n+yaM/_/ha nu haT+Te rnam sgeg ma/_/nya phyis dung dang khu ra dang /_/ko la da laM sen mo dang /_/de nas a D+hA kI kak+ShI/_/mr-it+s+nA tu ba ri ka dang /_/mr-it+tA la ka yul bzangs skye/_/li ga dur dang da sha
[\[163b.3\]]raM bA ne yaM pa ri be la baM/_/bla ba go pu ra go nar+d+da ko bar+t+tI musta kA ni tsa/_/gran+thi par+N+NaM shu kaM bar+hiHpuSh+paM s+thau Ne ya kuk+ku re/_/ma run+mA lA tu pi shu nA spr-ik+kA de bI la tA la g+huH/_/sa mu drAn+tA ba d+hU ko TI baR+ShA laM ko pi ke t+ya pi/_/ta pa swi nI dza TA lA dza TA
[\[163b.4\]]pur/_/nags skyes pa ri phe la baM/_/p+la ba go pur go nar+d+ha/_/ke bar+t+ti musta kA ni tsa/_/tshigs 'dab shu kaM bar+hi dang /_/me tog gnas skyes kuk+ku re/_/ma run+mA la bi shu nA/_/pr-ik+kA lha mo'i 'khri shing nyung /_/ba d+hu ko Di rgya mtsho'i mtha'/_/baR+ShA laM ko pi ke yang /_/dka' thub can ma ral can ma/_/_
[\[163b.5\]]mAM sI lo ma sA mi shI/_/twa k+Shan+t+ra sUt+ka TaM b+h+r-ing+ga twa tsaM tso tsaM ba rAng+ga kaM/_/kartsU ra ko T+rA bi Da kaHkA l+ya ko be d+h+ra mu kha kaH/_/o Sha d+h+yo dzA ti mA tre s+yu ra dzA to sar+b+ba mau Sha d+haM/_/shA kA khyaM pat+t+ra puSh+pA di taN+Da lI yonyalpa mA ri ShaH/_/bi shalpAg+ni
[\[163b.6\]]spang spos spu can mAM si'o/_/pags lo sut+kaT b+h+r-ing+ga dang /_/pags pa tso tsam yan lag mchog_/kartsU ra ko bi Da ka_/kAlpa ka dang rig byed gdong /_/o Sha d+hi ni rigs tsam yin/_/ra dzA to ni kun la sman/_/shA kA khyaM 'dab me tog sogs/_/taN+Du lI yo chung dang 'phags/_/bi shal ba dang me
[\[164a\]]
[\[164a.1\]]shi khA nan+tA pha li nI sa ku puSh+p+ya pi/_/s+ya dr-ik+Sha gan+d+hAts+tsha ga lAn+b+yA be gI br-id+d+ha dA ra kaH/_/dzuM go brah+mI tu mat+s+yA k+Shi ba yaHs+thA so ma bal+la rI/_/pa Tu par+N+NI hai ma ba tI swar+N+Nak+ShI rI hi mA pa tI/_/ha ya puts+tshI tu kam+po dzI mA
[\[164a.2\]]@#/_/yi rtse/_/brgya byin me tog mtha' yas 'bras/_/dr-ik+Sha'i dri can ts+tsha ga lA na/_/byA be gI dang rgan 'joms dang /_/dzuM go tshangs ma nya mig dang /_/zla ba'i 'khri shing na tshod gnas/_/lo ma gsar dang gser ldan dang /_/gser gyi 'o ma kha ba ldan/_/rta yi mjug dang kam+bo dzI/_/_
[\[164a.3\]]Sha par+N+NI ma hA sa hA/_/tuN+Di ke rI rak+ta pha lA biM bi kA pi lu par+N+N+ya pi/_/barba rA ka ba rI tuM gI kha ra puSh+p+yA dza gaM d+hi kA/_/e la par+N+NI tu su ba hA rAsnA yuk+ta ra sA tsa sA/_/tsAM ge rI tsu kr-i kA dan+ta sha ThAM bASh+ThA mra lo Ni kA/_/sa ha sra be
[\[164a.4\]]sran ma'i lo ma bzod po che/_/tuN+Di ke rAM 'bras bu dmar/_/gzugs brnyan can dang pi lu'i 'dab/_/barba rA dang ka ba rI/_/mtho ba bong bu me tog dri/_/e la'i lo ma legs 'bab dang /_/ra snA yuk+ta ra sA dang /_/tsAM ge rI dang tsu kri kA/_/so rtse mo dang skyur mo dang /_/stong 'bigs dang
[\[164a.5\]]d+hI tsu kro\u0f85m+la be ta saHsha ta bi d+h+ya pi/_/ta ma skA rI gaN+Da kA lI sa maM gA kha da rI t+ya pi/_/dzI ban+tI dzI ba nI dzI bA dzI ba nI yA ma d+hush+tsa sA/_/kUrba shIR+She ma d+hu ra kaHshr-ing+ga hra swAng+ga dzI ba kA/_/ki rA ta tik+to b+hU nim+bo\u0f85nAr+Ya tik+to\u0f85tha sap+ta lA/_/_
[\[164a.6\]]ni tsu kro dang /_/skyur mo dang ni brgya 'bigs kyang /_/phyag 'tshal dang ni gaN+Da kA lI/_/lus mnyam dang ni seng ldeng ngo /_/'tsho byed dzI ba nI dzI bA/_/dzI ba nI ya mngar mo yang /_/kUrba shIR+She ma d+hu raka_/rwa can lus thung dzI ba kA/_/ki rA ta tik+ta sa'i nim+ba/_/a na ma tik+ta de nas bdun/_/_
[\[164b\]]
[\[164b.1\]]bi ma lA shI ta lA b+hU ri phe nI tsarma ka she t+ya pi/_/bA ya so lI swA du ra sA ba yaHs+thA tha mu kU la kaH/_/ni kum+b+ho dan+ti kApra t+yak+tsh+wa N+yu dum+pa ra par+N+N+ya pi/_/a dza mo dA tU gra gan+d+hA brah+ma gar+b+hA ya mA ni kA/_/mU le pauSh+ka ra kAsmI ra pad+ma pat+t+ra Ni pauSh+ka
[\[164b.2\]]dri med bsil 'dzin b+hU ri dang /_/phe nI tsarma ka she ti/_/na tshod 'dzin dang mngar ba dang /_/na tshod gnas dang mu kU la/_/so ldan ni kum+b+ha pra t+yaka_/shre Nu u dum bA ra'i 'dab/_/ra dga' mo ma drag po'i dri/_/tshangs pa'i snying po thun chod can/_/rtsa ba rdzing bu kha che dang /_/pad+ma'i 'dab dang rdzing las
[\[164b.3\]]re/_/a bya thA ti tsa rA pad+mA tsa ra TI pad+ma tsA ri NI/_/kam+pil+laHkar+k+ka shash+tsaN+d+ro rak+tAM go ro tsa nI t+ya pi/_/pra pun+nA Das+t+we Da ga dzo te dru g+h+nash+tsa kra mar+d+da kaH/_/pad+mA Ta u ra NA khyash+tsa pa lAN+DA stu su kaM da kaH/_/la nAr+k+ka du dru mau ta tra ha ri te
[\[164b.4\]]skyes/_/nad med a ti tsa rA dang /_/pad+ma tsar+TI pad+ma spyod/_/'dar byed btsun mo zla ba dang /_/yan lag dmar dang mdzes ldan kyang /_/pra pun+nA Da s+t+we Da glang /_/te dru 'joms dang 'khor lo 'joms/_/pad+mA Ta dang u ra Na bshad/_/me mo dang ni sge'u dang /_/btsong dang kun dong sgog sngon dang /_/_
[\[164b.5\]]tha ma hau Sha d+haM/_/la shu naM gUny+dza nA riSh+Ta ma hA kan+da ra so na kAH/_/bu nar+n+na bA tu so tha g+h+nIHpi tun+naM su niShan+na kaM/_/s+yAd+d+hA ta kaHshI ta lonyapa rA dzi tA sha na par+N+N+ya pi/_/pA rA ba tAM g+h+riHka Ta b+hI piN+yAdz+yo tisma tI la tA/_/bAR+Shi kaM trA ya mA NA s+yAt+t+rA yan+tI

[\[165a\]]
[\[165a.1\]]ba la b+ha dri kA_/biSh+wak+se nA pri yA gr-iSh+Ti bA rA hI ba da re t+ya pi/_/mArka bo b+h+r-id+ga rA dzaHs+yAt+kA ka mA tsi tu ba ya sI/_/sha ta puSh+pA shi ta ts+tshat+t+rAnyab+hi ts+tshat+t+rA ma d+hu rA mi si/_/a bak+puSh+pI kA ra bI tsa sa ra NI tu pra shA ra NI/_/ta s+yA

[\[165b.1\]]tu sha ta bar+thi kA/_/sa ha sra bIr+Ya b+hAr+g+ga byau ru hA nan+tA tha sA si tA/_/go lo mI sha tra bIr+YA tsa gaN+DA lI sa ku lA k+Sha kaH/_/ku ra bin+do me g+ha nA mA mustA musta ka mas+t+ri yAM/_/s+yAd+b+ha dra musti ko guM drA tsU DA lA tsa kra lots+tsa TA/_/baM she twak+sA

[\[168a\]]
[\[168a.1\]]kA la kaN+Tha kaH/_/A tA pi tsal+lo dak+ShA pya gr-id+h+rau kA+e ra shu kau sa mau/_/kruM krony+tsi tha ba kaHka hAHpuSh+ka rA hwastu sA ra sa/_/ko kash+tsa kra bA ko ra thAng+gA dwa ya nA ma kaH/_/kA dam+baHka la haM saHs+yA
[\[168a.2\]]@#/_/mgrin nag go/_/'ol ba dang ni tsil+lo'o/_/bya rgod dang ni gr-i d+ho'o/_/ne tso kun 'gro mtshungs pa'o/_/krung krung dang ni kruny+dza'o/_/de nas bya gar kong ka'o/_/bya khyung dmar po sA ra sa/_/dur pa 'khor lo tsakra bAka_/gnyis po shing rta'i ming can no/_/chu skyar ka la haM sa yin/_/shin
[\[168a.3\]]dut+k+ro sha ru ro sa mau/_/haM sAstu shwe ta ga ru Dash+tsakrAng+gA mA na sau ka saH/_/rA dza haM sAstu te tsany+tsu ca ra Nirlo hai taiHsi tAH/_/mi li nair+m+mal+li kA khyAste d+hArtu raSh+T+raHsi te ta rai/_/sha rA ri rA Ti rA Dish+tsa ba lA kA bi sha kaN+Thi kA/_/haM sa s+ya yo Shid+ba tu
[\[168a.4\]]khro dang sgra sgrogs mtshungs/_/ngang pa bya khyung dkar po dang /_/'khor lo'i yan lag ma dros gnas/_/ngang pa'i rgyal po mtshungs rkang dmar/_/ngang dkar dri can phreng 'dzin zhes/_/yul 'dzin dang ni ngang skya'o/_/sha rA ri rA Ti rA Di/_/ba lA ka dang pad zlum mgrin/_/ngang pa'i chung ma ba ra DA/_/_
[\[168a.5\]]ra TA sA ra sa s+ya tu lak+ShA NA/_/ja tu kAnya?dzi na pa trA s+yAt+pa roSh+NI tai la pA yi kA/_/bar+ts+tsa NA mak+Shi kA nI lA sa ra g+hA ma d+hu mAk+Shi kA/_/pa taM gi kA pu ti kA s+yA daM sha stu ba na mak+Shi kA/_/daM shI tadz+dzA ti ra l+yA s+yAd+gan+d+ho lI ba ra TA dwa yoH/_/b+h+r-ing+gA rI

[\[168b.1\]]sI ru kA tsI rI dz+hi li kA tsa sa mA i mAH/_/sa mau pa taM ga sha la b+hau kha d+yo to dz+yo ti riM ga NaH/_/ma d+hu bra to ma d+hu ka ro ma d+hu liT+ma d+hu pA li NaH/_/dwi re pha puSh+pa liT+g+h+r-id+ga ShaD+pa da b+h+ra ma rA la yaH/_/ma yU ro bar+hi No bar+hI nI la

[\[171a\]]
[\[171a.1\]]sUH/_/dzA tA pa t+yA pra dzA tA tsa pra sU ta tsa pra sU ti kAH/_/s+t+rI nag+ni kA koT+Ta bI s+yAd+dU tI pany+tsa ri kA sa me/_/kA t+yA ya n+ya r+d+ha br-id+d+hA yA kA ShA ya ba sa nAnyad+ha bA/_/sai ran+d+h+rI pa ra be sh+ma s+thA swa ba sha shi lpa kA ri
[\[171a.2\]]@#/_/skyes ma/_/bu skyes pa dang rab skyes dang /_/rab tu btsas dang rab tu 'khrungs/_/bud med gcer bu gos med yin/_/pho nya mo dang kun spyod mtshungs/_/kA t+yA ya ni dar yol ma/_/ngur smrig gos dang ldan pa'o/_/tha ga pha rol khyim sdod dang /_/rang dbang bzo yi las
[\[171a.3\]]kA/_/a sik+nI s+yA da br-id+d+hA yA prai Sh+yan+taHpu ra tsA ri NI/_/bA ras+t+rI ga Ni kA be sh+ya rU pA dzI bA tha shA dza naiH/_/sat+k+r-i tA bA ra mu khyA s+yAt+kuT+Ta nI saM b+ha lI sa me/_/bi pra shwi kA twIk+Sha Ni kA dai ba dz+nyAnyatha ra dza swa

[\[171b\]]
[\[171b.1\]]Ni kyA gar+b+hi NaM yau ba taM ga NAH/_/pu na b+hUr+d+di d+he ShU ru D+hA ya dwista s+yA di d+hu ShuHpa tiH/_/sa tu dwi dzo ge di d+hi ShuHsai ba ya s+ya ku Dum+bi nI/_/kA nI naHka n+ya kA dzA taHsu to\u0f85tha su b+ha gA su taH/_/sau b+hA gi ne yaHs+yAt+pA ra s+t+rai Ne yastu pa ras+t+ri yAH/_

[\[172a\]]
[\[172a.1\]]swa sA pa t+yur+n+nap+t+rI pau trI su tArma dzA/_/b+hAr+YAstu b+h+rA tri brga s+ya yA ta raHs+yuHpa raspa raM/_/pra dzA ba tI b+h+rA tr-i dzA yA mA tu lA nI tu mA tu lI/_/pa ti pat+n+yoHpra sUHshwa shruHswa shu rastu pi tA ta yoH/_/pi tr-i b+h+rA tA pi tr-i byaHs+yAt+mA tr-i b+h+rA tA tu ma tu laH/_/_
[\[172a.2\]]@#/_/mo gnyid mo dang /_/tsha bo tsha yug bu bdag skyes/_/chung ma sring mo sde tshan gyi/_/yA ta ra ni phan tshun du/_/pra dzA ba tI skud po'i chung /_/zhang po'i chung ma mA tu lI/_/khyo shug ma ni sgyug mo dang /_/gyos po zhes pa pha'i yin no/_/pha yi spun dang a khu'o/_/ma yi sbun dang zhang po'o/_/_

[\[172a.4\]]s+yA la chung ma'i sbun zla'o/_/bdag po'i spun tshang de ba rau/_/swa sri ya ni sring mo'i bu/_/dza ma tA ni bu mo'i khyo/_/phas mchod pha yi pha dang mes/_/de yi pha dang yang mes po/_/phyi mo dang ni yang phyi mo/_/mtshun mchod pa dang rigs rgyud do/_/skyes gnas mtshungs dang ming sring dang /_/tshangs pa
[\[172a.5\]]dzAHsa mAH/_/sha go tra bAn+d+ha ba dz+nyA ti ban+d+hu swa swa dza nAHsa mAH/_/dz+nyA te yaM ban+d+hu tA te k+ShAM kra mAd+b+hA ba sa mU ha yoH/_/d+ha baHpri yaHpa tir+b+har+t+tA dzA rastU pa pa tiHsa mau/_/_
[\[172a.6\]]lhan cig skyes pa mtshungs/_/de yi rigs dang 'brel ba dang /_/nye du rtsa lag rang rigs dang /_/gnyen 'dab rnams ni mtshungs pa'o/_/snag gi gnyen mtshams nye 'brel te/_/de rnams go rims tshogs pa'o/_/rab tu dga' byed tsha byed dang /_/bdag po 'gegs byed rtsa lag byed/_/khyo bo
[\[172b\]]
[\[172b.1\]]a mr-i te dzA dzaHkuN+Do po mr-i te b+har+t+ta ri go la kaH/_/b+h+rA trI yA b+h+rA tr-i dzo b+h+rA tr-i b+ha gi n+yau b+h+rA ta rA bu b+hau/_/mA tA pi ta rau pi ta rau mA ta ra pi ta rau tsa tA ta bu b+ho dza na pi t+r+yau/_/shwa shru shwa shu rau shwa shu rau bu trau pu trash+tsa du hi tA tsa/_/dam+pa tI dzam+pa
[\[172b.2\]]rnams ni mtshungs pa'o/_/khyo ma shi yi rtsa lag skyes/_/kuN+Do ma shi gso go la/_/sring mo lcam mo las skyes dang /_/spun zla sring mo spun dag gnyis/_/pha ma dag ni pi ta rau/_/pha ma gnyi ga skyed byed dag_/gyos sgyug dag ni shwa shu rau/_/bu dang bu mo'ang bu dag go/_/bza' mi khyo shug khyim thab dang /_

[\[176b.1\]]byA mo bA hwoHsa ka ra yosta ta yo stir+Ya gan+ta raM/_/Ur+d+h+wa bis+t+r-i ta doHpA Ni nr-i mA nai pau ru ShaM tri Shu/_/kaN+Tho ga lo\u0f85tha grI bA yAM shi ro d+hiHkan+d+ha re t+ya pi/_/kam+bu grI bA tri re khA sA\u0f85ba Tur+g+hA TA kr-i kA Ti kA/_/bak+t+rA s+ye ba

[\[181b.1\]]nu dz+nyaHsa mA br-it+taHsu twA twa b+hi Sha bai kr-i te/_/kAn+tAn+te ba si nau shi Sh+yai shai k+ShAHprA tha ma kalpi kAH/_/e ka brah+ma bra tA tsA ra mi thas+sa bra h+ma tsA ri NaH/_/sa tIr+th+yAsh+tse ka gu ra bash+tsi ta bA na g+ni ma g+ni tsita/_/pA raM par+Yo pa
[\[181b.2\]]bka' yis rjes gnang thob/_/su twA mngon bar khrus byas thob/_/sgrib byed nyer gnas slob ma'o/_/shik+ShA dang por rtog pa bslabs/_/gcig pu tshangs pa'i brtul zhugs spyod/_/tshangs par spyod dang bcas pa'o/_/sa tIr+th+yA ni bla ma gcig_/me 'dzin ag+ni tsi ta'o/_/brgyud pa nyer bstan
[\[181b.3\]]de she s+yA dai ti ng+yu mi ti hA bya yaM/_/u pA dz+nyA dz+nyA na mA d+yaM s+yAt+dz+nyA twA raM b+ha u pa kra maH/_/ya dz+nyaHsa bo\u0f85d+ha ro yA gaHsap+ta tan+tur+m+ma khaHkra tuH/_/pA Tho ho mash+tsA ti thI naM sa par+YA tar+YA tar+Ya naM ba liH/_/e taiHpany+tsa ma hA ya dz+nyA bra h+ma ya
[\[181b.4\]]i ti h+ya/_/mi zad nyer shes ye shes rgyags/_/dz+nyA twa rtsom pa'i rim pa'o/_/mchod sbyin sbyin sreg a d+ha ro/_/mchod sbyin dang ni rgyud bdun pa/_/klog dang sbyin sreg gsar 'ongs mchod/_/mtshun gsol ba dang gtor ma dang /_/de rnams mchod sbyin chen po lnga/_/tshangs pa'i
[\[181b.5\]]dz+nyA ni nA ma kai/_/sa ma dz+yA pa ri Shang+goSh+ThI sa b+hA sa mi ti saM sa daH/_/As+thA ni klI ba mas+thA ni s+t+rI na puM sa ka yoHsa daH/_/prAg+bad+shaHprAg+g+ha birge hA t+sa da s+ya bi d+ha daR+shi naH/_/sa b+hA sa daHsa b+hAstA rAHsa b+h+yAHsA mA dzi kAsh+tsa te/_/_
[\[181b.6\]]mchod sbyin la sogs zhes/_/tshangs pa 'khor mang 'dus pa dang /_/sa b+hA tshogs pa khyu dang ni/_/phung po ma ning as+thA ni/_/mo dang ma ning 'dus pa'o/_/dang po'i brgyud pa dang po la/_/'tshogs nas cho ga lta ba'o/_/'dun sar tshogs dang 'dun sar rgyu/_/tshogs pa spyi yi ming yin no/_/_

[\[182a.1\]]a d+h+waR+YAng+ga tr-i ho tA ro ya dzuHsA mar+g+bi daHkra mA ta/_/ag+nId+h+rA d+yA d+ha nairbA yA r-i twi dzo yA dza kAsh+tsa te/_/be diHpa ris+t+r-i ta b+hU miHsa mes+thaN+Di la tsa twa re/_/tsa ShA lo yU pa ka Ta kaHkum+bA su ga ha nA
[\[182a.2\]]@#/_/a d+h+wa r+YU ng+gA tr-i ho tA ro/_/mchod sbyin snyan tshig rig byed rim/_/ag+nI d+h+rA la sogs pa yi/_/nor spyod mchod sbyin yA dza kA/_/rig byed sa gzhi yongs su bcos/_/mtshungs pas gzhi grub bzhi pa/_/tsa ShA la ni phyugs btags shing /_/bum pa shin tu
[\[182a.3\]]br-i tiH/_/yU pa gran+tar+m+ma nar+m+man+th+ya da ru Ni twa ra Nir+d+wa yoH/_/dak+Shi NAg+nirgAr+ha pa t+yA ha ba nI yau tra yog+na yaH/_/ag+ni tra ya mi daM tre tA pra NI taHsaMskr-i to\u0f85na laH/_/sa mU dz+yaHpa ri tsA y+Yo pa tsA dz+yA bag+naupra yo gi NaH/_/yo gAr+ha
[\[182a.4\]]bskor ba'i khyim/_/srog shing rtse mo tarma'o/_/gtsub shing gtsug stan ar Na gnyis/_/lho yi me dang khyim gyi me/_/ha ba nI yo me gsum pa/_/me 'di gsum la tre tA'o/_/pra NI ta ni legs sbyar me/_/yongs bsags nyer bsags sa mU dz+ya/_/me yi ming la rab sbyor ro/_/gang zhig

[\[182b.1\]]k+ShI re s+yAd+da d+hi yo ga taH/_/d+ha bi traM bya dza naM ta d+ya da tsi taM mr-i ga tsar+m+ma NA/_/pU Sha dA dz+yaM sa da d+h+nyA dz+ye pa ra mAn+naM tu pA ya saH/_/ha bya ka bye dai ba pai tre yan+ne pA traM sru pA di kaM/_/d+h+ru bo pa b+h+r-i dz+dzahU nA tu s+yu be b+ha dAHshru

[\[184a.1\]]bA da na mi t+yu b+he/_/b+hik+ShuHba ri brAT+kar+m+maM dI pA rA shar+Y+Ye pi maska rI/_/ta pa swI tA pa saHpA ra kAM k+ShI bA tsa ya mo mu niH/_/ta ba kle sha sa ho dAn+to bar+N+Ni no brah+ma tsa ri NaH/_/r-i Sha yaHsa t+ya ba tsa saHsnA

[\[184b.1\]]sA ma ya d+h+wan+si dza pyaM tri Sh+wa g+ha maR+Sha NaM/_/daR+shash+tsa paur+Na mA sash+tsa yA gau pa k+ShAn+ta yo pr-i tha ka/_/sa rI ra sA d+ha nA pe k+ShaM ni t+yaM yat+kar+m+ma tang+Ya maH/_/ni ya mastu sa yat+kar+m+mA ni t+ya mA gaM tu sA d+ha naM/_/u ba bI taM yadz+nya sU traM brod+d+h+r-i te

[\[185a\]]
[\[185a.1\]]k+Sha ta bra taH/_/sup+te yasmin+na sta me ti sup+te yasmin+nu de ti tsa/_/aM su mA na b+hi ni muk+tA b+h+yu ti tau tau ya thA kra maM/_/pa ri tset+tAnyanu dzonyanU D+he dz+yeSh+The dA ra pa ri gra hA ta/_/pa ri bit+ti stu tadz+dz+yA yaM n+wi bA ho pa ya mai sa mau/_/ta thA pa ri Na yo dwA ho

[\[185b\]]
[\[185b.1\]]sAsti yash+tsA dz+nya yA ra dz+nyaHsa sa mrA Da tha ra dza kaM/_/rA dza n+ya kany+tsa nr-i pa tik+Sha t+t+ri yA NAM ga Ne kra mAtaH/_/man+t+rI d+hI ma tsi bo\u0f85mA t+yo\u0f85n+ye kar+m+ma sa tsi bAsta taH/_/ma hA mA t+r+yaHpra d+hA nA ni pu ro d+hA stu bu ro ti taH/_/draSh+Ta ri bya ba
[\[185b.2\]]bstan bcos dang /_/bka' lung rgyal po dag pa'i rgyal/_/rgyal po'i tshogs pa rgyal po rnams/_/mi bdag rgyal rigs tshogs pa'i rim/_/bka' dbang gros pa blon po dang /_/gzhan ni las dang lhan cig spyod/_/blon po chen po gtso bo dang /_/blon po dang ni mdun na 'don/_/nang blon can dang khrims

[\[185b.5\]]naiski kaH/_/an+ta pu re twa d+hi kr-i taHs+yA dan+tarba shi ko dza naH/_/sau bi dal+lAHkany+tsu ki naHs+thA pa t+yaHsau bi dAsh+tsa te/_/shaN+To baR+Sha ba rastu l+yAHse ba kAr+th+ya nu dzI bi naH/_/bi Sha yA nan+to ro rA dza sha trur+m+mit+t+ra ma taHpa raM/_/u dA sI naHpa ra ta
[\[185b.6\]]dngul gnyer pa/_/nang mi pho brang nang pa dang /_/nang na gnas pa'i skye bo'o/_/btsun mo'i sku srung ra'i gu can/_/gnas brtan dang ni nyung rum pa/_/ma ning nyams pa zam mtshungs/_/zhabs thog pa dang 'tsho ba ba/_/yul mthar gnas pa'i rgyal po dgra/_/de yi pha rol bshes yin no/_/u dA sI na bar gnas yul/_/_
[\[186a\]]
[\[186a.1\]]raHpASh+Nigra hastu pr-iSh+Tha taH/_/ri pau be ri sa pa pat+nA ri dwiSha dweSh+Na du hr-i daH/_/dwiT+bi pak+Sha hi tA mi tra da s+yu shA tra ba sa tra ba/_/a b+hi g+hA ti ba rA rA ti pra t+yar+thi pa ri pan+thi naH/_/ba ya pyaHsnig+d+haHsa

[\[190a.1\]]kany+tsu ko bA ra bA No\u0f85s+t+rI yat+tu ma d+h+ye sa kany+tsu kAH/_/ba d+h+nan+ti ta t+sA ra sa nA bi kAng+ge a tha shIR+Sha kaM/_/shIR+Sha N+ya ny+tsa si ras+t+re a tha ta nu traM bar+m+ma daM sha naM/_/u rash+tsa daHkang+ka Ta ko dza ga raH ka ba tse\u0f85s+t+ri yAM/_/A muk+taHpra ti muk+ta sh+tsa pi

[\[190a.3\]]dwash+tsA pi na bad/_/saM nad+d+ho bar+m+mi taHsadz+dzo daM shi to s+yU Ta kaM ka TaH/_/triSh+wA muk+tA da yo bar+m+ma br-i tAM kA ba tsi kang+ga Ne/_/pa dA ti pat+ti pa dag pA dA bi ka pa dA dza yaH/_/pang+ga sh+tsa pa di ka sh+tsA tha pA dA taM pat+ti saM ha ti/_/sas+t+rA dzI be kAN+DA spr-i Sh+TA yu d+hI yA yu d+hi kAHsa
[\[190a.4\]]pa dang chas zhugs dang /_/go cha war mi ta ka'o/_/gsum ni ma grol la sogs pa/_/go cha can dang go tshogs pa/_/rkang thang rkang dmag rkang 'gros pa/_/pA dA bi ka rkang rgyu ba/_/pa da ga dang ba di ka/_/rkang thing tshogs dang dpung bu chung /_/mtshon chas 'tsho dang mtshon cha ba/_/'khrug mi dang ni gsos
[\[190a.5\]]mAH/_/kr-i ta hastaHsa pra yo ga bi Shi khaHkri ta puM kha ba ta/_/a pa rA dwa pr-i Sha sko sau lak+Sh+yA d+ya sh+ts+yu ta sA ya kaH/_/d+ha n+wI d+ha nu Sh+mAn+d+ha nu sko ni Shang+g+ya s+t+rI d+ha nung+d+ha raH/_/s+yAt+kAN+Da bAM stu kAN+Di raH shAk+tI kaHshak+ti he ti
[\[190a.6\]]po mtshungs/_/lag sbyangs rab dgos khyad par can/_/skyes bu dang ni sgyu rtsal mkhan/_/'ben las gzhan du mi 'gro ba'i/_/mda' shes pa dang mda' pa'o/_/gzhu can gzhu ldan gzhu pa dang /_/gzhu thogs pa dang gzhu 'dzin no/_/mda' can mda' ba mda' 'dzin pa/_/mdung can pa dang mdung
[\[190b\]]
[\[190b.1\]]kaH/_/ne yASh+TI ka pAr+sh+wa d+hi kau yaSh+Ti pa ra shu he ti kauH/_/nai s+t+rIM shi ko si he tiH s+yAtsha mau prA shi ka kau ti kau/_/tsar+m+mI pha la ka pA NiHs+yAt+pa tA kI bai dza yan+ti kaH/_/a nu bla baHsha hA yash+tsA nu tsa ronya b+hi sa raH sa mAH/_/_
[\[190b.2\]]'dzin pa/_/dbyig pa can dang ber ka can/_/dbyug pa dgra sta'i mtshon cha can/_/grib dang ni ral gri'i mtshon/_/mtshungs pa mdung can mdung mtshon can/_/tsar+m+mI lag na phub yin no/_/ba dan rnam rgyal ba dan dang /_/rjes 'jug phyi 'brang rjes su spyod/_/rting du 'brang dang mtshungs pa'o/_/sngon
[\[190b.3\]]bu ro gA gre sa ra praSh+ThA gra tas+sa ra pu raH sha rAH/_/pu ro ga maHpu ro gA man+da gA gA mI tu man+tha raH/_/dzaM g+hA lo nyas+t+ri dza bstu l+yo dzaM g+hA ka ri ka dzA g+hi kau_/ta ra swI twa ri to be gI pra dza bI dza ba no dza baH/_/dza yo yaHshakya te dze tuM dze yo
[\[190b.4\]]'gro mdun 'gro dang por 'gro/_/sna 'dor ba dang gdong 'gro dang /_/sngon du rgyu dang gdong ma'o/_/man ngag mI dal gyis 'gro/_/myur 'gro ba dang rgyug pa mnyam/_/bang chen pa dang dzAM g+hi ka/_/mgyogs dang myur du rgyug pa bang /_/rgyu ba dang ni rab tu bskyod/_/rgyal dang rgyal
[\[190b.5\]]dus dze tuM 'o/_/dze ya rgyal bar dze ta bya mA tra ke_/dzai trastu dze tA yo gats+tsha t+ya laM bi dwi Sha taHpra tiH/_/so\u0f85b+h+ya mi t+r+yo\u0f85b+h+ya mi trI yo\u0f85bya b+h+ya mi trI Na i t+ya pi/_/Ur+dz+dza swa laHs+yA dUr+dz+dza swI ya Ur+dz+dzo\u0f85ti sha yA n+wi taH/_/s+yA du ra swA nu ra si lo ra thi ko ra thi no ra thI/_/_

[\[191a\]]
[\[191a.1\]]mI no h+ya t+yan+tI nasta thA b+h+r-i shaM/_/shU ro bI rash+tsa bi krAn+to dze tA dziSh+Nush+tsa dzi twa raH/_/sAM yu gI no ra Ne sA d+huHshas+t+rA dzI bA da yas+t+ri Shu/_/d+h+wa dzi nI bA hi nI se nA pr-i ta nAnyanI ki nI tsa mUH/_/pa rU
[\[191a.2\]]@#/_/'gro/_/stan 'gro de bzhin rgyun du 'gro/_/dpa' dang rtul phod ngo la gnon/_/brjid can dang ni rgyal byed pa/_/g.yul na brjid dang legs pa dang /_/mtshon chas 'tsho ba la sogs gsum/_/rgyal mtshan dang ni bzhon pa dang /_/dmag dpon ru dang sde dang ni/_/dmag dang dpung

[\[191b\]]
[\[191b.1\]]shas+t+ra mas+t+ra ma thA s+t+ri yau/_/d+ha nush+tsA pau d+ha n+wa sha rA sa na kau daN+Da kArmu kaM_/iSh+ThA so\u0f85pya tha kar+N+Na s+ya kA la pr-iSh+ThaM sha rA sa naM/_/ka pi d+h+wa dza s+ya gAN+Di ba pAN+Di kau pun+na pun+sa ke_/ko Ti ra s+yA Ta nI go d+hA ta le dz+ya g+hA ta bA ra Ne/_/lasta kastu d+ha

[\[192a\]]
[\[192a.1\]]yaH/_/kok+Sha ya ka maN+Da lA graHka ra bA laH kr-i pA Na bta/_/t+sa ruHkhaD+gA di muSh+Tau s+yAt+me kha lA tan+na ban+d+ha naM/_/pha la ko\u0f85s+t+rI pha laM tsar+m+ma saM gra ho muSh+Ti ra s+ya yaH/_/dru g+ha No mung+ga ra g+ha Nau s+yA dI lI ka ra pha li kAH/_/b+hin+di pA laHsr-i gastu l+yau pa ri
[\[192a.2\]]@#/_/rdeg cha dang /_/maN+Da la rtse lag pa bskyed/_/kr-i pA Na 'dra bse ru'o/_/ral gri'i yu ba chang zung ngo /_/de yi 'ching thag ske rags so/_/phub ni mo min pha la'o/_/tsar ma bsdus nas lag 'dzin pa/_/tho ba 'joms byed g+ha na'o/_/sked gri ka ra pha li kA/_/'bigs skyong mdung dang mnyam

[\[192a.6\]]sarbog+ha/_/kun gyi go gyon bsdogs byed pa/_/go gsar dang ni go cha bgos/_/rgyal po dmag la mnga' gsol byed/_/gang zhig dmag 'gro de dbang bskur/_/dmag thegs bskyod dang 'degs pa dang /_/zhugs pa 'gro ba ga ma'o/_/brkyangs pa dang ni ru bskyangs dang /_/pha rol dmag na
[\[192b\]]
[\[192b.1\]]li tAr+tha kaM_/a hi tA na pra t+ya b+hI ta s+ya ra Ne ya na ma ti kra maH/_/bai tA li kA bo d+ha ka rAsh+tsAkri kA g+hAN+Ti kAr+tha kAH/_/s+yur+m+mA ga d+hAstu ma d+hu kA ban+di naHstu ti pA Tha kAH/_/saM sap+ta kAstu sa ma yAt+saM grA mA da ni bar+t+ti naH/_/re

[\[193a\]]
[\[193a.1\]]kra ma prA Nau bi kra mas+t+wa ti shak+ti tA/_/bI ra pA nan+tu yat+pA naM br-it+te b+ha bi ni bA ra Ne/_/yud+d+ha mA yo d+ha naM dza n+yaM pra d+ha naM pra bi dA ra NaM/_/mr-i d+ha mA skand naM saM khyaM sa mI kaM sAm+ba ra yi kaM_/as+t+ri

[\[193a.4\]]'dzings mnyam shi a NI ka_/g.yul du 'thab mo bi gra hau/_/'phrog 'joms dge bral rtsod pa dang /_/shin tu 'dral dang saM yu ga_/mngon par nyed dang rdeg gsod dang /_/sa mu da ya 'thab 'khrug long /_/mi bde g.yul 'gyed a dzi dang /_/sa mi t+sa d+ha zhes pa'o/_/mtshon bral gyad kyi
[\[193a.5\]]bA hu yu d+he s+yAt+ta mu laM ra Na saM ku laM/_/k+Sh+we DA tu siM ha nA daHs+yAt+ka ri NA g+ha Ti nA g+hA TAH/_/kran+da naM yod+d+h+r-i saM rA be br-iM hi taM ka ri gardzi taM/_/bis+phA ro d+ha nu ShaHswA naHpa Ta hA Dam+ba rau sa mau/_/pra sa b+hastu bA lAt+ka

[\[193b.1\]]ro ha Nenyad+h+was+kha li ti ka laM/_/a dza n+yaM klI ba mud+pA ta u pa sar+g+gaH sa maM tra yaM/_/mur+ts+tsha tu kash+ma laM mo ho pya ba mar+d+dastu pI Da NaM/_/a b+h+ya bskaM da naM twa b+h+yA sa da naM bi dza yo dza yaH/_/bai ra shud+d+h+riHpra tI ka ro bai ra Ni r+Y+'a
[\[193b.2\]]de nas 'khrul dang nor ba dang /_/mi shes ma ning ltas byung dang /_/nyer bsgyur dang ni mtshungs pa gsum/_/brgyal dang myos dang 'bog pa'o/_/mnar ba dang ni 'tshir ba dang /_/rmas pa dang ni lus nyams so/_/rgyal ba dang ni rnam par rgyal/_/'gras dang rtsen dang slar byed dang /_/'khon
[\[193b.3\]]ta nany+tsa sA/_/pra drA bod+d+rA ba saM drA baHsaM dra bo bi dra bo dra baH/_/a pa kra mo pa yA naM tsa ra Ne b+haM gaH pa rA ja yaH/_/pa rA dzi taHpa rA b+hU tau tri Shu naSh+Ta ti ro hi tau/_/pra mA pa nin+na rbar+ha NaM ni kA ra NaM bi sA ra NaM/_/_
[\[193b.4\]]zhugs pa dang sha khon zhugs/_/bros dang zhogs dang bur ba dang /_/saM dra ba bi dra bo dra ba/_/a pa kra mo bros pa'i ming /_/g.yul du bcom dang gzhan las rgyal/_/'pham pa dang ni pha rol rgyal/_/yib pa dang ni skyabs pa'o/_/'joms dang rdeg dang rdung ba dang /_/rnam 'tshe 'tshe dang bsnun
[\[193b.5\]]pra bA sha naM pa rA sa naM ni sUd ni Ni hiM sa naM/_/nir+b+bA sha naM saM dz+nye pa naM ni r+g+ran+tha na ma pA sa naM/_/nistar+ha NaM ni ha na naM k+Sha Na naM pa ri brdza naM/_/nir+b+bA pa naM bi shA sa na mA ra NaM pra ti g+hA ta naM/_/ut+pA sa naM pra ma tha naM kra tha no dz+nyA
[\[193b.6\]]pa dang /_/bzhus dang nyer gtses mnar ba dang /_/nor ba nyed pa gos med dang /_/brdungs gtag ngo 'joms nges par gsod/_/skad cig dang ni yongs su spangs/_/nges par 'debs dang rnam par 'chos/_/gsod dang so sor 'joms pa dang /_/ut+pA sa naM rab tu 'joms/_/'tshe ba
[\[194a\]]
[\[194a.1\]]sa nA ni tsa/_/A laM b+ha piM dza bi sha ra g+hA tan+man+tha ba d+hA a pi/_/s+yAt+pany+tsa tA kA la d+har+m+mA dr-iSh+TAn+taH pra la yo\u0f85t+ya yaH/_/an+to nA sho dra yo r+m+r-i t+yur+m+ma ra NaM ni d+ha no\u0f85s+t+ri yAM/_/pa rA su prAp+ta
[\[194a.2\]]@#/_/byed dang dz+nyA sa na ni/_/dmigs pa piM dza rnam 'joms gtum/_/de rnams gsod gcod rnam grangs so/_/lnga pa dus chos lta ba'i mtha'/_/skal 'jog 'tshe 'gro mtha' ma dang /_/chud 'dza' gnyis te tshe 'da' dang /_/'chi byed bcings pa mo min no/_/pha rol 'das dang
[\[194a.3\]]pany+tsa twa pa re ta pre ta saMs+thi tAH/_/mr-i ta pra mI tau tri Sh+we te tsi tA tsi t+yAM tsi tiH s+t+ri yaH/_/ka ban+d+ho\u0f85s+t+rI kri yA yuk+ta ma pa mUr+d+ha ka le ba raM/_/sh+ma shA naM s+yAt+pi tr-iM ba naM ku NA paHsha ba mas+t+ri yAM/_/pra gra ho pa gra hau baM d+yAM kA ra s+yAd+ban+d+ha nA
[\[194a.4\]]lnga po nyid/_/pha rol song dang yi dgas gnas/_/ro dang tshe 'das gsum zhes so/_/ro thab sgong phug tsi ti mo/_/ka ban d+ha ni mo min te/_/bya ldan mgo med ro yin no/_/dur khrod dang ni gshin gyi nags/_/ro dang shi ba mo min no/_/gdon dang 'byung po 'ching byed do/_/kA ra s+yAd ni 'ching
[\[194a.5\]]la ye/_/puM si b+hUm+n+ya sa baHprA NAsh+tsai baM dzI bonyasu d+hA ra NaM/_/A yurdzI bi ta kA lo nA dzI bA tu dzI bi tau Sha d+haM/_/k+Sha tri ya bar+g+gaH//_!_//U ru byA U ru dzA R+YA bai s+yA b+hU mi spr-i sho bi shaH/_/A dzI bo dzI di kA ba r+t+tA
[\[194a.6\]]byed gnas/_/skyes bus srog brA Na'o/_/de bzhin 'tsho dang gson pa dang /_/tshe ni ji srid 'tsho ba'i dus/_/skyes bu 'tsho byed 'tsho ba'i sman/_/rgyal rigs kyi sde'o//_!_//brlas byung brla skyes 'phags pa dang /_/rje rigs 'dzin rje'u'o/_/kun 'tsho 'tsho ba brtA dang /_/gson
[\[194b\]]
[\[194b.1\]]br-it+ti rbar+t+ta na dzI ba ne/_/s+t+ri yAM kr-i ShiHpa' shu pA l+yaM bA ni dz+yaM tse ti br-it+ta yaH/_/se bAsh+tsa br-ir+t+ti ra nr-i taM kr-i Shi runy+tsa shi laM tw-i taM/_/dwe yA tsi tA yA tsi ta R+Ya thA saM khyaM mr-i tA mr-i te/_/sa t+yA nr-i taM ba Nig+b+hA baHs+yAd+d+r-i NaM ya R+Yu dany+tsa naM/_/_
[\[194b.2\]]byed so ni 'tsho tshis so/_/gsum yin rmo rko dud 'gro skyong /_/tshong dang 'tsho ba'i tshis zhes bya/_/zhabs thog pa ni khyi'i 'tsho/_/rmo rko dang ni phru rlog dang /_/ston thog dang ni lo thog go_/bya tshol dang ni slong mo pa/_/ji ltar bden dang tshong dngos po/_/bun dang skyag dang bde 'tsho dang /_
[\[194b.3\]]ud+d+hA ronyar+tha pra yo gastu ku shI daM br-id+d+hi dzI bi kA_/yAts+nya yASh+Ta yA tsi ta kaM ni ma yA dA pa mi t+ya kaM_/ut+ta mar+N+NA d+har+m+mar+N+Nau d+hau pra yo k+t+r-i gra ha ko kra mAta/_/ku shI di ko bAr+d+hu Shi ko br-id+d+h+yA dzI bash+tsa bar+d+hu Shi/_/k+She tra dzA baHkaR+Sha kash+tsa kr-i ShI kash+tsa ShI

[\[194b.5\]]ba laH/_/k+Shai traM bai hi yaM shA le yaM br-I hi shA l+Yud+b+hA bo tsi taM/_/ya byaM ya bkyaM ShaSh+Ti kyaM ya bA di b+ha ba naM ha tata/_/ti l+yaM tai lI na ban+mA Sho mA nu b+had+gA dwi ru pa tA/_/maung+gI na kau dra bI nA de se Sha d+hA n+yod+b+ha pa k+Sha maM/_/bI dzA kr-i taM tUp+ta kr-iSh+TaM sI t+yaM

[\[195a.1\]]kriSh+Tany+tsa ha l+ya ba ta/_/tri gu NA kr-i taM tr-i ya kr-i taM tr-i ha l+ya tri sI t+ya ma pi ta smin/_/dwi gu NA kr-i te tu sar+b+baM pUr+b+baM sam+ba kr-i ta ma pI ha/_/dro NA D+ha kA di bA pA dau drau Ni kA D+ha ki kA da yaH/_/khA rI bA yastu
