[\[198b.4\]]bAta sa ka/_/khyu ba nog chen ma hok+Sha/_/br-id+d+ho k+Sha ni glang rgan no/_/nog skyes pa dang gsor nog 'chas/_/gnya' 'dul glang gsar 'dra ba'o/_/sha bcad ma ning sbyor ba'o/_/ma ning mkhan po pa ti ri/_/dpung pa'i phyogs ni ba ha'o/_/sA snA ske yi lkog shal lo/_/sna thag dang ni
[\[198b.5\]]pyo taHpraSh+Tha bA d+yu ga pAr+sh+wa gaH/_/yu gA dI nAn+tu bo TA ro yu gya prA sad+g+ya shA ka TAH/_/kha na ti de na tad+bo D+hA nyas+ye daM hA li ka sai ra kau/_/d+hUrba he d+huR+Ya d+ho re ya d+hu rI NAHsa d+hu ran+d+ha rAH/_/u b+hA be ka d+hu rI Nai ka d+hu rA
[\[198b.6\]]kha thag go/_/rgyab len 'gro dang khur 'gro ba/_/gnya'i shing la sogs po TA ro/_/gnya' shing gnya' 'dul shing rta 'dren/_/rmod byed gcod byed 'khru byed pa/_/gshol ldan rmo glang khab glang dang /_/rgal dang khal pa khur 'dren pa/_/gnyis po gcig ni khur theg pa/_/gcig
[\[199a\]]
[\[199a.1\]]be ka d+hu rA ba he/_/sa tu sar+b+ba d+hu rI NaHs+yAd+Yo bai sarba d+hu rA ba haH/_/mA he yI sau ra yI gau tu srA mA ta tsa shr-iM gi NI/_/a dza n+yaT+m+yA ro hi NI s+yA dut+ta mA gau Shu nai tsi kI_/bar+N+Na di te dA t+saM dz+nyAHs+yuHsha ba lI d+ha ba lA
[\[199a.2\]]@#/_/theg gcig pus 'dren pa'o/_/kun gyi khur theg dul ma dang /_/khur kun 'dren par nus pa'o/_/ba mo ba dang gau tu swA/_/mchod byed ma dang rwa ldan ma/_/mchod pa mchod yon ro hi NI/_/ba lang mchog ni nai tsi kI_/kha dog la sogs dbye ba'i ming /_/khra mo dkar
[\[199a.3\]]da yaH/_/dwi hA ya nI dwi baR+ShA go re kAb+dA twe ka ha yi nI/_/tsa tu rab+dA tsa tur+hA ya n+ye ba t+r+yab+dA ti hA ya ni/_/ba shA ban+d+h+yanyab to kA tu shra brgar+b+hA tha san+d+hi nI/_/A krAn+tA br-i Sha b+he nAnyatha be had+ga r+Sh+To pa g+hA ti NI/_/kalpo pa saR+YA
[\[199a.4\]]po la sogs pa/_/lo gnyis ma dang lo gnyis pa/_/lo gcig ma dang lo gcig pa/_/la bzhi ma dang lo bzhi pa/_/lo gsum ma dang lo gsum pa/_/be'u med dang skam pa mo/_/a ba to ka be'u shor/_/de nas she dang khyu mchog sbyor/_/de nas lo be khu ru ma/_/dus thob 'khor ma dus
[\[199a.5\]]pra dza ne praSh+Thau hI bA la gar+b+hi NI/_/s+yA da da tsaN+DI tu su ka rA ba hu sU tiHpa reSh+Na kA_/tsi ra sU tA ba k+Sha ya NI d+he nuHs+yAn+na ba sU ti kA_/su bra tA su kha san+do h+yA pI no d+h+nI pI ba rasta nI/_/dro Na k+ShI rA dro Na du g+hA d+he nuSh+pA ban+d+ha ke s+thi tA/_/sa mAM sa
[\[199a.6\]]ldan ma/_/mngal thob ma dang be'u ma'o/_/la tsaN+DI ni dul ma'o/_/be mangs ma dang lo be ma/_/be yun ring ba bak+Sh+ya NI/_/d+he nu be'u gsar skyes so/_/sprin pa dang ni 'jo bde ma/_/nu 'thung 'thung mi nu ma'o/_/dro Na k+ShI ra bre chen bzhod/_/'dogs thag 'ching thag stan byed pa/_/lo re zhing yang
[\[199b\]]
[\[199b.1\]]mI nA sA yai ba pra ti bar+thaM pra sU ya te/_/U d+hastu klI ba mA pI naM sa mau shi ba ka kI la kau_/na puM si dA ma san+dA naM pa shu radz+dzu stu dA ma nI/_/bai shA khA man+tha man+thA na man+thA no man+tha daN+Da ke_/ku Tha ro daN+Da beSh+kam+b+ho nI mar+g+ga rI sa me/_/uSh+Te ku me
[\[199b.2\]]skye ba'o/_/lo btud skye dang slar skye ma/_/U d+ha ma ning mA pI naM/_/brtod pa'i shing dang phur pa'o/_/pho min thag pa 'dogs thag go/_/phyugs thag rkang thag dA ma nI/_/srub ma srub shing man+thA na/_/srub ma dang ni zho skya'o/_/srub ma'i ka ba ku Tharo/_/zho rdza srub pa'i rdza dag mtshungs/_/rnga mo rigs can
[\[199b.3\]]la ka ma ya mA hAd+gAHka ra b+haH shi shuH/_/ka ra b+hAHs+yuHshr-ing+kha la kA dA ra baiH bA ra ban+d+ha naiH/_/a dzAts+tshA gIstu b+ha ts+tsha ga bsta ts+tsha ga la kA a dzaH/_/meN+Do ra b+h+ro ra Nor+NA yu me Sha tr-iSh+Na ya e Da kAH/_/uSh+To ra b+h+rA dza br-in+de s+yA dauSh+Ta kau rab+h+rA ko dza kaM_/_
[\[199b.4\]]rang bzhin dang /_/lus chen rde'u rde phrug go/_/rde'u 'dogs thag shr-ing+kha la/_/shing la rkang pa'i 'dogs pa'o/_/ra dang ts+tshA gi tshe tshe dang /_/ra dang sba 'phyang ma skyes pa/_/lug dang lto 'phyang bal ldan dang /_/g.yang dkar dang ni e Da kA_/rnga mo brang 'gro tshogs dang khyu/_/rnga khyu gsus 'phyang ko dza kaM_/_
[\[199b.5\]]tsakrI ban+tastu bA le yA ra sa b+hA gard b+hAHkha rAH/_/bai da ha kaH sAr+tha bA ho nai ga mA bA ni jo bA Ni ka_/pa N+yA dzI bo h+yA pa Ni kaHkra ya bi kra yi kash+tsa saH/_/bi kre tA s+yA dwi kra yi kaHkrA ya kaHkra yi kaHsa mau/_/bA ni dz+yan+tu ba Ni dz+yA
[\[199b.6\]]bong bu 'khor lo can stobs ldan/_/sna chen skad chen kha ra'o/_/gzhan skyes ded dpon nges 'gro dang /_/tshong dpon tshong ba zong 'tshong dang /_/zong pa dang ni nyo 'tshong ngo /_/'tshong ba bi kra yi ka'o/_/rnam par rje dang rnam par 'tshong /_/tshong pa dang ni tshong byed mtshungs/_/btsong bye ba Ni dz+ya yin no/_/_
[\[200a\]]
[\[200a.1\]]s+yAt+mu l+yaM bsno pya ba kra yaH/_/ni bI pa ri pa NaM mU la d+hanaM lA b+honyad+hi kaM pha laM/_/pra ti dA naM ba ri bar+t+to bai me ya ni ma yA ma yi/_/pu mA nu pa Ni d+hir+n+yA saHpa ri dA naM ta darba NaM/_/kra ye pra sA ri taM kra y+YaM kra yaM kre ta
[\[200a.2\]]@#/_/rin dang gzhal bya ba kra ya/_/zong dang tshong dngos rtsa nor dang /_/rnyed pa lhag pa'i 'bras bu can/_/so sor byin dang yongs su bsgyur/_/brje ba dang ni sgyur ba'o/_/skyes bus gtams pa bcol ba'o/_/slar blangs dang ni gtad pa'o/_/tshong zong bkram pa kra y+YaM'o/_/kre ya gzhal
[\[200a.3\]]bya mA tra ke_/bi kre yaM pa Ni ta byany+tsa pa N+yaM kra y+YA da yas+t+ri Shu/_/klI be sha t+yA pa naM sha t+yaM kAraHsa t+yAkr-itiHs+t+riyAM/_/bi pa no bi kra yaHsaM khyAHsaM khyo yeh+yA da shatri Shu/_/bi sa t+yA d+yAHsa dai ka twe sar+b+bAHsaM khye ya saM khya yoH/_/saM khyAr+the dwi
[\[200a.4\]]bar bya ba'o/_/rnam par brje pa'i tha snyad dang /_/tshong dang nyo tshong la sogs gsum/_/ma ning bden zong bden byed dang /_/bden byas bud med 'tshed dang 'tshong /_/grangs dang bgrang bya bcu ni gsum/_/nyi shu la sogs thams cad gcig_/bgrang bya dang ni grangs dag go/_/grangs don gnyis
[\[200a.5\]]ba hu twe stastA su tA na ba teHs+t+ri yaH/_/paM k+teHsha ta sha ha srA di kra mAd+da sha gu Not+ta raM/_/bai ta ban+du ba yaM pA y+Ya mi ti mA NAr+tha ka tra yaM/_/mA nAM tu lAM gu li pras+the rguny+dzAHbany+tsA d+ya mA Sha kaH/_/to Sho Da shA k+ShaHkaR+Shonyas+t+rI pa laM kaR+Sha
[\[200a.6\]]dang mang po'i tshig_/dgu bcu pa ni mo min no/_/'phreng ni brgya dang stong la sogs/_/rim pa bcu 'gyur phyi ma'o/_/'jal byed mnyam byed tshad byad ces/_/tshad kyi don ni gsum yin no/_/'jal byed srang dang ser dang bre/_/ma tu lnga sogs mA sha ka_/de rnams bcu drug zho yin te/_/zho bzhi srang
[\[200b\]]
[\[200b.1\]]tsa tuSh+Ta yaM/_/su bar+N+NA bistau he m+no k+She ku ru bistastu tat+pa le/_/tu lA sti yAM pa la sha taM b+hA ra s+yAd+biM sha tistu lAH/_/A tsi taM da sha b+ha rAHs+yuHsA ka To b+ha ra A tsi taH/_/kaR+ShA pa NaHkaR+ShikaHs+yAt+kA R+Shi ke tA mr-i ke pa NaH/_/as+t+ri yA mA D+ha kadro Nau
[\[200b.2\]]ngo mo min no/_/gser 'jam zho cha gser mig go/_/ku ru bsti de yi srang /_/mnyam byed mo min srang brgya la/_/khur yin nyi shu tham pa ni/_/A bi taM zer/_/srang ngo A tsi taM khur bcu/_/shing rta khur rta A tsi ta/_/kar ShA pa Na dong tshe yin/_/zangs ma'i dong tshe kAR+Shi kai_/mo min bre bo A D+ha ka_/bre dang khA ri
[\[200b.3\]]khI rI ba ho ni kuny+tsa kaH/_/ku Da baHpras+tha i t+yA d+yA pa ri mA NAr+tha kAHpr-i tha ka_/pA dastu rI yo b+hA gaHs+yA daM sha b+hA go tu baN+Ta ke_/drabyaM bit+ta swA te yaM r-ik+tha mrak+tha d+ha naM ba tsa su/_/hi ra N+yaM dra ba na d+yusna mar+tha re bi b+ha bA a pi/_/s+yAt+ko
[\[200b.4\]]bA ha ni/_/ni kuny+tsa ka zhes pa'o/_/ku Da ba ni bre la sogs/_/yongs su 'jal byed so so'o/_/rkang pa dang ni gcig cha yin/_/cha dang cha shas 'god pa'o/_/rdzas dang yo byad nor dang ni/_/'byor pa dngos po dkor dang rdzas/_/dbyig dang zang zing longs spyod don/_/nor dang dngos po nyid kyang ngo /_/mdzod
[\[200b.5\]]Shash+tsa hi ra N+yany+tsa he ma ru pya kr-i tA kr-i te/_/tA b+h+yA ma ya du n+ya tut+ku pyaM ta d+d+wa ya mA ha taM/_/gA rut+ma taM ma raka ta masma gar+b+haM ha rin+ma NiH/_/so Na rat+naM lo hi ta kaHpad+ma rA gonyatha mok+ti kaM_/muk+ta\u0f85tha bi dru maHpuM si
[\[200b.6\]]dang rin chen gser gzugs dang /_/sgrom dang snod ces bya ba'o/_/de dang gang zhig gzhan mdzod dang /_/dngul dang de gnyis ma ha taM/_/mkha' lding gshog pa mar gad dang /_/rdo yi snying po nor bu ljang /_/rin chen dmar po lo hi ta/_/pad+ma rA ga de nas ni/_/mu tig dang ni muk+ta'o/_/de nas
[\[201a\]]
[\[201a.1\]]pra bA laM bun+na pun+sa kaM_/rat+naM me Nir+d+wa yo rasma dzA tau muk+tA di ke pi tsa/_/swAr+N+Na su bar+N+NaM ka na kaM hi raN+yaM he ma hA Ta kaM_/ta pa nI yaM shA ta kum+b+haM gAM ge yaM b+har+m+ma karbu raM/_/tsA mi ka raM dzA ta rU paM ma
[\[201a.2\]]@#/_/byi ru skyes bu ste/_/byi ru pho dang ma ning ngo /_/rin chen nor bu gnyis yin te/_/rdo skyes mu tig la sogs dang /_/gser dang mdog bzang ka na kaM_/rin chen he ma tshong dus 'drim/_/bsreg bya bum brgya gAM ga skyes/_/b+harma mdangs ldan sa le sbram/_/skyes gzugs kha dog
[\[201a.3\]]hA ra dza ta kAM tsa NaM/_/rug+maM kAr+t+ta swa raM dzAm+bU na da maSh+TA pa donyas+t+ri yAM/_/a laM kA raM su bar+N+NaM yats+tsh-id+gI ka na ka mi t+ya daH/_/durbar+N+NaM ra dza taM rU pya khardzU raM shwe ta mi t+ya pi/_/rI rIHs+t+ri pA mA ra kU Tonas+t+ri yA ma tha tA mra kaM_/shulwaM m+le ts+tsha mu kha d+w+yaSh+Tha ba riSh+Thau
[\[201a.4\]]chen po dang /_/mdag ldan 'od byed 'dzam bu yi/_/chu bo'i gser dang rkang brgya mo/_/rgyan gser gang zhig rwa can dang /_/ka na kaM zhes pa 'di'o/_/mdog ngan chon dang dngul dang ni/_kha rdzu ran dkar zhes pa yang /_/rI rI mo dang ra gan dang /_/de nas zangs dang shu lwaM dang /_/kla klo kha dang zangs ma dang /_/mchog
[\[201a.5\]]dum+ba riSh+Thau dum+ba rA Ni tsa/_/lo ho\u0f85s+t+rI sas+t+ra kaM tI k+Sh+NaM piN+DaM kA lA pa sA ya sI/_/ash+mA sA ro\u0f85tha maN+DU raM siM g+hA na ma pi tan+ma le/_/sar+b+bany+tsa tai dza saM lo haM bi kA ras+t+wa ya saHku shI/_/k+ShAraHkA tso\u0f85tha tsa pa lo ra sa sU tash+tsa pA ra de/_/ga ba laM mA
[\[201a.6\]]gnas dum+ba rA Ni'i/_/lcags ni mo min mtshon byed rno/_/gong bu nag po gar bu dang /_/rdo yi snying po de nas ni/_/so rdog lcags dreg dri ma'o/_/mdog can thams cad yang dag lcags/_/lcags kyi bye brag gshol lpags dang /_/mching bu g.yu gser de nas ni/_/rgyug byed dngul chu 'ded byed dang /_/mchog sbyin khu ba'i
[\[201b\]]
[\[201b.1\]]hi ShaM shr-iM ga ma b+h+ra kaM gi ri dzA ma le/_/shro to\u0f85ny+dza na tu so bI ra kA yo tAM dza na ya mu naM/_/tu t+thAM dza naM shi khi grI baM bi tun+na ka ma yU ra kaM_/kaR+Y+ya rI dA rbi kAk+ShA thod+b+ha baM tu t+yaM ra saM dza naM/_/ra sa gar+b+ha tAr+k+Sh+ya shai laM ga n+d+ha sh+mani tu gan+d+hi kaH/_
[\[201b.2\]]dbang po'o/_/gab laM dang ma he'i rwa/_/lhang tsher ri skyes dri ma med/_/chu srol mig sman so bI ra/_/mig sman kA yo ya lu naM/_/spangs ma mig sman rma bya'i mgrin/_/sngon po dang ni rma bya'i mdongs/_/spangs ma btul ba dArbi kA_/k+Sha tha las byung spangs ma'o/_/khu ba'i mig sman khu ba'i snying /_/rdo mthing di rdo dri
[\[201b.3\]]sau gan+d+hi kash+tsa tsak+ShuSh+pA ku lA l+yau tu ku lat+pi kA_/r-i ti puSh+paM puSh+pa ke tu pau Sh+ya kaM ku shu mAny+dza naM/_/piny+dza raM pI ta naM tA la mA lany+tsa ha ri tA la ke_/gai re ya mar+th+yaM gi ri dza mash+ma dzaM tsa shi lA dza tu/_btsos ba/_/bo la gan+d+ha ra sha prA Na piN+Da go sa sha shAHsa mAH/_/hiN+DI ra\u0f85b+d+hi
[\[201b.4\]]ldan dang /_/dri bzangs mig sman rigs can dang /_/dus kyi me tog me tog zer/_/me tog mig sman pau Sh+ya kaM_/ba bla tA la ma la zer/_/ha ri tA la ke zhes so/_/brag zhun mar+th+ya re skyes dang /_/rdo skyes shi lA dza tu'o/_/'byar rtsi dri sbyin srog can dang /_/gor bu gos ri bong mnyam/_/rgya mtsho lbu ba phe na
[\[201b.5\]]ka phe naHphe naHsin+dU raM NA ga saM b+ha baM/_/nA gaHshI sha ka yo geSh+Ta ba d+h+rA Ni tra pu pits+tsa TaM/_/rang+ga beng+ga a tha pi tsu stU lonyatha ka ma lot+ta raM/_/s+yAt+ku sum+b+haM bah+ni shi khaM ma hA ra dza na mi t+ya pi/_/me Sha kam+ba Ur+N+NA yuHsha shor+N+NaM sha sha lo ma ni/_/ma d+hu k+Shau mAk+ShI kA di tsa ma d+hUt+sa Sh+Tan+tu sik+tha
[\[201b.6\]]lbu/_/sin du raM dang li khri'o/_zha nye skyes/_/nA ga zha nye tshon mo steng /_/ro nye tra pu pits+tsha TaM/_/tshon dang gsha' tshe 'khar ba'i rgyu/_/de nas btsag ces bya ba'o/_/le brgan me lce tshon chen po/_/zhes pa'ang lug snam bal gos so/_/ri bong bal ni ri bong spu/_/sbrang dang mngar ldan mak+Shi sogs/_/sbrang snyigs
[\[202a\]]
[\[202a.1\]]kaM_/ma naHshi lA tu ku na TI ma no hwa nA ga dzi hwi kA_/nai pA lI ku nA Ti go lA ya bak+Sha ro ya bA gra dzaH/_/pa kyo\u0f85tha shardzi kA k+ShA raHkA po taHsu kha brtsa kaH/_/sau bar+ts+tsa la s+yA dru tsa kaM twa k+ShI rA baM sha ro ca NA/_/si gru dzaM shwe ta ma ri
[\[202a.2\]]@#/_/dang ni spra tshi la lo/_/man ri skyes ldong ros dang /_/ldong ros dang ni klu lce ba/_/nai pA lI ku gar go lA/_/nas kyi 'gyur ba nas rtse skyes/_/smin pa de nas brgya tsha 'gyur/_/kA po ta dang su kha brtsa ka_/sau brtsa dang dru tsa kaM_/shing tsha baM sha ro tsa na/_/myur skyes dkar po pho ba ris/_/_
[\[202a.3\]]tsaM\u0f85mo ra TaM mU la mai k+Sha paM/_/gran+thi ka pi pya lI mU laM tsa Ti kA shi ra i t+ya pi/_/go lo mI b+hU ta ke shwa nA pa trAd+gaM rak+ta tsan+da naM/_/tri ka Tu t+r+yu Sha NaM byo ShaM tri pha lA tu pha la tri kaM_/bai s+ya bar+g+gaH//_!_//shU drAsh+tsA ba ra bar+N+NAsh+tsa br-i Sha lAsh+tsa
[\[202a.4\]]mo raT m+bu la bur shing ngo /_/mdung can pi pi li yi rtsa/_/tsa Ti kA shir zhes pa yang /_/go lo mI dang 'byung po'i skra/_/pa trAM ga dang tsan+dan dmar/_/tsha gsum drod gsum drod can dang /_/'bras bu gsum ni phal trika_/rje rigs kyi sde tshan no//_!_//dmangs rigs dang ni phyis skyes dang /_/chos
[\[202a.5\]]dza ga n+ya dzAH/_/A tsaN+DA lA tu saM kIr+N+NA am+baSh+ThA ka ra NA da yaH/_/su drA bi shostu ka ra Nonyam+ba Sh+Tho bai sh+ya dwi dzan+ma noH/_/shU drA k+Shi tri ya yo ru gro mA ga d+haHk+Sha tri yA bi shoH/_/mA hi Sh+yo\u0f85R+YA k+Sha tri ya yoHk+Sha t+tA\u0f85R+YA shU dra yoHsu
[\[202a.6\]]snub dang ni byin skyes so/_/kun gtum mthar thug 'dres ma'o/_/sman pa ri mo mkhan la sogs/_/dmangs dang rjes skyes ri mo mkhan/_/sman pa rje'u gnyis skyes las/_/dmangs dang rgyal 'dres drag po'o/_/bya bas 'tsho ba rgyal rje 'dres/_/mA hi Sh+ya ni 'phags rgyal 'dres/_/k+Shat+ta 'phags dang dmangs mo'i
[\[202b\]]
[\[202b.1\]]taH/_/brah+ma N+yAM k+Shat+t+ri yAt+su tat+su tasta pyAM bai de ha ko bi shaH/_/ra tha kA rastu mA hi Sh+yAt+ka ra N+yAM ya s+ya sam+b+ha baH/_/s+yats+tsaN+DA lastu dza ni to brAh+ma N+yAM br-i Sha le na yaH/_/kA ruHshilbI saM ha tai stair+d+wa yoHshre NiH sa dzA ti b+hiH/_/ku la kaHs+yAt+ku
[\[202b.2\]]bu/_/bram ze rgyal 'dres su ta'o/_/de dang rje'u 'dres bai de ha/_/shing rta mkhan po mA hi Sh+ya/_/ri mo mkhan las byung ba'o/_/kun gtum pa yi skye ba ni/_/bram ze mo dang chos snub las/_/byed mkhan dang ni bzo bo las/_/tshogs pa de rnams gnyis yin te/_/shes nyen mkhan dang bzo po'i rigs/_/rigs ldan
[\[202b.3\]]la shreSh+ThI mA lA kA rastu ma li kaH/_/kum+b+ha kA raHku lA laHs+yAt+pa la gaN+Dastu le pa kaH/_/tan+tu bA yaHku bin+daHs+yAt+tun+na ba yastu tsau tsi kaH/_/rang+gA dzi bash+tsitra ka raHshas+t+ra mArdzonyasi d+hA ba kaH/_/pA du kr-its+tsar+m+ma kA raHs+yAd+b+yo kA ro lo ha
[\[202b.4\]]rigs kyi gtso bo dang /_/me tog mkhan pa ma li ka_/bum pa mkhan dang rdza mkhan no/_/zhal ba mkhan po le ba ka_/tan+t+ra bA ya thags mkhan no/_/tshem bu ba dang gos bzo ba/_/tshon rtsis 'tsho ba ri mo byed/_/mtshon cha mkhan dang ral gri mkhan/_/lham mkhan dang ni ko lpags mkhan/_/lcags bzo
[\[202b.5\]]kA ra kaH/_/nA Din+d+ha ma swar+N+Na kA ra ka lA do rug+ma kA ra ke_/s+yAts+tshAd+gi kaHkAm+ba bi kaHshau lwi kastA mra kuT+Ta kaH/_/tak+ShA tu bar+d+ha kistaSh+TA ra tha kA rash+tsa kASh+Tha taT/_/grA mA d+hI no gra ma tak+ShaHkau Ta tak+Sho\u0f85na
[\[202b.6\]]ba dang lcags mgar ba/_/gser mgar dang ni gser mkhan dang /_/gser byed dang ni gser bzo ba/_/dung bzo ba dang dung mkhan no/_/zangs mgar zangs mkhan zangs brdungs pa/_/shing mkhan shing bzo shing 'jog pa/_/shing rta byed dang shing 'jog mkhan/_/phya ma mkhan dang ni khyim shing mkhan/_/khyim_
[\[203a\]]
[\[203a.1\]]d+hI na kaH/_/k+Shu ri muN+Di di bA kIr+t+ti nA pi tAM tA ba shA yi naH/_/nir+N+Na dza kaHs+yA dra dza kaHshau N+Di ko maN+Da hA ra kaH/_/dzA pA laHs+yA da dzA dzI bo de bA dzI bstu de ba laH/_/s+yAn+mA yA sAm+bA rI mA yA ka rastu prA
[\[203a.2\]]@#/_/gnas dang ni bza' mi'o/_/'dreg mkhan skra mkhan mtho ris grags/_/na pi ta dang mthar gnas pa/_/tshos ma dang ni btso blag mkhan/_/chang 'tshong ma dang chang ma'o/_/ra rdzi dang ni ra skyong ba/_/lha yis 'tsho dang lha gnyer pa/_/sgyu ma ba dang sgyu ma mkhan/_/sgyu ma byed dang so sor

[\[203a.4\]]'phrog_/gar ba dang ni gar mkhan no/_/bud med kyis 'tsho bud med bskyangs/_/b+ha ra tA zhes gar dang ni/_/rkang pa ba dang gar gyis 'tsho/_/rnga ba dang ni rnga brdung ba/_/lag pa'i sgra dang thal mo rdeb/_/gling bu ba dang gling bu 'bud/_/pi wang ba dang pi wang mkhan/_/'tsho ba tha chang bya shor ba/_/bya

[\[207a.1\]]s+yAd+da yA luHkA ru Ni kaHkr-i pA luHsu ra taHsa mAH/_/swa tan+t+ronyapA br-i taHswai rI swats+tshan+do ni ra ba gra haH/_/pa ra tan+t+raHpa rA d+hI naHpar bAn+nAtha bA na pi/_/a d+hI no ni g+h+na A yat+to swa ts+tshan+do gr-i h+ya ko pya sau/_/_

[\[207a.6\]]las mi de yi byed pa can/_/skye khrus dang ni shi khrus so/_/krums dang sha ya zas dang ni/_/ltogs dang bkres dang bru ba tsha/_/zas 'dod gzhan zas pha rol zas/_/lto che grod che dang ga bde/_/snyom las dang ni skyid skyur dang /_/sgyid snyom dang ni 'jas po gnyis/_/bdag 'gengs lto 'gengs rang
[\[207b\]]

[\[212a.1\]]n+ya br-it+ti re kA grai kA ya nA ba pi/_/a pye ka sarga e kA g+r+yo pye kA ya na ga to pi tsa/_/puM s+yA diHpUrba pau ra s+t+ya pra tha mA d+yA a tha s+t+ri yAM/_/an+to dza g+ha n+yaM tsa ra ma maM t+ya pAsh+tsa t+ya pash+tsi maM/_/meg+haM ni rar+tha kaM spaSh+TaM s+phu Ta pra byak+ta

[\[216b.1\]]kastu pra yA maHs+yAtshan+ni d+hiHsan+ni kaR+Sha Na/_/la bonyab+hi lA bo la ba ne niSh+pA baHpa ba ne pa baH/_/prastA baHs+yA da ba sa raHsU tra beSh+Ta naM/_/pra dza naHs+yA du pa sa raHpra sa raHpra Na yaHsa mau/_/d+hI shak+tirniSh+k+ra monyas+t+rI tu saM kra mo dur+g+ga sany+tsa raH/_/pra
[\[216b.2\]]rab tu nges/_/nye 'khor nye logs dag dang ni/_/rnga ba 'breg pa 'bal ba'o/_/nges 'byed 'phyar dang 'khrab pa'o/_/gnas skabs dang ni skabs yin no/_/thags spun son pa snal ma dkri/_/she sbyor 'khrig dang tshogs pa mtshungs/_/blo nus dang ni chu srol lo/_/mo min zam pa bgrod dka' zam/_/'khrug
[\[216b.3\]]t+yut+k+ra maHpra yo gAr+thaHpra kra maHs+yA du pra kra maH/_/s+yA da s+yA dA na mud+g+hA ta A raM b+haHsam+b+h+ra mas+t+wa rA/_/pra ti ban+d+haHpra tiSh+Tam+b+honyab nA yastu ni pA ta naM/_/u pa lam+b+has+t+wa nu b+ha baHsa mA lam+b+ho be le pa naM/_/bi pra lam+b+ho bi pra yo go bi mam+b+ha s+t+wa ti sar+dz+dza naM/_/bi shrA bstu
[\[216b.4\]]phyir 'jug dang rab sbyor don/_/khom pa dang ni mgo 'ju ba/_/'ju ba rtsom pa A raM b+ha/_/tam tam tur tur bar chad gegs/_/'og min 'og tu lta ba'o/_/sngon shes slar yang 'phel ba'o/_/bsku byug dang ni byug pa'o/_/rjes chags dang ni sbyor ba'o/_/sbyin ster rnam grags rab tu
[\[216b.5\]]pra bi khyA ti ra be k+ShA pra ti dzA ga raH/_/ni pA Tha ni pa Thau pA The te ma ste mau sa mund ne/_/A dI na bA shra bau kle she me la ke saM ga saM ga mau/_/saM bI k+Sha NaM bi tsa ya naM mAr+g+ga NaM mr-i ga NA mr-i gaH/_/pa ri ram+b+haHpa ri Sh+waM gaHsaM sh+le Sha u pa gU ha naM/_/_

[\[217a\]]
[\[217a.1\]]nirbar+N+Na naM tu naM d+h+yA naM daR+sha nA lo ka ni k+Sha NaM/_/pra t+yA khyA naM ni ra sa naM pra t+yA de sho ni rA kri tiH/_/u pa sA yo bi shA yash+tsa par+YA ya sha ya nAr+tha kau_/ar+t+ta naM tsa dz+ha tI yA tsa hr-i NI yA tsa g+h+r-i tor+tha ke_/s+yAd+b+ya t+yA so bi par+YA so bya t+ya yash+tsa bi paR+Ya ye/_/par+YA yonyati kra mastasmin+na

[\[217b.1\]]tirniSh+The ba na niSh+ThI ba na mi t+ya b+hin+nA ni/_/dza ne be dzU tiHsa ti s+t+wa ba sA naM s+yA da tha dz+wa ro dzUr+t+tiH/_/u da dzastu pa shu pre ra Na ma ka ra Ni ri t+yA da yaHshA pA/_/go trAn+te b+h+ya sta s+yab+dan+da mi t+yau pa ga ba kA di kaM_/A pU pi kaM shASh+ku li ka me ba mA d+ya ma tse ta

[\[220b\]]
[\[220b.1\]]dza gaN+DaHka Ti ka Tau/_/shi bi piSh+Tastu kha la tau duSh+tsar+m+ma ni ma he shwa re/_/de ba shilpi n+ya pi twaSh+TA diSh+TaM dai be bi na dwa yoH/_/ra se ka TuHka T+wa kAr+Ye tri Shu mat+sa ra tIk+Sh+Na yoH/_/riSh+TaM k+She mA shu b+hA b+hA be Sh+wa riSh+Te tu shu b+hA shu b+he/_/mA yA nish+tsa la yan+t+re Shu ke ta bA nr-i ta rA shi Shu/_
[\[220b.2\]]Ta/_/glang po'i 'gram dang rked ka To/_/shi bi piSh+Ta nyams pa dang /_/pags pa ngan dang dbang phyug che/_/lha yi bzo ni twaSh+Ta'o/_/diSh+TaM skal ba gnyis 'dus la/_/ro bro ka TuHka Tu ni/_/don med gsum mo ser sna rno/_/riSh+TaM bde dang mi dge med/_/a riSh+Te ni dge mi dge_/sgyu ma mi g.yo 'khrul 'khor dang /_/g.yo sgyu mi bden phung ba
[\[220b.3\]]a yo g+ha ne shai la shrid+ge sI rAM ge kU Ta mas+t+ri yAM/_/sUk+Sh+mai lA yAM tru Tis+t+rI s+yAt+kA le\u0f85lpe saM sha phe pa sA/_/ar+t+YurkaR+ShA shra yaHko T+yo mU le lag+na ka tse dza TA/_/byuSh+Ti pha le sa mr-id+d+hau tsa dr-iSh+Tir+dz+nyA nek+Shi daR+sha ne/_/iSh+Tir+YA gets+tsha yoHsraMSh+TaM nish+tsa te ba hu
[\[220b.4\]]dang /_/lcags tho ri yi rtse mo dang /_/thong gshol rnams la kU Ta'o/_mo ma yin/_/tru tri sug smel dus dang ni/_/nyung du the tshom rnams la'o/_/bgrod dka'i gnas la ko Ti'o/_/rtsa ba dus sbyor skra dza TA/_/byuSh+Ti 'bras bu phun tshogs la'o/_/dr-iSh+Ti ye shes mthong ba mig_/iSh+Ti mchod sbyin 'dod pa'o/_/sr-iSh+TaM nges dang
[\[220b.5\]]ni tri Shu/_/kaSh+Te tu kr-its+tsh+ra ga ha ne dak+ShA man+dA ga de Shu tu/_/pa Tur+d+wau bA ts+ya ling+gau tsa nI la kaN+ThaHshi be pi tsA/_/puM si koSh+Tho\u0f85n+t+ra dza Tha raM ku shU lo\u0f85n+tar+g+r-i haM ta thA/_/niSh+ThA niSh+pat+ti nA shAn+tAHkoSh+Thot+kaR+She s+thi to di shi/_/tr-i Shu dz+yeSh+Tho\u0f85ti
[\[220b.6\]]mang po gsum/_/kASh+Te dka' las nags thibs po/_/mkhas dang mi dman nad med la'o/_/pa Tu gnyis te brjod bya'i rtags/_/Ta mtha'o/_/nI la kaN+Tharma bya zhi/_/pho'o koSh+Tha rgyu ma dang /_/gsus pa bru dong khang ba'i nang /_/niSh+ThA byas zin chud zos mtha'/_/kASh+Tha dga' gnas phyogs la'o/_/dz+yeSh+Tha rgan dang
[\[221a\]]
[\[221a.1\]]shas+t+ya pi ka niSh+Tho\u0f85ti yu bAlpa yoH/_/daN+Do\u0f85s+t+rI la gu De pi s+yAd+gu Do go lek+Shu pA ka yoH/_/sar+p+ya mAM pAt+pa sU byA Do b+hU go bA tsas+t+wi DA i lAH/_/ri rab la nye ba'i yul gyi ming zer/_/k+She DA baM sha sha lA kA pi nA DI kA le pi ShaT+k+Sha Ne/_/kAN+Do\u0f85s+t+rI
[\[221a.2\]]@#/_/phul byung la/_/ka niSh+Tha ni chung dang nyung /_/Tha mtha'o/_/daN Da khral dang dbyug pa'o/_/gu Da rtog pa bur shing btsos/_/byA Da sbrul dang sha zan phyugs/_/i Da sa phyugs ngag zla bu/_k+She DA smyug skas spa yi skas/_/nA DA dus dang skad cig drug_/kAN+Da dbyug pa
[\[221a.3\]]daN+Da pA NArba bar+g+gA ba sa ra bA ri Shu/_/s+yAd+b+hAN+Da ma shwA b+hA ra Ne\u0f85man+t+re mU la lba ni g+d+ha ne/_/br-i sha pra ti dz+nya yorbA D+haM pra gA D+ha b+h+r-i sha kr-its+tsh+ra yoH/_/shak+ta s+thU lau tri Shu dr-i D+hau b+h+yU D+hau bi n+yasta saM ha tau/_/b+h+ru No\u0f85r+b+ha kes+t+rai Na gar+b+he bA No ba li
[\[221a.4\]]mda' dang ni/_/rta dang sde tshan gnas skabs chu/_/b+hAN+Da rta yi rgyan dang ni/_/sngags min rtsa ba tshangs pa'i nor/_/Da mtha'o/_/b+hA D+haM nges dang dam 'cha' la/_/phul byung dka' las pra gA D+ha/_/dr-i D+ha nus dang sbom po la/_/byU D+ha bkod dang tshogs pa la/_/D+ha mtha'o/_/b+h+ru Na byis dang ngan gsher can/_/bA Na stobs
[\[221a.5\]]su te sha re/_/ka No ti sUk+Sh+me d+hA n+yAM she saM g+hA te pra ma the gaNaH/_/pa Nod+yu tA di ShUt+s+r-iSh+Te b+h+r-i tau mu l+ye d+ha na pi tsa/_/maur+b+h+yAM dra byA shrI te satwa shukla san+d+h+yA di ke gu NaH/_/nir+b+yA pA ra s+thi tau kA la bi she Shot+sa ba yoHk+Sha
[\[221a.6\]]ldan bu dang mda'/_/ka Na shin tu phra dang zegs/_/tshogs dang 'joms byed ga Na'o/_/pa Na sho sogs rgyal byas gla/_/rin dang nor la yang de'o/_/yon tan dang ni dngos skyed dang /_/rten dang snying stobs dkar po dang /_/mtshams la sogs pa gu Na'o/_/byar med gnas dang dus bye brag_/spro ba
[\[221b\]]
[\[221b.1\]]Na/_/bar+No dwi dzA dau shuklA dau stu tau bar+NaM tu tsAk+Sha re/_/grA ma NIrnA pi te puM si shreSh+The grA sA d+hi pe tri Shu/_/Ur+N+NA me ShA di lo mni s+yA dA bar+t+te tsAn+ta ra b+h+ru bau/_/ha ri NI s+yAn+m+r-i gI he ma
[\[221b.2\]]dag lak+ShaNa'o/_/bar+Na gnyis skyes la sogs dang /_/dkar po la sogs kha dog bstod/_/bar+Na yi ge la yang ngo /_/grA ma NI ni 'dreg mkhan dang /_/skyes gsum mchog bdag rnams la'o/_/Ur+NA lug sogs bal dang ni/_/smin ma'i mtshams kyi 'khyil pa la'o/_/ha ri NI ni ri dgas mo/_/gser
[\[221b.3\]]pra ti mA ha ri tA tsa sA/_/tri Shu pAN+Do tsa ha ri NaHs+thUNA stam+b+he pi besh+ma NI/_/tr-iSh+Ne spr-i hA pi pA se dwe dzu gup+sA ka ru Ne g+h+r-i Ne/_/ba Nik+pa the pi bi pa NiHsu rA pra t+yak+tsa bA ru NI/_/ka re Nu ri b+h+yAM s+t+rI ne b+he dra bi NaM tu ba laM d+ha naM/_/sha ra NaM gr-i ha rak+Shi troH_
[\[221b.4\]]gyi gzugs brnyan ser po la/_/gsum rnams skya bo ha riN/_/lcags dang khyim gyi ka ba la/_/tr-iSh+Na 'dod pa skom pa la/_/smod pa snying rje g+h+r-i Ne'o/_/tshong 'dus lam ni bi pa Ni/_/chang dang nub phyogs bA ru NI/_/ka re Nu ni glang mo glang /_/dra bi NaM ni stobs dang nor/_/sha ra NaM ni khyim dang
[\[221b.5\]]shrI par+N+NaM ka ma le pi tsa/_/bi ShA b+hi ma ra lo he Shu tIk+Sh+Na klI baM kha re tri Shu/_/pra ma NaM he tu mar+YA dA shAs+t+re yan+tA pra mAtr-i Shu/_/ka ra NaM sA d+ha ka ta maM k+She tra gA tren+d+ri ye Sh+wa pi/_/prA N+yut+pA de saM sa ra Na ma sam+bA d+ha tsa mU
[\[221b.6\]]skyabs/_/shrI par+Na ni pad+ma bum/_/tik+Sh+Na dug dang g.yul la'o/_/lcags rno ma ning kha re gsum/_/pra ma NaM ni gtan tshigs dang /_/yul lugs bstan bcos sdom brtson tshad/_/ka ra NaM ni sgrub nus dang /_/zhing dang lus dbang rnams la yang /_/saM pa ra Na srog chags skye/_/dpung tshogs rgyu dang
[\[222a\]]
[\[222a.1\]]ga tau/_/g+haN+TA pa the\u0f85tha bAn+tAn+ne sa mud+d+ha ra Na mun+na ye/_/a tas+t+ri Shu bi ShA NaM s+yAt+pa shu shr-ing+ge b+hadan+ta yoH/_/pra ba NaM kra ma nim+nor+b+yAM pra hwe nA tu tsa tuSh+pa the/_/saM kIr+N+No ni tsi tA shud+d+ha bi ri NaM shU n+ya mU Sha raM/_/_
[\[222a.2\]]@#/_/grong khyer btsan/_/sa mud+b+ha ra Na skyug dang 'khyer/_/khral 'bab lam gyi mtha' la'o/_/'di ni gsum ste bi ShA Na/_/phyugs kyi rwa dang btsun pa la'o/_/pra ba Na ni rim gyis gzhol/_/dga' dang bzhi mdo rnams la'o/_/saM kIr+Na ni dag ma dag_/stong pa tsha sgo i ri NaM/_/_
[\[222a.3\]]de ba sUr+Yau bi ba shwan+tau sa ra swan+tau na dAr+N+Na bau/_/pak+Shi tAr+k+Shau ga run+man+tau sha kun+tau b+hA sa pak+Shi Nau/_/ag+n+yut+pA tau d+hU ma ke tU dzI mU tau me g+ha par+b+ba tau/_/hastau ru pA Ni nak+Sha tre ma ru tau pa ba nA ma rau/_/yan+tA hastI pa ke sU te b+har+t+tA d+hA ta ri poSh+Ta ri/_/yA
[\[222a.4\]]Na mtha'o/_/bi ba shwan+tau nyi ma lha/_/swa ra swan+tau gtsang bo mtsho/_/ga run+man+tau 'dab chags khyung /_/'od dang bya la sha kun+tau/_/me skyes du ba ke tu'o/_/dzI mU tau ni sprin dang ri/_/hastau lag pa rgyu skar me bzhi la'o/_/rlung dang 'chi med ma ru tau/_/yan+tA glang chen kha lo sgyur/_/b+har+t+tA 'dzin dang gso ba la/_/gru
[\[222a.5\]]na pA tre shi shau po taHpre taHprA N+yaM ta re mr-i te/_/gra ta b+he de d+h+wa dza ke tuHpAr+thi be ta na ye su taH/_/s+thA pa tiH kA ru b+he de tsa b+hU b+h+r-id+b+hU mi d+ha re nr-i pe/_/mUr+d+hA b+hi Shik+to b+hU pe pi r-i tuH s+t+rI ku su me pi tsa/_/biSh+Na ba pya dzi tA t+yak+to sU tas+t+waSh+Ta ri
[\[222a.6\]]dang byis pa po ta'o/_/pre ta srog chags mtha' ma ro/_/ke tu rgyal mtshan gza'i bye brag_/su ta bu dang rgyal po la'o/_/shing mkhan bye brag s+thA pa ti/_/sa 'dzin ri dang rgyal po la'o/_/spyi bor dbang bskur rgyal rigs la'ang /_/r-i tu bud med me tog dus/_/khyab 'jug ma pham t+yak+to'o/_/sU ta bzo
[\[222b\]]
[\[222b.1\]]sA ra thau/_/byak+taHprA dz+nye pi dr-iSh+TAn+tA bu b+he shAs+t+ra ni daR+sha ne/_/k+Shat+tA s+yAt+sA ra thau dwAHs+the k+Sha tri yA yAny+tsa shU dra dze/_/br-it+tAn+ta s+yAt+p+ra ka ra Ne pra kA re kar+t+s+n+ya bAr+t+ta yoH/_/A nar+t+ta sa ma re nr-i t+ya s+thA na nI br-id+pi she Sha yoH/_/kr-i tAn+to
[\[222b.2\]]bo'i kha lo sgyur/_/byak+ta mkhas dang gsal ba'o/_/dpe dang bstan bcos dr-iSh+TAn+ta/_/k+Shat+tA kha lo sgyur ba dang /_/sgo skyong rgyal rigs dmangs 'dres bu/_/br-it+tAn+ta ni rab byed dang /_/bye brag tshogs pa gtam rnams la'o/_/A nar+t+ta ni g.yul dang ni/_/gar gnas skyes mtha'i bye brag la/_/kr-i

[\[222b.4\]]tAn+ta ni gshin rje dang /_/grub mtha' dbang thang mi dge'i las/_/bad kan la sogs ro dang ni/_/khrag sogs 'byung ba chen po dang /_/de yi yon tan dbang po rnams/_/rdo yi rnam 'gyur sgra'i skye gnas/_/d+hA tu yin te khams zhes so/_/kak+ShAn+ta re btsun mo'i 'khor/_/mi dbang kun gyi spyod
[\[222b.5\]]yoHshak+tirmUr+t+tiHkA Thi n+ya kA ya yoH/_/bistA ra bal+l+yoHpra ta tirba sa ti rA tri besh+ma noH/_/k+Sha yArtsa yo ra pa tsi tiHsA tirdA nA ba sA na yoH/_/ar+t+ti pI DA d+ha nuHko T+yordzA tiHsA mA n+ya dzan+ma noH/_/pra tsA ra s+yan+da yo rI ti rI ti Dim+ba pra bA sa
[\[222b.6\]]yul min/_/mtshon dang nus pa shak+ti'o/_/mUrti sra dang lus la'o/_/yangs pa 'khri shing pra ta ti/_/ba sa ti ni mtshan mo khyim/_/zad mchod a pa tsi ti'o/_/sA ti sbyin dang gnas dag lo/_/a rti zug rngu gzhu yi mchog_/dzA ti spyi dang skye ba dag_/rab skyod bskyod pa I ti'o/_/rI ti mchod dang gnas dag
[\[223a\]]
[\[223a.1\]]yoH/_/u da yo\u0f85d+hi ga me prAp+ti s+t+re tA twak+ni tra ye yu ge_/pi nA b+he de pim ha tI b+hU tar+b+hasma ni sam+pa ti/_/na dI na gar+YornA ga nAM b+ho ga ba t+ya tha saM ga re/_/saM ge sa b+hA yAM sa mi tiHk+Sha ya bA sA ba pi k+Shi tiH/_/ra be ra rtsish+tsa
[\[223a.2\]]@#/_/go/_/shar dang thob pa prAp+ti'o/_/s+t+re tA me gsum gsum ldan dus/_/pi wang dbye ba ma ha tI/_/b+hU ti thal ba phun sum tshogs/_/gtsang po klu yi grong khyer rnams/_/b+ho ga ba ti de nas g.yul/_/grogs dang 'phong sa sa mi ti/_/zad dang gnas la k+Shi ti'o/_/nyi ma'i 'od zer
[\[223a.3\]]shas+t+rany+tsa bah+ni dz+wA lA tsa he ta yaH/_/dza ga tI dza ga ti ts+tshan+di bi she She pi k+Shi tA ba pi/_/paMk+tish+tsan+do pi da sha maM s+yAt+p+ra b+hA be pi tsA ya tiH/_/pat+tir+g+ga tau tsa mU le pi bak+Sha tiHpak+Sha b+he da yoH/_/pra kr-i tir+Yo ni liM ge tsa kau shi kyA d+yAsh+tsa br-it+ta yaH/_/si ka tAHs+yurbA lu
[\[223a.4\]]mtshon cha dang /_/me lce 'bar la he ti'o/_/dza ga tI ni 'gro ba dang /_/sdeb sbyor bye brag sa gzhi la'ang /_/paMk+ti gral dang yig bcu'i sdeb/_/'od dang chags pa A ya ti/_/bat+ti 'gro dang rkang thang ngo /_/rtsa ba gshog dbye pak+Sha ti/_/pra kr-i ti ni skye gnas rtags/_/gar gyis 'tsho ba br-it+ti'o/_/si ka tA ni bye gyo dum/_/_

[\[223a.6\]]rig byed thos pa shru ti'o/_/ba ni tA dang dza ni ta/_/ma dang rjes chags bud med la/_/gup+ti dong 'bru bug bcas gru/_/d+h+r-i ti 'dzin dang blo gros so/_/br-i ha tI ni bum sman dang /_/sdeb sbyor dbye ba chen po la'ang /_/bud med glang mo bA si tA/_/bAr+t+tA 'tsho ba skye bo'i gtam/_/bAr+t+taM nad med snying po med/_/zhun mar mar
[\[223b\]]
[\[223b.1\]]mr-i te/_/kal d+hau taM rU pya he m+norni mit+taM he tu lak+Sha NoH/_/shru taM shAs+t+rA ba d+h+r-i ta yoR+Yu ga par+YAp+ta yoHkr-i taM/_/a t+yA hi taM ma hA b+hI tiHkarma dzI bA na pe k+Shi tsa/_/yuk+tek+Sh+mA dA br-i te b+hU taM prA N+ya tI te sa me tri Shu/_/br-it+taM pa d+ye tsa ri tre tri

[\[223b.3\]]Sh+wa tI ta dr-i D+ha ni sta le/_/ma ha drA dz+yaM tsA ba gI taM dza n+ye s+yAng+gar+hi te tri Shu/_/shwe taM ru pye pi ra dza taM hA re rU pya si te tri Shu/_/tri Sh+wa to dza ga ding+ge pi rak+tan+nI l+yA di rA gi tsa/_/a ba dA taHsi te pI te shud+d+he
[\[223b.4\]]gsum/_/'das dus brtan pa zlum po la/_/a ba gI taM rgyal srid dang /_/skye bos smod dang chen po la/_/shwe taM dngul dang dkar po la/_/ra dza taM ni do shal dang /_/dngul dang dkar po rnams la gsum/_/dza gad 'gro dang 'khor ba la/_/rak+ta sngo sogs chags pa la/_/a ba dA ta dkar po dang /_/ser po dang
[\[223b.5\]]bad+hArdzu nau si tau/_/yuk+te\u0f85b+hi saMskr-i te\u0f85maR+Shi N+ya b+hI nI to\u0f85tha saMskr-i taM/_/kr-i tri me lak+Sha No pi te pya nan+to na ba d+hA ba pi/_/khyA te hr-iSh+Te pra tI to\u0f85b+hi dzA tastu ku la dze bu d+he/_/bi bik+tau pU ta bi dza Nau
[\[223b.6\]]ni dag pa'o/_/lhag lus dkar po si ta'o/_/rigs dang mngon par legs sbyar dang /_/nus pa a b+hi ni to'o/_/de nas legs sbyar zin pa dang /_/mtshan nyid u pa te yang ngo /_/a nan+ta ni mtha' yas dga'/_/grags dang yid 'ong pra tI ta/_/a b+hi dzA ta rigs skyes blo/_/bi bik+tau ni dag dang dben/_/mUr+ts+tshi
[\[224a\]]
[\[224a.1\]]mUr+ts+tshi tau mU D+ha sots+tsh+wa yau/_/dwau tsAm+bu pa ru Shau shuk+tau shI ti d+ha ba la me tsa kau_/sa t+ye sA d+hau bid+ya mA ne bra shastenyab+h+yar+hi te tsa sata/_/pur skr-i taHpU dzi tenyarA t+ya b+hi yuk+tenyagra taHkr-i te/_/ni bA tA bA shra ya bA taushras+t+rA b+he d+yaM tsa
[\[224a.2\]]@#/_/tau ni rmongs dang mtho/_/gnyis dag skyur rtsub shuk+tau'o/_/shI ti dkar dang dkar nag 'dres/_/legs dang yod dang dge ba dang /_/phan byed bden pa rnams la sa ta/_/pur skr-i ta mchod pa dang /_/dgra dang mngon par rigs pa dang /_/mngon du bya ba rnams la'o/_/ni bA ta ni rlung med gnas/_/_
[\[224a.3\]]bar+m+ma ya tra/_/dzA ton+na dwa prAd+bad+d+hAHs+yu ru ts+tsh+ri tA ut+thi tAs+t+wa mI/_/br-id+d+hi mat+p+ro d+ya to t+pan+nA A dr-i tau sA dA rArtsi tau/_/ar+tho\u0f85b+he d+hi ya rai bstu pra yo dza na ni br-it+ti Shu/_/ni dA nA ga ma yostIr+tha mr-i Shi dzuSh+Ta dza le gu rau/_/sa mar+thas+t+ri
[\[224a.4\]]mtshon gyis mi chod go cha la'ang /_/dzA ti skyes dang 'tsho ba thob/_/uts+tsh+ri tA dang ut+thitA/_/mtho dang shar phyogs skye ba rnams/_/A dr-i tau ni gus dang mchod/_/ta mtha'o/_/ar+tha brjod bya dang ni nor/_/dngos po dgos pa ltogs pa la/_/tIr+tha gleng gzhi lung dang ni/_/drang srong mu stegs lci ba'o/_/sa mar+tha
[\[224a.5\]]Shu shak+tiSh+Thi sam+bad+d+hAr+the hi te pi tsa/_/da sha mI s+tho k+ShI Na rA ga br-id+d+ho bI thi pa da bya pi/_/As+thA nI yat+na yo rAs+thA pras+thonyas+t+rI pA nu mA na yoH/_/a b+hi prA ya ba shauts+tshan+dA bab+dau dzI mU ta bat+sa roH/_/a ba bA dau tu nin+dA dz+nya dA ya dau su ta bAn+d+ha
[\[224a.6\]]gsum nus pa dang /_/'dod pa 'brel don phan pa la'ang /_/da sha mI s+tho chags nyams rgan/_/bI thi lam dang rtsig pa la/_/As+thA gnas dang 'bad pa dag_/pras+tha ri sul dang ni be/_/tha mtha'o/_/dgongs can dbang byed ts+tshan+da'o/_/a bdo char sprin be'u la'o/_/a ba bA dau smod dang bka'/_/dA ya dau ni bu dang
[\[224b\]]
[\[224b.1\]]bau/_/pA dA rasmyaM g+h+r-i tur+YAM shash+tsan+d+rAg+nyarkAsta mo nu dAH/_/nirbA do dza na bA de pi shA do dzam+bA ya shaSh+pa yoH/_/sA rA be ru di ti trA tar+YA kra n+do dA ruNe ra Ne/_/s+yAt+p+ra sA donyanu ro d+he pi sU dAHs+yAd+b+yany+dza ne pi tsa/_/goSh+ThA d+h+yak+She pi go bin+do haR+She pyA mo da ban+ma daH/_/pra d+hA n+ye ra dza ling+ge tsa
[\[224b.2\]]gnyen/_/pA da 'od zer zhabs bzhi cha/_/ta mo nu da me nyi zla/_/ni rbA da ni skye bos smod/_/shA do 'dam dang myu gu'o/_/sgra bcas du skad skyob pa rnams/_/A kran+da'o drag pa'i g.yul/_/pra sA da ni dad pa'o/_/sU da za ster spags la yang /_/ru dpon brdzi go bin+da/_/dga' dang chang la ma da na/_/gtso bo dang ni rgyal po'i
[\[224b.3\]]br-i ShAd+ge ka ku do\u0f85s+t+ri yAM/_/s+t+ri sam+bid+dz+nyA na saM b+hA ShA kri ya kA rA dza na ma suH/_/d+harme ra ha s+yu pa ni ShAt+s+yA tri to bat+sa re sha rata/_/pa daM byA ba si taM trA Na s+thA na lak+ShaM hri bstu Shu/_/goSh+pa daM se bi te mA ne pra taSh+ThA kr-i t+ya mA s+yA

[\[224b.5\]]daM/_/tri Sh+wiSh+Ta ma d+hu rau swA dU mr-i du tsA tIk+Sh+Na ko ma lau/_/mU D+hA lpA pa Tu nir+b+hA gyA man+daHs+yur+d+wo tusha rA dau/_/pra t+ya grA pra ti b+hau bi dwat+su pra gal+b+hau bi sha ra dau/_/byA mo ba D+hash+tsa n+ya gro d+hA but+se d+ha kA ya un+na ta/_/paR+Ya hA rash+tsa mAr+g+gash+tsa bI

[\[225a\]]
[\[225a.1\]]ba d+hau bi ba d+hau tsa tau/_/pa ri d+hir+Ya dz+nyi ya ta roHshA khA ya mu pa sUR+Ya ke_/ban+d+ha kaM bya sa naM tse taH pI DA d+hiSh+ThA na mA d+ha yaH/_/s+yuHsa mar+tha na nI bA ka ni yA mash+tsa sa mA d+ha yaH/_/do Shot+pA do\u0f85nu ban+d+ha s+yAt+p+ra kr-i t+yA di Sh+wa na swa

[\[225a.3\]]re/_/mu khyA nu pA yi ni si shau pra kri ta s+yA nu bar+t+ta ne/_/bi d+hurbiSh+No tsan+d+ra ma shi pa rits+tshe de bi le ba d+hiH/_/bi d+hirbi d+hA ne dai be yi pra Ni d+hiHprAr+tha ne tsa re/_/bud+d+ha br-i d+d+hau paN+Di te pi skan+d+haHsa mu da ye pi tsa/_/de she ba da

[\[225b.1\]]a tas+t+ri Shu mamun+nad+d+ho paN+Di taM ma n+ya garbi tau/_/brah+ma ban+d+hu ra d+hi k+She pe nirde she\u0f85thA ba lam+bi taH/_/a bi dU ro pya baSh+Tab+d+ho pra sid+d+hau khyA ta b+hU Shi tau/_/sUr+Ya ba h+nI tsi tra b+hA nu sa ha sra rasmi de bA ka rau/_/b+hU tAt+mA nau d+hA tr-i de ho mUr+kha nI tso pr-i thag+dza nau/_/grA ba
[\[225b.2\]]'di nas gsum yin sa mun+na d+hau/_/mkhas pa'i nga rgyal khengs pa'o/_/brah+ma ban d+hu g.yo nges bstan/_/brten dang ring min a baSh+Tab+d+hau/_/pra sid d+hau ni grags dang rgyan/_/d+ha mtha'o/_/tsi tra b+hA nu nyi ma me/_/'od stong can dang nyin mor byed/_/b+hU tAt+mA nau gso byed lus/_/pr-i thag+dza na rmongs dang dman/_/grA bA

[\[227a.1\]]d+hA na yoH/_/Ats+tshA da ne saM pi d+hA na ma pa rA Na mi t+yu b+he/_/A rA d+ha naM sA d+ha ne s+yA de bA bab+tau to Sha Ne pi tsa/_/a d+hiSh+ThA naM tsa kra pu ra pra b+hA bA s+yA sa ni Sh+wa pi/_/rat+naM swa dzA ti shreSh+The pi ba ne sha li la kA na ne/_/ta li naM be ra le sto ke bA ts+ya ling+gan+ta

[\[227b.1\]]b+hi rU po bud+d+ha ma na dz+nya yoH/_/b+he d+ya liM gA a mI kUrmI bI nA b+he dash+tsa kats+tsha bI/_/an+ta rA b+ha ba sat+t+we\u0f85shwe gan+d+ho rbo di bya gA na ne/_/kam+burnA ba la ye shaM khe dwi dzi hwau sar+p+pa sU tsa kau_/pUr+b+bA\u0f85n+ya liM gaHprA gA ha puM ba hu twe

[\[228a\]]
[\[228a.1\]]pa rA kra mau/_/d+har+m+mAHpu N+ya ya man+yA ya swa b+hA bA tsA ra so ma pAH/_/u pA ya pUrba A ram+b+ha u ba d+hA tsA pyu pa kra maH/_/ba Ni ka pa thaHpu raM be do ni ga mA nA ga ro ba Ni ka_/nai ga mau dwau ba le rA mo nI

[\[228b\]]
[\[228b.1\]]rad+ga ga ru Dau tA rakyau ni la yA ya tsa pau k+Sha yo/_/shwa shur+Yo de ba ra sh+yA lo b+h+rA tr-i byau d+h+rA tr-i dza dwi Shau/_/paR+Ya n+yau ra sa dab+den+d+ra s+yAR+YaH swA mi bai sh+ya yoH/_/ti Sh+yaHpu Sh+ye ka li yu ge paR+Ya yo\u0f85ba sa re kra mai/_/pra t+ya yo\u0f85d+hI na sha pa tha dz+nyA na baM shwA
[\[228b.2\]]'gro 'dab bzangs tAr+k+Sh+yau'o/_/gnas dang nyams pa k+Sha ya'o/_/skud po gnyid mo shwa shuR+Ya/_/spun skyes dgra ni b+hA tr-i byau/_/paR+Ya n+yau ni 'brug sprin dbang /_/aR+Ya bdag bo rje rigs so/_/ti Sh+ya rgyal dang rtsod ldan dus/_/paR+YA ya ni gnas skabs rim/_/pra t+ya ni gzhan dbang dang /_/mna' dang shes pa yid chos dang /_/_
[\[228b.3\]]sa he tu Shu/_/ran+b+h+ra shap+de thA nu sha yo dIr+g+ha dwe ShA nu tA pa yoH/_/s+thU lots+tsa yas+t+wa sA ka l+ye nA gA nAM ma d+h+ya me ga te/_/sa ma yAHsha pa thA tsA ra kA la sid+d+hAn+ta sam+bi daH/_/bya sa nA d+ya shu b+haM dai baM bi pa di t+ya na yAs+t+ra yaH/_/a t+ya yo\u0f85ti kra
[\[228b.4\]]rgyu dang bug sgra la'o/_/de nas a nu sha ya ni/_/yun ring zhe sdang rjes su gdung /_/s+thU lots+tsa ya ma tshang dang /_/glang chen 'bring du spyod pa'o/_/sa ma ya ni mna' dang sbyod/_/dus dang grub mtha' yang dag rig_/gnod sogs mi dge sngon las dang /_/phun sum tshogs min a na ya/_/a t+yo ni 'khyog pa dag/_/_
[\[228b.5\]]me kr-its+tsh+ra do She daN+De bya thA pa di/_/yud+d+hA ya t+yoHsam+pa bA yAHpU dz+yastu shwa shu ro pi tsa/_/pash+tsa da bas+thA pi ba laM sa ma bA pash+tsa san+na yau/_/saM g+hA te sa ni be she tsa saM s+t+yA yaHpra Na yAs+t+wa ma'i/_/bi shram+b+ha yAts+nyA pre mA No\u0f85bi ro

[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]d+he\u0f85pi sa muts+tsh+ra yaH/_/bi Sha yo ya s+ya yodz+nyA tasta tra shap+dA di ke Sh+wa bi/_/nir+YA se pi ka ShA yonyas+t+rI sa b+hA yAny+tsa pra ti shra yaH/_/prA yo b+hU m+n+yan+ta ga me ne ma n+yu dai n+ye kra tau kru d+hi/_/ra ha s+yo pas+thA yorgu h+yaM sa t+yaM sha pa tha ta th+ya yoH/_/bIr+YAM
[\[229a.2\]]@#/_/sa muts+tsh+ra ya 'gal med kyang /_/bi Sha ya ni shes bya yi/_/gang gi de la sgra sogs rnams/_/dur kha bska ba ka ShA ya/_/'du khang pra ti shra ya'o/_/prA yo phal cher mthar 'byin dang /_/ma n+yu mchod sbyin khro ba la/_/gsang dang nyer gnas gu h+yaM'o/_/sa t+yaM dag tshang bden pa'o/_/bIr+YaM
[\[229a.3\]]ba la pra b+hA bo tsa dra byam+b+ha bye gu NA shra ye/_/d+hiSh+T+yaM s+thA ne gr-i he b+heg+nau b+hA gyaM kar+m+ma shu b+hA shu b+haM/_/ka se/_gro ma la 'jug pa yod kyang 'dir rta/_ru he mno gAM ge yaM bi sha l+yA dan+ta kA pi tsa/_/br-i ShA ka pA yI shrI gaur+Ya ra b+hi khyA nA ma so b+ha yoH/_/A ram+b+ho niSh+k+r-i tiHshik+ShA pU dza naM

[\[229a.5\]]saM pra d+hA ra NaM/_/u pA yaHkar+m+ma tseSh+TA tsa tsa kit+sA tsa na bkri yAH/_/tshA yA sUr+ya pri yA kAn+tiHpra ti bim+ba nA ta paH/_/kak+Sh+yA pra koSh+ThI harmA deHkAts+yam+ma d+h+ye b+ha ban+d+ha ne/_/kr-i t+yA kri yA de ba ta yos+t+ri Shu b+he d+ye d+ha nA di b+hiH/_/_
[\[229a.6\]]dang bsgrub bya bgros pa zer thabs las sems/_/gso dpyad dgu la kri yA'o/_/tshA ya nyi ma'i chung ma mdzes/_/gzugs brnyan cha ba med rnams la'o/_/ka k+Sh+yA re mig bsil khang sogs/_/rked rgyan glang chen dbus su 'ching /_/kr-i t+yA bya ba lha dag gsum/_/dbye ba nor la sogs rnams kyis/_/_
[\[229b\]]
[\[229b.1\]]dza n+ya s+yAdz+dza na bA de pi dza g+ha n+yony+n+tonya me pi tsa/_/gar+h+yA d+hI nau tsa bak+ta byau ka l+yau sadz+dza ni rA ma yau/_/At+ma bA na nu pe tor+thAdar+th+yau pu N+yaM tu tsArba pi/_/rU pyaHpra shastu rU pe pi ba dA n+yo balgu bA ga pi/_/n+yA y+YA bi ma d+h+yaHso myaM tu sun+da re sho ma de ba tai/_/_
[\[229b.2\]]dza n+ya skye bos smod pa'o/_/dza g+ha n+yo ni mtha' yang bya/_/ngan pa gzhan dbang bak+ta byau/_/ka l+yau nad med yon tan can/_/bdag ldan nor bral ar+th+yo'o/_/pu N+ya yid du 'ong ba la'ang /_/rU pya dga' dang gzugs la'o/_/ba dA n+yo ni ngag mnyen pa/_/ma d+h+ya bar ma rigs pa la/_/so myaM gdu bu zla ba lha/_/bai

[\[230a.1\]]sma shrurbA tU ba rau/_/su bar+Ne bi rAHpa ri ka raHka pa ri bA ra yoH/_/muk+tA shud+d+hau tA raHs+yAt+sA ro bA yau pa tri Shu/_/karbu re\u0f85tha pra ti dz+nyA dzi sam+bi dA pat+su saM ga raH/_/be da b+he de gup+ti bA de man+t+ro mi tro ra bA ba pi/_/_

[\[230b.1\]]hA ra N+ye durga pa the kAn+tA raHpun+na buM sa kaM_/mat+sa ro\u0f85 n+ya shu b+ha dwe She tat+bat+k+r-i pa Na yo s+t+ri Shu/_/de bAd+d+h+r-i te ba raHshreSh+The tri Shu klI baM ma nA k+p+ri ye/_/baM shAM ku re ka rI ro\u0f85s+t+ra'i ta ru b+he de g+ha tre tsa nA/_/nA tsa mU dza ga ma ha sta
[\[230b.2\]]chen bgrod dka' lam dang ni/_/skyes bu ma ning kAn+tA ra/_/mat+sa ro ni gzhan dge la/_/zhe sdang de bzhin ser sna gsum/_/ba ra lha yis spel ba dang /_/mchog gsum ma ni cung zad dga'/_/baM shAM ku re smyug ma'i myug_/mo min shing dbye bum pa'o/_/dmag dpung dang ni dmag

[\[231a.1\]]traM shro Ni b+hAr+Ya yoH/_/yo gya b+hA dza na yoHpA traM pa traM bA ha Na pak+Sha yoH/_/nirde sha gran+tha yoHshAs+t+raM shas+t+ra mA yu d+ha lo ha yoH/_/s+yAdz+dza TAM shu ka yorne traM k+Shi traM bat+nI sha rI ra yoH/_/mukhA gre kro Da ha la yoHpo traM go trany+tsa nAm+ni tsa/_/sat+t+ra
[\[231a.2\]]@#/_/dbyi mgo zer/_/ma chu/_/rigs dang snod ni pA traM ngo /_/pa traM bzhon pa 'dab ma'o/_/shAs+t+raM nges bstan dang ni gzhung /_/shas+t+ra mtshon dang lpags dag la'o/_/rtsa phran gos mig ne traM'o/_/k+She traM chung ma lus dag go/_/phag sna gos bshol pa traM'o/_/go traM rigs dang ming la yang /_/saM

[\[232a\]]
[\[232a.1\]]ka Thi na ni rda yau/_/u dA ro dA tr-i ma hA to ri ta ras+t+wa n+ya nI tsa yoH/_/mnad swa ts+tshan+da yoHswai raHshu b+h+ra mud+dIp+ta shukla yoH/_/tsU Da ki rI TaM keshAsh+tsa saM ya tA mo la yas+t+ra yaH/_/dru ma pra b+he da mA taM ga kAN+Da
[\[232a.2\]]@#/_/ra mkhregs dang brtse ba med/_/u dA ra ni sbyin byed che/_/i ta ra ni gzhan dang dman/_/dman dang rang 'dod swai ra'o/_/shu b+h+ra snang gsal dkar po'o/_/ra mtha'o/_/gtsug phud cod pan skra dang ni/_/saM ya tA rnams mau la'o gsum/_/shing gi rab dbye glang po dang /_/_
[\[232a.3\]]puSh+pA Ni pI la baH/_/kr-i tAn+tA ne ha soHkA lash+tsa tur+the pi yu ge kaliH/_/s+yAt+ku raM ge pi ka ma laHprA bA re tsa pi kam+ba laH/_/ka ro pa hA ra yoHpu si ba liHprA N+yaM ga dze\u0f85s+t+ri yAM/_/s+tho l+ya sA mar+th+ya sai n+ye Shu ba laM nA kA ka shI ri NoH/_/bA
[\[232a.4\]]mda' dang me tog pI lu'o/_/mthar byed dus dag kA la'o/_/dus bzhi'i tha ma ka li'o/_/ri dgas bye brag ka ma la/_/gos dang snam bu kam+ba la/_/rgyal sdud ba li skyes bu'o/_/srog chags lus las skyes pa mo/_/stobs dang nus pa dmag dpung rnams/_/ba laM skyes bu bya rog thogs/_/bA

[\[232b\]]
[\[232b.1\]]b+he de pyA li sa khyA ba lI a pi/_/ab+d+h+yam+bu bi kr-i tau be lA kAl mar+YA da yo ra pi/_/ba hu lA kr-it+ti kA gA bau ba hu lo \u0f85 g+niHnyasi tau tri Shu/_/lI lA bi lA sa kri ya yo ru pa lAHsharka rA a pi/_/sho Ni te \u0f85m+b+ha saM kI lA laM mU la mA d+yeshi phA b+ha yoH/_/dzA

[\[232b.3\]]la sa mU ha A nA yo ga bAk+Sha k+ShA ra me tog 'ga' re dang lhan cig pas zer kA ba pi/_/shI la swa b+hA ba sad+b+r-i te sa bye he tu kr-i te pha laM/_/tsha dirne tra ru dzoHklI baM sa mU he pa Ta lan+na nA/_/a d+haHswa rU pa yo ras+t+rI ta laM s+yAts+tsA mi she pa laM/_/aurbA mtsho'i me zer na le

[\[233a\]]
[\[233a.1\]]pyas+t+rI tri Shu s+thU laM dza De pi tsa/_/ka rA lo dan+tu ro tud+ge tsA ro dak+She tsa pe sha laH/_/mUr+khe\u0f85r+b+ha ke pi bA laHs+yAl+lo lash+tsa la sa tr-iSh+Na yo/_/de bau dA bau ba NA ra N+ya ba h+nI dzan+ma hA rau b+ha bau/_/man+t+rI sa hA ya sa tsi bau pa
[\[233a.2\]]@#/_/mo min gsum po s+thU laM glen/_/ka rA la ni dma' dang mtho/_/mdzes dang mkhas pa pe sha la/_/rmongs dang byis pa bA la ste/_/lo la sred dang g.yo ba la/_/la mtha'o/_/de bau dA bau nags 'brog me/_/skye dang dbang phyug b+ha ba'o/_/blon po lhan cig sa tsi'o/_/_
[\[233a.3\]]ti shA khaM na rA d+ha bA/_/a ba yaHshai la me ShArkA A dz+nyA hwA nA d+hA rA ha bAH/_/b+hA baHsa twa swa b+hA bA b+hi prA ya tseSh+TAt+ma dzan+ma pu/_/s+yA dut+pA de pha le puSh+pe pra sa bo gar+b+ha mo tsa ne/_/a bi shwA se\u0f85pa h+na be pi
[\[233a.4\]]bdag po grogs mi d+ha bA'o/_/a bi ri bo lug nyi ma/_/bka' bsgo 'bod dang mchod sbyin rnams/_/A ha bA 'o b+hA ba ni/_/sems can rang bzhin dgongs pa dang /_/sems dang bdag skye rnams la'o/_/skye ba 'bras bu me tog dang /_/mngal nas btsas pa pra sa ba/_/yid mi ches dang ngan pa
[\[233a.5\]]ni kr-i tA ba pi ni hU baH/_/ut+se kA maR+Sha yo rits+tshA pra sa re ma ha ut+sa baH/_/a nu b+hA baHpra b+hA be tsa sa tAny+tsa mati nish+tsa ye/_/s+yAdz+dzan+ma he tuHpra b+ha baHs+thA naM d+yo pa lab+d+ha ye/_/d+h+ru bo b+ha b+he de klI be tu nish+tsi te shA shwa te
[\[233a.6\]]dang /_/nyes byas rnams kyang ni hU ba/_/mthor 'gro spro dang 'dod pa brkyang /_/mchod pa rnams la ut+sa ba/_/a nu b+hA ba rtogs pa dang /_/dgongs pa blo gros nges pa la/_/pra b+ha ba ni skye dgu dang /_/gnas dang don thob 'byung gnas so/_/d+h+ru ba rgyu skar dbye ba dang /_/ma ning nges dang rtag
[\[233b\]]
[\[233b.1\]]tri Shu/_/swa dz+nyA tA bAt+ma ni swaM tri Sh+wA mI yA swonyas+t+ri yAn+d+ha ne/_/s+t+rI ka TI ba s+t+ra ban+d+he pi nI bI pa ri pa Ne pi tsa/_/shi bA gau rI phe ra be pi dwaM dwaM ka la ha yug+ma yoH/_/dra byAsna bya ba sA ye pi sa twa mas+t+rI tu dzan+tu
[\[233b.2\]]pa gsum/_/swa ni gnyen dang bdag dang ni/_/swAM ni gsum ste bdag dang ni/_/swa ni mo min nor yin no/_/nI bI bud med rked gos mdud/_/tshong pa'i zong rnams la yang ngo /_/shi bA dkar mo ce spyang ngo /_/dwaM dwaM 'thab mo zur rang bzhin/_/dra bya zad dang rdzas la'o/_/sa twa mo min
[\[233b.3\]]Shu/_/klI baM na buM sa kaM shaN+De bA ts+ya liM ga ma bi kra me/_/dwau bi shau bai sh+ya ma nu dzau dwau tsa rA bya ma rta b+hi ma rauspa shau/_/dwau rA shI puny+dza me ShA d+yau dwau baM shau ku la maska rau/_/ra haHpra kA shau bI kA shau nirbe shau
[\[233b.4\]]b+h+ri sems can no/_/klI baM ma ning za ma ste/_/brjod bya'i rtags can rnam par gnas/_/la mtha'o/_/gnyis/_bi shau rje rigs mi dag go_/gnyis/_bang chen mngon spyod pa shau/_/gnyis/_rA shI phung po lug sogs khyim/_/baM shau rigs dang 'od ma'o/_/dben dang gsal ba bI kA sho/_/sa dang
[\[233b.5\]]ti gla zer b+ho ga yauH/_/kr-i tAn+te puM si kI nA shaHk+Shu dra kaR+Sha ka yo s+t+ri Shu/_/pa de lak+Sh+me ni met+te\u0f85pa de shaHs+yAt+ku sha map+su tsa/_/da shA bas+thA ne ka bi d+hA pyA sha tr-iSh+NA pi tsA ya tA/_/ba shAs+t+rI ka ra NI pa sh+yA dr-i ka dz+nyA ne dz+nyA ta ri tri Shu/_/_
[\[233b.6\]]longs spyod rang be sho_/mthar byed skyes bu kI nA sha_/ser sna dang ni mkhregs pa gsum/_/a pa de sha gnas mtshan rtags/_/ku sha rtswa dang chu la yang /_/da sha gnas skabs rnam mang po/_/a sha sred pa ring po'o/_/ba shA glang mo dbang du byed/_/dr-i sha blo dang mig yin gsum/_/karka
[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]s+yAt+karka saHbrtag dpyad med par kun la 'jug pa/_sA ha si kaHka Tho rA ma sr-i Nab pi/_'jungs pa/_pra kA sho\u0f85ti pra sid+d+he pi si shA ba dz+nye pi bA li shaH/_/su ra mat+s+yA ba ni mi Shau pu ru ShA bAt+ma mA na bo/_/kA ka mat+s+yA khe gau d+h+waM k+Shau kak+Shau tsa tr-i Na bI ru d+hau/_/a b+hI Shu pra gra he
[\[234a.2\]]@#/_/sha ni dpa' rtul dang /_/sra ba dang ni gyong ba'o/_/pra kA sha ni rab gsal grags/_/byis dang blun po bA li shaH/_/sha mtha'o/_/lha dang nya la ni mi Sha/_/pu ru ba ni bdag dang me/_/d+h+wAM k+Sha bya rog nya mkha' 'gro/_/kak+Sho rtsa dang 'khri shing ngo /_/a b+hI Shu ni srab 'od
[\[234a.3\]]rasmau pre ShaHpre Sha Namarda ne/_/pa k+ShaHsa hA ye pyuSh+NI ShaHshi ro beSh+Ta ki rI Ta yoH/_/shu kra le mU Shi ke shreSh+The su kr-i te br-i Sha b+he br-i ShaH/_/ko Shonyas+t+rI kuT+ma le pad+ma'i nang khaD+ga pi d+hA ne\u0f85r+thau g+ha di bya yoH/_/d+YU
[\[234a.4\]]zer/_/pre Sha 'gyed dang nyed pa'o/_/pak+Sha phyogs dang lhan cig la/_/uSh+NI kha ni gtsug tor dang /_/thod dang cod pa na dag la'o/_/rlig pa bye ba mchog dang ni/_/legs byas khyu mchog br-i Sha'o/_/ko Sha mo min grol med dang /_/ral gri'i shubs dang do na tshogs mnan/_/ak+Sha
[\[234a.5\]]te\u0f85_k+She shA ri pha la ke pyA kaR+Sho\u0f85thA k+Sha min+d+ri ye/_/nA d+YU tAng+ge kaR+She srang gi bzhi cha tsakre bya ba hA re ka li dru me/_/kaR+ShUr+b+bak+t+rA ka rI ShAg+niHkaR+ShUHku l+yA b+hi d+hA yi nI/_/sum+b+hA be tat+k+ri ye yAny+tsa pau ru ShaM bi Sha map+su tsa/_/u pA dA ne
[\[234a.6\]]sho dang sho ye stan/_/'gugs pa la'o de nas ni/_/ak+Sha dbang po sho lus 'dren/_'khor lo chos lus rtsod pa'i shing /_/kaR+ShU bzhin dang lci ba'i me/_/kaR+ShU 'gram dang brjod bya'o/_/skyes dngos bya ba pu ru ShaM/_/bi ShaM dug dang chu la yang /_/sha dang nyer len A mi
[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]byA mi ShaM s+yAd pa rA d+he pi kilba ShaM/_/s+yAd+p+r-i Sh+Tau lo ka d+hA twaM she bat+sa re baR+Sha mas+t+ri yAM/_/prek+ShA nr-it+te k+Sha NaM pradz+nyA b+hik+Sha se bAr+tha b+h-i tiH/_/twiT sho b+hA pi tri Shu pa ren+yak+Sha kAr+t+s+n+ye ni kr-iSh+Ta yoH/_/pra t+ya k+She\u0f85d+hi kri te\u0f85d+h+ya k+Sho ru k+Sha s+t+wa pre m+N+ya tsik+ka
[\[234b.2\]]ShaM/_/gnod byed sdig pa kilpi ShaM/_/char dang 'jig rten khams cha dang /_/lo rnams baR+Sha mo min no/_/prek+ShA gar lta shes rab bo/_/b+hi k+Sha zhabs thog slong dang gla/_/twi Sha mdzes dang 'od gsum gzhan/_/n+ya k+Sha nyes dang mtha' dag go/_/mngon sum bka' lung a d+h+yak+Sha/_/ru k+Sha mi mthun pa dang
[\[234b.3\]]Ne/_/rabi shwa tats+tsha dau haM so sUR+Ya bah+nI bi b+hA ba sU/_/bat+sau bar+Nu ka baR+Shau dwau sA raM gash+tsa di bau ka saH/_/shr-iM gA rA dau bi bIr+Ye gu Ne rA ge dra be rasaH/_/buM s+yut+taM sA ba taM sau dau kar+N+Na pU re pi shi kha re/_/_
[\[234b.4\]]rtsub/_/Sha mtha'o/_/nyi ma dang skya haM sa'o/_/nyi ma me 'od ba sU'o/_/bat+sau be'u lo dag gnyis/_/khug rta mtho ris di bau kas/_/sgeg pa la sogs nyams dang ni/_/dug dang thig le yon tan chags/_/khu ba rnams la ra sa'o/_/a ba taM sa ut+taM sA/_/gnyis te rna ba'i gong rgyan thod/_/lha yi bye
[\[234b.5\]]de ba b+he denyan li rasmau pa sU rat+na d+ha ne ba su/_/baSh+Nau tsa be d+haHs+t+rI twA shIr+hi tA sha sA hi daMSh+T+ra yoH/_/lA la se prAr+tha naut+su kye hiM sA tsar+YA de karma tsa/_/pra sU ra shwA pi b+hu d+yA bau ro da sau ro da shI tsa te/_/dz+wA lA b+hA sorna pu
[\[234b.6\]]brag rlung dang ni/_/'od zer rnams la ba sU'o/_/nor dang rin chen ba su'o/_/khyab 'jug kyang ni be d+ha sa/_/mo nyid A shI sa nyid ni/_/phan sems sbrul gyi mche ba'o/_/lA la sa ni slong dang sred/_/hiM sA chom rkun sogs kyi las/_/pra sU ma dang rgod ma'o/_/sa dang nam mkha' ro da s+ya/_/'od zer kyang ngo
[\[235a\]]
[\[235a.1\]]s+yar+ts+tsi dz+yo tir+b+ha d+yo ta dr-iSh+Ti Shu/_/pA bA ba rA d+ha yo rA gaHkha ga bA l+yA di no rba yaH/_/te dzaHpu rI Sha yorbar+ts+tsorma hastUs ba te dza soH/_/ra dzo gu Ne pi s+t+rI puSh+pe rA hau d+h+wan+te gu Ne ta maH/_/_
[\[235a.2\]]@#/_/b+hA sa ni/_/'bar ba dang ni ma ning ngo /_/a rtsis ni 'od snang mig_/sdig dang nyes pa A gsa'o/_/mkha' 'gro na mnyam ya bas so/_/'od dang bshad lam brtsas/_/chen po spro ba te dza sa/_/ra dza sa yon tan bud med rdul/_/ta mas sgra gcan mun yon tan/_
[\[235a.3\]]ts+tshan+daHpa d+yenyab+hi lA She tsa ta paHkr-its+tsh+rA di kar+m+ma tsa/_/sa ho ba laM sa mA rge na b+haHkhaM shrA ba No na b+hAH/_/o kaHsa da mA shra yash+tso kAHpa yaHk+ShI raM pa yom+bu tsaH/_/o dzo dIp+tau ba le shro ta in+d+ri ye nim+na gA ra ye/_/te
[\[235a.4\]]ts+tshan+das tshigs bcad mngon zhen no/_/ta pas dka' thub sogs kyi las/_/sa has stobs sa hA sa mgo zla/_/gro zhun na b+hA sa mkha' na b+has/_/o ka sa khyim dang rten o kA sa/_/pa yas 'o ma pa yas chu/_/o dzas mdangs 'od stobs la'o/_/shro tas dbang po gtsang po khyim/_/te dzas
[\[235a.5\]]dzaHpra b+hA be dIp+tau ba le shu kre pya tas+t+riShu/_/bi dwAn bi daMsh+tsa bI b+hat+so hiM sro pya ti sha ye twa mI/_/br-id+d+ha pra sha s+ya yor+dz+ye yA na ka nI yAM stu yu bA lpa yoH/_/ba rI yAM stu ru ba ra yoHsA d+hI yan+sA d+hu ba Ta yoH/_/da le pi bar+haM ni rban+d+ho pa rA gA rkA da yo gra
[\[235a.6\]]nus mthu sgron ma dang /_/stobs dang khu ba rnams la'o/_/bi dwA na ni rig pa'o/_/bIb+hat+sa ni rnam 'tshe'o/_/dz+ye yan+sa ni 'phel dang shis/_/ka nI yaM sa na tshod gzhon/_/ba rI yaM sa brla dang mchog_/sA d+hI yan+sa legs shin tu/_/sa mtha'o/_/'dom ma rma bya'i mdongs bar+ha/_/byis gdon gza' sogs_
[\[235b\]]
[\[235b.1\]]hAH/_/dwAr+YA pI De kwA tha ra se ni r+Ya ho nA ga daM ta ke_/tu lA sU tre\u0f85shwA di ra smau pra grA haHpra grA ho pa tsi/_/pat+nI pa ri dza nA dA na mU la shA pAHpa ri grahAH/_/dA ri Sh+wa pi gr-i hAHsro N+yA ma pyA ro ho bar s+t+ri yAH/_/byU ho br-in+de pya hi r+b+r-i tre
[\[235b.2\]]gra ha'o/_/sgo khyud nang dang sman bskol ba/_/niR+YU ha'o glang chen po/_/srag thag rta la sogs pa'i srab/_/pra grA ha dang bra gra ha'o/_/chung ma 'khor bcas len pa rtsa/_/mna' rnams pa ri gra hA'o/_/bud med khyim bdag 'dzin pa'o/_/chu so dang ni bud med mchog_/A ro ha'o byU ha tshogs/_/A hI sprul dang
[\[235b.3\]]lha pyag+nIn+d+warkA stA mo pa hAH/_/pa ri ts+tsha de nr-i pA r+he\u0f85r+the pa ri ba r+ho\u0f85bya yAHpa re/_/A dI Sha da r+the\u0f85b+hi byA btau sI mA r+the d+hA tu yo ga dze/_/A pra gr-i h+yaHsmr-i tau bA kye pyA stu s+yAt+ko pa pI Da yoH/_/pA pa kut+se Sha dar+the ku
[\[235b.4\]]min la/_/ta mo pa hA me nyi zla/_/yongs gcod mi dbang yo byad ni/_/pa ri brto mi zad phyir/_/ha mtha'o/_/cung zad don dang mngon khyab dang /_/khams dang mtshams sbyor las skyes Ang /_/dran pa dang ni ngag la yang /_/A ni mtshams mi sbyor ba'o/_/A ni khro ba zug rngu dang /_/sdig dang ngan pa nyung du ku/_/d+hing
[\[235b.5\]]d+hid+ni b+hAt+sa na nin+da yoH/_/tsA n+wA tsa ye sa ma hA re ta re ta ra sa muts+tsa ye/_/swa s+t+yA shiHk+She ma pu N+yA dau pra kaR+She laM g+ha ne pya ti/_/swit+p+rash+ne pi tarke tsa tu s+yAd+b+he de\u0f85ba d+hA ra Ne/_/sa kr-it+sa dai ka bA re tsA pyA rA d+dU ni
[\[235b.6\]]sdigs tshig smod pa dag_/rtsa ni zhar byung bsdu ba dang /_/re re ba dang kun las btus/_/swa sti shis pa bde legs dang /_/bsod nams la sogs shin tu dga'/_/mchongs pa la yang a ti'o/_/swita dri ba rnam rtog go/_/tu ni dbye ba dmigs 'dzin pa/_/sa kr-ita lhan du lhan cig pa/_/A rA da rid
[\[236a\]]
[\[236a.1\]]ra sa mI pa yoH/_/pra tI ts+yA tsa ra me pa sh+tsA du tA pyar+tha bi kalpa yoH/_/pu naHsa dar+tha yoHsha shwat+sA k+ShA t+p+ra t+ya k+Sha tu l+ya yoH/_/khe dA nu kam+pA saM to Sha basmi yA man+t+ra ne ba ta/_/han+ta haR+She nya nu kam+pA/_/_
[\[236a.2\]]@#/_/dang sa gcig dag_/nub phyogs phyi ma pa sh+tsA da'o/_/u tA'i don ni brtag dpyad dag_/yang dang rtag tu'i don sha shwata/_/sA k+ShA ta mngon sum mtshungs pa dag_/sems can rjes su brtse ba dang /_/nye bar tshim dang ngo mtshar dang /_/snyan gsan 'bebs pa ba ta'o/_/han+ta
[\[236a.3\]]yAM bA kyA ram+b+ha bi ShA da yoH/_/pra ti pra ti ni d+hau bIp+sA lak+Sha NA dau pra yo ga taH/_/i ti he tu pra ka ra Na pra kA shA di sa mAp+ti Shu/_/pra ts+yAM pu rastAt+p+ra tha me pu rAr+the\u0f85gra ta i t+ya pi/_/yA
[\[236a.4\]]dga' dang rjes brtse dang /_/ngag rtsom pa dang 'o brgyal ba/_/pra ti mtshon byed khyab 'gro 'dod/_/mtshan nyid la sogs rab sbyor las/_/i ti rgyu mtshan gnas skabs dang /_/gsal byed sogs dang rdzogs rnams la/_/pu ra stA ta ni shar phyogs dang /_/dang po sngon don bdun zhes pa'ang /_/ji
[\[236a.5\]]bat+tA bats+tsa sA ka l+ye nya ba d+hau mA na ba d+ha ra Ne/_/mang+ga lA nan+ta rA ram+b+ha prash+na kA r+t+s+n+ye Sh+wa tho a thaH/_/br-i thA ni ra r+tha kA bi d+h+yau rnA nA ne ko b+ha yAr+tha yoH/_/nu prits+tshA yAM bi kalpi tsa pash+tsAt+sa dr-i sh+ya yo ra nu/_/pra sh+na ba
[\[236a.6\]]snyed de snyed sA ka l+ya/_/bar mtshams tshad dang dmigs 'dzin no/_/bkra shis rgyun mi chad dang rtsom/_/'dri dang mtha' dag a tha'o/_/de nas br-i tha don med dang /_/bya min la'o nA nA ni/_/du ma dang ni gnyi ga'i don/_/nu ni dri ba rnam rtog dang /_/phyi ma 'dra dag a nu'o/_/'dri ba dmigs 'dzin
[\[236b\]]
[\[236b.1\]]d+hA ra NA nu dz+nyA \u0f85nu na yA man+d+ra Ne na nu/_/gar+hA sa muts+tsa ya prash+na shaM kA sam+b+hA ba nA swa pi/_/u pa mA yAM bi kalbe sA mi twar+d+he dzu gup+sa ne/_/a mas ha sa mI pe tsa kam+WA ri ni tsa mUr+d+h+ni tsa/_/i bat+the mar+tha yo re baMnu naM ta rke\u0f85tha ni sh+tsa ye/_/_
[\[236b.2\]]rjes dang bsgo/_/yid gcugs 'bod pa na nu'o/_/smod dang kun btus 'dri ba dang /_/dgos pa 'byung 'gyur ba a pi'o/_/nyer 'jal 'dam kha bA yin no/_/sA mi phyed dang smod pa la/_/a mA lhan cig sa gcig nye ba dang /_/kaM ni chu dang spyi bo la/_/dpe dang 'di yi don e waM/_/nu naM rtog dang don nges la'o/_/_
[\[236b.3\]]tUSh+NI mar+the su khe dzo ShaM kiM pr-its+tshA yAM dzu gu gup+sa ne/_/nA ma pra kA sh+ya sam+b+hA n+ya kro d+ho pa ga mu gut+sa ne/_/a laM b+hU Sha Na par+YA p+ti yongs su rdzogs pa/_shak+ti nus pa/_bA ra Na bA tsa kaM/_/huM bi ta rke pa ri prash+ne sa ma yAn+ti ka ma d+h+yo yoH/_/pu na ra pra tha ma b+he de ni rnish+tsa ya ni She d+ha yoH/_/_
[\[236b.4\]]mi smra'i don bde dzo Sha'o/_/kiM ni dri dang smod pa la/_/nA ma ston byed 'byung ba dang /_/khro dang khas len ngan pa'o/_/a laM rgyan dang rnam grangs thob/_/mdung thung dang ni chog tshig la/_/hUM ni rnam rtog yongs su 'dri/_/sa ma ya ni nye dang dbus/_/pu nar dang po ma yin dbye/_/nir ni nges dang dgag pa
[\[236b.5\]]s+yAt+p+ra ban+d+he tsi rA tI te na ka TA gA mi ke pu rA/_/u rar+pU rI tso da rI tsa bi stA renyad+gi kr-i tau tra yaM/_/swa rge pa ro tsA lo ke swarbA r+t+tA sam+b+hA bya yoH ki la/_/ni She d+ha bA kyA laM ka ra dzi dz+nyA shA nu na ye kha lu/_/sa mI nye ba/_po b+ha ya taH/_shA+e
[\[236b.6\]]la/_/pra ban+d+ha ni dus ring 'das/_/nye 'khor 'byung 'gyur sngon ma ring /_/u ra pU ri bi da rI/_/chu zheng khas len byas dag gsum/_/mtho ris pha rol 'jig rten spar/_/gtam dang 'byung ba dag ki la/_/dgag pa tshig gi rgyan dang ni/_/shes 'dod gtsugs pa kha lu'o/_/sa gcig gnyi ga myur ba'o/_/_
[\[237a\]]
[\[237a.1\]]g+h+ra sA ka l+yA b+hi mu khe\u0f85b+hi taH/_/nA ma pra kA sh+ye yoHprA dur+m+mi tho\u0f85n+yo n+yaM ra ha s+ya pi/_/ti ran+tar+d+h+wau tir+Ya gar+the hA bi ShA da shu gar+t+ti Shu/_/a ha he t+yad+b+hu te khe de hi he tA ba ba d+hA ra Ne/_/ya ne kArba bar+g+gaH//_//tsi rA
[\[237a.2\]]@#/_/mtha' dag mngon gyur a b+hi ta/_/ming dang gsal byed prA du ra/_/mi tho phan tshun dben pa'ang /_/ti ra sgrib dang dud 'gro'i don/_/hA ni sdug bsngal mya ngan la/_/a ha ha ni rmad byung skyo/_/hi ni rgyu mtshan dmigs 'dzin no/_/don sna tshogs kyi sde tshan no//_//rgyun
[\[237a.3\]]ya tsi ra rA trA ya tsi ra s+yA d+yAsh+tsi rAr+tha kAH/_/mu huHpu naHpu naHsha shwa da b+hIk+Sh+Na ma sa kr-itsha mAH/_/srAg+d+ha gi t+yany+dza sA h+nA ya sa ya di drAM mak+Shu tsa dra te/_/ba la bat+suSh+Thu ki/_/mu ta swa t+ya tI ba tsa nir+b+ha re/_/pr-i
[\[237a.4\]]ring yun ring ring po dang /_/dus ring po la sogs pa'i don/_/yang dang slar dang slad dang ni/_/rtag tu yang yang gcig min mtshungs/_/mgyogs myur skyon dang yud tsam dang /_/de ma thag dang me sdod myur/_/shin tu nan tar ha las dang //_//su dang a ti shin tu'i don/_khyad 'phags la'o/_/so
[\[237a.5\]]thag+bi nAn+ta re Na rte tu hi ru ka nA nA tsa brdza ne/_/yat+tad+ya tasta to he tA ba sA ka l+ye tu kiny+tsi ta/_/ka dA tsidz+dzA tu sArban+tu sA kaM sa traM sa maM sa ha/_/A nu ku l+yAr+tha kaM prA d+h+weM byar+tha ke tu br-i thA mu d+hA/_/A ho u tA ho ki mu tA bi
[\[237a.6\]]so re re mthar byas dang /_/tu hi rug dang nA nA bor/_/yad tad gang las de las rgyu/_/thams cad ma yin kiny+tsi ta/_/ka dA tsi ta ni ni ma zhig go/_/lhan cig dus gcig mnyam mtshungs ldan/_/mthun phyogs don dang mthun pa'o/_/don med byar med don med do/_/rtog pa rnam rtog brtag pa dang /_/'dam
[\[237b\]]
[\[237b.1\]]kalpe kiM ki mU ta tsa/_/tu hi tsasma ha bai pA da pU ra Ne pU dza ne swa ti/_/di bA h+nI t+ya tha do Sha tsa nak+tany+tsu ra dza nA bi ti/_/ter+Ya gar+the 'khyog po/_sA tse ta ro pya tha saM b+ho d+ha nAr+tha kAH/_/s+yuH Sh+T+yA T+pA DaM ga he hai b+hoHsa ma yA
[\[237b.2\]]kha ci zhig rnam par rtog_/tu hi tsasma ha dang bai/_/tshig gi kha skong don yin no/_/su dang a ti mchod pa'i bya/_/nyin mo thun dang de nas ni/_/nyis mtshan nam zhes bya ba'o/_/dud 'gro'i don dang sA tsi phyugs/_/de nas bod pa'i don yin no/_/s+yuHs+yA Ta dang pA DaM ga_/he hai b+hoHrnams bod pa'o/_/lhan

[\[240b.1\]]phon pa/_goN+DA pi lto ba/_tsiN+Da bta/_btags pa/_/ga DuHka raN+Do la gu Do dong ba/_ba raN+Da sh+tsa bcings pa ki No g+hu NaH/_/dr-i pags pa ti sI man+ta ha ri to ro man+tha ng+gI tha bung+bu dAH/_sman bye brag/_kA sa mardo\u0f85rda ni kun+daHme tog/_phe nastU pau sa zan/_pU ba kau_/A ta paHk+Sha tri ye nA b+hiHka Na ya k+Shu ra ke da raH/_/pU ra khu

[\[241a\]]
[\[241a.1\]]taM/_/pA trA d+ya dan+tai re kA r+tho d+d+wi gu rla k+ShA nu sA ra taH/_/dwaM dwai ka twA byA yI b+hA bo pa thAHsaM khyA nya bya yat+pa raH/_/Sha Sh+Th+yA sh+tshA yA ba hu nAM tse dwi ts+tshA yaM saM ha to sa b+hA/_/shA lAr+thA pi pa rA rA dza ma nu Sh+yA r+thA da rA dza
[\[241a.2\]]@#/_/pa'i rA tra dang /_/snod la sogs pa a ta mtha' rnams kyi don/_/gcig pa'i ba gnyis mtshon bya'i rjes 'brang nas/_/zlas dbye'i gcig nyid mi zad gyur pa dag_/mi zad grangs las pha rol pa tha'o/_/gal te ming ni drug pa las tshA ya/_/tshogs pa dang ni 'dus pa'i bits+tsh+wa ya/_/khang don pha rol mi ma yin gyi don/_/rA dza min pa'i rgyal po las kyang
[\[241a.3\]]kA ta/_/dA shI sa b+haM nr-i pa sa b+haM rak+ShaHsa b+ha mi mA di shaH/_/u pa dz+nyo pa kra mAM tats+tsa ta dA di twa pra kA sha ne/_/ko pa dz+nyA ko pa kra mA di kan+tho shI na ra nA ma su/_/b+hA b+he na Na ke tsid+b+h+yo \u0f85_n+ye sa mU he b+hA ba karma NoH/_/_
[\[241a.4\]]ste/_/'bangs kyi mdun sa mi bdag mdun sa dang /_/srung ba'i mdun sa 'di rnams phyogs tsam mo/_/nye bar shes dang nye bar bgrod pa'i mtha'/_/de ni dang por rab tu gsal ba rang /_/tshangs pa shes dang tshangs pa'i go rims sogs/_/u shI na ra'i ming can la kan+tha/_/na Na ka tsi ta las gzhan dngos po dang /_/tshogs pa dang ni dngos po la sa dag_/_
[\[241a.5\]]a dan+ta pra t+ya yAHpuN+ya su di nA b+h+yAM twa haHpar/_/kri yA\u0f85bya yA nAM b+he da kA n+ye ka twA+e\u0f85p+Yu k+thatoT ke/_/tso tsaM pits+tshaM gr-i ta s+thU naM ti rI TaM marma yo dza ne/_/rA dza sU yaM bA dza pe yaM ga rkyang ng+ya pa tshegs bcad/_/d+ya kr-i tau ka beH/_/_
[\[241a.6\]]la/_/a ta mtha'i rkyen rnams bsod nams nyi ma bzang /_dag las pha tu ni a haH'o/_/bya ba mi zad rnams kyi dbye ba rnams/_/gcig nyid kyang ngo rig bye gar gyi bye brag/_/ta la'i 'bras bu dang ni rma bya'i mdongs/_/thong la kA rATo yod pas brtag_/khyim gyi ka ba thod thod la ki rI Ta yod pas brtag dang srog gi gnad/_/dpag tshad dang ni rgyal po'i sbyin dang /_/bA dza mchod pa po yaM tshigs bcad rkang ldan dang /_
[\[241b\]]
[\[241b.1\]]mA Ni kya b+hA Sh+ya sin+dU ra tsI ra tsI ba ra pany+dza raM/_/lo kA ya taM ha ri tA laM bi da la s+thal thil ming bAh+la baM//_//pun+na pun+sa ka yoHshe Sho \u0f85 ar+d+hA/[ \u0f85 ]r+d+wa r+ts+tsa/_r+d+hA rig bye dra grangs/_rtsa pi N+ya ka kaN+Da kAH/_/mod la du ko daN+Da ka tshong pa'i stong pa ri ka/_stad+ka sdeb sbyor ram ras ring po/_shA Ta kaHkarba To\u0f85 rdo 'jog/_rbu
[\[241b.2\]]snyan ngag mkhan byas nor bu dang ni skad/_/li khri gos dang chos gos dang ni gur/_/'jig rten rgyang pan dang ni ba bla dang /_/bdug rdzas ster ma dang ni gur gum mo//_//skyes bu ma ning dag la'o lhag ma yi/_/phyad mchod 'ba' cha dang ni tsher ma dang /_/zas kyi bye brag rgyun chags mthun bral dang /_/gos dang brgya grong de bzhin shar
[\[241b.3\]]daH/_/pa ta ko d+Yo ga tsa ra ka ta mA lA mA la na DaH/_mdze nang la'ang /_/kuSh+Tha muN+Da shI d+hu bsta 'bru sogs phye mar byas/_k+Sh+we Di taM k+She ma kuT+Ti 'og gi zhal ba/_maM/_/saM ga ma sha ta mA yon tan nAr+m+ma sam+ba lA bya ya tAN+Da baM/_/ka bi yaM kar+m+ma kar+p+yA sa pA ra bA raM yu gan+d+ha raM/_/_
[\[241b.4\]]dang ni/_/ltung ba dang ni nyer sbyor sman dpyad dang /_/ta mA lA dang grong mtha' ldum ra dang /_/ru rta mgo bo'i chang dang bas ta dang /_/seng sgra dang ni bde dang bum pa dang /_/yang dag 'grogs dang brgya tshad mig nad dang /_/rgyags dang mi zad pa dang gar stabs so/_/kha yi sgye dang las dang ras bal dang /_/pha rol tshu rol dang ni gnya' shing
[\[241b.5\]]yU paM/_yU yaM rang zer/_pra grI ba pA tri be yU sran phye/_Shany+tsa sran sogs khu ba/_ma sa tsi k+ka sngo gro nas bye sau/_/tsik+ka sau/_/ar+d+ha r+ts+tsa rig byed grangs/_dau g+h+r-i tA dI nAM pu s+t+wA d+yaM bai di kaM d+h+ru baM/_/tan+no k+ta mi ha lo ke pi tats+tsa das+t+ya stu she Sha bta//_//s+t+rI puM sa yo ra pa t+yan+ta dwi tsa tuH ShaT+pA
[\[241b.6\]]'dzin/_/mchod sdong pra grI rab mgrin ba dang lhung bzed dang /_/ga'u zla ba dang ni chang gi snod/_/phyed mchod la sogs dang ni mar la sogs/_/skyes pa nyid phyir gang zhig nges par rig_/de 'dir bshad pa min pa 'jig rten na/_/gal te yod na'ang lhag ma bzhin du gyis//_//bud med skyes pa dag la'o bu rgyud mtha'/_/gnyis
[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]]do ra gAH/_/dzA ti b+he dAHpu mA khyA sh+tsa s+t+rI yo gaiH sa ha mal+la kaH/_/mu ni rba rA Ta kaH swA tirba r+N+Na ko dzA Ta li r+m+ma nuH/_/mU ShA sr-i bya shing rta mo/_pA TI 'bras bu karkan+d+hu yaSh+TiHsA TI ka TI ku TI/_khang chung /_/s+t+r+wi na puM na sa
[\[242a.2\]]@#/_/bzhi drug gi rkang ldan brang 'gro rnams/_/rigs kyi bye brag skyes par kun tu bshad/_/bud med ldan pa rnams kyis lhan cig gyad/_/thung pa lte ba dang ni sa ri dang /_/kha dog can dang ral pa can dang thun/_/gser skong bya yi bye brag khrag 'dzin dang /_/mchod sdong gos dang rked pa phu lu'o/_/bud med ma ning dag la'o kha
[\[242a.3\]]ka yo rba \u0fb7\u0f71 ba bkri ya yoH_Sh+ya \u0f85\u0f90 tsi tsa\u0f85ts+tsa bu nya/_/au tsi t+ya mau tsi tI mai trAM bu \u0f85\u0fa4\u0fb2 \u0f71gu da hr-i taH/_/Sha Sh+th+ya n+ta prA k+pa dAHpe nAts+tshA ya sA lA su rANi shAH/_/s+yu rbA nri se naM shwa ni shaM go shA la mi ta re tsa di kra/_/A ba n+no t+ta ra
[\[242a.4\]]cig tu/_/dngos po bya ba dag laSha nya dang pu nya/_/rigs dang mi rigs dang ni byams pa dang /_/mi byams bu nya dang por dper brjod pa/_/drug pa'i mtha' yi tshig rnams snga ma can/_/dmag dang grib ma ra ba chang mtshan mo/_/yang na'o dmag gi mi dang sang dgongs dang /_/ba lang rab gzhan la'ang phyogs yin no/_/ab an mtha' can tshig
[\[242a.5\]]pa do dwi gush+tsA puM si na sh+tsa lu pa/_/dik+t+ri kha T+wAM tri kha T+wI tsa tri tak+Sha pi mA na sAta//_//tri Shu pA trI pu Ta 'khar snod/_bA TI pe TI ku ba la dA Di mau/_/pa ra ling+ga swa pra d+hA ne dwa dwe tat+pu ru She pi ta ta/_/ar+tha n+tAHprA d+ya laM prA p+tA pan+na
[\[242a.6\]]rnams phyi ma can/_/ba gnyis pa dang skyes min na yang dbyi/_/phyogs dang khri gsum khri gsum gsum 'jog kyang //_//gsum rnams snod dang phur ma dang ni khur/_/sgrom dang ut+pal dang se 'bru'o/_/pha rol rtags ni rang gtso zlas dbye dang /_/de yi skyes bu yang de don gyi mtha'/_/pra sogs a laM thob dang rnyed pa dang /_/snga
[\[242b\]]
[\[242b.1\]]pUrbAHpa ro pa gAH/_/tad+d+hi tAr+the dwi guHsaM khyA sarba nA ma ta dan+ta kAH/_/ba hu brI hi ra ding+nA man mun+ne yaM ta du dA hr-i taM/_/gu Na dra bya kri yA yo go pA d+hi b+hiHpa ra gA mi naH/_/kr-i taHka r+t+tar+YaM saM dz+nyA yAM kr-i t+yAHkar+t+ta ri
[\[242b.2\]]ma can dang pha rol nye bar 'gro/_/de yan don dang po gnyis pa dang grangs/_/sarba nA ma de yi mtha' can rnams/_/phyogs kyi ming min 'bru mang po nyid de/_/de yi dper brjod rnams na grang bar bya/_/yon tan rdzas dang bya ba la sbyor ba'i/_/sngon ma can rnams pha rol 'gro ba can/_/ming med byed pa po la kr-ita rnams te/_/las dang byed pa po la
[\[242b.3\]]kar+m+ma Ni/_/a nA d+yan+tAsta na rak+tAd+yar+the nA nAr+tha b+he de kAH/_/ShaT saM dz+nya kASh+Ti Shu sa mA yuSh+ma dasmat+ti nga bya yaM/_/pa raM bi ro d+he se Shan+tu dz+nye yaM shiSh+Ta pra yo ga taH/_/lid+ga saM gra ha bar+g+gaH/_/pad+ma
[\[242b.4\]]kr-id+ya rnams/_/des btsos la sogs don la aN sogs mtha'/_/sna tshogs don gyi dbye ba can rnams so/_/drug gi ming can rnams ni gsum dang mnyam/_/yuSh+mad a smad ting dang mi zad pa/_/'gal ba la ni phyi ma'o lhag ma rnams/_/mchog gi sbyor ba las ni shes par bya/_/rtags bsdus pa'i sde tshan no//_//pad+ma rnams ni
[\[242b.5\]]ni bo d+ha ya t+yar+k+kaHkA byA ni ku ru te ka bi/_/tat+sau ra b+han+na b+ha swan+taHsan+ta stan+ban+ti tang+gu NA naH/_/sa mAp+ta mi da ma ma ra siM ha kr-itan+nA ma laM ng+gA nu shA sa naM//_//bud+d+hA pu N+yA nu b+hA be na de ba tA nAM ma te ba tsa/_/yo yo\u0f85r+thaHsa ma b+hi prA
[\[242b.6\]]nyi mas rgyas/_/snyan ngag rnams ni mkhas ba yis/_/de yi dri bzang rlung gis 'ded/_/de bzhin mkhas pas de yon tan/_/'chi med seng+ges byas pa'i ming dang rtags rjes su bstan pa 'di rdzogs so//_//sangs rgyas bsod nams mthu dag dang /_/lha rnams kyis ni bsam pa yis/_/khyed kyi 'dod don gang yin
[\[243a\]]
[\[243a.1\]]taHsarbo \u0f85r+tho \u0f85d+ya sa mr-i d+h+ya tAm/_/nA nA ka bI nAM ya di nA ma ko ShAHsaM t+ye ba kA byA r+thA be daM pra ban+d+hA/_/ta thA bi sUk+te \u0f85ma ra saM ha nAm+naHka be ra tI ba pra sr-i taM ma no naH//_//ye d+har+m+ma he tu pra b+ha bA he tun+te ShAn+ta thA ga to
[\[243a.2\]]@#/_/pa'i/_/don de de ring grub gyur cig_/sna tshogs snyan ngag rnams kyi ming gi mdzod/_/snyan ngag don rig rnams kyis rab sbyar ba/_/de ltar 'chi med seng ges legs par bshad/_/snyan ngag pa rnams yid la dga' ba spel/_/gang rnams chos rnams rgyu las byung ba dang /_/de yi rgyu dang de 'gog
[\[243a.3\]]h+ya ba data/_/te ShA ny+tsa yo ni ro d+hA e baM bA dI ma hA shra ma NaH//_//paN+Di ta chen po kIr+t+ti tsan+d+ra'i zhal snga nas/_yar lung pa grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis bal yul yam bu'i grong khyer du bsgyur ba'o/_/_
[\[243a.4\]]gang yin pa/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis bka' stsal te/_/de skad gsung ba'i tshul can dge sbyong che//_//shu b+haM ma stus rba dza ga tAM/_slad nas 'gos lots+tsha ba dge slong shrI d+harma pA la b+ha dra zhes bgyi bas/_/rgya dpe dang 'gyur rnying la gtugs te/_don
[\[243a.5\]]la ci nus dpyad de 'gyur bde bar bgyis pa'o/_/sna tshogs dngos po rnams kyi mngon brjod pa/_/rin chen 'byung gnas la 'gran bstan bcos 'di/_/sngon gyi paN+Di ta dang lo tsA bas/_/gangs can skad du bsgyur ba'i rjes su yang /_/ma dag
[\[243a.6\]]dka' ba rnams/_/gtsug lag dbang po bgyis te ci nus bcos/_/slad nas 'jig rten mig mchog rnams kyis kyang /_/'grel dang bstun nas byi dor rnam dag zhu/_/sarba mang+ga lo//_//_

[\[244b\]]
[\[244b.1\]{D4300}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_a ma ra ko ShaTI kA kA ma d+he nu nA ma/_bod skad du/_'chi ba med pa'i mdzod kyi rgya cher 'grel pa 'dod 'jo'i ba mo zhes bya ba/_bcom ldan 'das gsung gi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sa mchog chen po brnyes las 'khrungs/_/bdud rtsi rdzu 'phrul
[\[244b.2\]]yal 'dab ldan/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i dpag bsam shing /_/khyed la me tog 'bras bur shog_/gang gA'i chu bo rab 'bab bzhin/_/gang gi thugs rje lam gsum gshegs/_/dpal gyi rgya mtsho bdud rtsi'i gter/_/srid pa'i zla phyed bdag phyag 'tshal/_/srid pa'i mtsho chen de
[\[244b.3\]]las sgrol byed chos kyi gru/_/snying rje'i dpag bsam ljon pa'i shing las grub gyur pa/_/rab tu dang sems dad pa'i skyo ba rab bskyod de/_/pha rol phyin nas mngon 'dod rin chen thob par shog_/bung bas me tog rtsi blangs thigs pa rab bsags ltar/_/gang zhig blo gros bzang po'i btung ba
[\[244b.4\]]'jo zhing ster/_/snyan dngags mkhan dbang yid 'ong gtsug gi me tog bzhin/_/dpal ldan 'chi med gsung pa de nyid gcig pu rgyal/_/mtha' yas rgyud kyi mngon brjod chu gter rin chen gang /_/snyan dngags mgrin pa'i do shal bang mdzod rnam bkod rnams/_/dpal ldan tsaN+Da go mis
[\[244b.5\]]sbyar ba'ang phul byung mod/_/des na rab tu bsgrub pa'i cho ga bdag gis brtsam/_/de nas gzhan la phan pa rjes su ston pas sdig pa rab tu zhi ba dang /_/bsod nams phun sum tshogs pa bsag pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po la mchod par brjod pa ni/_gang gi zhes pa la sogs
[\[244b.6\]]pa ste/_mkhyen pa ni yul gyi dngos po mtha' dag yongs su mkhyen pa'o/_/brtse ba ni sdug bsngal las yang dag par 'don par bzhed pa'o/_/de gnyis ni rgya mtsho dang 'dra bas rgya mtsho ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de'i mkhyen pa dang brtse ba ni rgya mtsho'o/_/'dir rgya mtsho'i sgras gting
[\[244b.7\]]med pa la sogs pa'i yon tan mtshungs pa nye bar 'jal ba'o/_/mkhyen pa dang brtse bas byas pa de ni gting med pa la sogs pa can zhes pa ste/_byed pa po la mang po'o zhes pa'i bsdu ba'o/_/bya ba ni ma 'ongs pa'i don can yin pa'i phyir 'dir dgos pa med do/_/mkhyen pa dang brtse ba dag ni rgya
[\[245a\]]
[\[245a.1\]]mtsho'o zhes bshad pa ni byed pa po sgrub pa ste/_de'i tshig mi mngon pa'am yang na drug pa 'brel pa'i bsdu ba'o/_/mkhyen pa dang brtse ba dag ni rgya mtsho lta bur gyur pa ste/_rgya mtsho ni gzhi yangs pa'o/_/rgya mtsho ni brtan zhing yangs pa'o zhes lha rnams la rab tu grags so/_/_
[\[245a.2\]]gting med pa ni gzhan gyis mi rtogs pa ste/_gang gi mkhyen pa dang brtse ba'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol zab mo yongs su dpyod mi nus pa'o/_/gang gi phyir bcom ldan 'das de'i mkhyen pa dang brtse ba shes bya'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dag la khyab pas/_gang yang sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtsho gting mtha' med
[\[245a.3\]]pa skyabs med pa'i 'gro ba rnams kyis mngon par khyab cing gang ba de dag gang gis mthar thug par sgrol nus pa de lta bur gyur pa gang yin pa de ni sdig med de/_'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyes pa rnams spangs pa'o/_/yon tan ni byams pa dang bzod pa dang nye bar zhi ba la sogs pa ste/_
[\[245a.4\]]gu Na bod pa la'o zhes pa ata mtha' can gyi byings tsur sogs kyi lhag ma yin te/_tshogs dang bcas pa yongs su ma rdzogs par br-ita byas pas so/_/bod pa dang goms pa dang bsngags pa'i don rnams la zhes pas e ra tsa'o/_/kye blo ldan khyed cag rnams kyis de bstan par bya ba nyid yin
[\[245a.5\]]no zhes rtogs par bya'o/_/khyad par du 'phags pa don dam pa grub pa'i phyir du brtse ba dang blos pha rol tu son pa tshol bar byed pa dang mchog gi snying rje la sogs pa yon tan chen po de lta bu ni gzhan la phan pa dang bde ba yang dag par sgrub pa la zad pa mi mnga' zhing bsnyel ba mi mnga' bas na
[\[245a.6\]]mi zad pa'o/_/yang na 'khor bar gnas pa nyid na yang 'di la rga shi mi mnga' bas mi zad pa'o/_/gting med pa ni rgya mtsho'i mthil la mi reg pa nyid do/_/sdig med kyi yon tan nyid rin po che'i 'byung gnas su gyur pas na mi zad pa ste yongs su gang ba nyid do/_/skye bo mtha' dag 'bras bu la
[\[245a.7\]]gzhol bar rab tu 'dzud pas na rab tu 'jug pa'i 'bras bu ston to/_/dpal dang bdud rtsi'i phyir du yang zhes pa ni/_'tshed pa'i phyir du 'gro bar byed pa bzhin du de'i don nyid la bzhi pa'i rnam dbye'o/_/gang gi yi ge ni phan tshun sdud pa'i tshig go/_/dpal ni phun sum tshogs pa'o/_/bdud
[\[245b\]]
[\[245b.1\]]rtsi'i ched du zhes pa bcud len gyi phyir bsten pa'o/_/mkhyen pa dang brtse ba'i rgya mtsho ni srid par bde ba 'dod pa'i mkhas pa rnams kyis dpal gyi phyir te/_sde tshan gsum gyi phun sum tshogs pa'i phyir dang /_thar pa 'dod pa rnams kyis bdud rtsi'i phyir te thar pa'i ched du bsten par bya ba
[\[245b.2\]]nyid do zhes pa'o/_/'dir mkhyen pa dang brtse ba'i rgya mtsho la sogs pa rnams kyis thams cad mkhyen pa sems can thams cad la rgyu med par mchog tu mnyes gshin pa'i rang bzhin can bcom ldan 'das bde bar gshegs pa de nyid nye bar mtshon par byed pas na/_/'di ni rab tu dngas
[\[245b.3\]]pa zhes bya ba'i snyan dngags kyi yon tan te/_ji skad du/_dbyangs can gyi mgul rgyan gyi snyan dngags kyi rgyan las/_gang gi don ni rab gsal ba/_/de ni rab tu dngas par brjod/_/dper na/_'di shar gyur pas rgya grol pad+ma can rnams rgyas gyur cing /_/ri dang nags tshal man+d+ra ra ba'i
[\[245b.4\]]me tog gzhon nu bzhin/_/dur ba lhan cig mi gnas rab tu bcom zhing gnyis gnyis gnyen/_/spre'u rab tu khros pas mkhur tshos 'gram pa zangs mdog bzhin/_/zhes pa 'dir mun pa bsal bas dur ba'i mya ngan bsal te/_ngur pa pho mo mtshan mo lhan cig mi gnas pa yin la/_de la
[\[245b.5\]]sogs pa bsal bas/_nyi ma'i mtshan nyid ma bshad kyang don gyis rab tu gsal bar mtshon par byed pa bzhin no/_/tshigs su bcad pa 'di bstan bcos la yang sbyar te/_'dir snyan dngags smra ba nyid kyis dang por rig pa'i gnas mtha' dag la shes pa sbyin pa dang /_de'i dpal ni phun sum
[\[245b.6\]]tshogs pa'o/_/shes pa sbyin pa nyid kyis phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i phyir rgya mtsho dang 'dra bas/_rgya mtsho ste bstan bcos so/_/'di ni rgyu'i gzugs can gyi rgyan te/_ji ltar/_zab pas rgya mtsho dang mtshungs zhes pa bzhin no/_/de'i gting med pa nyid ni ji skad bshad pa'i yon tan dang ldan
[\[245b.7\]]pas mtshungs pa med pa nyid do/_/sdug bsngal gyis gzir ba rnams la sdig pa zhes mngon par brjod de/_sdig med ni yon tan nyid dang /_bde ba'i rgyur nyung ba dang gsal ba nyid la sogs pa'o/_/bsten pa ni thos pa dang bsam pa dang 'chad pa la sogs pas so/_/mi zad pa ni yang dag par
[\[246a\]]
[\[246a.1\]]rdzogs pa nyid do/_/yang na ming gi sgra thams cad kyi go rims dang /_rtags gsal bar brjod pa'i go rims kyi tshad do/_/'di ltar las dang mngon par 'dod pa dag la de yang dag par rab tu sbyin pa'o/_/gang yang las dang byed pa po dag las aN dag go/_/de la 'dir
[\[246a.2\]]'dod pa na spyod pa'i thos pa'i don gyi go rims nyid rgya mtsho'i sgra ste de ni rtags zhes nges par bstan te/_ming dang rtags rjes su bstan pa'i sgra'i'o/_/dpal ni sde tshan gsum gyi phun sum tshogs pa'o/_/de yang slob dpon byA Das/_dpal dang dbyangs dang blo yi sde gsum gyi/_/phun tshogs
[\[246a.3\]]'byor pas mdzes par gyur rnams la/_/'jigs pa med pa'i yo byad gang yin pa'i/_/yon tan de yang dpal zhes rab tu bshad/_/ces gsungs so/_/yang na thams cad mkhyen pa'i gsung gi rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa ni rang gi don phun sum tshogs pa yin zhing /_de'i rgyu
[\[246a.4\]]can sde tshan gsum gyi rgyu ni gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa ste/_de gnyis ka ni dpal lo/_/rang dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa dang bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs la 'bad pa las thar pa thob pa ni bdud rtsi'o zhes so/_/de nas bstan bcos gang zhig bsten pas skyes bu rnams kyi
[\[246a.5\]]don sgrub par byed pa gsungs pa/_ming dang rtags rjes su bstan pa brjod par bya zhes te/_thun mong pa'i rtags 'chad par 'dod pa nyid las ma ning gi rtags nyid kyi go rims med de/_dper na/_ngag gnyis kyis tshig gcig ces pa bzhin no/_/mtho ris la sogs pa'i ming rnams la
[\[246a.6\]]'jug pa'i sgra gang zhig yin zhe na/_byom la sogs pa rnams so zhes pas ma nA'i byings las/_ma ning dang ma dbyi ba yang ngo /_/yang na na mi ste sgra yang don du ma nyid kyi phyir ro/_/de bshad pa/_Na ma rab tu 'dud pa dang sgra la'o zhes so/_/'dud par byed pa mngon par brjod pa la 'di yis
[\[246a.7\]]nA ma la snga ma bzhin ma ning la sogs pa'o/_/yang na rtags gang dI pa dang a tsal sogs pa rnams kyis gsal bar byed pa'i bud med la sogs pa'i rtags gang yin pa de ni bud med dang skyes pa dang ma ning nyid do/_/de dag rjes su ston pa'i bstan bcos so/_/ming dang rtags 'di dag gis
[\[246b\]]
[\[246b.1\]]slob ma rnams la rjes su ston par byed cing bye brag tu rtogs par byed pas na brjod par bya zhes te nang gi de nyid kyis grub pa la phyi'i de nyid kyis rab tu gsal bar byed pa'o/_/yang na bsngags pa la 'byung 'gyur dang da ltar ba dang nye bar spyod pa las laTa'o/_/de bzhin du yang /_'jig rten
[\[246b.2\]]na nges par 'byung ba bzhin grub pa la mngon par 'dod pa'i ngo bo yang da ltar ba'i don bzhin nam yang na srid pa bzhin tha snyad byed do/_/dper na/_'ga' zhig 'ga' zhig 'chad de/_bdag ni phal cher 'di'o zhes pa bzhin no/_/de nges par yod ces sems par byed pa dang /_yang na
[\[246b.3\]]phal cher thob ces so sor smra'o zhes so/_/de nyid kyi phyir bsngags pa byed pa la srid pa bzhin zhes shin tu bstan pa'i tshig so sor 'chad do/_/'o na sngon gyi slob dpon rnams kyi ming dang rtags rjes su bstan pa'i phyir ci'i don du 'di rjod par byed ce na gsungs pa/_rgyud gzhan rnams las
