[\[288a.5\]]sdig pa'i ming yin la/_aM g+ha ni aM ha zhes par yang yod de/_'jig rten dbang phyug gi bstod pa rgyas par rjes khrid la'o/_/du ri taM ni ring du byed dang /_duSh+k+r-i taM ni nyes byas te de rnams sdig pa'i ming ngo /_/tshigs bcad phyed kyis chos te/_thams cad 'dzin pas na/_d+harma ste/_chos
[\[288a.6\]]so/_/puN+ya ni bsod nams dang /_shre ya sI/_rab tu bsngags pa 'am dge legs dang /_su kr-i taM ni legs byas dang /_br-i Sha ni/_bany+tsha taM zhes bya ste/_'dod par bya ba yin pas br-iSha la i ka mtha' nye las ka rkyen du byas pa'o/_/tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis bde ba'i ming ste/_mu da ni
[\[288a.7\]]dga' ba dang /_prI ti ni mgu ba dang /_pra mad ni rangs pa dang /_haR+Sha ni spro ba dang /_pra mo da ni yi rang dang /_mod dgyes pa dang /_sam+mA da mnyes pa dang /_A nan+da nyams dga' dang /_thu rA nan+da sdig zad dang /_sharma skyid pa dang /_shA da dam pa dang /_su Sha bde ba rnams so/_/tshigs bcad gcig
[\[288b\]]
[\[288b.1\]]gis dge ba'i ming ste/_sra shre ya saM/_dge legs te/_'dir swa zhes pa'i sgra ni/_dus kyi khyad par la gnas pa'i rang bzhin gyi tshig phyi ma bsngags pa'i don can no/_/shi baM ni zhi ba dang /_b+ha da ni bzang po ste/_b+ha 'di dge ba la'o/_/ran rkyen no/_/ka l+yA Na dge ba'o/_/maM ga laM bkra shis te/_
[\[288b.2\]]ma gi 'gro ba la a la tsa rkyen no/_/shu b+ha ni dge ba'o/_/b+hA bu kaM dang /_b+ha bi kaM dang /_b+ha byaM rnams kyang /_skal pa dang /_skal ldan dang /_legs pa rnams so/_/ku sha la ni ngan sel ste dge ba'o/_/k+She ma bde legs so/_/dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las tsam la tshigs bcad phyed de/_
[\[288b.3\]]dai baM ni lhas bskos te/_lha las 'ongs pas so/_/diSh+TaM ni lhas bsten no/_/b+hA ga d+he ya ni skal ldan te/_b+hA ga la rang gi don la d+he ya'i de phan gyi rkyen no/_/b+hA gyaM ni skal ba'i cha'o/_/ni ya tirbi d+hi ni nges pa'i sgrub byed do/_/rgyu tsam gyi ming la rkang pa gnyis te/_he tu ni rgyu ste/_hi 'gro ba
[\[288b.4\]]la'o zhes pa la/_'gro zhing yongs su 'gyur ba'i bya ba'i rang bzhin la/_ka mi mA ni dza ni hi rnams las zhes pas ru rkyen no/_/kA ra Na byed pa po ste/_kr-inya las byed pa po la la sh+Yu rkyen dang ring po'o/_/bI dzaM rnam par bskyed pas sa bon te/_dza na rab tu skye ba la Da rkyen dang /_nye bar bsgyur
[\[288b.5\]]ba'i sngon du gnas pa ni gzhan rnams la yang ngo zhes pas ring po'o/_/ni da naM ni 'bras bu nges par ster bas rgyu 'am gzhi'o/_/A di kA ra NaM/_thog ma'i byed pa po'o/_/rkang pa gnyis kyis bdag gi rnam grangs te/_k+Shetra dz+nyA ni zhing shes te/_zhing ni lus so/_/At+ma ni bdag ste/_ata 'gro ba la/_
[\[288b.6\]]byo ma la sogs pa rnams so zhes pas ma nin rkyen dang ring po'o/_/pu ru Sha ni skyes bu ste/_pr-i skyong ba la/_kuShan rkyen dang /_pur du bsgyur ba'o/_/tshigs bcad phyed kyis srog chags kyi ming ste/_pra NI/_srog chags te srog rnams lus la 'dzin cing ldan pas so/_/tse ta na sems
[\[288b.7\]]can no/_/dzan+mI skye ldan no/_/dzan+tu dang dza n+yu/_skye bo'am skye dgu'o/_/sha rI ri Na lus can no/_/tshigs bcad phyed kyis sems kyi ming ste/_tsit+ta ni sems par byed pas sems so/_/tse ta sems pa'o/_/hr-i da yaM/_snying ngo /_/stan+taM yid do/_/hr-i da snying po'o/_/mA na saM yid byed/_ma na yid do/_/_
[\[289a\]]
[\[289a.1\]]tshigs bcad gcig gis blo'i ming ste/_bud+d+hini blo ste/_yid bum pa dang snam bu dang shing rta la sogs pa la rtogs par byed pa'o/_/ma nI Sha/_yid 'dod dam/_yid 'gro'o/_/d+hi Sha Na/_spobs pa can no/_/d+hIHsems par byed pas blo'o/_/she mu ShI/_nyal
[\[289a.2\]]slong ngo /_/ma ti blo gros so/_/pre k+Sha/_rab tu lta ba 'am rtogs pa'o/_/u ba lab+hi nye bar dmigs pa'o/_/tse ta sems so/_/sam+bi da/_yang dag rig go/_/pra ti pradz+nyap+ti/_so sor rtog pa'o/_/tse ta na/_sems pa'o/_/d+hIHmi brjed pa dang /_d+hA ra Na ba tI/_gzungs kyi nus pa dang ldan pa dang /_
[\[289a.3\]]me d+hA ni yid gzhungs pa dang /_saM kalpa ni yang dag pa'i rtog pa ste de dag blo khyad par can no/_/yid byed kyi ming la/_karma mA na saM/_yid kyi las dang /_tsit+ta b+ho ga sems kyi longs spyod dang /_ma na skA ra yid la byed pa la'o/_/tshad mas don la lta ba la ming gsum ste/_tsar+Yu/_
[\[289a.4\]]dpyod pa dang /_saM khyA/_bgrang ba dang /_bi tsA ra Na/_rnam par dpyod pa'o/_/lhag par brjod pa la rkang pa gcig ste/_ad+h+yA hA ra/_lhag par brjod pa ste/_ma tshang ba kha bskang ba'i phyir du lhag pa'i tshig brjod par bya'o/_/tarka ni rtog ge ste/_kri tI gcod pa la'o zhes pa'i khams la g+ha nya
[\[289a.5\]]rkyen dang yi ge bzlog pas grub po/_/u ha ni/_rtog pa'o/_/the tshom la ming bzhi ste/_bi tsi kit+sA/_the tshom dang /_saM sha ya/_som nyi dang /_saM de ha/_nem nur dang /_dwA pa ra yid gnyis so/_/the tshom dang bral ba'i ming la/_nirla ya ni/_gtan la phebs pa ste/_ya thAs+thA Nau s+tha Nu
[\[289a.6\]]r-i ti pra tI ti ni rla ya naM/_zhes bya ste/_ji ltar gnas pa la gnas pa nyid du yid ches pas gzhi nges pa'o/_/niSh+tsa ya ni nges pa ste/_nges gzung gi bdag nyid du yid ches pa'o/_/las dang 'bras bu la skur pa 'debs pa'i lta ba la ming gnyis te/_me th+yAdr-iSh+Ti/_log par lta ba ste/_
[\[289a.7\]]bden pa ma yin pa nye bar dmigs pa'o/_/nAsti ka tA/_med pa pa ste/_sbyin pa med do/_/sbyin sreg med do/_/mtho ris med do/_/thar pa med do zhes pa 'dod pa'o/_/bya pA da/_gnod sems dang /_dro ha tsit+ta naM/_'tshe ba'i bsam pa 'am 'khu ba'i bsam pa ste gnod sems so/_/'khrul
[\[289b\]]
[\[289b.1\]]pa la ming gsum ste/_b+h+rAn+ti 'khrul pa ste/_thag pa la sbrul du shes pa lta bu'o/_/b+h+ra mu g.yo ba la kan+ti dang ring po'o/_/mi th+ya log pa dang /_a ti b+h+ra ma/_shin tu 'khor ba'o/_/tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis khas len gyi ming ste/_sam+bi da ni/_khas len dang /_A gu ni phyog
[\[289b.2\]]gzung bste/_Ang sngon ma can gyi ga mi la Du rkyen du byas pa'o/_/pra ti dz+nyA ni dam bca'o/_/ni ya ma/_nges pa dang /_A shra ba/_mnyan bya dang /_saM shra ba/_yang dag thos pa dang /_ang+gi kA ra/_bdag gir byas pa dang /_a b+h+yu pa gam/_khas blangs dang /_pra ti shra ba/_so sor mnyan
[\[289b.3\]]bya dang /_sa mA d+hi/_ting nge 'dzin rnams so/_/mya ngan las 'das pa'i ming la/_muk+ti/_grol ba dang /_kai ba l+ya/_ma 'dres pa'am 'ba' zhig pa dang /_nirbA Na mya ngan las 'das pa dang /_shre yaHrab bsngags dang /_niHshre yas nges legs dang /_a mr-i ta/_'chi med dam bdud rtsi dang
[\[289b.4\]]mok+Sha thar pa dang /_a pa brga/_spangs pa'am byang grol lo/_/de nas kha dog gi skabs su dkar po'i ming la/_shukla/_dkar po dang /_shu b+h+ra/_dge byed dang /_shu tsi/_gtsang ba dang /_shwe ta/_dkar gsal dang /_bi Sha da/_mdog dkar dang /_sh+ye ta/_dngas pa dang /_paN+Dar/_dkar
[\[289b.5\]]skya ste pa Di 'gro ba la/_am+ba ra bzhin a ran rkyen dang /_gzhan la yang ngo zhes pas ring po'o/_/a ba dA ta dkar po dang /_daipa dag pa la/_k+ta 'o/_si ta/_dkar po ste/_Shi 'ching ba la/_k+ta'o/_/gau ra/_dkar po ste/_gung sgra la raka rkyen dang /_ai nyid do/_/ba lak+Sha dang /_d+ha ba la dang /_
[\[289b.6\]]ardzu rnams kyang dkar po'o/_/ha ri Na dang /_pAN+Da ra dang /_pAN+Da ra rnams skya ser dang /_ser skya dang /_skya bo rnams so/_/i Shat+paN+Da ni cung zad skya ba'o/_/d+hU sa ra'o la kha'o/_/tshigs bcad phyed kyis nag po'i ming ste/_kr-iSh+Na nag po dang /_nI la sngon po dang /_a si ta dkar min dang /_
[\[289b.7\]]sh+yA ma sngo bsangs dang /_kA la rtsa ba'i rgya dpe gnyis su ki lA zhes pa ma dag par mngon no/_/nag po dang /_ka la las g+hanya'o/_/sh+yAm la/_sngo bsangs 'dzin no/_/ma tse ka_/nag lhang ngo /_/t+pA ta dang /go ra ni ser po dang /_ha ri dra b+ha ni yung ba'i mdog go/_/pa khA sha dang /_ha ri ta dang /_ha ri ta rnams ni ljang gu'i
[\[290a\]]
[\[290a.1\]]ming ngo /_/ro hi ta dmar po/_lo hi ta lI brgan/_rak+ta khrag mdog_/sho Na dmar ba/_ko ka na rda ni ut+pa la dmar po'i mdog go/_/a ru Na ni mi gsal ba'i dmar rtsa'am/_skya rengs mdog go/_/pA Da la ni/_dmar skya ste dkar dmar 'dres pa'i mdog go/_/sh+ya baHni
[\[290a.2\]]ser nag dang /_ka pi sha ni gser ro/_/d+hU mra dang /_d+hu ma la/_kr-iN+Da lo hi ta rnams ni nag po dang dmar po 'dres pa'i ming ste/_dmar nag dang /_dud kha dang /_mchin kha'o/_/tshigs bcad phyed kyis dmar ser te/_ka Da ra dmar ser ro/_/ki sa la ni ta tra nI la dzI taHka pi laHzhes te/_de la
[\[290a.3\]]ka pi la ni sngo ser ro zhes so/_/sing+ga dang /_gi hang mdog go/_/ka dru ni sing+ga la ni gser mdog go/_/tshigs bcad phyed kyis kha dog sna tshogs pa'i ming ste/_tsi tra ni bkra ba 'am sna tshogs pa ste/_bya khu byug gi mgrin pa'i mdog lta bu'o/_/karmIr dang /_kal+mA kha ni zal po 'am 'dres
[\[290a.4\]]ma'o/_/sha ba la khra bo 'am zal po'o/_/ka rlu ra sna tshogs pa'o/_/tshigs bcad gcig gis tshig bshad de/_'dir tshangs pa dag gi lhag pa'i lhar 'dod de de las byung bas bra h+mi te tshangs byung ngo /_/'di b+ha ra ta'i 'jig rten du babs pas b+hA ra ti zhes dang /_b+hA ShA ni skad de smra bar byed
[\[290a.5\]]pas so/_/gIHtshig dang /_bAka ngag dang /_bA NI brjod pa dang /_sA ra swa ti skad dam dbyangs can nam mtsho ldan te/_mtsho la brten pa nyid kyis yod pa'i phyir ldan pa'i rkyen gyi mtha' can no/_/'di sngon tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas tshangs pa'i mtsho la brten nas chu klung gis gzugs
[\[290a.6\]]kyis 'jig rten 'dir babs so zhes grags so/_/byA hAr/_gtam dang /_uk+ti lo rgyus sam tshig dang /_la pi taM smra ba dang /_b+hA Shi taM bshad pa dang /_ba tsa naM brjod pa dang /_ba tsa tshig go/_/sgra rjes su bstan pa la legs par sbyar ba ma yin pa'i sgra rnams ni a pa shap+ta/_sgra nyams te/_
[\[290a.7\]]de thams cad sgra rjes su bstan pa'i bstan bcos las a pa b+h+raM sha ste zur chag ces brjod do/_/snyan dngags las ni ba lang rdzi la sogs pa'i tshig ste de nyid kyi phyir 'jig rten gyi zur chag gi skad ces rab tu grags so/_/rang bzhin dang rkyen gyi sgo nas don rjod par byed pa'i sgra ni legs
[\[290b\]]
[\[290b.1\]]pa nyid de/_legs par sbyar ba'i bstan bcos kyi sgra la brjod do/_/de yang ting dang sub kyi mtha' can gyi tshig dang yang dag par 'brel pas don rjod par byed pa'o/_/rig byed la ming gsum ste/_shru ti thos pa dang /_be ta rig byed dang /_am+bA ya man ga ste gsum mo/_/r-i ka ces pa nges
[\[290b.2\]]brjod de/_r-itsa bstod pa la'o/_/lha rnams la stod pa byed do zhes pas kwi pa rkyen du byas pa'o/_/sA ma snyan tshig dang /_ya dzuShI mchod sbyin no/_/shik+Sha ni bslab pa ste/_de la sogs pa thos pa zhes pa de'i yan lag go/_/de ltar yang /_bslab pa cho ga lung ston dang /_/nges tshig skar dpyad thos
[\[290b.3\]]pa dang /_/sdeb sbyor rnam par sems pa ste/_/rig byed yan lag drug tu brjod/_/ces te/_de la bslab pa ni/_a la sogs pa'i yi ge rnams ni gnas dang byed pa dang rtsol ba rnams rtog par byed pa ste/_r-i Tu ra Sha spyi bo las zhes pa la sogs lta bu'o/_/kalpa ste cho ga ni mchod sbyin gyi
[\[290b.4\]]bya ba gtan la 'bebs par byed pa'o/_/byA ka ra Na ste lung ston pa ni sgra bye brag tu rtogs par byed pa legs pa'i sgra 'chad par byed pa'o/_/ni ruk+taM ste nges tshig ni/_yi ge A ga ma dang yi ge go bzlog pa la sogs pa'i nges pas bshad pa byed pa'o/_/dz+yo ti ShaM skar dpyad thos pa ni/_gza' rtsi
[\[290b.5\]]bar byed pa'i bstan bcos so/_/ts+tshan+da ste sdeb sbyor ni/_tshigs bcad kyi bstan bcos so/_/oM ni pra Na ba ste rab tu bsngags pa'i don no/_/a ba skyong ba la/_byo ma la sogs pa'i nyid kyi phyir ma nin rkyen dang /_mtha'i atsa la sogs pa dbyi ba dang /_dz+wa ra twa ra zhes pas UT dang /_ata eng
[\[290b.6\]]du byas pas oM grub ste/_rang bzhin gyis grangs med pa'o/_/i ti hA sa ni sngon rabs te/_ches snga bar byung ba'i tshul brjod pa byas pa drang srong rgyas pa la sogs pas byas pa'i b+ha ra ta la sogs pa'i gzhung ngo /_/pu ra br-iny+taM ni sngon byung ste/_sngon gyi tshul brjod pa'o/_/u dAt+ta la sogs
[\[290b.7\]]pa gsum ni dbyangs rnams kyi ste/_u dAt+ta ni mtho bas brjod pa'o/_/a nu dAt+ta ni dma' bas brjod pa'o/_/swa ri ta ni nga ro bar mas brjod pa'o/_/pra ban+d+ha ni rab tu sbyar ba'am 'brel pa dang /_kalpa nA rtog pa dang /_ka thA ni brjod pa'am gtam ste/_de yang mtshan mas mtshon pa rmad du byung ba'i don
[\[291a\]]
[\[291a.1\]]can no/_/sha za'i skad kyi rang bzhin te/_yul chen po'i mi dang rta dang glang po la sogs pa'i spyod pa bzhin rgya che ba'i gtam ni 'dir tsam+bU zhes brjod par bya'o/_/pra he li kA shes dka' ba'i don can te/_de nyid la pra bah+li kA/_brdas ston pa zhes kyang bya ste/_dper na/_gnyid log na
[\[291a.2\]]mig mi 'dzums pa yod de/_skra'i shugs 'phel bas so/_/nya gnyid lag pan mig mi 'dzums par byed de chu klung gi shugs 'phel ba'o/_/rig byed la smr-i ti ste shong gab tshig ces me long du yod/_dran pa zhes bya ba ni/_drang srong chen po rnams kyi dran pas so/_/'jig rten gyi brjod pa'i ming la/_kam+bi
[\[291a.3\]]dan+tI zhes pa ci thos brjod ba ste/_'jig ka tse be ga na bar+d+ha te rten gyi brjod pa bden pa dang mi bden pa gang yang rung ba brjod pa'o/_/dza na shru ti ni skye bos thos pa'o/_/brda dang /_pra br-it+ti ni gtam lo rgyus so/_/br-it+tan+ta ni byung ba'i mtha' dang /_kha skad do/_/u dan+ta ni bka' mchid do/_/ming
[\[291a.4\]]bshad pa la/_A hwa ya/_bod pa 'am ming dang A khya zhes bya ba dang /_ang+ka mtshan dang /_a b+hi d+hA na mngon brjod dang /_na ma d+he ya ming ste/_d+he ya ni ming gi de phan gyi rkyen no/_/nA ma yang zhes bya ba'am/_ming ngam mtshan no/_/rtsod pa'i ming la/_bi bA da/_rnam par rtsod pa 'am 'gyed pa'o/_/bya ba
[\[291a.5\]]hA ra tha snyad do/_/u pa n+ya sa nye bar dgod pa ste/_u pa dang ni sngon ma can gyi as yod pa la 'o zhes pas khams la g+hanya'o/_/bAd+mu kha ni smra ba'i sgo'o/_/u da ha ra ni dper brjod dam/_brjod pa ste tshig gam ming gi rnam grangs rnams go sla bas ma bris so/_/dbyangs bdun gyi ming la
[\[291a.6\]]rgyud las byung ba dang mgrin pa las byung ba'i sgra ni 'khor nyan la sogs pa'i dbyangs bdun te/_'khor nyan ni glang po che'i skad lta bu'o/_/khyu mchog ni ba lang gi skad lta bu'o/_/dri 'dzin skyes ni ra'i skad lta bu'o/_/drug skyes ni rma bya'i skad lta bu'o/_/bar ma ni khrung khrung gi skad lta bu'o/_/blo gsal ni rta'i skad lta bu'o/_/_
[\[291a.7\]]lnga pa ni khu byug gi skad lta bu'o/_/de ltar yang /_thub pa mis byin bus bshad pa/_/drug skyes rma bya'i sgra ltar sgrogs/_/khyu mchog ba lang skad kyis rtsom/_/dri 'dzin skyes ni ra yi skad/_/bar ma khrung khrung sgra sgrogs bzhin/_/lnga pa me tog rgyas dus su/_/_
[\[291b\]]
[\[291b.1\]]khu byug sgrogs pa lta bu ste/_/blo gsal rta skad lta bur mtsher/_/'khor nyan glang po sgrogs pa bzhin/_/zhes 'byung ngo /_/sngon gyi gtsug lag las/_rtsed mo rA+om par blang ba ni/_/lnga pa dang ni bar ma'i dbyangs/_/dpa' 'o drag po ngo mtshar du/_/drug skyes khyu mchog de bzhin no/_/sa 'dzin pa dang 'khor nyan dbyangs/_/snying rje'i ro la
[\[291b.2\]]blang bar bya/_/'thab mo 'jigs dang bcas pa la/_/blo gsal dbyangs ni blang bar bya/_/zhes 'byung zhing /_de dag gi don yang /_de bzhin gshegs pas sngon [(]bcun [,]btsun [)]mo'i tshogs dang rtse zhing rol ba dang rlom sems pa'i tshul du bstan pa de dang mthun par lnga pa dang bar ma'i glu dag blangs la/_gzhan yang des drag po'i gzugs su bstan cing bdud tshar gcod pa
[\[291b.3\]]la sogs pa ngo mtshar gyi khyad par bstan pa de dang mthun par drug skyes dang khyu mchog go/_/de nyid snying rje'i ro dang ldan pas de dang mthun par sa 'dzin pa dang 'khor nyan gyi glu dag blang ngo /_/de 'dzin pa'i rtsod pa'i 'khor lo shoms pa lta bur bstan te de dang mthun par blo gsal zhes bya ba'i glu blangs zhes pa'o/_/de la sogs pa glu'i dbyangs mang po drang srong b+ha
[\[291b.4\]]ra ta dang bi sha khi la'i gzhung las brtag par bya'o/_/gzhan yang /_dbyangs bdun rnams dang grong gsum dang /_/rgyal ba nyi shu rtsa gcig dang /_/tan bzhi bcu dgu rnams te/_/dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor de tsam mo/_/zhes pa ste/_glu'i mtha' na/_dza ya ti dang /_ta na la sogs pa'i tshig de rnams yod pa'o zhes lang+kar gshegs pa'i mdo'i gleng gzhir
[\[291b.5\]]srin po'i bdag po 'bod sgrogs kyi pi wang gi sgra dang bcas pa'i drug skyes la sogs pa'i dbyangs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba btab pa'i 'grel par slob dpon ye shes rdo rje'i bgod pa nyid 'di gsal byed du bris pa'o/_/de la ni ShA da ni/_'khor nyan te gang gi phyir dbyangs 'dis nges par dang bar byed pas so/_/r-i Sha b+ha khyu
[\[291b.6\]]mchog ste/_'gro bar byed pa sems rab tu 'jug pas r-i Shi 'gro ba la a b+ha tsa rkyen no/_/gan+d+ha ra ni dri 'dzin skyes te/_dbyangs kyi bar du dri'i shas 'dzin par byed pas so/_/gzhan la yang ngo zhes pas ring po'o/_/gan+d+ha rA zhes bya ba ni/_ljongs kyi skye bo'i glu'o/_/ShaT+ja ni drug skyes te/_gang gi phyir sna dang
[\[291b.7\]]mgrin pa dang brang dang rkan dang lce dang so ste drug po 'di rnams la yang dag par brten te skyes pas so/_/ma d+h+ya ma ni bar ma ste/_gnas kyi dbus nas khyad par du byung bas so/_/d+hai ba ta ni blo gsal te/_blo dang ldan pa rnams kyis blang bar bya bas na/_d+hi ma ta la/_lhag ma las aN dang /_ming la'o zhes pas
[\[292a\]]
[\[292a.1\]]wa nyid do/_/pany+tsa ma ni lnga pa ste/_lnga rnams kyi rdzogs par gyur pas so/_/ka la dang /_d+h+wa ni ni mi gsal ba'i snyan pa'o/_/ka ka li ni sgra cha phra ba'o/_/rol mo'i ming la/_tA pa ni pheg rdog pa 'am cha lang ngo /_/bi Na pi wang dang /_bal+la kI pi wang rgyud gsum pa'o/_/rgyud rgyas pa'i
[\[292a.2\]]pi wang ni mi 'am ci la sogs pa'i sil snyan no/_/kha pags pas g.yogs pa ni/_rnga pa Ta ha dang /_mur dza ste rdza rnga chen po la sogs pa'o/_/baM sha ni gling bu dang /_shaM kha ni dung dang /_de dag ni shu Shi ra ste sbubs kyi sgra can no/_/kAM s+ya ni 'khar rnga'o/_/sogs pa'i sgras g+haN+Da ste dril bu dang /_nU pu ra
[\[292a.3\]]rkang gdub la sogs pa'i sgra'o/_/mr-i taM ga rdza rnga'am rnga zlum mo/_/D+hak+ka dang /_b+he rI/_rnga chen dang /_A na ka dang /_dun+du b+hi rnga bo che dang /_Da ma ru dang /_cang te'u dang /_DiN+Di ma 'dor 'phen dang /_maD+Du cang te'u chen po dang /_dz+har+dz+ha ra ni rdza rnga kha gcig pa dang /_marda la glu rnga dang /_pa Na ba 'khar rnga dang /_
[\[292a.4\]]sA mya ni 'khar khrol lo/_/de la mr-it+ti kAng+ga dang /_mr-i dang+gA dang /_mu ra dza rnam grangs so/_/mur las skyes pas mur dza'o/_/ang+gi dang /_Al+g+ying dang /_Ur+d+ha ka gsum ni mu ra dza'i dbye ba ste/_de yang ang+kI ni ha rI ta ki a ru ra'i dbyibs lta bu'o/_/A lang+g+yi ni/_go puts+tsha ste ba lang gi mjug ma'i dbyibs
[\[292a.5\]]lta bu'o/_/Ar+d+hi kA dang /_urnyiHsbi ta dang /_ur+d+han+da ma zhes pa rnam grangs te/_steng gi khas sgrogs pa gyen du 'gro bas na Ur+d+ha ste rlung gyen du bskyod pas sgra 'byung ba'o/_/yo gi kA pA li kA di bA d+ya Da ma ruHzhes pa ni rnal 'byor ma skyong bar byed pa la sogs pa'i rol mo Da ma ru zhes bya ste/_Da ma rau ti
[\[292a.6\]]nyid shaM ku la sogs pa'i nges pa'i tshig gis Da ma ru ste cang te'u'o/_/pa e ba bi bu la maD+Du/_zhes pa ni de nyid rgya chen po la maD+Du zhes bya'o/_/maD+Du ka dang mar+d+ha la mtshungs so zhes slob dpon ra b+ha sa'o/_/DiN+Ni ma ni 'dor zhing 'phen pa zhes te/_DaN+Di ma dang Deng+gu ri zhes bya'o/_r+dz+ha ra Ni sgra'i khyad par yongs
[\[292a.7\]]su 'gyur bar byed pa rdza rnga kha gcig pa ste/_ka ra Da ka zhes kyang bya'o/_/gzhan yang triN dang /_tsa pe Ta dang /_go mu kha dang /_hu Duk+kA la sogs pa rol mo'i dbye ba'o/_/de nas gar gyi nyams kyi ming ste/_sgeg pa la sogs pa gar gyi nyams brgyad ni gar gyi ro ste myang bar bya ba yin pas so/_/dper na
[\[292b\]]
[\[292b.1\]]bya na sna tshogs dang legs par sbyar ba'i kha zas skyes bus zos shing ro myang na lhag par dga' bar 'gyur ba bzhin no/_/de bzhin du tshul sna tshogs pas gsal bar byas pa dang ldan pa mthong zhing myong ba las yid dga' ba skye ba'o/_/de la dga' ba zhes bya ba ni rab tu dga' ba'i bdag nyid kyi dngos po
[\[292b.2\]]ste/_gang nye bar bsags pa las bdag nyid kyi yid la rnam par 'gyur ba'i khyad par mchog gi rang bzhin ni shri gA ra sgeg pa zhes pa'i ro ste/_de ltar yang /_skyes pa bud med phrad pa las/_/so sor dga' ba 'byung 'gyur ba/_/de ni sgeg pa zhes byar bshad/_/dga' ba'i rtsed mo sogs kyi rgyu/_/_
[\[292b.3\]]zhes so/_/de yang rnam pa gnyis te/_mchog gi rang bzhin mang po can/_/de ni skyes pa bud med rgyu/_/longs spyod dang ni ltad mo ste/_/sgeg pa rnam pa gnyis su 'dod/_/ces bya ste/_de la rdzing bu dang /_khang bzangs mchog dang /_skyed mos tshal dang /_phreng ba dang /_tsan+dan dang /_bud med la sogs
[\[292b.4\]]pa gzhan la rtse zhing rol ba'i bdag nyid ni longs spyod kyi 'byor pa'o/_/ltad mo ni/_mthong na dga' ba'i 'byor pa ste/_/nyams skyed par byed pas 'byor pa'o/_/ji skad du/_'di las nyams ni skye 'gyur ba/_/de ni 'byor pa rab tu bshad/_/de las bde ba myong bar 'gyur/_/de ni mkhas pas
[\[292b.5\]]rnam par bsgrub/_/ces so/_/spro ba'i bdag nyid ni bI ra dpa' bo ste/_de ni 'byor pa dang dul ba dang dka' thub kyi stobs dang rnam par gnon pa'o/_/de yang rnam pa gsum ste/_sbyin pa la dpa' ba dang /_chos la dpa' ba dang g.yul las dpa' ba rnams so/_/mya ngan nye bar sdud pa'i bdag nyid
[\[292b.6\]]ni ka ru Na snying rje ste/_'dod pa dang nor nyams pa dang /_sdig pa dang bsad pa dang bcing ba dang brdeg pa dang sbyo ba dang nyon mongs pas nye bar gdungs pa sogs kyis bskyed pa ni snying rje'i nyams so/_/ngo mtshar ba nye bar sdud pa'i bdag nyid ni ad+b+hu ta rmad du byung ba'am rngam pa ste/_khang bzang dang skyed
[\[292b.7\]]mos tshal dang brag ri la sogs par song ste bzang po mthong ba dang /_'dun pa dang gzhal med khang dang sgyu ma dang mig 'phrul dang bzo la sogs pa mthong ba ste/_de ni snying la 'dod pa'i 'byor pa thob pa las byung ba'o/_dgod pa nye bar sdud pa'i bdag nyid ni hA s+ya dgod pa ste/_a yig la sogs pa sbed
[\[293a\]]
[\[293a.1\]]pa dang rnam 'gyur dang bcas pa dang yol ba dang ma bcings pa mthong ba la sogs pa'o/_/'jigs pa nye bar sdud pa'i bdag nyid ni b+hA yA na ka 'jigs rung ste/_'jigs byed chen po dang /_srin po 'bod sgrogs dang /_yi dgas la sogs pa mthong ba dang /_
[\[293a.2\]]khyim dang mdun khang stong pa dang dgon pa dang gsod pa dang 'ching ba lta ba dang skrag pa dang ngal ba dang skyo ba na ce spyang dang 'ug pa la sogs pa'i sgra thos pa rnams so/_/smad pa'i bdag nyid ni bI b+hat+sa mi sdug pa ste/_mi sdug pa dang /_rul ba'i sha la sogs pa mthong ba dang thos pa dang grags pa
[\[293a.3\]]rnams so/_/khro ba nye bar sdud pa'i bdag nyid ni/_rau dra drag shul te/_lus dang ngag gi spyod pa drag shul gyi las bya ba'i bdag nyid las skyes pa g.yul ngor 'jug pa'i rgyu'o/_/de rnams ni nyams brgyad do/_/rin chen mdzod las ni/_sgeg pa dpa' ba mi sdug pa/_/drag shul dgod
[\[293a.4\]]dang 'jigs su rung /_/snying rje rngam dang zhi ba ste/_/'di rnams gar gyi nyams dgu'o/_/zhes gsungs na/_'dir dgu pa zhi pa'i nyams ci'i phyir ma bshad ce na brjod par bya ste/_zhi ba'i nyams ni sgeg pa'i nyams kyi rjes su 'jug ste/_chos 'dod pa nyid kyi sgeg pa rnam pa gsum ste/_
[\[293a.5\]]de la dang po ni dka' thub dang brtul zhugs la sogs pa bdag nyid la phan pa'i rgyur byed pa nyid kyis so/_/slob dpon ra b+ha sa ni/_sgeg pa dpa' ba mi sdug pa/_/dgod dang drag shul 'jigs su rung /_/snying rje rngam dang zhi ba dang /_/mnyan gshin pa ste nyams bcu'o/_/zhes zer ro/_/_
[\[293a.6\]]gzhan dag ni nyams brgyad po bzhir bsdus te nyams bzhi'o zhes zer ro/_/sgeg pa la sogs pa'i rnam grangs brjod pa/_shu tsi gtsang ba ste 'ba' zhig pa'o/_/udz+dz+wa la ni 'bar ba ste ltan sdug pa'o/_/de dag sgeg pa'i bya ba'i bdag nyid brjod pa'o/_/de skad du slob dpon byA Dis/_
[\[293a.7\]]gtsang dang 'bar ba sgeg pa ste/_/dga' ba spro ba 'phel ba yin/_/zhes te/_sbyin pa dang chos dang g.yul gyi 'thab mo la spro bar byed pa ni dpa' ba'i nyams so/_/kA ru N+ya dang ka ru Na snying rje ste/_snga ma ni g+h+yaNa'i rkyen can no/_/g+h+r-i NA brtse ba g+h+r-i 'khrud pa la'o/_/rasna la sogs pa rnams so zhes pas
[\[293b\]]
[\[293b.1\]]naka rkyen no/_/kr-i pA dang /_da yA dang /_a nu kam+ba rnams kyang brtse ba'o/_/u nu kro sha rjes su brtse ba'o/_/de nas ha sa dang /_hA sa dang /_hA s+ya gsum bzhad gad kyi ming ste/_dgod dang bzhad gad dang gad mo zhes bya'o/_/bi b+hat+sa dang /_bi kr-i ta rnam 'gyur dang mi sdug pa'o/_/bisma yang ngo mtshar ro/_/_
[\[293b.2\]]ad+b+hU ta rmad du byung ngo /_/ash+tsar+Ya mtshar che'o/_/tsi traM phul byung ngo /_/b+hai ra baM 'jigs byed dang /_dA ru NaM mi bzad pa dang /_b+hI Sha NaM 'jigs par byed dang /_dA ru r+Na mi bzad pa dang /_b+hI ma dang b+hiSh+ma 'jigs pa dang /_g+ho raM drag po'am skrag byed dang /_b+ha ya na kaM 'jigs rung dang /_b+ha yang+ka ra dang /_pra ti b+ha yaM/_'jigs byed
[\[293b.3\]]dang /_so sor 'jigs so/_/de nas bsam pa'i ming la/_its+tsha dang /_kaM k+ShAM dang /_spr-i hA dang /_tr-i Ta dang /_bAny+tshA dang /_lis+sA rnams ni 'dod pa'am bsams pa'i ming gi rnam grangs te/_re ba dang 'dod pa dang bsam pa'o/_/kA ma
[\[293b.4\]]'dod pa dang /_a b+hi lA Sha mngon 'dod dang /_taR+Sha 'dod pa dang /_ma hAn lA las 'dod chen po/_/gnyid kyi ming la/_ni dA gnyid dang /_sha ya na nyal ba dang /_swA pa dang swap+na gnyid log pa'am rmi lam dang /_sam+ba sa/_legs phab ces bya'o/_/dga' ston gyi ming la/_ud+d+haR+Sha/_nye bar
[\[293b.5\]]dga' ba ste/_uta las haR+Sha'i ha yig d+ha ru bsgyur ba'o/_/ma ha mchod pa'am dus ston dang /_ud+d+ha ba/_ltad mo ste/_uta las ha d+ha ru bsgyur ba'o/_/ut+sa pa dga' ston no/_/rab 'byor zla bas mdzad pa'i 'chi ba med pa'i [(]mdzod [,]mjod [)]kyi rgya cher 'grel pa 'dod pa 'jo ba las mtho ris kyi
[\[293b.6\]]sde tshan rdzogs so//_//de nas sa 'og gi sde tshan las/_thog mar sa 'og la ming lnga ste/_a d+h+wa b+hu ba nas 'og go/_/pA tA la ni rkang 'og gam sa 'og ste/_pa ti tsaN+Di dag la A lanya'o zhes pas/_pa ta la A la nya'i rkyen byas pa'o/_/ba li pad+ma zhes pa la ba li ni stobs ldan
[\[293b.7\]]te lha ma yin gyi dbang po'o/_/pad+ma ni gnas te stobs ldan gnas sam lha min gnas so/_/ra sA tA la ni bcud 'og go/_/nA ga lo ka ni klu'i 'jig rten no/_/de nas shu Sha'i mthar thug pas bu ga tsam gyi ming ste/_de la ku ha ra bu ga'o/_/bi bar ni glog go/_/shu Shi raM ni skar khung ngo /_/bi lam
[\[294a\]]
[\[294a.1\]]ni khung bu'o/_/ts+tshi traM ni bu gu'o/_/nir+b+ya tha ni 'jigs pa'i bu ga'o/_/ro kaM ni pad mig go/_/ran+d+h+raM ni bu ga'am sbubs so/_/shwa b+h+raM ni gsal mthongs so/_/ba pa rlung 'byung ba'i bu ga'o/_/shu Shi ni bu ga'o/_/gnyis po 'di sa'i bu ga brjod pa'o/_/garta ni mthong ba'o/_/de nas mun
[\[294a.2\]]pa'i ming la/_an+d+b+ha kA ra mun pa'o/_/d+h+wAn+taM ldongs pa'o/_/ta mi sraM snang med do/_/ti mi raM rab rib po/_/ta maHsmag rum mo/_/d+h+wAn+te mun 'khrigs so/_/g+ha Ta shin tu stug po'o/_/an+d+ha ta ma saM dang /_a ba ta ma saM yang mun pa'o/_/de nas klu'i ming la/_nA ga ni klu ste ri gnas zhes bya'o/_/kA dra
[\[294a.3\]]be+e ya ni ka dru'i bu zhes bya ste/_drang srong 'od srungs kyi chung ma ka dru zhes bya ba las skyes pas ka drul bu brgyud kyi rkyen e yaN sbyar ba'o/_/klu de rnams kyi dbang phyug ni she Sha ste lhag ma can zhes pa dang a nan+ta mtha' yas zhes pa dang /_bA su ki ste nor rgyas kyi bu zhes bya ba rnams te/_sarba rA dza
[\[294a.4\]]sbrul rgyal zhes kyang bya'o/_/de nas sbrul tsam gyi ming la/_go nA sa ste ba lang sna dang /_ti lits+tsha dor gnas dang /_a dza ga ra sha yu nyal byed dang /_bA ha sa rlung zas dang /_a la gar+d+ha myur 'gro dang /_dza la bya la chu sbrul dang /_rA dzi la gral ris can te/_rgyab la phreng ba'i ri mo yod pa dang /_ma lu
[\[294a.5\]]d+hA na khri can dang /_muk+ta kany+tsu ka lpags pa 'grol ba dang /_sar+p+sa/_sa la 'phye dang /_pr-i dA ku sa la 'khyog dang /_b+hu dzag lag 'gro dang /_b+hu dzang+ga dang /_b+hu dzaM ga ma yang de nyid dang /_a hi myur 'gro dang /_a shI bi Sha mche ba'i dug can dang /_tsakri 'khor lo can dang /_byA Da 'khyog
[\[294a.6\]]'gro dang /_sa rI sri pa 'khyog por 'phye ba dang /_kuN+Da li 'khyil pa ste 'di'i lus rna rgyan bzhin du 'khyil bas 'dug pa'o/_/gUD+D+ha pA da ni rkang sbas te/_'di'i rkang pa rnams sbas pas mi mngon pa'i phyir ro/_/lung las/_rkang pa rnams kyang shes bya ste/_/nyis brgya dang ni nyi shu
[\[294a.7\]]gnyis/_/zhes 'di'i rkang pa nyid kyi grangs 'byung ngo /_/tsak+ShuHshra bA mig gis thos zhes bya'o/_/kA ko dar/_lto 'phye'o/_/pha Ni ni gdengs can no/_/darbI ka ra gzar bu mgo ste/_ji skad du/_gdengs can chen po gzar bu mgo/_/me dang rab mtshungs gzi brjid can/_/pha Na ka ra myur
[\[294b\]]
[\[294b.1\]]zhing gtum/_/sbul nag 'byung po mi yi bdag_/ces so/_/dIrga pr-iSh+Tha rgyab rings so/_/dan+da shU ka zas ngan te 'di zas ngan pa za ba'i ngang tshul can no/_/bi li sha ya khung du nyal lo/_/u ra ga brang 'gro 'am lto 'gro dang lto 'phye'o/_/pan+na ga rkang mi 'gro dang /_b+ho gI gdengs ka
[\[294b.2\]]can dang /_dzih+ma ga 'khyog 'gro dang /_pa ba nA shan rlung za can rnams te sbrul gyi ming ngo /_/de nas dug gi ming la/_kA ko la la sogs pa dug chen po'i rab tu dbye ba dgu ste/_de la kA ko la ni dro na kA zhes bya ste bya rog gi yan lag dang 'dra ba'i dug go/_/kA la kU Ta ni nag po brtsegs
[\[294b.3\]]pa zhes bya ba lha dang lha ma yin 'thab pa na byung ba ste rim la ya dang /_kong+kaN dang /_shr-ing+ga be ra'i ri bo rnams su skye ba'o/_/ha lA ha la zhes bya ba'i dug ni tA la'i 'dab ma'i dbyibs can gyi 'dab ma sngon po ba'i nu ma'i rnam pa can gyi 'bras bu ldan pa de dang nye ba'i shing la sogs pa sreg
[\[294b.4\]]par byed pa zhig ste/_yul hi ma ba ti dang kong+kaN dang /_lho phyogs kyi rgya mtsho rnams su skye ba'o/_/sA roSh+Ti ka ni brtan pa'i dug go/_/shaulka ke ya/_'di yang dug gi khyad par ro/_/ba h+ma pu tra ni tshangs pa'i bu zhes bya ste/_yul ser skya dang ma la ya'i ri bo rnams su skye ba'o/_/pra dI
[\[294b.5\]]pa na ni rab gsal zhes bya ste/_mdog dmar po sreg par byed pa/_ri any+dza nar skye ba'o/_/dA ra da ni da ra da skyes zhes bya ste yul da ra da ru skyes pa'o/_/yul de la 'od bzang zhes bya bar yang rab tu grags so/_/bar+sa nA b+ha ni be+e 'u'i lte ba zhes bya ste sin+d+hU bA ra'i 'dab ma 'dra ba be'u'i lte ba'i
[\[294b.6\]]dbyibs can de dang nye ba'i shing rnams mi 'phel bar byed pa'o/_/dug 'joms pa'i ming la/_bi Sha bai t+ya/_dug gi sman pa'o/_/dzang+ga li/_dug sel lo/_/byA la grA hi/_sprul 'dzin no/_/a hi ruN+Di ka/_sprul dang kha 'thab pa'o/_/de nas tshigs bcad phyed kyis dmyal ba spyi'i ming ste/_
[\[294b.7\]]na ka ra dang /_ni ra ya rnams dmyal ba'am 'dod bral lo/_/durga ti ngan 'gro'o/_/dmyal ba de yi dbye ba ni/_ta pa na tsha ba'o/_/a bi tsi ni mnar med do/_/rau re ba dang ma hA rau ra ba ni du 'bod dang du 'bod chen po'o/_/kA la pU tra thig nag po can no/_/sdug bsngal gyi ming la/_yA ta nA brnag
[\[295a\]]
[\[295a.1\]]dka'o/_/tI bra be+e da na/_mi bzad pa'i tshor ba can nam tshor ba drag pa'o/_/pI Ta/_gzir ba'am zug rngu'o/_/bA d+ha/_zug gzer ro/_/byA thA/_na ba'i sdug bsngal lo/_/duHkhaM/_sdug bsngal lo/_/A mA na s+yaM yid 'grogs so/_/pra pU ti dzaM bu skyes pa'i sdug bsngal
[\[295a.2\]]lo/_/kaSh+TaM dang kr-its+tsh+ra dka' ba'am sdug pa'o/_/a b+h+r-i lam/_'jigs pa len zhes bya ba'o/_/de nas tshigs su bcad pa phyed dang gnyis kyis rgya mtsho'i ming ste/_de las sa mu dra ni rgya mtsho ste/_sam sngon ma can gyi un+dI la/_du ra la sogs pa rnams las so zhes pas raka rkyen du byas pa'o/_/_
[\[295a.3\]]ad+hiH_chu gter te/_a pa sngon ma'i d+hA la ki rkyen du byas pa'o/_/a kU pA raHzla bas 'phel zhes bya'o/_/pA rA bA raHmtha' mi mngon zhes bya ste/_a dr-i Sh+ya pA ra at+yar+thaHpha mtha' mi mthong ba zhes pa'i don to zhes so/_/sA rat+pa ti/_chu klung bdag go/_/u dan+bAn/_chu ldan te ma tus rkyen du
[\[295a.4\]]byas pa'o/_/u da d+hi/_chu gter ro/_/sin+d+hu/_rgyun ldan no/_/sA ra swAn chu ldan no/_/sA ga ra dug can pa'o/_/ar+Na ba/_rgya mtsho'o/_/rat+nA ka ra rin chen 'byung gnas so/_/dza la ni d+hi chu gter ro/_/yA daHpa ti chu srin bdag go/_/A pam+pa ti chu bdag go/_/de nas rkang pa dang bcas pa'i tshigs bcad
[\[295a.5\]]gnyis chu'i ming ste/_de la A paHni chu rnams so/_/bA ri chu/_sha li lam/_'bab ldan nyid kyis chu ste/_sha la 'gro ba la/_ki ra tsa rkyen dang /_ka pi ri la sogs pas ra la ru bsgyur ba'o/_/kA ma lam/_'dod par bya bas chu ste/_kA mya te 'dod par byed do zhes pas sha mi ka mi dag las
[\[295a.6\]]ka la'o zhes pas ka mi la ka la'i rkyen byas pa'o/_/dza lam/_'bru la phan pas chu ste/_chus 'bru bskyed pas ja la la a tsa rkyen no/_/pa yaHni btung bar bya bas chu ste/_pIng 'thung ba la a sun rkyen du byas pa'o/_/kI lA la/_'ching bar byed pas chu ste/_kI la 'ching ba la/_kA lan
[\[295a.7\]]rkyen du byas pa'o/_/a mr-i ta/_mi 'chi bar byed pas chu ste/_mr-ing srog 'dor ba lak+ta rkyen dang na nya sngon du byas pa'o/_/dzI ba na/_'tshe bar byed pas chu ste/_dzi ba la lhu rkyen du byas pa'o/_/b+hu ba naM/_'ju byed dang /_ba naM gnas byed do/_/ka ban+d+ha ni lus 'ching bas chu ste/_kaM ni lus so/_/_
[\[295b\]]
[\[295b.1\]]u da kaM gsher bar byed pas chu ste/_un+di slas pa la/_kan rkyen du byas pa'o/_/da ka zhes pa'i sgra yang chu la yod do/_/pA thaH'og tu ltung bas chu ste/_pA ta btung ba la a sun dang thuT 'ang ngo /_/puSh+ka ra ni/_rgyas par byed pas chu ste/_pu Sha rgyas pa la/_ka ran rkyen du byas pa'o/_/sarba to muShaM
[\[295b.2\]]sgo thams cad du 'gro bas chu'o/_/am+bu ni gzhol bar 'gro bas chu ste/_a mi las a sun rkyen no/_/b+huka A ga ma'o/_/ar+Na/_mthar 'gro bas chu ste/_an+ti'i uta kyang ngo zhes pa rjes su 'jug bzhin pa la sun dang /_nuT 'ang ngo /_/to ya skyong bar byed do zhes pas so/_/nI ra gzhol bar byed pas
[\[295b.3\]]chu ste/_'di gnyi ga pr-i Sho da ral sogs pa'o/_/pA ni ya ba tung bar bya bas chu ste/_pA btung ba la/_A ni ya rkyen du byas pa'o/_/k+Shi ra zad par byed pas chu ste/_k+Sha Nu 'tshe ba la/_DI ra tsa rkyen du byas pa'o/_/am+bu/_'ching bar byed pas chu ste/_a bi 'ching ba la/_shang+gu la sogs pa
[\[295b.4\]]rnams so zhes pas ku rkyen du byas pa'o/_/sham+ba ra/_mchog tu bde bar byed pas chu'o/_/me g+ha puSh+pa/_sprin gyi me tog dang /_g+han ra sa/_sprin gyi bcud de/_de dag chu'i ming gi rnam grangs so/_/de nas b+haM ga la sogs pa chu'i rlabs kyi ming ste/_b+had+ha dba' rlabs dang /_ta rang+ga chu gnyer dang /_
[\[295b.5\]]Urmi chu rlabs dang /_bI tsi ni chu'i rim pa ste/_bi sma ya tsi no ti zhes pas thra kho da ra la sogs pas bi tsi ru bsgyur ba'o/_/de nas lo dba' rlabs chen po ste/_de lta bu la sogs pa rnams chu dang 'brel ba'i ming du shes par bya ste go sla'o/_/de nas nyi ma'i ming la/_pr-i thu ro ma/_spu rings zhes bya
[\[295b.6\]]ste/_kha'i phyogs su spu ring po yod pa'o/_/mat+s+ya ni nya ste/_'di khyad par du sbu med pa'i zlum po/_/dz+haSha ni/_ma hA prA Na dz+ha Sha ste/_srog chen po'i nya pags pa la 'byar ba'i dz+ha rAs brgyan pa rgya mtsho'i nya'o/_/ma di las s+yana'o/_/mI na/_'gro ldan te/_mA 'jal ba la nanya rkyen no/_/mA s+thA zhes
[\[295b.7\]]pa la sogs pas i nyid do/_/bai sA ri Na/_rnam par 'phyo ba ste/_rnam pa sna tshogs pas 'phyo ba'i phyir ro/_/aNA dza ni/_sgong skyes te sgong las skyes pa'i phyir ro/_/bi sA ra yang rnam 'phyo'o/_/shaka lI ni go cha can te/_ro hi ta la sogs pa mang po go cha rags pa'i phyir ro/_/ga Du ka/_/khrus
[\[296a\]]
[\[296a.1\]]mkhan te/_ga Du/_'khrud pa la/_kwun rkyen du byas pa'o/_/sha ku lAr+b+ha ka/_ni sha ku la'i phru gu dang 'dra bas sha ku la'i bu'o/_/sa ha sra daMSh+Ta/_mche ba stong ldan dang /_pA Thi na/_nya zan te/_nya ti mi zhes bya ba dang /_nya mid ces kyang ngo /_/'di la 'ga' zhig pA Tha zhes kyang bya'o/_/_
[\[296a.2\]]u lU pi/_steng du 'phar dang /_shi shu ka byis pa gsod de/_chu srin byis pa gsod dang dbyibs 'dra ba'i nya'i khyad par ro/_/na la mI na ni stobs ldan nya ste/_ta la mI na zhes kyang kha cig go/_/prauSh+Thi na/_dro ba'i nya ste/_u Sha sreg pa la'o/_/than rkyen du byas pa'o/_/rab tu sreg par byed do zhes
[\[296a.3\]]pa tshig phrad las prauSh+ThI'o/_/sha ha ri/_logs nyal te logs kyis nyal bar byed pas so/_/de nas rus sbal gyi ming la/_kUrma/_rus sbal te smad pa'i shugs dang ldan pas so/_/ka ma tha/_rus sbal te 'gro ba bul bas so/_/kats+tsha ba glos 'thung ste rus sbal lo/_/de nas tshigs bcad
[\[296a.4\]]phyed kyis srin bu pad+ma'i ming ste/_rak+ta pA ni/_khrag 'thung ngo /_/dza lau ka yang khrag 'thung ste/_u tsa tshogs pa la'o/_/byed pa la g+hanya ste/_de ltar yang /_brda sprod pa'i rgyud nyung du kA t+ya ya na'i mdo las/_pad/_ru dza/_bi sha/_spr-i sha/_u tsa rnams la g+hanya'o zhes bshad do/_/dza lau kA sa
[\[296a.5\]]yang de nyid do/_/de nas nya phyis kyi ming la/_muk+ta spo Ta mu tig skye gnas dang /_shuk+ti nya phyis so/_/dung gi ming la shaM kha dang kumyu'o/_/de nas sbal pa'i ming la/_b+he ka/_mchong 'gro dang /_maN+Du ka sbal pa dang /_baR+ShA b+hu dbyar skyes sam char skyes/_sha lU ra dang /_bla ba rkyal mkhan dang /_
[\[296a.6\]]dan+du ra rnams so/_/de nas rdzing bu'i ming la/_puSh+ka ri Ni zhes pa chu ldan nam pad+ma can te/_puSh+ka ra chu dang pad+ma gnyis ka'i ming ste ldan pa'i don du i na'i rkyen sbyar ba'o/_/khA taM/_brus chu ste/_kha na rko ba la k+ta'i rkyen dang /_dza nas na kha na rnams kyi Ata'o/_/A khA taM/_kun tu
[\[296a.7\]]brus pa ste rdzing bu'o/_/de ba khA ta kaM/_lhas byas pa'i rdzing ste/_lha dang lha ma yin gyi zho shas 'tsho ba dag gis byas pa'o/_/pad+mA ka raM ni pad+ma'i 'byung gnas su gyur pas rdzing bu'o/_/ta DA ga/_chu mang ldan no/_/kA sa ra sgra ldan no/_/sa ra sI ra ni to ya sA ra zhes te/_chu'i snying po can no/_/_
[\[296b\]]
[\[296b.1\]]de nas 'bab chu'i ming la na dI chu klung ngo /_/sa ri ta 'bab chu'o/_/ta ring+ga NI/_rlabs ldan no/_/sai ba li nI/_nya lcibs can no/_/ta Di nI/ngogs ldan nam 'gram ldan no/_/hra di nI/_sgra ldan no/_/d+hu nI/_g.yo ldan no/_/sro tA swa tI/_rgyun ldan no/_/dwI pa ba tI/_gling can no/_/pra ban+tI 'bab ldan
[\[296b.2\]]no/_/ni m+ba gA/_gzhol 'gro'o/_/A pa gA mtshor 'bab ces bya ba rnams so/_/de nas tshigs bcad gcig gis chu bo gang+gA'i ming ste/_ga ma gA ni/_'gro ldan ma zhes bya ste/_ga mi la gan gyi rkyen sbyar ba'o/_/biSh+Nu pa dI/_khyab 'jug rkang ldan te khyab 'jug gi rkang pa la mchod yon du gyur
[\[296b.3\]]pa'o/_/dza h+nu ta na yA/_zhes pa dza h+nu'i bu mo zhes bya ste/_'di drang srong gi rgyal po dza h+nus btungs te sgyugs pa las de'i bu mo dang 'dra bar gyur pas so/_/su ra nim+ba gA ni lha'i chu bo'o/_/b+ha gI ra thI/_skal ldan shing rta'i bu mo zhes bya ste/_rgyal po skal ldan shing rtas 'di 'jig rten du phab
[\[296b.4\]]pas de'i bu rgyud du gyur pas/_b+ha gI ra tha la/_bu brgyud kyi rkyen an sbyar ba'o/_/tri pa tha ga/_lam gsum 'gro zhes bya ste/_mtho ris dang mi yul dang sa 'og gi lam gsum du 'gro bas so/_/tri sro tA/_rgyun gsum 'bab ces bya ba yang snga ma bzhin no/_/b+hISh+ma sU/_'jigs byed bu mo
[\[296b.5\]]zhes bye ste de dag chu bo gang+gA'i ming ngo /_/de nas tshigs bcad phyed kyis chu bo ka lin+dI'i ming ste/_de la ka lin+dI ni ri bo ka lin+dA las byung bas de'i bu mo ka lan+dA'i bu mo zhes bya'o/_/sUr+Ya ta na yA nyi ma'i bu mo'o/_/ya mu na zhes pa yang ngo /_/sha ma na swa sA/_zhi ba'i sring mo ste gshin rje'i sring
[\[296b.6\]]mo'o/_/de nas tshigs bcad phyed kyis chu bo re bA zhes pa'i ming ste/_re ba zhes pa'i chu bo dang /_narma da zhes pa dza la ke li pra dA ste/_rtsed 'jo'i chu bo dang /_so mod+b+ha ba ni zla ba las byung /_me ka la ka n+yA/_ri bo me ka la las byung bas de'i bu mo ste/_ri bo'i bu mo zhes bya'o/_/de nas chu
[\[296b.7\]]bo shi ta'i ming ste/_ka ra to ya ni lag chu ste/_lha bde byed kyis lha mo gau rI bag mar blangs pa'i chu las byung bas so/_/sa dA nI rI/_rtag tu 'bab ste/_'di las dus rtag tu rdul dmar po zla mtshan lta bu 'bab pas te/_khrag 'bab ces kyang ngo /_/ba hu dA/_mang po sbyin no/_/sai ta bA
[\[297a\]]
[\[297a.1\]]hi ni dkar po 'bab ste/_ardzu ni srid sgrub ma nyid kyi phyir dkar po 'bab ces brjod pa dang /_yang na bsil bar 'bab pas so/_/si ta dru zhes pa yang bsil 'bab po/_/sha ta dru ni brgyar gyes te/_bu'i mya ngan gyis lto bar rdo bcings te zhugs pa la/_drang srong
[\[297a.2\]]gnas 'jog gis rnam pa brgyar bshig pas brgyar gyes te/_yul dzA lan+d+ha ra la sogs pa brgyar 'phags te gnas zhes grag go/_/bi pA shA ni zhags pa grol zhes bya ste/_bu'i mya ngan gyis zhags pa bcings te zhugs pa drang srong gnas 'jog gis grol bar byas pas so/_/bi pA
[\[297a.3\]]sha nyid bsdu ba'i mthar bi pAHzhes byas pa yang zhags grol lo/_/de nas me tog ut+pa la'i ming te/_thun mong ba'i sgra nyid kyi phyir ut+pa la 'di la chu skyes sngon po zhes pa yang 'jug go/_/in+d+ri wa ra dbang mchog dang /_ut+pa la dang /_b+hU ru ha ti/_sa skyes zhes pa rnams ra b+ha sas bshad
[\[297a.4\]]do/_/dga' byed dang /_ku ba la ya ya dang /_dbang mchog dang /_chu skyes sngon po rnams so zhes mchog sred kyis bshad do/_/ut+pa la zhes pa ni pA 'thung ba uta sngon ma can la/_ut+pi pa ti steng du 'thung bar byed do zhes pas ka la rkyen du byas pa'i pr-i Sho dar la sogs pa ste steng 'thung
[\[297a.5\]]zhes bya'o/_/ku ba la ya ni sa'i gdu bu dang /_ku ba las stobs dang /_skabs gsum gyi lhag mar ku bi zhes pa yang bshad do/_/me tog ku mu da 'i ming la/_si ta ni dkar po dang /_ku mu da ni sa dga' 'am sa mos te/_kau ra ba ni sa sgrogs rnams so/_/de nas pad+ma'i ming la/_
[\[297a.6\]]tshigs su bcad pa gnyis te/_pad+ma ni/_pa di las d+harma bzhin du man rkyen du byas pa'o/_/na li naM/_sdong bu can te/_na la la i na'i rkyen sbyar ba'o/_/a ra bi nAM ni rtsibs 'bigs so/_/ma hot+pa la ni ut+pa la chen po dang /_sa ha sra pat+t+ra 'dab stong pa dang /_ka ma la ni chu rgyan te/_kaM ni
[\[297a.7\]]chu dang /_a la rgyan no/_/sha ta pa traM 'dab brgya pa dang /_ku she sha yang /_chur nyal dang /_pang+ka ngu hi/_'dam skyes dang /_tAm raM sa ni chur gnas te/_de la tA ma raM g+h+r-i ta mar+Nash+tsa/_zhes pa tA ma raM ni mar dang chu zhes bya ste/_sa ni tiSh+Tha ti gnas pa'i don to/_/sA ra saM ni/_chu skyes so/_/sa ra sI
[\[297b\]]
[\[297b.1\]]ru haM mtsho skyes so/_/bi Sha pra su rgo/_pad rtsa skyes so/_/rA dzI ba ni phreng ldan to/_/ze 'bru'i phreng ldan no/_/am+bo ru ha chu 'khrungs so/_/puN+Da rI kaM pad+ma dkar po'o/_/sI ta tam+bo dza/_chu skyes dkar po'o/_/chu skyes dmar po la ming gsum ste/_rak+ta sA ro ru ha/_de nyid dang /_rak+tot+pa la ut+pa la dmar
[\[297b.2\]]po dang /_ko ka na daM/_pad+ma dmar po ste/_ku mud dmar po lta bu'o/_/de nas na la dang nA la ni yu ba'am sdong bu'am ngar pa ste/_Na la 'ching bar byed pa'i khams las so/_/mr-i Na la pad+ma sogs kyi rtsa ba dang /_bi shang zhes pa yang pad+ma'i rtsa ba'i don nyid du/_dpal ldan rgyal po nyi ma rnam par
[\[297b.3\]]gnon pas spyod pa'i snye mar bshad do/_/ka dam+ba/_chu skyes la sogs pa'i rtsa ba'i tshogs so/_/ShaN+Da zhes pa yang tshal te/_chu skyes la sogs pa'i rtsa ba'i 'o/_/de yang byings rab tu gsal bar slob dpon srung bas/_/Sha Di nad la'o/_/tshogs pa la a tsa'o/_/ShaN+Da ba naM/_pad+ma ShaN+Da
[\[297b.4\]]zhes pa ShaN+Da tshal te pad+ma'i tshal lta bu'o zhes dper brjod pa bshad do/_/de nas kar ha Ta dang /_si phA kan+da ni pad+ma'i skogs pa'o/_/kiny+dze lka dang ke sa ra ni pad+ma'i ge sar ro/_/saM ba di kA/_'dab ma 'khyil ba dang /_na ba da laM/_'dab ma gsar pa'o/_/bI dza ko Sha ni sa bon gyi mdzod dang /_
[\[297b.5\]]bA rA ka Ta ni ze'u 'bru ste/_gnyi ga pad+ma'i lte ba'o/_/de ltar na/_mtho ris mkha' dang phyogs dus blo/_/sgra sogs gar dang bcas pa dang /_/sa 'og gdeng can dmyal ba chu/_/de rnams kyi ni tshogs bcas bshad/_/ces bya ste/_de la sgra sogs zhes sogs pa'i sgras gzugs
[\[297b.6\]]dang nyams la sogs pa dang /_gar dang bcas pas ni/_glu dang gar dang rol mo dang ldan pa ste/_'di ni dbyangs kyi skabs su 'grel pas bshad do/_/de yang 'di ltar/_mtho ris kyi skabs su ni lha la sogs pa dang /_nam mkha'i skabs su ni sprin la sogs pa dang /_phyogs kyi skabs
[\[297b.7\]]su ni phyogs kyi glang po brgyad la sogs pa dang /_dus kyi skabs su ni sgra gcan zhugs pa la sogs pa dang /_blo'i skabs su rnam par dpyod pa la sogs pa dang /_sgra'i skabs su ni u dAt+ta la sogs pa dang /_gzugs dang nyams pa la sogs pa'i skabs su ni grags pa dang smad pa
[\[298a\]]
[\[298a.1\]]la sogs pa dang /_gar gyi skabs su na b+h+ru kuM pa la sogs pa dang /_sa 'og gi skabs su bu ga la sogs pa dang /_gdeng can gyi skabs su ni bags pa brjes pa la sogs pa dang /_dmyal ba'i skabs su ni dpal med la sogs pa dang /_chu'i skabs su ni gru la
[\[298a.2\]]sogs pa bshad ces so/_/mtho ris la sogs pa'i skabs zhes par sogs pa'i sgras ni sa 'og go/_/skabs ni rab tu bkod pa ste yongs su bcad pa 'am sde tshoms su byas pa'i bdag nyid can no zhes bya'o/_/slob dpon rab 'byor zla bas mdzad pa'i 'chi ba med pa'i mdzod kyi rgya cher
[\[298a.3\]]'grel pa 'dod pa 'jo ba las skabs dang po rdzogs so//_//de nas sa'i sde tshan bshad par bya ste/_sa yi sde tshan grong khyer dang /_/ri bo dang ni nags tshal dang /_/sman dang ri dgas la sogs rnams/_/mi dang bram ze rgyal rigs dang /_/rje'u rigs dmangs rigs
[\[298a.4\]]yan lag bcas/_/nye ba'i yan lag bcas 'dir brjod/_/ces pa la 'dir sa'i skabs yan lag dang bcas pa nye ba'i yan lag las sa la sogs pa bcu rnams kyis sa'i sde tshan te rnam pa bcur bshad do zhes pa bsdus pa'o/_/ri dgas la sogs pa rnams zhes pas ni seng ge
[\[298a.5\]]la sogs pa rnams so zhes pa'i don to/_/tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis sa'i ming ste/_b+huHsa dang /_b+hU mi skrun byed de/_b+hU yod pa la/_snga ma la kwi pa dang /_phyi ma la u rmi b+hU mi sogs kyis mi'i rkyen sbyar ba'o/_/a tsa la/_mi g.yo ba ste sa'o/_/a nan+ta/_'di la mtha' med pas
[\[298a.6\]]mtha' yas zhes bya'o/_/ra sA/_bcud ldan no/_/bi shwam+b+ha rA sna tshogs 'gengs so/_/s+thi rA brtan pa ste/_s+thA gnas pa la ki ra tsa rkyen no/_/d+hA ra 'dzin ma'o/_/d+ha ra trI/_rten byed ma'o/_/d+ha ra NiH'chang byed ma'o/_/k+Sho NI/_sgra sgrogs ma ste/_k+Shu sgra la/_i nin rkyen no/_/dz+ya/_rgyal
[\[298a.7\]]byed do/_/kA sh+ya pI/_'od srungs byin zhes bya ste/_rgyal po dga' byed dgra sta can gyis drang srong 'od srungs la rta gtsang gi mchod sbyin gyi mthar yon du byin zhes grag go/_/k+Shite/_gnas te/_k+Shi nges par gnas pa la k+ti'o/_/sarbaM sa ha/_kun bzod de/_Sha ha bzod pa la kha sha rkyen no/_/_
[\[298b\]]
[\[298b.1\]]ba su ma ti/_nor ldan ma ste/_gser dang dngul dang /_hI ra ste rdo rje la sogs pa'i rin po che'i 'byung gnas su gyur bas ldan pa'i don la ma tub rkyen du byas pa'o/_/ba su d+hA/_nor 'dzin no/_/urbI/_yangs ldan ma'o/_/ba sun+d+ha rA/_dbyig 'dzin ma'o/_/gau trA/_chu skyob ste/_gau chu dang /_
[\[298b.2\]]trA skyob pa'o/_/ku pa ste/_kai sgra la/_shaM ku sogs kyis ku rkyen no/_/pr-i thi bI dang /_pr-i th+wI/_sa gzhi dang skyed byed do/_/k+Sh+mA/_bzod byed do/_/a ba ni/_srung byed do/_/me di nI/_zhag ldan ma ste/_lha ma yin sbrang rtsi dang shes gsal la sogs pa bsad pa'i tshil gyi zhag babs pa dang /_
[\[298b.3\]]ldan pas so/_/ma hI/_mchod byed ma ste/_'di la mchod pa byed par gyur pas so/_/de nas gnas tsam la ming lnga ste/_dza ga tI/_'gro ba ldan no/_/lo kaH 'jig rten no/_/piSh+Ta saM/_gnas brtan no/_/b+hu ba naM/_sa gzhi'i gnas so/_/dza ga ta/_skye 'gro'o/_/'di ni b+hA ra ta'i
[\[298b.4\]]yul zhes pa la 'dir 'dzam bu'i gling gi sa'i dum bu ri bo chen pos bcad pa'i yul rnams bshad par bya ste/_skabs gsum gyi lhag ma las bshad pa/_b+hA ra ta dang na ra b+hU/_/skyes bu'am ci dang seng ge'i yul/_/bzang po byang gi sgra mi snyan/_/dbyig skyes i la br-i taM dang /_/tog
[\[298b.5\]]gi phreng ba 'di rnams ni/_/sa la gnas pa'i yul chen dgu/_/zhes so/_/gzhan du ni/_na ra b+hU dang /_mi 'am ci'i gnas su/_ra ma Na dang /_seng ge mchog dag rjod par byed do/_/de la 'di ni 'jam bu'i gling gi mi'i 'jig rten la/_dbang po'i gling dang /_ka me ru'i gling dang /_gzhon nu'i gling la
[\[298b.6\]]sogs pa gling dgu'i dbye bas phye ba'i dum bu dgu pa ni dpag tshad stong phrag dgu'o/_/bdag nyid gangs can gyi lho phyogs kyi rgya mtsho'i mthar rgyal po khyu mchog ces bya ba nags su rab tu byung ste bu brgya'i nang nas bu thu bo b+hA ra ta zhes bya ba la yul 'di byin nas b+hA ra tas 'di bzung bas b+hA ra ta'i yul te/_
[\[298b.7\]]de ltar yang /_gang phyir nags su rab byung ba'i/_/pha yi b+hA ra ta la byin/_/de nas 'di ni b+hA ra ta'i/_/yul zhes 'jig rten rnams la grags/_/zhes so/_/drag pos ni 'dzam bu'i gling nyid 'don to/_/drang srong rgyas pas bshad pa'i gzhung du ni 'dzam bu'i gling la yang b+hA ra ta zhes so/_/gangs can gyi
[\[299a\]]
[\[299a.1\]]byang na rgyar dpag tshad stong yod pa'i mi 'am ci'i yul te/_der skye dgu rnams shing p+lak+Sha'i 'bras bu za zhing tshe lo stong phrag bcu thub po/_/mi 'am ci'i yul gyi byang na he ma kU Ta gser gyi phung po zhes bya ba'i ri bo yod do/_/de'i byang na dpag tshad stong phrag bco brgyad pa'i seng ge mchog
[\[299a.2\]]ces bya ba'i yul lo/_/der 'jig rten pa rnams bu ram shing gi bcud za zhing tshe lo stong phrag bcu gcig tu 'tsho'o/_/de'i byang na ta ru NA di t+ya san+ni b+ho ni Sha d+ha/_nyi ma gzhon nu dang mtshungs pa/_/ni Sha d+ha zhes bya ba'i ri bo yod do/_/de'i byang shar gyi cha na/_bzang po zhes bya ba'i yul te/_mi rnams shing
[\[299a.3\]]ka dam+pa'i 'bras bu za ba'o/_/nub na ni ke ru mA la me tog gi phreng ba zhes bya ba'i yul te/_skye dgu rnams shing pa na sa'i 'bras bu za ba'o/_/bar na ni i la br-i taM zhes bya ba'i yul ri bos yongs su bskor ba'o/_/de'i dbus na ri rab ste lha thams cad gnas pa skye dgu rnams shing 'dzam bu'i 'bras bu
[\[299a.4\]]za ba'o/_/yul gsum po 'di ni dpag tshad stong phrag sum cu'i tshad can no/_/i la br-i ta'i byang na/_ni Sha d+ha dang tshad mnyam pa sngon po zhes bya ba bai DUr+ya'i rang bzhin gyi ri bo yod do/_/de'i byang na seng ge'i yul dang tshad mnyam pa'i ram Na zhes bya ba'i yul te/_gang du mi rnams shing n+ya gro d+ha'i
[\[299a.5\]]'bras bu za zhing tshe lo stong phrag bcu gsum du 'tsho'o/_/de'i byang na dkar po zhes bya ba dngul gyi rang bzhin gyi ri bo yod do/_/de'i byang na mi 'am ci'i yul dang tshad mnyam pa'i nyi ran+ma ya zhes bya ba'i yul te/_gang du mi rnams shing la ku tsa'i 'bras bu za zhing tshe lo stong phrag bcu bzhir 'tsho ba'o/_/_
[\[299a.6\]]de'i byang na rin po che thams cad kyi rang bzhin saM ga ma zhes bya ba'i ri bo yod do/_/de'i byang na b+hA ra ta'i yul dang tshad mnyam pa'i byang sgra mi snyan pa'i yul te/_gang du skye dgu rnams dpag bsam gyi shing las ji ltar na mngon par 'dod pa 'byung zhing tshe lo stong phrag bco lngar 'tsho'o/_/de la b+hA ra
[\[299a.7\]]ta'i yul gyi dbang ldan nas shA ra ba ti zhes bya ba'i klung bden bral du 'bab ste nub phyogs kyi rgya mtshor 'bab po/_/de nas 'phags pa'i yul gyi ming la/_ma d+h+ya de sha/_yul dbus so/_/ma d+h+ya ma dbus so/_/AR+yA brta/_'phags 'khrungs te/_A brta/_'khrungs pa'o/_/puN+ya b+hU mi/_bsod nams
[\[299b\]]
[\[299b.1\]]sa gzhi zhes kyang bya'o/_/de nas tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis lam gyi ming ste/_a a naM/_lam mam bgrod pa'o/_/bar+t+t+ma/_'gro bya'am lam mo/_/mArga lam mo/_/a d+h+wA/_shul lam mo/_/ban+thA na dang /_pa tha bI dang /_sri di rnims kyang lam mam 'jug bya'o/_/sar Ni dang /_pan+d+ha ti dang /_pa
[\[299b.2\]]t+ya dang /_bar+t+t+ma ni rnams kyang lam mo/_/e ka pa dI/_rkang pa gcig ldan te/_lam phra mo'o/_/de nas lam bzang po la tshigs bcad phyed de/_a ti pan+thA ni lam po che dang /_su ban+tha lam bzang dang /_sat+pa tha/_bden lam mam lam mchog gam lam dam pa dang /_artsi te\u0f85d+h+wa ni/_mchod par
[\[299b.3\]]bya ba'i lam mo/_/de nas bya d+h+wa dang /_du ra d+h+wa la sogs pa rnams lam ngan pa'i ming ngo /_/de nas ga b+hu ti ni ba lang shing rta 'am/_ba lang gi lam gyi tshad ces bya ba ste/_de la sor mo nyi shu rtsa bzhi ni/_kuSh+ku dang hasta te khru zhes bya'o/_/khru bzhi brgyal/_/na lwa zhes pa'o/_/khru stong phrag brgyad la kro
[\[299b.4\]]sha ste rgyang grags zhes bya zhing /_gzhu 'dom stong phrag gnyis la ga blu ti zhes bya ste/_rgyang grags dang gcig go/_/gzhu 'dom bcu'i khyon ni g+haN+DA pa tha dang /_rA dza mArga ste rgyal po'i lam khral lam/_dril bsgrags pa'i lam mo/_/sa'i sde tshan no//_//de nas grong khyer gyi sde tshan te/_de la
[\[299b.5\]]grong khyer la ming bdun te/_pU dang pu rI ni grong ste/_phas kyi rgol ba dang /_bgrod dka' ba srung zhing skyong bas so/_/grong brgyad brgya'i tha snyad dang ldan pa ni na ga ra ste grong khyer ro/_/gang du rgyal po'i pho brang dang nye bar gyur pa ni bat+ta naM rgyal lam mam pho brang 'khor ro/_/bu Ta b+hed naM/_ni tshong khang ngam
[\[299b.6\]]tshong dus te/_tshong pa rnams 'byung ba dang 'jug pa'o/_/s+thA nI yaM ni/_'jigs med gnas te/_cis kyang 'jigs pa med pa'i gnas so/_/mig ma ni mi bskyod gnas so/_/de nas khang pa'i ming la/_gr-i ha khyim mam khab bam tshang ngam shubs so/_/ge ha khyim mam khang pa'o/_/ud
[\[299b.7\]]ba si taM gnas so/_/bash+me/_khyim mam 'jug bya'o/_/pad+ma/_gnas sam khang pa'o/_/ni ke ta naM/_gnas gzhi'o/_/gzhan yang b+ha ba nA dang /_gA ra dang /_man+di raM dang /_ni la ya dang /_a ma ya la sogs pa yang gnas khang dang gnas gzhi sogs so/_/de nas par+Na sha la/_lo ma spyil po
[\[300a\]]
[\[300a.1\]]la sogs pa ste/_gnas kyi khyad par gyi ming rnams so/_/de nas bA tA ya naM ni rlung bu ga ste glo skar raM skar khung ngam khra ma'o/_/ga bAk+Sha ni/_ba lang mig ste de dag skar khung gi ming ngo /_/de nas khang bzangs kyi ming la/_harmi/_bsil khang ngam ba gam can nam rgya phibs
[\[300a.2\]]can nam/_pra sA da/_khang bzangs so/_/sau d+ha/_gtsang gnas so/_/rA dza sa da na/_rgyal po'i khang pa'o/_/swasti ka/_bde legs can nam bkra shis ldan no/_/sarba to b+ha dra/_kun bzangs so/_/de nas s+t+ya ga raM la sogs pa rkang pa gsum gyis btsun mo'i khang pa'i ming ste/_s+t+rI a gA ra/_
[\[300a.3\]]btsun mo'i khang pa zhes pa'o/_/grong khyer gyi sde'o//_//de nas ri'i sde tshan las thog mar ri'i ming la/_ma hI d+h+ra/_zhes pas 'dzin te ma hI sngon du ldan pa'i D+h+r-i nya 'dzin pa la/_mU la bi b+hu dza la sogs pa bzhin du ka'i rkyen sbyar ba'o/_/shi kha ri rtse mo can nam zom can te/_shi kha ra'i sgra la
[\[300a.4\]]ldan pa'i rkyen i ni'o/_/k+Sh+mA b+h+r-i ta/_sa gzhi 'chang ba 'am sa 'dzin te/_k+Sh+ma sngon du ldan pa'i b+h+r-inya 'dzin pa la rnam par 'dzin par byed do zhes pa'i don la kwipa rkyen du sbyar ro/_/a hAr+ya/_mi 'phrog pa ste/_nanya sngon ma'i hr-i nya 'phrog pa la N+ya ta'o/_/d+ha ra/_'dzin pa ste sa 'dzin pas so/_/_
[\[300a.5\]]sarba ta/_tshig can te/_sarba rdzogs pa la/_/a ta tsa rkyen no/_/a tri/_ri bo'o/_/go tra/_sa skyob ste/_'dir go b+hu baM/_go ni sa'o zhes so/_/go ri/_gyen du 'phyur zhes pa ste/_gr-I gsal bar byed pa la/_rang gi ngo bo la i ki ship+ta rnams so zhes pas i'i rkyen sbyar ba'o/_/gA bA/_zhes
[\[300a.6\]]pa yang ri bo ste/_gr-I'i khams las ka nin rkyen du sbyar ba'o/_/a tsa la/_mi g.yo ba ste ri bo'o/_/shi la/_brag ri'o/_/shi lots+tsha ya/_rdo brtsegs so/_/de nas ri'i khyad par las khor yug gi ming la/_lo kA lo ka/_'jig rten du snang ba ste/_sa'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dag la zlum po'i snang
[\[300a.7\]]bas bskor te/_ra bar gyur pa 'di'i nang gi ngos rnams nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis rab tu gsal ba'i phyir de ltar bshad do/_/tsakra bA Da khor yug go/_/tri ku Ta/_sum brtsegs te ri bo gsum brtsegs pas gnas pa'o/_/tri ka kuT/_rwa gsum pa ste 'di la rtse mo gsum yod pas so/_/de nas
[\[300b\]]
[\[300b.1\]]asta dang /_tsa ra ma ni/_nub dang phyi ma ste/_nub ri'i ming ngo /_/u ra ya dang /_pUrba sha raM/_mdun ma ste/_mdun ri 'am shar ri'o/_/hi ma bAn/_gangs can la sogs pa yang ri bo'i bye brag ste sogs pa'i sgras ma la ya'i ri bo dang /_ri bo da rda ra la sogs pa'o/_/de la gangs can dang /_gang
[\[300b.2\]]brtsegs dang /_ni Sha d+ha ste/_'gog byed dang /_ri me ru dang /_ri sngon po dang /_ri dkar po dang /_ri saM ga ma'i mthar thug pa yul bdun mtshams bcad pa'i ri bo rnams so/_/ri dbang chen dang /_ma la ya dang /_sa h+ya dang /_'bigs byed dang /_pa ri yA tra dang /_tri pra dang /_tIk+ShA rnams ni b+hA ra ta'i
[\[300b.3\]]yul gyi ri'i rigs bdun no/_/ri phreng ba can ni ri khrung khrung ste/_khrung khrung yang phreng ba can no zhes skabs gsum gyi lhag ma las bshad do/_/ri rab kyi nub na ri spos kyi ngang ldang dang tshad mnyam pa'i ri mA l+ya ban+te phreng ba can yod do/_/ri rab shar na chur dpag tshad stong phrag gsum cu rtsa gnyis
[\[300b.4\]]zheng du dpag tshad stong phrag gcig 'og tu son pa'i ri bo gan+d+ha mA da na ste/_spos kyi ngad ldang yod de/_de ltar ri bo gzhan rnams kyang lung las shes par bya'o/_/de nas tshigs bcad phyed kyis rdo ba'i ming ste/_pA ShA Na/_rdo ba'o/_/pra sta ra/_sbad byed do/_/gra ba
[\[300b.5\]]zhes pa gor ma ste/_sngar ri bo la yang bshad pa'o/_/u pa la/_tsog po'i rdo ba ste/_u pa nye ba dang /_la 'dzin par byed pa'o/_/ash+ma na/_ju po'o/_/shi la rtun bu'i rdo ba'o/_/dr-i shad rdo'o de nas rkang pa gcig gis rwa'i ming ste/_ku Ta/_brtsegs pa'o/_/shi kha ra zhes pa gtsug
[\[300b.6\]]skyes sam/_/rwa'i rtse mo'o/_/shi kha gtsug dang /_ru ha skye ba ste/_shi khI ro ha ti zhes pas ru hal Da rkyen du byas pa'o/_/shr-ing+ga/_rwa rtse'o/_/de nas rkang pa gcig gis ri gzar gyi ming ste/_pra pAta/_rab ltung ste/_g.yang sa'o/_/ta Ta/_ri 'gram ste/_ri gzar gyi 'gram mam ngos so/_/b+h+r-i gu
[\[300b.7\]]ri gzar te/_b+ha s+tha la ku rkyen dang /_sa dbyi ba dang /_yan a ki ru bsgyur ba'o/_/de nas kaDa ka/_ri zhol dang /_ni tam+ba/_ri sham mo/_/ni kuny+dza nags dang /_kuny+dza nags tshal dang /_la tA pi hi tA/_'khri shing khebs zhes bya ste/_nags tshal lo/_/ri'i sde'o/_/de nas nags kyi sde la/_A Ta bi/_a
[\[301a\]]
[\[301a.1\]]ri N+yaM dgon pa'o/_/bI pi naM/_dgon pa stong pa'o/_/ga ha naM/_nags 'thibs po'o/_/kA na naM/_nags tshal lo/_/ba naM/_nags sam tshal lo/_/gr-i hA rA ma/_khyim gyi kun dga' ra ba ste/_khyim dang nye ba'i kun dga' ra ba'o/_/niSh+ku TaHnges 'gro'o/_/u pa ba ba naM/_nye ba'i tshal
[\[301a.2\]]lo/_/kr-i tr-i maM ba naM/_bcos ma'i tshal lo/_/kr-i DaHrtsed mo'i sa'o/_/ut+Ya na/_skyed tshal lo/_/de nas phred du byas pa'i ming la/_bi th+ya phreng ba dang /_A li dang /_a ba li yang phreng ba dang gral dang /_paM k+ti/_tshar du dngar ba'i phreng ba dang /_shre NI/_phreng ba'i khrigs chags so/_/le kha bkod pa'am
[\[301a.3\]]bris pa'o/_/rA dzi gral rims sam phreng ba rnams so/_/de nas ad+ku ra ni myu gu 'am khye'u kha'o/_/a b+hi na ba/_mngon par sar pa ste gser skyes so/_/ud+b+hi di/_steng du 'thon pa ste/_sa bon las myu gu steng du phyogs pa'i ming ngo /_/de nas shing tsam gyi ming la tshigs su bcad pa gcig

[\[301a.5\]]'thung ste/_rkang pas ro bcud 'thung bar byed pas pA 'thung ba la ka'i rkyen sbyar ba'o/_/ta ru shing ste/_tri la me ru bzhin du u'i rkyen sbyar ba'o/_/a no ka ha/_'gro 'gog ces bya ste shing ngo /_/ku Tha shing ngo /_/shA la/_'dab ma can nam chen po'o/_/pa lA shi/_sdong po'i 'dab ma can no/_/dru ma

[\[301b\]]
[\[301b.1\]]'bras bu skyed pa'i shing rnams la/_an+d+h+ya ste/_mo sham min pa'i 'bras med min pa dang /_pha le gra ni 'bras bu 'dzin pa zhes bya ba la/_'bras bu med pa rnams la mo sham dang 'bras med ces bya'o/_/pha la bAn/_'bru ldan dang /_pha li na/_'bras can dang /_pha lI shing thog can no/_/de nas rkang

[\[302b.1\]]yang na u Da m+ba ra zhes par yang 'gyur te/_de ni bdud 'joms zhes brjod do/_/'dra ba'i sgra ni nges par bstan pa'i don gyi phyir ro/_/dzan+tu pha la/_dzun+tu'i 'bras bu'o/_/ya dz+nyAng+ga mchod sbyin yan lag go/_/he ma du g+d+ha ka/_gser gyi 'o ma can te/_gser gyi mdog can gyi 'o ma 'byung bas so/_/de nas

[\[303a.1\]]ru ra'i 'bras bu'i shing gi ming ngo /_/de nas ma d+hu ka la sogs pa lnga ni sbrang shing gi ming ste/_ma d+hu ka/_sbrang shing dang /_gu Da puSh+pa/_bu ram me tog ste 'di'i me tog bu ram bzhin du zhim pas so/_/ma d+hu dru ma sbrang rtsi'i shing dang /_bA na pra s+tha/_nags su rab gnas dang /_/ma

[\[303b.1\]]ba zhes bya'o/_/lung thang gi shing la ming gnyis te/_a riSh+Ta/_lung tang dang /_phe ni la/_dbu ba can no/_/de nas shing bil ba la ming lnga ste/_bilpa dang /_shaN+Di l+ya dang /_shi lU Sha dang /_mA lU ra dang /_shrI pha la ste/_dpal 'bras rnams so/_/de la thub pa drang srong gi rab tu dbye bas/_mA lU ra dang /_shaN+Di

[\[304a\]]
[\[304a.1\]]gzar shing dang /_gran+thi la/_tshigs can nam tshigs mang dang /_byA g+h+ra pA da stag gi rkang pa rnams so/_/de nas gnyis ni/_ai ra ba ta/_sa srung dang /_nag rad+ga klu shing ste gnyis po rnam grangs so/_/de nas gnyis ni/_na de ya/_skyur rtsi dang /_b+hU mi dzam+bu _sa yi dzam+bu'o/_/'di

[\[304a.5\]]dang rnam pa 'dra ba tshangs pa'i shing gi ming ste/_drug ni/_kra mu ka dang /_paT+Ti kA dang /_lod+h+ri dang /_gu da ka dang /_b+ha dra dang /_musta ka rnams so/_/nI pa la sogs pa bzhi ni shing ka dam+pa'i ming ste/_nI pa ni _na ya ti/_mo daM nI pa zhes pa dga' ba 'dren par byed pas nI pa ste/_nI pa pri ya ka dga'
[\[304a.6\]]byed dga' ba 'dren byed do/_/ka dam+ba tshogs can no/_/ha li gshol ldan no/_/pri ya dga' byed do/_/bI ra pr-ik+Sha la sogs pa bzhi ni/_b+hal+la ta ka'i ming ste/_bI ra br-ik+Sha dpa' bo'i shing ngo /_/a ruSh+ka ra zhes pa la/_a dur+b+ra Na zhes te/_a ru ni rma'o zhes pas rma byed ces bya'o/_/ag+ni
[\[304a.7\]]mu kha me gdong ngo /_/b+hal+la ta kI rnams so/_/garda b+han+da la sogs pa lnga ni/_gad+d+ha muN+Da zhes grags pa'i shing ste/_'di'i tsher ma dang 'dab ma dang 'bras bu rnams a shwat+tha dang mtshungs so/_/b+hu rdza la sogs pa gsum ni stag pa'i ming ste/_b+hurdza/_grog can dang /_tsarmi tsarmi pags pa can
[\[304b\]]
[\[304b.1\]]dang /_mri du twa ka/_shun pa 'jam po can zhes pa rnams so/_/de nas pits+tsha la sogs pa lnga ni/_shing shal+ma la'i ming ste/_pits+tsha la ni/_mjug ma can te/_'di la mjug ma ldan pas so/_/spru rA yuHni tshe brtan te/_ring du 'tsho bas so/_/ro tsa na la sogs pa gnyis ni kA sham+bi la zhes grags
[\[304b.2\]]pa'o/_/tsi ri bilba la sogs pa bzhi kra rany+dza'i ming ngo /_/pra kIr+Yal sogs pa bzhi ni ka rany+dza tsher ma can gyi ming dang /_ShaD+gan+thA mdud pa drug pa la sogs pa ni ka rany+dza'i dbye ba'o/_/ro hI la sogs pa bzhi ni/_se 'bru'i shing gi ming ste/_p+lA ha sha tru ni mchin dgra ste/_mchin nad 'joms pas so/_/_
[\[304b.3\]]dA Di ma put+pa ka se 'bru'i me tog can no/_/gA yA trI la sogs pa bzhi ni seng ldeng gi ming ste/_gA yA trI/_glu len ma'o/_/de nas seng ldeng gi khyad par/_bi Da kha di ra ni/_bshang ba'i seng ldeng ste/_chu med pa'i mya ngam gyi thang du skye ba bshang ba dang 'dra ba'i dri can no/_/de nyid tshil 'joms pas
[\[304b.4\]]a ri me dang /_tshil dgra zhes bya ba'o/_/kha dir si ta/_seng ldeng dkar po dang /_so ma balka zla ba'i yal ga dag rnam grangs so/_/de nas shing byA g+h+ra puts+tsha la sogs pa bcu gcig ni shing e raN+Da'i ming ste/_bya g+h+ra puts+tsha stag gi mjug ma dang /_gan+d+harba ha sta ka dri za'i lag pa dang /_'di'i 'dab
[\[304b.5\]]ma sor mo lnga pa'i bdag nyid du yod pas so/_/pany+tsAd+gu la/_sor mo lnga'o/_/sha mi la sogs pa gsum ni shing sha mA'i ming ngo /_/paN+Di ka la sogs pa drug ni myos byed shing ste/_ma ya na zhes grags pa'o/_/sha kra pA da pa la sogs pa ni brgya byin rkang 'thung ste/_de ba dA ru'i ming drug ste/_pI ta dA ru
[\[304b.6\]]shing ser dang /_dA ru shug pa dang /_pU ta kASh+Tha dang /_tshi can shing ngo /_/de nas pA Ta la la sogs pa bdun ni shing skya nar gyi ming ngo /_/byA ma la sogs pa bcu gnyis ni shing pri yaM gu'i ming ste/_sh+yA ma ni/_/sto bsangs so/_/pri yaM gu dga' byad do/_/pri ya ka de nyid do/_/ma N+DU ka
[\[304b.7\]]pa r+Nal sogs pa bcu gnyis ni shing dmar gyi tshang ste/_/maN+Du ka phar+Na sbal nga'i 'dab ma ste/_/'dab ma sbal ba'i dbyibs 'dra bas so/_/'di'i mig gi skabs su phreng bskyur ba/_/'bru pri yaM sku dang /_/shing dri yaM ku ya byed par mngon ne/_/shoN ka dmar po'o/_/ar lu ni dmar skya ste/_a ru Na nyid ka pi li ka la sogs pas bsgyur bas so/_/tiSh+ya
[\[305a\]]
[\[305a.1\]]pha la la sogs pa bzhi ni skyu ru ra'i shing gi ming ste/_ti Sh+ya pha la ni rgyal 'bras so/_/Am+la kI/_skyu ru ra'o/_/a mr-i tA bdud rtsi can no/_/ba yaHs+thA/_na tshod gnas byed de/_na tshod dang lang tsho brtan par byed pas so/_/de nas bI b+hi ta ga la sogs pa drug ni ba ru ra'i ming ste/_bi b+hI ta ka ni
[\[305a.2\]]ba ru ra'o/_/b+hU ta bA sa/_'byung po'i gnas so/_/ka li dru ma rtsod pa'i shing ngo /_/de nas a b+ha ya la sogs pa tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis a ru ra'i ming ste/_a b+ha ya ni 'jigs med de/_nad kyi 'jigs pa med pas so/_/a bya tha ni nad med do/_/ba th+yA ni phan pa can no/_/ba yaHs+thA na tshod gnas

[\[305b\]]
[\[305b.1\]]sho ka skyes pas shing 'di la a sho ka ste mya ngan med do/_/de nas tsAm+pe la sogs pa bzhi ni nA ga ge sar gyi ming ste/_ke sar ni ge sar can no/_/kAny+tsa nA hwa ya/_gser ming can no/_/de nas lnga ni rgyal byed kyi ming ste/_dza yA rgyal ba dang /_dza yan+ti/_rgyal byed dang /_tarkA ri/_rtog pa'i dgra dang

[\[307a.1\]]la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa sman shing gi ming ste/_tshong pa la sogs pa rnams kyis rA sna sman zhes btags pa'o/_/bi dA ri gan+d+ha/_rnam 'joms dri zhes bya ba nas/_brtan par gnas kyi bar ni/_sA la par+Ni/_sA la'i 'dab ma'i ming ngo /_/kar+pa sI la

[\[307b\]]
[\[307b.1\]]dang /_ra sA ro ldan nam bcud ldan dang /_ma he ra Na/_cher g.yo dang /_kun+du ru kI/_bcud 'bab dang /_sih+la kI/_tshim byed 'dzag dang /_h+la di nI tshim byed rnams te sih+la'i ming ngo /_/mi 'bar la sogs pa bzhi ni d+hA ta ka'i ming ngo /_/pr-i thI kA la sogs pa bzhi ni/_ka ko la'i ming ste/_pr-i thI kA/_

[\[308a\]]
[\[308a.1\]]sha can ma ste spang spos dang /_lo ma sA/_spu can ma la sogs pa rnams so/_/twa k+pa tra la sogs pa drug ni shing tsha'i ming ngo /_/twa k+pa tra/_pags pa'i 'dab ma zhes so/_/kurba shIR+Sha la sogs pa lnga ni dzI ba ka'i ming sti/_kurba shIR+Sha/_mgo bor byas pa'o/_/dzI ba ka 'tsho
[\[308a.2\]]byed do/_/kir ta ti k+ta la sogs pa gsum ni tsir yi te zhes grags pa ste/_mon yul la sogs par skye ba'i tik+ti'i ming ngo /_/sap+ta la sogs pa bdun ni/_bdun ldan zhes bya ba'i dri'i rdzas tshong pa'i nor gyi ming ngo /_/a dza mod la sogs pa ni/_ya mA ni ka'i ming ste/_rigs gnyis la ming gi rnam

[\[308a.5\]]so/_/go lam la sogs pa bzhi ni dUrba dkar po'i ming ste/_go lo mi/_glang gi spu skyes so/_/sha ta puSh+pa/_nus pa brgya pa'o/_/gaN+DA lI/_/dum bu 'dzin no/_/sha ku lA k+Sha/_bya'i mig go/_/ku ru bin+da la sogs pa gsum ni mon lug gi ming ngo /_/bi sha la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad
[\[308a.6\]]pa ni 'od ma'i ming ngo /_/gran+thi la sogs pa gsum ni tshigs can gyi ming ngo /_/gun+d+ra la sogs pa gsum ni smyug ma mda' rgyu'i ming ngo /_/na Da la sogs pa gsum ni 'dam bu'i ming ngo /_/bzhi ni rtswa ku sha'i ming ste/_ku sha ni ngan sel te/_ku ngan pa dang /_sha zhi ba'am sel ba'i
[\[308a.7\]]don to/_/ku tha sa gnas dang /_nga r+b+ha rten byed dang /_sa bi dra dag byed do/_/ka r+t+r-i Ne rtsa chung ngu ste de la sogs pa drug ni rA ma ga pur zhes grags pa dri bzang po'i rtswa'i ming ngo /_/gdugs kyi rnam pa zhes bya ba ni rtsa'i khyad par te/_de ltar yang /_dri bzang tsha bzhes bya ba/_/de bzhin gdugs
[\[308b\]]
[\[308b.1\]]dang shin tu gdugs/_/gdugs kyi rnam pa zhes bya ste/_/rtsa ba 'dab ma'i dbyibs legs so/_/zhes bshad do/_/nA ri ke la dang /_lAng+ga li dag rnam grangs te/_de la nA ri ke la ni mi mo rtse ba zhes bya ste/_bi ta'i shing gi ming ngo /_/lAng+ga lI ni gshol ldan no/_/nags dang sman gyi sde'o//_//_
[\[308b.2\]]de nas seng ge la sogs pa'i sde la/_tshigs bcad phyed kyis seng ge'i ming ste/_sing+ha seng ge ste/_hi si 'tshe ba la/_ri dgas la 'tshe bar byed do zhes pas a tsa rkyen dang /_pr-i Sho da ra la sogs pas dang po dang mtha' phyin ci log tu bya'o/_/mr-i gen+d+ra/_ri dgas dbang po ste/_nags kyi
[\[308b.3\]]ri dgas rnams kyi rgyal po yin pas so/_/pany+tsA s+ya ni/_pany+tsa lnga dang /_a s+ya kha'am/_gdong ste/_gdong lnga pa'am/_kha lnga pa zhes bya ste/_kha bzhin du rkang pa gnyis dang lag pa dag gis kyang lag ldan gyi bum pa 'gems par bzod pa'i phyir ro/_/har+Ya k+Sha ni ha ri 'phrog byed/_
[\[308b.4\]]a k+Shi mig la rang gi yan lag las Sha tsa'o zhes pas Sha tsa sbyar ba ste/_des na 'phrog byed mig ces bya ste/_'di'i mig dmar ser du yod pas so/_/ke sha rI/_ral pa can no/_/ha ri 'phrog byed ri dgas rnams kyi srog 'phrog par byed pas so/_/de nas stag la ming gsum ste/_shArdUl dang
[\[308b.5\]]dwI pa dang /_byA g+h+ra rnams so/_/de la shArdU la ni stag ste/_shr-i 'tshe ba la/_U ra tsa la sogs pa'o/_/dwI pI/_stag gi dbye ba chung zhing bkra ba ste/_de'i pags pa gnyis pa de ldan pas i ni'i rkyen no/_/sbyor ba 'di ni ka ma la shI la'i yin te/_stag phran stag dang byi la sram/_/seng ge'i pags pa
[\[308b.6\]]mdun byas te/_/zhes so/_/byA g+h+ra dri snom ste stag go/_/de nas gnyis ni dred kyi ming ste/_ta rak+Shu/_dred ces bya ba khyi chen po dang tshad mnyam pa/_khyi'i dbyibs can phyugs dang mi la sogs pa la 'tshe ba byed pa'o/_/mr-i gA da na/_ri dgas za byed do/_/phag gi ming la tshigs su bcad pa
[\[308b.7\]]gcig ste/_bA ra ha/_mchog tu 'joms pas na phag go/_/sU ka ra/_gtsang byed de/_su tsa gtsang ba dang ka ra byed pa la/_pr-i Sho da ra la sogs pas tsa phyis shing /_gzhan rnams la yang ngo zhes pas su yig ring por bsgyur ba'o/_/g+h+r-i Sh+Ti sgra ldan no/_/ko la po Ti/_khyim gtsang byed/_ki ri
[\[309a\]]
[\[309a.1\]]ni/_sa 'thor byed de/_kr-I rnam par g.yeng ba la/_ika mtha' nye las ki rkyen no/_/ki Di/_sa slong ste/_de bzhin du ki Ti'i khams las ki Ti'o/_/daM Sh+Ti mche ba can dang /_g+ho NI sna rings so/_/sta b+d+ha ro mA spu gzings so/_/kro Da sa rlog go/_/b+hU dA sa
[\[309a.2\]]'joms so/_/ka pi nas nags gnas kyi bar gyis spre'u'i ming ngo /_/ka piH spre'u 'o/_/sla baM ga dang /_sla ba ga/_rgyug 'phyong ngam 'chong byed dam/_'phar 'gro'o/_/shA kha mr-i ga/_yal ga'i ri dgas dang /_ba lI mu kha/_gnyer ma'i gdong dang /_mArka Ta/_nyi ma dga' dang /_bA na ra
[\[309a.3\]]mi dang 'dra ste/_bA shab+da i bA r+the/_ba'i sgra ni 'dra ba'i don to zhes so/_/kI sha rlung gi bu brgyud dang /_ba nau ka sa/_nags gnas rnams so/_/de nas b+hal+lu ka la sogs pa ni/_dom gyi ming ngo /_/de nas g+haN+Da ka da/_khaD+ga'i nI la sogs pa gsum ni bse'i ming ngo /_/tshigs bcad phyed kyis ma

[\[309a.5\]]mr-i ga d+hUrta/_ri dgas khram pa dang /_shr-i ga la/_ma rungs pa dang /_bany+dza ka/_slu byed dang /_kroSh+Ti/_'bod byed dang /_phe ru dang /_phe rab ngan g.yo ba 'am/_g.yo can no/_/dzam+bu ka/_ce spyang ngo /_/tshigs bcad phyed kyis byi la'i ming ste/_o ru zhum bu dang /_bi DA la bshang ba sped/_bshang ba
[\[309a.6\]]dug bzhin sped par byed pa'o/_/mA rdzA ra/_khrus mkhan no/_/pr-i Sha daM sha ka/_byi ba za dang /_a khu b+hu ka/_byi ba'i zas can rnams so/_/ko ka la sogs pa gsum ni/_'phar ba'i ming ste/_ko ka mtsha' 'am 'phar ba ste/_khyi dang tshad mnyam pa'i ri dgas ser skya/_go Da la
[\[309a.7\]]sogs pa'i yul du ko ba zhes bya zhing /_mA la ba la sogs pa'i yul du bi ka zhes grags pa'o/_/de nas ri dgas la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa phyed kyis ri dgas tsam gyi ming ngo /_/e Na ni ri dgas kyi khyad par brjod pa ste de las byung bas e Ne ya'o/_/ka ta li la sogs pa
[\[309b\]]
[\[309b.1\]]drug ni ri dgas kyi khyad par rin po cher gyur pa'i pags pa 'byung bas na pags pa'i skye gnas su brjod do/_/ji ltar ri dgas kyi sgra phyugs gzhan la spyir 'jug cing ri dgas ku rang+ga la bye brag tu 'jug ste/_dper na lcags kyi sgra gser la sogs pa la spyir 'jug pa dang lcags la bye brag
[\[309b.2\]]tu 'jug pa bzhin no/_/de bzhin du pags pa'i skye gnas zhes pa yang ri dgas spyi dang bye brag la 'jug go/_/kr-iSh+Na sA ra la sogs pa nas ri bong gi mthar thug pa ni khyad par ba re re'i ming ste/_de la kr-iSh+Na sA ra ni/_ri dgas gzhung nag go/_/ru ru ni/_sgra sgrogs so/_/n+yad+ku ni/_nges mchod zhes
[\[309b.3\]]bya'o/_/sham+bA ra ni/_mchog bde zhes so/_/go ka r+Na ni/_'di la ba lang lta bu'i rna ba yod pas ba lang rna ba ste/_gan+no zhes grags pa'o/_/pr-i Sha ta ni/_thig le khra bo can te/_rin chen mdzod las/_pr-iSha ta ri dgas khra bo zhes so/_/e Na/_tsa ru na yan/_mig mdzes te/_byin pa thung zhing
[\[309b.4\]]bong tshod chung ba'o/_/e Na ri dgas chung du'o zhes koSh+Tha'i rgya cher 'grel las so/_/r-i sh+ya ni/_kha dog sngon po rta dang mnyam pa ste/_'di rwa gsum pa yin cing /_ri hi ta zhes kyang bya'o/_/tsa ma ra ni/_g.yag ste/_ma he'i dbyibs can/_yul byang phyogs su skye ba gang gi mjug ma
[\[309b.5\]]las rnga yab 'byung ba'o/_/gan+d+ha rba/_ri dgas kyi khyad par te/_rta sre zhes par shes par bya'o/_/sha ra b+ha ni/_rkang pa brgyad pa gyen mig can/_seng ge yang 'joms pa ste/_b+ha ra ta ra rkang pa brgyad pa gyed mig can/_/sha ra b+ha ni nags na spyod/_/seng ge 'joms par yang dag 'gro/_/_
[\[309b.6\]]thub pa der ni nges par zhugs/_/zhes so/_/de'i rkang pa bzhi ni gyen du phyogs so/_/ga ba ya ni/_ba men te/_ba lang dang dbyibs 'dra ba'o/_/de nas byi ba la ming gsum ste/_an+du ru/_byi ba dang /_mU She ka/_rkun po dang /_a khu/_'bigs byed rnams so/_/gi ri kA/_ri'i byi ba
[\[309b.7\]]dang /_bA la mU Shi ka_/byi ba gzhon nu gnyis ni byi bran gyi ming ngo /_/sdom la ming bzhi ste/_lU ta sdom dang /_tan+d+ra pA ya thags mkhan dang /_U r+Na nA b+ha/_bal gyi lte ba can dang /_mArka Ta ka sam/_spre'u mtshungs rnams so/_/de nas bya'i ming las/_phug ron la ming gsum ste/_
[\[310a\]]
[\[310a.1\]]ka po ta dang /_pA rA ba ta/_phug ron dang /_ka la ra ba ca co sgrogs sam ngag snyan no/_/de nas khra la ming gsum ste/_sha shA da na/_ri bong za dang /_pa r+t+ri 'dab chags khra dang /_sh+ya na/_bya khra rnams so/_/'ug pa la ming gsum ste/_u lU ka_/steng gi rna ba can to/_U r+d+ha
[\[310a.2\]]kar+Na la/_pr-i Sho da ra la sogs pas/_u lU kar bsgyur ba'o/_/bA ya sA ra ti/_bya rog dgra ste/_bA ya sa/_bya rog dang /_a rA ti dgra'o/_/pe tsa ka 'ug pa'o/_/dur bya la ming gnyis te/_lo ha pr-iSh+Tha/_rgyab dmar dang /_kang+ka'o/_/de nas tsA sha dang /_ko kI di bi gnyis ni spu'i mdog baidU r+ya ltar
[\[310a.3\]]dngas shing gshog pa bkra ba'i bya/_gser gyi gtsug phud ces grags pa'i ming ngo /_/de nas bya shing sta mo'i ming gnyis te/_sha ta pa tra/_'dab ma brgya pa dang /_dA rbA g+hA Ta/_shing 'joms sam shing dgra 'am shing sta mo ste/_dA ru shing dang /_A g+hAT/_'joms pa'o/_/de nas khug rta la ming
[\[310a.4\]]gsum te/_sa rang+ga khug rta dang /_to ka ka/_chu nyung ste/_sto ka nyung du dang /_ka chu ste/_sa yig phyis pa'o/_/tsa ta ka rnams so/_/khyim bya la ming bzhi ste/_kr-i ka bA ku dang /_kuk+ka Da khyim bya ste/_ku ku zhes sgrogs pas so/_/tA mra tsU Da/_zangs kyi gtsug phud can no/_/tsa ru NA yu d+ha/_rkang
[\[310a.5\]]pa'i mtshon cha can no/_/grong gi byi'u la ming gnyis te/_tsa Da ka/_mchil pa dang /_ka la bing+ka'o/_/khu byug la ming bzhi ste/_ba na pri ya/_nags na dga' dang /_pa ra b+h+r-i ta/_gzhan gyis gsos zhes bya ste/_bya rog gis bzung nas gso bar byed pas so/_/ko ki la dang /_si ka/_khu byug

[\[310b\]]
[\[310b.1\]]byed do/_/bA ya sa/_bya rog ste/_na tshod gnas zhes so/_/dro na ka la sogs pa bzhi ni/_bya rog chen po'i ming ngo /_/'ol ba dang /_bya rgod dang /_ne tso la sogs pa ni rab tu grags pa nyid do/_/krung dang /_krauny+tsa ni/_khrung khrung zhes bya ste/_kony+tsa zhes grags pa'o/_/ko ka la sogs pa bzhi ni ngur pa'i ming
[\[310b.2\]]ngo /_/kAd m+pa dang /_ka la haM sa ni chu skyar gyi ming ngo /_/gnyis ni bya ku ra ra'i ming ste/_ut+k+ro sha/_rgyang grags thos dang /_ku ra ra/_sgra sgrogs so/_/bzhi ni ngang pa sbyi'i ming ste/_haM sa/_ngang pa dang /_shwe ta ga ru Da/_mkha' lding dkar po dang /_tsa krAng+ga 'khor lo'i yan lag dang /_man sau ka sa/_

[\[310b.5\]]brtul zhugs dang /_ma d+hu ka ra sbrang rtsi byed dang /_ma d+hu li Da/_sbrang rtsi myang dang /_ma d+hu pA li ta/_sbrang rtsi skyong dang /_dwi re pha/_ra yig gnyis pa ste/_'di'i ming sbrang ma la ra yig gnyis yod pas so/_/puSh+pa liDa/_me tog myang dang /_d+h+r-i ng+ga/_bung ba dang /_ShaT+pa da/_rkang pa drug pa dang /_b+h+ra ma ra/_'khor
[\[310b.6\]]'gro dang /_a li/_sbrang bu rnams so/_/de nas rma bya'i ming la tshigs su bcad pa gcig ste/_ma yU ra/_sa 'gro dang /_bar+hi Na/_mdongs can dang /_bar+hi/_mdongs ldan dang /_nI la kaN+Tha/_mgrin sngon dang /_b+hu dzang+ga b+hu ka lag 'gro za dang /_shi khA ba la/_gtsug phud can dang /_shi khi/_rtse mo can dang /_ke kI
[\[310b.7\]]ke ke'i sgra can dang /_me g+ha nA dA nu la si/_'brug sgra'i rjes su sgeg pa rnams so/_/rma bya'i sgra skad la ke kI zhes bya zhing /_mjug ma la gnas pa mig gi dbyibs lta bu'i zla kham ni/_me tsa ka te/_mdongs zhes bya ba la/_me tsa ka nag po la yang sngar bshad do/_/de nas tshigs su bcad pa byed
[\[311a\]]
[\[311a.1\]]dang gsum gyis bya spyi'i ming la kha ga/_mkha' 'gro'o/_/bi hang+ga/_bi ha ga/_bi hang+ga ma/_bi hA ya sa/_rnams mkha' 'gro 'am/_mkha' rgyu'am mkha' spyod sogs so/_/sha kun+ti bya'o/_/pak+Shi 'dab chags so/_/sha ku ni/_sha kun+ta/_sha ku nA/_rnams kyang bya'am nus ldan no/_/_

[\[311a.3\]]'dab chags so/_/nI Dod+g+ha ba/_tshangs skyes so/_/ga tun+man+ta/_gshog ldan no/_/p+si tan+ta/_'phur 'dod do/_/na b+ha sang+ga ma/_mkha' la spyod do/_/de nas ha ri ta la sogs pa bya'i khyad par gyi ming ste/_tit+ti la sogs pa ni sreg pa'i ming ngo /_/dzre baM dzI ba la sogs pa shang shang ste'u'i ming ste/_dzI ba ny+dzI ni 'tsho

[\[311a.5\]]dang /_saM g+ha ta/_'dus pa dang /_si tsa ya la sogs pa bsdus pa la sogs pa rnams so/_/seng ge la sogs pa'i sde'o//_//de nas mi'i sde las mi spyi'i ming la/_ma nu Sh+ya/_mi dang /_ma nu Sha/_yid skyes dang /_ma r+t+ya/_shes ldan dang /_ma nu dzA/_ma nu'i bu dang /_mA na ba/_yid ldan dang /_mi dang /_pu mAn+sa/_skyes pa
[\[311a.6\]]dang /_pany+tsa dza na/_lnga skyes te/_sa la sogs pa'i 'byung ba lnga rnams las skyes pas so/_/pu ru Sha dang /_pU ru Sha/_skyes bu'o/_/n+w-i mi rnams so/_/bud med kyi ming la/_s+t+rI bud med dang /_yo Shi ta/_btsun mo dang /_a ba lA/_stobs med ma dang /_na rI mi mo dang /_sI man+ti nI/_mtshams ldan ma dang /_ba d+hu 'ching byed ma dang
[\[311a.7\]]pra tI pa da R+shi ne/_zhes pa la/_pra tI pa ni ka TAk+Sha zur mig gi don te/_zur lta ma zhes bya'o/_/bA mA/_g.yon ma dang /_ba ni tA/_g.yon byed dang /_ma he la/_dga' ston sa gzhi ste/_ma hA dga' ston dang /_i la sa gzhi'o zhes kaspi Na mngon par 'byung ba las bshad do/_/khyad par du zhes pa ni bud
[\[311b\]]
[\[311b.1\]]med khyad par can brjod par bya ba de la/_ang+ga nA zhes pa shreSh+ThA ng+gI/_lus mchog ma zhes bya ste/_bud med kyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa rab tu shis pa'i rkang pa dang lag pa la sogs pa'i lus 'di la yod pa ste/_lus bzang ma zhes bya'o/_/b+hI ru 'jigs can ma ste/_'jigs pa'i rang
[\[311b.2\]]bzhin ma'o/_/kA ma ni/_'dod ldan pa'o/_/bA ma lo tsa nA/_g.yon mig ma ste/_mig mdzes ma'o/_/pra ma dA/_rab myos ma ste/_mchog tu rgyags pa'i gzugs dang skal ba bzang po dag gis bskyed pa'i rnam 'gyur can ma'o/_/b+hA bi nI/_sgeg ldan ma ste/_b+ha ba ni sgeg pa'i spyod pa
[\[311b.3\]]yin la de dang ldan pas so/_/kAn+tA/_/lus mdzes ma'o/_/la la nA/_gzhon lus ma ste/_shin tu gzhon pa'i lus can ma'o/_/ni tam+bi nI/_smad rgyas ma'o/_/sun+da ni/_mdzes ma ste/_gzugs mdzes pa phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa'o/_/ra ma NI dang /_rA mA/_dga' byed ma'o/_/_
[\[311b.4\]]de nas ko pA nA khro byed ma ste/_de lta bu la sogs pa bud med dang 'brel pa'i ming ji snyed pa rtogs par bya'o/_/rA dza swa lA la sogs pa brgyad ni/_rgul ldan ma ste bud med zla mtshan can ma'i ming ngo /_/bud med sbrum ma la ming bzhi ste/_A pan+na sa twa/_sems can zhugs ma dang /_
[\[311b.5\]]gurbi NI lus lcim dang /_an+ta rbat+t+waM/_nang ldan ma dang /_gar+g+hi NI/_snying po ldan ma'o/_/bu la ming lnga ste/_At+ma dza/_bdag skyes dang /_ta na ya/_lus 'phel dang /_sU nU su ta/_pu tra rnams kyang bu ste de rnams so/_/pha la ming gsum ste/_tA ta/_yab bam pha 'am skyong
[\[311b.6\]]byed do/_/dza na ka skyed byed do/_/pi tra/_pha ste srung byed do/_/ma la ming bzhi ste/_dza na ya tI/_yum mam skyed byed ma dang /_pra sU rab skyed ma dang /_mA tA/_'tsho ma dang /_dza na nI/_skyed byed ma'o/_/sring mo la gnyis te/_b+ha gi nI/_sring mo 'am che zhe dang /_swa sA sring
[\[311b.7\]]mo'o/_/tsha bo'i ming la gnyis te/_na tri dang /_pau trI/_bu'i bu'o/_/nye du spyi'i ming la drug ste/_sa go tra/_rus mtshungs pa dang /_bA n+ta pa/_'brel pa dang /_dz+nyA ti/_mdza' bshes dang /_/ban+d+hu rtsa lag dang /_swa gnyen dang /_swa dza na/_rang rigs sam rang gi skye bo 'am
[\[312a\]]
[\[312a.1\]]gnyen gyi skye bo'o/_/bza' mi la ming bzhi ste/_daM pa ti/_bza' mi dang /_dzaM pa ki/_khyo shug ste/_'di dag gi dam dang /_dzaM zhes pa'i skra dag ni mi zad pa'i tshig chung ma rjod par byed pa dag go/_/b+hAR+YA pa tI/_khyim thab dang /_dzA yA pa tI/_bza' mi dang /_byis pa'i ming
[\[312a.2\]]la rkang pa gcig te/_shi shu/_byis pa dang /_shai sha raM/_bu tsha dang /_ba l+yaM phru gu'o/_/dar ma'i ming la rkang ba gcig ste/_tA ru N+ya/_dar ma dang /_yo ba naM/_shed ldan nam lang tsho can no/_/rgan po'i ming la rkang pa gcig ste/_s+tha bI raM/_gnas brtan dang /_br-id+d+ha twaM/_rgan po dang /_dzIr+Na dang
[\[312a.3\]]dza ran/_rgas pa dang [(]'khog [,]'khogs [)]pa'o/_/da sha mI/_bcu pa dang /_dz+ya yA na/_ches rgan pa ste/_lo dgu bcu las gong du 'phags pa ni bcu pa'i gnas skabs dang ches rgan pa'o/_/de nas sman gyi spyi'i ming la lnga ste/_b+he Sha dza/_rtsi dang /_o Sha d+ha/_sman dang /_b+hai Sha dz+ya/_rtsi sman dang /_a ga da/_nad
[\[312a.4\]]med dang /_dzA yuH'tsho byed ces pa rnams so/_/nad tsam la ming bdun te/_rug dang /_ru dza/_nad dang /_u pa tA pa/_nye bar gdung bas ste/_nad kyis lus dang yid nye bar gdung bas so/_/ro ga dang /_byA d+hi dang /_ga da dang /_A ma ya rnams kyang nad de/_na tsha dang nyams mi bde ba la sogs pa'o/_/_
[\[312a.5\]]de nas gra Na dang /_a ru ni rma'i ming ngo /_/sman pa'i ming la tshigs su bcad pa phyed de/_/ro ga hA ri/_nad 'joms te nad 'phrog par byed pas so/_/a gad ma kA ra/_nad sel te/_nad med par byed pas so/_/b+hi Sha ga sman pa'o/_/bai d+ya 'tsho byed de/_tshe'i rig byed rig pas so/_/tsi kit+sa ka gso
[\[312a.6\]]dpyad mkhan rnams so/_/khu ba la ming drug ste/_shu kra khu ba dang /_te dzaHzla ba'am gzi brjid/_re ta sI/_thig le dang /_bI dza sa bon dang /_bIr+Ya/_nus pa dang /_in+d+ri ya/_dbang po rnams so/_/de nas ma yu dang sit+taM ni mkhris pa'o/_/ka pha dang /_sh+leSh+ma ni bad kan no/_/de nas twaka pags pa ste/_
[\[312a.7\]]twa tsa yang dag par sgrib pa la'o zhes pas rus pa'i gzeb dang sha dang khrag sgrib par byed pas so/_/a sr-ig+ng+ha ra/_brag 'dzin pags pa'o/_/sha la ming drug ste/_pi sha taM/_cha shas kyi don gyis sha ste/_pa sha cha shas la/_k+ta rkyen no/_/ta ra saM/_bsgral bas sha ste/_tr-i sgrol bar byed pa la/_de ba pa bzhin
