[\[312b\]]
[\[312b.1\]]du/_as tsa rkyen no/_/man+sa/_mchod byed do/_/mA na mchod pa la/_ha sa'i sgra bzhin du sa'i rkyen no/_/pA la la skyong byed de sha'o/_/gra bya dang /_A miSha sha'o/_/tshigs bcad phyed kyis khrag gi ming ste/_ru d+hir/_khyab gnas te khrag go_/a sr-ig a ti sr-i dza ti lhag par 'dor byed la pr-i Sho da ra la
[\[312b.2\]]sogs pas a sr-ig tu bsgyur ba ste/_mtshon ma btab na mi ltung la/_btab na lhag par 'dor bas so/_/lo hi ta dang rak+ta ni dmar bas khrag go_/k+Sha ta dza/_rma skyes te khrag go/_/sho Ni taM/_rgyud ldan nam dmar po'o/_/snying la bzhi ste/_puk+ka snying dang /_a gra mAn+sa/_sha mchog dang /_
[\[312b.3\]]hr-i da ya/_snying po dang /_hrad ces pa yang snying ste/_lus kyi nang na gnas pas sha'i khyad par pad+ma'i rnam pa lta bu kha 'og tu phyogs pa ste/_de ltar yang /_pad+ma'i ze'u 'bru dang 'dra ba/_/bu ga ldan pa 'og tu phyogs/_/de ni snying zhes bya ba ste/_kun gyi skye mched chen po'o/_/zhes pa pad+ma dkar
[\[312b.4\]]po'i phreng ba zhes bya ba las so/_/lus kyi rtsa la ming gsum ste/_nA Di dang /_d+ha ma ni dang /_shi rA rnams te/_bu ga dang ldan zhing rlung 'bab pa dang /_srad bu bzhin rus pa 'ching bar byed pa dang /_klo ma dang /_ma sti Sh+kaM/_klad rgyas sam klad pa ste/_mgo bo las byung ba mar gyi gong du lta bu g+hi b+hi
[\[312b.5\]]zhes grags pa'o/_/nang na gnas pa'i zas las byung ba'i dri ma 'bab pa ni snabs la sogs pa rnam pa bcu gnyis te/_de ltar yang /_zhag dang khu ba rkang dang khrag_/rna spabs bshang gci snabs mtshan ma/_/bad kan dang ni [(]mchim [,]mchi ma [)]rdul/_/mi yi dri ma bcu gnyis so/_/zhes so/_/_
[\[312b.6\]]gsum gyis mchil ma'i ming ste/_sr-i Ni ka kha chu ngang /_s+yan+di nI dang /_lA lA/_mchil ma'o/_/gnyis kyis dri chu'i ming ste/_mU tra/_dri chu'am gcin dang /_pra sra ba/_gci ba'am rgyun 'bab po/_/U ts+tsA ra la sogs pa bshang ba'i ming ste/_U ts+tsA ra dor bya'o/_/a bska ra/_khyab ldan
[\[312b.7\]]no/_/sham la/_'dres ma'o/_/sha kr-ita/_'gro byed do/_/pu ri ShaM/_bshang ba'o/_/gu tha/_phyi sa'o/_/brtsa skaM/_dri ma'o/_/biSh+ThA dang /_bi Da dri chen no/_/de nas thod pa'i ming la/_ka ro Ti dang /_karba Ta dang /_ka pA la rnams so/_/rus pa tsam la ming gsum ste/_kI ka saM dang /_ku l+yaM/_gdung ngam rus dang /_as+thi/_
[\[313a\]]
[\[313a.1\]]rus pa'o/_/ka le ba ra la sogs pa bcu gnyis ni lus spyi'i ming ngo /_/de la ka le bar 'am ka re ba ra ni khog pa 'am lus so/_/gA traM gong bu'am lus dang /_ba su 'dus pa dang /_saM ha na naM/_tshogs pa dang /_sha rI raM/_thos byed dang /_bar+Sh+Ya/_gzugs po dang /_bi gra ha/_rnam
[\[313a.2\]]'dzin dang /_kA ya lus dang /_de ha/_khyab pa dang /_mA rti/_lus dang /_ta nu dang /_ta nU yang lus te/_snga ma ni ta nu rgyas pa la/_me ru'i sgra bzhin/_u rkyen dang /_phyi ma ni/_tsa mi ta ni ba d+hi rnams las u'o zhes pas u rkyen du byas pa'o/_/rkang pa la ming bzhi ste/_pA da/_pa da/_'gro bar byed
[\[313a.3\]]pas rkang pa dang /_tsa ra Na/_rgyu byed dang /_aM g+h+ri 'gro byed de/_a hi 'gro ba la/_mang po las so zhes pas krin 'o/_/'jig rten dbang phyug gi bstod pa brgya par/_aM hri zhes ha yig gi rjes khrid yod de/_kle sha b+hu hA hi te hA hu ti bi hi ta br-i ha tro hi du Sh+ya g+ni dA hA bA hI nI stA rba hu bi hi ta hi tA pad+ma ha stAM
[\[313a.4\]]hri b+ha baH_zhes 'byung ngo /_/bud med kyi rtags la ming gsum ste/_u pa s+tha/_nyer gnas dang /_b+ha ga cha ba'am skal ba dang /_yo ni skye gnas so/_/skyes bu'i rtags la ming bzhi ste/_sha sh+ma pho rtags dang /_me tra mjug do dang /_ma he na chu 'dar te/_gci ba dang khu ba rnam par 'dor
[\[313a.5\]]bas so zhes so/_/she pha si/_nyal gnas te/_shing nyal ba la/_a sun rkyen dang /_phuT A ga ma'o/_/gsum ni 'bras bu'i sgo nga'i ming ste/_muSh+ko nyaN+Da/_'bras bu'i sgo nga dang /_ko Sha mdzod can dang /_br-i Sha Na/_spubs can no/_/lto ba la ming lnga ste/_pi tsi N+DaM/_gsus pa dang /_
[\[313a.6\]]ku k+She dku dang /_dza Tha ra dang /_u da ra/_lto ba dang /_run+da rU Na gang ba la'o/_/ad+ha la sogs pa bzhin du dan rkyen dang /_thung du la sogs pa'o/_/de nas sta na dang /_ku tsa nu ma'i ming ngo /_/phrag pa la ming gsum ste/_skan+d+ha phrag pa ste/_kaM ma ste kaM da d+hA ti skan+d+ha/_zhes pas/_kaM
[\[313a.7\]]mgo bo yin pa 'dzin par byed pas phrag pa ste/_pA ra ska ra la sogs pas su Ta A ga ma sbyar ba'o/_/b+hu dza shi raHdpung pa'i mgo'o/_/aM sa phrag pa'o/_/de nas lag pa'i ming la/_b+hu dza/_lag pa ste skyod par byed pas so/_/bA hu 'bar bar byed pas lag pa'o/_/pra biSh+Ta/_'jug
[\[313b\]]
[\[313b.1\]]par byed pas lag pa'o/_/doHzhi bar byed pas lag pa ste/_dmu nye bar zhi ba la sogs rkyen no/_/pany+tsa sha kha/_yal ga lnga pa ste shing yal ga lnga pa dang 'dra bas so/_/sha ya lag pa ste nyal byed do/_/pA Ni lag pa ste tha snyad ston par byed pas so/_/de nas kur+pa ra zhes pa gru mo yin la/_
[\[313b.2\]]de'i gong du gnas pa pra gaN+Da/_bar lhu'o/_/gru mo las 'og tu/_pra koSh+Tha lag ngar ro/_/de dang lag mgo'i bar/_ma Ni ban+d+ha/_nor bu 'ching ba zhes bya ste mkhrig ma'o/_/de nas mthe'u chung gi bar la/_ka ra b+ha zhes bya'o/_/mdzub mo'i ming la/_tardza nI/_sdigs mdzub dang /_pra de shi nI/_
[\[313b.3\]]rab tu ston byed ces bya'o/_/sor mo la/_ang+gu lI dang /_ang+gu rI/_so ra mo dang /_ka ra sha kha/_lag pa'i yal ga zhes bya'o/_/mthe bong la sogs la so so'i ming la/_ang+gu Sh+Tha/_mthe bong ste/_ang+ga tiSh+Tha ti/_zhes pa lus la gnas pas mthe bong ngo /_/mdzub mo la pra de shi nI/_sngar bshad
[\[313b.4\]]pa ste/_'phral gyi tha snyad rab tu ston cing go bar byed pas so/_/ma d+h+ya ma/_gung mo thams cad kyi dbus su skyes pas so/_/a nA mi kA ming med de 'di la ming med pas so/_/kan Sh+Tha/_mthe'u chung ste/_thams cad kyi tha mar gyur pas so/_/de nas sen mo'i ming la/_pu nar+b+ha ba/_slar skye ba
[\[313b.5\]]dang /_ka ra du ha/_lag skyes dang /_na kha dang /_na kha ra/_sen mo zhes pa rnams so/_/de nas tshad kyi ming la/_mdzub mo dang bcas pa'i mthe bong brkyang ba ni/_pra de sha rab tu ston byed ces bya zhing /_de bzhin du gung mo dang ldan pa'i mthe bong brkyang ba ni/_tA lA ste/_mtho gang zhes bya
[\[313b.6\]]la/_ming med dang yang dag par ldan pa'i mthe bong brkyang ba ni kar+Na/_ba lang rna ba zhes bya ba dang /_mthe'u chung dang ldan pa'i mthe bong brkyang ba ni/_bi sta ste zhes bya ba'i mtho'o/_/de nas mgrin pa'i ming la/_kaN+Tha mgrin pa dang /_gal ske dang /_gra'i ba mgrin pa dang /_shi ro d+hi dang /_
[\[313b.7\]]kan+d+ka ra mgo 'dzin dang /_kamU gra'i ba/_dung 'dra'i mgrin pa dang /_tri re khA/_ri mo gsum pa ste/_'di gnyis skyes bu chen po'i ming ste/_/de nas kha'i bu ga la ming bdun te/_bak+t+ra smra byed dang /_a s+ya kha dang /_bad na/_smra byed dang /_ruN+Da dang /_A na na/_kha 'am zhal dang /_la pa naM/_rjod byed
[\[314a\]]
[\[314a.1\]]dang /_mu kha/_sgo 'am kha rnams so/_/sna'i ming la/_g+h+rA Na snom byed dang /_gan+d+ha ba ha/_dri len dang /_g+ho NA/_nA sA dang /_nA si ka_sna 'am shangs so/_/mchu'i ming la/_oSh+Tha dang /_a d+ha ra ya mchu ma mchu dang /_ra da nA ts+tsha da so sgrib dang /_da sha na bA sa sI/_
[\[314a.2\]]so'i gos te de dag dang chos mtshungs pas so/_/de nas g+haN+Da dang /_ka po la ni mkhur tshos so/_/de nas so'i ming la/_ra da nA ldad byed dang /_da sha nA/_gcod byed dang /_dan+ta snyems byed dang /_ra dA so rnams so/_/de nas tA lu dang /_kA ku dam rkan gyi ming ngo /_/de nas lce'i ming la/_
[\[314a.3\]]ra sa dz+nyA/_ro shes dang /_ra sa nA/_ro myang dang /_dzi hwa/_lce rnams so/_/dpral ba'i ming la/_la lA Ta/_dpral ba dang /_a li ka rgyan gnas dang /_go d+hi mig 'dzin te/_gorne tra d+hI ya ti/_zhes pa/_go mig yin te 'dzin par byed do zhes so/_/mig la ming brgyad de/_lo tsa naM/_lta byed
[\[314a.4\]]dang /_na ya naM 'dren byed dang /_netraM mig dang /_ak+Shi NaM/_mthong byed dang /_tsak+ShuHgsal byed dang /_ak+ShiNI/_khyab byed dang /_br-i ka dang /_dr-iSh+Ti dang /_snang byed dang lta byed do/_/mgo bo la ming lnga ste/_ut+ta mang+gA/_yan lag mchog dang /_shi raHmgo bo dang /_shIR+Sha mgo bo dang /_mUr+d+ha
[\[314a.5\]]na spyi bo dang /_masta ka klad pa can no/_/skra la ming drug ste/_tsi ku ru bsags nas gcod pas skra ste/_tsi sogs pa la'o/_/kur gcod pa la'o/_/de dag la pri Sho da ra la sogs pas rkyen phyis te/_tsi ku ra'o/_/kun+ta la/_'khril ba'o/_/bA la phra bas na skra ste/_ka tsa 'ching bar byed pas skra ste/_ka tsa 'ching ba la/_atsa
[\[314a.6\]]rkyen no/_/ke sha zhes ke masta ke she te/_tiSh+Tha ti/_zhes 'byung ste/_ke zhes pas mgo bo la zhes pa dang /_sha ni she te/_nyal ba'i cha shas kyi yi ge ste/_mgo bor nyal te gnas pa dang 'dra bas mgo nyal te skra'o/_/shi ro ru ha/_mgo skyes so/_/ba spu la ming gsum ste/_ta nU ru ha/_lus skyes so/_/ro ma/_ba
[\[314a.7\]]spu ste/_ru ha rab tu skye ba la/_byo ma la sogs pa rnams so zhes pas ma ning rkyen dang /_mtha' dbyi ba byas pas/_ro ma zhes grub pa/_de nyid ka pi ri ga la sogs pa rnams so zhes pas la ru bsgyur bas lo ma/_spu 'am ba spu'o/_/de nas rgyan gyi ming la/_a laM kA ra/_a laM kri yA/_A b+ha ra Na/_pa riSh+kA ra
[\[314b\]]
[\[314b.1\]]b+hU ShaN/_maN+Da naM rnams rgyan spyi'i ming ngo /_/mu ku Ta dang /_ka ri TaM cod pan dang /_tsU Da ma Ni/_gtsug gi nor bu dang /_shi ro ma Ni/_spyi bo'i nor bu ste mgo rgyan gyi ming ngo /_/rna rgyan gyi ming la/_kar+Ni ka ze'u 'bru can dang /_tA la pat+t+ra/_ta la'i 'dab dang /_kuN+Da la/_'khyel pa can dang /_kar+Na beSh+Te kaM rna
[\[314b.2\]]ba dkris pa ste de rnams so/_/de nas grai be ya ka dang /_kan+Tha b+hU Sha mgrin rgyan no/_/lag gdub la/_ka Ta ka dang ba la ya'o/_/ske rags la/_me kha lA 'og pag gam ske rags rgyan can dang /_ra sa nA ro ldan zhes pa gnyis so/_/rkang gdub la many+dzi ra dang /_nU pu ra dang haM sa ka ngang pa can
[\[314b.3\]]zhes pa la sogs pa'o/_/de nas pags pa la sogs pa rnam pa bzhi ni gos kyi bye brag ste/_gos kyi rgyu yin pas so/_/de la twa ka pags pa ste/_shing shun dang zar ma'i ras la sogs pa'o/_/pa la 'bras bu ste/_ras bal shing gi 'bras bu las byung ba'o/_/kr-i mi srin bu ste/_da ra la sogs
[\[314b.4\]]pa srin bu'i sbubs las skyes pas so/_/ro ma spu ste ri dgas ang+ku zhes bya ba dang /_lug la sogs pa'i spu las skyes pa'o/_/na ba am+bar la sogs pa ni/_gos sar zhes pa la sogs pa gos kyi khyad par ro/_/gos tsam gyi ming la brgyad de/_nak+ta ka/_gcer sgrib dang /_kan+pa Ta ras
[\[314b.5\]]gos dang /_bas+t+ra gos dang /_Ats+tsha da naM/_/g.yogs ma'am dgab bya dang /_bA sa bgo ba dang /_tsem la gos dang /_bA sa naM gcer skyob dang /_aM shu kaM bgo rgyu'o/_/mchu dang zheng gi ming la dair+g+h+ya/_ring ba'am srid du'o/_/A yA ma dang A ro ha ring ba'o/_/pa ri NA ha dang bi shA la zhing che ba 'am
[\[314b.6\]]yangs pa'am rgya che ba'o/_/pu tse la gos bzang dang pa Ta dar gos te gnyis ni gos bzang po'i ming ngo /_/ba rA shi gos kyi phung po dang s+thU la shaT gos mthug po ste gnyis ni gos brtsegs pa'am spom po'i ming ngo /_/de nas ni tsol dang prats+tsha da paT smad gos sam dor ma'o/_/ral+la ka dang kam+ba la la ba'am snam
[\[314b.7\]]bu'o/_/pa ri d+hA na dang a d+ho aM aM shu ka ni/_sham thabs sam mthang gos so/_/pra bA ra dang u t+ta ra saM ga ni stod gos sam bla gos so/_/de nas bi tA naM bla re dang /_ul+lor steng g.yogs dang /_dU Sh+ya gur dang /_bat+t+ra biShaM sbra ste/_gos kyi khyim zhes pa'o/_/de nas pra ti si ra dang dza ba ni ka'am ya ba ni kA yol ba dang /_
[\[315a\]]
[\[315a.1\]]ti raSh+ka ra b+hA mi snang byed do yol ba'i ming ngo /_/de nas pa ri karma yongs bcos dang /_aM ga saM ska ra lus kyi bcas legs te khrus la sogs pa spyi'i ming ngo /_/de la mAR+Shi/_'dag 'chal dang /_mArdza nI khrus rtsi dang /_mr-i dza dag byed do/_/ud+d+hat+ta na dang /_uts+tsha da na dril phyis te/_rdzas kyis dri ma sel
[\[315a.2\]]ba'i ming ngo /_/snA naM khrus so/_/A sla ba dang sla ba chur khrus byed pa'i ming ngo /_/lus la byug pa'i sman dri bzang po'i ming la/_kung+ku ma gur gum dang /_kash+mI ra dzan+ma kha che skyes dang /_ag+ni shi kha me'i rtse mo dang /_bar mchog ldan dang /_bA h+TI ka me ldan dang /_pI ta na/_ser po dang /_sU R+ya nyi ma dang /_rak+ta
[\[315a.3\]]dmar po dang /_saM ko tsa kun nas 'khums dang /_pi shu na phra ma can dang /_de rnams gur kum gyi ming ngo /_/d+hI ra brtan pa dang /_la hi ta dmar po gnyis ni tsan+dan dmar po'i ming ngo /_/rgya skyegs la ming drug ste/_lak+ShA rgya skyegs dang /_de nyid ka pi ri ka la sogs pas bsgyur/_rak+ShA de nyid do/_/dzan+tu skye ldan dang /_
[\[315a.4\]]yA ba dang /_A lak+ta rgya tshos dang /_dru mA ma ya shing nad med do/_/li shi la ming gsum ste/_la bang+ga li shi dang /_de ba ku su ma/_lha'i me tog dang /_shrI saM dz+nya/_dpal gyi ming can no/_/de nas dzA pa ka zlos pa po dang /_kA lI ya dus su phan dang /_kA la nU sA ri dus rjes 'brang zhes pa rnams ni tshong pa la sogs pa
[\[315a.5\]]la kA lI ya zhes grags pa'i shing ser po'i ming ngo /_/de nas a ga ru'i ming la sa mAr+tha kaM nus ldan dang /_baM shi ka rgyud ldan dang /_a gu ru zhes pa/_la g+hu nA ma twA gu ru zhes 'byung ste/_yang ba'i ming can nyid kyi phyir mi lci ba'o zhes bya'o/_/rA dzA r+ha rgyal po la 'os zhes bya'o/_/lo ha kr-i mi dza srin skyes dang /_dzong+ga
[\[315a.6\]]kaM zhes pa dang /_slob dpon byA Dis/kr-iSh+Ta dr-ik+Sha shing nag dang /_nr-i pa pri ya mi bdag dga' byed ces kyang bshad do/_/a ga ru khyad par can la a ga ru nag po dang maM ga lI bkra shis can dang mal+li gan+d+hi zhes bshad do/_/de nas yak+Sha d+hU pa la sogs pa lnga ni spos dkar gyi ming ste/_yak+Sha d+hU pa mchod sbyin spos
[\[315a.7\]]dang /_sardza ra sa thang chu'i spos dang /_a rA la pra rtsi spos dang /_sarba ra sa/_khu ba kun ldan dang /_ba hu rU pa/_gzugs mang ngo /_/pr-ika d+hU pa/_sbyar spos dang /_kr-i tri ma d+hU pa/_bcos ma'i spos te/_a ga ru la sogs pa lhan cig skyes pa'i dri rnams dri'i bstan bcos las 'byung ba bzhin phan tshun legs par
[\[315b\]]
[\[315b.1\]]sbyar ba yan lag bcu pa lta bu'o/_/de nas tu ruSh+ka dang paN+D-ika dang /_sih+la dang /_yA ban zhes pa rnams sih+la'i ming ngo /_/de nas shrI ba sa dpal gos te de la sogs pa lnga ni thang chu'i ming ngo /_/de nas gla rtsi la ming gsum ste/_mr-i ga nA b+he ri dgas lte ba dang /_mr-i gam da ri dgas chang dang /_kastU ri gla rtsi'o/_/_
[\[315b.2\]]ka ko la la ming gsum ste ko la ka ma dang kak+ko la kaM dang ko sha pha la sbubs 'bras so/_/ga bur la ming lnga ste/_karbU nus pa dang ldan pas ga bur te/_kr-i pu nus pa la U ra rkyen du byas pa'o/_/g+ha na sA ra/_sprin gyi snying po'o/_/tsan+d+ra saM dz+nyA/_zla ba'i ming can te/_zla ba dang bur phan tshun ming gi
[\[315b.3\]]rnam grangs so/_/si tA b+h+ra/_'od dkar can no/_/hi ma bA lu ka kha ba'i bye ma'o/_/de nas tshigs su bcad pa phyed kyis tsan+dan spyi'i ming ste/_gan+d+ha sA ra dri'i snying po dang /_ma la ya dza/_ma la ya skyes te/_ri bo ma la ya las byung ba'o/_/b+ha dra shrI dpal bzang po/_tsan+dan tsan dan zhes grags pa ste/_
[\[315b.4\]]tshim byed ces bya ste/_tsa di tshim pa la luT rkyen no/_/tsan dan dkar po la ming gsum ste/_tai la par+Ni ka til mar 'dab can zhes bya ba'i tsan dan ri bom la ya'i phyogs gcig nas 'byung ba'o/_/go shIR+Sha/_sa mchog gam ba lang mgo zhes bya ba ste ba lang mgo'i rnam pa can ma la ya'i phyogs su
[\[315b.5\]]skye ba'o/_/ha ri tsan+dan/_zhes pa la ha ri ni sbal pa ste/_de'i dbyibs can gyi ri bo zhig las skyes pas ha ri tsan dan zhas bya'o/_/de nas tsan dan dmar po'i ming ste/_tai la par+Ni/_til mar 'dab can no/_/pa trAng+gaM 'dab ma'i lus can te dbus dmar ba'i 'dab ma can no/_/rany+dza naM tshos byed do/_/_
[\[315b.6\]]rak+ta tsan+dan tsan dan dmar po'o/_/ku tsan+dan tsan dan ngan pa'i ming ngo /_/de nas dzA ti'i ming la/_dzA ti/_sna ma'am sri shing sna ma dang /_ko Sha sbubs can dang /_dzA ti pha la/_spos kyi rgyal po'am lig shi wer zhes pa'o/_/yak+Sha karda ma/_mchod sbyin gyi byug pa ste/_ga pur dang gla rtsi dang a ga ru dang kak+ko la rnams sbyar ba'o/_/_
[\[315b.7\]]bkod pa'am rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i ming la/_ra tsa nA/_bkod pa dang pa ri s+yan+da/_chos rtsom pa dang /_A b+ho ga dang /_pa ri pUr+Na/_yongs su rdzogs pa'o/_/dI pa/_mar me dang /_pra dA+e pa/_rab 'bar te sgron me'i ming ngo /_/gdan la/_pI Tha dang A sa na'o/_/de nas sa murga te/_za ma tog dang /_sam+bu Ta ka/_kha sbyar
[\[316a\]]
[\[316a.1\]]ram ga'u'o/_/pra sA d+ha nI/_skra shad dang /_kang+ka ti kA so mangs te/_ba so la sogs pa las byas pa skra byi dor byed pa'i cha byad do/_/me long la dar+pa Na dang ma ku ra dang A daR+sha/_kun mthong zhes pa rnams so/_/de nas byany+dza naM rlung g.yab dang ta la br-it+ta kaM bsil yab ces pa ste de rnams mi'i
[\[316a.2\]]sde tshan no//_//de nas bram ze la sogs pa'i sde la/_thog mar rigs tsam gyi ming la/_san+ta ti rgyud dang go tra rigs dang dza na na cho 'brang dang /_ku la/_rus sam rigs dang /_a b+hi dza na/_rtsa lag dang /_a n+wa ya rjes skyes sam rjes 'gro dang /_bi sha rigs rgyud dang /_a n+wa bA ya/_rtsa khrid dang san+tA na rgyud
[\[316a.3\]]do/_/rigs de ni rnam pa bzhi ste/_bram ze dang rgyal rigs dang rje rigs dang dmangs rigs rnams so/_/bram ze la ming drug ste/_dwi dza gnyis skyes te bram ze dang bya dang so rnams la'o/_/a gra dzan+ma/_sngon skyes te rigs bzhi'i thog mar bram ze skyes zhes grag go_/b+hU de ba sa'i lha'o/_/ba Da brta
[\[316a.4\]]can no/_/bi sra bram ze'o/_/prah+ma Na tshangs pa'i bu ste/_bram ze rnams tshangs pa'i kha las skyes par grag go_/mkhas pa'i ming gi rnam grangs la 'dir nyi shu rtsa gsum ste/_bid bAn/_rig pa can nam rig ldan dang /_bi pash+tsi ta rnam gsal dang /_do Sha dz+nyA nyes pa shes dang /_sad mdzes ldan nam dam pa dang
[\[316a.5\]]su d+hI blo bzang dang /_ko bi da/_ci yang rig dang /_bud+ha/_rtogs ldan dang /_d+hI ra brten pa dang /_ma nI Shidz+nya/_sems shes dang /_pradz+nyA shes rab can dang /_saM khyA na grangs can dang /_paN+Di ta mkhas pa'am mdzangs pa dang /_ka bi snyan dngags mkhan dang /_d+hI mA na/_blo ldan dang /_sU ri dpa' bo dang /_kr-i tI go ba
[\[316a.6\]]can dang /_kr-iSh+Ti mkhas pa dang /_lap+d+ha bar+Na grags ldan nam grags thob dang /_bi tsak+Sha Na/_rnam par dngas pa'am rnam par gsal ba dang /_dU ra daR+shi ring du mthong ba dang /_dIr+g+ha diR+shA ring po mthong dang /_sho tri ya/_thos ldan dang /_ts+tshan+da sa/_sdeb sbyor shes zhes pa rnams so/_!_/_rgyal rigs kyi sde
[\[316a.7\]]las rgyal po'i ming la/_rA dza rgyal po dang /_ba hu dza dpung ba skyes dang /_rgyal rigs rnams tshangs pa'i dpung pa las skyes par grags pas so/_/k+Sha tri yang rma skyob ces bya ste rgyal rigs so/_/pi rA Ta/_rnam par rgyal dang /_rAT gsal ba'am rgyal po'o/_/pAr+thi ba/_sa bdag dang /_k+Sh+mA b+hu ka sa spyod
[\[316b\]]
[\[316b.1\]]dang /_nr-i pa mi bdag dang /_b+hU pa sa skyong dang /_ma hI k+Shi taH/_sa gzhi skyong ba'o/_/a d+hI shwa ra/_lhag pa'i dbang phyug ste/_rgyal phran du mas btud pa'i rgyal po dang /_tsakra brti/_'khor los sgyur ba dang /_sarba b+hau ma/_sa kun dbang ba rnams so/_/glang po che'i ming la dan+tI/_so ldan dang /_dad+hA so can dang /_ba la
[\[316b.2\]]stobs ldan dang /_hasti lag ldan dang /_dwi dan+tA so gnyis pa dang /_a ne ka pA/_mang po 'thung dang /_dwi pA gnyis 'thung dang /_mA taM ga dza/_glang mo skyes rnams so/_/rta spyi'i ming la g+ha Ta ka 'dren byed dang /_bA ti/_chu 'thung dang /_tu ra~M` 'og tu/_nA ga_/kuny+dza ra/_ga dza/_tha ra Na/_ka rI/_i b+ha/_stam+be ra ma/_sad mi ste chags can rnams so/_
[\[316b.3\]]ga tu raM ga ma rnams myur 'gro'am mgyogs 'gro'am 'gro mgyogs zhes bya'o/_/ba dzI gshog pa can dang /_bA ha bzhon pa dang /_arba rta dang /_gan+d+harba 'gro byed dang /_a shwa dang /_ha yarta dang /_sain+d+ha ba/_rgya mtsho skyes te lan tshwa dang ral gri la yang ngo /_/sap+ta ya bdun ldan rnams so/_/rta khyad par can
[\[316b.4\]]gyi ming la/_A dzA ne ya/_cang shes dang ku lin+ta/_kye ling /_bi nI ta/_rnam dul dang /_sA d+hu ma hi na/_legs 'gro dang /_bA na yu dza dang /_pA ra sI ka dang /_kAm+bo dza bah+ni kA ya/_rnams yul de dag tu skyes pa'i ming ste/_rim pa bzhin/_bA na'i yul skyes/_par sig skyes/_'dar byed skyes dang /_me ldan skyes
[\[316b.5\]]zhes bya'o/_/phun sum tshogs pa la ming bzhi ste/_sam+pa da/_phun sum tshogs pa dang /_sam+pat+ti/_'byor ldan nam phun sum tshogs pa dang /_shrI dpal lam g.yang dang /_lak+Sh+mI phun sum tshogs pa'am dpal lam shis pa'o/_/slob dpon rab 'byor zla bas mdzad pa'i 'chi ba med pa'i mdzod kyi rgya
[\[316b.6\]]cher 'grel pa 'dod pa 'jo ba ji ltar rnyed pa rdzogs so//_//'di ni mkhas pa rnams kyis shes par bya ba'i gnas la rig pa'i gnas lnga yod pa las/_sgra rig par gtogs pa/_gsung rab dgongs 'grel dang bcas pa dang /_rig byed la sogs pa phyi nang gi gzhung lugs rab 'byams
[\[316b.7\]]las 'byung ba mkhas pa rnams la grags pa'i ming gi tha snyad rab 'byams la rmongs pa med par byed pa/_mngon brjod kyi bstan bcos 'chi ba med pa'i mdzod ces bya ba'i rgya cher 'grel pa ste/_'di'i rtsa ba ni paN+Di ta 'chi med seng ge zhes bya bas/_sngon gyi slob dpon byA Di dang /_mchog sred dang /_tsan+d+ra go
[\[317a\]]
[\[317a.1\]]mi dang /_bA man la sogs pa'i bstan bcos las btus te khyad par dang bcas pa phul du byung bar mdzad de/_de yang ut+pa li la sogs pa la mdor bsdus pa dang /_ming gi phreng ba sogs la rtags kyis dman pa dang /_rtags kyi rab tu byed pa sogs la ming gis dman pa
[\[317a.2\]]dang /_'chi med phreng ba sogs ma rdzogs pa dang /_po pA li ta la sogs pa sde tshan gyis stong pas 'di yon tan thams cad kyis khyad par du 'phags pa nyid yin pas 'di nyid sngar paN+Di ta kIrti tsan+d+ra dang /_yar lungs lo tsA ba grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis tshang bar bsgyur ro/_/'grel pa 'dod pa 'jo ba
[\[317a.3\]]'di ni paN+Di ta rab 'byor zla ba zhes bya bas/_tha snyad kyi gtsug lag rab 'byams las btus nas rnam par phye ba ste/_ming so so'i sgra sgrub tshul rnams ni/_gtso bor slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mi'i lugs yin te/_sngar mchod brjod du/_mtha' yas rgyud kyi mngon brjod chu gter rin chen gang /_/snyan
[\[317a.4\]]dngags mgrin pa do shal bang mdzod rnams bkod rnams/_/dpal ldan tsan+d+ra go mis sbyar ba'i phul byung mod/_/des ni rab tu bsgrubs pa'i cho ga bdag gis brtsam/_/zhes 'byung ngo /_/gzhan yang /_tsan+d+ra pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon d+harma dA sas mdzad pa dang /_de'i rgyas 'grel paN+Di ta rat+na
[\[317a.5\]]ma tis mdzad pa dang /_de'i yang rgya cher 'grel pa paN+Di ta sUr+Na tsan+d+ra dzi ten+d+ra ste rgyal dbang zla ba gang bas mdzad pa stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug pa dang /_des mdzad pa'i byings kyi dpung gnyen dang /_'jam dpal gyi byA ka ra Na'i 'grel pa ka ling+ga'i slob dpon rgyal po dpal gyis mdzad pa stong phrag
[\[317a.6\]]brgyad pa dang /_rgyud nyung gi rnam bshad du rgas mdzad pa ste/_ka lA pa'i 'grel pa durga sid+ha dang /_bram ze pA Ni'i sgra'i bstan bcos dang /_slob dpon mchog sred dang /_byA Di dang /_ra b+ha sa dang /_bA man dang /_drang srong rgyas pa sogs kyis ci rigs par mdzad pa'i 'chi med phreng ba dang /_rin chen
[\[317a.7\]]mdzod dang /_sgeg pa gsal ba dang /_skabs gsum gyi lhag ma dang /_sngon byung lo rgyus kyi snyan dngags b+hA ra ta dang /_sham+ba'i sngon rabs dang /_rA ma ya Na dang /_markaN+De ya dang /_dbyangs can gyi mgul rgyan dang /_sha ba ra swa mi/_ri khrod rje'am/_shi bA swa mi/_zhi ba'i rjes mdzad pa'i ka spin mngon par
[\[317b\]]
[\[317b.1\]]'byung ba rtsa 'grel dang /_nag mo'i khol gyis mdzad pa'i gzhon nu 'byung ba dang /_daN+Di'i tshig rgyan la sogs pa la brten nas gzhung chen po'i tshigs su bcad pa'i grangs kyis btsal na stong phrag bcur longs pa tsam mdzad pa'i phyed lhag gi rgya dpe sne'u gdong rtse'i gtsug lag khang na bzhugs
[\[317b.2\]]pa las phul du byung ba'i mkhyen rab dang thugs rje tshad ma mchis pa mnga' ba gangs ri'i khrod kyi sa skyong mtha' dag gi gtsug gi nor bu la zhabs rten gyi pad+mo'i ge sar rnam par 'god pas skabs gsum dbang po'i khengs pa 'phrog par mdzad cing /_lugs gnyis kyi rig lugs dri ma med
[\[317b.3\]]pas/_stobs bcu mnga' ba'i bstan pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang /_lhar bcas skye dgu'i phan bde dbyig 'dzin gyi gzhi la rgyas shing yun du gnas par mdzad pa'i sa thams cad kyi dbang phyug chos kyi rje chos kyi rgyal po spyan snga rin po che dpal ngag gi dbang phyug grags pa phyogs thams
[\[317b.4\]]cad las rnam par rgyal ba lha'i zhal snga nas kyis legs par bsgyur ces bka' lung dang mthun rkyen bzang po stsal ba la brten nas/_legs par sbyar ba'i skad kyi brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos chen po ka lA pa dang /_tsan+d+ra pa 'grel pa dang bcas pa dag thos shing cha shas tsam khong du
[\[317b.5\]]chud la/_sngon gyi lo tsA ba chen po rnams kyis dam pa'i chos ji ltar bsgyur ba'i tshul phyogs tsam mthong ba dpal zhwa lu'i btsun pa 'gos lo tsA ba gsum pa dge slong d+harma pA la b+ha dra zhes bya bas gsung rab rin po che'i ming gi cha rnams la ma rtogs pa'i
[\[317b.6\]]'khrul pa bsal ba dang /_dri ma med pa'i gtsug lag gi tshul phyogs tsam gsar du bstan pas bstan pa rin po che'i sgo thams cad nas mi nub cing 'phel ba dang bcas pa'i rten 'brel du gyur par bsams nas/_dpal sa skyong mchog gi bka' spyi bos
[\[317b.7\]]mnos te sgra'i sgrub tshul rgya chen po rnams ni sngon gyi lo tsA ba chen po rnams kyis kyang mngon pa mdzod kyi 'grel pa rgyal sras ma dang /_ma hA mA ya'i bka' 'grel yon tan ldan pa la sogs pa bod rnams kyi tshul bzhin mi rtogs par dgongs nas ma bsgyur bar snang
[\[318a\]]
[\[318a.1\]]ba bzhin bzhag_/ming so so nas rgya gar skad dang bod skad shan sbyar bas/_skabs don 'ga' zhig gi bshad pa go ba la shin tu phan par snang ba ni rgya dpe la med na'ang /_'dus pa'i 'grel pa don gsal du ban+d+ha ban+d+ha ni chings shig pa'o zhes sogs
[\[318a.2\]]bsgyur snang ba ltar skad gnyis ka bkod de bshad/_dbri bsnan gyi dbang gis bar skabs su mtshams sbyor ba'i tshig phrad dang rnam dbye rnams bod skad la ji ltar bde bas bla thabs su bsnan/_sgra'i sgrub tshul nyung zhing gsal ba 'ga' zhig shong ston rdo rje rgyal mtshan la sogs pas
[\[318a.3\]]brda sprod pa'i tshul bod skad du bsgyur ba dang /_bshad pa'i srol btod pa la brten nas/_deng sang yang mkhas pa dag snang bas/_'ga' zhig la phan par bsams nas bsgyur te/_mdor na sgra sbyor bam po gnyis pa las/_dam pa'i chos bsgyur ba'i lugs ni don dang
[\[318a.4\]]mi 'gal la/_bod skad la yang gar bde bar gyis shig ces gsungs pa ltar bsgyur cing legs par gtan la phab pa'o/_/de ltar gnyis med gsung ba'i gsung rab kyi/_/tshig 'bru bzang po'i tshig gi rgyan 'gyur phyir/_/tha snyad gtsug lag 'grel 'di legs bsgyur
[\[318a.5\]]las/_/thob pa'i legs spyad ston zla ltar dkar zhing /_/rgyu skar lam ltar yangs pa gang thob des/_/ma lus 'gro ba'i snying gi mun bsal zhing /_/rnam dpyod blo gros snang ba cher rgyas nas/_/blo bzang so so yang dag rig thob shog_/ji ltar 'jig rten las dang nyon mongs
[\[318a.6\]]rgyur bcas byed rgyur ldan byung dang /_/las dang nyon mongs pa dag ldog rgyu de yang 'dren pas rab tu gsungs/_/gang na skye dang rga dang rgud pa'i sdug bsngal nges par mi gnas pa/_/thar pa mchog de smra ba'i khyu mchog de yis rang gis mkhyen te gsungs/_/gtsug lag gi tshigs su bcad
[\[318a.7\]]pa'o/_/'di'i 'gyur snga phyi'i yi ge pa ni/_skad gnyis smra ba'i bshes gnyen/_mtshan gyi thog ma yi ge mchog_/mtha' ni rin po che yis spras/_/a nu ba ma rat+na ste/_/dpe med rin po che yis so/_/zhes bya'o//_//_
[\[318b\]]
[\[318b.1\]{D4301}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_kA byA daR+sha/_bod skad du/_snyan ngag me long /_'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gdong bzhi gdong gi pad tshal gyi/_/ngang pa'i bu mo thams cad dkar/_/dbyangs can ma ni kho bo yi/_/yid la ring du gnas par mdzod/_/_
[\[318b.2\]]bstan bcos snga ma rnams bsdus shing /_/sbyor ba rnams kyang nyer mtshon te/_/ji ltar nus bzhin bdag gis ni/_/snyan ngag rnams kyi mtshan nyid bya/_/'di na kun du mchog rnams kyang /_/mchog gi rjes su bstan pa yi/_/tshig rnams nyid kyi drin gyis ni/_/'jig rten lugs la 'jug par byed/_/_
[\[318b.3\]]gal te sgra don snang ba ni/_/'khor ba'i bar du mi gsal na/_/'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag 'di/_/smag rum mun pa nyid du 'gyur/_/sngon gyi rgyal po grags pa'i gzugs/_/ngag gi rang bzhin me long thob/_/de dag nye bar mi gnas kyang /_/rang nyid nyams pa med la ltos/_/mkhas pas yang
[\[318b.4\]]dag rab sbyar ba'i/_/ngag ni ngag gi 'dod 'jor bshad/_/de nyid nyes par sbyar na slar/_/sbyor po ba lang nyid rjod byed/_/de phyir snyan ngag dag la skyon/_/chung bar gyur kyang ci zhig ltar/_/btang snyoms mi bya lus mdzes kyang /_/skyon gcig gis ni skal ngan 'gyur/_/skye bo bstan bcos mi shes pas/_/_
[\[318b.5\]]yon tan skyon dag ji ltar dbye/_/gzugs kyi dbye ba dmigs pa'i skabs/_/long bdag la yod dam ci/_/de phyir mkhas pas skye dgu rnams/_/bye brag rtogs la mngon dgongs nas/_/rnam bkra lam ldan tshig rnams kyi/_/bya ba'i cho ga nges par sbyar/_/de rnams kyis ni snyan ngag gi/_/lus dang
[\[318b.6\]]rgyan yang rab tu bstan/_/lus ni re zhig 'dod pa yi/_/don gyi rnam bcad tshig gi phreng /_/de yang tshigs bcad lhug pa dang /_/spel ma rnam gsum nyid du gnas/_/tshigs bcad rkang bzhi de yang ni/_/pr-it+ta dzA ti zhes rnam gnyis/_/de yi spros pa mtha' dag ni/_/sdeb sbyor gzhung du nges par bstan/_/_
[\[318b.7\]]rig de snyan ngag rgya mtsho ni/_/zab mo brgal 'dod rnams kyi gru/_/grol ba dang ni rigs dang mdzod/_/'dus pa zhes bya de 'dra yi/_/tshigs bcad rgya ches rgas bcings/_/cha shas rang bzhin phyir ma brjod/_/sargas bcings pa snyan ngag che/_/de yi mtshan nyid brjod par bya/_/shis brjod phyag bya
[\[319a\]]
[\[319a.1\]]dngos po ni/_/nges par bstan pa'ang de yi sgo/_/sngon byung gtam las gyur pa'am/_/cig shos legs pa la brten pa/_/sde bzhi 'bras bu'i dbang gyur dang /_/mkhas shing yid 'ong 'dren pa dang /_/grong khyer rgya mtsho ri dang dus/_/nyi zla 'char ba'i bsngags pa dang /_/skyed
[\[319a.2\]]tshal chu yi rol rtsed dang /_/chang 'thung dga' ba'i dga' ston dang /_/ma tshogs pa dang bag ma dang /_/gzhon nu skye dang 'phel ba dang /_/gros dang pho nya bgrod pa dang /_/g.yul dang 'dren pa dar bas kyang /_/brgyan par gyur cing mdor bsdus min/_/nyams dang 'gyur ba dag gis gtams/_/_
[\[319a.3\]]sarga shin tu rgya che min/_/mnyan 'os pr-it+ta legs mtshams sbyar/_/kun du sarga dag gi mtha'/_/tha dad ldan pas 'jig rten mdzes/_/snyan ngag dam pa'i rgyan ldan ni/_/bskal pa'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/gang zhig yan lag 'gas dman yang /_/gal te sbyar rnams phun tshogs
[\[319a.4\]]kyis/_/de rig mgu bar byed pas na/_/'di ni snyan ngag skyon ma yin/_/thog mar 'dren pa yon tan gyis/_/nye bar bkod nas de yis ni/_/dgra la gnod pa byed ces pa'i/_/lam 'di rang bzhin mdzes pa yin/_/rigs dang brtson 'grus thos sogs kyis/_/dgra bo la yang bsngags byas nas/_/_
[\[319a.5\]]de las rgyal phyir 'dren pa ni/_/khyad 'phags brjod pa'ang bdag dga' skyes/_/rkang pa med pa'i tshig rgyun ni/_/lhug pa brjod pa dag dang gtam/_/zhes pa de yi rab dbye gnyis/_/de la 'dren pa nyid kyis ni/_/brjod par bya ba brjod pa lo/_/gzhan ni 'dren pa'am gzhan gyis kyang /_/rang gi yon
[\[319a.6\]]tan bsgrags skyon 'dir/_/yang dag don bsngags phyir yod min/_/'on kyang nges pa ma mthong ste/_/der yang gzhan gyis brjod pa'i phyir/_/gzhan gyis brjod dam rang gis zhes/_/dbye ba'i rgyu ni ci zhig yod/_/gal te sgo dang gzhan sgo dang /_/yid brten ldan nyid brjod pa ni/_/tha dad pa yi rtags yin
[\[319a.7\]]na/_/zhar gyi gtam rnams dag la yang /_/'phags pa sogs bzhin sgo dang ni/_/gzhan gyi sgo dag cis mi 'jug_/lam+b+ha sogs sam a shrA sa'i/_/dbye ba mthong yang de las ci/_/de phyir gtam dang brjod pa zhes/_/ming gnyis dag gis rigs gcig mtshon/_/lhag ma brjod pa'i rigs rnams
[\[319b\]]
[\[319b.1\]]kyang /_/'di nyid nad du 'dus par 'gyur/_/bu mo 'phrog dang g.yul dang ni/_/bslu dang dar ba la sogs pa/_/sargas bcings pa mtshungs pa nyid/_/de dag khyad byed yon tan min/_/snyan ngag mkhan gyis bsam byas rtags/_/gzhan du yang ni skyon mi 'gyur/_/'dod don bsgrub la sgo ru ni/_/_
[\[319b.2\]]mkhas pa rnams la cis mi 'gyur/_/spel ma zlos gar la sogs te/_/de dag rnams ni gzhan na rgyas/_/lhug pa tshigs bcad rang bzhin gang /_/tsam bu zhes pa mngon par brjod/_/ngag gi rang bzhin de dag kyang /_/legs sbyar de bzhin rang bzhin dang /_/zur chag 'dren ma zhes pa ste/_/rnam
[\[319b.3\]]pa bzhi ru mkhas pas gsungs/_/legs sbyar zhes pa lha yi ni/_/skad du drang srong chen pos gsungs/_/de skyes de mtshungs yul can zhes/_/rang bzhin rim pa du ma yod/_/yul 'khor chen po la brten skad/_/legs bshad rin can dag gi mtsho/_/se rus bcings pa rang bzhin gang /_/rang bzhin
[\[319b.4\]]mchog tu gyur par rig_/sau ra se na gau Da dang /_/lA Di gzhan yang de 'dra'i skad/_/rang bzhin nyid ces bya ba yi/_/tha snyad rnams la nye bar 'gyur/_/ba lang rdzi la sogs pa'i tshig_/snyan ngag la zur chag ces gnas/_/bstan bcos rnams la legs sbyar las/_/gzhan pa zur chag nyid du
[\[319b.5\]]brjod/_/legs sbyar sargas bcings la sogs/_/rang bzhin skan+d+ha ka sogs dang /_/zur chag o sa ra sogs te/_/zlos gar la sogs 'dres pa'o/_/gtam sogs skad ni thams cad dang /_/legs sbyar gyis kyang bcings pa ste/_/rmad byung don can rgya che'i gtam/_/'byung po'i skad kyi rang bzhin
[\[319b.6\]]brjod/_/sgeg dang rol dang stabs la sogs/_/lta ba'i don yin cig shos kyang /_/mnyan par bya ba nyid ces pa/_/'di yang lugs gnyis dag tu brjod/_/phan tshun dbye ba phra mo can/_/tshig gi lam ni du ma yod/_/de la phai dar+b+ha dang ni/_/gau Da'i khyad par gsal bar brjod/_/sbyar ba rab dngas
[\[319b.7\]]mnyam nyid dang /_/snyan dang shin tu gzhon pa dang /_/don gsal ba dang rgya che dang /_/brjid dang mdzes dang ting nge 'dzin/_/yon tan 'di bcu bai dar+b+ha'i/_/lam gyi srog tu bshad pa yin/_/'di dag phal cher bzlog pas ni/_/gau Da'i lam dag mtshon pa yin/_/sbyar ba srog chung yi ge mchog_/lhod
[\[320a\]]
[\[320a.1\]]pa nyid kyis ma reg pa'o/_/lhod pa mA lA tI mA la/_/lo lA li ka li lA bzhin/_/gau Da pa yi rjes khrid blos/_/de 'dod mA la tI dA ma/_/laM g+hi taM b+h+ra ma raiHzhes/_/bai dar+b+ha yi sbyor lci byed/_/rab dang sa ldan pa grags don can/_/zla ba'i mtshan ma ut+pal gyi/_/'od kyis mdzes pa rgyas
[\[320a.2\]]zhes pa/_/rtogs pa'i skal bzang ldan pa'i tshig_/nges tshig yod phyir gau Da pa/_/shin tu grags pa min yang 'dod/_/shin tu dkar min chu las skyes/_/de 'dras mtshan pa 'od dkar can/_/mnyam pa sbyor ba mi mnyam dral/_/de ni 'jam rtsub par ma ste/_/sbyor ba 'jam rtsub par ma yi/_/yi
[\[320a.3\]]ge bkod pa'i skye gnas can/_/khu byug ca co sgrog byed cing /_/nyar ma rab 'thor dngas shing dngas/_/chu rgyun chu thigs kyis bran pa'i/_/ma la ya rlung bdag la 'ongs/_/tsan+dan gyis bsgos dri ldang zhing /_/'jam pa ma la ya yi rlung /_/bdag gi brtan 'gog dga' ma ni/_/mchog gi kha yi rlung dang
[\[320a.4\]]'gran/_/zhes pa mi mnyam ma brtags par/_/don dang rgyan gyi tshogs dag la/_/ltos nas shar phyogs pa dag la/_/snyan ngag lam 'di 'byung bar 'gyur/_/snyan pa nyams ldan tshig dang ni/_/dngos po la yang nyams gnas pa/_/sbrang rtsi spyod pa sbrang rtsis bzhin/_/gang gis blo ldan dga' byed
[\[320a.5\]]pa'o/_/sgra ni gang dang ci yis kyang /_/gang zhig mtshungs par nyams myang ba/_/de yi gzugs sogs tshig nye ba/_/rjes su khrid bcas nyams dang ldan/_/gang tshe bram ze dga' ba yi/_/rgyal po 'di yis dpal thob 'gyur/_/de nas bzung ste chos kyi ni/_/dga' ston 'jig rten 'di ru 'byung /_/zhes
[\[320a.6\]]'di gau Da pa mi 'dod/_/de dag rjes su khrid la dga'/_/phal cher rjes su khrid pas kyang /_/bai dar+g+ha ni 'di nyid 'dod/_/rkang ba rnams dang tshig rnams la/_/yi ge bskor ba rjes su khrid/_/gal te snga ma'i nyams myong ni/_/'du byed rtog byed mi ring nyid/_/ston mtshan dbu rgyan zla ba ni/_/kun+da'i
[\[320a.7\]]phon por 'khrul pa la/_/mtshan ma in+d+ra nI la mtshungs/_/bung ba'i dpal ni yang dag 'dzin/_/mdzes ma mkha' la zla ba yi/_/dkyil 'khor mdzes pas bdag gi yid/_/yid srubs kyis mnan brtse med du/_/'joms par brtson pa 'di la ltos/_/zhes pa shin tu mi ring bar/_/thos pa dag ni
[\[320b\]]
[\[320b.1\]]rjes khrid 'dod/_/dga' ma bzhin gyi chu skyes dang /_/mtshungs pa zla ba zhes mi 'dod/_/bdag gi lus dang khro ba phra/_/'dod pa rtsub cing mdza' bo ngan/_/khengs pa nyams shing chags pa rgyas/_/rmongs pa skyes te srog rnams song /_/zhes sogs sbyor ba rtsub pa dang /_/lhod pa yang ni ster bar
[\[320b.2\]]byed/_/de phyir de lta'i rjes khrid ni/_/lho phyogs pa rnams mi sbyor ro/_/skor ba kho na tshogs pa yi/_/spyod yul zung dang ldan par rig_/de yang gcig tu snyan pa min/_/de phyir phyi nas bshad par bya/_/nges par rgyan rnams kun la yang /_/don gyi nyams dag sbyin par byed/_/de lta na yang grong pa nyid/_/_
[\[320b.3\]]min pa'i khur 'di phal cher 'dzin/_/'dod ldan bdag la gzhon nu ma/_/khyod ni ji ltar 'dod mi byed/_/ces 'di grong pa'i don bdag nyid/_/nyams dang bral ba kho nar byed/_/g.yon mig 'dod pa gtum po 'di/_/nges par bdag la brtse ba med/_/khyod la khro med dga' zhes pa/_/grong pa'i don min ro
[\[320b.4\]]dang ldan/_/sgra la'ang grong pa nyid yod de/_/de ni legs pa'i cig shos grags/_/dga' ba'i dga' ston brjod pa la/_/ji ltar ya yig la sogs bzhin/_/tshig gi mtshams sbyor gyis zhugs dang /_/slar yang dag don dag gis kyang /_/nges par rtogs byed grod pa ste/_/yA b+haHba taHpri ya bzhin/_/_
[\[320b.5\]]gzhan la bsnun nas skyes bu ni/_/bir+Ya ldan pa'i bi shran+ta/_/gzhan la bsnun nas skyes bu ni/_/khu ba ldan pa rnam par ngal/_/de lta bu sogs lam dag ni/_/gnyis ka la yang bsngags ma yin/_/b+ha ga ba tI b+ha gi nI/_/zhes sogs kun du khas len nyid/_/de ltar snyan pa rnam par phye/_/shin tu
[\[320b.6\]]gzhon pa bshad par bya/_/rtsub min yi ge mang ba 'di/_/shin tu gzhon pa nyid du 'dod/_/gang phyir thams cad mnyen pa ni/_/sbyor ba lhod pa'i skyon du bshad/_/sprin gyi phreng ba ldan dus su/_/snyan par sgrogs pa'i mgrin ldan pa/_/rma bya yi ni mjug ma dag_/zlum por byas nas gar byed do/_/zhes
[\[320b.7\]]pa don rgyas nyid ma yin/_/rgyan yang de 'dra yod min te/_/shin tu gzhon pa nyid kyi dpe/_/dam pa rnams kyi kha na gnas/_/gsal phyir gzhan dag phal cher ni/_/brjod par dka' ba dag kyang sbyor/_/n+yak+Sha sa rgyal rigs rnams kyi phyogs/_/skad cig gis ni nyams par byas/_/don gsal don
[\[321a\]]
[\[321a.1\]]brtag mi dgos nyid/_/'phrog byed kyis ni sa gzhi dag_/rmig pas bcad pa'i klu khrag gis/_/dmar ba chu yi gter las phyung /_/phag pa chen po dag gis sa/_/chu gter dmar po dag las phyung /_/zhes pa 'di nyid bstan pa ni/_/brang 'gro'i khrag ni brtag
[\[321a.2\]]dgos nyid/_/lam 'di gnyis ka dag la yang /_/rtogs pa'i skal bzang mi ldan zhing /_/sgra dang rigs pa las 'gongs pa/_/'di 'dra phal cher bzhed ma yin/_/gang du 'ga' zhig brjod pa la/_/khyad 'phags ldan pa'i yon tan rtogs/_/de ni rgya cher brjod de des/_/snyan ngag lam
[\[321a.3\]]kun mgon dang bcas/_/slong ba rnams kyi bkren pa'i mig_/lan cig khyod gdong la lhung ba/_/lha gcig gnas skabs de yis slar/_/gzhan gyi gdong la blta ma yin/_/zhes pa nyid kyi ngag 'di la/_/gtong ba khyad 'phags legs par mtshan/_/lam 'di nyid kyis gzhan dag kyang /_/rigs
[\[321a.4\]]pa mtshungs pas dpag par bya/_/bsngags par 'os pa'i khyad par dang /_/ldan pa rgya cher 'ga' zhig 'dod/_/rol pa'i chu skyes rtse dga'i mtsho/_/gser gyi rgyan la sogs pa bzhin/_/brjid pa tshig sdud mang po nyid/_/'di ni lhug pa dag gi gsos/_/tshigs bcad la yang shar phyogs pa/_/'di nyid
[\[321a.5\]]dpung dang gnyen du bzhed/_/de la lci dang yang ba rnams/_/mang dang nyung ba nyid spel bas/_/mtho dma' yi ni rnam pa de/_/brjod pa la sogs rnams la blta/_/nub kyi rim gor lhung ba yi/_/mtha' dag nyi 'od ma la stan can/_/mkhregs pa'i nu ma la gnas pa'i/_/gos dmar g.yo bzhin chu
[\[321a.6\]]ldan ma/_/zhes pa brjid dang ldan pa'i tshig_/tshigs bcad la yang shar pa sbyor/_/gzhan dag 'khrugs min mdzes pa yi/_/tshig rnams brjid par 'dod de dper/_/chu 'dzin ngos kyi phang na chags/_/mtshams kyi nyi 'od gos dang ldan/_/chu ldan ma yis su yi yid/_/'dod pas gzir bar byed
[\[321a.7\]]mi 'gyur/_/mdzes pa 'jig rten don dag las/_/ma 'das 'gro kun la mdzes pa'o/_/de yang gtam gyi ma don brjod dang /_/bsngags pa la sogs rnams la'ang sbyar/_/dka' thub phung po khyod 'dra yi/_/zhabs kyi rdul ni gtsang ma rnams/_/yang dag btab pa gang yin pa/_/de dag kho na nges par khyim/_/_
[\[321b\]]
[\[321b.1\]]skyon med lus can khyod kyi ni/_/lag pa'i 'khri shing bar dag tu/_/nu ma rab rgyas 'di dag gi_/go skabs rnyed par 'gyur ma yin/_/zhes pa khyad par brjod pa yi/_/legs sbyar de dag srid pa nyid/_/'jig rten lugs kyi rjes su ni/_/'brang ba thams cad mdzes par 'gyur/_/'jig rten 'das shing
[\[321b.2\]]brjod 'dod kyis/_/don gang shin tu bkod gyur pa/_/de yis mkhas pa shin tu ni/_/tshim 'gyur cig shos ma yin dper/_/deng nas bzung ste bdag gi khyim/_/lha yi khyim bzhin bsten par 'os/_/khyod kyi zhabs rdul lhung ba yis/_/nyes pa dag ni ma lus bkrus/_/khyod kyi nu ma 'di lta bur/_/rnam par
[\[321b.3\]]rgyas par gyur pa 'di/_/nges par ma brtags byed po yi/_/nam mkha' dag ni chung ngur sprul/_/'di ni ha cang brjod pas na/_/go Da pa mul mdzes par brjod/_/'jug pa snga ma gzhan gyi ni/_/lam la snying po nyid du bshad/_/gzhan gyi chos de gzhan dag la/_/'jig rten lugs kyi rjes 'brangs nas/_/gang du
[\[321b.4\]]yang dag 'dzin byed pa/_/ting nge 'dzin du brjod de mud per/_/ku mu da ni mig 'dzums shing /_/pad+ma dag kyang mig 'byed ces/_/mig gi bya ba bkod pa las/_/de yi rjod byed sgra dag thob/_/niSh+Thu ta dang ung+gIr+Na/_/skyugs sogs phal par 'jug bstan pa/_/shin tu mdzes te gzhan du ni/_/grong ba nyid kyi nus pa
[\[321b.5\]]bstan/_/pad+mas nyi zer skyugs pa rnams/_/'thungs nas rdul dmar skyugs pa yi/_/kha yi dag byed zer ma rnams/_/shin tu skyug par byed pa bzhin/_/zhes pa mdzes te mi mdzes pa/_/chung ma skyug pa byed ces pa'o/_/cig car nyid du chos du ma/_/bkod pa dag kyang 'dod de dper/_/lci ba'i mngal khur gyis
[\[321b.6\]]ngal zhing /_/'khun par byed pa sprin gyi phreng /_/'di dag g.yo med steng gi ni/_/phang pa dag tu yang dag nyal/_/grogs mo'i phang par nyal ba dang /_/'khun dang lci ba nyid dang dal/_/zhes pa 'di ni mngal ldan ma'i/_/chos mang po rnams gzhan la bstan/_/ting 'dzin zhes bya'i yon tan gang /_/'di ni snyan
[\[321b.7\]]ngag bdog kun te/_/snyan ngag mkhan po don mthun gyi/_/tshogs kyang 'di nyid rjes su 'brang /_/de ltar rang bzhin brtags pa las/_/lam ni 'di gnyis rnam par phye/_/de dag dbye ba snyan ngag mkhan/_/so so la gnas brjod mi nus/_/bur shing 'o ma bur sogs kyi/_/mngar ba nyid kyis khyad par che/_/de
[\[322a\]]
[\[322a.1\]]lta mod kyi de brjod par/_/dbyangs can mas kyang nus ma yin/_/rang bzhin gyis grub spobs pa dang /_/mang du thos pa dri med dang /_/mngon par sbyor ba mi dman pa/_/snyan ngag phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyu/_/gal te sngon gyi bag chags yon tan gyi/_/rjes 'brel spobs pa rmad
[\[322a.2\]]byung med pa la'ang /_/thos dang 'bad pa dag gis ngag bsten na/_/ci zhig ltar yang nges par rjes 'dzin byed/_/de phyir grags 'dod rnams kyis rtag tu ni/_/snyom las med par rim pas dbyangs can bsten/_/snyan ngag chung ngu la yang ngal byas mi/_/mkhas pa'i 'dun sa dag tu 'dug la dbang /_/snyan ngag
[\[322a.3\]]me long las le'u ste dang po'o//_//snyan ngag mdzes par byed pa yi/_/chos rnams rgyan zhes rab tu brjod/_/de ni da lta'ang rnam rtog ste/_/de dag ma lus sus 'chad nus/_/'on kyang rnam rtog sa bon ni/_/sngon gyi slob dpon rnams kyis bstan/_/de nyid rab tu legs sbyar
[\[322a.4\]]phyir/_/yongs su ngal 'di bdag gi'o/_/lam ni rnam par dbye don du/_/rgyan 'ga' zhig ni sngar yang bstan/_/thun mong dag tu rgyan gyi ni/_/rigs gzhan rab tu bstan par bya/_/rang bzhin brjod dang dpe dang ni/_/gzugs can gsal byed bskor ba dang /_/'gog dang don gzhan bkod pa
[\[322a.5\]]dang /_/ldog pa can dang srid pa can/_/bsdus dang phul byung rab brtags dang /_/rgyu dang phra mo cha dang rim/_/dga' dang nyams ldan gzi brjid can/_/rnam grangs brjod dang kun du phan/_/rgya che ba snyon dor sbyar ba dang /_/khyad par mtshungs par sbyor ba dang /_/'gal dang skabs min bstod pa dang /_/zol
[\[322a.6\]]stod nges par bstan pa dang /_/lhan cig brjod dang yongs ba rjes shis/_/rab spel de nas dgongs ba can/_/'di dag tshig rnams dag gis ni/_/rgyan du sngon gyi mkhas pas bstan/_/dngos po rnams kyi rang bzhin dang /_/gnas skabs sna tshogs dngos gsal byed/_/de ni rang bzhin brjod pa ste/_/_
[\[322a.7\]]dang po'i rgyan yin rigs sogs dper/_/mchu ni dmar zhing gug pa dang /_/gshog pa ljang zhing mnyen pa dang /_/mgrin pa kha dog sum phreng can/_/ne+e tso 'di dag tshig 'jam ldan/_/mgrin pa'i nang nas snyan sgrags shing /_/mig ni kun du 'phrul pa yi/_/phug ron rtse 'dod dga' ma la/_/_
[\[322b\]]
[\[322b.1\]]yongs su bskor nas mchu dag sbyor/_/dga' ma yi ni reg pa 'dis/_/lus la spu lang rgyas pa dang /_/yid ni bde bar byed pa dang /_/mig dag zum par byed cing 'jug_/mgrin sngon lag na thod pa ni/_/gnas pa zla ba'i cod pan dang /_/snum zhing dmar ba'i ral pa can/_/khyu mchog rgyal mtshan
[\[322b.2\]]'khrungs par gyur/_/rigs dang bya ba yon tan rdzas/_/rang bzhin brjod pa 'di 'dra ni/_/bstan bcos kun la rgyal srid nyid/_/snyan ngag la yang 'di dag 'dod/_/ji lta ci zhig ltar mtshungs par/_/gsal bar gang du rtogs byed pa/_/de ni dpe zhes bya ste de'i/_/spros pa 'di ni rab bshad
[\[322b.3\]]bya/_/mdzes ma khyod kyi lag mthil ni/_/chu skyes bzhin du kun du dmar/_/zhes pa chos dpe dngos su ni/_/mtshungs pa'i chos dag bstan phyir ro/_/khyod kyi gdong ni pad+ma bzhin/_/mig dag ut+pal sngon po bzhin/_/zhes pa chos cig rtogs byed pa/_/de ni dngos po'i dpe nyid do/_/khyod kyi
[\[322b.4\]]gdong bzhin pad+ma ni/_/rnam par rgyas par gyur zhes pa/_/de ni grags pa bzlog pa'i phyir/_/bzlog pa'i dpe zhes bya bar 'dod/_/khyod kyi zhal bzhin chu skyes te/_/chu skyes bzhin du khyod kyi zhal/_/zhes pa phan tshun khyad 'phags ni/_/rjod par byed 'di phan tshun dpe/_/khyod zhal pad+ma nyid dang
[\[322b.5\]]mtshungs/_/gzhan ni 'ga' zhig dang yang min/_/zhes pa mtshungs pa gzhan bzlog phyir/_/'di ni nges par nyid kyi dpe/_/re zhig khyod gdong pad+ma yi/_/rjes 'gro gzhan yang de 'dra ba/_/gal te yod na de byed 'gyur/_/zhes pa 'di ni nges med dpe/_/khyod gdong mdzes pa kho na yis/_/zla
[\[322b.6\]]ba'i rjes su 'gro min te/_/dga' bskyed las kyis kyang zhes pa/_/'di 'dra bsdus pa'i dpe yang yod/_/khyod kyi zhal ni khyod nyid la/_/mthong zhing zla ba mkha' la mthong /_/'di nyid kho na tha dad de/_/gzhan med ces ni phul byung dpe/_/de yi bzhin dpal nga nyid la/_/yod ces zla ba
[\[322b.7\]]snyems mi dgos/_/pad+ma la yang de yod phyir/_/zhes pa 'di ni rab brtag dpe/_/smin legs gal te pad+ma 'ga'/_/rnam par 'phrul pa'i mig ldan na/_/khyod kyi bzhin gyi dpal 'dzin te/_/zhes pa 'di ni rmad byung dpe/_/lus phra khyod gdong ri bong can/_/zhes btags khyod gdong bsam pa
[\[323a\]]
[\[323a.1\]]yi/_/zla ba 'di yang rjes su bsnyags/_/zhes 'di rmongs pa'i dpe ru bshad/_/pad nang bung ba 'khor ram ci/_/khyod gdong la mig g.yo 'am ci/_/bdag gi sems ni rnam par g.yo/_/zhes pa 'di ni the tshom dpe/_/zla ba skyengs byed mdzes pa 'di/_/zla bas tshar gcod pad+ma min/_/_
[\[323a.2\]]de phyir khyod kyi gdong nyid do/_/zhes 'di gtan la phebs pa'i dpe/_/bsil zer can gyi 'gran zla dang /_/dpal dang ldan dang dri bzangs kyi/_/khyod kyi gdong ni chu skyes bzhin/_/zhes pa sbyar ba'i dpe ru bshad/_/mtshungs pa'i sgra yis brjod bya'i phyir/_/mnyam nyid dpe ste ji ltar na/_/skyed tshal phreng 'di bu mo
[\[323a.3\]]bzhin/_/mdzes ldan sA la kA na na/_/pad+ma rdul mang zla ba 'dzad/_/de dag las ni khyod kyi bzhin/_/mtshungs pa la yang khyad par bcas/_/zhes pa smad pa'i dpe ru 'dod/_/pad+mas tshangs pa mchog tu bskyed/_/zla ba bde 'byung gtsug gis 'dzin/_/de dag khyod gdong mtshungs zhes pa/_/de ni bsngags
[\[323a.4\]]pa'i dper brjod do/_/yon tan ldan yang skyon 'gyur yang /_/zla ba khyod gdong mtshungs zhes pa/_/brjod 'dod bdag gi yid la yod/_/ces pa brjod 'dod dpe zhes rig_/'dab brgya pa dang ston zla dang /_/khyod kyi gdong dang gsum po ni/_/phan tshun rnam par 'gal zhes pa/_/de ni 'gal ba'i
[\[323a.5\]]dpe brjod do/_/dri ma ldan zhing blun gyur pas/_/zla ba la ni khyod gdong dang /_/'gran pa'i nus pa nam yang med/_/ces pa dgag pa'i dpe nyid do/_/khyod gdong ri dgas mig gis mtshan/_/zla ba ri dgas nyid kyis mtshan/_/de lta na yang 'di mtshungs nyid/_/khyad 'phags min zhes ngo
[\[323a.6\]]bstod dpe/_/'di ni bzhin nyid pad+ma min/_/'di dag bung ba ma yin mig_/ces pa rnam gsal mtshungs pa las/_/de ni de nyid brjod pa'i dpe/_/zla ba pad+ma dag gi ni/_/mdzes pa las 'das khyod kyi gdong /_/bdag rang nyid dang mtshungs par gyur/_/zhes pa thun mong min pa'i dpe/_/pad+ma mdzes
[\[323a.7\]]pa'i snying po kun/_/'ga' zhig dag tu bsdus pa bzhin/_/khyod zhal rnam par mdzes zhes pa/_/de ni 'byung min dpe zhes rig_/zla ba'i gzugs las dug bzhin dang /_/tsan+dan las ni me bzhin du/_/zhal 'di las ni rtsub mo'i tshig_/ces pa srid pa min pa'i dpe/_/tsan+dan chu dang zla ba'i zer/_/_
[\[323b\]]
[\[323b.1\]]zla shel sogs bzhin khyod kyi ni/_/reg pa bsil zhes khyad par dag_/gsal bar byed pa mang ba'i dpe/_/lus phra khyod kyi bzhin ras ni/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor las bton bzhin/_/pad+ma'i nang nas phyung ba bzhin/_/zhes pa 'di ni rnam 'gyur dpe/_/'od kyis nyi bzhin nyi ma yis/_/nyin bzhin
[\[323b.2\]]nyin gyis mkha' la bzhin/_/rnam par gnon pas khyod la dpal/_/'dzin zhes de ni phreng ba'i dpe/_/gang yang dag don nyid kyis ni/_/gal te ngag don nyer 'jal na/_/ngag don dpe de bzhin sgra ni/_/gcig dang du mas de rnam gnyis/_/khyod gdong mig ni mi brtan zhing /_/so yi 'od zer rab
[\[323b.3\]]gsal ba/_/'dam skyes bung ba g.yo ldan ni/_/ge sar dag gis mtshon bzhin mdzes/_/pad+ma can bzhin lus phra ma/_/pad+ma bzhin du de yi gdong /_/sbrang rtsi spyod pas bzhin du ni/_/bdag gis 'thungs shing 'thungs shing rtses/_/dngos po 'ga' zhig nyer bkod nas/_/de yi chos mthun rab bkod
[\[323b.4\]]pa/_/mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa can/_/zla bo dngos po'i dpe yin dper/_/rgyal po rnams ni skyes gyur kyang /_/da lta khyod 'dra gcig kyang med/_/yongs 'du dag la rkang 'thung ni/_/gnyis pa nges par yod ma yin/_/lhag pas dman pa bya ba yi/_/cho ga gcig la rab bsdus nas/_/gang smras de
[\[323b.5\]]ni mtshungs pa dag_/sbyor ba'i dpe ru bshad de dper/_/bu lo ma dgra mtho ris dang /_/khyod kyis sa bsrung mel tshe byed/_/de yis dregs ldan lha min dang /_/khyod kyis mi yi bdag po 'joms/_/rgyal po mdzes pas zla ba dang /_/gzi byin gyis ni nyi ma dang /_/brtan pas rgya mtsho'i rjes su byed/_/_
[\[323b.6\]]ces pa 'di ni rgyud per dran/_/blo ldan mi dgyes med gang la/_/nges par dpe yi skyon dag ni/_/tha dang rtags dang tshig la med/_/dman dang lhag pa nyid la'ang med/_/ma ning 'di 'gro bud med bzhin/_/bud med 'di smra skyes pa bzhin/_/bdag gi grogs 'di srog rnams bzhin/_/rig pa rnams
[\[323b.7\]]bsgrub nor bzhin no/_/sa gzhi skyong ba khyod bzhin du/_/lha yi rgyal po rnam par mdzes/_/tsha zer can gyi nus pa la/_/mi bdag_/gzi yis 'gong bar nus/_/zhes pa de lta bu la sogs/_/skal bzang nam yang gtang min nyid/_/sbyor ba 'ga' la ngag rig rnams/_/mi dgyes pa yod ji ltar na/_/_
[\[324a\]]
[\[324a.1\]]ngang mo bzhin du zla ba dkar/_/mtsho rnams bzhin du mkha' dri med/_/khyi bzhin dpa' bo rje la gus/_/nyi ma bzhin du me khyer gsal/_/'di 'dra spangs te mkhas rnams kyis/_/rgyu yang 'dir ni bsam par byos/_/bzhin ltar lta bu ji ltar sgra/_/mthun mtshungs yang dag mtshungs
[\[324a.2\]]dang mnyam/_/yang dag gsal dang nges par gsal/_/rab gsal gzugs kyi zla bo dang /_/gnyen po dang ni dgra zla dang /_/so sor rtog dang 'gal dang 'dra/_/blta bcas dang ni bslu ba dang /_/rigs mthun rjes su smra ba dang /_/gzugs brnyan dang ni so sor sdeb/_/gzugs mtshungs mnyam dang yang dag gzhal/_/mtshan nyid
[\[324a.3\]]mthun 'dra mtshungs pa dang /_/mthun phyogs dper byas dpe dang rtog_/dman dang cung zad dman sogs dang /_/rab tu smra dang so sor bzlag_/rags mthun mnyam byas sgra dag dang /_/gang yang dman min don can tshig_/ri bong mtshan ma'i gdong can sogs/_/'bru mang po yi tshig sdud dang /_/'gran
[\[324a.4\]]dang rgyal dang sdang ba dang /_/'khu dang mi mthun sgrogs pa dang /_/'thab pa dang ni 'phya ba dang /_/sma 'bebs byed dang smod pa dang /_/co 'dri ba dang 'gog pa dang /_/rgod dang phrag dog mi bzod dang /_/de yi skal bzang 'phrog byed dang /_/de yi mdzes pa zum byed dang /_/de dag 'gran las tshar gcod dang /_/_
[\[324a.5\]]de dag mtshungs las lhag par mdzes/_/de yi rjes su rkang 'jog dang /_/de yi nus pa la 'jug dang /_/de yi rjes 'gro rjes su 'ching /_/de yi ngang tshul de 'gog dang /_/de yi rjes su byed ces pa'i/_/sgra rnams mtshungs pa gsal byed yin/_/tha dad snang min gyur pa yi/_/dpe nyid dag ni gzugs can
[\[324a.6\]]'dod/_/dpung pa 'khri shing lag pa ni/_/pad+ma sor mo yal 'dab bo/_/lag pa'i 'khri shing sor mo rnams/_/yal 'dab sen mo'i 'od zer ni/_/me tog tu gyur dpyid kyi dpal/_/khyod ni nged la mngon sum rgyu/_/zhes pa 'di ni ma bsdus te/_/snga ma bsdus pa'i gzugs can no/_/bzhin zla 'dzum pa'i
[\[324a.7\]]zla 'od ces/_/gzugs can bsdus dang ma bsdus pa'o/_/sor mo dmar ba'i 'dab phreng dang /_/sen mo'i 'od kyi ge sar can/_/khyod kyi zhabs kyi chu skyes ni/_/sa skyod rnams kyi spyi bor 'dzin/_/sor mo la sogs 'dab sogs dang /_/rkang pa pad+ma nyid byas nas/_/de 'os gnas su rnam bkod pa/_/'di
[\[324b\]]
[\[324b.1\]]ni mtha' dag gzugs can no/_/gtum mo glo bur nyid du ni/_/khyod gdong mchu yi yal 'dab g.yo/_/rdul gyi chu yi thig pa yi/_/dog pa mu tig 'od can 'dzin/_/'di ni rdul chu dog par byas/_/mchu yang yal 'dab nyid byas kyi/_/gdong ni rnam pa gzhan ma byas/_/de phyir cha shas gzugs can no/_/gdong
[\[324b.2\]]pa'i 'dam skyes smin 'khyog cing /_/rdul gyi chu ni zags pa dang /_/mig dag kun du dmar ba 'di/_/myos pa'i gnas skabs gsal bar byed/_/'dir ni gdong ba'i cha shas dag_/rnam 'gyur ma byas gdong pa nyid/_/pad+mar bkod byas des na 'di/_/cha shas can gyi gzugs can no/_/mdzes ma myos pa'i
[\[324b.3\]]mkhur tshos dmar/_/mig gi ut+pal dmar po can/_/khyod kyi gdong gis skye bo ni/_/'dir yang dmar ba'i rang bzhin byas/_/'di ni yan lag gcig gzugs can/_/de ltar 'dir ni gnyis sogs kyi/_/yan lag rnams kyang rtogs par bya/_/ldan dang mi ldan tha dad byed/_/gdong 'di
[\[324b.4\]]'dzum pa'i me tog 'bar/_/g.yo ba'i mig gi bung ba can/_/zhes pa me tog bung ba dag_/'grogs pas ldan pa'i gzugs can no/_/gdong 'di 'dzum gsher zla 'od dang /_/snum pa'i mig gi ut+pal can/_/zla 'od ut+pal mi ldan pas/_/ldan min zhes pa'i gzugs can no/_/yan lag can dang
[\[324b.5\]]yan lag rnams/_/gzugs byas gzugs su ma byas la/_/brtan pas mi mnyam pa zhes pa'i/_/gzugs can mdzes pa yin te dper/_/myos pa'i mkhur tshos rab dmar zhing /_/smin ma'i 'khri shing gar byed pa/_/khyod gdong zla ba yid srubs kyis/_/'jig rten gsum po gzhom par nus/_/_
[\[324b.6\]]'phrog byed rkang pa dzah+nu yi/_/bu mo'i chu gos rtse la btags/_/lha min dogs med lha dga' ba'i/_/dga' ston rgyal mtshan rgyal gyur cig_/gang zhig tog gi khyad par gyis/_/tshogs kyi gzugs ni 'di 'dra ba/_/de ni rkang pa la bkod 'di/_/khyad par dang bcas gzugs can no/_/pad+ma
[\[324b.7\]]rnams ni mi 'dzum zhing /_/nam mkha' la yang mi 'gro ba/_/khyod gdong zla bas bdag gi ni/_/srog rnams 'phrog pa nyid du blta/_/zla ba'i bya ba bya min dang /_/gzhan gyi bya ba'i bya ba 'dir/_/yang dag bstan te de yi phyir/_/'gal ba zhes bya'i gzugs can no/_/khyod ni zab pas rgya mtsho ste/_/_
[\[325a\]]
[\[325a.1\]]brling ba nyid kyis ri bo yin/_/'jig rten rnams la 'dod pa ni/_/ster phyir dpag bsam rkang 'thung ngo /_/'di ni zab pa la sogs pa'i/_/rgyu rnams dag gis rgya mtsho ri/_/dpag bsam shing yang byed pas na/_/'di ni rgyu yi gzugs can no/_/grogs mo khyod kyi gdong pad ni/_/rA
[\[325a.2\]]dza haM sas nyer spyad 'os/_/dri zhim bung bas don gnyer 'os/_/zhes pa sbyar ba'i gzugs can no/_/gtso bo dang ni phal ba la/_/chos mthun chos mi mthun mthong bas/_/dpe dang ldog pa can zhes pa'i/_/gzugs can rnam pa gnyis 'dod dper/_/myos pas kun du dmar ba yis/_/bkab pa bzhin
[\[325a.3\]]gyi zla ba 'di/_/'char ka'i dmar ba phun tshogs pa'i/_/zla ba la ni rab tu 'gran/_/lha rnams kyis ni zla ba dang /_/bdag gis khyod gdong zla ba 'thung /_/'di ni gang ba ma yin yang /_/'di ni rtag tu dkyil 'khor rdzogs/_/mdzes ma khyod gdong zla bas ni/_/'di ltar gzhan dag gdung byed pas/_/zla ba
[\[325a.4\]]nyid du brjod min zhes/_/'di ni 'gog pa'i gzugs can no/_/gtum mo khyod gdong zla bas kyang /_/brtse ba med par bdag sreg pa/_/bdag gi skal ba nyid kyi skyon/_/zhes 'di mnyam 'jog gzugs can no/_/khyod gdong 'dam skyes dor 'dir/_/smin ma'i 'khri shing gar mkhan ma/_/rol sgeg
[\[325a.5\]]dga' bas gar byed do/_/zhes pa gzugs can gyi gzugs can/_/'di ni gdong min 'di pad+ma/_/'di dag mig min 'di bung ba/_/'di khyod so yi 'od zer min/_/'di rnams ge sar nyid yin no/_/gdong la sogs pa nyid bzlog ste/_/pad+ma la sogs gzugs byas pas/_/yon tan khyad
[\[325a.6\]]'phags gsal byed pa/_/de nyid bsnyon dor gzugs can no/_/gzugs can dpe yi rnam rtog rnams/_/mtha' yod ma yin de yi phyir/_/phyogs tsam bstan la blo ldan rnams/_/ma brjod rjes su dpag par bya/_/rigs dang bya ba yon tan rdzas/_/tshig gcig la ni gnas pa yis/_/gal te
[\[325a.7\]]ngag kun la phan na/_/de ni gsal byed du brjod dper/_/lho yi rlung gis 'khri shing ni/_/'dab ma rnying ba lhung bar byed/_/dud pa'i lus can rnams kyi yang /_/khengs pa gsar du 'joms par nus/_/rgyu'o chu gter bzhi dogs kyi/_/skyed mos tshal du so can te/_/khor yug ri bo'i khongs su yang /_/_
[\[325b\]]
[\[325b.1\]]khyod kyi yon tan kun+da dkar/_/sngo bsangs nyid do phyogs rnams ni/_/dbyar skyes sprin gyi phreng ba yis/_/sa yang rtswa sngon gsar pa ni/_/shin tu gzhon pa'i phreng bas so/_/khyab 'jug rnam gnon la gnas pas/_/dA nu'i bu yi 'byor ba dag_/gang du btang zhing lha rnams kyi/_/phun tshogs
[\[325b.2\]]gang na gnas pa blangs/_/zhes pa dang po'i gsal byed bstan/_/de bzhin bar dang mtha' yi yang /_/tshig dag bdag gis bstan par bya/_/de dag 'ga' zhig 'di lta ste/_/gar byed ni tsu la phang du/_/glu yang lan no mjug sgro can/_/dga' bas rgyas pa'i mig dag kyang /_/chu 'dzin la ni
[\[325b.3\]]gtod par byed/_/dri bzhon dal bu 'gyur byed de/_/zla ba dag kyang me ru 'gyur/_/tsan+dan byug pa lhung ba yang /_/mtshon lhung 'khyams pa rnams la'o/_/chu 'dzin gyis ni rab gtor chu/_/khyim gyi gtsug phud ldan pa'i tshogs/_/glog gi thag pa g.yo ba yang /_/me tog gzhu can dag gis
[\[325b.4\]]dpung /_/khyod kyi ut+pal rna ba la/_/'dod pa'i mda' ni mda' stan la/_/ngas kyang sems ni 'chi ba la/_/gsum po 'di ni mnyam du byas/_/dkar phyogs kyis ni 'od dkar can/_/'phel byed de yis mda' lnga pa/_/des kyang chags pa chags pas kyang /_/na chung dga' ba'i dga' ston dpal/_/_
[\[325b.5\]]zhes sogs gsal byed yin mod kyang /_/snga ma snga ma la ltos pa'i/_/ngag gi phreng ba rab ldan phyir/_/de ni phreng ba'i gsal byed 'dod/_/rlung gis gtsubs pa'i chu thigs can/_/sprin gyi lus med dag gis ni/_/a ba le ba 'phel bar byed/_/rdul gyi dag ni sel bar byed/_/'dir ni sprin gyi tshig dag
[\[325b.6\]]dang /_/a ba le ba'i tshig dag gis/_/bya ba 'gal ba ldan pa de/_/'gal ba'i don gyi gsal byed do/_/chu 'dzin dag gi phreng ba 'dis/_/phyogs rnams kyi ni go skabs phrog_/skar ma yi ni tshogs rnams bzung /_/deng yang bdag gi srog rnams len/_/gang phyir chu 'dzin phreng ba yi/_/bya ba
[\[325b.7\]]gcig nyid gsal byed 'dir/_/du ma'i sgra yis nyer blangs pa/_/de phyir don gcig gsal byed do/_/dri yi bzhon pa yid 'ong mtho/_/sngo bsangs ta ma la yi 'od/_/sprin ni mkha' la rgyu byed de/_/glang chen 'di dgas la'o/_/'dir ni chos rnams tha dad min/_/sprin dang glang po rnams dag kyang /_/_
[\[326a\]]
[\[326a.1\]]rgyu ba nyid kyis 'brel ba'i phyir/_/sbyar ba'i don gyi gsal byed do/_/rnam pa 'di nyid kho na yis/_/gsal byed la ni rnam rtog pa/_/lhag ma rnams kyang rjes mthun par/_/mkhas pa rnams kyis rtogs par bya/_/gsal byed kyi ni gnas nyid du/_/don skor dang ni tshig skor dang /_/_
[\[326a.2\]]gnyis ka bskor ba zhes pa yi/_/rgyan gsum po dag 'dod de dper/_/ka dam+ba ni rnam par rgyas/_/kuT dzod+ka ma rab gsal/_/kan+da l+ya ni rab tu bye/_/ka ku b+ha yang gyes par gyur/_/sprin gyi phreng ba dag gis ni/_/rma bya'i tshogs rnams 'dod ldan byed/_/chu srin rgyal mtshan can gyis ding /_/na chung
[\[326a.3\]]rnams yid 'dod ldan byed/_/kun las rgyal nas de ring khyod/_/btsun mo rnams dang rtse bar byed/_/khyod kyi dgra sde mtho ris song /_/lha mo rnams dang rtse bar byed/_/dgag pa brjod pa 'gog pa ste/_/dus gsum la ltos rnam pa gsum/_/de nas de yang dgag bya yi/_/dbye ba mtha' yas phyir
[\[326a.4\]]mtha' yas/_/lus med kyi ni me tog gi/_/mda' ldas kun las rgyal bar gyur/_/zhes pa mi srid yang na ni/_/dngos po'i nus pa rnam par bkra/_/zhes pa 'di ni rgyu stobs kyis/_/lus med rgyal bar mi rigs blo/_/de ltar gyur bkag de yi phyir/_/'di 'dra de ni byung ba 'gog_/snyan sgrogs ma dag
[\[326a.5\]]ci yi phyir/_/rna ba la ni up+tal 'dzud/_/las 'di la ni mig zur dag_/yongs rdzogs min par sems sam ci/_/'ga' zhig dkar min ut+pal la/_/rna bar byed la mdza' bo yis/_/de ltar bstod pas 'gog byed pa/_/'di ni mngon gyur 'gog pa'o/_/jo bo bden par smra bo bdag_/gzhan dang tsum+ba nas
[\[326a.6\]]'phos pa'i/_/rgya skyegs kyis dmar mig gis ni/_/nam yang mthong bar 'gyur ma lags/_/sngar nyid shin tu khengs ldan mas/_/nam zhig 'di yi gnod pa dag_/'byung ba de ltar 'gog byed pa/_/'di ni 'byung 'gyur 'gog pa'o/_/lus phra khyod kyi yan lag rnams/_/'jam pa nyid du gnas pa
[\[326a.7\]]brdzun/_/gal te bden par 'jam pa na/_/glo bur du bdag ci la gdung /_/gang phyir de ltar 'dod ldan gyis/_/de dang 'gal ba'i chos kyis 'dir/_/bud med lus ni 'jam pa dag_/'gog pa 'di ni chos 'gog pa'o/_/de ni mdzes sam ma yin zhes/_/rnam rig 'di ni ci las skyes/_/der ni 'od tsam
[\[326b\]]
[\[326b.1\]]g.yo ba nyid/_/mthong bar 'gyur gyi rten ma yin/_/gang phyir gzugs can ma'i ngo mtshar/_/brjod pa 'dod pas 'od ces pa'i/_/chos 'di khas blangs chos can dag_/'gog 'di chos can 'gog pa'o/_/khyod kyi mig dag dmar gyur cing /_/mchu yi yal 'dab g.yo ba dang /_/smin ma 'khyog ste
[\[326b.2\]]de lta na'ang /_/nyes pa med pas bdag mi 'jigs/_/gang phyir mdza' mo mkhas pa yis/_/'jigs pa yi ni rgyu yi gtso/_/rang gi nyes pa 'gog byed pa/_/'di dag 'dir ni rgyu 'gog pa'o/_/mdza' bo dag ni ring na gnas/_/chu 'dzin bgrod ldan 'di ni 'ongs/_/ni tsu la yang rgyas par mthong /_/bdag
[\[326b.3\]]shi min pa 'di ci gang /_/de rgyu chu 'dzin bgrod pa sogs/_/mi bzad pa dag nyer bkod nas/_/'bras bu 'chi ba bzlog pa'i phyir/_/de ni 'bras bu 'gog pa'o/_/gal te gshegs na gshegs par mdzod/_/khyod kyi bgrod pas bdag la ni/_/gdung ba yun ring 'byung mi 'gyur/_/'di la khyod ni dogs
[\[326b.4\]]mi 'tshal/_/zhes pa 'chi ba gsal byed pas/_/rjes gnang nyid kyi sgo nas ni/_/mdza' bo'i bgrod pa 'gog byed pa/_/de ni rjes gnang 'gog pa'o/_/nor ni mang po rnyed 'gyur zhing /_/lam du yang ni bde zhing dge/_/bdag srog la yang the tshom med/_/'on kyang mdza' bo 'gro mi bya/_/mdza' bo 'gro bar
[\[326b.5\]]sbyor ba yis/_/rgyu rnams dag ni rab bshad nas/_/dbang nyid kyis ni de 'gog pa/_/'di 'dra dbang gis 'gog pa'o/_/bdag ni gson re stobs dang ldan/_/nor gyi bsam pa stobs ldan min/_/mdza' bo gshegs sam bzhugs lags sam/_/rang
[\[326b.6\]]gi gnas skabs smos pa lags/_/gang phyir 'di ni chags ldan mas/_/ma gus bzhin du tshig sbyar nas/_/mdza' bo'i bgrod pa 'gog byed pa/_/'di ni ma gus 'gog pa'o/_/mdza' bo gal te gshegs na bzhud/_/khyod kyi lam ni shis gyur cig_/gang du khyod ni gshegs pa der/_/bdag kyang skye ba nyid gyur cig_/de ltar shis
[\[326b.7\]]brjod lam gyi gang /_/rang gi gnas skabs gsal byed mas/_/mdza' bo'i bgrod pa 'gog byed pa/_/'di ni shis brjod kyis 'gog pa'o/_/gal te khyod 'gro bden nyid na/_/khyod kyis gzhan pa 'ga' zhig tshol/_/bdag ni glags 'tshol 'chi ba yis/_/de ring nyid du 'gog par 'gyur/_/_
[\[327a\]]
[\[327a.1\]]gang phyir mdza' ba'i dbang gyur mas/_/mdza' bo'i bgrod pa 'gog byed pa/_/tshig rtsub yi ge sngon 'gro can/_/de ni rtsub mos 'gog pa'o/_/gal te gshegs na myur du bzhud/_/phyi nas gnyen 'dun 'khrugs pa'i khas/_/bsgrags pa'i cho nges 'gro ba yi/_/gegs gyur khyod kyi rna
[\[327a.2\]]bar 'ong /_/gang phyir 'dir ni mtha' gcig tu/_/chags mas grogs nyid byed pa yis/_/mdza' bo'i bgrod pa 'gog pa 'di/_/grogs nyid kyis ni 'gog pa'o/_/bzhud ces khyod dgyes brjod 'dod kyang /_/bdag nyid dga' bar byed pa'i tshig_/ma gshegs zhes pa kha nas ni/_/byung bar gyur la
[\[327a.3\]]bdag ci byed/_/mi 'dod dngos la 'bad byas pas/_/'bras bu phyin ci log bskyed pa'i/_/don med nye bar bstan pa'i phyir/_/de ni 'bad pas 'gog pa'o/_/skad cig lta la gegs byed pa'i/_/rdzi ma bskyod pa la khro ba/_/khyod kyis mdza' la 'gro ba smos/_/bdag ni de yi 'dod pa 'dod/_/gang phyir
[\[327a.4\]]mdza' ba'i gzhan dbang mas/_/don 'dir nye bar gsal byas nas/_/mdza' bo'i bgrod pa 'gog byed pa/_/'di ni gzhan dbang 'gog pa'o/_/mgon po 'bral ba bzod par bgyi/_/gang gis mig bsgos dag la ni/_/'dod pas bsnun du mi mthong ba'i/_/mthong min mig sman bdag la stsol/_/_
[\[327a.5\]]'tsho ba'i thabs ni dka' ba dag_/nye bar bkod nas bdag po ni/_/'gro ba 'gog par byed pa'i phyir/_/'di 'dra thabs kyis 'gog pa brjod/_/jo bo khyod kyi zhal nas tshig_/bdag 'gro zhes pa nges par byung /_/mdza' ba dman pa khyod kyis da/_/ma phyin na yang bdag la ci/_/mdza' ba rgyas pas
[\[327a.6\]]ma bsdams pa'i/_/bdag nyid khro bas mdza' bo yi/_/'gro ba rtsom pa bzlog pa gang /_/de ni khro bas 'gog pa'o/_/ma bsnom bu mo'i rna ba la/_/ma byas chang la ma btab par/_/khyod kyi dgra yi rdzing nyid du/_/ut+pal sngon po zegs par gyur/_/mya ngan bcas shing ut+pa la/_/de 'os las ni bzlog byas
[\[327a.7\]]nas/_/mya ngan 'os pa'i skabs ston phyir/_/'di ni mya ngan gyis 'gog pa'o/_/don 'di 'ga' yang tshogs ma byas/_/rig pa 'ga' yang ma bsgrubs phyir/_/dka' thub 'ga' yang ma bsags pa/_/na tshod mtha' dag song bar gyur/_/gang phyir 'di ni tshe song bas/_/don bsgrub la sogs 'gog pa ni/_/_
[\[327b\]]
[\[327b.1\]]'gyod pa gtso bor ston byed pa/_/'di ni 'gyod pas 'gog pa'o/_/ci 'di ston dus chu 'dzin nam/_/yang na ngang pa'i tshogs sam ci/_/sgra ni rkang gdub kyi 'dra ba/_/thos pas de ni chu 'dzin min/_/chos 'di ngang pa la yod cing /_/sprin gyi rigs la ma reg pas/_/gang zhig the tshom zlog byed pa/_/_
[\[327b.2\]]'di ni the tshom 'gog pa'o/_/bdud rtsi'i bdag nyid pad+ma la/_/sdang zhing snum pa'i dkar 'bras can/_/khyod gdong zla ba 'di yod bzhin/_/zla ba gzhan gyis ci zhig bya/_/phal pa'i zla ba la brten pa/_/de mtshungs yon tan bstan byas nas/_/gtso bo'i zla ba 'gog byed pa/_/rnam pa de ltar sbyar
[\[327b.3\]]pa'i 'gog_/thams cad mnan yang khyod kyis ni/_/rnam gnon tshim pa med pa mtshar/_/'on kyang sreg za 'bar ba la/_/tshim pa dag ni nam zhig mthong /_/gang phyir 'dir ni don gzhan dag_/de yis chos mtshungs bstan byas nas/_/ya mtshan rtsom pa 'gog byed pa/_/'di ni don gzhan
[\[327b.4\]]'gog pa'o/_/sbyin pa po zhes nam yang ni/_/mi dbang khyod la mi bstod de/_/gang phyir slong bas khyod kyi nor/_/rang gi nyid du bsams nas len/_/zhes pa la sogs 'gog pa ni/_/rgyu 'gog pa zhes bshad pa ste/_/phyogs 'di nyid kyis rnam par rtog_/gzhan pa dag kyang dpag par nus/_/gang zhig
[\[327b.5\]]dngos 'ga' rab bkod nas/_/de yi sgrub byed nus pa can/_/dngos po gzhan dag 'god pa de/_/don gzhan bkod par shes par bya/_/kun khyab khyad par la gnas dang /_/sbyar ba can dang 'gal ba can/_/mi 'os byed dang 'os pa'i bdag_/'os dang mi 'os ldog pa'o/_/'di yi dbye ba de lta sogs/_/_
[\[327b.6\]]sbyor ba rnams la rab tu mtshon/_/'di rnams rang bzhin gsal bya'i phyir/_/dper brjod phreng ba bstan par bya/_/legs ldan 'gro ba rnams kyi mig_/nyi ma dang ni zla ba yang /_/nub par gyur pa nyid la ltos/_/nges pa la ni su zhig 'gongs/_/chu 'dzin 'di dag lus can gyi/_/yongs su gdung ba 'phrog
[\[327b.7\]]par byed/_/bdag thob min nam chen po rnams/_/gzhan gyi sdug bsngal zhi slad du'o/_/ma la ya yi rlung gis ni/_/'jig rten dga' ba skyed par byed/_/dAk+Shi N+ya dang yang dag ldan/_/kun gyi snying sdug ma yin nam/_/mtshan mor byed 'di dri ma dang /_/ldan yang 'gro ba dga' ba skyed/_/gnyis skyes dbang po
[\[328a\]]
[\[328a.1\]]skyon ldan yang /_/gzhan dag rjes su 'dzin par nus/_/sbrang rtsi 'thungs pa'i mgrin snyan las/_/byung ba bung ba'i sgra dag kyang /_/rna bar rtsub pa nyid 'gyur ba/_/'dod ldan rnams kyi sdig 'di 'dra/_/chu skyes 'dab ma'i mal stan 'dis/_/bdag gi lus 'di gdung bar byed/_/bsreg pa'i
[\[328a.2\]]bdag nyid sreg za dang /_/'dra bas rigs pa ma yin nam/_/bsil zer can gyis nyams byed mod/_/dpyid kyis bdag ni ci la gdung /_/dri ma can gyis spyod pa'i las/_/dag pas mi 'os pa min nam/_/ku mud ldan yang sreg byed na/_/pad+ma'i 'byung gnas cis mi byed/_/zla bas bzung rnams rtsub pa na/_/_
[\[328a.3\]]nyi mas bzung ba 'jam mi 'gyur/_/sgra 'jug pa'am rtogs pa yis/_/dngos po gnyis ni mtshungs gyur pa/_/de yi dbye ba brjod pa gang /_/de ni bzlog pa can zhes brjod/_/brten dang che ba'i bdag nyid dang /_/lA ba N+ya sogs yon tan gyis/_/khyod dang rgya mtsho mtshungs tha dad/_/khyod lus 'di 'dra nyid
[\[328a.4\]]kyis so/_/gcig la gnas pa'i chos kyis ni/_/gnyis ka la gnas tha dad dag_/rtogs pa'i yul du gyur pa'i phyir/_/'di ni gcig gi ldog pa can/_/chu yi phung po dag dang khyod/_/mtshams las mi 'dab zab pa ste/_/'di ni mig sman dang mtshungs la/_/khyod ni gser gyi 'od can no/_/gang phyir
[\[328a.5\]]'dir ni gnyis ka yis/_/'byed byed yon tan nag po dang /_/ser po dag ni tha dad bstan/_/'di ni gnyis ka'i ldog pa can/_/khyod dang rgya mtsho du rbA rau/_/ma hA satwa te dzaHbcas/_/'di yi khyod gnyis tha dad de/_/de ni chu bdag khyod mkhas so/_/'di ni sbyar ba'i tshul ldan phyir/_/sbyar ba can zhes gzung bar
[\[328a.6\]]mdzod/_/'gog pa can dang gtan tshigs can/_/gnyis po de yang bstan par bya/_/lugs dang ldan zhing brtan pa dang /_/rin chen 'byung gnas yin mod kyang /_/dri ma ldan pa chu srin gnas/_/khyod kyi 'gran zla 'gyur ma yin/_/ri gling rgya mtshor bcas pa yi/_/sa gzhi mtha' dag 'dzin mod kyang /_/_
[\[328a.7\]]lag 'gro rnams kyi rjer gyur phyir/_/lhag ma can ni khyod pas dman/_/sgra dag 'jug par mtshungs pa yi/_/ldog pa can ni 'di 'dra ste/_/rtogs par gyur pas mtshungs pa yang /_/yod pa de ni rjes su bsgrub/_/khyod kyi gdong dang pad+ma ste/_/'di gnyis kyi ni khyad par yang /_/pad+ma chu las skyes pa dang /_/_
[\[328b\]]
[\[328b.1\]]khyod gdong khyod la bstan pa'o/_/ri dgas mig la smin sgeg dang /_/myos pa'i dmar bas reg pa med/_/khyod kyi mig ni gnyis po 'di/_/yon tan de dag nyid kyis brgyan/_/snga mar dbye ba tsam zhig bstan/_/'di ni lhag pa nyid bstan to/_/slar yang mtshungs pa'i ldog pa can/_/gzhan dag rab
[\[328b.2\]]tu bstan par bya/_/khyod kyi gdong dang pad+ma dkar/_/rgyas shing dri bzang ldan pa ste/_/pad+ma la ni bung ba 'khor/_/khyod kyi gdong la mig rab g.yo/_/zla ba 'di ni mkha' yi rgyan/_/ngang pa 'di ni chu yi rgyan/_/mkha' 'di rgyu skar phreng ba can/_/chu 'di ku mud rgyas pa can/_/'dir ni zla ba ngang pa dag_/dkar
[\[328b.3\]]ba nyid sogs rtogs pa dang /_/mkha' dang chu ni dag pa yang /_/rtogs par mtshungs pa'i dbye ba byas/_/snga ma la ni sgra ldan mtshungs/_/gnyis ka la yang tha dad dbye/_/bung ba mig la sogs pa mtshungs/_/de phyir mtshungs pa'i ldog pa can/_/rin can snang bas mi 'phrogs shing /_/nyi ma'i 'od kyis
[\[328b.4\]]mi bzlogs pa/_/lang tsho las byung na chung gi_/mun pas lta ba 'gog par byed/_/mun pa'i rigs las mun pa 'di/_/lta ba 'gog pa nyid kyis mtshungs/_/gzhan dag gis ni tha dad bstan/_/'di ni rigs mthun ldog pa can/_/rab tu grags pa'i rgyu bzlog nas/_/gang zhig rgyu gzhan cung zad dam/_/_
[\[328b.5\]]gang du rang gi ngo bo nyid/_/ston pa de ni srid pa can/_/ma 'thungs myos pa'i kA dam+pa/_/ma phyis dri ma med pa'i mkha'/_/drungs par ma byas dngas pa'i chu/_/'gro ba'i yid ni 'phrog par byed/_/sman ma bskus par dkar min mig_/mnan pa min par smin ma dma'/_/tshon ma bskus par dmar ba ni/_/_
[\[328b.6\]]mdzes ma khyod kyi mchu 'di'o/_/gang phyir ma 'thungs la sogs skyes/_/myos pa nyid sogs rgyu gzhan can/_/rgyu med dag kyang brjod 'dod pa/_/de la 'dir ni 'gal ba med/_/bsgos pa med par kha dri zhim/_/bcos pa med par lus po mdzes/_/rgyu med dag tu zla ba dgra/_/rgyu mtshan med
[\[328b.7\]]par 'dod pa grogs/_/bsgos pa med sogs tshig gis 'dir/_/rgyu ni dngos su rab bzlog cing /_/dri zhim nyid sogs 'bras bu brjod/_/de phyir de ni srid pa can/_/dngos po 'ga' la bsam byas nas/_/de dang mtshungs pa'i dngos po gzhan/_/bsdus pa'i tshul gyis rjod byed pa/_/de ni bsdus pa
[\[329a\]]
[\[329a.1\]]brjod par 'dod/_/bung ba ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin/_/pad+ma rgyas la sbrang rtsi 'thungs/_/dri zhim rgyas pa ma yin yang /_/me tog kha ma bye sbyor ltos/_/chags ldan bud med dar ma la/_/dga' ba'i rtse dgas bcings pa dag_/bu mo 'ga' zhig dag la yang /_/'dod pa 'phel ba ston
[\[329a.2\]]par byed/_/khyad par can tsam tha dad cing /_/khyad par rnam pa mtshungs pa'ang yod/_/khyad par tha dad tha dad min/_/'di ni gzhan pa dag kyang yod/_/rtsa brtan 'bras bu'i khur gyis ni/_/slong rnams rtag tu rgyas par byed/_/grib ma snum pa'i ljon pa che/_/'di ni bdag gis yang dag thob/_/_
[\[329a.3\]]yal ga'i khyon ni mi chung zhing /_/me tog 'bras bu phun sum tshogs/_/dam pa'i grib bsil brtan ldan pa'i/_/shing 'di bdag gi skal bas rnyed/_/gnyis ka la yang skyes bu 'ga'/_/ljon pa nyid kyis nye bar bsngags/_/chos rnams thams cad snga ma la/_/thun mong gzhan la rnam pa gnyis/_/_
[\[329a.4\]]sprul ngan 'grogs pa dang bral zhing /_/rang bzhin gyis ni mngar ba'i nang /_/kye ma chu yi gter 'di ni/_/dus kyis yongs su skam par gyur/_/rgya mtsho la ni de mtshungs pa/_/skyes bu'i ldog pa gsal byed cing /_/snga ma'i chos ni bzlog pa'i phyir/_/'di ni sngon med bsdus par brjod/_/khyad par gyi ni
[\[329a.5\]]brjod 'dod gang /_/'jig rten mtshams las brgal gyur pa/_/phul du byung bar brjod pa 'di/_/rgyan gyi dam pa yin te dper/_/mal+li kA yi phreng tshogs can/_/lus kun khyab pa'i tsan+dan gsher/_/dkar ba'i gos can sngon 'gro ma/_/zla ba'i 'od la mtshon ma yin/_/zla ba'i 'od ni lhag pa nyid/_/_
[\[329a.6\]]khyad 'phags ldan brjod de bzhin du/_/the tshom phul byung la sogs kyang /_/gsal phyir cung zad bstan par bya/_/dga' ma khyod kyi nu ma dang /_/dpyi yi bar na rkang pa ni/_/yod dam med ces bdag gi ni/_/the tshom da dung bzlog ma gyur/_/ni tam+bi ni khyod la ni/_/rked pa yod ces nges par nus/_/'o ma
[\[329a.7\]]'dzin pa'i khur gnas pa/_/rnam pa gzhan du srid ma yin/_/khyod kyi grags pa'i phung po ni/_/dpag nus min yang 'dir shong ba/_/sa skyong srid pa gsum gyi ni/_/khongs dag e ma shin tu yangs/_/rgyan ni gzhan pa dag las kyang /_/ngag gi dbang pos mchod gyur ba/_/phul byung zhes ni brjod pa
[\[329b\]]
[\[329b.1\]]'di/_/gcig pu nyid ni mchog tu brjod/_/sems ldan dag gam cig shos kyi/_/rnam pa gzhan du gnas pa'i tshul/_/gang du rnam gzhan rab rtogs pa/_/de ni rab rtog tu rig dper/_/nyin gung nyi mas gdungs pa yi/_/glang po dag ni mtshor 'jug pa/_/nyi ma'i phyogs gyur pad+ma rnams/_/gzhom
[\[329b.2\]]par 'dod pa yin nam snyam/_/khrus dang btung dang pad rtsa dag_/bza' phyir lag ldan chur 'jug pa/_/de ni 'khon lan blan phyir zhes/_/snyan ngag mkhan gyis rab brtags brjod/_/'di ni bdag gi ring ba dag_/'gog byed rna ba'i rgyan zhes te/_/khyod kyi mig gis rna ba yi/_/ut+pal dag la
[\[329b.3\]]'gongs pa 'dra/_/mig zur char ni lhung gyur pa/_/mig gi 'od kyis ut+pal la/_/reg pa min yang snyan ngag mkhan/_/de ltar rab tu brtags te brjod/_/mun pa lus la 'byug pa bzhin/_/mkha' ni mig sman char 'bebs bzhin/_/zhes 'di yang ngo rab rtog gi_/mtshan nyid ldan pa shin tu
[\[329b.4\]]mang /_/'dir ni bzhin gyi sgra yis 'ga'/_/dpe 'di nyid du 'khrul pa bskyed/_/ting nga'i mtha' yis dpe ma yin/_/zhes pa yid ches gsung bzlas nas/_/dpe dang dper bya nyid dag ni/_/mtshungs pa'i chos la ltos pas na/_/'byug pa dang ni mun pa la/_/chos 'di mngon par gyur tam ci/_/_
[\[329b.5\]]gal te 'byug pa nyid 'dod na/_/'byug ces bya ba gzhan pa ci/_/de nyid chos dang chos can yang /_/zhes pa ma myos 'chad ma yin/_/gal te byed pa nges yin na/_/bya tshig la 'di dbang bral 'gyur/_/rang gi bya bsgrub mi nus pa/_/gzhan gyi ltos byar mi 'gyur ro/_/gang gis 'byug pa 'di dang
[\[329b.6\]]ni/_/mun pa mtshungs zhes smra na yang /_/lus la zhes pa ma 'brel te/_/de yang yon tan mtshungs pa blta/_/dper na khyod gdong zla ba bzhin/_/zhes pas mdzes pa rtogs 'gyur te/_/de bzhin 'byug pa 'di la ni/_/'byug pa las gzhan rtogs ma yin/_/de phyir 'byug pa 'di dang ni/_/mun
[\[329b.7\]]pa byed po lus kyang las/_/nye bar sbyar don skyes bu yis/_/de ltar rab brtags zhes 'dod bya/_/snyam dang dogs dang nges dang 'dra/_/min nam zhes pa la sogs pa'i/_/sgra yis rab brtags gsal bar byed/_/bzhin gyi sgra yang de dang 'dra/_/rgyu dang phra mo cha dag ni/_/tshig rnams dag gi rgyan gyi mchog_/_
[\[330a\]]
[\[330a.1\]]rgyu ni byed po shes byed de/_/de dag rnam pa du ma dper/_/ma la ya yi rlung gis ni/_/tsan+dan ljon pa gsar pa yi/_/yal 'dab skyod par byed pa 'di/_/kun gyi dga' ba skyed par byed/_/dga' ba bskyed par 'os pa yi/_/rang bzhin nye bar sbyar ba 'di/_/rgyan nyid du ni rab bstan te/_/_
[\[330a.2\]]ldog pa dag kyang de dang mtshungs/_/ma la ya yi chu rgyun la/_/reg cing tsan+dan nags bskyod pa/_/rlung 'di 'gron po rnams dag ni/_/nyams par byed phyir nye bar gnas/_/de ltar 'byung ba'i rlung gis ni/_/'bral ba'i rims las byung gyur pa/_/yid 'ong la sred skye bo la/_/nyams pa sgrub par byed par
[\[330a.3\]]nus/_/'grub par byed dang rnam 'gyur la/_/de nyid la ltos rgyu nyid do/_/'thob pa'i las la phal cher ni/_/bya ba la ltos rgyu nyid do/_/'grub par byed pa'i rgyu dag ni/_/bstan te lhag ma gnyis po yi/_/dper brjod gnyis ni bkod byas nas/_/shes par byed pa bstan par bya/_/lo 'dab
[\[330a.4\]]gsar 'khrungs nags tshal dang /_/'dab brgya rab tu rgyas pa'i rdzing /_/zla ba rgyas pa 'dod pa yis/_/'gron po lta ba'i dug tu byas/_/khengs pa goms par bya'o zhes/_/grogs mo mdza' ba'i gnas bkod la/_/bu mo smin 'khyog mig yon gyis/_/mchu ni g.yo zhing lta bar byed/_/nyi ma nub
[\[330a.5\]]gyur zla ba mdzes/_/'dab chags rnams ni gnas su song /_/zhes pa 'di yang dus kyi skabs/_/go bar byed pa legs pa nyid/_/grogs mo 'dod pas gzir ba'i yid/_/zla ba'i 'od kyis mi bzlogs shing /_/tsan+dan chu yis mi bzod pa/_/lus kyi drod kyis gdung bar 'dzin/_/zhes pa'i sbyor ba
[\[330a.6\]]rnams la ni/_/yid 'ong shes byed rgyu dag mtshon/_/dngos med rgyu ni yid 'phrog pa/_/'ga' zhig rab tu bstan par bya/_/rig pa rnams ni ma goms dang /_/blo ldan rnams dang ma 'grogs dang /_/dbang po rnams ni ma bsdams pas/_/mi rnams rab tu gdung bar 'gyur/_/'dod pa'i gtam
[\[330a.7\]]gyis myos pa song /_/lang tsho yi ni rims dag nyams/_/rmongs pa zad cing sred pa 'phos/_/bsod nams gnas la yid dga' byas/_/nags tshal 'di dag khyim ma yin/_/chu klung 'di dag bud med min/_/ri dgas 'di dag bu tsha min/_/de phyir bdag ni yid dga'o/_/shin tu ma brtags spyod
[\[330b\]]
[\[330b.1\]]pa ni/_/'phags pa rnams la yod ma yin/_/de phyir de dag rnams kyi ni/_/phun tshogs thams cad rtag tu 'phel/_/skyed tshal sa hA kA ra rnams/_/snye ma ma 'khrungs pa min na/_/'gron po rnams kyi bud med ni/_/til bcas khyor chu sbyin byar 'gyur/_/yod dang med pa'i rang bzhin gyi/_/_
[\[330b.2\]]'bras bu skyed pa dag la 'dir/_/sngar med la sogs rang bzhin gyi/_/dngos po yi ni rgyu nyid do/_/ring 'bras de dang lhan cig skyes/_/de bzhin 'bras ma thag skyes dang /_/rigs min rigs pa byed ces pa/_/mtshar ba'i rgyu rnams grangs med do/_/'di rnams sbyor ba'i lam rnams la/_/btags pa'i
[\[330b.3\]]'jug pa la brten pa/_/shin tu mdzes pa dag mthong ste/_/de yi dper brjod ji ltar na/_/lus can khyod mig zur ces pa/_/rgyal byed lus med dag gi mtshon/_/gang de gzhan la rab 'phangs pa/_/de yis bdag gi yid kyang bcom/_/skyes bu lus skyes kyis myos pa'i/_/rnam 'phrul sna tshogs
[\[330b.4\]]lhan cig nyid/_/bud med rnams la bu mo ni/_/yongs su nub pa'i na tshod skyes/_/sngar nyid ri dgas mig can ma'i/_/chags pa'i rgya mtsho rgyas par gyur/_/phyis nas 'od zer rab 'phro bas/_/zla ba yi ni dkyil 'khor shar/_/lha gcig khyod kyi zhabs gnyis po/_/dmar ba'i nyi gzhon la reg
[\[330b.5\]]pas/_/rgyal po rnams kyi lag pa yi/_/pad+ma zum par byed pa ci/_/khyod kyi zhabs sen zla ba yi/_/'od zer kun+da dri med rnams/_/sa skyong rnams kyi lag pa yi/_/pad+ma zum par byed la dbang /_/zhes pa rgyu yi rnam rtog rnams/_/lugs ni 'di 'dra dag tu bstan/_/zur dang rnam pas mtshon pa'i don/_/phra
[\[330b.6\]]phyir phra mo zhes par brjod/_/nam zhig 'u cag 'grogs 'gyur zhes/_/tshogs su brjod par ma bzod pa'i/_/mdza' bo rig nas bud med kyis/_/rtse dga'i pad+ma zum par byed/_/lus skyes dag gis gzir ba yi/_/mdza' bo dbugs dbyung 'dod pa yis/_/pad+ma zum par byas pa las/_/'dir ni mtshan
[\[330b.7\]]mo 'grogs pa bstan/_/glu yi 'dun sar khyod la mig_/gtad pa de gdong chu skyes la/_/dmar zhing gsal ba rgyas pa yi/_/mdzes pa ci yang byung bar gyur/_/'dir yang rang bzhin ma brjod par/_/dga' ba'i dga' ston 'dod pa dag_/nges par gnas pa nyid gyur pa/_/phra mo nyid las brgal ma yin/_/_
[\[331a\]]
[\[331a.1\]]cha ni cha yi dngos po yi/_/rang bzhin nges par gsal ba sgrib/_/dper brjod nyid kyis 'di yi ni/_/rang bzhin nges par gsal bar bya/_/rgyal po'i bu mo la chags bdag_/spu long rgyas pa srung ba pos/_/rig par gyur la kye ma tshal/_/bsil ba'i rlung ldan yin par shes/_/ci ltar
[\[331a.2\]]bu mo mthong nyid na/_/bdag la dga' ba'i mchi ma byung /_/rlung gis gtsubs pa'i me tog gi_/rdul gyis bdag mig sun phyung ngo /_/zhes pa la sogs skabs su ni/_/rgyan 'di shin tu mdzes pa yin/_/kha cig cha la smad pa'am/_/bstod par byas la cha zhes brjod/_/gang yid g.yul gyi dga'
[\[331a.3\]]ston la/_/'dod pa'i dga' ston las kyang chags/_/gzi ldan lang tsho yon tan can/_/rgyal 'di khyod kyi bdag por 'os/_/brtson 'grus khyad 'phags bstod pa 'dir/_/smad pa nyid de longs spyod la/_/rgyun du spyod 'dod bu mo yi/_/bsam pa dag ni bzlog par nus/_/gnod pa rab gzhil nyid kyi
[\[331a.4\]]phyir/_/gang gis snyan par smra ba bslab/_/skye bo 'di ni brtse med g.yo/_/grogs mo de yis bdag la ci/_/skye bo grogs mos rab bstan khengs/_/chags phyir byed par ma nus nas/_/skyon ltar snang bas yon tan gang /_/snyan par smra ba nyid kyang bstan/_/dngos po rab tu bstan pa rnams/_/rim pa bzhin du
