[\[331a.5\]]rjes ston pa/_/grangs dang rim pa bzhin zhes pa/_/grangs bzhin zhes par rab tu brjod/_/khrus la chur ni rab zhugs ma/_/khyod kyi 'dzum mig gdong mdzes ni/_/ku mud ut+pal pad+ma yis/_/bskus par nges so gzugs can ma/_/dga' ba mchog tu dga' bar brjod/_/nyams ldan yid 'ong nyams
[\[331a.6\]]dang ldan/_/gzi brjid nga rgyal skyes pa ste/_/de gsum khyad 'phags dag dang ldan/_/go bin+da khyod khyim 'ongs pa/_/deng bdag dga' ba skyes pa gang /_/dga' ba 'di ni slar yang khyod/_/dus kyi 'ongs na 'byung bar 'gyur/_/de 'dra'i dga' ba bi du ras/_/gzhan las min zhes rigs par smra/_/de la
[\[331a.7\]]gus pa tsam gyis ni/_/rab brtan 'phrog byed shin tu dges/_/zla ba nyi ma rlung sa mkha'/_/sbyin sreg byed dang me dang chu/_/zhes pa'i gzugs rnams rab 'das nas/_/lha khyod lta bar nged kyis ci/_/mngon sum byas pa'i lha la ni/_/rgyal po dga' ba'i go cha yis/_/dga' ba rab tu gsal byas gang /_/_
[\[331b\]]
[\[331b.1\]]de yang dga' bar rjes rtogs bya/_/shi ba zhes pa pha rol du/_/gang dang 'grogs phyir bdag 'chi 'dod/_/a ban+ti de bdag gis ni/_/skye 'di nyid la ci ltar 'thob/_/dga' ba nyid ni sngar bstan te/_/dga' ba sgeg pa nyid 'gyur 'di/_/gzugs mang dag dang ldan pas na/_/'di ni nyams dang ldan
[\[331b.2\]]pa'i tshig_/gang gis nag mo bdag mdun nas/_/skra nas bzung ste drangs gyur pa/_/bsten dka' sdig can thob pa 'di/_/skad cig 'tsho bar 'gyur ram ci/_/zhes pa 'jigs sde dgra dag la/_/lta ba'i khro ba mchog gi mthar/_/'dzegs pa drag po'i bdag nyid 'gyur/_/'di ni ro dang
[\[331b.3\]]ldan pa'i tshig_/mtshor bcas sa las ma rgyal zhing /_/rnam mang mchod sbyin ma byas la/_/slong la nor rnams ma sbyin par/_/sa skyong du bdag ci ltar 'gyur/_/zhes pa spro ba khyad 'phags dag_/dpa' bo'i nyams kyi bdag nyid gnas/_/nyams ldan nyid du nus pa la/_/tshig 'di dag ni
[\[331b.4\]]dbang ba yin/_/lus 'jam gang la pad+ma yi/_/mal stan dag kyang rtsub byed na/_/lha mo de ni ro khang dag_/sreg za ldan par ji ltar nyal/_/zhes pa snying rje rgyas pa yi/_/rgyan nyid du ni rab tu bshad/_/de bzhin gzhan yang ngam pa dang /_/bzhad gad rmad byung 'jigs rung ngo /_/rgyu mas brgyan
[\[331b.5\]]pa'i srin po rnams/_/mgo med ro dang lhan cig tu/_/lag pa sbyar bas khyod dgra'i khrag_/'thung zhing 'thung zhing gar byed do/_/grogs mo me tog ma rnyings ma/_/khyod kyi nu ma'i ngos la ni/_/sen rjes gsar pa chags pa 'di/_/stod g.yogs kyis ni sgrib par mdzod/_/dga' tshal ljon
[\[331b.6\]]pa 'di rnams kyi/_/'dab ma gsar pa gos bzang dang /_/me tog do shal la sogs rgyan/_/yal 'dab khang par gyur pa mtshar/_/rtse mo dag la me gnas pa/_/brgya byin gyi ni rdo rje gang /_/'di ni dran na lha min gyi/_/bud med mngal ni lhung bar byed/_/snyan pa grong ba nyid min skyes/_/brjod bya
[\[331b.7\]]yi ni nyams dag bstan/_/'dir ni nyams brgyad dbang byas te/_/tshig rnams nyams dang ldan par bshad/_/bdag ni gnod pa byed po zhes/_/khyod kyi snying la 'jigs ma byed/_/bdag gi ral gris phyir phyogs rnams/_/nam yang gzhom par 'dod ma yin/_/zhes pa skyes bu dregs ldan 'gas/_/_
[\[332a\]]
[\[332a.1\]]g.yul du gzhan ni bkag byas nas/_/gtong ba de lta bu la sogs/_/gzi brjid ldan pa shes par bya/_/'dod don dngos su ma brjod par/_/de nyid 'grub par bya ba'i phyir/_/rnam pa gzhan dag brjod pa gang /_/de ni rnam grangs brjod par 'dod/_/sa hA kA ra'i snye ma rnams/_/_
[\[332a.2\]]gzhan gyi gsos 'dis za bar byed/_/de ni bdag gis bzlog par bgyi/_/khyed gnyis dal gyis 'dug par mdzod/_/grogs mo skyes phran phrad byas nas/_/de dag dus sar dga' ba yi/_/dga' ston bsgrub tu gzhug 'dod pas/_/'ga' zhig de nas song bar gyur/_/bya ba 'ga' zhig rtsom pa
[\[332a.3\]]la/_/skal pa yi ni stobs las kyang /_/de yi sgrub byed phun tshogs gang /_/de ni kun du phan par brjod/_/khengs pa gzhom phyir de yi ni/_/rkang pa dag la phyag 'tshal ba/_/bdag la phan phyir skal pa yi/_/'brug gi sgra ni grags par gyur/_/bsam pa'am ni 'byor ba yi/_/chen po nyid ni bla med gang /_/_
[\[332a.4\]]de ni rgya che zhes pa yi/_/rgyan du mkhas pa rnams kyis brjod/_/rA ma Na yi mgo gcod pa'i/_/bya ba'i khur yang bzod pa gang /_/rA g+hu'i bu des bla ma yi/_/bka' las 'da' bar nus ma gyur/_/rin chen rtsig pa las 'phos pa'i/_/gzugs brnyan brgya yis bskor gyur pa/_/lang+ka'i dbang phyug
[\[332a.5\]]de kho na/_/any+dza na bus dka' bas shes/_/snga mar bsam pa'i bdag nyid che/_/'dir ni mngon par 'byor pa brling /_/rgya che gnyis po 'di dag kyang /_/rab tu gsal bar mtshon pa yin/_/bsnyon dor dag ni bsnyon byas nas/_/don gzhan cung zad ston pa ste/_/'dod pa dag ni mda' lnga pa/_/ma yin sgro
[\[332a.6\]]ldan stong phrag yod/_/tsan+dan zla 'od dal bu yi/_/lho phyogs dri yi bzhon pa 'di/_/me yi rang bzhin spro ba ste/_/gzhan gyi ngor ni bsil zhes grags/_/'dod ldan gyis ni gzhan la de/_/bsil ba khas blangs bdag nyid la/_/tsha ba nyid du rab bstan phyir/_/'di ni yul la bsnyon pa'o/_/bdud rtsi zags
[\[332a.7\]]pa'i 'od zer can/_/zla ba zhes par bdag cag 'dod/_/don gyi bdag nyid 'di ni gzhan/_/dug zag zer dang ldan pa nyid/_/ces pa zla ba'i zla ba nyid/_/bzlog nas don gzhan bdag nyid ni/_/'dod pas gzir bas brjod pa'i phyir/_/'di ni rang bzhin bsnyon dor ro/_/bsnyon dor des ni sngar nyid du/_/_
[\[332b\]]
[\[332b.1\]]dper brjod rnams la rab bstan to/_/'di yi bsnyon dor dbye ba rnams/_/mtshon bya dag la rgya cher mtshon/_/sbyar ba gzugs gcig ldan pa'i tshig_/du ma'i don can nyid du 'dod/_/de tshig tha dad min pa dang /_/tha dad tshig 'dra rnam pa gnyis/_/u da ya gnas mdzes pa can/_/dkyil 'khor la
[\[332b.2\]]chags rgyal po 'di/_/mr-i du ka raH'jig rten gyi/_/yid ni rab tu 'phrog par byed/_/rgyal rigs lam la mi gnas pa/_/rgyal po skyon gyi 'byung gnas dang /_/bsdongs nas skyon mang dag gis bdag_/dga' med 'di ltar cis ma mnar/_/rgyu skar lam la rab gnas pa/_/mtshan mor byed pa dang
[\[332b.3\]]bsdongs nas/_/srod la yis ni bdag 'di ltar/_/dga' ba med par cis ma mnar/_/dpe dang gzugs can 'gog pa dang /_/ldog pa can sogs spyod yul can/_/sbyor ba gang du bstan zin te/_/gzhan pa 'ga' zhig bstan par bya/_/'ga' zhig bya ba tha dad min/_/gzhan pa bya ba 'gal min
[\[332b.4\]]yod/_/'gal ba'i las can dag kyang gzhan/_/sbyar ba des pa can yang yod/_/nges pa 'gog pa'i gzugs brjod dang /_/'gal med 'gal ba can yang ste/_/de dag rnams kyi rang bzhin yang /_/dpar brjod dag las gsal par 'gyur/_/'khyog cing yid 'ong rang bzhin can/_/chags pa
[\[332b.5\]]gsal bar ston byed ma/_/mdzes mas bskul ba'i mig dang ni/_/pho nya mos kyang mdza' bo 'gugs/_/yid 'ong chags pa 'phel bar byed/_/'jam zhing myos pa'i gdangs snyan can/_/khu byug sgra ni thos gyur te/_/dkar min mig can dag la 'khyud/_/chu ma dang sbyor 'phel ba yi/_/dmar ba rab tu
[\[332b.6\]]ston byed cing /_/tsha zer can ni nub gyur te/_/lus skyes dag ni rnam par rgyas/_/ral gri nyid la nis+t+riM sha_/gzhu nyid la ni 'khyog po nyid/_/mi bdag 'di yi mA rga Na/_/mda' rnams nyid la gnas pa yin/_/khyod kyis bsrungs la tsher ma ni/_/pad+ma'i yu ba nyid la mthong /_/'on kyang chags can
[\[332b.7\]]'khrig pa la/_/'khyud par gyur pa rnams la'ang mthong /_/sa 'dzin ka Ta ka mang zhing /_/gzi brjid ldan pa des par dar/_/mkhas pa skye dgu'i bdag 'byung ste/_/rje bo nus pa 'dzin yang de/_/nyams med yin yang chos sbyong min/_/rgyal po yin yang zad mi shes/_/bde byed yin yang lag
[\[333a\]]
[\[333a.1\]]'gro med/_/lha nyid yin yang rnam sad min/_/khyad par rab tu bstan pa'i phyir/_/yon tan rigs dang bya ba sogs/_/gang du ma tshad nyid bstan pa/_/de ni khyad par brjod par 'dod/_/me tog gzhu can dag gi mtshon/_/rtsub pa ma yin rno ba'ang min/_/de ltar na yang 'di yis ni/_/_
[\[333a.2\]]sa gsum dag las rgyal bar 'gyur/_/'di dag lha yi bu mo min/_/dri za'i rigs las byung ba'ang min/_/de lta mod kyi tshangs pa'i yang /_/dka' thub gzhom pa bsgrub par nus/_/khro gnyer dag ni ma bsdus shing /_/so yi g.yogs kyang ma bskyod la/_/mig kyang dmar por ma gyur pa/_/dgra
[\[333a.3\]]yi rigs ni nyams par byed/_/shing rta med cing glang po'ang med/_/rta med rkang thang med par yang /_/zur mig nyid kyis bud med rnams/_/'gro ba gsum po dag las rgyal/_/shing rta 'khor lo gcig pa dang /_/kha lo pa nyams rta mi mnyam/_/de lta na yang gzi byin can/_/nyi mas 'gro ba
[\[333a.4\]]gsum po mnan/_/gzi byin can zhes khyad par las/_/'dir ni rgyu yi khyad par brjod/_/rim pa 'di yis gzhan gyi ni/_/dbye ba rnams kyang brtag par bya/_/brjod 'dod yon tan khyad 'phags dang /_/mtshungs par byas nas 'ga' zhig ni/_/bstod smad don du bsgrags pa gang /_/de ni mtshungs
[\[333a.5\]]par sbyor ba bshad/_/gshin rje lus ngan chu lha dang /_/mig stong pa dang khyod nyid kyang /_/'jig rten skyong ba zhes pa'i sgra/_/yul gzhan med par rnam par 'dzin/_/ri dgas mig dang 'grogs pa dang /_/glog gi rtse dga' dag dang ni/_/sprin gyi rtsom pa'ang rang bzhin gyis/_/skad cig
[\[333a.6\]]gnyis par mi gnas so/_/'gal zla sgrub byed slad du ni/_/gang du dngos po 'gal ba rnams/_/yang dag 'grogs par rab bsten pa/_/de ni 'gal ba bshad de dper/_/ngang pa'i rgyal po rnams dag ni/_/myos pa'i gdangs snyan ca co 'phel/_/rma bya rnams kyi sgra dag ni/_/yid 'ong nyid
[\[333a.7\]]dang bral bas nyams/_/dbyar skyes chu 'dzin dag gis ni/_/nam mkha' yul ngan lta bur spyod/_/chags pa yis kyang 'gro ba yi/_/yid ni kun du chags par gyur/_/rked pa phra zhing ro smad sbom/_/mchu dmar mig ni dkar ba min/_/lte ba dma' zhing nu ma mtho/_/bud med lus kyis su
[\[333b\]]
[\[333b.1\]]ma bcom/_/pad rtsa'i lag pa chu shing brla/_/pad+ma'i gdong dang ut+pal mig_/khyod kyi gzugs kyis bdag cag rnams/_/gdung nus min nam lus can ma/_/skyed tshal rlung gis rab bskyod pa/_/tsUta tsam pa ka yi rdul/_/reg pa min yang 'gron po yi/_/mig las mchi ma 'dzag par byed/_/snyan
[\[333b.2\]]par sgrogs ma khyod kyi mig_/nag dkar rjes su dmar ba yang /_/rna ba dag la brten pa ni/_/su yi yid brtan nyid du 'gyur/_/nag mo snyan sgrogs khyod kyi mig_/srid sgrub la chags lta byed kyang /_/rna can dag la brten pa ni/_/su yis yid brtan nyid du 'gyur/_/de ltar rgyan 'di rnam pa ni/_/du ma nyid du rab
[\[333b.3\]]rtogs bya/_/skabs min 'dod pas bstod pa ni/_/skabs su ma bab bstod pa yin/_/gzhan mi bsten pa'i ri dgas rnams/_/'bad med rnyed par sla ba'i nor/_/chu dang rtswa yi myug sogs kyis/_/nags rnams su ni bde bar 'tsho/_/rgyal po'i rjes 'brang nyon mongs pa/_/skyo ba'i yid dang ldan pa yis/_/_
[\[333b.4\]]skabs su ma bab nyid du 'dir/_/ri dgas spyod tshul 'di dag bsngags/_/gal te smad pa bzhin bstod nas/_/skyon ltar snang ba'i yon tan nyid/_/gang du nye bar thob gyur pa/_/'di ni zol gyis bstod pa bshad/_/rA ma dka' thub pa yis kyang /_/'byung po'i 'dzin ma 'di las rgyal/_/de nyid rgyal po khyod kyis
[\[333b.5\]]kyang /_/'di la khyod ni rgyags ma mdzad/_/sngon gyi skyes bu las bcad nas/_/dpal 'di khyod kyis yongs su spyod/_/rgyal po bu ram shing pa'i rgyud/_/khyod kyis 'di ni rigs sam ci/_/khyod kyi btsun mo sa gzhi ni/_/lag 'gro'i longs spyod dag la chags/_/ci slad khyod kyi nga rgyal ni/_/mchog gi
[\[333b.6\]]mtha' ru 'dzegs par gyur/_/de ltar nye bar mtshon pa las/_/sbyar ba can dang gzhan dag gi_/zol gyis bstod pa'i rnam pa rnams/_/rab tu rgya che mtha' dang bral/_/gal te don gzhan 'jug pa yis/_/de dang mtshungs pa'i 'bras bu 'ga'/_/mchog gam mchog min ston byed pa/_/de ni nges par
[\[333b.7\]]bstan pa yin/_/nyi ma 'char ba nyid kyis ni/_/pad+ma rnams la dpal ster byed/_/phun tshogs rnams kyi 'bras bu dag_/grogs po rjes 'dzin bstan pa'i phyir/_/zla ba'i zer gyis reg pa na/_/mun pa'i phreng ba nub par gyur/_/'phral la rgyal po dang 'gal rnams/_/ngan pa'i mthar gyur gsal bar byed/_/_
[\[334a\]]
[\[334a.1\]]yon tan las rnams lhan cig gi/_/dngos po brjod pa lhan cig brjod/_/don rnams bsnol ba gang yin pa/_/yongs brjes yin te de dag dper/_/da ni mtshan mo 'di dag rnams/_/bdag gi dbugs dang lhan cig ring /_/zla ba'i rgyan ldan ma rnams kyang /_/bdag lus nyid dang
[\[334a.2\]]lhan cig skye/_/'gron po rnams kyi rmongs pa dang /_/lhan cig tsU ta'i dog pa rgyas/_/de dag mchi ma dang mnyam du/_/ma la ya yi rlung dag 'bab/_/khu byug sgrogs pa'i skal bzang dang /_/nags kyi rlung ni dri bzang dang /_/dpyid nyid skye bo'i kun dga' rnams/_/lhan cig dag tu 'phel bar 'gyur/_/_
[\[334a.3\]]de ltar lhan cig brjod pa yi/_/dper brjod 'ga' zhig 'dir byas te/_/yongs su brjes pa'i rang bzhin yang /_/nges par bstan pa cung zad bya/_/sa spyod rnams la mtshon bsnun pa/_/ster byed khyod kyi lag pa yis/_/de dag grags pa ku mud dkar/_/yun ring dag tu bsgrubs pa phrog_/mngon par
[\[334a.4\]]'dod pa'i dngos po la/_/smon pa shis brjod ces bya dper/_/ngag yid spyod yul ma yin pa'i/_/snang ba dam pas khyod la srungs/_/rjes 'gro med dang the tshom can/_/dag ni dpe rnams nyid la bstan/_/dpe yi gzugs can dag kyang 'dir/_/gzugs can rnams la nges par bsgrags/_/rab rtog
[\[334a.5\]]cha shas 'di yang ni/_/rab rtog dag gi dbye ba nyid/_/tha dad rgyan rnams bsres pa ni/_/spel ma dag tu brjod pa ste/_/yan lag yan lag can dngos kyi/_/skabs dang thams cad stobs mtshungs nyid/_/ces pa'i lugs gnyis spel ma yi/_/rgyan dag la ni mtshon par bya/_/mdzes ma khyod kyi
[\[334a.6\]]bzhin gyi dpal/_/pad+ma dag gis 'gog par byed/_/mdzod dang yu ba phun tshogs pa/_/'di la bya dka' ci zhig yod/_/rang bzhin brjod dang 'khyog brjod ces/_/ngag gi ngang bzhin tha dad gnyis/_/'khyog por brjod pa thams cad la/_/phal cher sbyar bas dpal rgyas byed/_/snyan ngag mkhan
[\[334a.7\]]bsam dgongs pa ste/_/snyan ngag grub par gang gnas pa/_/rab sbyor yul gyi yon tan can/_/de ni dgongs pa can zhes brjod/_/dngos po yis ni tshig rnams kun/_/phan tshun phan par byed pa nyid/_/don dang bral ba'i khyad par rnams/_/ma byas gnas su bsngags pa dang /_/brjod rim
[\[334b\]]
[\[334b.1\]]stobs las dngos po ni/_/zab mo dag kyang gsal ba ste/_/de kun dgongs pa'i dbang gyur phyir/_/de dag dgongs pa can zhes rig_/gang yang mtshams sbyor yan lag dang /_/'jug pa'i yan lag mtshan nyid sogs/_/lung gzhan dag tu brjod 'di yang /_/rgyan nyid du ni bdag cag
[\[334b.2\]]'dod/_/rgya che mtha' yas rab bsdus tshad du gyur pa yi/_/rgyan rnams dag gi lam 'di nyid ni rnam par phye/_/brjod pa'i yul las 'das par yongs su gnas pa yi/_/khyad par rnams ni goms pa rnams kyis dbye bar nus/_/snyan ngag me long las le'u ste gnyis ba'o//_//_
[\[334b.3\]]bar ma chod dang bar chod bdag_/yi ge tshogs pa bskor ba ni/_/zung ldan de yang rkang pa yi/_/dang po bar mtha' spyod yul can/_/gcig gnyis gsum bzhi rkang pa yi/_/zung ldan rnams kyi rnam rtog ni/_/thog ma bar mtha' bar dang mtha'/_/bar dang thog ma thog mtha' kun/_/kun du
[\[334b.4\]]dbye ba las gyes pa/_/de dag dbye ba shin tu mang /_/de la bya sla bya dka' yang /_/'ga' zhig dag ni bstan par bya/_/grogs mo mdza' bo'i skye bo la/_/khengs pa 'di dang 'grogs ma byed/_/bslus pa'i mgrin pa nas 'khyud la/_/de nyid ngo tsha ldan par gyis/_/ngang pa rnams kyi dregs 'joms pa/_/_
[\[334b.5\]]sprin gyi sgra yis myos byed ni/_/dga' ma dang bcas bud med kyi/_/khengs bral yid la 'jug par byed/_/chu gter bzhi yi ske rags can/_/sa yi lag dpya 'dzin la mkhas/_/khyod nyid thob nas da lta ni/_/skye dgu rgyal po bzang ldan gyur/_/rkang thang shing rta glang po dang /_/rta dang bral ba khyod kyi dgra/_/_
[\[334b.6\]]'ga' zhig nags dang gzhan dag ni/_/lha rnams dag gi gnas su song /_/chu skyes gdong ldan mig gnyis kyi/_/rnam 'phrul yid 'ong 'di la ni/_/dpyid kyi bung ba'i rnam 'phrul gyis/_/co 'dri byed pa ci yin smros/_/'dod pa g.yul du dpa' bo yi/_/glang po'ang bzung dka' rta med kyis/_/_
[\[334b.7\]]gang phyir bdag cag mthar byas pa/_/de phyir khyod kyi rnam gnon mtshar/_/g.yul du rno bas mdzes pa yi/_/mi bdag khyod 'dra nor 'dzin ni/_/rgyal bar gyur te nor 'dzin gyis/_/tshim pa dag kyang thob par gyur/_/sa hA kA ra'i me tog gsar/_/bdag yid mchog tu sred ldan byed/_/khu byug myos
[\[335a\]]
[\[335a.1\]]pa dag gi sgra/_/yid du 'ong ba 'dis kyang ngo /_/khyod la dmigs pa'i re ba dang /_/ma bral 'di la de 'dra yi/_/gnas skabs lus ni 'jig byed pas/_/bud med 'dzeg nus ji ltar min/_/yal 'dab gsar pas mdzes pa yi/_/ljon pas drangs pa'i gzhon nu rnams/_/pad+mar mngon
[\[335a.2\]]phyogs bung ba yis/_/mig nas bzung ste 'gugs par byed/_/myos pa'i bzhad ni rab 'jug pa/_/rdzing gi chu la dkar ba yi/_/ngang pa 'di yi ca co yis/_/bdag ni mthar byed zas su byed/_/dri bral zla ba'i cha dag dang /_/lhan cig ma la ya yi rlung /_/bdag dga' mi byed 'dod pa ni/_/mi bzad
[\[335a.3\]]dug gi rjes su 'gro/_/bdag bstan mi 'dod khengs pa can/_/do shal dang ldan 'phrog byed ma/_/lus med nyid kyi dngos po khyod/_/phra 'gyur bdag 'grogs bde rgyas mdzod/_/khyod kyi gdong gis bdag las rgyal/_/chu yi rgyun gyur bung ba can/_/'dab ldan pad+ma gtam med las/_/ji ltar mi
[\[335a.4\]]rgyal bdag dga' ma/_/nyi ma'i 'od kyis dmar gyur pa'i/_/chu lha mo bzhin pA Ta la/_/dmar ba'i gos can dri bzang gnas/_/bdag gi dga' ma dga' bar bya/_/de ltar rkang pa'i thog ma yi/_/zung ldan bar chod med rnam rtog_/de ni bar du chod pa yi/_/rnam rtog 'ga' yang bstan par bya/_/sa
[\[335a.5\]]hA kA ra las 'khrungs nyid/_/yid 'ong dri bzang ldan pa yi/_/dpyid kyi e Na'i mig can gyi/_/khengs pa sgra yi lhag mar byed/_/dga' ma'i lag pa shin tu dmar/_/rgyud mangs la bsnun rnam 'phrul la/_/phrag dog ldan par mdza' bo la'ang /_/rna ba'i ut+pal gyis snun byed/_/rlung gis gar
[\[335a.6\]]bsgyur sprin gyi phreng /_/mtha' dag chu ni 'thor bar byed/_/de rjes mjug ma rab bslangs pa'i bye/_/mjug sgro ldan pa gar dag byed/_/'dod ldan ma dag khyod kyi yid/_/khengs rtsod rang nyid nyams 'gyur te/_/nI pa'i kA li kA mthong nas/_/gnas skabs ci la reg gyur tam/_/rtse dga'i ri yi zla
[\[335a.7\]]shel gyi/_/thang 'di la ni rab 'dzegs nas/_/mdongs mtha' mchog tu mdzes pa yi/_/gtsug phud can 'di gar byed do/_/gang zhig sbrul mchog steng gnas shing /_/phag pas bzung ba'i sa 'di ni/_/rgyal po'i tshogs las rab blangs nas/_/da lta khyod kyi lag pas bzung /_/g.yul du
[\[335b\]]
[\[335b.1\]]dgra yi glang po rnams/_/khyod kyi lag pa mthar byed kyis/_/bsnun pas khrag ni rab zags pa/_/thun mtshams dag gi sprin bzhin mdzes/_/rlung gis ri yi 'khri shing bzhin/_/gzhan gyi sde ni dpa' bas bcom/_/mtha' ni gshed song ba bzhin/_/rdul gyis nam mkha' khyab par gyur/_/_
[\[335b.2\]]legs ldan chu 'dzin gsar pa'i 'od/_/lha min dag gi rigs nyams byed/_/sbyin ldan glang po mchog bcom pa/_/khyab 'jug des khyod rtag tu srungs/_/khyod kyi mag skra bung ba 'dra/_/gdong ni pad+mar phrag dog byed/_/dpal gyi bzhin du rab myos pa/_/khyod kyis su zhig rtsi mi byed/_/rgya che rin chen rgyan dang
[\[335b.3\]]ldan/_/rgyags pas mig 'khor dza g+ha na/_/chung ba min pas mdza' bo ni/_/dga' ba ldan pa bya bar bzod/_/gzhan gsos rnams kyis bsgrags pa dang /_/khyod kyis brjod pa'i sgra dang ni/_/lho yi phyogs kyi rlung gis kyang /_/bdag yid 'phrogs so pho nya mo/_/rked pa phra zhing rdul zags pas/_/_
[\[335b.4\]]gdong gi zla ba rab mdzes pa/_/bud med chang gis ngo tsha bcom/_/skyes pa'i lus la 'dzeg par byed/_/de ltar bar chod zung ldan gyi/_/rab tu dbye ba 'di yang bstan/_/bar chod mchod bdag nyid kyi/_/rnam rtog kyang yod 'di lta ste/_/kA li ka 'phyang yal ga can/_/sA la blta bar des mi nus/_/ba ku lar
[\[335b.5\]]chags bung ba dang /_/grogs mos pad+ma can yang min/_/sprin nag chen po ldan pa'i dus/_/snang dang rgyu skar kun mi mtshon/_/gsang mthor dga' ba sgrog byed pa'i/_/dus 'dra su yis lta bar nus/_/thun gsum dbang gyur ring ba yi/_/mtshan mo 'di yis bdag shi zhig_/gang la bdag song srog gzir 'gro/_/_
[\[335b.6\]]de ni blo med bdag gis bcom/_/zhes rkang dang po zung ldan gyi/_/rnam rtog lugs ni 'di 'dra ste/_/'di lta kho nar zung ldan gyi/_/rnam rtog gzhan pa rnams kyang ngo /_/spros pas 'jig phyir dbye ba ni/_/mtha' dag brjod par mi 'dod de/_/de la bya dka' mngon 'dod gang /_/'ga' zhig dag ni bstan par bya/_/_
[\[335b.7\]]brtan dang dbang po rab bsdoms pa/_/khyod ni sdom brtson phyir mi nyams/_/sgyu med khyod kyi bde 'jig par/_/mi 'gyur 'di snyed ched du'ang 'gyur/_/rgyal po mdun sar sa yi lha rnams dag gi zhal/_/chang gis ma bcom nor gyis mdzes pas rab bstod pa'i/_/khyod kyi yon tan rab gsal chags bdag
[\[336a\]]
[\[336a.1\]]skye dgu la/_/phung po nyid gyur lha rnams su ni mi 'gro min/_/dam pa'i spyod lam bag med khyod kyi dga' ma gang /_/dga' ba'i dga' ston dga' ba'i khyad par du myos ma/_/de yis 'dir ni 'od ldan rgyan rnams gzung bar 'os/_/bdag la mdzes ldan nyid kyi 'bras bu 'ga' yang
[\[336a.2\]]med/_/mgon po khyod ltas dud pa'i ro ni mi mkhyen te/_/dman pa nyid dang mchog nyid dag ni nges par 'gal/_/gang zhig dman pa rnams ni khyod la mgos 'dud cing /_/de dag kho na dman pa'i ro des mchog tu gyur/_/rol pa'i 'dzum dkar dag dang 'jam por smra ba dang /_/chung ngu'i lta ba dang ni
[\[336a.3\]]lci ba'i 'gro ba dang /_/kun du glal dang dza g+ha na dag ston pa des/_/bsnun pa des na bdag ni 'tsho bas dman par gyur/_/dpal ldan mi shod brtan ldan gang gi bdag nyid ni/_/'chi med lam dang mnyam pa'i tshad ldan rab dud pa'i/_/'gro ba rgyas byed mchod ldan tshad med ming can ni/_/'jal byed
[\[336a.4\]]tshad med mang po bkod la phyag dag mdzod/_/bcud la zhugs te brang gis dga' byed cing /_/snying por gyur pa'i bcud mang rab tu 'dzin/_/bzhad kyi rjes mtshungs sgra ldan dril chung can/_/des na bcud len snying po min pa rig_/brtan rgyas tshul dang tshul min brtag pa 'di yis ni/_/tshul med dge ba'i
[\[336a.5\]]thabs la long rnams rnam par thul/_/bzhon pas ma 'gro rgyal ba'i theg 'gro dag gis gang /_/tshul ma thob rnams thob pa dag la brten pa bskyed/_/mtshungs med lci ba'i mtshon ldan g.yul du sa skyes ni/_/rgyal mtshan la gnas dpa' bo bya yi sgra yis bros/_/nyi ma bzhin du drag po'i 'phrog
[\[336a.6\]]byed 'di mdun du/_/'jigs rung g.yul du dgra rnams lugs dang mtshungs par rig_/mtshan mo tshad med thun ldan dpal med tshad med cing /_/mthar ni bgrod bya min pas zad nad la brten pa/_/cha yi rang bzhin nad can 'bral ba'i nad kyis gzir/_/skal ldan ma 'di snying rje'i rang bzhin 'bral med
[\[336a.7\]]mdzod/_/ngal med khyod kyi blo la mnyam nyid bzlog pa nyid/_/ma yin bla med rjes su mi mthun 'gro ma yin/_/gdung med kyis thob mchog gi rjes su mthun pa nyid/_/dga' med 'dod med rnams kyi bzhed pa dag las rgyal/_/dus kyi dus kyi mgrin nag ngo nag nag po nyid dag 'dzin/_/snyan
[\[336b\]]
[\[336b.1\]]sgrog dag gi sgrog byed bung tshogs sprin nag dus ltar gnag_/dus kyi mi pa zung dus cha'i gtso bo chu 'dzin gyis mdzes su/_/dka' bas 'tsho ba'i bud med len bu'i phreng bas mgo nag bsten/_/rkang pa gnyis kyi mtha' thog ni/_/rab sbyar zung ldan gnas skabs 'di/_/brjod pa'i khongs su 'du
[\[336b.2\]]mod kyang /_/rang dbang nyid kyis 'dir bshad do/_/myos pas chags pa nye bar gnas kyang bud med des/_/bdag nyid ma sbyar bdag gi sdig pas khro ba yi/_/ro dang sbyar te lus med dag gis gdungs gyur kyang /_/bdag ni 'di snyed gdung ba'i slad du ma bsdad do/_/phyed bzlas yang dag sbyar ba yin/_/_
[\[336b.3\]]'di la dbye ba gsum du 'dod/_/rkang pa bzlas pa'ang du ma yi/_/bdag nyid de dag dpes gsal bya/_/skyes bu brtan gang snying stobs can/_/khengs pa rab spangs spang bya ste/_/khyod kyis mchog tu 'bad pa yis/_/yid brten bya'o 'bad med ma/_/khyod kyi bgrod pa khyab bdag gzi byin gyis/_/yang
[\[336b.4\]]yang rab sbyar mdzes pa med pa yi/_/mi rnams tshul dang nga rgyal nyams byas nas/_/gdungs shing kye ma byas zos rnam par bcom/_/sgra yis sprin bgrod dbyar skyes rma bya yi/_/tshogs rnams mdzes pa nyid du nye bar 'gyur/_/rlung gi tshogs stug bral ba chur sgrogs kyang /_/tshogs rnams sgra dang bral ba
[\[336b.5\]]nyid du gyur/_/'tsho ba'i dbang phyug dud pa'i brang la kho mo ni/_/dman zhing khengs pa nges par bsgrub pa'i dbang gyur ma/_/brtse ba spang ba'i bdag nyid yid kyi 'o ma 'dzin/_/gnyis po nye bar gtad nas kun du ma 'khyud do/_/lha rnams 'dun sar stobs med rnam par brgyan pa ru/_/khyod kyi yon tan pad rtsa
[\[336b.6\]]dri ma med pas 'dzegs/_/de ni phyi nas grong bzang rnams kyis phun sum tshogs/_/brgyan pa'i bud med dag dang rnam par rtse zhing spyod/_/snyan par smra dang lus rked dud dang nu gnyis mas/_/khyod las gzhan pa su zhig ma bcom de yi phyir/_/'byung po lus ldan skyon las grol ba khyod la sogs/_/bgrang
[\[336b.7\]]ba la ni ming med nye bar 'gro ma yin/_/khyod kyi dmag dpung khyab 'jug lta bu go bgos pa/_/mtshon rnon ldan pa dpa' bo dag gis phyogs rnams su/_/grags pa dang ni rdul dag rgyas byed g.yul gyi ni/_/dgra rigs lus bral gzi med rgyags pa nyams par byed/_/dran ldan bdag las phan pa'i
[\[337a\]]
[\[337a.1\]]tshig gcig mnyan par mdzod/_/khyod kyi lag pa dpal dang lhan cig lag 'gro yis/_/sa yi dkyil 'khor rnam 'dzin de phyir sa gzhi 'dzin/_/rang lag rig nas rgyags par rgyas pa yod mi byed/_/'dod pa'i me gang khengs pas rab bsgrubs pa/_/skad cig dang mnyam rgyas
[\[337a.2\]]te pad+ma'i mig_/ro med khyod kyi bde ba de dag ni/_/kun nas nyams pa nyid du cis mi byed/_/mdud khyod ni 'jig rten bdag gyur tshe/_/mthu yis mthu ldan rin chen mang gis btud/_/de phyir gsar ba'i btung ldan mchod sbyin ni/_/nges pa nyid du chad par ma gyur to/_/dpung gi glang po rnams ni gzhan dang
[\[337a.3\]]gzhan/_/stobs ldan sgra sgrogs rab tu brgyud pa yis/_/thang la rdul sgrub nam mkha' 'gog byed cing /_/g.yul gyi stobs ldan mchog tu gzhan la rgyug_/khyod ltar mnyam par ma bzhag srid par ni/_/rnam gnyis mi mnyam phan pa med rnams tshig_/log par gyur pa sgrub byed mi mnyam pa/_/_
[\[337a.4\]]sbrul bgrod mtshungs la mi dad ngo tsha med/_/dgra yi mdzes nyams rgyal po'i sde yis btud/_/skyes mchog u mas phan rje dpal med min/_/go bgos u mas btud pa mda' 'dra ste/_/mchod thob dam pa rdul med mi mdzes min/_/de ltar rkang pa lan cig dang /_/gnyis dang gsum dang bzlas pa
[\[337a.5\]]bstan/_/tshigs bcad gnyis dang ldan pa'i don/_/tshigs bcad bzlas pa yin te dper/_/zlum zhing rgyas pa'i lag pa can/_/grogs min rab tu 'joms byed pa/_/rnam 'dren khyod kyis bstan pa'i sa/_/mi mtshungs pa 'di 'jigs pa med/_/'dren pa dag dang bral gyur cing /_/lag pa sreg khang
[\[337a.6\]]nye gyur pa/_/rang grogs kyis btang dgra yis ni/_/mtshungs med ba 'di mngon par bsten/_/rkang bzhi rnam pa gcig pa gang /_/zung ldan chen por brjod pa yin/_/de la'ang bzlas pa mthong ste de/_/zung ldan bya ba gzhan yin no/_/mnyam med dpal ldan mtshungs med ma/_/khengs ldan ngal ba dag dang
[\[337a.7\]]ni/_/khengs pa mnyam ldan tshul min dag_/dor ba'i tshad 'dis 'grogs su chug_/'dzin ma 'dzin ma'i rnam 'dzin 'dzin ma spyod rnams kyi/_/lag pa rnam gnon mi dman 'phral la dgra 'joms pa/_/myur ba dang ldan mchod pa'i khur ni brten pa yis/_/sa gzhi dag ni rim pas bsrung bar
[\[337b\]]
[\[337b.1\]]bzod pa yin/_/rkang phyed tshigs bcad spyod yul can/_/lugs las bzlog pas bskor ba ni/_/zung ldan lugs las bzlog pa'i phyir/_/lugs las bzlog pa zhes pa bshad/_/gang la 'bad byas phra mo nyid/_/de ni bdag gis thob mdza' bo/_/re 'dod med pas byed med lha/_/bstod nas 'ongs
[\[337b.2\]]khyod 'gro gyur cig_/nA da ldan bdag rang gi blo/_/myos min 'dod pa 'ga' yang med/_/dul ba 'joms pa'i 'dod pa yis/_/rang dbang gdung ba dag kyang med/_/yid 'gro bdud skyong lcags mi dman/_/gang zhig dbang gyur skye bo 'joms/_/gang la bdag song skye bo brgya'i/_/dbang gyur de la byon zhes
[\[337b.3\]]smras/_/ston 'di yis ni gzir gyur cing /_/brten mi shes pa de yis ni/_/nyin mo'i nad dag ma thob min/_/mya ngan bral slad khengs ma byed/_/gal te phyed kyi yi ge rnams/_/gcig gis bar chod gzugs gcig nyid/_/de ni bya dka'i de nyid rig_/ba lang gcin zhes smras te dper/_/chang 'dra'i
[\[337b.4\]]mig ldan zur mig gi/_/mtshon gyis 'dod pa 'di rgyal te/_/gal te bdag kyang sdig zad na/_/'dod pa la ni thal mo sbyor/_/gal te tshigs bcad phyed 'khor na/_/phyed du 'khor ba zhes par brjod/_/gal te kun du 'khor ba na/_/kun du bzang po zhes par 'dod/_/ma dud yid 'byung khyod dar phyir/_/_
[\[337b.5\]]sde ni khangs ldan ma yin min/_/yang na 'jigs las dpag med na/_/bdag cag sdig pa'i rang bzhin no/_/zla dang nad ring cis min gang /_/dga' ma bdud kyi rgyar ma lhung /_/bgrod bzlog sgra med dpal med ma/_/stobs ldan sgyu gnas 'chi slad du'o/_/dbyangs dang gnas dang yi ge rnams/_/nges pa gang 'di
[\[337b.6\]]bya dka' la/_/bzhi la sogs pa rab bstan 'di/_/gzhan ni bya sla dag tu 'dod/_/rig byed rnam thar tshig smras pa'i/_/glu dang dga' ba yams nad 'jigs/_/longs spyod nad dang dga' dang rmongs/_/dge ba'i yul du sems 'dod zung /_/sa las rnam rgyal brtan pa sgrub byed pa'i/_/brtul zhugs la dga'
[\[337b.7\]]mchog rtogs ku ru pas/_/g.yul du rang gi rigs kyi dgra rnams ni/_/che bar bkag cing lci bar 'dar bar byas/_/dpal gzi ngo tsha grags dang /_/blo lugs tshig dang dga' dag_/khyod la 'phel ba nyid gang /_/'di gnyis lha dbang la med/_/zla dang nad ring cis min gang /_/dga' ma bdud kyi rgyar ma lhung /_/_
[\[338a\]]
[\[338a.1\]]bgrod bzlog sgra med dpal med ma/_/stobs ldan sgyu gnas 'chi slad du'o/_/'dren byed kun dga'i skyed byed ma/_/rgyu skar tshogs rnams dag gi gnas/_/sprin med mkha' la lus can ma/_/lan cig mig gnyis sbyin pa mdzod/_/nu sdug khyod gdong len bu yi/_/'khri shing bung ba ltar sngo zhing /_/_
[\[338a.2\]]'dren byed pad+ma'i gzugs brnyan can/_/zla ltar mdzes pas su ma bcom/_/rtag tu sdig med kun dga' mchog_/lus dud dag dang 'grogs la chags/_/btsun mo lus med kyis 'gongs te/_/'jigs pa du mas reg par 'gyur/_/ha ha mi sgrogs mkha' 'gros mtshan/_/ri 'gro dbang 'khyog ldan mi
[\[338a.3\]]chags/_/'khyog sgrogs gang+gA'i chur 'jug sdig_/bya rog 'joms pa mtho ris 'gro/_/kyai kyai sgra sgrogs ru ru'i brang /_/'joms sdig pa ri ri char 'gro/_/nga can ma 'ong bdag gi ma/_/bya rog rma bya'i sgra bsgyur ci/_/lha rnams dga' bar byed pa'i lha/_/rig byed la smod 'gog pa pos/_/lha min dga' byed
[\[338a.4\]]bcom pa na/_/sgra yis mtho ris gang bar gyur/_/mkhas pa lha dang lha min la/_/'gro stobs ldan pa'i byin legs can/_/chang gi ro ldan gshol 'dzin de/_/bzhad kyi sgra ldan mtsho ru song /_/'di yis bdag cag rnams kyi bzhin/_/bzhin gyis nges par ma bcom min/_/bdag srog mi dman 'di dang sbyor/_/_
[\[338a.5\]]rje bo skyes min sdig med min/_/de ltar bya dka'i lam la yang /_/rim pa cung zad kun du bstan/_/gab tshig dag gi rnam pa yi/_/lugs kyang rab tu bstan par bya/_/rtsed mo'i 'dun sar bzhad gad dang /_/de shes tshogs su gsang smre dang /_/pha rol kun du rmongs byed la/_/gab tshig dag ni nyer mkho ldan/_/tshig mtshams
[\[338a.6\]]sbyar bas don sbas pa/_/kun du tshogs pa zhes par brjod/_/gzhan la grags pa'i sgra dag gis/_/gang du slu ba slu byed nyid/_/sbyor ba shin tu 'khrugs pa yis/_/rmongs byed rim pa bral ba ste/_/gang la don rtogs dka' ba yi/_/tshig phreng de ni rab bcom yin/_/phal ba'i don bkod tshig dag gis/_/_
[\[338a.7\]]bsdebs pa dag ni mthun pa'i gzugs/_/mtshan nyid yod tsam nges tshig dang /_/bden pa'i tshig ni rtsub mo'o/_/gang du grangs kyis kun rmongs par/_/byed pa grangs nyid ces bya ste/_/gang du ngag don rnam pa gzhan/_/snang ba de ni rab brtags nyid/_/gang du ming la sna tshogs don/_/btags de ming du
[\[338b\]]
[\[338b.1\]]'dus pa nyid/_/tshig ni chos mtshungs la reg pas/_/don gzhan bsgrib pa bsgrib pa'o/_/sgra yi rnam grangs bkod pa yis/_/bsgrub pa dag ni mthun pa'i sgra/_/gang zhig mngon sum don bstan yang /_/rmongs phyir de ni rmongs zhes bya/_/gang la sbyor phreng bdag nyid can/_/de ni yongs su 'phrog ces bya/_
[\[338b.2\]]gang du rten ni gsal byed de/_/brten pa sbas pa gcig bsgrib pa'o/_/gang du gnyis ka sbas gyur pa/_/de ni gnyis ka bsgrib pa'o/_/gang la mtshan nyid sna tshogs 'dres/_/de ni yongs su 'dres zhes bya/_/'di rnams gab tshig bcu drug ste/_/sngon gyi slob dpon rnams kyis bstan/_/gab tshig ngan pa gzhan
[\[338b.3\]]dag kyang /_/bcu bzhi de dag rnams kyis brjod/_/ngan pa mtshan nyid med gang de/_/skyon gyis yongs bgrang bya min par/_/rig nas slar yang bdag cag gis/_/legs pa kho na brjod par bya/_/mA yAHgo ra sems kyis ni/_/shes pa med la ci slad khro/_/gnas min du ba 'di yis ni/_/ci byed kun du
[\[338b.4\]]mig dmar ma/_/kub+dza bstan pa khyod kyi ni/_/dga' ba ji ltar 'phel gyur pa/_/'chi med bu mor co 'dri la/_/mi mo sbyad pas de lta min/_/yu bar 'o byed pad can gyi/_/ngang pa tsher ma rtsub mo can/_/zhal la sgra snyan sgrogs byed cing /_/lus ni 'dar bar byed cing mchus/_/bu mo khyod kyi rkang mdzes la/_/rkang
[\[338b.5\]]gdub rgyas pa sgra snyan sgrogs/_/mngon sum nyid du gyur pa 'dir/_/bdag gi srog ni brtan ma yin/_/gang gi yal ga yal 'dab la/_/me tog dmar po'i dog pa can/_/'khri shing yal 'dab lnga pa ni/_/skyed mos tshal 'dir bdag gis mthong /_/lha rnams lha yi khang pa ru/_/so so'i 'od kyis dul
[\[338b.6\]]bur rgyu/_/dri bzang rdzing bur myos byas pa/_/de rnams da ni rgan mo bzhin/_/sna ldan dbus na gsal byed bzhis/_/yongs su rnam par brgyan pa yi/_/grong khyer 'ga' yod gang zhig na/_/mi bdag mi brgyad ming can yod/_/chig rnams rab tu 'khrugs pa dang /_/mgo bo dud cing mig dman pa/_/'dug
[\[338b.7\]]kyang 'dar ldan bdag la ni/_/rgan mo rjes su mi brtse'am/_/mig mi brtan ma sa ldan 'ga'/_/dang po rA dza zhes par sgrogs/_/sa nA ta na yang ste 'di/_/rgyal po ma yin khyab 'jug min/_/rdzas bral mi ni btang byas nas/_/nor ldan rnams can bgrod pa gang /_/sna tshogs skyogs brgyas 'jig rten 'gugs/_/_
[\[339a\]]
[\[339a.1\]]gzung dka' smad 'tshong ma yin no/_/khyod kyi sa min ming mthun gang /_/rab gyur skra ming can las rgyal/_/de yis ding bdag mchog tu ni/_/sred ldan byed do snyan sgrogs ma/_/'dod ldan dag ni mal stan la/_/khro bas phyir bzlog nyal bar 'gyur/_/chags pas de bzhin nyid nyal te/_/_
[\[339a.2\]]dal bu yis ni kha dag sbyor/_/bya rgyal zas skyes dgra yis ni/_/bla ma'i 'od kyis bcom skye'o/_/kha 'joms grogs min 'dzin pa yis/_/khyab pa'i mkha' la mngon par dga'/_/nam yang mtshon dang bud med kyi/_/nu ma'i dkyil 'khor la ma reg_/mi ma yin pa 'ga' zhig ni/_/lag ni 'bras med yin no
[\[339a.3\]]lo/_/su zhig gang dang 'gogs pa yis/_/bya ba thams cad nye bar ni/_/thob cing zas kyi dus dag tu/_/gal te mthong na 'dor bar byed/_/ha ya ga dza b+ha Ta can/_/sde 'di gal te ma rgyal na/_/mA tri ka med nged kyi bu/_/'di ni yi ge shes kyang blun/_/de ni ming du 'dus par bsres/_/bslus pa yi ni gzugs dang
[\[339a.4\]]ldan/_/de bzhin nyid du gzhan gyi yang /_/'dres pa'i rim pa shes par bya/_/don nyams don 'gal don gcig pa/_/the tshom can dang rim pa nyams/_/sgra nyams gcod mtshams nyams pa dang /_/sdeb sbyor nyams dang mtshams sbyor bral/_/yul dus sgyu rtsal 'jig rten dang /_/lung rigs dag
[\[339a.5\]]dang 'gal ba ste/_/skyon bcu de dag snyan ngag la/_/snyan ngag mkhan gyis spang bar bya/_/dam bca' gtan tshigs dpe nyams pa/_/zhes pa 'di yang skyon min nam/_/phal cher dpyad par dka' ba nyid/_/sbyor ba de yi 'bras bu ci/_/tshogs pa'i don gyis stong pa gang /_/de ni don nyams zhes par 'dod/_/_
[\[339a.6\]]myos pa smyon pa byis pa yi/_/brjod las gzhan du de skyon no/_/'di ni rgya mtsho 'thung byed de/_/bdag ni de ring rgas pas gzir/_/sprin 'di rab tu sgrogs byed de/_/'phrog byed sa srung dag la dga'/_/'di sems rnal du mi gnas pa'i/_/mngon par brjod la smad min te/_/gzhan du de lta bu la sogs/_/snyan
[\[339a.7\]]ngag mkhan po su zhig sbyor/_/ngag gcig gis ni rab sbyar ba/_/snga ma phyi ma gzhan 'joms pa/_/'gal ba'i don can nyid kyi skyon/_/don 'gal zhes par rab tu brjod/_/dgra rigs mtha' dag 'joms pa dang /_/sna tshogs khur ni rgyal gyur cig_/'byung po kun la brtse ba can/_/khyod la dgra ni su yang med/_/_
[\[339b\]]
[\[339b.1\]]mngon par chags ldan sems la ni/_/skabs de 'ga' zhig yod pas na/_/gang la 'gal ba'i don can gyi/_/tshig kyang mngon par 'dod par 'gyur/_/gzhan gyi bud med la sred pa/_/'phags pa dag gis ga la rigs/_/de yi so sgrib g.yo ba dag_/bdag ni nam zhig 'thung 'gyur ram/_/don nyid dam
[\[339b.2\]]ni sgra la yang /_/khyad par med par sngar brjod pa/_/gal te slar yang rab bsgrags pa/_/de ni don gcig par 'dod dper/_/sred pa sred byed bu mo rnams/_/de yi len bu'i 'od zer can/_/chu 'dzin glog dang ldan pa dang /_/zab mo sgra sgrogs 'di dag go/_/rjes su brtse sogs khyad par las/_/gal te
[\[339b.3\]]'ga' zhig brjod 'dod na/_/yang brjod pa la skyon med de/_/'di ni rgyan du rigs pa yin/_/'dod pa skabs min 'khon pa yis/_/bud med mchog 'di bcom par gyur/_/yan lag kun mdzes bcom par gyur/_/'jam par sgrog ma bcom par gyur/_/nges pa'i don du rab sbyar ba'i/_/tshig rnams nyid
[\[339b.4\]]kyis gal te na/_/the tshom skyed par byed na 'di/_/the tshom can zhes rab tu brjod/_/re 'dod dga' ba lta ba yi/_/ro la mig g.yo grogs mo dag_/rgyang na 'dug pa'i ma ma 'dis/_/'di 'dra blta bar bzod ma yin/_/'di 'dra the tshom slad nyid du/_/gal te 'ga' zhig tu sbyar na/_/'di ni rgyan nyid du 'gyur gyi/_/_
[\[339b.5\]]de la skyon med 'di lta ste/_/ma smad de ni lus skyes kyi/_/'jigs pas gzir zhing rtsub mo yi/_/dus nyid kyis ni bzung ba mthong /_/bdag cag khyod la re ba ci skye/_/'dod pas gzir ram tsha bas gdungs/_/zhes pa nges med byed pa'i tshig_/rtsed 'jos skyes pa 'khrugs par ni/_/bya phyir pho nya mos smras so/_/_
[\[339b.6\]]mdor bstan rjes su yon tan don/_/gal te rjes bstan ma byas na/_/rim pa nyams par mngon brjod pa'i/_/skyon du de ni bshad de dper/_/'gro ba rnams kyi gnas pa dang /_/sprul dang 'jig rgyu ma skyes pa/_/bde 'byung sred med chu skyes kyi/_/skye gnas can gyis khyed rnams srungs/_/'brel pa nges par
[\[339b.7\]]shes pa'i rgyur/_/gang yang gal te 'bad byas na/_/rim pa bzlas kyang skyon min par/_/mkhas pa rnams ni smra ste dper/_/gnyen gtong ba dang lus gtong dang /_/yul gtong zhes pa gsum po la/_/dang po tha ma nyon mongs ring /_/bar pa skad cig gdung ba'o/_/mtshon bya mtshan nyid lam la mtshon/_/_
[\[340a\]]
[\[340a.1\]]tshig sbyor mchog min 'dod pa ni/_/sgra nyams yin te mchog rnams dag_/'dod pa nyid ni skyon ma yin/_/sa gzhi rgya mtsho'i ska rags can/_/rgyal chen khyod la dpung pas srungs/_/zhes pa shes 'dod med pas na/_/tshig 'di la ni nyams yod min/_/lho yi ri las nyer btud pa'i/_/_
[\[340a.2\]]rlung gis tsU ta'i rkang 'thung ni/_/yal 'dab rol par bskyod pa yis/_/myu gu mdzes dang ldan par byed/_/ces sogs bstan bcos bdag nyid che/_/lta la g.yel ba'i sems ldan pas/_/sgra nyams bzhin du snang mod kyi/_/skal bzang nam yang gtang ma yin/_/tshigs bcad rnams la nges pa'i gnas/_/_
[\[340a.3\]]tshig gi gcod mtshams ngal gsor rigs/_/de nyams gcod mtshams nyams pa ste/_/nyan po dga' min skyed de dper/_/bud med rnams kyis yang dag brjod pa'i cho ga ro nyams med la 'dir/_/mchog rnams dang 'grogs mi dbang nyi ma'i rigs 'dis lta byed la sogs skyon/_/bya dang bya min ma tshang
[\[340a.4\]]med la lung nyid kyis ni lta byed cing /_/mi bdag 'di yi dbang gyur sa 'dzin zhes pa de ltar sbyor ba yod/_/ji ltar tshig mtha' phyis pa la/_/lhag ma tshig nyid du nges pa/_/de bzhin mtshams sbyor rnam 'gyur mtha'/_/tshig nyid ces ni brjod pa yin/_/de lta na yang rna bar rtsub/_/snyan ngag mkhan rnams mi
[\[340a.5\]]sbyor te/_/rgyal po de yi rgyal mtshan gyi/_/tog gi chu 'dzin bskul zhes 'di'o/_/gang du yi ge chad lhag dang /_/lci yang ji lta bzhin mi gnas/_/de ni sdeb sbyor nyams pa ste/_/skyon 'di shin tu smad pa'o/_/zla ba'i 'od zer rab bsil bas/_/reg ces yi ge nyung ba nyid/_/sa hA kA ra'i lo 'dab gsar pa
[\[340a.6\]]rnams/_/snum zhes yi ge lhag pa'o/_/'dod pas mda' rnon ri dgas mig can la/_/rnam par 'phong zhes lci ba ji bzhin min/_/mdzes pa'i mig can dag la myos byed kyi/_/mda' rnon lhung zhes yang ba ji bzhin min/_/bsdus pa brjod par mi 'dod ces/_/tshig la mtshams sbyor med pa dang /_/ya phyis
[\[340a.7\]]la sogs rgyu med pa/_/de ni mtshams sbyor bral zhes bstan/_/mkha' dang bdag gi yid la yang /_/rlung ni dal bur rgyu ba yis/_/bud med 'gram pa'i dkyil 'khor la/_/rdul gyi chu rgyas sel bar byed/_/mtshan mo 'di la zhes 'di 'dra/_/mkhas pas nyams par rigs mi byed/_/ri nags yul 'khor
[\[340b\]]
[\[340b.1\]]la sogs yul/_/nyin mtshan dus drug la sogs dus/_/'dod pa'i don la bstan pa yi/_/gar dang glu sogs sgyu rtsal te/_/'byung ba rgyu dang mi rgyu ba'i/_/'jug pa 'jig rten ming can no/_/rigs pa gtan tshigs rigs bdag nyid/_/thos bcas gsungs pa lung nyid de/_/snyan ngag mkhan po
[\[340b.2\]]bag med las/_/de der ji ltar grags pa bzhin/_/min par gal te rab zhugs na/_/'di ni yul sogs 'ga' zhes brjod/_/ga bur rkang 'thung la reg pa'i/_/ma la ya rlung dri bzang can/_/ka ling ka yi nags skyes pa'i/_/glang po dag ni ri dgas rigs/_/tso la kA pa ri ngogs pa/_/a ka ru ni nag po sngo/_/_
[\[340b.3\]]zhes pa yul dang 'gal ba yi/_/tshig gi 'jug pa 'di 'dra ste/_/pad+ma can ni mtshan mo rgyas/_/nyin par ku mud ldan pa gsal/_/dbyid ni ni tsu la rab rgyas/_/sos ka dag ni sprin gyis gtibs/_/ngang pa'i sgra ni dbyar mnyan 'os/_/ston ni rma bya myos pa ste/_/dgun ston nyi ma dri ma med/_/dgun ni tsan+dan bsngags par 'os/_/_
[\[340b.4\]]zhes pa 'di 'dra dus dang ni/_/'gal ba'i lugs dag bstan pa yin/_/sgyu rtsal dag dang 'gal ba'i lam/_/cung zad bstan par bya ste dper/_/dpa' ba sgeg pa dag gi dngos/_/brtan pa khro dang ya mtshan no/_/dbyangs bdun rdzogs pa 'di dag ni/_/tha dad lam du rab tu 'jug_/'di ltar sgyu rtsal drug cu bzhir/_/'gal
[\[340b.5\]]ba legs par rtogs par bya/_/sgyu rtsal yongs su bcad pa las/_/de yi rang bzhin gsal bar 'gyur/_/glang po dag ni ral pa g.yo/_/rta yi rwa ni rno ba yin/_/e raN+Da ni snying pos lci/_/seng ldeng ljon pa snying po med/_/ces pa 'di ni 'jig rten pa/_/nyid dang 'gal ba kun gyis smad/_/rigs pa zhes bya gtan tshigs kyi/_/rig
[\[340b.6\]]pa dang 'gal bstan par bya/_/bde gshegs 'dus byas 'jig par ni/_/gsungs pa bden mod de lta na'ang /_/tsa ko ra yi mig can de/_/bdag gi snying la da dung gnas/_/ser skyas gnas la yod min nyid/_/rab tu skye bar nye bar brjod/_/med pa nyid ni bdag cag gis/_/rab tu skye bar mthong gang phyir/_/rigs pa
[\[340b.7\]]dag dang 'gal ba yi/_/lugs ni kun du bstan par bya/_/de nas lung dang 'gal ba yi/_/'jug pa dag ni bstan par bya/_/me ni bzhag pa ma yin yang /_/bu skyes bram ze ma nyams pa'i/_/spyod pas brgyan pa 'di dag ni/_/be+e shwa na ri mchod sbyin byed/_/'di ni cho ga ma byas kyang /_/bla ma dag las rig byed bklags/_/rang
[\[341a\]]
[\[341a.1\]]bzhin dag pa'i shel dag ni/_/'du byed gzhan la ltos pa med/_/skyon ni mtha' dag 'di la yang /_/res 'ga' snyan ngag mkhan mkhas pas/_/skyon gyi grangs las rab 'das nas/_/yon tan lam ni rnam par 'dzin/_/rgyal po de yi mthu yis ni/_/de yi skyed tshal lha rnams kyi/_/ljon pa yal
[\[341a.2\]]'dab gos dmar dang /_/ldan pa dag gi gnas su gyur/_/rgyal po 'jigs pa gsal byed pa/_/ka dam pa yi rdul dang 'grogs/_/'dab bdun las 'khrungs skyod byed cing /_/drag po yi ni rlung dag rgyu/_/khyogs kyis rab bskul skrag pa yi/_/skye bo bud med khas brjod glu/_/stabs mi mnyam pas 'dod ldan gyi/_/_
[\[341a.3\]]chags pa dag ni 'phel bar byed/_/zla ba'i 'od zer rab bsil bas/_/bsreg bya 'dzin pa 'dod ldan ni/_/bud med dang bral nyon mongs kyis/_/'khrugs pa 'di yis rtsi bar byed/_/gzhal bya yin yang gzhal bya min/_/cha ldan yin yang cha ldan min/_/gcig nyid yin yang gcig nyid min/_/sna tshogs
[\[341a.4\]]gzugs khyod la phyag 'tshal/_/skya bseng bu lnga dag gi ni/_/chung ma lnga len bu mo ste/_/dag pa rnams kyi mchog tu 'gyur/_/'di 'dra lha yi sgrub byed do/_/sgra don rgyan ni bkra ba dang /_/bya sla bya dka' dag gi lam/_/snyan ngag rnams kyi yon tan skyon/_/de ltar mdor bsdus rab tu bstan/_/sgrub byed bstan pa'i lam 'dis
[\[341a.5\]]skyon dang yon tan dag_/rab tu rtogs pa'i blo can skal bzang dbang gyur pa'i/_/tshig dang mngon par 'grogs byas chang mig ma dag dang /_/lang tsho can bzhin dga' dang grags pa thob par gyur/_/snyan ngag me long las le'u ste gsum pa'o//_//slob dpon dbyug pa can gyis mdzad pa'i snyan ngag me
[\[341a.6\]]long gi gzhung 'di phul du byung ba'i yon tan dpag tu med pas spras pa bla ma dam pa chos kyi rgyal po rin po che ba dang /_dpon chen shAkya bzang po'i bka' lung gis rgya gar gyi mkhan po snyan ngag mkhan chen po shrI la k+Sh+mI ka ra dang /_bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong shong ston gyis dpal sa skya'i gtsug lag khang chen por
[\[341a.7\]]bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/_de rjes dpang lo tsA ba blo gros brtan pas go dka' ba'i cha shas su gyur pa rnams dang don che ba rnams la 'gyur bcos bgyis pa la phyis snye thang blo brtan bzhi pas legs par 'gyur bcos bgyis pa lags so//_//_
[\[341b\]]
[\[341b.1\]{D4302}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_me g+ha dU ta nA ma/_bod skad du/_sprin gyi pho nya zhes bya ba/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gsung gi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rje bo khros pa'i shin tu lci ba'i bka' lung dag gis gzi brjid nyams par byas gyur cing /_/gnod sbyin 'ga' zhig la ni rang
[\[341b.2\]]nyid bag med dbang gyur mdzes ma spangs la lo yi bar/_/yid 'ong skyed byed bu mo'i khrus bya bsod nams che ba rnams dang shin tu rab mdzes pa'i/_/rab bzang ljon shing grib ma dang ldan dra ma'i dri bor song la spyod pas gnas par gyis/_/'dod ldan de ni mdzes ma spangs shing zla ba 'ga' yis ri bo der ni
[\[341b.3\]]phyin byas pas/_/lag pa phra bar gyur nas gser gyi gdu bu dag ni dpud pa'i bar du rgyu bar byed/_/chu stod zla ba rdzogs pa'i nyin la sprin rnams ri shod ri steng nyal bar gyur pa ni/_/mchog tu rol cing mdzes par gyur pa'i glang chen yin nam snyam du rtog cing mthong bar gyur/_/nor cing rgyal po'i rjes
[\[341b.4\]]'brangs de ltar gnas de mdun du ke ta'i me tog rgyas stobs kyis/_/nang du yid la rab tu gdung ba'i mchi ma yun ring dag tu ci yang byung gyur te/_/mgrin par 'khyud bya dga' ma ring na gnas par gyur pa'i skye bo'i sems la ni/_/chu 'dzin mthong na bde ldan yang ni rnam pa gzhan du gdung ba ci yang 'jug
[\[341b.5\]]par 'gyur/_/dbyar dus zla ba gnyis pa 'ongs par gyur tshe brtse ldan ma yi ched du srog chags ni/_/bde la char sprin dag gis rang nyid bde'am zhes pa'i tshig 'di khyer nas 'jug pa bzhin/_kun da'i zla yi chu skyes 'dzum pa rnams kyis de la mchod pa'i ched du dga' byed bzhin/_/mdza' ba mngon du gyur pa'i tshig
[\[341b.6\]]de legs par 'ongs sam dga' bzhin brjod pa bzhin/_/gang du du ba gzi ldan chu gter myur 'gro rnams kyi tshor ba las ni char sprin te/_/gang du mkhas pa'i byed pa rnams dang srog rnams kyis ni legs bshad ched du thob par byed/_/ces pa mchog tu dga' ba'i gsang ba pa ni de las yongs su mi shes gang gis
[\[341b.7\]]ni/_/'dod pa'i don du mkhas dang mi mkhas rnams dang sems ldan sems med rnams la zhu bar byed/_/khyod ni rigs mchog dang ldan mchod sbyin brgya pa'i blon po mchog ste 'dod 'jo'i ngo bo nyid/_/sa gsum mtha' dag rig cing bskal par 'jug pa'i che ba'i chu 'dzin nyid du bdag gis shes/_/des
[\[342a\]]
[\[342a.1\]]na khyod ni don gnyis nyid la skal ba'i dbang gis dman min 'dod pa thob pa nyid/_/mchod sbyin 'bras med bdag gi ring gnas gnyen 'dun dag tu yon tan mchog dbang khyod gshegs mdzod/_/ka ye chu ldan khyod ni shin tu gdungs gyur skabs nyid de phyir bdag gi dga' ba la/_/gtam gyi
[\[342a.2\]]bdag po ched cher khros pas 'khyams shing bral ba dag gi phrin ni mdzad du gsol/_/phyi rol skyed mos mchog gnas 'phrog byed gtsug gi zla ba'i 'od kyis snang byas khang bzangs can//gsang ba'i bdag po'i bsti gnas chen po lcang lo can zhes bya ba'i gnas su khyod gshegs mdzod/_/khyod ni dri yi bzhon
[\[342a.3\]]pa dang ldan mkha' lam gshegs pa'i dbang gis lam bgrod mdzes ma rnams/_/bsam pa dga' bar gyur te len bu'i rtse mo rgyab tu byas nas blta zhing gus par byed/_/khyod 'ongs tshon brel bas mchog tu nyen cing g.yog bzhin gzhan dbang gyur pa bdag 'dra dang /_/gang zhig gzhan yang mi yi skye bo su
[\[342a.4\]]zhig gus shing dga' ba rgya cher byed mi 'gyur/_/dal bu dal bus bskyod pa'i dri bzhon dag gis khyod la mdzes mthun zhabs tog byed pa bzhin/_/myos pa'i tsa ta ka 'di'ang khyod la snyan pa'i bstod pa'i bstod pa g.yon nas sgrogs pa dang /_/chu skyar mdzes ma rnams kyang skal bzang mig gis mkha' la khyod
[\[342a.5\]]mthong phreng bar byas nas brten/_/nges par mngal ni rab tu 'dzin pa yongs su gsal ba nyid du bya ba bzod par nus/_/bdag gis mdzes ma de yang nyin zhag grangs bzhin bdag po gcig pu yid la 'dri bar ni/_/gdon mi za bar myur du gshegs te bdag ni ma shi ba nyid khyod kyis bstan par mdzod/_/gang phyir
[\[342a.6\]]'phral la chu skyed phal cher phreng bas bcings pas ltung ba med par gyur pa bzhin/_/lha mo'i snying gi dga' ba bral las ltung ba phral la 'gog cing mdza' bas 'ching bar byed/_/gang zhig khyod kyi 'brug sgra sgrogs pa de ni skal bzang rna bas thos byas nas/_/mchog tu rgyas pa'i me tog dag gis sa
[\[342a.7\]]gzhi'i ched du gdugs dag byas par gyur pa nyid/_/khyod ni nam mkha' dag la gshegs tshe dga' ba'i yid kyis mtsho dang gangs can bar la ni/_/pad+ma'i rtsa ba lo ma'i lam rgyags ldan pa'i ngang pa'i rgyal po rnams kyang grogs su 'gyur/_rag+hu'i bdag po'i zhabs kyis mtshan pa'i ri ngos rnams la skye
[\[342b\]]
[\[342b.1\]]bo kun gyis phyag byed pa'i/_/che ba'i ri bo 'di ni khyod kyi dga' ba'i grogs bzang khyod lang 'khyud pa sngon 'gro ba'i/_/mdza' ba gsal byas yun ring 'bral las byung ba'i mchi ma'i dro ba'ang 'byung ba yongs mthong la/_/khyod dang gang de dus dus dag tu yang dag mjal 'gyur zhes ni byas nas khams
[\[342b.2\]]bde mdzod/_/kwa ye chu 'dzin re zhig khyod ni lam la bgrod pa'i thabs kyis gtam ni mnyan par mdzod/_/de yi rjes su bdag gi 'phrin ni rna ba'i bde ba skyed khyod rna bar gzung bar mdzod/_/shin tu ngal zhing rab tu ngal tshe ri bo'i rtse la rkang bkod ngal ba bsal nas gshegs/_/gang du skom shing shin tu skom
[\[342b.3\]]na nyung ngu'i chu dang che ba'i mtsho la'ang btung bar bya/_/ni tsu la ni gsar pas gnas 'di las ni khyod langs mkha' la byang du gdong phyogs mdzod/_/phyogs kyi glang po rnams kyi lag pa che bas bcings pa'i lam ni yongs su dor bar gyis/_/ri yi rtse mo phrogs nas dri bzhon 'gro ba'am chu 'dzin langs
[\[342b.4\]]nas 'gro ba'i ci zhes the tshom du/_/gyur nas grub pa'i bud med rnams kyis gyen phyogs bltas te 'jigs shing skrag pas rmongs par 'gyur/_/rin chen 'od kyis snang ba bzhin du rab mdzes mchod sbyin brgya pa'i gzhu yi dum bu ni/_/che ba'i grog mkhar rtse las byung ba de ni mdun du yang dag mthong bar
[\[342b.5\]]'gyur/_/khyab 'jug glang rdzi'i tshul bzung rma bya'i sgro yi 'od kyis khyab par gyur pa bzhin/_/khyod sku mchog tu mdzes pa mthing nag gang gis kun du khyab par byed pa thob par 'gyur/_/khyod 'ongs te na grong khyer na chung dga' zhing chags pa'i mig rnams kyis ni smin ma yi/_/rnam 'gyur mngon par mi
[\[342b.6\]]shes bzhin du blta zhing 'bru rnams kun ni 'phel bar byed pa'i phyir/_/khyod ni cung zad nub tu bskyod cing gnas bya 'phrin la smon gyi rol dga' ba yi/_/gnam chu sgug pa'i zhing la gru char rgyas bya slar yang byang du myur bar dal gyis gshegs/_/lam du yongs su ngal ba'i tshe na ngos ldan a sma brtsegs
[\[342b.7\]]pa'i ri rtser gnas bya ste/_/khyod kyi nags nang shing skam rnams ni char gyis brlan par byas bzhin legs par mdzod/_/gang phyir che ba'i skye bo dang por legs byas rgyu mtshan thob pa'i grogs bzang la/_/de lta'i bya bas gnas ched ci yang gyur la phyir phyogs ngan pa'i skye bo'ang 'gyur ma yin/_/kwa ye chu
[\[343a\]]
[\[343a.1\]]'dzin khyod ni lam la ngal tshe sna tshogs brtsegs pa zhes pa'i ri bo ni/_/ngos ldan rtse mo yangs la bsdad nas phan tshun mngon du phyogs pa'i bsnyun ni byed bzhin pas/_/khyod kyang de yi so ka'i ma ni bdud rtsis zhi byed de yang phan pa'i dngos bo'i rten du 'gyur/_/chen po rnams la phan
[\[343a.2\]]btags lan du 'phral la 'bras bu dam pas brlan pa nyid/_/khyod ni g.yo med rtse mor gnas tshe a mra'i nags kyi 'bras bu rgyas par smin pa ni/_/phyogs kun khyab par bkram pa dga' ma'i rnam mdzes len bu dag dang mtshungs pa bzhin du gyur/_/sa gzhi'i mdzes ma'i nu rgyas lhag ma dkar zhing thig le
[\[343a.3\]]sngon pos mdzes pa bzhin/_/'chi med khyo shug dag ni ya mtshan nges pa thob pa'i mig gis rab tu lta bar byed/_/de nas ri dgas pa dag po'i chung ma'i nags kyi khang pa de la yud tsam gnas byas nas/_/de yi pha rol chu las thon nas mchog tu myur bas lam gzhan dag tu gshegs shing bgrod pa na/_/_
[\[343a.4\]]drang srong bu mo'i chu bo 'bigs byed ri yi zhabs ni rtsub pa'i rdol 'og tu 'bab ldan ma/_/so gnyis yan lag mchog las dkar mo tshon gyis legs bris bzhin du khyod kyis mthong bar 'gyur/_/khyod kyis thog mar char pa sgyug bya de yi chu ni 'thungs nas bgrod par bya ste phyin nas ni/_/nags kyi glang po myos
[\[343a.5\]]pa'i tig ta'i ro dang 'dzam bu'i shing gi chu de'ang myur du 'gengs/_/kwa ye sprin stug khyod ni nang gi snying po ldan na dri bzhon dag gis g.yo mi nus/_/gang phyir thams cad stong na yang bar 'gyur zhing yongs su gang na kun kyang lji ba nyid/_/dang por kan+da li yi me tog kha 'bus rnams ni shun pas bsgribs pa byung ba dang /_/_
[\[343a.6\]]'dab ma ljang zhing ge sar dkar ser phye ldan brtan pa rnams kyi chu skyes me tog mthong nas kyang /_/'brog dgon rnams su mes bsregs sa gzhir dri 'dzin mnam bya dri bzang mang po byung ba na/_/chu 'dzin dal bus char bskrun khyod la sA rigs rnams ni ston par byed par 'gyur/_/khyod ni legs par 'ongs [(]che [,]tshe [) ]
[\[343a.7\]]snyan pa'i sgra bsgrags dus na grub pa rnams kyis mchod byed cing /_/tsU ta ka rnams chu yi thigs pa bzung nas dga' bas 'thung la lta bar byed bzhin dang /_/chu sgrogs rnams ni phring bar bsgrigs rnams yongs su bsgreng zhing ci zhes nges par lta bzhin dang /_/mchog tu 'dar byas dga' bas dga' ma la ni
[\[343b\]]
[\[343b.1\]]dam du 'khyud pa rnams ni byed pa yin/_/kwa ye grogs po khyod ni bdag gi dga' ba'i don la myur du 'gro snyam yod na yang /_/ka ku b+ha yi dri ldan ri bo ri bo rnams la yun ring thogs par bdag gis shes/_/gtsug phud can gyi 'dren byed chu dang bcas pas legs par 'ongs sam byas nas yun ring
[\[343b.2\]]gnas par 'dod/_/de slad khyod ni shin tu shin tu myur ba 'gro bar 'gyur ba dag kyang ji ltar yin/_/khyod 'ongs tshe na ngang pa rnams ni de nyid cung zad gnas nas 'gro zhing 'bras bu ni/_/yongs su smin pa ljang sngon dang ldan 'dzam bu'i nags kyis bskor dbus dkar po'i 'od ldan che ba yi/_/nags kyi 'khri shing ke
[\[343b.3\]]ta'i chu skyes ge sar gsal bar rgyas shing grong dang mchod rten gyis/_/bskor ba'i khang par gtor len tshang skyed rtsom pa'i grong khyer tam sha zhes pas mchod par 'gyur/_/de yi byang phyogs gzhi la bi di sha zhes mchod cha rgyal po'i khab tu myur song nas/_/der ni khyod kyis shin tu che ba'i 'bras bu thob mchog go
[\[343b.4\]]'phang 'phral la thob 'gyur zhing /_/che ba'i kha zheng dang ldan mtha' nas lhung lhung skad snyan sgrogs shing dang zhing bsil ldan pa/_/g.yo ba'i rlabs phreng gdong kha smin ma g.yo bzhin pa 'dra'i mtsho de'ang skal bzang khyod 'thung 'gyur/_/gang zhig ni tsa zhes grags ri bor khyod 'ongs thob las der ni ngal
[\[343b.5\]]bso'i ched du gnas/_/ka dam pa yi me tog dga' bas spu long rgyas shing ge sar 'dzum par byed pa bzhin/_/grong khyer rnams ni sman 'tshong ma rnams dga' bar byed pa'i dri bzangs dag gis gang ba rnams/_/rdo yi phrag phrug rnams kyi mchog tu mdzes pa'i lang tsho ma rnams smra ru 'jug pa bzhin/_/_
[\[343b.6\]]ngal sos gyur na bgrong bya gsar skyes rnams kyi me tog gsar pa'i dra ba mdzes pa rnams/_/chu bo chu ngogs skyes pa rnams ni chu thigs rnams kyis bran pa 'phral du 'ongs 'gyur zhing /_/chu skyes thog ma'i gdong gi 'gram pa'i rngul thigs ser la rna ba'i ut+pal ngal ba dang /_/rnyings gyur la ni nyid kyis
[\[343b.7\]]skad cig bde ba'i grib bsil yongs su gnang bar mdzod cig kye/_/yang ni byang gi phyogs su bgrod cing gang zhig khyed ni 'khyog po'i lam la zhugs pa'i tshe/_/grong khyer udz+dza ya na'i rgyal po'i pho brang nang du phyir phyogs min par gnas par mdzod/_/de na grong gi dga' ma rnams kyi rol sgeg zur mig glog gi
[\[344a\]]
[\[344a.1\]]thag pa g.yo ba ni/_/skyong byed mig gis gal te khyod ni ma mthong 'bras bu med cing bslus pa nyid du 'ang 'gyur/_/rlabs phreng g.yo ldan snyan par sgrogs shing 'dab chags phreng ba'i rked rgyan ska rags sil sil can/_/dal gyis dal gyis 'gro zhing lang ling mdzes pa'i skal bzang
[\[344a.2\]]'khor lo'i lte ba dang ldan pa/_/ro mchog dang ldan chu bo'i na chung bir bin+d+ha ni khyod ni lam na mngon bzhugs nas/_/dga' ma rnams kyis mdza' bo rnams la rol sgeg thog mar ston cing rked rgyan 'grol 'dra mthong /_/de rgal sin+d+hu'i chu ni len bu bzhin du lus ni rab tu phra bar gyur pa can/_/dgos su gyur
[\[344a.3\]]pa'i shing ni rnyings pa'i 'dab ma lhung ba rnams kyis khyab par bkram pas dkar/_/kwa ye skal bzang khyod dang bral bar gnas pas lus kyi gnas skabs 'di 'drar 'gyur/_/gang gi chung ma spangs nas che ba'i gnas skabs mdzad dam khyod mkhyen de ni rjod par byed/_/a wan+ta'i yul thog na u da ya na'i
[\[344a.4\]]gtam ni grong gi rgan mos shes pa yod/_/de rjes grong khyer sngar bstan khang pa yangs shing dpal dang phun tshogs che ldan yangs pa can/_/'dzam gling sa gzhir mtho ris mdzes ldan dum bu bsod nams lhag ma rnams kyi skabs gsum pa'i/_/legs bshad 'bras bur gyur pa nyung shas 'ga' zhig dag ni
[\[344a.5\]]phrogs nas 'ongs par gyur pa bzhin/_/gang du bzhad rnams myos pa'i gdangs snyan che bar sgrogs shing yid 'ong sgra ni gsal bar byed/_/nyi gzhon gyis rgyas chu skyes dri bzangs dga' skyed bska ba'i ro ldan yid du 'ong gyur cing /_/chu thigs kyis bran dri bzhon bud med chags gzir gdung ba phrog byed lus
[\[344a.6\]]kyi rjes mthun pa/_/bdag po mchog ni 'dod don gnyer bar byed la snyan par sgrogs shing dga' bar byed pa bzhin/_/de yi nor ldan khang pa rnams na len bu spos kyis bdugs pa'i dri bzangs dra ba nas/_/'thon pas khyod lus cher 'gyur khyim gyi gtsug phud can ni dga' bas gnyen mthong gar gyis ni/_/_
[\[344a.7\]]mchod 'bul chu skyes dri bzangs ldan pa bud med rol sgeg ldan pa'i rkang pa'i tshon rnams kyis/_/mtshan pa rnams kyi dbus su dub par gyur pa'i rang nyid sdug bsngal bsal bar bya/_/yang ni srid pa gsum gyi bla ma dpal mgrin gnas su bsod nams ldan khyod bgrod par bya/_/'khor tshogs chos kyis
[\[344b\]]
[\[344b.1\]]khyab bdag mgrin 'od mtshungs bzhin zhes gus dang bcas pas lta bar byed/_/yid 'ong dri ldan chu la lang tsho ma rnams rol sgeg khrus ni byed pa'i dri ldang zhing /_/ut+pal ge sar ldan pa'i dri rnams kyis bsgos rlung gi skyed tshal g.yo bar byed pa yod/_/kwa ye chu 'dzin nag po chen po'i gnas su bgrod nas
[\[344b.2\]]nyin zhag gzhan pa'i dus la yang /_/nyin mor byed pa 'dren byed yul du 'ongs par gyur gyi bar du khyod ni gnas par mdzod/_/rtse gsum can la thun mtshams la ni gtor ma rnga chen bsgrags shing bstod dbyangs byed pa bzhin/_/khyod kyis 'brug dbyangs bsgrags tshe ma tshang med pa'i 'bras bu thob pas
[\[344b.3\]]kun gyi don yang byed/_/de nas rkang pa bkod par gyur tshe 'og phag dag las sil sil snyan pa'i sgra 'byung zhing /_/rol sgeg g.yo ba'i rin chen 'od 'phros lus mdzes rnga yab 'dzin pas ngal ba'i lag pa can/_/tshogs kyi mdzes ma sen rjes gsar pas gdungs la khyod las char thigs thob na tshim
[\[344b.4\]]byed pa/_/khyod la sbrang rtsi byed pa'i phreng ba bzhin du g.yo ba'i zur mig ring ba dag gis blta bar 'gyur/_/phyugs bdag glang chen lpags rlon 'dod bzhin gyon nas gar ni rtsom pa 'phrogs par gyur pa bzhin/_/khyod 'ongs snga dro'i thun mtshams nyi gzhon dmar ba'i 'od kyis dmar ba'i chu skyes 'dzin byed
[\[344b.5\]]cing /_/rgyab nas mtho ba'i lag pa zlum po'i nags kyi shing chen dag gis brgyangs nas 'dzin cing gnas/_/zhi ba'i char rgyun 'bab tshe ri yi sras mos g.yo med mig gis gus pas lta bar byed/_/des na bdag po'i gnas su mchog gi btsun mo rnams ni rab dgas sgeg par byed pa na/_/mtshan
[\[344b.6\]]mo'i mun pa stug po rnams kyis mi yi bdag po'i lam gyi snang ba 'gog byed pas/_/khyod kyi glog 'od gser mtshungs 'od kyi snang bas sa gzhi'i lam ni kun nas bstan par mdzod/_/chu char 'brug dbyangs sgra chen mang po ma byed mdzes pa de rnams skrag cing 'chi bar 'gyur/_/de rnams kyis ni khang
[\[344b.7\]]bzangs phug nor nyal sa steng gi rgya phubs 'ga' zhig dag tu ni/_/yun ring 'ongs las dub pa'i rang gi dga' ma glog ma'i don du mtshan mo gnas byas nas/_/nyi ma mthong tshe khyod ni slar yang lhag ma'i lam dag shin tu mgyogs pas bgrod par bya/_/gang phyir snying grogs dag gi don du 'bad pa
[\[345a\]]
[\[345a.1\]]byas pa nges par bya ba byas pa nyid/_/de yi dus su nyin mor byed pas lam ni dor nas myur du 'gro bar bya/_/'od zer rab tu 'phro ba bsgrags na khro ba chung ba min pa khyod la byed par 'gyur/_/mtshan mo bdag po song ba'i bud med mig gi mchi ma sel la bdag po 'ong ba bzhin/_/pad+mo'i
[\[345a.2\]]yum gyi chu skyes gdong gi mig chu de yang rab tu sel ba byed par 'gyur/_/rab tu dang ba'i sems bzhin shin tu zab mo dang ldan mtsho yi chu yi nang du ni/_/khyod kyi gzugs brnyan yang ni rang bzhin skal ba bzang po bdag nyid 'char ba thob par 'gyur/_/de slad de yi ku mu ta ni dkar po rnams kyis khyod la
[\[345a.3\]]bkur sti bsnyen bkur byed/_/brtags pas don yod bya ba'i ched du g.yo ldan nya rnams gyen du 'phar zhing lta bar byed/_/de yi chu gos sngon pos chu yi dogs kyi tshing ra 'phrogs par byas nas spangs pa na/_/ma 'phrog ces ni shing chen yal ga'i lag pa dag gis dbus su cung zad 'dzin pa bzhin/_/kwa
[\[345a.4\]]ye grogs po chu 'thungs lto khengs lji nas lam du 'gro ba yang ni ji ltar yin/_/mdzes ma'i sgron ma mdzes pa'i bro ba shes na ji ltar 'dor ba'i nus pa yod pa yin/_/khyod ni de pa'i ri las nye bar 'gro tshe dal bu dal bu'i rlung ni ldang 'gyur zhing /_/bsil ba'i rlung gis bsgos pa'i u du m+WA ra'i nags kyi
[\[345a.5\]]'bras bu 'chang zhing rol rtsed byed/_/khyod kyis char chen phab pas nor 'dzin ma yi dri dang rlangs pa gtsang ma tshogs pa ni/_/so ldan rnams kyi sna yis rngub cing bu ga'i nang du skal bzang glu dbyangs sgrogs par byed/_/der ni skye mched nyi ma las lhag gzi ldan sreg zla las skyes son du phyogs pa can/_/_
[\[345a.6\]]gtsug na zla ba rin chen mang gi dmag tshogs bsrung pa'i don du bskos pa de ni gnas/_/khyod kyi mkha' yi gang+gA'i chu las sprin gyi me tog gsher ba mang po rnams kyis ni/_/me tog gru char bdag nyid phab pa rnams kyis gang zhig de ni khrus ni byed par 'gyur/_/gtsug phud ldan de chu 'thungs dga' bas
[\[345a.7\]]phyin nas ri gzung snyan pa'i sgra sgrogs gar dag byed/_/mig zur dkar ba'i zer gyis 'phrog byed gtsug gi zla ba'i 'od kyi zer ni skyengs byed kyang /_/gang gi che ba'i mjug sgro mdongs 'od tshon rtsis bris bzhin mdzes pa 'od gyur pa/_/u ma'i sras ni dga' bar byed pa chu skyes 'dab ma bzhin du rna
[\[345b\]]
[\[345b.1\]]bar byed pa yod/_/smyig ma'i tshal nas skyes pa'i lha de yang dag mchod nas slar yang lam ni brgal bar mdzod/_/grub pa'i khyo shug dag gi lag pa'i pi wang chu thigs brlan la 'jigs pas lam ni ster/_/khyod kyis mthong bar 'gyur ba'i sa bdag dga' ba'i lha yi sras po chu gter gzugs 'dzin
[\[345b.2\]]ni/_/sa yi gzhi la byung zhing lhun po 'dod 'jo'i bu mos 'ongs nas mchod pa byed par 'gyur/_/khyod kyi de yi rlabs ldan mtsho yi chu 'thungs 'ongs pa'i tshe na thag ring mthu las ni/_/chen po yin yang phra mo dang ni sbrang rtsi'i bu yi kha dog bskus par gyur pa dang /_/chen po'i sa la in+d+ra nI la mu tig do shal dag ni
[\[345b.3\]]gcig tu bkod pa bzhin/_/mkha' la bgrod pa rnams kyi mig rnams dag gis 'og tu blta zhing nges par mthong bar 'gyur/_/de rnams brgal nas bgrod tshe smin ma 'khri shing gzhon nu rol pa rnams kyis mdzes pa can/_/dkar nag 'od zer dang ldan rnams kyi rdzi ma steng du bskyod par gyur pa'i mdzes pa dag_/_
[\[345b.4\]]kun da'i me tog g.yo ba'i rjes 'gro sbrang rtsi byed pa'i dpal gyi mdzes pa bzhin du ni/_/mdzes ldan da sha zhes bya'i grong khyer na chung mig gis blta 'dod la ni rang lus bstan par mdzod/_/dang por tshangs pha 'jug pa zhes bya'i ljongs la khyod ni bgrod bya 'og tu grib bsil bya/_/de nas rgyal rigs bcom pa'i
[\[345b.5\]]dur ldan ku ru ba yi bzhin ni khyod kyis bstan par bya/_/gang du srid sgrub mda' rnon brgya phrag dag gis rgyal rigs mang po'i mgo bo bcad pa ni/_/khyod kyi gru char chen po rab tu mang po phab pas pad+ma rnams ni chad pa bzhin/_/myos par byed pa'i ro ldan dga' ma snar ma'i tshig gis mtshan pa'i chang ni spang byas nas/_/_
[\[345b.6\]]rang gi gnyen la dga' bar 'gyur bas yul las phyir phyogs stobs bzang gang de blta bar bya/_/kwa ye zhi ldan sA ra swa ti'i chu la mngon par phyogs tshe khyod kyis 'thungs byas nas/_/lus kyi kha dog dag ni nag por 'gyur zhing nang gi bsam pa yang ni dkar ba nyid/_/de nas bgrod pa'i phyi nas ka kha pa yi grong
[\[345b.7\]]yod dza hu'i bu mo ri rgyal gyi/_/ngos la bgrod pa dug can rgyal po'i bu ni mtho ris de yi them skas bgrod pa bzhin/_/gang gi dbu ba'i phreng ba rnams kyis gau rI'i zhal gyi khro gnyer rnams la dgod pa bzhin/_/bde 'byung skra nas rlabs kyi lag pa dag gis bzung nas zla phyed 'phrog par byed pa bzhin/_/khyod ni gal te
[\[346a\]]
[\[346a.1\]]de yi chu 'thungs bsams nas lus phyed snga ma mkhar las 'phyang ba ni/_/lha yi glang po bzhin te chu de'i zhing ni dri med dkar ba'i shel bzhin snang ba nyid/_/chu bo de la khyod kyi glag ma bsam pas 'phral la yang dag 'byung 'gyur mdzes pa ni/_/ya mu na yi chu dang gang+gA 'grogs ba'i mdzes pa las
[\[346a.2\]]'ongs gyur la gnas ma yin/_/rdo leb steng du ri dgas gnas pas ri dgas lte ba'i dri bzang 'dzin pa'i rdo ldan zhing /_/gang+gA nyid kyi yab gyur kha bar dkar ba'i g.yo med gangs ldan de nyid thob byas nas/_/lam gyis dal ba rnam par 'dul ba'i ched du de yi rtse la slebs nas 'dug pa yi/_/mdzes pa mig gsum
[\[346a.3\]]pa yi bzhon pa dkar ba'i khyu mchog rwa yis 'dam ni blangs pa bzhin/_/de la gal te rlung gis rab bskyod thang shing lag pa kun du 'thabs pa las byung ba'i/_/me yi dug dang me stag dag gis 'brong gi dga' ma'i spu tshogs mang po sreg byed na/_/khyod kyis de rnams zhi ba'i ched du chu 'dzin stong phrag mang po char
[\[346a.4\]]ni bya bar 'os/_/gang phyir chen po rnams kyi phun tshogs 'bras bu mang po'i sdug bsngal zhi bar byed pa nyid/_/der ni khyod kyis sgra chen bsgrags la ma bzod che ba'i dregs pa kun du ldan pa'i rkang brgyad pa/_/khyod kyi steng du mchong bar bya'o snyam nas ma mchongs rang gi yan lag kun du rmas/_/de rnams dag la rab
[\[346a.5\]]tu bzhad ldan thog ser char pa drag phab mang pos gzhom par mdzod/_/rang bzhin ngan pa'i gnas pa dag gi 'bras med rtsom pa'i 'bad pa rnams ni ci yang med/_/der ni che zhing gsal ba'i rdol gtsug na zla phyed 'dzin pa'i rkang bkod rjes la ni/_/rtag tu grub pa rnams kyis gtor ma mchod kyis gus pas
[\[346a.6\]]phyag dang bskor ba mdzod/_/gang zhig mthong na byed pas byas pa'i sdig pa rnams ni shin tu ring por 'dor byed cing /_/gus pa 'dzin pa rnams ni de yi 'khor du gnas pa thob byed brtan pa thob par 'gyur/_/dri zhim rnams kyis khengs par gyur pa'i khang pa nang nas snyan pa'i yid 'ong sgra 'byung zhing /_/mi'am ci
[\[346a.7\]]mo rnams kyis grong khyer gsum rgyal 'gyur las yang dag dga' bas glu dbyangs sgrogs/_/rda zlum snyan pa'i sgra bzhin gal te khyod kyis rdo yi gtsug lag khang der sgra snyan ni//bsgrags par gyur na nges par phyugs bdag drung du gsum 'dus dbyangs snyan don gyi tshogs pa 'byung /_/gangs kyi ril nye ba'i thang la
[\[346b\]]
[\[346b.1\]]rkang pa bskyod tshe de dang de yi khyad par la/_/krauny+tsa'i ri yi lam la rab grags b+h+ri gu'i bdag po'i mda' phug ngang pa'i sgo can yod/_/de nas nor sbyin phyogs su khyod ni rjes su 'gro tshe 'khyog por 'gro ba'i mdzes pa ni/_/stobs ldan slu ba'i ched du khyab 'jugs 'jal rkang pa sngo bsangs yang dag bkod pa bzhin/_/_
[\[346b.2\]]mgrin bcu'i lag pas bskyod bya ri ngos yangs pa dang ldan shel gyi kai la sha yi ri/_/skabs gsum mdzes ma'i gdong gi me long bstan bya'i steng du'ang song ste cung zad gnas par bya/_/gang gi rtse mo shin tu mtho ba ku mu ta ltar mkha' la khyab par gnas pa ni/_/mig gsum pa yis rab tu brgad pa phyogs bcu
[\[346b.3\]]dag nas gcig tu spungs par gyur pa bzhin/_/de yi ri ngos dag la khyod ni 'gro tshe snum pa'i sman mchog dag dang mtshungs pa dang /_/de ni gnyis 'thung so ni 'phral la bcad par byas pa lta bur dkar zhing mdzes pa de/_/mdzes pa'i ri bo la ni g.yo ba med pa'i mig gis blta bya nyid du 'gyur ba dang /_/stobs
[\[346b.4\]]ldan dkar ba'i dpung pa dag la gos sngon bkod par gyur bzhin 'byung ba bdag gis shes/_/der ni bde 'byung sbrul gyi gdu bu dor nas gau rI'i lag pa dag la 'dzin byed cing /_/gal te yang ni rol rtsed ched du zhabs kyis 'gro bas ri la de dag dal 'gro na/_/khyod bgrod lus ni 'khyog por 'gro zhing nang na
[\[346b.5\]]gnas pa'i chu chen dag ni spang bya zhing /_/bkab par byas nas steng du 'gro ba rnams la rkang pa'i bde ba reg par bya ba mdzod/_/rigs gnas der ni khyod kyis chu rnams skyugs par byas pas nges par nang na med pa na/_/lha yi na chung rnams kyis khyod ni 'khrul 'khor gyis bzung khang bzangs nang du 'khyer
[\[346b.6\]]bar byed/_/kwa ye grogs bzang tsha bas gdungs pa de rnams ched du gal te khyod ni mi gtong na/_/rol sgeg g.yo ba'i mdzes ma de rnams rna bar rtsub pa'i sgra chen bsgrags pas 'jigs par bya/_/chu thigs dag gis bran pa dang ldan dri bzhon gyis bskyod dpag bsam shing la g.yo bzhin du/_/khyod kyi
[\[346b.7\]]grib 'od shel ltar dkar ba'i gos kyis ri dbang de ni yongs su g.yogs bya zhing /_/yid 'ong chu bo bzhi yi rgyun ni gser gyi chu skyes gsar pa ltar de'ang 'thung ba dang /_/sa srung bu yi gdong pa'i gos ni ci 'dod spyad cing dga' ba'ang skad cig bya bar mdzod/_/kwa ye 'dod bzhin rgyu byed khyod ni des
[\[347a\]]
[\[347a.1\]]las rgal tshe lcang lo ldan ma shes par 'gyur/_/slar yang ri de g.yo ldan gang+gA'i chu gos ldan ma'i bdag po bzhin du mi mthong min/_/mthong ba'i gzhal med khang steng char sprin che las khyod kyi chu byas sgyugs byas dus su ni/_/gang zhig 'dod ldan ma ni len bu mu tig dra bas bsgrigs pa'i
[\[347a.2\]]phreng ba ldan pa bzhin/_/khyod la glog 'od ldan bzhin sgeg pa'i mdzes ma dang ldan dbang po'i gzhu bzhin bkra bar ldan/_/snyan pa'i dbyangs ni zab pa bzhin du glu dbyangs dag dang rol mo'i dbyangs snyan rnams dang ldan/_/chu yi snying po can bzhin sa gzhi nor bu'i rang bzhin mtho bzhin rtse mo mkha' la reg_/_
[\[347a.3\]]gang du khyad par de rnams kyis ni khyod dang khang bzangs mtshungs pa'i ched du nor bur ldan/_/gang du na chung rnams ni lag pad mdzes shing len bu'i kun da gzhon nu'i skra ni 'ching /_/gdong gi chu skyes 'dzum zhing dkar ba'i ge sar dpal ni gsar pa dag gis mdzes byas shing /_/gtsug phud ku ru ba
[\[347a.4\]]ka'i me tog zhags pas bcings pa mdzes shing rna bar ut+pal can/_/skra mtshams bkra ba'i me tog dag dang ldan pa'ang khyod ni nye bar 'ongs las skyes pa yin/_/gang gi dkar po'i nor bu dang ldan rin chen 'od kyis khyab pa chu skyes ltar mdzes pa'i/_/yang thog gzhi la gnod sbyin rnams ni mchog gis
[\[347a.5\]]dga' ma dang bcas yang dag gnas byas nas/_/dpag bsam shing las rab tu 'khrungs pa'i dga' ma'i ro ldan chang ni kun du 'thung byed cing /_/dal bu rnams kyis rnga rnams la ni brdungs pa khyod kyi 'brug sgra zab pa'i dbyangs snyan bzhin/_/gang du rab bgrod ches cher 'dar bas len bu lhung zhing man+da
[\[347a.6\]]ra ba'i me tog ni/_/mtshar bar gyur cing rna ba'i rgyan gyur rab mdzes gser gyi me tog lhung bar gyur pa dang /_/nu rgyas mu tig dra ba mtshar bar gyur cing do shal srad bu chad par gyur pa yi/_/'dod ldan ma rnams mtshan mo lam du 'gro la byung ba 'od ldan shar tshe gsal bar byed/_/gang ched chags pas gnod sbyin
[\[347a.7\]]bud med rnams kyi 'og pag bcings pa 'grol zhing gos dag ni/_/bsal la mdza' bo rnams la 'dod mas 'dar bar gyur cing g.yo ba'i lag pa 'phen pa na/_/mchog tu che ba'i 'od zer dang ldan rin chen mar me mngon du mthong bar byed pa ni/_/ngo tshas rmongs pa rnams kyi lag pa dag gis phye ma gtor
[\[347b\]]
[\[347b.1\]]bar gyur pa 'bras med 'gyur/_/gang du chu 'dzin sa steng gnas rnams 'dren byed rtag 'gros gzhal med khang nang nged pa na/_/gang zhig rang gi chu thigs dag gis bkra ba'i ri mo rnams la 'phral du skyon byung nas/_/ngo tsha reg pa bzhin du khyod 'dra dum bu dum bu dag tu 'thon par byed pa ni/_/dra mig
[\[347b.2\]]rnams kyi nang nas du ba zhugs pa 'thon pa rnams kyi rjes su byed pa bzhin/_/gang du bud med mchog rnams bdag po mchog gis kun nas 'khyud pa rnams ni btang ba na/_/lus ni kun nas gdung bar byed la zla ba chu shel srad bu'i dra ba 'phyang ba can/_/khyod kyis bsgribs pa med cing dkar ba'i zla ba'i 'od
[\[347b.3\]]rnams gsal bar mthong bar gyur pa na/_/chu thigs 'bab pa kun nas byugs pas zhi bar byed cing mchog tu dga' ba skyed pa nyid/_/gang du gnod sbyin bdag po'i grogs bzang lha nyid mngon sum nyid du gnas pa shes byas nas/_/'jigs pa mang las yid srubs gzhu ni rkang drug pa yi gzhu
[\[347b.4\]]rgyud can de dor bas chog_/bdag po'i 'ben la mdzes ma'i smin ma 'khyog po'i gzhu la zur mig g.yo ba dag gi mda'/_/rol sgeg g.yo ba rtsom par byed pa nyid kyis de yi 'bras bu nges par grub pa nyid/_/de na nor gyi bdag po'i khang bzangs las ni byang gi phyogs na bdag gi grong khyer ni/_/mtho
[\[347b.5\]]ris bdag po'i gzhu dang 'dra ba'i rta babs mdzes pas ring nas 'tsham par byas pa ste/_/gang gi skyed tshal man+da ra dang ljon shing gzhon nu bdag gi mdzes ma'i bu ltar ni/_/bskyangs pa'i mthu las 'phel ba'i me tog chun 'phyang thur du 'phyang ba lag pas thob bya yod/_/bkod ma bzang mo'i chu ni mar ka ta'i
[\[347b.6\]]rdo yi phring ba bsgrigs pa'i lam skas can/_/'di nas mdzes pa'i gser gyi pad+ma rgyas pa rin chen rtsa ldan rnams kyis khyab pa ste/_/gdung ba dang bral ngang pa'i tshogs rnams dag ni gang+gA'i chu la gnas par byas pa'i tshe/_/khyod nyid yang dag mthong bar gyur kyang nye bar gnas pa'i yid 'ong mtsho las 'gro
[\[347b.7\]]mi 'gyur/_/kwa ye grogs bzang khyod ni glog gi dga' ma g.yo bzhin nye bar mthong bar gyur pa na/_/mtsho de'i dogs na mdzes pa'i ri bo yid 'ong mchog gi in+d+ra nI la rnams kyis ni/_/rtse mo mdzes par byas par gsar gyi bskor ba rnams kyis bskor ba khyod kyis blta bya ba/_bdag gi dga' ma dga' byed
[\[348a\]]
[\[348a.1\]]dang bcas de nyid sems gdungs bdag ni shin tu dran par gyur/_/de la ku ru ba ka'i shing gis bskor ba'i yal ga'i khang bzangs dang ldan nye ba na/_/mya ngan med shing dmar dang ke sa ra yi shing chen yal 'dab g.yo ba mdzes pa yod/_/gcig la khyod kyi grogs su gyur ba'i dga' ma bdag dang
[\[348a.2\]]bcas pa'i g.yon pas bsgrun 'dod cing /_/gzhan la gdong gi chang 'thungs me tog 'byung ba'i don du dga' ma de ni bdag 'dod gyur/_/de yi dbus na rab dkar shel gyi gzhi la gser gyi sdong po che zhing mtho bar gnas/_/rtsa ba rin chen phreng bas bcings pa rdo rje pha lam che ba min pa 'od 'phro ba/_/gang la khyod
[\[348a.3\]]kyi grogs bzang mgrin sngon gnas nas nyin phyed song tshe rol sgeg gar byed cing /_/bdag gi mdzes ma rin chen gdu bu 'thab pa'i dbyangs snyan skal bzang mchog tu mdzes pa yod/_/de rnams kyis ni legs par mtshan pa kwa ye legs pa'i thugs 'dzin khyod kyis blta bar bya/_/sgo yi mtha' dang nye ba dag
[\[348a.4\]]na dung dang pad+ma'i gzugs bris mthong bar byas pa na/_/da lta bdag dang bral bar gyur pas nges par mdzes pa dman pa nyid du gnas par nges/_/nyi ma nub par gyur pas nges par pad+ma dag gis mdzes pa nyams par gyur pa nyid/_/mdzes ma de ni yongs su bskyangs ched myur du gshegs nas glang phrug lus
[\[348a.5\]]bzhin chung ba yis/_/mdzes pa'i ri bo de yi ngos la gnas nas dang por legs bshad snyan pa'i gsung gleng mdzod/_/bdag gi khang nang 'jug tshe me khyer phreng ba lta bu'i snang ba chung shing chung ba ni/_/mdzes shing rol pa'i smin ma g.yo ba'i glog gi mig ni byas nas khyod kyis blta bar 'os/_/de na bdag gi
[\[348a.6\]]dga' ma lus phra mdog mdzes gnyis skyes bkra ba'i phra lam mchu dag ni/_/bil ma smin pa bskyed pa phra zhing 'dren byed g.yo ba'i ri dgas mig can lte ba dma'/_/ro smad sbom zhing dal gyis 'gro mkhas 'o ma 'dzin pa dag gi bar dag mchog tu mdzes/_/na chung dag gi yul la mngon du zhen par byed po
[\[348a.7\]]tshangs pas dang po nyid du gyur/_/gzhon ma de ni bdag gi srog ni gnyis par shes par mdzod ces dal gyis smra bar bya/_/bdag dang lhan cig spyod la shin tu ring bar gyur te ngang mo gcig pur gyur pa bzhin/_/'di la nyin zhag mang po 'ong ba rnams su yid la gcags pa med pa nyid du gyur/_/dgun smad pad+ma can
[\[348b\]]
[\[348b.1\]]ni kha bas nyams pa bzhin du gzugs gzhan thob par bdag gis shes/_/dga' ma de ni nges par mchi ma mang po babs las mig 'phur che ba dag tu gyur/_/steng 'og chu yi pags pa dag ni shugs ring shin tu dro ba'i dbugs ni du ma byas/_/gdong ni legs par bkod la len bu 'phyang bas bsgribs
[\[348b.2\]]pas mtha' dag gsal ba min pa ni/_/zla ba'i 'od kyis mdzes pa khyod ni 'ongs pas bsgribs las snang min sman pa 'dzin pa bzhin/_/gtor ma byed pa'ang bral bas btud par gyur pa bdag 'dra yid kyis rtogs bya 'dri ba'am/_/snyan pa'i tshig gis smra ba'i sha ri ka ni gur gyi nang na gnas shing gnas pa la/_/_
[\[348b.3\]]kwa ye grogs mo de yi dga' ba dran nam zhes pa'i dri ba byed pa bdag kyang ni/_/khyod ni mthong bar gyur pa na ni nga ni mdun du 'ongs shing dga' bar byed par 'gyur/_/kwa ye grogs bzang dri ma'i gos dang bcas pa'i rang gi phang par pi wang bzhag byas nas/_/bdag gi ming nas bod pas mtshan cing 'dod pa'i dbyangs
[\[348b.4\]]snyan cher sgrogs snyan par gyur pa'i tshe/_/rang gis byas par gyur kyang dbyangs snyan dum bu dum bur bcas nas sems zhing yang yang ni/_/mig chus brlan pa'i rgyud mangs cung zad phyi bar byas nas kyang ni de ni 'ong bar 'gyur/_/bdag ni 'ongs pa'i nyin nas brtsams te nyin zhag dang ni zla ba song ba'i lhag ma rnams/_/_
[\[348b.5\]]sa la rnam par 'god cing sgo yi nang du gangs kyi me tog rnams ni sgyur bar byed/_/bdag can nam ni phrad par 'gyur ram snyam pa snying la sems pa'i rtsom pa mang po byed/_/phal cher bud med rnams ni bdag po bral bas yid kyi las kyi gdung ba mang po nyid/_/nyin mo'i bar la bya ba dang ldan bdag dang bral las de
[\[348b.6\]]ltar shin tu min na yang /_/mtshan mo shin tu ring las khyod kyi grogs mo bya med gdung ba che bar bdag gis shes/_/legs ma mtshan ring rnams la gnyid bral stan med sa la nyal tshe dra mi gnye bar ni/_/gnas nas blta bya bdag gi phrin rnams bzlas pa rnams ni bde ba'i ched du nus pa nyid/_/bral bas lhag par
[\[348b.7\]]gdungs pas sa yi gzhil gzhogs gcig brten te nyal bar gyur pa ni/_/tshes gcig zla ba shar ba cha gcig lhag ma rtsa bar gnas pa'i lus bzhin du ni gyur/_/bdag dang lhan cig gnas tshe 'dod pa'i dga' ma rnams kyi mtshan mo skad cig bzhin du song /_/gang de da ltar bral ba las skyes mchi ma dron mo rnams bcas
[\[349a\]]
[\[349a.1\]]shin tu ring ba nyid/_/khrus kyis dag cing yangs shing rtsub pa'i skra yi len bu 'gram pa dag las 'phyang ba rnams/_/dbugs kyi rlung gis sel bar byed pa rnams la mchu yi 'dab ma dag ni dal bar nges/_/gnyid ni 'dod pa med cing bdag dang phrad pa las byung gnyid ni cung zad 'byung 'gyur zhes/_/_
[\[349a.2\]]dga' ma de ni 'dren byed mchi ma dang bcas shin tu gdungs pa mthong bas 'gog par byed/_/bdag gis bcings pa'i spyi gtsug len bu bral ba'i nyi ma dang po nyid la dor byas nas/_/len bu rnams ni gcig gyur reg pa rtsub pa mi bzad 'gram pa dag la gnas pa las/_/sen mo ring ba'i lag pas reg pa'i nyon
[\[349a.3\]]mongs ldan pas lan cig min par sgyur byed ma/_/rje bo khros pa'i bka' lung rdzogs pa gdung bral gyur pa bdag gis gang bde dgrol bar bya/_/mig ni mchi ma mang po rnams kyis gdungs la rdzi ma rnams kyis bkab par byas nas ni/_/zla ba'i rkang pa'i 'od zer bdud rtsi sil ma rnams ni dra mig nang nas zhugs pa na/_/_
[\[349a.4\]]bkab pa bsal te mngon du 'ongs nas dang por dga' 'gyur ldog pa na ni de bzhin nyid/_/sprin dang bcas pa'i nyin mo sa la gnas pa'i pad+ma rgyas min zum pa ma yin bzhin/_/dga' ma de ni nyin par mdza' bo'i grogs mo rnams kyis skad cig kyang ni gtong min bzhin/_/lus phra ma la gcig ni blta tshe kun gyi rmad byung
[\[349a.5\]]blta bas 'jug par 'gyur ba nyid/_/mtshan mo skye bo rnams ni nyal bar gyur la mdzes ma gnyid bral kwa ye chu 'dzin khyod/_/dra mig dang ni nye bar gnas nas nyal sar nye bar 'ongs te de ni dga' bar mdzod/_/len bu gcig tu gyur la reg pa 'gram pa la gnas sen mo mtho ba'i lag pa yis/_/yang dang yang du sel bar
[\[349a.6\]]byed cing sa yi gzhi yi mal gyi steng du gzhogs gcig ni/_/ltung bar gyur cing de yi mtha' na mchi ma rnams ni 'bab pa do shal chad pa dag_/g.yo zhing ltung bar gyur pa bzhin du gnas pa de mthong nyid kyis dal gyis brjod par bya/_/mdzes ma de ni rgyan rnams yang dag gzhag cing lus ni shin tu phral 'dzin byed cing /_/gdung
[\[349a.7\]]ba'i sdug bsngal dag gis mal stan steng na yang dang yang du 'dre ldog byed pa na/_/khyod kyang 'phral la chu yi rang bzhin mchi ma 'dzag pa nyid du 'gyur ba gdon mi za/_/phal chos thams cad nang gi bdag nyid bstan pas snying rje ci yang 'jug par 'gyur ba nyid/_/kwa ye grogs po khyod kyi grogs mo bdag la mdza' ba mang du 'dzin pa
[\[349b\]]
[\[349b.1\]]bdag gis shes/_/de phyir de ltar gyur pa rnams ni dang por bral la de ni bdag la sems par byed/_/skal bzang nang gi bsam pa dag gis brjod pa nges par brdzun min bden par shes pa ni/_/bdag gis gang gang brjod pa ma lus yun ring min par khyod la mngon sum nyid du 'gyur/_/len bu rnams kyis mi gzung
[\[349b.2\]]gnyis po g.yo ba 'gog cing mig sman byug pas gtor ba dang /_/nyes par byed pa nam yang med par gyur las smin ma'i rnam 'gyur brjed par 'gyur na yang /_/khyod ni yang la ri dgas mig can 'dren byed steng ni g.yo bar byed par bdag gis shes/_/gang zhig nya yis bskyod las chu skyes g.yo ba'i dpal ni 'dzin
[\[349b.3\]]par byed pa nyid dang mtshungs/_/de yi bdag gi lag pa'i sen mo'i rjes ni med cing mu tig rnams kyi dra ba ni/_/yun ring nyid nas 'dor bar byas par gyur cing longs spyod nyid kyis rdzogs pa'i mtha' ru ni/_/bdag gis lag pa rnams kyis mnyes par byas pa med kyang khyod 'ongs skal bzang dbang gis ni/_/de yi chu shing gsar
[\[349b.4\]]pa'i sdong po brla yang g.yon pa g.yo ba nyid ni thob par gyur/_/kwa ye chu 'dzin de la de yi dus su gal te bde ba'i nyid ni thob gyur na/_/de tshe khyod ni thun tshod bar du sgra sgrogs min par lhan cig dag tu gnas par mdzod/_/de yi bdag por gyur ba bdag la dka' tshegs chen pos thob par 'gyur ba'i rmi lam ni/_/mgrin par
[\[349b.5\]]lag pa'i 'khri shing dag gis che bar 'khyud pa'i mdud pa 'phral la gtong bar byed/_/rang gi chu yi thigs pa bsil bas bsgos pa'i rlung gi mA la ta ya rnams kyis ni/_/shin tu gzhon pa'i me tog bcas pa de ni bslad nas kyang ni de yi dbugs dbyung mdzod/_/khyod ni glog gi 'dren byed g.yo zhing g.yo ba khyod mdog dang
