[\[349b.6\]]mtshungs gnas su gnas byas nas/_/khengs ldan ma la 'brug dbyangs tshig ni snyan pa'i brjod pa khyod kyis yang yang rtsom par mdzod/_/kwa ye khyod ldan chu gzhon ming can bdag ni rje yi grogs bzang yin par shes par mdzod/_/de yi 'phrin snyan yid la bzung nas khyod kyi drung du nye bar 'ongs par gyur ba nyid/_/bdag gi sgra ni
[\[349b.7\]]bsgrags tshe lam bgrod dub pa'i tshogs rnams sgo yi nang du 'bros par byed/_/snyan pa'i sgra dbyangs rnams kyis bud med len bu 'grol zhing 'dod pas gzir bar mtshon par byed/_/ces pa de skad bshad tshe dri bzhon bu ni mi thil yi bu mos mthong ba bzhin/_/de ni dga' bde'i snying gis khyod la mngon phyogs blta zhing bden pa nyid
[\[350a\]]
[\[350a.1\]]du'ang nges pa nyid/_/kwa ye grogs bzang de nas legs par gnas la gzhan yang nyan 'dod sgra ldan ma rnams ni/_/bdag po'i tshig ni snying grogs bdag gis khyer 'ongs gyur las phrad ltar lhag mar lus pa nyid/_/kwa ye tshe ldan bdag gi tshig dang nyid kyis kyang ni de la phan pa'i ched du ni/_/khyod kyi rgyal po mchog
[\[350a.2\]]ni rgyal por ma yi ri yi gnas na gnas shing 'tsho ba nyid/_/khyod ni spangs par gyur la kwa ye mdzes ma dge'am dri zhes de ltar smra bar mdzod/_/gang phyir skye bo rnams ni byed pa nyams la dang por de 'dra'i dbugs dbyung byed pa nyid/_/lus kyi nang nas shin tu phra pas phra gyur dang ni shin tu gdung bas gdungs gyur dang /_/mchi ma
[\[350a.3\]]'dzags pas mchi ma 'dzag gyur che bar phrad 'dod nyid kyi phrad 'dod mchog tu gyur/_/dbugs dron shugs rings lhags pas dbugs dron shugs rings mchog tu lhags gyur ring nas 'jug pa can/_/bsod nams chom rkun dag gis lam bkag gyur cing de rnams yid la sim zhing 'jug pa yin/_/grogs mo'i mdun du
[\[350a.4\]]de yi rna ba la ni khyod kyi gdong ni reg par thob gyur pas/_/khyod kyi gang yang gus pa'i gtam gyi ched du gyur pa'i che ba'i sgra 'di brjod par 'os/_/gang de rna ba'i yul las shin tu gang yang 'das shing mig dag gis ni mthong bya min/_/khyod dang dga' bas 'phrad 'dod gyur zhes bdag gis kha yi tshig 'di zer zhes smra bar
[\[350a.5\]]mdzod/_/'khri shing 'ga' la yan lag mdzes pa 'jigs pa bcas ri dgas mo la mig mdzes g.yo ba mthong /_/'gram pa'i mdzes 'od ri bong can la skra rnams gtsug phud can gyi mjug sgro'i tshogs la mthong /_/smin ma'i rol sgeg mdzes ma rnams ni chu klung rlabs phreng phra mo rnams la rab tu mthong /_/e ma gcig tu tshogs pa dang
[\[350a.6\]]ldan g.yon mig khyod dang mtshungs pa 'ga' yang yod ma yin/_/char gyis brlan las dri med sbrang rtsi can bzhin khyod kyi gdong 'di mdzes so lus phra ma/_/khyod ni ring gyur bdag ni phra ba'i lus gyur mda' lnga pa yi gdung ba yang yang byin/_/so ka rdzogs pa'i mtha' ru phyogs kun che ba'i chu 'dzin stug pos bsgribs pas nyi ma yi/_/snang ba rnams ni
[\[350a.7\]]nyams shing rgyun du char 'ong bdag gis zhag gi grangs ji lta ba yin/_/khyod ni rdo leb gzhi la khams kyi mtshon rnams kyis ni dga' dang khro bas legs bris te/_/de rnyed rdzogs nas 'dod pa bya ba'i ched du khyod kyi zhabs drung lhung bar gyur pa na/_/tshig lan ma byung bdag la mchi ma mang po yang yang byung bas zugs pas mig la khro/_/der yang
[\[350b\]]
[\[350b.1\]]bdag cag gnyis ni lhan cig 'grogs pa'i skal ba med pas nyid du gyur pa zhig_/khyod ni bdag gi rmi lam dag tu 'ongs shing thob pa ci yang mthong bar gyur pa na/_/kho bos dam du 'khyud par bya ba'i ched du nam mkha' dag la lag yug bya ba ni/_/sa la gnas pa'i nags kyi lha rnams kyis ni nges par ma mthong ma yin mang po ru/_/_
[\[350b.2\]]mu tig brgyud pa bzhin du shing gi yal ga rnams la mchi ma'i dum bu lhung bar 'gyur/_/de wa dA ru'i ljon pa rnams kyi yal ga'i 'dab ma rnams ni 'phral du bcad byas nas/_/de rnams kyi ni 'o ma zags pa'i dri bzang dang ldan lho phyogs zhugs pa'i dri bzhon rnams/_/gang zhig bdag la dang por rab tu 'khyud do kwa ye yon tan ma lus de rnams
[\[350b.3\]]ni/_/gangs kyi ri la gal te song na khyod kyi lus la reg pa nges par gyur ro ce'o/_/thun gsum mun pa can ma yun ring gyur ba skad cig bzhin du bsdus pa ci ltar yin/_/nyin par yang ni gnas skabs kun du cung zad gdung ba'ang ji ltar gyur pa yin/_/kwa ye 'dren byed g.yo ba de ltar gyur pas bdag sems don gnyer skal ba dman par
[\[350b.4\]]gyur/_/khyod dang bral ba'i gdung ba rnams dang che ba'i sdug bsngal rnams kyis brtan par min par byas/_/bdag ni zhag grangs mang po'i bdag nyid bgrang zhing nang gi bsam pas mi 'chi bar ni shes/_/kwa ye dge legs ldan ma khyod kyang mya ngan mang po shin tu bya ba ma yin te/_/bde ba mtha' gcig ldan pas su yin rtag tu sdug bsngal
[\[350b.5\]]mtha' gcig pa yang su zhig yin/_/de dag 'khor lo rtsibs ni cung zad 'og tu 'gro zhing steng du'ang rim gyis bskor ba bzhin/_/khyab 'jug lag 'gro'i gnas na gnyid las langs tshe rje bo khros pa'i bka' lung rdzogs pa nyid/_/de la zla ba bzhin yod de bar mig ni zum par byas nas khyod ni gnas par mdzod/_/phyi nas bdag cag gnyis ni
[\[350b.6\]]yun ring bral bar las byung 'dod pa'i longs spyod de thob ste/_/ston ka'i zla ba rdzogs pa'i mtshan ma rnams la 'dod pa'i longs spyod de dag ldan par 'gyur/_/yang ni brjod pa sngon ni bdag dang khyod ni mal stan gnas na mgrin 'khyud gnyid song bas/_/bdag ni phral la rab tu sad par gyur nas ci yang ngu bar byas par gyur pa na/_/nang nas
[\[350b.7\]]rgod pa dang bcas lan cig min par khyod kyis bdag la dri ba brjod pa na/_/kwa ye g.yo ma 'ga' zhig dang yang dga' byed rmi lam mthong zhes bdag gis khyod la'o/_/de la bdag ni khyod la mtshan ma bzang po sbyin par byed pa yin par rig byas na/_/kwa ye 'dren byed dkar min skye bo ngan pa'i tshig las bdag mi gus 'os ma yin/_/gang phyir
[\[351a\]]
[\[351a.1\]]bral bas gdungs pa longs spyod bral la de rnams mdza' bo'i brjod pa ci zhig yin/_/dngos po rnams ni mthong tshe mchog tu dga' ba'i ri ni mang po'i phung po nyid du 'gyur/_/'di rnams kyis ni dang por bral bas gdungs par gyur pa'i grogs mo de ni dbugs dbyung mdzod/_/mig gsum pa yi khyu mchog lta
[\[351a.2\]]bur dkar ba'i kai lA sha yi ri las slar ldog bya/_/de la'ang rang gi dge ba'i mtshan ma khyer 'ongs de dang de ni bdag la bshad par bya/_/khyod ni kun da'i ge sar g.yo ldan myur 'gro rnams kyis bskul byas myur bar 'ong bar bya/_/kwa ye grogs bzang khyod kyis bdag gi gnyen 'dun dag tu cung zad gnas pa 'di byas nas/_/slar
[\[351a.3\]]yang 'phrin rnams brtan pa khyod las nges par bdag la 'ong bar 'gyur zhes bdag sems so/_/tsUta ka rnams sgra med par yang chu ni sbyin par mdzod ces khyod la zhu bar sems/_/gang phyir skye bo rnams la 'dod par gyur pa rnams kyi bya ba'i don nyid lan gyi tshig_/kwa ye chu 'dzin gdung ldan bdag gi brjod pa bdag gi sems
[\[351a.4\]]la don gnyer dga' ba yi/_/tshogs 'di byams par gyur pa'am rjes su rab tu brtse ba'i blos ni 'di rnams kun byas nas/_/khyod kyang 'dod pa'i yul ni thob cing mdzes pa'i char sprin tshogs 'dzin dpal dang ldan pa dang /_/glog ma dang yang nam yang mi 'bral gyur cig de bzhin kun kyang dge zhing shis gyur cig_/snyan ngag mkhan
[\[351a.5\]]chen po nag mo'i khol gyis mdzad pa'i sprin gyi pho nya rdzogs so//_//blo gros dang snying rje dang /_brtul ba dang des pa dang /_gtong ba la sogs pa'i yon tan phul du phyung ba dpag tu med pas spras pa'i dpon chen nam mkha' brtan pa'i bka' lung gis/_kha che'i paN+Di ta snyan ngag mkhan chen po su ma na shrI dang /_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba mang
[\[351a.6\]]du thos pa'i dge slong byang chub rtse mo dang /_lo tsA bar gtogs pa lung rigs smra ba nam mkha' bzang pos dpal sa skya'i gtsug lag khang chen por bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/_/gang zhig thugs dgongs rnam par dag pa yis/_/'di la bskul zhing mthun rkyen bsgrubs pa dang /_/bdag cag 'bad las bsod
[\[351a.7\]]nams gang bsgrubs pas/_/'khor ba las rgal sku gsum thob par shog_/byang gi bdag po'i gsung bzang las/_/snyan ngag 'di ni bod skad du/_/kha che paN chen dang lhan cig_/dge slong byang chub rtse mos bsgyur/_/'dis 'gro ba dpag tu med pa la phan thogs nas bkra shis shing bde legs su gyur cig/_//_
[\[351b\]]
[\[351b.1\]{D4303}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_ts+tshan+da rat+nA ka ra nA ma/_oM na mo wA gI shwa rA ya/_dzi nA ya mu ni sU R+yA ya pa ra ma dz+yo ti rAt+ma ni/_an+ta rni shi bi mi tra NA man+ta rdi na kr-i te nA maH/_pa d+yaM tsa tuSh+pa dI tats+tsa br-it+ta dzA
[\[351b.2\]]@##/_/bod skad du/_sdeb sbyor rin chen 'byung gnas zhes bya ba/_oM ngag gi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rgyal ba thub pa nyi ma ni/_/snang ba mchog gi bdag nyid can/_/nang gi mtshan mo bshes bral gyi/_/nang gi nyin byed la phyag 'tshal/_/tshigs bcad rkang bzhi de yang ni/_/br-it+ta
[\[351b.3\]]ti pra b+he da to dwi bi d+haM/_a k+Sha ra saM khyA br-it+ti/_mA trA saM khyA b+ha ba ti dzA ti/_hra swaHswa ro la g+hu l+r-i dzuH/_pa dAn+te Shu ba hu laM gu ru gwa kraH/_pUrbaHswa rA ra hi ta byany+dza nAts+tsa/_dIr+g+ha p+lu tau tsai ba/_b+ha di gu
[\[351b.4\]]dzA ti rnam gnyis dbye/_/yi ge bgrang ba br-it+ta yin/_/phyi mo bgrang ba dzA tir 'gyur/_/dbyangs thung ngu ni yang ba ngang la ste drang po'o/_/rkang pa'i mtha' rnams su mang po zhig lci ba dang ga ste 'khyog po'o/_/dbyangs dang bral ba'i gsal byed las snga ma'o/_/ring po dang p+lu ta nyid kyang ngo /_/gsum gyi
[\[351b.5\]]ru Ti ka me TaM/_dzan+ta rgu ru/_san+ta gu ru/_ma she Sha gu ru/_yA di la g+hu tsa/_ran+ta rla g+hu/_tan+ta la g+hu/_na she Sha la g+hu/_ts+tshan+dAM si bi duHShaT+ka rau nya raM b+h+yai kai ka br-it+ti b+hiHpA daiH/_/gA ya t+yuSh+Ni ka nuSh+Tu p+p+r-i ha tIp+saM k+ti ta thA
[\[351b.6\]]thog ma lci ba b+ha ru 'dod/_dza dbus lci ba/_sa mtha' lci ba/_ma kun lci/_ya thog yang ba/_ra dbus yang /_ta mtha' yang ba/_na kun yang /_drug pa nas brtsams te re re 'phel ba'i rkang pas sdeb sbyor rnams rtogs par byed do/_/dbyangs sgrogs rab dga' rjes bsngags br-i ha tI/_/phreng ldan dang ni
[\[352a\]]
[\[352a.1\]]tr-iSh+Tupra/_dza ga tI sharkar+YaSh+Ni d+h+r-i ta yaH/_pr-i thak+ke ge kai ka a ti pa rAsh+tsa/_shud+d+ha prA bi sa ma t+ya d+heHpa rA tsa kr-i tiH/_i ti Sha DaSh+Ta ha yAH/_sa ma mar+d+ha sa maM bi Sha maM/_tse ti tri bi d+haM pra
[\[352a.2\]]de bzhin gsum bsngags so/_/skye 'gro nus ldan legs spyod brtan 'dzin rnams/_/so so re re phyi ma shin tu pa'o/_/byed ldan dag pa rab kun rnam legs shin tu lhag pa las phyi ma'ang ngo /_/de ltar drug brgyad rta rnams so/_/mnyam dang phyed mnyam mi mnyam zhes bya ba/_/br-it+ta rnam pa gsum
[\[352a.3\]]tsak+Sha te br-it+taM/_ta nu ma d+h+yA di ka mu ba tsi tra kA di bak+t+rA di tat+k+ra ma shaH/_s+thA naM ya ti riSh+TaiHtad+bA nu ti b+hA diH/_an+te tsa ra NA nAM/_g+WaH/_lkaH/_pra ti pA daM/_t+Yautsait+ta nu ma d+h+yA/_ku mA ra la li tA dz+saugra_/_
[\[352a.4\]]du rab pa bshad bya/_/de ni dbus phra sogs dang nyer bkra sogs/_/kha sgo la sogs rnams dang go rims bzhin/_/'dod pa rnams kyi gnas pa sdod/_/b+ha sogs uta la de ldan no/_/rkang pa rnams kyi mtha' la'o/_/lci ba wa/_yang ba ka/_/rkang pa so so la'o/_/gal te ta ya dbus phra'o/_/gzhon nu ral pa dzas ga_/_
[\[352a.5\]]glau tsi tuHsa mA n+ya sau hi/_/la gau tsa tuH pra mA N+ya so+au/_tsa tra pa dA ya di b+hau gau/_mau gau tset+sA bi d+yun+mA lA/_b+hAt+ta la gA mA Na ba kaM/_rAn+na sau ya di ha la mu khI/_b+hu dza ga shi shu su tA nau maH/_dz+nye ya shud+d+ha bi rAN+ma sau dza gau/_/m+nau
[\[352a.6\]]lci yang bzhi pa de ni 'dra mtshungs so/_/lag bzhi pa de ni gzhal dpag go/_/gal te b+ha dag ga dag rkang bkra/_gal te ma dag ga dag glog phreng /_b+ha las ta la ga bram ze'i bu/_gal te ra las na sa dag gshol gdong /_/na dag ma ni lag 'gro khye'u'i bu/_/mas dza ga dag pa'i snang bar shes par bya/_/ma na
[\[352b\]]
[\[352b.1\]]yAd+gaHkha lu pa Na baHkhyA taH/_/s+yAn+ma yU ra sA ri NI ra dzau rgau/_/rug+ma ba tI sA ya tra b+ha mau sgau/_/dz+nye yA mat+tA ma b+ha sa ga pr-iSh+TA/_/tAdz+dzau ga gi tI ya mu pa s+thi tA s+yAtra/_/s+yA din+d+ra badzrA ya di tau dza gau gaH/_/u ben+d+ra badzra hi dza tau dza gau gaH/_/a
[\[352b.2\]]ya las lci nges 'khar rngar bshad/_/ra dza ra dang ga ni rma bya'i 'gros yin/_gang la b+ha ma sa ga de ni gser ldan/_ma b+ha sa gas bskyed pa myos mar shes par bya/_/ta las dza gnyis ga ga zhes 'di nyer 'khod 'gyur/_/gal te dbang po rdo rje ta gnyis dza lci gnyis/_/dza ta dza lci gnyis ni nye dbang rdo rje ste/_/de ma thag tu
[\[352b.3\]]nan+ta rod+b+hA bi ta lak+Sha NA d+yau/_/pA dau b+ha be tAM bi bi d+hairbi kalpaiH/_/yA sA mu b+hau shra bya ya ti pra pany+tsau/_/smr-i tAHsmr-i tI shai ru pa dzA ta yastA/_/do d+ha ka mits+tsha ti b+ha tri ti yAd+gau/_/mo bA ro bA shA li nI be da lo kaiH/_/mo
[\[352b.4\]]brjod zin la sogs mtshan nyid dag_/sna tshogs rnam rtog rnams kyis rkang pa dag tu 'gyur/_/gang de gnyis ka mnyan 'os ngal bso'i spros ba can/_/de rnams nyer bskyed rnams su dran pa'i dbang pos bshad/_/b+ha gsum las ni ga dag 'jo ba por 'dod do/_/ma ba ra gnyis pa rig 'jig rten shA li ni/_/gal te
[\[352b.5\]]bAHsrau bA ya di bA tormi mA lA/_/mo bA nau bA b+h+ra ma ra bi la si tA/_/rAt+pa re na ra la gA ra thod+d+ha tA/_/swA ga tA ra na b+ha gai rgu ru NA tsa/_/na na sa ga gi ti tsa b+ha bed+b+r-it+tA/_/na na ra la gi ti tsai wa b+ha dri kA/_/sh+yan+Yu dI ri tA ra dzau ra lau gu ruH/_/dza sau tsa ta ga gash+tso
[\[352b.6\]]ma bsar ba ni chu rlabs phred/_/ma wa na dag wa ni bung ba rol ba'o/_/ra las pha rol na ra la ga shing rta dregs/_/ra na b+ha ga rnams dang lci bas legs 'ongs so/_/na na sa ga ga zhes bya ba zlum por 'gyur/_/na na ra la ga zhes bya ba bzang ldan nyid/_/ra dza ra la dang ni lci ba dkar mor brjod/_/dza sa ta dang ga ga rnams ni
[\[353a\]]
[\[353a.1\]]pas+thi ti s+yA ta/_/tsan+d+ra bar+t+ma tsa ra yan+t+ri ra na b+ha saiH/_/u shan+ti baM shas+tha mi daM dza tau dza rau/_/s+yA din+d+ra baM shA kha lu ya tra tau dza rau/_/pu tra i ha ba su be dA nau ga baurbau/_/r-i tU dza su dza sU dza lod+d+ha ta ga tiH/_/a tha to Ta ka mab+d+hi sa kA ra kr-i
[\[353a.2\]]@#/_/nyer gnas 'gyur/_/ra na b+ha sas rgyu zhing 'khor ba zla ba'i lam/_/dza ta dza ra 'di ni rig gnas nyid du 'dod/_/gang la ta gnyis dza ra nges par dbang po'i rgyud 'gyur ro/_/na dag ga ba ra ba nor rig byed 'dir sbyor ba'o/_/dus dag la ni dza su dza su chu 'thor 'gro/_/sa yig chu gter byas pa de nas 'gro byed
[\[353a.3\]]taM/_/dru ta bi laM bi ta mA ha na b+hau b+ha rau/_/b+hu dzad+ga pra yA taM tsa tu r+b+hir+Ya kA raiH/_/kIrti tai ShA tsa tU re phi kA prag+bi NI/_/pra mi tAk+Sha rA sa dza sa saiH ka thi tA/_/ma gwA re phau bA bai shwa de bI sha ra shwaiH/_/mo ba n+ya gwA dza la d+ha ramA lAb+d+h+yad+gaiH/_/na na ra ra g+ha Ti tA
[\[353a.4\]]yin/_/na dang b+ha dang b+ha ra dal myur yin par smra/_/ya yig bzhi rnams kyis ni lag 'gro ltung ba yin/_/ra yig bzhi pa de ni me tog phreng can grags/_/sa dza sa sa rnams kyi yi ge nyung ngur grags/_/ma ga wa ra ra wa mda' rtas sna tshogs lha mo'o/_/ma ba na ya ga wa rgya mtsho yan lag chu 'dzin phreng /_/na na ra ra 'dus pa dal
[\[353a.5\]]tsa man+dA ki nI/_/ba da ti mu nir+Ya mu mAM na dzau dza rau/_/i ha na ba mA li nI ya di na dzau b+h+yau/_/t+r+YA shA b+hirmu na dza ra wAHpra haR+Shi NI s+yAta/_/dza bau na dzau ri ti ru tsi rA tsa tur+g+ra haiH/_/mo bo b+hat+yAH sai ba ya tirmat+ta ma yU raH/_/sa dza sAH sa gau tsa ka thi taHka la
[\[353a.6\]]gyis 'bab pa yin/_/na dza dza ra ya mu nA ru thub pa smra/_/gal te 'dir ni na dza b+ha ya phreng ba gsar ba'o/_/mu na dza ra wa rnams gsum dang phyogs kyis rab dga' can/_/dza wa na dza ra zhes bzhi dang gza' yis mdzes ma yin/_/ma ba b+ha ta ya rnams de nyid ngal bso rma bya myos/_/sa dza sa dang sa ga rnams ni snyan pa'i ngang par
[\[353b\]]
[\[353b.1\]]haM saH/_/sa dza sA dza gau tsa ya di many+dzu b+hA Shi Ni/_/mA gA bA nau mAHsha ra na ba b+hi ra saM bA d+hA/_/na na bi dza dza bi tsa swa rai ra pa rA dzi tA/_/pra ha ra Na ka li tA na na bi na na bi taiH/_/dz+nye yaM ba san+ta ti la kaM ta b+ha dzA dza gau gaH/_/_
[\[353b.2\]]bshad/_/gal te sa dza sa rnams dang ni dza ga 'jam pa'i ngag_/ma ga wa dang na gnyis ma rnams mda' dang dgu yis gnod med do/_/na na ba dang dza dza wa rnams dbyangs kyis gzhan gyi mi thub pa/_/na na wa dang na na wa rnams de yis mtshon cha kha 'bus so/_/ta b+ha dza dza ga ga dpyid kyi thig ler shes par bya/_/sa
[\[353b.3\]]ba su d+hA sla bo na pi tsa rau tsa pany+tsa gra haiH/_/gu ru ni d+ha na ma nu la g+hu ri ha sha shi ka lA/_/pra gi ya ma pi tsa ra sa na ba ka bi ra ma NA/_/ba su mu ni ya ti ri ti ma Ni gu Na ni ka raH/_/na na ga ba ra ra bAH s+yu rmA li nI twaSh+Ta lo kaiH/_

[\[358a.1\]]dwi mA tro daH/_/bi Sha me Shu dza ra hi tash+tse d+da le da le\u0f85Sh+Tau ga NAM b+ha bat+YAr+YA/_/pash+tsAr+d+he kaH ShaSh+Tho do Sh+Ta ma u b+ha ya tra tsAH she ShAH/_/pUrbAr+d+he ShaSh+Tho dzaHkho bA khe twA d+ya la g+hu ni b+ha ba ti ya tiH/_/ShaSh+ThaHkha pa ro\u0f85n+ta

[\[358a.3\]]ya ti stur+Yo s+ya tha b+ha ba ti tsa ra ma da le/_/tsai s+t+ri b+hi ra yug+ma pA dau ya dA sa mAp+tau ta dA b+ha bet+pa th+ya/_/e ko\u0f85pi niSh+Thi to na ya di tai ra yug+masta dA bi pu lA/_/gu ru ma d+h+ya brti nau tsed+d+wi tI ya tur+Yau ga Nau dza kA rA khyau/_/ar+d+ha dwa ye b+ha
[\[358a.4\]]ngal bso/_/'dab ma phyi mar bzhi pa'ang de nas 'gyur/_/tsa gsum rnams kyi zung min rkang pa dag_/gang tshe rdzogs pa de tshe 'phrod mar 'gyur/_/gal te zung min gcig kyang rdzogs min par/_/de rnams kyis ni de tshe yangs ma yin/_/gal te gnyis pa bzhi pa'i tshogs/_/lci gnyis dbus zhugs dza dag bshad/_/phyed pa gnyis la gyur
[\[358a.5\]]be taM b+ha bet+ta dA sarba tash+tsa pa lA/_/pUrbAr+d+ha e ba tsat+ke ba le b+ha bel+lak+Sha NaM tu tsa pa lA yAH/_/na s+yAt+bu na ra pa rAr+d+he mu kha tsa pa lA sau ta dA b+ha ba ti/_/nir+d+hiSh+TaM tsa pa lA yA lak+Sha Na ma pi hA ya ya tra pUrbAr+d+haM/_/pash+tsAr+d+ha me ka mA shrit+ya brta te ja g+ha na ce pa lA sA/_/s+yA du b+ha yo ra pi da la yoH
[\[358a.6\]]de tshe/_/kun nas g.yo bar gyur pa yin/_/gal te snga phyed 'ba' zhig nyid/_/g.yo ba yi ni mtshan nyid gyur/_/slar yang phyi phyed la gyur min/_/de tshe de sgo g.yo bar 'gyur/_/gang la bstan pa'i g.yo mtshan nyid/_/snga ma phyed la spangs nas kyang /_/phyi phyed gcig pur brten nas zhugs//de ni lus rten g.yo ba'o/_/gang du 'dab ma gnyis ka yang /_/_
[\[358b\]]
[\[358b.1\]]ShaSh+Tha ga No ya tra dzaH kha kA ro bA/_/pUrbAr+d+ha bats+tsa she ShaHpra ti ni ya mo b+ha ba ti b+ha ba ti sA gI tiH/_/ya s+yA ka e ba da la yo ru b+ha yo ra pi b+ha ba ti ShaSh+Tha ga NaH/_/a pa rAr+d+ha bats+tsa she Sho ni ya ma mastA yA hu ru ba gI ti/_/pUrbAr+d+he ShaSh+ThaHs+yAt+ko ya tra dza khau ru pash+tsar+d+he/_/she ShaHpra ti ni ya mo da la bi paR+ya yang+b+ta ba ti b+ha ba
[\[358b.2\]]drug tshogs dza'am kha nyid yin/_/phyed snga bzhin dang lhag ma yang /_/so so nges gyur de dbyangs 'gyur/_/gang gi 'dab ma gnyi ga'i yang /_/drug pa'i tshogs ni ka nyid 'gyur/_/phyed phyi bzhin dang lhag nges pa/_/de ni nye ba'i dbyangs su smra/_/gang du snga phyed drug gyur ka_/phyi phyed la ni dza'am kha dag_/lhag nges 'dab ma log pa las/_/gyur pa de ni mchog
[\[358b.3\]]ti sad+gI tiH/_/ya s+yA da le da le\u0f85Sh+Tau tsA khyAHShaSh+Thau ga Na stu dzo bA kho bA/_/pUrbAr+d+ha bats+tsa she ShaHpra ti ni ya mo b+ha ba ti b+ha ba ti sAr+YA gI tiH/_/AR+ya dzA ta yaH//_//da tra ya ma yu dzet+mu khe yu dzod+da tsa tuSh+kaM ra la gastu br-iSh+Tha taH/_/bai tA lI yaM ta du ts+ya te
[\[358b.4\]]dbyangs yin/_/gang 'dab 'dab mar brgyad rnams tsa zhes bya/_/drug pa'i tshogs ni dza'am yang na kha/_/phyed snga bzhin dang lhag ma so sor nges/_/gyur pa de ni 'phags ma'i dbyangs su 'gyur/_/'phags ma'i dzA ti rnams so//_//zung min dang por da gsum zung da bzhi/_/phyi ma la ni ra la ga rnams te/_/zung la yang drug bar ma chad du
[\[358b.5\]]la g+hu ShaT+kaM na ni ran+ta raM yu dzoH/_/bai tA li yo pa maM mu khe tse dau pa ts+tshan+da si kaM ra yau tu br-iSh+The/_/A pA ta li kA b+ha ga gan+tA mu kha mi ha bai tA lI ya sa mA naM/_/yug+ma mu khe dAt+da 'au dza dau prA ts+ya br-it+ti ra ba shiSh+Ta mA d+ya batra/_/u dI ts+ya br-it+ti rdza dau ya dA mu kha ma yu dzoHpa ri shiSh+Ta mA d+ya batra/_/_
[\[358b.6\]]min/_/de ni ro langs can du brjod par bya/_/gal te dang po ro langs can lta bu/_/phyi mar ya dag ni nye sdeb sbyor/_/'dir ni dang po ro langs can dang mtshungs/_/b+ha ga ga mtha' kun nas srab pa yin/_/da las pha rol dza da zung dang po/_/lhag ma dang po lta bu rab 'phel yin/_/gang tshe zung min dang po dza da dag_/lhag ma dang po lta bu phyi 'phel yin/_/_
[\[359a\]]
[\[359a.1\]]u dI ts+ya br-it+te rA yug+ma b+hak+p+ra ts+ya br-it+ti yug b+hak+p+ra pr-it+ta kaM/_/s+yAd+b+ra br-it+ta ka yu dzA\u0f85pa rAn+ti kAM/_/a yuk+pa daish+tsa ru hA si nI/_/bai tA lI ya dzA ta yaH//_//a gu ru ra tsa la d+h+r-i ti ru da d+hi tsi pa di ba di/_/gan+te mA trA sa ma kaM li da lAtra/_/b+ho ya di tsa dwi ta
[\[359a.2\]]@#/_/zung min cha ni phyi 'phel las/_/zung cha rab 'phel kun 'phel lo/_/kun 'phel zung ni gzhan gyi mtha' can 'gyur/_/zung min rkang pas mdzes rgod ma'o/_/ro langs can gyi dzA ti rnams so//_//rkang pa rkang pa chu gter tsa ste lci med mi g.yo brtan/_/mthar lci 'dab las yang ba phyi mo mnyam/_/gal te tsa gnyis las
[\[359a.3\]]yA du ba tsi trA/_/tsAt+kha dza e ba bA bi sh+lo kaH/_/kho dzo bA bA na bA si kAr+d+hAtra/_/tsA khyAd+Ya di sa dwi ta yaM tsi trA/_/sa ma nan+ta ra ni ba di ta lak+Sha Na b+hAta/_/mA trA sa mA di pA dA ku la kaM_/a bi di ta br-it+ta pa ri mA pa ri ga taM/_/mu ni nA\u0f85b+h+ya d+hA pi bA dA ku la

[\[359a.6\]]brjod/_/gang gi phyed la brgyad brgyad dag ni ga_/gzhan yang mtha' dag chu gter nor gyis bsgyur/_/yang ba phyi mar bkod pa'i rkang pa spro/_/de ni lus med rtsen du brjod pa yin/_/'dab ma so sor bcu bcu bcu rnams yang ba bkod mthar lci byas shin tu gsal mdzes so/_/dza med rang gi dang po yin ba b+ha bral gang zhig tsa da ka da ka dang tsa
[\[359b\]]
[\[359b.1\]]ya nA di me/_/mA trA sa ma ka dzA tA yaH//_//sarba gu ru br-it+ta mA dau dz+yoSh+Tha gu ro rla g+hu ra d+hAHpa ra sa dr-i shAH/_/pUrbe gAHprA stA re tA ba di mA sarba la g+hu yA batra/_/pid+ga la prAstA raH/_/gu rU pa ri la d+hAHprAstA re paM k+ti/_/r+d+wi gu NA ya tA pra ti ts+tshan+daH/_/gu ru la g+hu b+hir+d+wi
[\[359b.2\]]gzhes dum bu/_/phyi mo mnyam pa'i dzA ti rnams so//_//br-it+tA'i dang po thams cad lci/_/lci gtso'i 'og yang phyi rnams 'dra/_/snga mar lci 'di prA stA ra/_/ji srid thams cad yang de srid/_/dmar ser can gyi prAstA ra'o/_/steng lci 'og yang prAstAr la phreng /_/nyis 'gyur ring po sdeb sbyor so so ste/_/lci dang yang ba'i nyis 'gyur
[\[359b.3\]]gu Na ga Nai/_/re kai ka bar+d+ha te kra ma shaH/_/a ya masma dI yaHprAstA raH/_/e tA ba ti d+h+waM ki mi ti n+ya sri ta dA pha lAd+dal ye tra/_/bi Sha maM sai kaM da la yad+ge i ha sa me laHphal ti naSh+TaM/_/br-it+ta mi daM ka ti tha mi he t+yu pa ri li khai kA d+ya nu kra ma dwi gu NaM/_/ta tra tu

[\[359b.5\]]du gcig sogs rim pas nyis 'gyur bri/_/der ni yang ba'i steng la g+hUr+d+h+wa piN+De sai ke tA ba ti tha mud+d+hiSh+TaM/_/rU paM n+ya s+yot+tiSh+The ra k+Sha ra saM khyaiHsa mo pa ri k+She paiH/_/kra ma kharbai rut+thA nai r+b+r-it+ta ma la g+h+we ka la g+h+wA di/_/pid+ga lI la g+hu kri yA/_/ut+k+Shi pya rU pa mA d+ya ma kr-i te\u0f85pi saM khyAM li khet+ta to\u0f85d+hAH_

[\[360a\]]
[\[360a.1\]]s+thaiH/_/swa swA d+ha ra sa ma mi srar+b+r-it+ta ma la g+h+we ka la g+h+wA di/_/a ya ma sma dI ya la g+hu kri yA/_/kA saM khya br-it+tA nA ma k+Sha ra bA rANi ya ma gu NaM rU paM/_/ud+diSh+TAd+ke Sh+wan+to dwi gu No la g+hu karma piN+Dash+tsa/_/saM khyai ba bar+N+Na gu Ni tA ta tasta dar+d+h+waM ta to\u0f85p+Yu b+ha ya piN+DaH/_/_
[\[360a.2\]]@#/_/nas 'og_/gnas pa'i rang rang 'og mnyam bsre/_/br-it+ta yang med gcig yang sogs/_/'di ni kho bo'i yang ba'i bya ba'o/_/br-it+tA rnams kyi grangs ni gzugs/_/zung gi yi ge'i grangs su bsgyur/_/ud+diSh+Ta yi ang+ka'i mtha'/_/nyis 'gyur yang ba'i bya ba bsdu/_/grangs nyid war+N+Nas bsgyur de nas/_/de phyed de nas gnyis ka'ang sdom/_/_
[\[360a.3\]]A dau war+N+Na ma d+h+ya gu ra bo la g+ha bsta da nu mA trAH/_/a d+h+wA tiR+ya ga d+hash+tsa dwi gu Nai ko nA ni bar+N+Na br-it+tA ni/_/tu l+yA hi gu ru la g+hu nAM b+hU mista trAn+ta rA NAny+tsa/_/a nu pUrbaM prastA ro naSh+Tod+diSh+Ta la g+hu kr-i yA tsai ba saM khyA/_/ta thA d+h+wa yo go br-it+te Shu pra t+ya yaH/_/Sha Di mo la dang por yi ge dbus lci yang /_/de rjes phyi mo rnams yin no/_/_

[\[360a.5\]]g+hu b+hirbar+NA ra hi tA la g+hu ra hi ta naM da lany+tsa ma trA NAM mA trAsh+tsa/_/bar+Na ra hi tA ya thai ba tA ban+ta i ha gu ra baH/_/dwi gu Na gu ru NA tsa mA trA mA tra b+hirbi ra hi tA dwe gu Na bar+NAH/_/gu ru bi ra hi tAsh+tsa war+NA ya thai ba tA ban+ta i ha la g+ha baH/_/gu ru la g+hu piN+Do yA bAn+mA trA gu ru bi ra hi tAsh+tsa yA bat+p+raH/_/mA trA
[\[360a.6\]]yang ba rnams kyi yi ge dor/_/phyi mo'i yang ba dor 'dab ma'ang /_/yi ge dor ba'i phyi mo yang /_/de rnams ji snyed 'dir lci ba/_/lci ba nyis 'gyur gyi phyi mo/_/yi ge nyis 'gyur phyi mos spangs/_/lci ba bral ba'i yi ge rnams/_/de rnams ji snyed 'dir yang ba/_/lci yang sdom pa ji snyed de/_/phyi mo lci bral ji snyed de/_/ji snyed phyi
[\[360b\]]
[\[360b.1\]]la g+hu piN+Da da laM yA bat+tA ban+ta i ha war+NAH/_/la g+ha bo dwi gu Na gu ru yu tA dwi gu NA war+NA bi brdzi ta la g+hu b+hiH/_/gu ru mi shri tAsh+tsa war+NA ya thai ba tA ba t+ya i ha mA trAH/_/pu N+ya me dzA ya ta yan+me dzi na s+ya bi d+yA mi mAM pra sA da ya taH/_/tat+pa ra mar+thaiHpa ra maM
[\[360b.2\]]mo yang sdom 'dag_/de snyed 'dir ni yi ge rnams/_/lci ba nyis 'gyur yang ba bsre/_/yi ge nyis 'gyur yang rnams dor/_/lci ba bsres pa'i yi ge rnams/_/de rnams ji snyed 'dir phyi mo/_/rgyal ba'i rig pa 'di la bdag dad pa'i/_/bsod nams gang zhig bdag la rab skyes pa/_/de yis 'gro kun dam pa'i don
[\[360b.3\]]dza ga to bi d+yAM pra sA da yan+tu/_/shu b+ha mastu sarba dza ga tAM/_/kri ti ri yaM ka li kA la sarba dz+nya rat+nA ka ra shAn+ti pA dA nAM/_/li khi ta mi daM shAkya b+hik+Shu lo ka tsak+Sh+wa gra rat+na d+harma pA la b+ha dre Na/_/_
[\[360b.4\]]dang ni/_/rig pa mchog la rab tu dad gyur cig_/dge bar gyur cig 'gro ba thams cad la'o/_/'di ni rtsod pa'i dus kyi thams cad mkhyen pa rin chen 'byung gnas zhi ba'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa'o/_/'di ni shAkya'i dge slong 'jig rten mig mchog rin chen chos skyong bzang pos bris pa'o/_/_
[\[360b.5\]]slad kyi sa gsum na 'gran zla bral ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa chen po don gyi slad du mtshan smos pa byang chub rtse mo'i zhal snga nas bsgyur ba las/_slar yang de nyid kyi bka'i rjes su gnang ba la brten nas/_bla ma de nyid dang skyes bu dam pa rnams kyi bka' drin gyis bskyangs pa'i dge slong nam
[\[360b.6\]]mkha' bzang pos bsgyur ba las/_slar yang zha lu lo tsA ba chos skyong bzang pos dag par bcos pa'o/_/'dis kyang sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa rin po che dang sems can thams cad la phan thogs par gyur cig//_
[\[361a\]]
[\[361a.1\]{D4304}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_ts+tshan+da rat+nA ka ra nA ma/_bod skad du/_sdeb sbyor rin chen 'byung gnas zhes bya ba/_gsung gi dbang phyug 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/nang gi mtshan mo bshes bral gyi/_/nang gi nyin byed thub pa ni/_/snang ba mchog gi bdag nyid can/_/rgyal ba nyi ma
[\[361a.2\]]la phyag 'tshal/_/rang gi snyan ngag dang gzhan gyi snyan ngag rnams la ji ltar bya ba bye brag tu rtogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir bstan bcos brtsam mo/_/de la dmar ser gyi sdeb sbyor rtsa ba'i mdo dang de'i dper brjod ni rgyal ba'i lhas mdzad do/_/de dag gis mdzad du zin kyang de yon brgyad rnams kyis shin tu
[\[361a.3\]]dben par gyur te/_de ltar ni de la prAstA ra la sogs pa rnams la mdor bsdu ba med pa dang /_lci yang gi ming la sogs pa rnams la tshigs su bcad pas ma bcings pa dang /_phal cher mi gsal ba nyid dang /_ngo mtshar ba'i sbyor ba bstan pa yang ma mdzad pa dang /_ngal bso dang /_lus dang /_ming gi
[\[361a.4\]]ming 'dres pa dang sla ba yang med do/_/dper na/_ra dza dag rma bya'i 'gros so/_/de nas rag dag go/_/[ऽ।ऽ।ऽ।ऽ।ऽ।ऽ।ऽ ]nor dang chu gter la ngal bso ba'i na dag sbyor ba ste/_ma ya dag go/_/[।।।।।।ऽऽंऽ।ऽऽं ]dzA ti tsa la sogs pa'i sgo yis 'byed pa ni snga ma rnams kyi bzhed pa'o zhes pa ni sbyor ba'i rim pa
[\[361a.5\]]med pa'o/_/ro langs can ni ra lag phyi ma'o zhes pa la sogs pa'ang 'don sla ba med do/_/ngal bso dang tshogs dag kyang mi mnyam par bcad pa ste/_de'i phyir tshogs kyi mthar ngal bso ba med do/_/'di la yon tan brgyad po 'di rnams kyang yod cing /_slar dper brjod kyang mdo yis so/_/de'i phyir 'di de
[\[361a.6\]]bas kyang mchog tu gyur pa yin no/_/yang 'dir tshigs su bcad par gyur na/_mdor bsdus tshigs bcad gsal ba dang /_/mdo yis dper brjod bgyis pa dang /_/ma 'dres rim pas 'don pa dang /_/mthar sdod tshogs nyid yon tan yin/_/tshigs bcad ni rkang bzhi can no/_/gang gi rkang pa bzhi dang bcas pa
[\[361a.7\]]de ni rkang bzhi can no/_/rkang pa bzhi rnams kyi rkang pa'i sgra'am/_rkang pa'i don kun sdud pa ni/_/rkang bzhi can te de ni tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya'o/_/de yang br-it+ta dang /_dzA ti'i dbye bas rnam pa gnyis so/_/br-it+ta dang dzA te zhes pa'i dbye ba 'dis tshigs su bcad pa de ni rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur ro/_/yi ge bgrang ba
[\[361b\]]
[\[361b.1\]]br-it+ta yin/_/bgrang ba ni brtsi ba ste gang gi grangs yi ges yin pa de ni br-it+ta ru 'gyur ro/_/phyi mo bgrang ba dzA ti yin/_/gang gi grangs phyi mos yin pa de ni dzA ti ru 'gyur ro/_/gang yi ge re re ba'ang gsal bar 'don par byed pa de ni dbyangs zhes bya'o/_/de ni mdor bsdu na thung ngu dang ring po dang p+lu ta ste
[\[361b.2\]]rnam pa gsum yin no/_/de la thung ngu ni phyi mo gcig pa ste/_de yang /_a i u r-i l-i rnam pa lnga'o/_/ring po ni phyi mo gnyis pa ste/_de ni/_A I U r-I e ai o au rnam pa brgyad do/_/p+lu ta ni phyi mo gsum pa ste/_de ni rnam pa dgu yin te/_ji ltar ring po brgyad bris pa de lta bu'i mthar p+lu ta brgyad rnams
[\[361b.3\]]dang /_dgu pa l-i yig rkyang pa la gsum yig gis phye ba rnams so/_/de lta bas na dbyangs rnams nyi shu rtsa gnyis so/_/gang yi ge re re ba rnams gsal bar 'don par byed pa ma yin pa de ni gsal byed de/_ka la sogs pa nas ha'i mthar thug pa sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_rjes su nga ro dang /_rnam par
[\[361b.4\]]gcad bya dang /_lce rtsa can dang /_mchu can te bzhi rnams dang sum cu rtsa bdun no/_/de lta bas na bstan bcos 'dir yi ge rnams ni lnga bcu rtsa dgu'o/_/yi ge bgrang ba na dbyangs bgrang bar bya'i/_gsal byed rnams ni ma yin no/_/yang 'dir tshigs su bcad par gyur na/_gsal byed rnams ni sum cu
[\[361b.5\]]bdun/_/'dir ni dbyangs yig nyi shu gnyis/_/'di rnams yi ge lnga bcu dgu/_/dbyangs kyi yi ge bgrang bar bya/_/dbyangs thung ngu ni yang ba dang la ste drang po'o/_/dbyangs thung ngu ni yang ba dang la yig gi ming can du 'gyur zhing /_ri mo 'god pa na yang drang por 'gyur ro/_/su kr-i ta kl-i pi/_legs byas nus
[\[361b.6\]]shad la/[ ।।।।। ]rkang pa'i mtha' rnams su phal che ba zhig lci ba dang ga ste 'khyog po'o/_/rkang pa'i mtha' rnams su dbyangs thung ngu phal che ba zhig lci ba dang ga'i ming can du 'gyur zhing /_ri mo 'god pa na'ang 'khyog po'o/_/phal che ba zhig ces pa ci zhe na/_'dra mtshungs la sogs pa rnams la mi
[\[361b.7\]]'gyur ro/_/gzhan du ni zung gi rkang pa'i mtha' rnams su ji ltar 'os pa bzhin du 'gyur zhing /_dbang po rdo rje la sogs pa la ni zung ma yin pa'i rkang pa'i mtha' rnams su yang ngo /_/dbyangs dang bral ba'i gsal byed las snga ma'ang ngo /_/dbyangs dang bral ba'i gsal byed las snga ma gang yin pa'i
[\[362a\]]
[\[362a.1\]]thung ngu de yang lci ba dang ga yig yin te/_'khyog por yang 'gyur ro/_/mr-i t+yuHkiM kl-ip+taH/_shi na nus nas ci/[ ऽऽऽऽऽ ]ring po nyid dang p+lu ta dag kyang ngo /_/ring po dang p+lu ta ni thams cad du lci ba dang ga dang 'khyog por 'gyur ro/_/nA rInr-ItU be d+ho de wau/[ ऽऽऽऽऽऽऽऽ ]lha'i
[\[362a.2\]]cha byad bud med gar dag sgyur/p+lu ta ni nges par yang ste/_in+d+ro\u0f85g+nIkl-i\u0f85p+ta shi khaH/_kl-i\u0f85b+ta shi kha dbang po me dag yin/[ ऽऽऽऽ।।ऽ ]gsum gyi thog ma lci ba b+ha ru 'dod/_gsum gyi ni yi ge gsum rnams kyi'o/_/gsum rnams kyi thog ma lci ba gang yin pa de ni b+ha ru 'dod pa ste b+ha'i ming can
[\[362a.3\]]du 'dod do/_/[ऽ।। ]gang gi dang po yang yin lci ba kho na yang yin pa ni dang po lci ba ste/_dang po kho na lci ba'o/_/de bzhin du phyi ma rnams la yang rig par bya'o/_/dza dbus lci/_gsum gyi dbus ma lci ba gang yin pa de ni/_dza ru 'dod pa ste/_dza'i ming can zhes bya bar 'dod do/_/[।ऽ। ]sa mtha' lci/_mtha'
[\[362a.4\]]lci ba'i yi ge gsum gang yin pa de sa ru 'dod pa ste sa zhes bya bar 'dod do/_/[।।ऽ ]ma kun lci/_thams cad lci ba'i yi ge gsum gang yin pa de ni ma ru 'dod pa ste ma zhes bya bar 'dod do/_/[ ऽऽऽ ]ya thog yang /_thog ma yang ba'i yi ge gsum
[\[362a.5\]]gang yin pa de ni ya ru 'dod pa ste ya zhes bya bar 'dod do/_/[।ऽऽ ]ra dbus yang /_dbus ma yang ba'i yi ge gsum gang yin pa de ra ru 'dod pa ste ra zhes bya bar 'dod do/_/[ ऽ।ऽ ]ta mtha' yang /_mtha' yang ba'i yi ge gsum gang yin pa de ni ta ru 'dod pa ste ta zhes bya bar 'dod do/_/[ऽऽ। ]na kun yang /_thams cad
[\[362a.6\]]yang ba'i yi ge gsum gang yin pa de ni na ru 'dod pa sten zhes bya bar 'dod do/_/[।।। ]de rnams brgyad do/_/yi ge gsum pa'i tshogs de rnams ni brgyad du 'gyur te/_b+ha dang dza dang sa dang ma dang ya dang ra dang ta dang na rnams so/_/yi ge 'di rnams gang du rjes su brjod pa der de la sogs pa'i ming gi mdo rnams rjes su dran par
[\[362a.7\]]bya'o/_/b+ha thog lci ba dza dbus lci/_/sa mtha' lci ba ma kun lci/_/ya thog yang bar dbus yang /_/ta mtha' yang ba na kun yang /_/drug pa nas brtsams te re re 'phel ba'i rkang pas sdeb sbyor rnams rtogs par byed do/_/sdeb sbyor zhes bya ba ni br-it+ta gzhag pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/yi ge drug pa'i rkang pa
[\[362b\]]
[\[362b.1\]]byas pa nas brtsams te/_de nas phyi mar yi ge re re 'phel ba'i rkang pas sdeb sbyor rnams rtogs par byed do/_/dbyangs sgrogs/_rab dga'/_rjes pa ljags/_bri ha tI/_phreng ldan de bzhin gsum bsngags so/_/sdeb spyor gyi rim pa'i rgyun bkod pa de las rim pa bzhin sbyor gyi ming rnams/_
[\[362b.2\]]rnams 'brel lo/_/yi ge drug gi rkang pas dbyangs sgrogs so/_/yi ge bdun gyi rkang pas rab dga'o/_/yi ge brgyad kyis rjes bsngags so/_/yi ge dgus br-iha tI'o/_/yi ge bcus phreng ldan no/_/yi ge bcu gcig gis gsum bsngags
[\[362b.3\]]so/_/so sor re re phyi mar shin tu yang ngo /_/so so'i sgra ni re re'i don to/_/gsum bsngags kyi de ma thag pa'i sdeb sbyor gang yin pa de rnams ni skye 'gro la sogs pa so so re re dang phyi ma shin tu'i ming can du'ang 'gyur ro/_/yi ge bcu gnyis kyi rkang pas skye 'gro'o/_/yi ge bcu gsum gyis shin tu skye 'gro'o/_/yi ge
[\[362b.4\]]bcu bzhis nus ldan no/_/yi ge bco lngas shin tu nus ldan no/_/yi ge bcu drug gis legs spyod do/_/yi ge bcu bdun gyis shin tu legs spyod do/_/yi ge bco brgyad kyis brtan 'dzin no/_/yi ge bcu dgus shin tu brtan 'dzin no/_/so so smos pa ci zhe na/_skye 'gro nus ldan legs spyod brtan 'dzin
[\[362b.5\]]rnams/_shin tu skye 'gro/_shin tu nus ldan/_shin tu legs spyod/_shin tu brtan 'dzin zhes pa'i ming 'di dag tu rim pa bzhin mi 'gyur ro/_/byed ldan dag pa rab kun rnam legs shin tu lhag par las phyi ma yang ngo /_/'di nas phyi ma'i sdeb sbyor ni byed ldan 'ba' zhig pa dang /_rab la sogs pa las phyi
[\[362b.6\]]ma'i ming can yang ngo /_/yi ge nyi shu'i rkang pas byed ldan no/_/yi ge nyi shu rtsa gcig gis rab byed ldan no/_/yi ge nyi shu rtsa gnyis kyis kun byed ldan no/_/yi ge nyi shu rtsa gsum gyis rnam byed ldan no/_/yi ge nyi shu rtsa bzhis legs byed ldan no/_/yi ge nyi shu rtsa lngas shin tu byed ldan no/_/yi ge nyi shu rtsa drug gis
[\[362b.7\]]lhag par byed ldan no/_/de ltar drug brgyad rta rnams so/_/de ltar mdo gsum gyis brjod zin pa'i sdeb sbyor gang yin pa de rnams go rims bzhin du drug dang /_brgyad dang rta rnams so/_/rta zhes bya ba ni bdun no/_/grangs rab tu grags pa'i dngos po rnams ni grangs nye bar mtshon par byed do/_/de ji ltar na gzugs
[\[363a\]]
[\[363a.1\]]ni gcig go/_/zung ni gnyis so/_/me ni gsum mo/_/rig byed dang chu gter ni bzhi'o/_/mda' dang dbang po dang yul ni lnga'o/_/dus dang ro ni drug go/_/'jig rten dang rta dang dbyangs dang thub pa ni bdun no/_/nor lha dang yan lag dang myos byed ni brgyad do/_/bu ga dang gza' ni dgu'o/_/_
[\[363a.2\]]phyogs ni bcu'o/_/drag po ni bcu gcig go/_/nyi ma ni bcu gnyis so/_/srid pa ni bcu gsum mo/_/yid skyes ni bcu bzhi'o/_/mnyam dang phyed mnyam mi mnyam zhes bya ba/_/br-it+ta rnam pa gsum du rab bshad bya/_/de ni dbus phra sogs dang nyer bkra sogs/_/kha sgo la sogs rnams dang go rims
[\[363a.3\]]bzhin/_/mnyam pa dang phyed mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i br-it+ta rnam pa gsum nyid du smra'o/_/de yang go rims bzhin du dbus phra la sogs pa dang /_nyer bkra la sogs pa dang kha sgo la sogs pa'o/_/'dod pa rnams kyi gnas pa sdod/_/gnas pa dang sdod pa dang ngal bso ba dang rdzogs
[\[363a.4\]]pa zhes bya ba ni rnam grangs so/_/br-it+ta dang dzA ti rnams la gang 'dod pa'i yi ges gnas pa de ni sdod do/_/gaN+Da swo dA pa na ya na ru dzA klAn+ta kar+Not+pa lA nAM/_pra Na mats+tsha shAM ka mau li dwi gu NI kr-i ta tsa ra Na ba kha ki ra NA/_'gram pa'i rdul sel mig mdzes ma/_/rna ba'i ut+pal ngal rnams kyi/_/nyis 'gyur byas
[\[363a.5\]]zhabs sen zer la/_/ri bong gis mtshan thod can 'dud/_/'dod pa rnams kyi zhes pa ci zhe na/_mi 'dod pa rnams kyis mi 'gyur ba ste/_e Sha k+Shi ti po bi khyA ta s+phu Ta kIrtIH/_ya s+ye d+h+wa dzi nI ke tU dasta g+ha Nau g+hA/_gang gi rgyal mtshan tog dag ni/_/rgya che stug por tshogs gyur pa/_/grags pa rab rgyas 'di nyid
[\[363a.6\]]ni/_/sa skyong nyid du rnam par bshad/_/rkang pa rnams kyi mtha' la'o/_/thams cad du rkang pa'i mtha' la ngal bso bar 'gyur ro/_/b+ha sogs ud la de ldan no/_/mtha' zhes pa rjes su 'jug go/_/b+ha la sogs pa tshogs pa rnam pa brgyad kyi mthar u yig gyur na ngal bso dang ldan par rig par
[\[363a.7\]]bya'o/_/lci ba'i wa/_lci ba'i sdod dang ldan pa ni wa'i ming can du 'gyur ro/_/yang ba ka/_yang ba'i ngal bsod dang ldan pa'i ka'i ming can du 'gyur ro/_/mdog gsum po 'di rnams ni ngal bso mnyam par bcad pa'i don to/_/'jig rten pa'ang tshogs mi mnyan par bcad pa spangs nas mnyam pa
[\[363b\]]
[\[363b.1\]]bcad pa la 'dug ste/_ngal bso ba la goms par gyur to/_/rkang pa so so la'o/_/rkang pa dag dang rkang pa dag ni rkang pa so so'o/_/'di mnyam pa'i br-it+ta rnams la spyir btang ba'o/_/t+yau tset+ta nu ma d+h+yA/_gal te ta ya dbus phra'o/_/ta yig dang ya yig gal te rkang pa so so la gyur pa de'i tshe dbus phra
[\[363b.2\]]zhes bya ba'i br-it+tar 'gyur ro/_/bstan bcos 'dir mdo nyid dper brjod do/_/de'i phyir mdo'i yi ge nyid kyis prAstA ra bya'o/_/[ऽ।।।ऽऽ ]gal te ta ya zhes pa lus so/_/rkang pa'i mtha' rnams su ngal bso'o/_/de dag gi rkang pas rkang pa so so la'o zhes pa dang mngon par sbrel lo/_/dbus phra zhes pa ming
[\[363b.3\]]ngo /_/de bzhin du phyi ma rnams la yang rig par bya'o/_/mnyam pa'i br-it+ta rnams la mdo rkang pa yin pas lan bzhir bskyar nas tshigs bcad bya'o/_/gzhon nu rol pa dza sa ga_/dza dang sa dang ga yig gal te rkang pa so so la gyur pa de'i tshe gzhon nu rol pa zhes bya ba'i br-it+tar 'gyur ro/_/ku mA ra
[\[363b.4\]]la li tA dz+sau ga/_/_/[।ऽ।।।ऽऽ ]lci yang bzhi pa de ni 'dra mtshungs so/_/gang gi rkang pa so so la ga dang la lan bzhir nges pa de ni 'dra mtshungs so/_/glau tsa tuHsa mA n+ya sau hi/[ ऽ।ऽ।ऽ।ऽ। ]la ga bzhi pa de ni gzhal dpag go/_/gang gi rkang pa so so la la dad ga lan bzhir gyur ba de ni gzhal dpag
[\[363b.5\]]go/_/la gau tsa tuHpra mA N+ya sau/[ ।ऽ।ऽ।ऽ।ऽ ]gal te b+ha dag ga dag rkang bkra/_gal te rkang pa so so la b+ha dag dang ga dag tu gar pa de'i tshe rkang bkra'o/_/tsi tra pa dA ya di b+hau gau/[ ऽ।।ऽ।।ऽऽ ]gal te ma dag ga dag glog phreng /_gal te rkang pa so so la ma gnyis dang lci ba gnyis yin pa de'i tshe glog
[\[363b.6\]]gi phreng ba'o/_/mau gau tsat+s+wA bi d+yun+mA lA/[ ऽऽऽऽऽऽऽऽ ]b+ha las ta la ga bram ze'i bu/_gal te rkang pa so so la b+ha las pha rol tu ta dang yang ba dang lci ba yod pa de'i tshe bram ze'i bu'o/_/dmar ser ni bram ze'i bu rtsen pa zhes zer ro/_/b+hAt+ta la gA mA Na ba kaM/[ ऽ।।ऽऽ।।ऽ ]gal te ra las na sa dag
[\[363b.7\]]gshol gdong /_gal te rkang pa so so la ra las pha rol tu na dang sa yod pa de'i tshe gshol gdong ngo /_/rAn+na sau ya di ha la mu khI/[ ऽ।ऽ।।।।।ऽ ]na dag ma ni lag 'gro khye'u'i bu/_/gal te rkang pa so so la na gnyis dang ma yod pa de'i tshe lag 'gro khye'u'i bu'o/_/b+hu dza ga shi shu su tA nau maH/[ ।।।।।।]
[\[364a\]]
[\[364a.1\]ऽऽऽ ]ma sa dza ga dag pa'i snang bar shes par bya/_/gal te rkang pa so so la ma dang sa dang dza dang ga yin pa de'i tshe dag pa'i snang bar rig par bya'o/_/dz+nye yA shud+d+ha bi rAn+ma sau dza gau/[ ऽऽऽ।।ऽ।ऽ।ऽ ]ma na ya las lci nges 'khar rngar bshad/_/gal te rkang pa so so la ma dang na dang ya
[\[364a.2\]]las pha rol tu ga yin pa de'i tshe 'khar rngar bshad do/_/m+nau yAd+gaHkha lu pa Na baHkhyA taH[ ऽऽऽ।।।।ऽऽऽ ]ra dza ra dang ga ni rma bya'i 'gros yin/_gal te rkang pa so so la ra dang dza dang ra dang lci ba yin pa de'i tshe rma bya'i 'gros su 'gyur ro/_/s+yAn+ma yU ra sA ri NI ra jau rgau//[ ऽ।ऽ।ऽ।ऽ।ऽऽ ]gang la b+ha mi
[\[364a.3\]]sa ga de ni gser ldan no/_/gang gi rkang pa so so la b+ha dang ma dang sa dang ga yin pa de ni gser ldan no/_/rug+ma ba tI sA ya tra b+ha yausgau/[ ऽ।।ऽऽऽ।।ऽऽ ]ma b+ha sa gas bskyed pa myos mar shes par bya/_/rkang pa so so la ma dang b+ha dang sa dang ga yis bskyed pa myos ma ru rig par bya'o/_/dz+nye yA mat+tA ma b+ha sa
[\[364a.4\]]ga sr-iSh+Ta/[ ऽऽऽऽ।।।।ऽऽ ]ta las dza gnyis ga ga zhes 'di nyer 'khod 'gyur/_/gal te ta las pha rol tu dza gnyis dang ga gnyis rkang pa so so la yin pa de ltar na nyer 'khod du 'gyur ro/_/tAdz+dzau ga gi tI ya mu pas+thi tA s+yAta/[ ऽऽ।।ऽ।।ऽ।ऽऽ ]gal te dbang po rdo rje ta gnyis dza lci gnyis/_/gal
[\[364a.5\]]te rkang pa so so la ta gnyis dang dza dang lci ba gnyis yin na de'i tshe dbang po rdo rjer 'gyur ro/_/s+yA din+d+ra badzrA ya di tau dza gau gaH/[ ऽऽ।ऽऽ।।ऽ।ऽऽ ]dza ta dza lci gnyis ni nye dbang rdo rje ste/_/gal te rkang pa so so la dza dang ta dang dza dang lci ba gnyis yin pa ni nye dbang rdo rje'o/_/u pen+d+ra badzrA hi dza tau dza gau gaH/[ ।ऽ।]
[\[364a.6\]ऽऽ।।ऽ।ऽऽ ]de ma thag tu brjod zin mtshan nyid la sogs dag_/sna tshogs rnam rtog rnams kyis rkang pa dag tu 'gyur/_/gang de gnyis ka mnyan 'os ngal bso'i spros pa can/_/de rnams nyer bskyed rnams su dran pa'i dbang pos bshad/_/de ma thag tu brjod zin pa'i dbang po rdo rje dang nye dbang rdo rje gnyis
[\[364a.7\]]ka'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i rkang pa gnyis po dag nye bar spel cing /_de ma thag par brjod zin pa gnyis po rkang pa dag tu gyur pa gang yin pa de dag la rna bar snyan pa'i ngal bso'i spros pa dang ldan par gyur pa de rnams dran pa'i dbang po rnams kyis nyer bskyed rnams su bshad do/_/ci ltar na/_sna
[\[364b\]]
[\[364b.1\]]tshogs rnam rtog rnams kyis te rnam pa bcu bzhi rnams kyis so/_/gnyis ka dag gi yang rkang pa dag ji ltar rigs par gnas gcig pa dang /_gnyis pa dang gsum rnams su 'byung ba'i phyir ro/_/rkang pa bzhi po rnams kyi khyad par yang dang po'i yi ge rnams la'o/_/de'i phyir yi ge bzhi pa'i br-it+ta bzhin
[\[364b.2\]]prAstA ra byas nas blta bar bya ste/_steng ma la dbang po rdo rje dang /_'og ma la nye dbang rdo rje dang /_dbus ma la nyer bskyed bcu bzhi po rnams so/_/b+ha gsum las ni ga dag 'jo ba por 'dod do/_/gal te rkang pa so so la b+ha gsum las pha rol tu ga gnyis yin pa de'i tshe thub pas 'dod
[\[364b.3\]]pa 'jo ba por 'dod do/_/[ऽ।।ऽ।।ऽ।।ऽऽ ]do d+ha ka mits+tsha ti b+ha tri ti yAng+gau/_ma ba ra gnyis pa rig byed 'jig rten shA li nI/_/gal te rkang pa so so la ma yig ba dang bcas shing ra yig gnyis kyang ba dang bcas pa ste/_de ltar rig byed dang 'jig rten la ngal bso ba de'i tshe shA li nI ra 'gyur ro/_/mo bA ro bA shA li nI be+e da
[\[364b.4\]]lo kaiH/[ ऽऽऽऽंऽ।।ऽऽ।ऽऽं ]lci ba ba zhes pas lci ba'i ngal bso dang ldan pa ba'i ming can du byas so/_/gal te de ltar na de kho nas ngal bsor brjod zin kyang rig byed 'jig rten zhes bya ba de ci'i don du zhe na/_gsal bar byed pa'i don to/_/gal te ma ba sa ra ba ni chu rlabs phreng /_/gal te rkang pa so so
[\[364b.5\]]la ma ba dang bcas pa dang /_sa ra ba dang bcas pa ste/_de lta rig byed dang 'jig rten la ngal bso ba de'i tshe chu rlabs phreng ba'o/_/rgyal ba'i lha chu rlabs zhes zer ro/_/mo ba srau pA ya di bA tormi mA lA/[ ऽऽऽऽं।।ऽऽ।ऽऽं ]ma wa na dag wa ni bung ba rol pa'o/_/gal te rkang pa so so
[\[364b.6\]]la ma pa dang bcas pa dang /_na gnyis ba dang bcas pa ste/_de lta rig byed dang 'jig rten la ngal bso ba de'i tshe bung ba rol pa'o/_/mo bA nau bA b+h+ra ma ra bi la si tA/[ ऽऽऽऽं।।।।।।ऽं ]ra las pha rol na ra la ga shing rta dregs/_/rig byed 'jig rten zhes pa ldog go/_/gal te rkang pa so so la ra las pha rol tu na dang ra dang yang ba
[\[364b.7\]]dang lci ba yin pa de'i tshe shing rta dregs pa'o/_/rAt+pa re na ra la gA ra thod+d+ha tA/[ ऽ।ऽ।।।ऽ।ऽ।ऽ ]ra na b+ha ga rnams dang lci bas legs 'ongs so/_/rkang pa so so la ra dang na dang b+ha dang ga dang lci bas legs 'ongs so/_/swA ga tA ra ga b+ha gai rgu ru NA tsa/[ ऽ।ऽ।।।ऽ।।ऽऽ ]na na sa ga ga zhes bya ba zlum por 'gyur/_/gal te rkang pa
[\[365a\]]
[\[365a.1\]]sa so la na dang na dang sa dang lci ba gnyis yin pa de lta bu ni zlum por 'gyur ro/_/na na sa ga gi ti tsa b+ha bed+b+rit+tA/[ ।।।।।।।।ऽऽऽ ]na na ra la ga zhes bya ba bzang ldan nyid/_/gal te rkang pa so so la na gnyis dang ra dang yang ba dang lci ba yin pa de lta bu ni bzang ldan no/_/na na ra la gi ti tsai wa b+ha dri kA_/_
[\[365a.2\]।।।।।।ऽ।ऽ।ऽ ]ra dza ra la dang ni lci ba dkar mor brjod/_/gal te rkang pa so so la ra dang dza dang ra dang yang ba dang lci ba yin pa de'i tshe dkar mor bshad do/_/sh+yen+yu dI ri tA ra dzau ra lau gu ruH/[ ऽ।।।ऽ।ऽ।ऽ।ऽ ]dza sa ta dang ga ga rnams ni nyer gnas 'gyur/_/gal te rkang pa so so la dza dang sa dang ta dang lci ba gnyis
[\[365a.3\]]yin pa de'i tshe nyer gnas su 'gyur ro//dza sau tsa ta ga gAsh+tso pas+thi ta s+yAta/[ ।ऽ।।।ऽऽऽ।ऽऽ ]ra na b+ha sas rgyu zhing 'khor ba zla ba'i lam/_/rkang pa so so la ra dang na dang b+ha dang sa rnams kyis gang du 'khor zhing rgyu ba de ni zla ba'i lam mo/_/tsan+d+ra bar+t+ma tsa ra yan+t+ri ra na b+ha saiH/[ ऽ।ऽ।।।ऽ।।।।ऽ ]dza ta dza ra 'di ni rigs
[\[365a.4\]]gnas nyid du 'dod do/_/gang gi rkang pa so so la dza dang ta dang dza dang ra yin pa 'di ni rigs gnas su 'dod do/_/u shan+ti paM shas+tha mi daM dza tau dza rau/[ ।ऽ।ऽ।ऽऽ।।ऽ।ऽ।ऽ ]gang la ta gnyis dza ra nges par dbang po'i rgyud 'gyur ro/_/gang gi rkang pa so so la ta gnyis dang dza dang ra yin pa de ni nges par dbang po'i rgyud du
[\[365a.5\]]'gyur ro/_/s+yA din+d+ra baM shA kha lu ya tra tau dza rau/[ ऽऽ।ऽऽ।।ऽ।ऽ।ऽ ]na dag ga ba ra ba nor rig byed 'dir sbyor ba'o/_/gal te rkang pa so so la na dang na dang ga dang ba dang ra dang ba ste/_de ltar nor dang rig byed la ngal bso ba de ni sdeb sbyor 'dir sbyor ba'o/_/pu Da i ha ba su be+e dA nau ga bau rbau/[ ।।।।।।ऽऽंऽ।ऽऽं ]dus
[\[365a.6\]]dag la ni dza su dza su chu 'thor 'gro/_/dus dag la ni zhes pa drug pa gnyis la zhes pa'i don to/_/su zhes pa ni sa yig gi tshogs u yig dang ldan pa yin pa'i phyir mthar ngal bso dang ldan pa sta/_b+ha sogs uta la de ldan no/_/zhes bshad pa'i phyir ro/_/dza dang lhan cig pa'i su ni dza su'o/_/gal te
[\[365a.7\]]rkang pa so so la dza su'i rang bzhin gyi drug pa gnyis su gyur pa de'i tshe chu 'thor 'gro ba'o/_/r-i tU dza su dza sU dza lod+d+ha ta ga tiH/[ ।।।।।ऽं।ऽ।।।ऽं ]sa yig chu gter byas pa de nas 'gro byed yin no/_/rkang pa so so la sa yig bzhi rnams bkod pa ni de nas 'gro byed du 'gyur ro/_/a tha to Ta ka mab+d+hi sa kA ra
[\[365b\]]
[\[365b.1\]]kraM taM/[ ।।ऽ।।ऽ।।ऽ।।ऽ ]na dang b+ha dang b+ha ra dal myur yin par smra'o/_/gal te rkang pa so so la na dang b+ha dang b+ha dang ra yin pa de'i tshe dal myur yin par smra'o/_/dru ta bi laM pi ta mA ha na b+hau b+ha rau/_/[ ।।।ऽ।।ऽ।।ऽ।ऽ ]ya yig bzhi rnams kyis ni lag 'gro ltung ba yin no/_/rkang pa so so la ya yig bzhi rnams kyis
[\[365b.2\]]lag 'gro ltung ba yin no/_/b+hu dzad+ga pra yA taM tsa tu r+b+har+Yi kA raiH/_/[ ऽऽ।ऽऽ।ऽऽ। ]ra yig bzhi pa de ni me tog phreng can grags/_/rkang pa so so la ra yig bzhi dang ldan pa de ni me tog phreng can du grags so/_/kIrti tai ShA tsa tU re phi kA srag+bi NI/[ ऽ।ऽऽ।ऽऽ।ऽऽ।ऽ ]sa dza sa sa rnams kyis yi ge nyung ngur grags/_/_
[\[365b.3\]]rkang pa so so la sa dang dza dang sa dang sa rnams kyis yi ge nyung ngur grags so/_/pra mi tAk+Sha rA sa dza sa saiHka thi tA/[ ।।ऽ।ऽ।।।ऽ।।ऽ ]ma ga wa ra ra wa mda' rtas sna tshogs lha mo'o/_/gal te rkang pa so so la ma dang ga dang ba dang ra gnyis pa dang bcas pa ste de ltar mda' dang rtas ngal bso ba de'i tshe sna
[\[365b.4\]]tshogs lha mo'o/_/mgwA re phau bA bai shwa de wI sha ra shwaiH/[ ऽऽऽऽऽंऽ।ऽऽ।ऽऽं ]ma wa na ya ga wa rgya mtsho yan lag chu 'dzin phreng /_/gal te rkang pa so so la ma yig ba dang bcas pa dang na dang ya dang ga dang ba rnams kyang ste de ltar rgya mtsho dang yan lag rnams kyis ngal bso ba de'i tshe chu 'dzin phreng ba'o/_/mo

[\[368b.4\]]nas ra bdun rnams kyis so/_/'di nyid du zhes pa ni mnyam pa'i br-it+ta rnams su rgyun chags bshad par bya ba'o/_/de la rgyun chags dang po ni gtum pa'i char 'bebs zhes bya ba ste/_de yang rkang pa so so la na gnyis dang /_de'i bar ma chad du re pha bdun rnams su gyur pa na'o/_/pra tha ma ka i ha daN+Da kash+tsaN+Da
[\[368b.5\]]br-iSh+Ti pra yA to b+ha pan+na dwa ye nA tha raiHsap+ta b+hiH/[ ।।।।।।ऽ।ऽऽ।ऽऽ।ऽऽ।ऽऽ।ऽऽ।ऽऽ।ऽ ]'dir ni rkang pa so sor re pha 'phel bar gyur rnams chu rgyun rgya mtsho sbrul dang char sprin rol pa'i 'byung gnas shin tu bklubs pa dung sogs so/_/'dir rgyun chags la chu rgyun la sogs par phye ba rnams ni rkang pa so so
[\[368b.6\]]la ra yig re re 'phel bas snga ma snga ma las tha dad du 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste na gnyis las pha rol tu re pha brgyad rnams kyis chu rgyun no/_/dgu rnams kyis rgya mtsho'o/_/bcu rnams kyis sbrul lo/_/bcu gcig rnams kyis char sprin no/_/bcu gnyis rnams kyis rol pa'i 'byung gnas so/_/bcu gsum
[\[368b.7\]]rnams kyis shin tu bklubs pa'o/_/bcu bzhi rnams kyis dung zhes pa de lta bu la sogs par brjod par bya'o/_/de la chu rgyun gyi dper brjod ni mdo yin la/_lhag ma rnams kyis ni drang bar bya'o/_/pra ti pa da mi ha re pha pr-id+d+hAHs+yu tar+N+NAr+N+Na ba byA la dzI mU ta lI lA ka ro d+hA ma shad+khA da yaH/[ ।।।।।।ऽ।ऽऽ।ऽऽ।ऽऽ।ऽऽ। ]
[\[369a\]]
[\[369a.1\]ऽऽ।ऽऽ।ऽऽ।ऽ ]'dir ni na zung dag las ya rnams kyis ni rab bsags gtum pa'i char 'bebs sogs bzhin ra yis rgyun chags bzhin du ya yis so/_/rgyun chags ji lta ba bzhin du rab bsags te/_'on kyang khyad par ni na gnyis las pha rol tu ra rnams kyis rgyun chags yin
[\[369a.2\]]zhing na gnyis las pha rol tu ya rnams kyis ni rab bsags so/_/de bzhin du rab bsags rnams kyang ya yig bdun dang /_brgyad dang dgu la sogs pa rnams kyis gtum pa'i char 'bebs la sogs par dbye bar rig par bya'o/_/rgyun chags la ra yig rnams kyis brjod pa ji bzhin no/_/'di lta ste/_
[\[369a.3\]]rkang pa so so la na gnyis las pha rol tu ya bdun rnams kyis gtum pa'i char 'bebs zhes bya ba'i rab bsags so/_/brgyad rnams kyis chu rgyun no/_/dgu rnams kyis rgya mtsho'o/_/bcu rnams kyis sbrul zhes pa de lta bu la sogs pa rnams brjod par bya'o/_/de la gtum pa'i char 'bebs kyi dper
[\[369a.4\]]brjod ni mdo yin la/lhag ma rnams kyi ni drang bar bya'o/_/pra tsi ta i ha na yu gA d+yaista thA tsaN+Da pr-iSh+Ti pra yA tA da yo yaiR+Ya thA daN+Da ko raiH/[ ।।।।।।।ऽऽ।ऽऽ।ऽऽ।ऽऽ।ऽऽ।ऽऽ।ऽऽ ]mnyam pa'i br-it+ta rnams so//_//mnyam pa'i br-it+ta la rkang pa bzhi rnams kyi mtshan nyid gcig yin zhing /_
[\[369a.5\]]phyed mnyam pa la ni rkang pa zung dag gi gzhan dang /_zung min dag gi gzhan no/_/rkang pa dang po dang gsum pa dag zung min no/_/rkang pa gnyis pa dang bzhi pa dag zung ngo /_/zung dang 'cham pa dang phrugs dang /_mnyam pa zhes pa rnams rnam grangs so/_/zung min dang /_'cham min dang /_phrugs min dang
[\[369a.6\]]mi mnyam pa zhes pa rnam grangs so/_/gal te zung min sa dag sa dang la ga dang /_/zung la b+ha gsum can las ga dag nyer bkrar smra/_/gal te rkang pa zung min dag la sa dag dang /_/sa dang yang ba dang lci ba yin zhing rkang pa zung la ni b+ha gsum dang /_de las pha rol tu ga dag yin pa de'i tshe nye bar bkra ba zhes
[\[369a.7\]]bya ba'i br-it+tar smra'o/_/u pa tsi tra ka mA hu ra yuk+ma yuk+sau sa la gA ya di b+ha tri ta yAng+gau/[ ।।ऽ।।ऽ।।ऽ।ऽंऽ।।ऽ।।ऽ।।ऽऽ ]phyed mnyam pa rnams la mdo phyed yin pas lan gnyis bskyar la tshigs bcad bya'o/_/gal te b+ha gsum can las ga dag gyur pa la/_/gal te slar nyid na dza dza ya myur ba'i dbus/_/_
[\[369b\]]
[\[369b.1\]]gal te rkang pa zung min b+ha gsum las pha rol du lci ba dag yin la/_gal te rkang pa zung nyid la ni na dang dza dang dza dang ya yin pa de'i tshe myur ba'i dbus so/_/b+ha tri ta yAr+Ya di gau dru ta ma d+h+yA ya di su na re ba b+ha ban+ti na dzau dz+yau/[ ऽ।।ऽ।।ऽ।।ऽऽ।।।।ऽ।।ऽ।।ऽऽ ]gal te sa gsum can las lci ba dang ldan zhing /_/gal
[\[369b.2\]]te b+ha gsum can las ga dag shugs ldan ma/_/gal te rkang pa zung min sa gsum la lci ba dang ldan zhing /_rkang ba zung la ni/_gal te b+ha gsum can las pha rol tu lci ba dag yin pa de'i tshe shugs ldan ma'o/_/ya di sa tri ta yaM gu ru yuk+taM be ga ba tI ya di b+ha tri ta yAd+gau/[ ।।ऽ।।ऽ।।ऽऽऽ।।ऽ।।ऽ।।ऽऽ ]gang
[\[369b.3\]]la zung min ta dza re pha lci ba/_/zung la ma sa dza lci ga ni bzang po'i snang /_/gang la rkang pa zung min ta dang dza dang ra dang ga yin zhing /_rkang pa zung ni ma dang sa dang dza dang ga dang ga yin pa de bzang po'i snang ba'o/_/ya s+yAM ta dza re pha gA a yug+maM yug+maM b+ha dra pi rAN+ma sau dza gau gaH/[ ऽऽ।।ऽ।ऽ।ऽऽऽऽऽ।।ऽ।ऽ।ऽऽ ]
[\[369b.4\]]gal te mi mnyam sa dza sa dang lci ba/_/mnyam pa b+ha ra na ga lci ba tog ldan ma/_/gal te rkang pa zung min sa dang dza dang sa dang ga yin zhing /_/rkang pa zung ni b+ha dang ra dang na dang lci ba dang ga yin pa de tog ldan ma'o/_/bi Sha maM sa maM ya di sa dzau sgau ka tu ba tI b+ha re pha na ga gAsh+tsa/[ ।।ऽ।ऽ।।।ऽऽऽ।।ऽ।ऽ।।।ऽऽ ]
[\[369b.5\]]gal te zung min rkang pa ta ta dag dza lci ga_/zung ni dza ta dza ga lci rnams kun bsgrags so/_/gal te rkang pa zung min ta dag dang dza dang lci ba dang ga yin zhing /_zung gi rkang pa la dza dang ta dang dza dang ga dang lci ba yin pa de'i tshe kun bsgrags so/_/A khyA ni kA s+yAt+ya di tau dza gau gas+t+wa yug+pa daM yug+ta dza tau dza gau gaH/_

[\[370a\]]
[\[370a.1\]]gyur cing /_zung gi rkang pa ni na dang b+ha dang b+ha dang ra rnams yin pa de'i tshe ri dgas 'phyong ngo /_/ya di sa tri ta yAd+b+ha ba to la gau na b+ha b+ha rAsh+tsa ta dA ha ri Na p+lu tA/[ ।।ऽ।।ऽ।।ऽ।ऽ।।।ऽ।।ऽ।।ऽ।ऽ ]gal te na na ra dang la dang ga yin zhing /_/gal te na dza dza ra de tshe gzhan sgor 'dod do/_/gal te rkang pa

[\[370b.1\]]b+ha ba ti shi khA/[ ।।।।।।।।।।।।।।।।।।।।।।।।।।।।ऽ।।।।।।।।।।।।।।।।।।।।।।।।।।।।।।ऽ ]mnyam dang mi mnyam rkang pa dag gis yongs su brjod pa nges pa'i gnas ni nges pa dang bral byas pas 'dab mar bkod pa'i nges pa 'di dag ni/_'dir ni rkang pa 'khyog po'i 'gro ba dang ldan 'theng po dang ni

[\[370b.4\]।।।।।।।।।।ऽ।।।।।।।।।।।।।।।।।।।।।।।।।।।।ऽ ]phyed mnyam pa'i br-it+ta rnams so//_//br-it+ta gang la rkang pa bzhi rnams kyang lci yang mtshungs pa'am yi ge mtshungs pa med pa de mi mnyam pa'i br-it+ta'o/_/de kha sgo dang rkang bzhi 'phel dang steng 'gro dang dal gyis 'gro zhes pa rnam pa bzhi'o/_/rkang

[\[371a\]]
[\[371a.1\]]pa'i don te/_kha sgo 'dir bzlog pa'i phan pa zhes brjod do/_/khyad par gang gis she na/_rkang pa zung min dag gi mtsho las phyi ma dza yig gis so/_/dze nA yu dzo ru dA hr-i tA/_bi sa rI tA di te ShA smin/[ ऽऽ।ऽ।ऽ।ऽ।।ऽ।।ऽऽऽ ]kha sgo de nyid gya gyu can du/_/na yig sbyor las shes par bya'o/_/kha sgo de

[\[371a.5\]]b+he nAm+bu d+hesta dwi pu lA/[ ऽऽ।ऽऽ।।ऽ ]re phas de las gzhan yang de bzhin/_kha sgo la thams cad du rgya mtsho las pha rol ra yig gis de las gzhan du 'gyur te/_de bzhin zhes pa de'i yangs ma ste ra yig yangs ma'o/_/re phai Na tsai baM ta to n+yAM/[ ऽऽ।ऽऽ।ऽऽ ]na yig gis kyang de

[\[371b\]]
[\[371b.1\]]gzhan pa'i kha sgo'i mtshan nyid thams cad ni bla re'o/_/a n+ya da to hi bi tA naM/[ ऽऽ।।ऽ।।ऽ ]rkang pa kun las thog ma las sa/_/na min rkang zung rgya mtsho las dza/_/zung min dag gi ji ltar mdzes pas/_/sbyor ba phal cher blta bar bya'o/_/gang gi kha sgo'i bye brag brjod zin pa de rnams dang /_de'i bsdu bas snyan

[\[371b.6\]]la bzhi rnams kyis prAstA ra'o/_/pra tha monyaSh+TAk+Sha raHsA dash+tsa tur+b+hi ra ti war+d+hi tAHpar nyamuSh+mAta/_kra ma sho ya s+ya ta de tan+nA na bi n+yA sa saM sho b+hiHsa la li ta pa da pa da bI kaM pa da tsa tu rur+d+h+waM budAHprA huH/[ ।।ऽऽ।ऽऽऽ ।ऽ।।।ऽ।ऽ।ऽऽऽ ।।ऽऽ।।ऽऽऽऽऽऽ।ऽऽऽ ।।।।।।।।ऽऽ।।।।ऽऽ।ऽऽऽ ]'dir ni rkang pa bzhi ka 'phel la/_ga
[\[371b.7\]]dang ga yi mtha' can rkang pa ma lus yang la/_rol sgeg dang bcas nye bar phan pa ngal bso'i 'gro bas gal te 'jig rten/_dga' ba nye bar 'dren byed AM dang ldan pa'i pI Dar de nas 'gyur te kun nas bcer ro/_/'dir rkang bzhi 'phel gyi rigs nyid la gang gi rkang pa mthar lci ba gnyis dang cig shos thams cad
[\[372a\]]
[\[372a.1\]]yang ba gang la nye bar phan zhing rol sgeg dang bcas pa'i ngal bso'i 'gro ba 'di ltar gyur pas gal te 'jig rten gyi dga' ba yang 'dren par byed pa yin na/_de nas AM dang ldan pa'i pI Dar 'gyur te/de'i tshe kun nas bcer bar 'gyur ro zhes pa'i don to/_/i ha pa da tsa hu ru r+d+h+we/_ga ga ni d+ha na ni kha la la
[\[372a.2\]]g+hu pA daH/_ya di mu da mu pa na ya ti dza ga ti yu ta A dA/_sa mu pa hi ta sa la li ta ya ti ga ti ra tha b+ha ba ti pI DaH/[ ।।।।।ऽऽ ।।।।।।।।।।ऽऽ।।।।।।।।।।।।।।।ऽऽ ।।।।।।।।।।।।।।।।।।ऽऽ ]'dir ni yang dag shin tu lhung ba'i rkang pa dag gi/_rkang pa dang po nye las pha rol/_gnas par gal te yongs su byas te de nas dbus
[\[372a.3\]]su gnas par gyur la/_cig shos gsum rnams g.yo ba med par gnas ni nges par gyur pa me tog kha ma bye ba/_kun nas bcer ba 'di nyid la gal te rkang pa dang po/_/rkang pa gnyis pa 'das shing /_'on kyang gnas phyi ma 'das pa yang ma yin la/bar du gnas pa nyid dang /_de las gzhan pa'i rkang pa gsum rang
[\[372a.4\]]gnas su gnas pa nyid do/_/de lta bur gyur pa ni me tog kha ma bye bar 'gyur ro/_/ya di ni ka Ta mi ha tsa ra Na mAd+yAH/_sa ma ti pa ta ti pA daH/_pa ri kr-i ta pa ra ba sa ti ra tha ba sa ti mad+h+ye/_tra ya mi ta ra da tsa li ta ni dza ni la ya mi ti ka li kA s+yA ta/[ ।।।।।।।।।।ऽऽ ।।।।।।ऽऽ ।।।।।।।।।।।।।।ऽऽ ।।।।।।।।।।।।।।।।।।ऽऽ ]'dir ni yang

[\[375a\]]

[\[375b.4\]ऽ।।।।ऽ।ऽ ऽ।।ऽऽ।।ऽ।ऽ।ऽ ऽऽऽऽ।ऽ।ऽ।।ऽऽ।।ऽ।ऽ।ऽ ]gal te dang po ro langs can lta bu/_/phyi mar ra ya dag ni nye sdeb sbyor/_/gal te dang po la ro langs can dang mtshungs shing phyi ma la ra dang ya yin pa de ni nye ba'i sdeb sbyor ro/_/bai tA lI yo ba maM mu khe tse dau pats+tshan+da si kaM ra yau tu pr-iSh+The/[ ऽऽऽऽ।ऽ।ऽऽऽऽऽ।।]

[\[376b.7\]]mnyam pa'i dzA ti rnams so/_/dzA ti rnams bshad zin to//_//br-it+ta'i sdeb sbyor sngon nyid du brjod zin pa rnams kyang ji ltar gtso che ba dag yin gyi mtha' dag gis ma yin pas/_de la br-it+ta rnams kyi mtha' dag nyung ngus mkhas par shes pa'i don du prAstA ra la sogs pa drug brjod par bya'o/_/br-it+ta'i dang po thams cad lci/_/lci
[\[377a\]]
[\[377a.1\]]gtso'i 'og yang phyi rnams 'dra/_/snga mar lci 'di prA stAr/_/ji srid thams cad yang de srid/_/prAstA ra bya ba la br-it+ta'i dang po thams cad lci ba bri bar bya'o/_/de nas lci ba gtso bo'i 'og tu yang ba dang /_gzhan rnams 'dra ba dang /_snga mar lci ba zhes bya ba'i cho ga gsum rnams ji ltar rigs pa bzhin bya ste/_'di
