[\[377a.4\]]dang yang ba rnams kyis phyi ma re'ang spel bar bya'o/_/'di ni kho bo'i brAstA ra'o/_/'di 'dra 'di lta zhes bya lci/_/de bkod 'bras las 'dab ma bya/_/mi mnyam gcig bcas 'dab ma lci/_/'dir mnyam yang 'bras naSh+Ta'o/_/gang gi tshe mi mnyam pa'i br-it+ta gcig pu de dri bar 'dod pa de'i tshe cho ga 'di'o/_/'di 'dra ba'i rdzogs
[\[377a.5\]]pa 'di lta yin pa ni dper na/_yi ge bzhi pa'i sdeb sbyor la br-it+ta bcu pa ji lta bu zhes 'dri na/_de nyid du bcu bris nas ji srid 'bras bu naSh+Tar gyur pa de srid du 'dab ma bya'o/_/'dab ma ni phyed du byed pa'o/_/der gang mi mnyam pa de la gcig bsnan pa las mnyam par byas nas 'dab ma bya'o/_/'dir lci ba zhes bya ba ni mi mnyam pa'i
[\[377a.6\]]'dab ma la lci ba thob po zhes pa'i don to/_/mnyam yang zhes pa ni mnyam pa'i 'dab ma la yang ba thob bo zhes pa'i don to/_/gang dang gang thob pa de dang de nyid so sor 'phred la phreng du bri bar bya'o/_/de lta bur gyur pa ni 'bras bu naSh+Ta'o/_/[।ऽऽ। ]naSh+Ta ni 'dren byed do/_/br-it+ta 'di du pa yin zhes pa 'dir/_/steng du gcig sogs
[\[377a.7\]]rim pas nyis 'gyur bri/_/der ni yang ba'i steng bsdoms gcig dang bcas/_/'di lta nyid yin zhes pa ud+diSh+Ta/_/gang gi tshe br-it+ta rnams rang gi ngo bos ni du pa yin zhes shes par bya ba la 'di lta bu ma shes pa de shes pa'i don du ni ud+diSh+Ta'i cho ga'o/_/dper na yi ge bzhi pa'i sdeb sbyor la lci ba gnyis dbus na yod pa'i br-it+ta du
[\[377b\]]
[\[377b.1\]]pa yin zhes 'dri na/_br-it+ta de nyid kyi ri mo thor long du bris nas/_ri mo rnams kyi steng du gcig la sogs pa rim gyis nyis 'gyur du song ba rnams rim pas bri ste/_de lta bus de gsal bar brjod par bya'o/_/de la yang ba rnams kyi steng gi ang+ka gang yin pa de rnams ni yang ba'i steng ste/_de rnams bsdoms la gcig dang
[\[377b.2\]]bcas pa bya'o/_/de ltar byas pas grangs gang rnyed pa de 'di lta bu yin no zhes pa ni ud+diSh+Tar rig par bya'o/_/[।ऽऽ। ]'dir yang ba'i steng du gcig dang brgyad do/_/de dag bsdoms pas dgu ste gcig dang bcas pas bcu'o/_/de lta bus de br-it+ta bcu pa'o zhes par 'gyur ro/_/ud+diSh+Ta'i cho ga'o/_/gzugs bkod
[\[377b.3\]]yi ge'i grangs kyis bslang /_/mnyam pa steng du bcug pa yis/_/langs pa rim pas thung ngu ste/_/br-it+ta yang med gcig yang sogs/_/sdeb sbyor 'di la br-it+ta yang ba med pa rnams ni du/_gcig yang ba rnams ni du/_gnyis yang ba rnams ni zhes pa la sogs pa gang gi tshe shes par 'dod pa de'i tshe/_yang ba'i bya ba'o/_/_
[\[377b.4\]]gzugs zhes pa gcig ces pa'i don to/_/de la thog ma nyid du 'og tu gcig bkod nas de steng du rim pas bslang bar bya ste/_rang rang gi 'og ma mnyam pa rnams kyi steng ma steng mar yi ge dang mnyam pa'i grangs kyis gzhug go/_/dper na yi ge bzhi pa'i sdeb sbyor la bzhi rnams kyis so/_/de lta bus re re ba lngar 'gyur ro/_/_
[\[377b.5\]]11de la langs pa gcig dang gnas pa bzhi'o/_/rim pas thung dung byas pa'i langs pa gzhan rnams la gnas pa gsum dang /_gnas pa gnyis dang /_gnas pa gcig ste/_111444366231111_de ltar rdzogs pa'i las la med pa dang /_gcig dang gnyis dang gsum la sogs pa de'i mthar thug pa rnams ngos su bri bar bya'o/_/ci
[\[377b.6\]]22zhig 'grub par 'gyur zhe na/_yang ba med pa gcig dang /_gcig yang ba bzhi dang /_gnyis yang ba drug dang /_gsum yang ba bzhi dang /_thams cad yang ba gcig go/_/yang ba'i bya ba ji lta ba de bzhin du lci ba'i bya ba yang ngo /_/de'i phyir br-it+ta lci ba med pa dang /_gcig lci ba la sogs pa'ang blta bar bya'o/_/dmar ser gyi
[\[377b.7\]]yang ba'i bya ba'o/_/gzugs ni dang por ma byas kyang /_/steng gzhug grang bri de nas 'og_/gnas pa'i rang rang 'og mnyam bsre/_/br-it+ta yang med gcig yang sogs/_/dang por gzugs bri bar bya'o/_/ma byas kyang yang ba'i bya ba'o zhes pa yi ge gcig gi sdeb sbyor la'o/_/kyang gi sgras byas kyang ngo /_/de nas dang po'i gzugs de steng du
[\[378a\]]
[\[378a.1\]]gzhug pa ste/_steng du bkod nas de'i gnas su sdeb sbyor gyi yi ge'i grangs bri'o/_/dper na yi ge gcig pa'i sdeb sbyor la/_11_yi ge gnyis pa'i sdeb sbyor la/_dang po'i gzugs de nyid steng du bcu gnas de'i gnas su grangs bri'o/_/121_yi ge gsum pa la de kho na ltar grangs bris te/_de'i 'og na gnas
[\[378a.2\]]pa gnyis la rang gi 'og gi mnyam pa gcig pos bsre bar bya'o/_/1331_yi ge bzhi pa la de kho na ltar grangs bris la/_de nas 'og na gnas pa gsum dag la/_rang rang gi 'og gi mnyam pa gsum dang gcig pos kyang bsre bar bya'o/_14641_/_'di ni kho bo'i yang ba'i bya ba'o/_/br-it+ta rnams kyi grangs ni gzugs/_/zung gi yi ge'i grangs
[\[378a.3\]]su sgyur/_/ud+diSh+Ta yi ad+ka'i mtha'/_/nyis 'gyur yang ba'i bya ba bsdu/_/sdeb sbyor 'di la br-it+ta rnams du zhes pa nyid shes par 'dod pa la bya ba gsum ste/_dper na yi ge bzhi pa la gzugs bkod nas lan bzhir nyis 'gyur gyis bya'o/_/yang na ud+diSh+Ta'i cho ga'i ang+ka ste/_gcig dang /_gnyis dang /_bzhi dang brgyad rnams so/_/_
[\[378a.4\]]de rnams kyi mtha' ste brgyad nyis 'gyur du bya'o/_/yang na yang ba'i bya ba ste/_gcig dang bzhi dang drug dang bzhi dang gcig rnams te/_de rnams bsdu bar bya'o/_/de lta bus br-it+ta bcu drug tu 'gyur ro/_/br-it+ta'i grangs so/_/grangs nyid war+N+Na sa bsgyur de nas/_/de phyed de nas gnyis ka'ang bsdam/_/dang por yi ge dbus lci yang /_/de rjes phyi mo
[\[378a.5\]]rnams yin no/_/'dir war+N+Na'i sgras gsal byed rnams su ma nges pa'i dbyangs yig brjod do/_/br-it+ta rnams kyi yi ge la sogs pa shes par 'dod pa la cho ga 'di'o/_/dper na yi ge bzhi pa'i sdeb sbyor la br-it+ta'i grangs bcu drug ces pa 'di nyid dang por bris te/_/yi ge bzhi rnams kyis bsgyur bar bya'o/_/de nas phyis de'i phyed dang /_
[\[378a.6\]]de nas kyang phyis de gnyis ka bsdam mo/_/yi ge/_/lci yang /_phyi mo/_/de la dang po ni yi ge rnams te drug cu rtsa bzhi'o/_/dbus ma ni lci ba yang yin zhing yang ba yang yin te/_sum cu so gnyis so/_/tha ma ni phyi mo rnams te dgu bcu rtsa drug go/_/yi ge dang lci yang dang phyi mo'i grangs so/_/yi ge br-it+ta gnyis kyis bsgyur/_gcig dman a
[\[378a.7\]]d+h+wa 'phred dang 'og_/lci yang rnams kyi sa dang ni/_/de la bar yang mtshungs pa'o/_/sdeb sbyor 'di la prAstA ra ji tsam gyi a d+h+wa 'phred dang 'og tu ji tsam 'gro zhes pa shes par 'dod pa la cho ga 'di'o/_/dper na yi ge bzhi pa la/_yi ge bzhi po de rnams gnyis kyis bsgyur ba la gcig dman pa na bdun du 'gyur ro/_/de'i phyir nas
[\[378b\]]
[\[378b.1\]]sam sor la sogs pa bdun 'phred kyi a d+h+wa'o/_/br-it+ta bcu drug po de rnams gnyis kyis bsgyur ba la gcig dman pa rnams sum cu so gcig tu 'gyur ro/_/de'i phyir nas sam sor la sogs pa sum cu so gcig 'og gi a d+h+wa'o/_/de ltar ni lci ba rnams kyis ji snyed pa de snyed du yang ba rnams kyis brtag par
[\[378b.2\]]bya'o/_/ri mo rnams kyi ji snyed pa de snyed nyid du de'i bar rnams kyi'o/_/prAstA ra dang naSh+Ta ud+deSh+Ta/_/yang ba'i bya ba grangs dang a d+h+wa ste/_de ltar drug po de rnams rim pa bzhin/_/br-it+ta rnams la rtogs byed rnams yin no/_/prAstA ra la sogs pa drug mnyam pa'i br-it+ta rnams la rtogs byed yin te/_phyed mnyam pa la ma yin zhing /_
[\[378b.3\]]mi mnyam pa la ma yin la/_dzA ti rnams la'ang mi rigs pa'i phyir ro/_/ji ltar de rnams rtogs byed yin zhe na/_'di rnams kyi gang las ma rtogs pa'i khyad par nyung dus rtogs par byed cing /_bstan bcos mdzad pa rnams kyi yang mkhyen pa phul du byung ba yang dag par rtogs par 'gyur te/_sgra gcan spyod pa la sogs pa brtsis
[\[378b.4\]]pas skar rtsis pa la bzhin no/_/mnyam pa'i br-it+ta rnams kyi prAstA ra mtha' dag la rtogs byed drug rnams bshad zin to/_/br-it+ta 'am/_dzA ti re re la/_lci ba dang /_yang ba dang /_yi ge dang phyi mo rnams kyi grangs shes pa brjod par bya'o/_/de la dper brjod pa ni tshigs su bcad pa gnyis po 'di dag go/_/gang zhig mchog dang gang zhig
[\[378b.5\]]dam pa'i don/_/ma lus don dam lam 'bras rtogs gyur cing /_/skye bo gang yang der ni bskyed mdzad pa/_/sangs rgyas chos tshogs de rnams rgyal gyur cing /_/yaHpa ra maHpa ra mAr+tho ya da khi la pa ra mAr+tha ga ti pha laM bar+t+me/_tadz+dza ni to yash+tsa dza no dza yan+ti te bud+d+ha d+har+m+ma ga NaH/_rgyal chos nad las rgyal ba rgyal gyur cig_/de yi lhan cig
[\[378b.6\]]spyod ma shes rab kyang /_/gnyis la lhag mos sa bon las byung ba/_/lus can 'phags pa'i tshogs rnams rgyal gyur cig_/dza ya ti dzi no d+har+m+mA mo dza ya ti phradz+nyA tsa sa ha tsa rI ta s+ya/_u pa yA di muk+ti nI dza pra sa wa ta nU dza ya ti tsAr+ya ga NaH/_'dir phyi mo rnams lnga bcu rtsa bdun no/_/yi ge rnams bzhi bcu'o/_/lci ba rnams bcu bdun no/_/_
[\[378b.7\]]yang ba rnams nyi shu rtsa gsum mo/_/grangs gnyis gnyis dag bstan nas/_ji ltar rigs par cig shos rnams gsal bar bya ba yin pas de dang de rnams ni 'og dang steng du bkod pa'i las kyi mtha' la blta bar bya'o/_/yang ba rnams kyi yi ge dor/_/phyi mo'i yang ba dor 'dab ma'ang /_/yi ge dor ba'i phyi mo yang /_/de rnams ji snyed
[\[379a\]]
[\[379a.1\]]'di lci ba/_yi ge 40_yang ba 23_phyi mo 57_yang ba 23_phyi mo 57_yi ge40_lci ba ji tsam yod ces 'dri na/_dang po dang mtha' la dbri'o/_/dbus su phri nas 'dab ma'o/_/de lta bus lci ba bcu bdun rnams su 'gyur ro/_/lci ba'i grangs so/_/lci ba nyis 'gyur gyis phyi mo/_/yi ge nyis 'gyur phyi mos spangs/_/lci ba bral ba'i yi ge rnams/_/de rnams ji
[\[379a.2\]]snyed 'dir yang ba/_/phyi mo 57_lci ba 17_yi ge 40_phyi mo57_yi ge 40lci ba17_dang po la lci ba rnams nyis 'gyur du byas te dbri'o/_/dbus su yi ge rnams nyis 'gyur du byas te phyi mos dbri'o/_/mthar lci ba rnams dbri'o/_/de lta bus yang ba nyi shu rtsa bdun du 'gyur ro/_/yang ba'i grangs so/_/lci yang bsdoms pa ji snyed de/_/phyi mo lci bral
[\[379a.3\]]ji snyed do/_/ji snyed phyi mo yang /_bsdoms 'dab/_/de snyed 'dir ni yi ge rnams/_lci ba 17yang ba23phyi mo 57lci ba 17phyi mo 57_yang ba 23_dang po la bsnan no/_/dbus su dbri'o/_/mthar bsnan nas 'dab ma'o/_/de lta bus yi ge bzhi bcu rnams su 'gyur ro/_/yi ge'i grangs so/_/lci ba nyis 'gyur yang ba bsre/_/yi ge nyis 'gyur yang rnams dor/_/lci ba bsres pa'i yi ge rnams/_/de rnams ji
[\[379a.4\]]snyed 'dir phyi mo/_/yang ba 23lci ba 17_yi ge 40yang ba 23yi ge 40lci ba 17_dang po la lci ba rnams nyis 'gyur byas te bsnan no/_/dbus su yi ge rnams nyis 'gyur byas te yang ba rnams dbri'o/_/mthar bsre'o/_/de lta bus phyi mo lnga bcu rtsa bdun du 'gyur ro/_/phyi mo'i grangs so/_/rgyal ba'i rig pa 'di la bdag dad pa'i/_/bsod nams gang zhig bdag la rab skyes pa/_/_
[\[379a.5\]]de yis 'gro rnams dam pa'i don dang ni/_/rig pa mchog la rab tu dad gyur cig_/rtsod pa'i dus kyi thams cad mkhyen pa rin chen 'byung gnas zhi ba'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa'i sdeb sbyor rin chen 'byung gnas zhes bya ba rdzogs so//_//'di ni chos ldan ra za ba dang /_yar klungs pa grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba'o/_/slad kyi
[\[379a.6\]]sa gsum na 'gran zla dang bral ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa chen po don gyi slad du mtshan nas smos te/_byang chub rtse mo'i zhal snga nas bsgyur ba la/_slar yang de nyid kyi bkas rjes su gnang ba la brten te/_bla ma de nyid dang /_skyes bu dam pa rnams kyi bka' drin gyis legs par bskyangs pa'i dge slong nam mkha' bzang pos/_
[\[379a.7\]]shAkya'i dge slong sdom brtson dam pa rnams kyi gtsug rgyan/_sde snod gsum gyi glegs bam gcig pu/_skad gnyis smra ba'i dbang po dpal ldan blo gros brtan pa'i phyag bris kyi rgya dpe la gtugs nas/dpal e'i chos grwa chen por bsgyur cing zhus te dag par bgyis so//_//_
[\[379b\]]
[\[379b.1\]{D4305}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_br-it+ta mA lA stU ti/_bod skad du/_sdeb sbyor gyi phreng ba'i bstod pa/_'jam pa'i mgon po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gzhan don bsgrub slad ngag gi dbang po yi/_/spyod tshul mnyam dang phyed mnyam mi mnyam pa/_/zhes pa rnam pa gsum ni bsdus pa ste/_/_
[\[379b.2\]]rgyas pa las ni mtha' yas rab bstan to/_/gang du rab tu nges pa'i dbyibs grags shing /_/thub mchog rnams kyi mtshan ni yang dag brjod/_/ji ltar rnam mang rnam par bkod pa yis/_/sdeb sbyor tshig kyang mchog tu spros par 'gyur/_/so so'i gzugs ni mthong ba dag las kyang /_/mtha' dag
[\[379b.3\]]rim las lci dang yang ba rnams/_/blo ldan rnams kyis rnam par bgrang bar nus/_/'dir ni gzhan dag rjes su sbyar bas ci/_/legs byas zhal las mngon par 'khrungs gyur pa/_/tshig rnams dag gi rang gi rgyan gcig pu/_/de ni gus pas rnam par bsams pa na/_/khyed kyis 'khrul
[\[379b.4\]]pa 'joms par nus gyur cig_/blo/_dbyangs/_dpal/_rnams/_rang nyid/_gcig pu'i/_sa gang /_rnam mdzes/_rtag tu yang /_lha dang lha/_min sogs su/_rab skyes pa/_de yi yon tan/_dag la smon zhing /_yang dag brten pas/_dri ma dang bral/_gcig min srid par ni/_goms pas
[\[379b.5\]]rnam 'phel ba/_/rtogs pa'i khyad par dag_/legs 'chang rnams kyis brten/_/'dun la gA ya tri bzhin/_/dam pas dang por bsgrags pa/_/gang la sna tshogs dag gi_/dge legs mchog byung 'byung ba/_/phyag na ut+pal sngon po/_/ston pa rol sgeg gnas kyi/_/sku ni rked pa phra ldan/_/_
[\[379b.6\]]'di yis rgyal bar gyur cig_/bcom ldan dang por mdzod cig_/khyod nyid gcig pu la skyabs/_/skye bo blun po 'di la/_/cung zad rnam par gzigs mdzod/_/nyi ma'i 'od zer mi zad pa/_/so ga lhag pa dang bcas bzhin/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa ni/_/khyod nyid thob nas rab tu 'bar/_/_
[\[379b.7\]]rgyal ba rnams kyi gzhon no dag_/gzhon nu yi ni rol pa nyid/_/'dzin yang khyod kyi sku dag ni/_/nges pa kho nar sgeg pa nyid/_/gang zhig rjes su dran pas kyang /_/skye bo'i tshogs rnams dag gi gzugs/_/dman pa'i dngos dang bral 'gyur zhing /_/gyen du 'gro dang ldan par 'gyur/_/gang gi yon
[\[380a\]]
[\[380a.1\]]tan bstod pa rgyas las/_/grogs dang rjes su bsngags pa dag la/_/mchog gi gnas su rab 'khrungs rnams kyis/_/mkhas pa gcig pu rab tu sgrogs byed/_/gang zhig 'jigs rung gti mug mun pas/_/blo yi mig ni nges par bkag pa'i/_/skye bo dag gi mnyam du gsal
[\[380a.2\]]byed/_/rin chen dbyig pa bzhin du gyur to/_/ma lus 'dren pa de nyid nged kyi/_/'gro ba gsum las phul du byung ba/_/thub pa'i dbang po'i phun tshogs dag la/_/'phro ba dang ldan 'jal byed nyid do/_/mi bzad nyon mongs gdung ba 'joms nus/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi rigs la/_/_
[\[380a.3\]]khyod kyi mdzes ldan 'di yi rgyan 'dzin/_/chu 'dzin dag la glog phreng ji bzhin/_/'gro ba khye'ur gyur ba rnams ni/_/lugs dag glog tu 'jug pa bzhin du/_/mtshan ma'i dbyug pa 'dzin mdzad khyod kyi/_/bla ma dam pa'i spyod pa mdzes so/_/'gro ba gsum la rang gi lugs ni/_/gsal bar byed
[\[380a.4\]]cing rgyu chen blo ldan/_/khyod kyi phyag mthil g.yo ba dag ni/_/yal 'dab dag dang mtshungs par byed do/_/lhag pa'i dbang phyug khyod kyi gsung ni/_/bkra ba'i tshig dang ldan pas thams cad/_/de nyid ro la dus mnyam nyid du/_/rtogs pa dang bcas 'dzin pa 'char ro/_/gang la khyod kyi zur
[\[380a.5\]]mig dag kyang ni/_/skad cig rnam gnas mtshan ma thob gyur pa/_/de nyid gcig pus 'byor pa rgya che la/_/go 'phang bkod pa rab tu thob par byed/_/khyod spyan nyid dang yongs su 'dris pa la/_/skye bo'i tshogs 'di legs ldan nyid du ni/_/nye bar gyur ba rgyun du gshol gyi gdong /_/bkod par gyur
[\[380a.6\]]pa'i sa gzhi bzhin du mdzes/_/mchog sbyin de yis yongs su smin pa yi/_/de nyid skyed byed 'di la gang gi phyir/_/khyod kyi gsung gi sa bon btab pa na/_/zhi ba'i gzugs kyi 'bras bu smin par byed/_/nges par dbang po khyod kyi spyod pa dag_/'dir ni rab tu rtogs par su yis nus/_/mun pa
[\[380a.7\]]ldan pa'i dus su chu la ni/_/lag 'gro phru gu dag gis bgrod pa bzhin/_/'on kyang dbang po khyod grags thos pa las/_/skyes pa'i kun dga' brtan 'joms dag gis ni/_/rang gi nus pa rtogs pas bkod pa yi/_/'jig rten kha yi rgyan ni sel bar byed/_/rig dang zhabs rnams dag ni pha rol
[\[380b\]]
[\[380b.1\]]thob cing /_/dpal gyi gnas gyur khyod sku rol sgeg mkhas pa/_/sangs rgyas sras po'i phreng ba dag ni mdzes te/_/chu skyes dag la a ra bin+d+ha ji bzhin/_/rab tu grags pa'i rigs ni 'char byed ri bo/_/shes rab snang ba thabs kyi shing rta la gnas/_/blun po rnam par 'joms nus 'jig
[\[380b.2\]]rten gsum gyi/_/pad+mo can gyi nyi ma khyod la 'dud do/_/sangs rgyas sras rnams mngon par 'byung ba'i sa ni/_/mgon po khyod kyi 'byor ba mchog tu mdzes te/_/ri yi khyad par dag ge rtse mo'i sa ni/_/gser ldan rin chen myu gus mdzes pa bzhin no/_/ma lus mkhas pa'i tshig ni kun dga'
[\[380b.3\]]ldan pas/_/mgon po 'jig rten gsal bar mdzod pa khyod kyi/_/rnam rgyal sgra ni rgyas par byed cing rgyu ste/_/ji ltar kun du sgrogs par byed med pa bzhin/_/rgol ba'i tshogs kyi rab mchog mgo bo'i chu skyes/_/blo ldan dpal gyi gnas gyur khyod gsung 'jig rten/_/yon tan sbrang
[\[380b.4\]]chang sbyor bas myos pas mkhas pa/_/rnams kyang myos par byed cing rnam par rol lo/_/rgyal ba kun gyi 'khor los sgyur ba rnams kyi/_/rigs kyi rgyan gyur khyod la gsal ba nyid du/_/gzhon nu nyid ces bya bar 'dod pa de ni/_/rma bya'i 'gros la dman pa nyid gyur bzhin no/_/dag cing rnam
[\[380b.5\]]mdzes yan lag so so dag tu/_/rab gsal rang gi mdzes pa phun sum tshogs pa/_/sna tshogs rnam par 'phro ba'i 'od zer phreng ldan/_/khyod kyis rgyan phreng zil gyis mnan par gyur to/_/smra ba po bdag de nyid tshul 'chad sgrub la/_/khyod kyi lag g.yo phan tshun phrad pa dag las/_/sgra snyan
[\[380b.6\]]sgrogs par byed cing gdub bu dag ni/_/g.yo ba dag gis 'gro rnams bsrung bar gyur cig_/khyod kyi gzugs dang yon tan tshogs dang grags pa dag_/phul byung ldan 'di ma lus yang dag mthong gyur nas/_/rang gi yul la dga' bral rnam par 'dzin byed cing /_/gsum bsngags dag la 'gro
[\[380b.7\]]ba dman par nye bar gyur/_/gtso bo khyod kyi sku ni kun nas bzang ldan pa/_/mi chung rtse ba dag gi khu ba lta bu yi/_/mdzes pa'i rgyun ni dpe med rab tu 'phro ba dag_/su yi dga' ba dag ni skyed par byed ma yin/_/ston ka'i bdud rtsi'i zer gyi 'od zer 'phro ba dang /_/kha ba dang mtshungs dri ma
[\[381a\]]
[\[381a.1\]]dang bral dkar ba yi/_/mu tig phreng ba zlum po 'di ni khyod thugs la/_/yon tan tshogs pa bzhin du khyod la rnam par mdzes/_/ring du rgyas pa'i dri bzang dag la chags gyur cing /_/legs par 'ongs pa bung ba'i tshogs ni sgrogs byed pas/_/yid bzang dag las
[\[381a.2\]]yid bzang ldan pa dzA ti yi/_/grags pa rnam par rgyal ba bzhin du sgrogs byed cing /_/dri bzang rab gsal sbrang rtsi'i gter ni lhag gyur pa/_/gzhi mnyam dag gi phye ma 'dzin pa bzhin du ni/_/'dab mar bder nyal bud pa'i rtse dga' yongs ma rdzogs/_/khyod kyi chu skyes sngon po'i
[\[381a.3\]]dpal 'di rnam par mdzes/_/gang gi yun ring dag tu mig 'dzums bral bar ni/_/'di 'thung byed pa mig gi tshogs pa thob gyur pa/_/khyod kyi gzugs kyi bcud len goms par gyur pas na/_/nor lha kho na mang du mchod par bya ba'i mchog_/rin chen zur phud tshogs btud rab tu dga'
[\[381a.4\]]ldan zhing /_/lag pa'i thal mo sbyar bas skal ldan rnams kyi ni/_/gus pas yun ring dag tu bya ba gzhan bral bar/_/khyod kyi zhabs gnyis 'di ni nye bar bsten gyur to/_/blo yi dbang po khyod kyi zhabs kyi pad+mo dag_/nye bar bsten pa gal te rab tu grub gyur na/_/dbang po'i 'byor ba tshangs pa
[\[381a.5\]]dag gi dpal gyis ci/_/de dag las kyang khyad 'phags phun sum tshogs pas ci/_/khyod bsten dag las phyi rol phyogs rnams dbang med du/_/drag po'i las dang nyon mongs dag gis nges par ni/_/skye ba bgrod dka' 'di la nyams pa thob byed de/_/chu gter dbus su rlung dang rlabs kyi
[\[381a.6\]]gru gzings bzhin/_/shin tu mtha' bral srid pa dag gi bar du ni/_/skyon med ring du mthong ba'i yid can rnam dag gi_/khyod ni yongs bsten yid kyi shing rta 'phyar gyur pa/_/sems kyi rgyud ni ci yi rnam par 'phro ba yin/_/khyod kyi zur mig gzigs pa yis kyang bsod nams skabs/_/_
[\[381a.7\]]'phags pa'i bden pa'i bdud rtsi dag ni thob gyur cing /_/rnam par 'phrul ba bzhi chad dag la dga' ba ni/_/shes rab rab tu rgyas ldan ci yang 'byung bar 'gyur/_/gdud pa gcod byed bstod pa'i tshogs rnams dag gi gnas/_/shin tu dam pa'i yid 'phrog khyod kyi grags pa ni/_/_
[\[381b\]]
[\[381b.1\]]sdug ldan zla ba'i zla 'od rlan ldan tsan+dan ltar/_/dkar ba dag gas phyogs bcu shin tu brgyan par gyur/_/rtse mo du mas mtho zhing mngon par 'phags gyur pa/_/yang dka' sems can lta ba khyod la bsten pa las/_/rim gyis rab tu nyams par 'gyur te mi bzad pa'i/_/dbang po'i rdo
[\[381b.2\]]rjes bsnun bcom ri yi gzugs bzhin no/_/rnam rgyas chos kyi mnga' bdag dngos po legs ldan pa/_/rab mtho seng ge'i khri la yang dag bzhugs pa khyod/_/zhi ba'i dbang po nye dbang rdo rje'i mtshon byed po/_/zhi ba 'dod pa rnams kyis nye bar bsten par gyur/_/de ma thag tu rab brjod
[\[381b.3\]]mtshan nyid 'byor gyur pa/_/khyod kyi zhabs dag mnyan 'os bgrod pa spros pa yang /_/gang dag rnams kyi mig gi spyod yul du gyur pa/_/de dag lha rnams nye ba'i ris te bsngags par 'os/_/rab 'dod bdag nyid yon tan thams cad rjes su 'phrog byed/_/gzhan dag yod par gyur kyang the tshom
[\[381b.4\]]med par khyod ni/_/gzhan dang thun mong min pa'i blo gros dag gi bdag po/_/lus med dag las rgyal ba rigs la gnas par gsung ngo /_/byis pa'i dbyibs can mdzes shing rnam par bkra ba'i rgyan ldan/_/gser gyi mdog can mi 'khrugs cod pan dag dang bcas shing /_/thub dbang
[\[381b.5\]]rigs kyi rgyan ni 'byung ba dag gi dpal gyur/_/ngag gi dbang phyug la ni ngag blo lus kyis 'dud do/_/tshig bzang rnams kyi tshig ni shin tu mang po yis kyang /_/lhag pa'i mgon po khyod kyi yon tan pha rol ma phyin/_/bdag gi ston pa rab tu nyung ba 'di yang /_/rang nyid dga' ba tsam bskyed
[\[381b.6\]]skal ba bzang po nyid do/_/dbyangs can dbang po khyod la dbyangs can yon tan rab 'bar/_/gsal ldan ma lus rgyan rnams dag gis bsngags par 'od ldan/_/bsod nams bsten pa'i zhal gyi chu skyes las ni 'byung rnyed/_/dam pa'i yon tan phreng ldan rang nyid nye bar bsten to/_/mda' lnga
[\[381b.7\]]pa yi mda' de dag ni bcom pa dag dang /_/zhe sdang ma dag glan zhing rmongs pa'i blun pa nges sel/_/mgon po 'jig rten gsum po rjes 'dzin gyis 'brel gzugs can/_/khyod nyid kyi ni mthu las yon tan sna tshogs legs thob/_/shin tu brtan las yon tan tshogs kyi rin chen bkra
[\[382a\]]
[\[382a.1\]]bas/_/nang gi yongs su gang bas chu yi phung po'i lugs dang /_/kun nas nyon mongs me rab zhi byed dam chos chu yi/_/char rgyun dag gis chu 'dzin phreng ba'i rol ba 'dzin no/_/khyod kyi mdun dag tu ni mchog dang dam par rab 'dod/_/spobs pa dag dang bral ba'i
[\[382a.2\]]phyir la smra ba po rnams/_/myur ba dang ni bul bar brjod pa'i tshig rnams dag kyang /_/lkugs pa'i gnas skabs dag ni rnyed slar mang du bzhed do/_/'gro ba gsum po dag kyang gtsang ma nyid du byed cing /_/bsil zer ldan pa'i zer ltar rab tu dkar ba'i 'od can/_/grags pa dag ni yun
[\[382a.3\]]ring gnas pa khyod las 'byung ste/_/lha yi ri rtse las kyang dal gyis 'bab pa dag go/_/brtse ba dag gi rang gnas khyod kyi grags pa 'di yis/_/mkhas pa dag gi snying ni shin tu 'phrog par bgyid de/_/phyogs phyogs dag tu kun+da'i 'khri shing kun nas rab tu/_/rgyas pa'i me tog
[\[382a.4\]]tshogs ni bsags pa dag gi bzhin no/_/chos dbyings gsung gi dbang phyug dag gi ral ba 'dzin cing /_/sangs rgyas mang po bya ba sprul pa la ni mkhas gyur/_/brtse ba'i chu gter mdzes pa'i tshogs pa nye bar 'dzin pa/_/su zhig 'di ni 'gro ba rnams kyi sdig pa 'joms so/_/mkha' yi
[\[382a.5\]]rlabs ldan dag gi g.yo ba'i rlabs kyi 'od ni/_/'od zer tshogs la rnam par reg par gyur ba bzhin du/_/ya mu ni ya chu yi dba' rlabs lta bur sngo ba/_/khyod kyi ral gri skabs gzhan dag tu rnam rol/_/zhes pa 'di ni mkhas pa chen po stag sde ba seng ge rgyal mtshan gyi sras kyi thu bo/_phyi dang
[\[382a.6\]]nang gi gzhung lugs rgya mtsho'i pha rol du son pa/_de dus na 'gran zla dang bral ba'i mkhas pa chen po skad gnyis smra ba rnams kyi gtsug gi nor bu shang ston rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi zhal snga nas bsgyur ro//_//@##/_/sid+d+hi rastu/_mgon po rang gi gzugs kyi bdag po khyod kyi
[\[382a.7\]]gzugs ni/_/yid 'phrog do shal phreng bas dga' 'os 'di 'dra gang na/_/shin tu gdul dka'i sems can zhi ba'i ched du 'phro ba'i/_/'jigs rung rgyan cha lag 'gro rab tu thob pa'ang gang na/_/dbang po bar mtshams med pa'i mu tig rnams kyi tshogs kyis/_/brgyan pa khyod kyi sku 'di rab
[\[382b\]]
[\[382b.1\]]mdzes ma lI k+sha yi/_/dus su bsten pa 'os pa me tog phreng ba gsar ba/_/ldan pa lta bur su yi snying ni 'phrog par mi byed/_/mgon po kwa ye gal te khyod kyi mdzes pa bdud rtsi'i/_//chu gter rlabs chen byas par ngal ba mchog tu ston na/_/'gro ba'i mig ni rab tu mdzes par rtogs par
[\[382b.2\]]byed par/_/mngon par 'dod pa dag dang ldan par 'gro bar byed do/_/mchog sbyin srid las 'das par bdag gi yan lag rnams ni/_/gdon mi 'tshal bar gsal ba kho nar dga' ba dang bral/_/bsten par 'byung mod khyod kyi gsung gi bdud rtsi'i btung ba'i/_/snod gyur rna ba zung sbyar
[\[382b.3\]]pa 'di dga' ba'i rgyu'o/_/mthu stobs mnyam pa med pa gang zhig khyod la bsten yang /_/zhi ba'i bdud rtsi bcud rnams la ni dga' dang bral ba/_/blun po g.yengs pa'i blo can bdag lta bu yi skye bo/_/mi 'byung 'gyur ba'i rab mchog gcig po 'di ni khyod la slong ngo /_/lus 'dzin rnams
[\[382b.4\]]kyi mig gi dga' ston sgrub la zla ba/_/khyod kyi drin gyis dge ba yang dag rgyas pa'i dbang las/_/skye bo mkhas rnams srid pa zhig pa rnams kyi lam ni/_/dbye ba brgyad dang ldan par bde blag kho nar 'gro'o/_/ngag gi rgyal po khyod kyi zhabs la brten pa'i blo yis/_/snying po thob pa'i skal
[\[382b.5\]]ldan rnams ni 'gro ba kun du 'ang /_/bde dang sdug bsngal khyad par 'phags la sogs pa'i rgyu ni/_/skyes pa rnams kyis dran pa nyams par 'gyur ba med do/_/khyod kyi zhabs dag yongs su bsten par 'os pa rnams kyi yid/_/ma lus dri ma'i tshogs dang bral las gsal ba'i ngang tshul can/_/rab
[\[382b.6\]]tu rgyas pa'i yon tan dag gis che ba'i blo gros dag_/phun tshogs rang bzhin bde ba ci yang 'gro bar skyed par byed/_/dag par byas pa'i gser ldan mdzes pa'i sku can mchog tu sgeg_/gsal ba'i gsung gi ngang mo rnams kyis bsten bya rgyal ba yi/_/yid mtshor pad sdong ldan pa gcig por
[\[382b.7\]]ngang pa snyan sgrogs te/_/'jam pa'i dbyangs zhes grags pas 'dir ni khyod la bsrung gyur cig_/mgon po bzod par dka' ba'i nyon mongs 'di gsum rnams la ni/_/rnam par dpyod pa phra mo dag kyang gal te bya dka' bar/_/gsal bar 'gyur na 'jig rten gsum po 'dir ni mig dang yid/_/_
[\[383a\]]
[\[383a.1\]]dga' byed sku 'di 'dra ba thob pa nges par gang na zhig_/che ba'i 'od zer 'phro ba'i rin chen tshogs rnams 'dzin pa yi/_/chu yi gter du chu rnams rnam par gsal bar byas nas ni/_/gal te nges par blta bar gyur na khyod lta bu rnams kyi/_/sku la mdzes pa'i rgyun ni rab mdzes 'di lta bu
[\[383a.2\]]'di yang /_/mgon po zab mo'i sgra dbyangs mthon po rnams kyis khyod la gang /_/yid 'ong bdud rtsi'i rgyun rnams 'bebs byed dga' dang skal bzang dag_/spro byed spyod tshul shin tu yid 'ong dbyar gyi tshu 'dzin gyi/_/rjes su gsal bar 'gro ste de nyid rma bya myos byed kyang /_/dpyid zla bzhin du
[\[383a.3\]]khyod la 'gro ba gsum po rab dga' ba/_/bla med skyed byed ut+pal shing gi yal ga mig gi ni/_/mdzes pa'i me tog gis mthong sbrang rtsis myos pa bung ba yi/_/sgra rnams 'jam pa'i dbyangs byed tshul can 'di yis rgyal gyur cig_/khyad par 'phags pa'i yon tan kun gyis dga' ba mchog rab thob
[\[383a.4\]]pa yi/_/shes ldan sbrang rtsi'i brtul zhugs rnams kyis nye bar bsgrags par bya ba/_/rgyal ba'i lugs kyi rgyan du gyur pa khyod kyi spyod tshul kho na/_/dpyid kyi thig le tsU ta gsar pa dag ni min nam snyam mo/_/gdong pa bskyogs pas gdong phyogs ri dgas bdag po'i rgyal la bcibs pa/_/_
[\[383a.5\]]thugs rjes shin tu mchog tu gyur cing mngon par mtho ba'i rtsa ba/_/rab tu mdzes pa nyid kyis gser dang kha ba'i rkang ba bzung ba/_/smra ba'i rigs kyi lha nyid la ni dal bu min par phyag 'tshal/_/spros pa mtha' dag rab tu zhi bar gyur dang sgrib pa med pas/_/rab tu rgyas pa'i blo dang ting nge 'dzin gyi
[\[383a.6\]]bdud rtsi bsten pa/_/khyed kyi thub pa'i spyod tshul mi phan 'joms pa'i rnam par gnon pas/_/gzhan gyis mi thub pa yi srid pa gsum rnams 'dul bar byed do/_/rab tu 'jigs su rung ba'i yul can rnams kyi brtse ba med pa'i/_/spyod pas rab tu zhi ba sgrub pa'i ched du 'ga' zhig tu yang /_/thugs
[\[383a.7\]]rjes khyod kyi phyag gi yongs 'joms phreng ba bzhin du 'jigs rung /_/rnam pa sna tshogs mtshon cha sgrogs par byed rnams rnam par rol lo/_/mchog sbyin dge legs longs spyod dang ni yul la chags pa bral ba/_/'khrul ba med dang bdud rab 'joms dang srid gsum la phan phun sum/_/tshogs
[\[383b\]]
[\[383b.1\]]pa'i go 'phang thob dka' mi 'phrogs mngon par 'dod pa rnams kyi/_/de yang khyed la gus pa la ste lam gzhan gnod med med do/_/gal te dbang po rnams ni bsdams pas 'ga' zhig dag tu gus pa/_/g.yo ba med pa'i blo can khyod kyi cha shas ci yang bsgoms na/_/skye bo 'di la ring bor mi thogs
[\[383b.2\]]chu gter ska rags dag gis/_/brgyan pa'i nor 'dzin 'di ni rang nyid nges par 'dam par byed do/_/khyod kyi 'dun sar 'chi med bud med rnams ni nges par yang byas kyang /_/mdzes pa 'dod pa bzhin du rdul gyis gang bas rnam rol spu long rnams/_/mchog tu thon pa rnams kyi nu ma gas shing ska
[\[383b.3\]]rags ches cher bcings pa yi/_/stobs can ches cher 'dar ba'i 'dod lha'i rnam par bsgyings pa 'dzin par byed/_/gang gi yan lag rnams kyis dpe yod min pa'i dga' 'os bsten pa yis/_/mchog tu rgya che'i gzugs gzhan ma lus rnams la dga' bar 'phrog par byed/_/sku lus nyams pa med
[\[383b.4\]]pa dbang po'i mda' rten rnam par 'dul ba yi/_/gzhi yi mchog rab sna tshogs 'od zer phreng ba ldan 'di rgyal gyur cig_/rgyal ba'i khur bu zhal gyis mches pa khyod kyi 'dun sar dga' ba yis/_/ting ting lcags dang ma 'brel med par bsgrags pa'i sgra snyan phra mo yis/_/rnam par bsres pa'i
[\[383b.5\]]rgyud ma bskyod pa mdzes pa'i lnga pa lta bu dag_/rang gi che ba 'dod pa'i tshul can sgra dbyangs sred pa 'chad par byed/_/mgon po 'gro ba pham par byed pa'i glang po g.yo med byed pa yi/_/lcags sgrog dra ba lta bu'i dpung rgyan dag gis brgyan par byas gyur cing /_/ngan 'gro'i lam gyi sgo gtan chen po
[\[383b.6\]]rab dregs yid srub 'joms byed pa/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i dga' ba khyod kyi phyag gi ljon shing rgyal gyur cig_/bdag po khyod kyi mchog las rnam par rgyal bas yang dag bsags pa yi/_/grags pa'i dpal ni srid pa'i spyi bor che ba'i yon tan phun tshogs pa/_/'byung bar byed pa dri ma
[\[383b.7\]]mtha' dag rnam par bral bas gtsang ba yi/_/rjes su ston ka'i ri bong can gyi cha shas dag gis 'gro bar byed/_/dri bzang dag la gsal bar 'dus pa'i sbrang rtsir byed pa'i na chung rnams/_/'khor ba bzod pa bde bar gshegs pa sngon po'i bde ba 'phel byed pa'i/_/phreng ba ro yi khu ba ldan pa 'chi
[\[384a\]]
[\[384a.1\]]med bdag po'i bud med kyis/_/rnam par bkod pa 'di ni khyod kyi spyi bor rnam par rol par byed/_/gang phyir brtse las 'das blo can la sdom brtson min pa'i go 'phang bgrod/_/'gro ba gzhan la phan pa'i mkhas pa rnams ni rab tu rgyas par mdzad/_/ces te khyed kyi
[\[384a.2\]]yon tan kha ba bsags pa'i mdzes pas nam mkha' yang /_/rang gi nor bu nyi ma nye bar bcom pa can ni skyed par byed/_/shin tu dga' bar mdzad pa'i gsung can rgyun chad med par gsar ba dang /_/gsar par bstod pa sdom brtson legs par bsdams pa mchog rnams dag gis
[\[384a.3\]]ni/_/yon tan dgrang bya min pa khyod kyi yon tan tshogs kyi tshad rnams ni/_/chu gter rnams kyi nor bu'i tshogs kyis ji ltar yang dag 'jal bar byed/_/thugs rje shin tu che ba byis pa'i blo can rnams kyis bkod pa'i skye bo/_/mtha' dag rnam mang rnams kyi sna tshogs blo yi
[\[384a.4\]]rol pa byed pa rnams kyis/_/g.yo ba med pas brtan pa ma lus 'gro ba la rung longs spyod rnams kyi/_/sa gzhi lta bu khyod kyi sku lus 'di yis 'dir ni rgyal bar gyur cig_/blun po'i blo can rnams kyi ngor ni thugs rje yang dag lhag cing lci ba/_/dge las byung ba yang dag
[\[384a.5\]]tshogs pa phyag gi mthil du ut+pal bsnams pa/_/rgyal ba'i rigs kyi sa yi khor yug rnams ni khyod kyi khur bur bskur bar/_/dka' ba min zhes 'di na blo gros chung ngu rnams kyang sgrogs par byed do/_/mgon po nam mkha'i bar du bkram pa'i chang gi dri bzang pa bsnams pas/_/_
[\[384a.6\]]gsang mthor smra ba myos shing sgrogs pa'i lag ldan tshogs rnams 'joms par byed cing /_/sgrogs la 'bad pas sprin las rgyal ba glang chen dbang po'i rnam par rol pa/_/rgya che ba ni sna tshogs nags kyi nang 'di rnams su 'dzin par mdzad do/_/'gro la phan pa bsgrub par
[\[384a.7\]]bya ba'i blo yis go cha bcings pa khyod la/_/yongs gdung phra mo gang na'ang ci zhig kwa ye dam bcas nyams pa med pa/_/gang phyir bdud kyi chung ma'i skye bo'i lag pa dag ni 'dod par 'os pa'i/_/'gram pa'i gzhi la mkhur rtsi gsar pa 'god par byed la le lo kho na'o/_/dpe med
[\[384b\]]
[\[384b.1\]]dga' 'os gzugs can mya ngan rnam par bsal ba'i rgyal ba'i tshogs rnams/_/gzigs pa khyod kyi gzhon nu'i rol pa gser bzang gis ni stag gi sen mo'i/_/ri mo bris shing rab mdzes zur phud lnga rnams rnam par bkod par byas pa/_/'di yis 'jig rten skyong ba brgyad po rnams ni lhag par
[\[384b.2\]]dga' bar mdzad do/_/ji ltar 'dir ni khyod kho na la mchog gi nyams kyi khyad par rab 'dod pa'i/_/'byor pa ma lus bde ba'i yal ga'i rtse mo ldan pa yang dag 'byung 'gyur ba/_/de ltar bdag gis yon tan rnams kyis shin tu khyab pa lta bur 'gro rnams kyi/_/ci zhig ltar gyur cig ces khyod kyi 'dun
[\[384b.3\]]sa dal bus 'dir ni yongs smin gyur/_/'chi med ri bo'i lto ba lta bur brang gi gzhi ni rnam par yangs pa can/_/zhabs kyi yal ga'i 'od zer thang las skyes pa'i pad+ma'i nags kyi gzugs brnyan te/_/snang bar byed pa brgya phrag rnams las lhag par gsal ba'i gzi yis brgyan byas pa/_/mthar byed dregs pa
[\[384b.4\]]'joms byed srid gsum mgon po'i sa rnams 'dzin pa rgyal gyur cig_/rnam par rmongs pa rgya che'i mun pa'i tshogs kyis nges par bcings pa rnams kyis ni/_/khyod zhabs pad+ma dag ni bsten pa'i dga' ston bde la gal te mi gus na/_/sa 'og phug pa rgya che srid pa dog po rnams su gnas pa don med cing /_/yun rings
[\[384b.5\]]bdud rnams kyis ni bcom mo gzhon nu rgyal ba'i rigs kyi nyi ma kye/_/bdag po phyogs su ljid pa'i brtse ba bsten pa'i sdom brtson rigs kyi khyod la ni/_/mchog tu 'dus pa rnams kyis tshe ni shin tu g.yo ba 'di rnams bskul ba ni/_/brgya phrag rnams su nye bar bsgrubs pa'i 'bras bu chen po lta bur rnams byas te/_/_
[\[384b.6\]]chu skyes 'dab ma ltung ba'i chu ni rgyan du rung ba'i dngos por gyur pa bzhin/_/mchog sbyin khyod kyi yon tan rnam par rgyas dang 'dris pas dag par byas pa yis/_/ngag gi 'byor pa can ni sbrang rtsi'i rang bzhin snyan tshig gzhi dang dga' ldan pa'i/_/mchod sbyin ldan dang rna ba'i bdud rtsir mngon par mchod pa'i gzhir
[\[384b.7\]]gyur nges brjod kyi/_/bum pa can gyi zhal ni zhal bzang byed po de gcig pu yis kun du thob/_/dpang po srid pa gsum gyi dga' ba rab ster rgyal ba'i brtson 'grus dpyid la ni/_/lhan cig byed pa 'phro ba nyid kyis mchod par gyur par khyod kyi bya ba yis/_/gsung rab snye ma rnams las zag pa zhi ba bdud rtsi'i
[\[385a\]]
[\[385a.1\]]btung ba'i dga' ba yis/_/sdom brtson rkang drug pa dang mkhas pa snyan par sgrogs pa'i khu byug gso bar byed/_/smra ba mang po'i gnyis 'thung 'joms mdzad bde bar gshegs pa'i thugs kyi sa 'dzin gyi/_/phug pa zab ba'i khang pa ldan pa srid pa gsum gyi nags kyi lha ga pa yi/_/_
[\[385a.2\]]dbang po 'ga' zhig tu yang khyod kyi 'jigs pas bdud kyi gtum po'i dpud chen ni/_/rtsed mo'i ri yi rgya mtshor bltams pa ri dgas mo ltar ring du 'bros par byed/_/mgon po rnam par gnon par grags pa gdul bar dka' ba rnams ni gdul ba yi/_/ched du 'ga' zhig tu yang thugs rje'i shugs las
[\[385a.3\]]gang gi zhabs kyi rtse mo yis/_/nyan par 'dod pa 'jigs byed du ba'i sgra las gcig tu 'jug byed 'jig rten gsum/_/dman yang mnan 'di thim dang myur du rang gnas min par 'gro byed sku 'dzin byed/_/dge ba'i 'bras su lta bu'i bum pa bzang po rnams 'dzin gtso bo dpag bsam shing gis/_/mdzes pa phun
[\[385a.4\]]sum tshogs par gang gyur de nyid spyi bor bla ma gcig gis bskyed de/_/bshad par mdzad pas g.yob pa'i phyag gi phyag skyes rnams kyi mchog tu gsal ba dpung pa'i/_/yal ga 'di ni me tog rgyas pa'i 'khri shing rlung gis g.yo ba lta bur snang ngo /_/ma lus sangs rgyas rigs kyi rnyog pa mad pa'i cha shas
[\[385a.5\]]gter gyi spyod tshul 'di rnams/_/gal te snying la kun nas kun na grang ba chen po'i do shal nyams par 'gyur te/_/gal te lce yis ji ltar 'dod par byas na sprin gyi snying po'i grags pa ci zhig_/gal te rna ba gang bar byas par gyur na nor bu'i rna rgyan nges par bcom lags/_/bsod nams tshogs rnams nye bar
[\[385a.6\]]bsags pa mnyam pa med pa'i bdag nyid chen po khyod kyi/_/zhabs gdan nor bu'i rang bzhin dag gi stegs ni bde sogs lag pa'i mthil gyi bde ba/_/ster ba'i bsnyen bkur byed pa rnams kyis ma tshim gyur ba bzhin dang mchod sbyin brgya pa/_/'dud pa na ni mgo las tA ma la yi lo ma thob ste rang nyid gsal lo/_/_
[\[385a.7\]]gzhan gyi don la gnas pa shin tu brtan ldan rnams kyi dbang po sna tshogs thugs rje yi/_/sgo nas 'dus pa'i sna tshogs 'dod ldan nyams kyi gnas gyur gson cig bdag gis rigs lags so/_/bla ma gang gis bdag gi sdig pa rnam par bsgyings pa kun nas nun par byed pa rnams/_/'phrog byed dag byed rnams
[\[385b\]]
[\[385b.1\]]kyi dag byed gnas skabs de ni skad cig tsam yang bsgrub par mdzod/_/rgyal ba mchog gi rigs kyi chu gter 'phel la bcud rtsi'i 'od can shes rab mdzes ma dang /_/'grogs la yid srub gtam la mi gus 'jigs rung 'khrul pa'i mtshan mo yongs su 'dus pa la/_/nyi ma'i brtul zhugs 'dzin pa sna
[\[385b.2\]]tshogs nyon mongs ri dgas yang dag 'joms pa sgrub la/_/stag gis rnam par rtsen pa'i dpal ni khyed rnams dag la rtag tu bsrung bar gyur cig_/dri med ston ka'i zla ba'i 'od kyis yongs bskor zla ba'i gzugs las ma lus dga' bar bya la/_/rin thang med pa'i 'dzum pa'i nor ldan zhal can drag po'i gdon
[\[385b.3\]]rnams gdul ba thugs rje nyid las/_/'bad mdzad khyod kyi khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i gnas skabs nang gi skrag pa'i myu gu lta bur/_/lus skyes lang long gyur pa'i lha yi thub pa'i tshogs rnams dag gis mthong nas nyams par gyur to/_/'jigs pas nyams pa'i gzhon pa rnam dag shin tu ring bar
[\[385b.4\]]bral zhing brtan ba'i ched du 'ongs pa'i/_/'chi med rnams kyi gus pa lci ba khyad 'phags yid ni gsal bar byed la rgyu dang 'dra ba/_/shugs stobs mkha' ltar dpag tu med pa dus mtha'i sprin gyi sgra las lhag pa'i seng ge'i sgra can/_/bdud rnams yongs su nyams par byas pa khyod kyi seng ge'i rnam par rol pa
[\[385b.5\]]'gro la gyur cig_/tshogs rnams la khyab ston ka'i nam mkha'i dkyil ltar shin tu dag pa'i blo yi lhag par bsten pa/_/bzod dka'i gdung bas 'khrugs pa'i dpag med sems can khams kyi dbang gyur thugs rje dam pas phyug pa/_/yang dag bskyed dang mya ngan 'das la rtag tu mi gnas gsung ldan rnams
[\[385b.6\]]kyi mchog tu gyur pa/_/spyod tshul 'di 'dra ba ni ming tsam gyis kyang gzhan gyi grub par mngon par 'gro ba ma lags/_/drag por gdung bas rnam par bzhu ba'i lcag gi zer dang 'dra ba'i mig zur sdom pa'i skad cig la/_/sna tshogs yang dag 'phro ba dbang gyur phyogs bzhi'i dbang phyug rang bzhin gyis mthor skyes pa'i
[\[385b.7\]]bdag nyid ni/_/rnam par 'phrul pa'i spros pa rgyas pa spro byed mda' lnga pa ni 'joms byed rnams dang mdzes ma yi/_/skye bo bcu yi bdag nyid kyis kyang rab tu 'dod bya'i ngo mtshar dpal ni ci yang rgyas par byed/_/ma rig mngon par bcom pa khyod la mchod par 'dod pa'i rig 'dzin bu mo dri bzang gis bkug
[\[386a\]]
[\[386a.1\]]pa'i/_/bung ba'i tshogs rnams dga' bas sgrogs shing mchog tu rol pa'i me tog phreng ba 'dzin ma mdzes ma yi/_/'od zer spro ma rnams kyis nam mkha' kun khyab pa ni mig gi zur mig mdzes pa bsten pa yis/_/rab rgyas kun+da'i tshogs kyis rab dkrigs bzhin dang rdul zags yan
[\[386a.2\]]lag brlan pas yang yang bkrus pa bzhin/_/dbang po bcom ldan bla mar gus pa nyid dag tshig gis rtogs bya min pa yon tan rgya mtsho gang zhig_/srid pa'i lam du 'gro ba'i skye bo khyod kyi mtshan gyi rang bzhin glu dbyangs rtag tu len pa 'dis ni/_/gzugs dang skye tshul dang ni rnam par 'byor dang rnam gnon
[\[386a.3\]]khyad 'phags phun sum tshogs mtha'/_/sgrogs pa'i grags pa dri ma med pa ston ka'i zla ltar mchog tu rab mdzes nges par bde blag sgrub bo/_/ngag gi dbang phyug mchog sbyin khyod la nor gyi yul la dga' dang bral bar gtor ma mtha' gcig nyer bsgrubs pa'i/_/blo gros bzang pos bdud rtsi'i rgyun gyis
[\[386a.4\]]bkrus par gyur cing steng du 'khor la rab cher myos pa glu len pa'i/_/sbrang rtsi byed pa'i tshogs ldan dga' ba'i rol pa'i gnas gcig thub pa'i yid ni rnam par 'gyur bar byed pa yang /_/stobs yod gyur pa'i longs spyod dpal ldan nyid kyis rtsen pa mtho ris rnams su nges par nyams su myong bar byed/_/_
[\[386a.5\]]stobs rnams kyi gter khyod nyid gcig pu skyabs byas mi ni chang gi lci ba'i 'gram pas bsgrags pa rab mtho ba'i/_/sprin dag pham byed glang chen dbang po'i tshogs kyi dri ma can gyur rno byas mtha' dag mtshon cha'i 'od zer dag_/'phro pa'i gos dag bcings pa'i rkang thang tshogs can rab mchog shing rta
[\[386a.6\]]bzhon pa'i dmag mi bzang ldan yig 'phrog pa'i/_/ngal so dang ni rab tu 'jug dang dbang du 'gro ba'i rta mchog rnams kyi rol pa can dpung rten par byed/_/mkhas pa rnams kyi sa la bzhugs pa'i dbang po dga' ba'i gnas gyur rab mchog rgya mtsho rab sbyin bsten par mdzad pa/_/brjod pa rnams
[\[386a.7\]]su mtha'i go 'phang can khyod the tshom so sor bcom pa gang zhig rgyun du dran par byed na/_/na tshod kyis rol blon po can gyi tshogs ni lnga pa'i dbyangs dag sgrub par byed pa'i ngal sos dga' bar bya la/_/bsil zer can gyi gdong can mdzes ma de yi dbang du gyur pa 'di ni mi bdag dpal dang lhan cig gyur ro/_/_
[\[386b\]]
[\[386b.1\]]sna tshogs pa la phan pa kun nas chags pa gcig pur bzod pa'i nang gi rgyu yi byed pa lhag pa'i bdag po kwa ye/_/'di ni gang zhig nor gyi gnas ltar mchog rab khyod mtshan 'dzin bar byed pa de yi mngon du lha yi gnas kyi mtsho'o/_/phyogs kyi glang po byings pa'i 'gram pa dag las 'phos par gyur pa'i
[\[386b.2\]]chang gi dri bzang rab tu bsgos pa'i rol pa can/_/bzhad dang ngang pa khrung khrung rkang pas mtshan cing gser gyi pad+ma'i nags mthor bung ba'i tshogs rnams sgra sgrogs can yang 'grub/_/mun pa 'joms par mdzad pa bdud kyi dgra bo sdig pa bcom pa rgyal ba'i sras kyi sa la rgyan gyur dga' bar mdzad pa/_/shugs
[\[386b.3\]]stobs 'dus pa'i rol sgeg dpal can srid pa zhig pa rnams kyi gsung gi lugs dag skyed byed pha rol gnon pa/_/mchog sbyin khyod la 'bras ldan bsnyen bkur brtsams pa blo bzang rnams su rnam par gsal ba rgyas pa longs spyod la chags pas kyang /_/'di na mchog tu mi bzad yul gyi lus 'dzin lag
[\[386b.4\]]'gro'i rnam par bsgyings pa rang 'dod bzhin du rnam par 'dul bar byed do/_/rab tu gsal bar rgyun chad med par dpag med bdud rtsi'i bcud kyi ma ltar yan lag rnams ni kun nas rgyas par byed pa yi/_/so sor kun du blta ba yang dag sgrub byed gsar pa'i 'dod 'byung nyams kyi gnas gyur mtshungs pa med
[\[386b.5\]]pa mi mnyam dpal can/_/gang zhig dka' ba spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs legs byas sgrub pa gzhan pa rnams kyis rnyed par sla min khyod la brten pa yi/_/shing gi 'bras bu rgyud pa ma lus 'jigs byed ces bya de 'dir brtson pa'i bdag nyid can gyis yang dag nyams su myong ngo /_/g.yo bar gyur pa'i zhabs kyis
[\[386b.6\]]btsir ba'i ri yi dbang po dang ldan sa 'og rgan gyur gyen du 'phyong ba'i klu skyong gis bstod pa/_/des par lhung bzhin pa yi phyag dbyig tshogs kyi char pa drag po rab tu ldan pa'i chu 'dzin rab tu drag po'i rlung gis ni/_/mchog tu rol ba ngal ba zhi ba rgyas byed lta bu gang la 'jigs pa'i dus su dogs pas
[\[386b.7\]]'jig rten gsum pa skrag par 'gyur ba/_/thugs rje bzang pos rtsen cing 'phro ba khyod kyi pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug rnam pa'i rol par 'khrungs pas rgyal gyur cig_/mchog sbyin gzhan la phan pa dpag med dam pa'i bu lon mchog can rkang pa so sor mngon par 'phel las dag par 'khrungs shing 'gyur ba med
[\[387a\]]
[\[387a.1\]]la/_/mtha' yi ngo bor son pa'i rnam gsum ting nge 'dzin rnams yang dag rtogs pa'i dbang las 'phags mchog rab tu mang po rab tu dgyes pa rnams kyis/_/rab tu sgrogs mdzad gang la rjes su dga' bas ca co yang dag sgrogs pas mi ngoms sems ldan lha rnams kyis dkrol sil snyan
[\[387a.2\]]rgya mtsho'i sbrul lta'i/_/char sprin rol pa'i sgra yi 'byung gnas rab mtho dung la sogs rnams dal bar mi bgrod khyod kyi mthu stobs mchog gi 'dir ni rgyal gyur cig_/rab tu rgyas pa'i gser gyi pad+ma'i skal bzang brten pa'i sku can rten byed rnams la mun par nyi ma'i dngos po sbyin mdzad pa/_/sa
[\[387a.3\]]gsum zhi ba sgrub pa'i ched du mya ngan 'das pa bzlog mdzad ta ma la yi dbyibs can srid pa'i dgra la gus thob kyi/_/mgon po stobs bcu pa yi sras kyi tshogs kyi mchog gyur nges par 'khrugs pa'i sdug bsngal 'joms mdzad khyod la de ltar bstod pa yis/_/gang zhig rab bsags dge ba'i phung po chen
[\[387a.4\]]po de las skye bo'i tshogs pa mtha' dag la yang 'byor pa de nyid 'byung gyur cig_/bdag kyang khyod kyi zhabs pad mngon bar mnyes par bye dpa'i dbang gyur blo yi nang gi mun pa yang dag nges par 'gags pa skyes pa/_/mtha' dag dngos po'i phung po la khyab 'dris pa rmi lam sgyu ma'i rang bzhin gnyis su med
[\[387a.5\]]pa'i de nyid yang dag rtogs pa/_/brtse med rnams la brtse ba'i stobs dang mi bzlogs brtson 'grus skyes dang rnam pa sna tshogs bya ba brtsams pas bdud rnams nub byed spyad tshul/_/srid pa gsum la mchog tu phan pa gcig bu'i bya ba can ni skye bo gcig ma grol ba ji srid du yang spyad par bgyi'o/_/rab rgyas
[\[387a.6\]]thang gi chu skyes bkram dang mtshungs pa 'dzin pa'i zhabs gdan mthar ni lha dang klu dang lha min dbang po'i gtsug gi nor bu'i 'od zer tshogs kyis mdzes pa ngal so/_/bzod dka' mchog tu che ba'i sdug bsngal mes nyams nus pa 'khrugs pa'i 'jig rten gsum po mya ngan bral bar byas la ngal dang ngal so
[\[387a.7\]]med pa'i spyod pa rmad byung gter gyur/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi rigs rgyud dag pa'i rgyan du rab gsal grags ba rgyas pas phyogs kyi khongs dag khyab pa gzhon nu ngag gi dbang phyug bzlog par dka' ba bdud kyi/_/dpa' bo'i dmag dpung kun gyi spro ba 'jigs par byed la mngon par
[\[387b\]]
[\[387b.1\]]dga' dang ldan pa'i mnyam med nus pa bkod pas shin tu rab gdung byed pa shar 'dis rgyal bar gyur cig_/stobs ldan rdo rje btsun mo mchog gi yan lag rnams su yongs su bskyod pas rnam par rol mdzad gsog gsob tshogs las 'gro ba rgyal ba'i go cha/_/rgyu mar bcas shing zhag bcas khrag
[\[387b.2\]]dang chang gi btung bas rnam par myos pas ma bsdams rnam 'gyur gad rgyangs cher bgad lha dang lha min skrag mdzad/_/thugs brtse ba dang shin tu sbyor ba ngo mtshar rang bzhin dpe zla med pa'i drag po'i sku can gnyis med rgya mtsho chen por ngas bar zhugs pa/_/yon tan dag pa'i gzhir gyur rgya che'i gar gyi nyams
[\[387b.3\]]dgu rnams dang ldan pa rol pa'i spyod tshul can gyur thugs rje'i stobs la mngon par phyag 'tshal/_/zhes pa bya dka'i bye brag br-it+ta mA la'i bstod par mnyam pa'i pr-it+ta rnams so/_/thugs rje'i dbang gis 'jug pa'i tshul can khyod kyi sku/_/shar ka min pa'i ri bong can gyi 'od can byed/_/phyed ni nyi ma
[\[387b.4\]]shar ka'i gzugs brnyan 'dzin pa 'dis/_/su yi yid ni 'dzin par mi bgyid lags/_/myur ba de nyid bdud rtsi'i bcud kyis tshim pa'i khyad par dang /_/mtha' dag kun du bsgrubs pa'i dngos grub dbang las kyang ni/_/khyod kyi zhabs dag nyams su myong ba'i blo gros med pa rung /_/'byung bya min no sdig pa
[\[387b.5\]]'joms pa rigs pa kwa ye/_/gtso bo 'gro la phan pa gal te khyod kyis ni/_/gzigs pa bdud rtsi'i ro yi rgyun dang do shal mdzes pas/_/khyab par byas pas dkar la mtho ba de rnams kyis/_/lus 'gyur na ni mkhas pa rnams kyi lhag pa ci 'dod/_/zhal gyi dpal ni rgyas bar gyur pa mchog 'di thugs rje/_/chen po'i
[\[387b.6\]]blo can gnyug ma'i blo gros dpal gyi bcud rnams dang /_/yan dag ldan zhing g.yo ba'i mchu yi 'dab ma can ni/_/shin tu yid 'phrog gser gyi chus kyes rgyas 'dod bzhin du snang /_/khyod kyi zhal bzang gzhan 'di ut+pal bsdams pa yi/_/mdzes pa rnams ni yang dag bsags pa bzhin du snang zhing /_/zhal ras gzhan pa
[\[387b.7\]]ku mu ta ye dpal gyis ni/_/yang dag bskyed pa bzhin te 'di 'dras yid 'phrog mdzad do/_/'gro ba gsum las rgyal ba'i ngang can khyod kyis ni/_/rol pa 'di yang byis pa'i rol pa'o gang phyir la lar/_/don sgrub pa ni thams cad bskyod phyir khyod kyis ni/_/spyod pa'i tshul 'di e ma phyed mnyam pa ru mthong ngo /_/skad cig
[\[388a\]]
[\[388a.1\]]gcig la stobs kyis 'jig rten gsum gyi/_/rtse mo kun nas gnon pa khyod kyi zhal mthong nas/_/kun gyi dag ni rang gi bran mo bzhin du/_/khyod la snyan par smra bar ci ltar mi 'gyur lags/_/khyod kyi thugs rje gal te shugs ldan mi 'gyur/_/na ni rang gi ngang gis 'byung ba'i zhi ba'i lam/_/bsal nas blo ldan
[\[388a.2\]]gyis kyang rtogs par dka' ba'i/_/spyod pa shin tu ngo mtshar brgya yis ci zhig lags/_/kun las khyad par 'phags pa'i gzi brjid kyi gnas/_/yan lag kun khyab mtshon sla mtshan gyi dpal ldan zhing /_/bzang po rnam par gsal ba khyod sku kun gyis/_/dran par gyur bas kyang ni bzang po rgyas par mdzad/_/gzhan don mchog tu
[\[388a.3\]]don gnyer rnams kyis khyod sku kun nas 'phro zhing mngon par dga' 'os 'od zer gyi/_/rang bzhin rdo rje pad+ma ral gri nor bu/_/'khor lo rnams kyi tog dang ldan par rnam par snang /_/sems skams tsam gyis dngos po bsten pa'i snying rje la ni phun tshogs gzhan dang gzhan min don 'di 'dra ba gal 'byung /_/de 'di khyod kyi dbyibs kyis dor
[\[388a.4\]]te de phyir cha shas/_/sgra dang ldan pa'i rkyen dang bud med rtags kyis brjod pa'o/_/'char bzhin pa yi skya rengs rnams kyi 'od zer tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba'i/_/gser gyi rang bzhin dri ma dang bral kha ba'i 'od las nges rgyal ba/_/'gro ba ma lus mngon par dga' bar byed la mkhas shing shin tu mdzes pa/_/khyod kyi sku lus 'di yis
[\[388a.5\]]rgyal bar gyur cig shin tu byung ba kye/_/srid pa gsum gyis rtogs par dka' ba'ang zhabs la yongs su rgyu ba can gyi rnal 'byor lci ba bcom ldan bde bar gshegs pa dkar po ma yin pa'i/_/gzugs brnyan dang mtshungs dri ma rnam par bral ba'i nor bu nges par bsags pas spras phyir legs par yongs su 'byor ba'i yon tan rnams
[\[388a.6\]]kyi gnas/_/rang gi tshul lugs rjod par byed pa'i sgra ni zhum pa brjod pa yang dag rjes su byed la ro can lta bu'i lha yi me tog dri bzang po/_/yongs su byugs pa'i dri bzang gis 'dus bung ba'i tshogs kyi 'phungs gter khyod kyi gtsug gi phud kyis rgyal bar gyur cig rtogs pa'i chu gter gyi/_/yang dag dar ba'i phyogs la 'dod pa nye
[\[388a.7\]]bar bab ba rnams la yang dag dar bar byed pa rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par rjod byed cing /_/rab tu zhi ba'i bde ba'i rol ro myong blo can rnam la dpe zla med pa'i zhi ba'i bde ba'i lam rjod byed la lhur len chen po can/_/dpag tu med pa'i legs par byas pa'i 'bras bu blo can rnams la nges par drang zhing gya gyu'i blon can rnams la phul
[\[388b\]]
[\[388b.1\]]du ni/_/dbyung du med pa'i 'khyog pa'i tshig can khyod kyi gsung gis rgyal bar gyur cig lhag pa'i bdag po rgyal ba'i tshul gyi 'dren byed bdud rtsi'i khang ba kye/_/gang zhig khyod la bstod cing khyod kyi yon tan rnams/_/kun nas bshad pa 'di zhes mngon par rlom byed pa/_/de ni nges par 'khur ba gang ba'i chu ldan bas/_/bdag gi chu
[\[388b.2\]]gter nges par 'thungs so zhes pa nyid/_/'on kyang dran pa'i dgra bo ma lus rnams kyis kyang /_/brjod bya nyid ni brjod mi spyod pa mgon khyod kyi/_/yon tan rnams la don med mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis/_/brjod pa 'di ni phyin ci log pa snga ma can/_/zhes pa 'jug tshul phreng ba phyed mnyam pa'i brit+ta rnams so/_/yon tan rgya mtsho skabs
[\[388b.3\]]gzhan rnams su/_/rgya mtsho ma bskams brgyad po zhabs kyis te por btsir las/_/'phel pa rnams kyis sor mo'i khung bu gang ba min zhing bzod bya min pa/_/zhabs can mi mnyam pa ni rkang pa bzhi po gong ma can gyi thugs rje'i dgongs pa thob byed/_/ces pas nges par bsgrags pa'i rang bzhin/_/mi zad zhabs kyi bkod pa bya zhing
[\[388b.4\]]yang ba dang ni/_/lci ba'i nges pa 'dzin la gal te khyod kyis nges par mngon par smre sngags/_/tshig sgrub pa la rjes su gdung bar mi 'gyur ba ni 'jigs par 'gyur ba min pa su yin/_/ma rungs skye bo 'dul bar byed cing /_/rnam par gtsigs pa'i sku lus ston par mdzad pa khyod kyis/_/me tog kha 'bus 'di ni grong gsum 'phrog pa'i cod
[\[388b.5\]]pan nor bu 'dra dang /_/shin tu yun rings pan pa'i blo gros nges par mdzad pa'i sdong bu'i myu gu bzhin du snang ngo /_/khyod kyi spyan gyis cung zad gtad pa'i rol ba rab tu/_/stobs ldan mngon par mngon par phyogs pas me chen stug po 'jigs su rung ba'i/_/dra ba rab tu rgyas pa'i nam mkha'i mthil du bar mtshams med pa 'dzin par byed cing
[\[388b.6\]]gshin rje/_/yang ni rab tu zhi bar mdzad do/_/'di ni kho na sdig pa drag po dug gi phung po/_/mtha' dag rab tu zhi byas slar yang skye bo 'jam po'i rjes su yang dang /_/yang du mngon par gsar ba'i bde ba mnyam pa med pa'i gter dag kun du 'dren par byed cing /_/nges par gyur pa'i bdud rtsi'i rgyun lags/_/dbang po sku lus chu gter phung po
[\[388b.7\]]glog gis/_/mchog tu 'bar zhing chu yi khur gyis ljid la/_/'jigs rung 'brug sgra che ldan thugs rje lci yang gis/_/'gro ba rgyun du 'phags pa 'di yis rgyal gyur cig_/'di nyid phyir na shin tu bya ba dka' ba yi/_/rnam par rol pa brgya rnams rgyas par mdzad pa/_/khyod kyis gsal bar grags pa'i dri bzang nyid kyis/_/rmad du byung ba 'di yis
[\[389a\]]
[\[389a.1\]]'jig rten ma lus tshim par mdzad/_/khro gnyer gzigs stangs can gyi tshems rnams la ni/_/rnam par 'gyur rnams ci yang rnam par 'dzin pa/_/khyod kyi sku lus rgyal bar gyur cing 'on kyang gang zhig_/mi bzad 'di 'dra ba yis 'jig rten pa rnams 'dul bar mdzad la/_/ri yi bya skyibs 'jigs pa rmad byung phul byung de 'dra
[\[389a.2\]]ba yang /_/'gro la mi phan gzhom pa'i ched du kun du mnyam du ni/_/khyod kyis dal bur gshegs pa rol pa dang /_/bcas la'ang phul du dbyung du med pa'i mgyogs ldan rlung gi rjes 'gro min/_/gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das kyi khyu mchog rlabs po che'i/_/gnas ni mtshungs pa med pa/_/dag par snang ba'i khyad par can/_/'dzin pa khyod
[\[389a.3\]]ni rten du thob pa de/_/de phyir gzhan pa mi mnyam rnams kyi/_/mgo bor rkang pa nges par 'jog_/bsam pa gcig pa phun sum tshogs pas/_/khyod mnyes byas nas/_/dge ba dri ma med pa/_/'phel pa bzhin pa zhes gang yod pa/_/de las 'jig rten ma lus 'di rnams shin tu spyod tshul/_/khyad par rnams kyis/_/khyod kyis mngon par dgongs pa'i/_/_
[\[389a.4\]]go 'phang chen por/_/mchog tu 'gro bar gyur cig_/gzhan yang /_nges par 'dod bya dri ma med pas/_/dge ba 'di ni/_/slar yang /_/rab tu bsags par byas pas/_/lus dang ldan pa/_/mtha' dag rnams kyi/_/srid pa yis/_/mtshan mo las byung /_/mun pa'i phung po/_/rnam par bral gyur cig_/gzhan yang /_/stobs ldan shes rab rab dkar/_/kun nas/_/_
[\[389a.5\]]'khyud pas/_/lus med rtsen pa/_/'di ru gzings chen po la/_/mdzes pa bsags pa'i/_/rang bzhin lta bu'i lus ni/_/phul du dbyung du med pa'i/_/snying rje can/_/'bab byed cing /_/nyams su myong 'gyur/_/khyod la/_/sna tshogs/_/'jug tshul rnams kyis/_/de ltar bsngags pas/_/dge ba zla ba'i 'od zer/_/dri med bsags pa gang yin/_/de las 'jig rten/_/_
[\[389a.6\]]mya ngan las ni/_/yongs grol ba/_/bde ba/_/chen pos/_/khyab pa'i/_/rtse mo grogs/_/mchog 'byung 'gyur/_/'phags pa/_/'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi bstod pa/_/bya dka' ba'i khyad par 'jug tshul gyi phreng ba/_/mkhas pa chen po gnas brtan ye shes dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//'di yi ge bcu gnyis pa'i tshigs bcad bcu gnyis
[\[389a.7\]]pa ya mu na yan chad/_shong ston lo tsA ba chen po rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur te 'phro la lus pa las shong ston de nyid kyi brgyud pa'i slob ma dpang lo tsA ba dge slong dpal ldan blo gros brtan pas/_slob dpon shAkya rak+Shi tas mdzad pa'i 'grel pa la brten nas/_yongs su rdzogs par bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//_//
